akaြောငya”paြcātamya”lhaှာ
yaṃ passati na taṃ diṭṭhaṃ， yaṃ diṭṭhaṃ taṃ na passati．
apassaṃ bajjhate mūḷaှော， bajjhamāno na muccati．
(abhi-ṭṭha-2-347． dī-ṭṭha-2-207． ma-ṭṭha-1-247．)
loko = paramatyañāṇyapaññāmaျkyaci kāṇya”၍neso lūsā”apoငya”saññya． yaṃ = akaြငya
yokyaျာ” minya”makiု． passati = micchādassanaā”phaြင’ya maှာ”maှာ”yhaငya”yhaငya” (yokyaျာ” minya”mahu) simaြငya၍ ne၏．
taṃ = thiု paramatyañāṇyapaññāmaျkyaci kāṇya”၍nesañña’ya lūsā”apoငya”tiု’ maှာ”maှာ”yhaငya”yhaငya” simaြငyaapyaso
yokyaျာ” minya”masaññya． diṭṭhaṃ = paramatyañāṇyapaññāmaျkyaciphaြင’ya takayya maြငyasaင’ya maြငyathiုkyaso
tarā”saññyakā”． na = mahutyapāpe．
yaṃ = (ka) akaြငya rūpāruṅkiု， (kha) akaြငya chaṃpaငyacaso koṭṭhāsaapoငya”kiု， (ga) akaြငya bhūtarupya
upādārupyaapoငya”kiုkā”． diṭṭhaṃ = paññāraှိsūtoyakoငya”apoငya”tiု’saññya paramatyañāṇyapaññāmaျkyaciphaြင’ya takayya
maြငyasaင’ya maြငyathiုkya၏．
taṃ = paññāraှိsūtoyakoငya”apoငya”tiု’saññya paramatyañāṇyapaññāmaျkyaciphaြင’ya takayya maြငyasaင’ya maြငyathiုkyaso
(ka) thiု rūpāruṅkiု， (kha) thiု chaṃpaငyacaso koṭṭhāsaapoငya”kiု， (ga) thiု bhūtarupya upādārupyaapoငya”kiု．
loko = paramatyañāṇyapaññāmaျkyaci kāṇya”၍neso lūsā”apoငya”saññya． paññācakkhunā = paramatya
ñāṇyapaññācakkhuphaြင’ya． bhūtato = hutyamaှnyasoā”phaြင’ya． na passati = masi mamaြငya．
apassaṃ = paramatyañāṇyapaññācakkhuphaြင’ya hutyatiုငya”maှnyachā masi mamaြငyaso． mūḷaှော = asimaှာ”laျkya
thevesosūkiု． bajjhate = rāgaphaြင’ya naှောငyaphhaဲ’apya၏． bajjhamāno = rāgaphaြင’ya anaှောငyaaphhaဲ’ khaṃrasosūsaññya．
na muccati = kilesavaṭyadukkha saṃsarāvaṭyadukkhamaှ malhatyamaြောkyaniုငyape．
(abhi-ṭṭha-2-347． dī-ṭṭha-2-207． ma-ṭṭha-1-247． mūlaṭī-2-148．)

chaṃpaငyaacaraှိso koṭṭhāsaapoငya”kiု chaṃpaငya acaraှိso koṭṭhāsa apoငya”acuhu laññya”koငya”，
bhūtarupya upādārupyatiု’၏ apoငya”acu phaြcyaso rūpakāya = rupyatarā”apoငya”kiု bhūtarupya upādārupyatiု’၏
apoငya”acuhulaññya”koငya”， nāmakāya = nāmyatarā”tiု’၏ acuapuṅkiုlaññya” nāmyatarā”tiု’၏ acuapuṃ
hulaññya”koငya”， akaြောငya”tarā” akaျို”tarā”tiု’၏ acuapuṅkiုlaññya” akaြောငya”tarā” akaျို”tarā”tiု’၏
acuapuṃhulaññya”koငya”， aniccatarā” dukkhatarā” anattatarā” asubhatarā” acuapuṅkiုlaññya” aniccatarā”

thiုthiုāruṃpoya၌ thayyatātapyamakyamaှု rāgatarā”ka racyapatyanaှောငyaphhaဲ’၍ thā”၏． rāga၏ racyapatyanaှောငyaphhaဲ’maှုkiု
khaṃyūneraso thiုlūsā”saññya kilesavaṭya kammavaṭya vipākavaṭya taññya”hūso vaṭyasuṃ”pā”tiု’ achakyamapaြtya
laññyapatyanerā īsaṃsarāmaှ malhatyamaြောkyaniုငya．
paramatyañāṇyapaññācakkhutaññya”hūso sammādiṭṭhiñāṇyapaññānaှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃso sūtoyakoငya”saññyakā”-
1． rūpāruṅkiု rūpāruṃhulaññya”koငya”，
2． chaṃpaငyaacaraှိso koṭṭhāsaapoငya”acukiု chaṃpaငyaacaraှိso koṭṭhāsaapoငya”acuhulaññya”koငya”，
3． bhūtarupya upādārupyatiု’၏ apoငya”acu phaြcyaso rūpakāya = rupyatarā”apoငya”kiု bhūtarupya
upādārupyatiု’၏ apoငya”acuhulaññya”koငya”，
4． nāmakāya = nāmyatarā”tiု’၏ apāငya”acukiုlaññya” nāmakāya = nāmyatarā”tiု’၏ apāငya”acu
hulaññya”koငya”，
5． akaြောငya”tarā” akaျို”tarā”tiု’၏ acuapuṅkiုlaññya” akaြောငya”tarā” akaျို”tarā”tiု’၏ acuapuṃ
hulaññya”koငya”，
6． aniccatarā”acuapuṃ dukkhatarā”acuapuṃ anattatarā”acuapuṃ asubhatarā”acuapuṅkiုlaññya”
aniccatarā”acuapuṃ dukkhatarā”acuapuṃ anattatarā”acuapuṃ asubhatarā”acuapuṃhulaññya”koငya”
paramatyañāṇyapaññācakkhutaññya”hūso sammādiṭṭhiñāṇyapaññāphaြင’ya kiုyyatiုငyamaျkyamaှောkya thhaငya”phokya
simaြငya၏． thiုsiု’ mathemave thhaငya”phokyasimaြငyaneso sūtoyakoငya”kiု rāgasaññya manaှောငyaphhaဲ’apya manaှောငyaphhaဲ’niုငya．
rāga၏ racyapatyanaှောငyaphhaဲ’maှုkiု makhaṃraso thiုsūtoyakoငya”saññya kilesātiု’maှ lhatyamaြောkyaniုငya၏
saṃsarāvaṭyachaငya”raဲdukkhamaှ lhatyamaြောkyaniုငya၏．
īkā” athakyapā gāthā၏ chiုliုraငya”taññya”．
paramatyasiု’ ñāṇyaamaြငyamachiုkyaso paññāmaျkyaci kāṇya”neso lūsā”tacyaū”၏ amaြငyanaှင’ya paramatyasiု’
ñāṇyaamaြငyachiုkyaneso paññācakkhutaññya”hūso sammādiṭṭhiñāṇyaamaြငyanaှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃso sūtoyakoငya”
tacyaū”၏ amaြငyakā” amaြငyakhaျငya” matūpe． paññācakkhu kāṇya”neso lūsā”kā” paramatyasiု’ chiုkyaaောငya
mamaြငya， paññācakkhunaှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃso sūtoyakoငya”saññyakā” paramatyasiု’ chiုkyaaောငya maြငya၏．
ī gāthākiု akaြောငya”paြု၍ raှေ”sūtoyakoငya”tiု’kalaññya” ---
1． maြငyasā maြငyatayya mamaြငyabhū”，
2． kaြာ”sā kaြာ”tayya makaြာ”bhū”，
3． naṃsā naṃtayya manaṃbhū”，
4． arasākiု sāyāsā sāyātayya arasāmasibhū”，
5． thisā thitayya masibhū”，
6． sisā sitayya masibhū” ---
īsiု’ āruṃ (6)pā”luṃ”၌ amaှာ”the’nepuṅkiု mina’yatoyamūkaြsaññya．
(sammohavinodanībhāsāṭīkā-dutiyathaဲ-286．)

gha
paramatyasiု’ chiုkyaaောငya masimamaြငyaso paññācakkhu kāṇya”neso lūsā”tacyaū”kiု raññyaññhaှnya”၍
raှေ”sūhoငya”tiု’၏ mina’yakaြာ”toyamūkhaျkyamaျာ”paငya phaြcyakaြ၏．
akayya၍ asaငyasūtoyakoငya”saññyalaññya” saṃsarāvaṭyachaငya”raဲdukkhamaှ laှlaှkaြီ” kaျhatyalhatyathhakyamaြောkyaliုkhaဲ’pāmū
paramatyasiု’ chiုkyaaောငya thhaငya”phokyasimaြငyatatyaso paññācakkhutaññya”hūso sammādiṭṭhi
ū”choငyasañña’ya maggaငya (8)pā” akaျင’yamaြtyatarā”tiု’kiု bhurā”ho pāḷitoyakaြီ”naှင’ya aṭṭhakathā ṭīkātiု’၌
ññhaှnyakaြာ”paြsa chiုchuṃ”matoyamūsañña’yaatiုငya” canacyatakaျ kaျင’yakaြံkaြို”kutya phā”maျာ”ā”thutyaramaññya phaြcya၏．
bhurā”ho pāḷitoyanaှင’ya aññī maggaငya (8)pā” kaျင’yacañyatarā”tiု’kiု acīacañyatakaျ paြñña’yapaြñña’yacuṃcuṃ phhaင’yachiု
re”sā”thā”so kaျmya”maှာ visuddhimaggaaṭṭhakathākaျmya”paငya phaြcya၏．
visuddhimaggaaṭṭhakathā၏ paṭi ññāñya khaṃvanyakhaျkya
sudullabhaṃ labhithāna， pabbajjaṃ jinasāsane．
sīlādisaṅgahaṃ khemaṃ， ujuṃ maggaṃ visuddhiyā．
yathābhūtaṃ ajānantā， suddhikāmāpi ye idha．
visuddhiṃ nādhigacchana Åd， vāyamantāpi yogino．
tesaṃ pāmojjakaraṇaṃ， suvisuddhavinicchayaṃ．
mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ， desanānayanissitaṃ．
visuddhimaggaṃ bhāsissaṃ， taṃ me sakkacca bhāsato．
visuddhikāmā sabbepi， nisāmayatha sādhavo． (visuddhi-1-2 ．)
maြtyachābhurā”raှငya၏ sāsanātoyamaြtyaathaငya”၌ alhanyalaျှငya rakhaဲchāso raှငyarahanya”aphaြcyakiု raraှိkaြ
pākunyalaျkya sīla samādhi paññātaññya”hūso sikkhāsuṃ”rapya akaျင’yamaြtyatiု’phaြင’ya simya”kaျုံ”rethakyaapyaso，
kilesākhiု”sā”dhā”paြtiု’၏ pityachiု’naှောင’yayaှkyamaှုhūso bhe”ranyakaငya”so， attakilamathānuyoga kāmasukhallikānuye
mga sassatadiṭṭhi ucchedadiṭṭhi māyā sāṭheyaျcaso akhe’akokyaamaျို”maျို”kiု kaြñyaraှောငya
payyalhaှဲsaphaြင’ya lamya”khaဲmaraှိ tacyariု”taññya” (= tacyakaြောငya”taññya”) phaြောင’yamatyachāso， arahattaphiုlya nibbānya၏
rarārakaြောငya” rokyarārokyakaြောငya”phaြcyaso phaြူcaငyamaြင’yamaြtyasañña’ya maggaငya (8)pā” akaျင’yamaြtyatarā”kiု --
hutyatiုငya”maှnyachā masikunyasokaြောင’ya ī gotamabhurā”raှငya၏ sāsanātoyamaြtyaathaငya”၌paငyalaျှငya
arahattaphiုlya nibbānyakiု liုlā”toင’yatasaññya phaြcyakunyalaျkyalaññya”， samatha vipassanā naှcyaphaြာso bhā0nā၌

1． nibbānagāminipaṭipadā amaññyaraso īkaျmya”၌ samādhithūthoငyapuṃapiုငya”thaငya ānāpānassatisamādhi

kaြီ”maျာ”၌ bhurā”raှငyahokaြာ”thā”toyamūsañña’yaatiုငya” re”sā”taငyapaြthā”၏． thiုsiု’ re”sā”taငyapaြphhaင’yachiုrā၌

10． visuddhimaggaaṭṭhakathā dutiyathaဲ cāmaျkyanaှာ (300-301) tiု’thaငya vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā amaျို”maျို”tiု’kiု
re”sā”taငyapaြthā”၏．
(ka) ajjhatta khandhāငါ”pā” sakyasakyakiု vipassanāraှုruṃmaျှphaြင’ya，
( kha ) bahiddha khandhāငါ”pā” sakyasakyakiု vipassanāraှုruṃmaျှphaြင’ya，
( ga ) bhūtarupya upādārupyahūso rupyatarā” sakyasakyakiု vipassanāraှုruṃmaျှphaြင’ya，
(gha) nāmyakhandhāle”pā” sakyasakyakiု vipassanāraှုruṃmaျှphaြင’ya ---
vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā maphaြcyaniုငyakaြောငya” = ariyamagyasiု’ machiုkyaniုငyakaြောငya”kiု chuṃ”phaြtyathā”၏． thiုthaငya
vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā (9) maျို”naှင’ya patyasakyaso achuṃ”aphaြtyamaျာ”kiု aṭṭhasālinīaṭṭhakathāhu amaññyatapya၍
mimikiုyyatiုငya bhāsāpaြnyachiုthā”so abhidhammāaṭṭhakathā (abhi-ṭṭha-1-270-271．) maှ thutyanutya၍ phoyapaြthā”
pesaññya． nibbānyakiု liုlā”toင’yatalaျkyaraှိkaြkunyaso tarā”cacya tarā”maှnyakiု khaျcyamaြtyaniု”toyamūkaြkunyaso，
sitoyamū maြငyatoyamūsañña’ya sabbaññusammāsambuddhabhurā”raှငya kiုyyatoyatiုငya kaြhashā”toyamūsañña’ya
khaျmaှtyashā”toyamūsañña’ya tacyakaြောငya”taññya”so lamya”phaြcyasañña’ya nibbānyasiု’shā”rā lamya”riု” lamya”hoငya”kaြီ”
atiုငya” canacyahoငya”kaြီ”atiုငya” kaျင’yakaြံkaြို”kutya phā”maျာ”ā”thutyaliုkaြkunyaso sūtoyakoငya”apoငya”tiု’
riုsesamaှု ale”garupaြု၍ nāyūmaှtyasā”ramañña’ya raှေ”thuṃ”hoငya” upadesakaြီ” tacyakhupaငya phaြcyasaññya．
araှငyamahābuddhaghosa matheryamaြtyasaññya aṭṭhakathāmaျာ”chātiု’kiု cīraငya re”sā”toya mūkhaဲ’saññyamaှာ
maှnyasoyalaññya” mimi၏ ñāṇyachamya” ñāṇyacaphaြင’ya tīthhaငyakaြံcha၍ re”sā”khaဲ’saññyakā” mahutya， sīhiုḷyabhāsāphaြင’ya
taññyaraှိkhaဲ’so aṭṭhakathātiု’kiု pāḷibhāsāsiု’ bhāsāpaြnyachiုtoyamūkhaဲ’khaြငya”sālaျှငya phaြcyapesaññya． thapyamaṃ၍
anaññya”ငyya raှငya”laငya”taငyapaြapyapāsaññya．
araှငyamahābuddhaghosacharātoyabhurā”kaြီ”saññya samantapāsādikā maññyaso vinaññya”aṭṭhakathākiု
araှငyabuddhasirimatheryamaြtyaka laျှောkyathā” toငya”panyaapyasokaြောင’ya mahāvihārakaျောငya”tiုkya၏
toငyabhakya padhānagharaparivuṇyathaငya mahānigamasāmi amaññyaraso dāyakā၏ paြာsādya၌ sītaငya”suṃ”

F
charātoyaaraှငyasūmaြtyasaññya araှငyamahāmahinda rahantāmatheryamaြtyakaြီ”kiုyyatiုငya sīhiုḷyasiု’ choငyayūtoyamūkhaဲ’so
sīhiုḷyabhāsāphaြင’ya cīraငyathā”so mahāaṭṭhakathākiု thiု aṭṭhakathāsacya၏ kiုyyathaññyapaြု၍
mahāpaccarī， kurundī， saṅkhepa， andhaka aṭṭhakathātiု’maှlaññya” yūsaင’yayūthiုkyasaññyakiု yū၍ sīhiုḷyakaျhanya”၌
0sabhamaငya”lakyathakyatiုငyaaောငya thaငyaraှာ”kunyaso raှေ”raှေ”vinaññya”dhiုryamatheryamaြtyatiု’၏ achuṃ”aphaြtyaphaြcyaso
theravādakiုlaññya” thañña’yashaငya”၍ re”sā”cīraငyatoyamūlesaññya． thiုkaြောင’ya vinaññya”aṭṭhakathā၌ aောkyapā
cakā”tiု’kiု mina’yachiုthā”pesaññya． ---
thiု aṭṭhakathāsacyakiု cīraငyaranyaā”thutyaso ငါ (= buddhaghosamatherya)saññya mahāaṭṭhakathākaြီ”kiု
thiုaṭṭhakathāsacya၏ athaññyakiုyya araငya”khaṃpaြု၍ mahāpaccarīaṭṭhakathā၌laññya”koငya”， kaျောyacothaငyaraှာ”-
kunyaso kurundīaṭṭhakathā acaraှိkunyaso aṭṭhakathāhoငya”tiု’၌laññya”koငya” akaြငya achuṃ”aphaြtyakiု
chiုthā”၏． thiု achuṃ”aphaြtyamaှlaññya” saင’yalaျောyasoanakyakiု machana’yamū၍ thiုpaြငya araှငya tipiṭaka cūḷanāga
acaraှိso matheryamaြtyakaြီ”tiု’၏ achuṃ”aphaြtyahūso theravādamaျာ”pā pāvaငyaso aṭṭhakathāsacyakiု
koငya”chā ā”thutya cīraငyapeṃ’． (vi-ṭṭha-1-2．)
1． sumaṅgalavilāsinī maññyaso dīghanikāyyaaṭṭhakathā，
2． papañcasūdanī maññyaso majjhimanikāyyaaṭṭhakathā，
3． sāratthappakāsanī maññyaso saṃyuttanikāyyaaṭṭhakathā，
4． manorathapūraṇī maññyaso aṅguttaranikāyyaaṭṭhakathā，
5． aṭṭhasālinī， sammohavinodanī， pañcapakaraṇa maññyaso abhidhammāaṭṭhakathā ---
ī aṭṭhakathā arapyarapyatiု’kiုlaññya” paြုcīraငyatoyamūsaññya． paြုcīraငyapuṃ akhaြငya”arāmaှာmū araှငyamahāmahinda
matheryamaြtyasaññya sīhiုḷyakaျhanya”siု’ naှုtyatakyaāguṃanephaြင’ya choငyayūkhaဲ’၍ sīhiုḷyabhāsāphaြင’ya pethakyaakkharā
taငyathā”so sīhiုḷyabhāsāsiု’ bhāsāpaြnyachiုthā”so mūlaaṭṭhakathā khoya mahāaṭṭhakathākiုsālaျှငya
pāḷibhāsāsiု’ paြnyachiုsoā”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya”， athapyathapyachiုthā”so cakā”tiု’kiု khaျုံ”soā”phaြင’ya
laññya”koငya” re”sā”cīraငyatoyamūpesaññya． thiုkaြောင’ya thiုaṭṭhakathātiု’၏ kaျmya”ū”cakā”rapya၌ aောkyapā
atiုငya” mina’yachiုthā”toyamū၏． ---
“thiုsiု’ tatiyasaṅgāyanā taငyakhaဲ’paြီ”saññyamaှ nokyakāla၌ thiု mūlaaṭṭhakathākiု araှငyamahāmahinda
maññyaso rahantāmatheryamaြtyasaññya sīhiုḷyakaျhanya”siု’ naှုtyatakyaāguṃano”phaြင’ya choငyayūkhaဲ’၍ sīhiုḷyakaျhanya”
sā”tiု’ akaျို”ငှာ sīhiုḷyabhāsāphaြင’ya taငyathā”lesaññya．
thiု aṭṭhakathāhoငya”maှ sīhiုḷyabhāsākiု payyaraှာ”၍ pāḷitoyanaññya”ā”laျောyaso apaြcyakaငya”so
naှluṃ”mhe’laျောyaphhayyaraှိso pāḷibhāsāsiု’taငyalaျkya． pa ． athapyathapyachiုthā”so anakyakiု payya၍
pāḷitoya၏ anakya (= aṭṭhakathā)kiု phhaင’yapaြpeṃ’．” (dī-ṭṭha-1-1-2． abhi-ṭṭha-1-2．)
tacyaphanya araှငyamahābuddhaghosacharātoyabhurā”kaြီ”saññya aောkyapāatiုငya”laññya” aṭṭhakathātiု’၏
kaျmya”ū”aca၌ mina’yamaှာthā”toyamū၏． ---

2． dhutaငyaakaျင’yatarā”tiု’kiုlaññya”koငya”，

īchiုkhaဲ’so aluṃ”cuṅkiု ငါsaññya visuddhimagyakaျmya”၌ apaြñña’yaacuṃ caငyakaြyyachā chiုapyakhaဲ’paြီ， thiုkaြောင’ya thiု
aluṃ”cuṅkiု ī aṭṭhakathā၌ apiုalhanya thapya၍ macicacyakunyato’aṃ’． (dī-ṭṭha-1-2． abhi-ṭṭha-1-2．)
ī paṭiññāñya khaṃvanyakhaျkyamaျာ”naှင’ya aññī visuddhimaggaaṭṭhakathā၌ lāraှိso sīla samādhi paññā sikkhā

tiု’kiုlaññya”koငya”， yaငya”tiု’၏ samudayasabhokiုlaññya”koငya”， aththaṅgamasabhokiုlaññya”koငya”) masi
mamaြငya， thiုpuggiုlyaā” āsavotarā”tiု’၏ kunyakhanya”kaြောငya” ariyamagyaphiုlyakiု ငါbhurā” hotoyamamū ---
īkā” chiုliုraငya” anakyasabhotaññya”． no ajānato no apassato - hūso ī cakā”rapyaphaြင’ya
akaြငya puggiုlyatiု’saññya (upādānakkhandhā ငါ”pā”tiု’kiုlaññya”koငya”， yaငya”tiု’၏ samudayasabhokiုlaññya”koငya”，
aththaṅgamasabhokiုlaññya”koငya”) masipābhaဲlaျkyalaññya” mamaြငyapābhaဲlaျkyalaññya” saṃsarācasaññyatiု’maှpaငyalaျှငya
caငyakaြyyakhaြငya”kiု paြောhokaြkunya၏， thiုpuggiုlyatiု’kiု payyamaြcyaapyakunya၏． (saṃ-ṭṭha-2-49．)
jānato passato = sisasūā” maြငyasasūā” - hūso raှေ”naှcyapudyaphaြင’ya āsavotarā”tiု’၏
kunyakhanya”kaြောငya” naññya”lamya”koငya”kiု hokaြာ”toyamūapya၏． no ajānato no apassato =
masisasūā” mamaြငyasasūā” - hūso īnaှcyapudyaphaြင’ya āsavotarā”tiု’၏ kunyakhanya”kaြောငya” naññya”lamya”-
koငya” mahutyasaññyakiု payyamaြcyatoyamūapya၏． (saṃ-ṭṭha-2-49．)
tacyaphanya ṭīkācharātoya araှငyamaြtyaka yaငya” aṭṭhakathā၏ chiုliုraငya” anakyasabhotarā”kiု
aောkyapāatiုငya” suṃ”maျို”khhaဲ၍ raှငya”laငya” phhaင’yachiုthā”toyamū၏． ---
1． jānato passato = sisasūā” maြငyasasūā” - hūso īnaှcyapudya၌ dassana = maြငyakhaြငya”
hūsaññya paññācakkhuphaြင’ya maြငyakhaြငya”kiုsālaျှငya aliုraှိapya၏， maṃsacakkhu = pasādacakkhuphaြင’ya = (pakatimaျkyaciphaြင’ya)
maြငyakhaြငya”kiု aliုmaraှိapyape． thiုkaြောင’ya “ jānato = sisasūā”， passato = maြငyasasūā” hūso
ī naှcyapudyatiု’kā” tūsoanakya raှိkunya၏”hu aṭṭhakathācharātoyaka phhaင’yachiုshā”toyamūkhaြငya” phaြcya၏．
evaṃ santepi = īsiု’laျှငya cakā”luṃ”sā khaဲpaြာ”၍ tūso anakya raှိsoyalaññya” --- hūsaññya
jānato = sisasūā”， passato = maြငyasasūā” - hūso pudyanaှcyakhu၏ tūññīso anakyaraှိsaññya
phaြcyasoyalaññya” ---
1． āruṃ၏ sabhomaှnyakiု hutyatiုငya”maှnyachā thiု”thhaငya”sikhaြငya” sabhoraှိso ñāṇalakkhaṇa၏ āruṃ，
2． āruṃ၏ sabhomaှnyakiု hutyatiုငya”maှnyachā thiု”thhaငya”maြငyaaောငya aroငyaalaငya”kiု thhanya”paြkhaြငya”sabho
raှိso ñāṇappabhā0၏ āruṃ ---
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ

sabhomaှnyakiု hutyatiုငya”maှnyachā thiု”thhaငya”sikhaြငya” sabholakkhaṇāraှိ၏hu aṭṭhakathācharātoyaka phhaင’yachiု

alaငya”phaြင’ya āruṃ၏ sabhomaှnyakiု hutyatiုငya”maှnyachā maြငyaaောငya aroငyaalaငya”kiု thhanya”paြkhaြငya” ñāṇakiccaraှိ၏．

166．) thiုkaြောင’ya aṭṭhakathācharātoyaka - ñāṇena vi0ṭe dhamme passati = sammādiṭṭhi ñāṇyaamaြငyaraှိso
puggiုlyasaññya āruṃ၏ sabhomaှnyakiု maြငyaaောငya aroငyaalaငya”kiု thhanya”paြkhaြငya” kiccaraှိso ñāṇyaka

«« maှtyakhaျkya --- ñāṇyaroငyaakaြောငya”kiု īkaျmya” - cāmaျkyanaှာ - 510-534-tiု’thaငya kaြñña’yapā． »»
2． tacyanaññya” --- jānato - hūsaññya raှေ’aphiု’၌ phaြcyaso ñāṇyaphaြင’ya sisasūā” hu chiုliု၏．
passato - hūsaññya nokyaaphiု’၌ phaြcyaso ñāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyasasūā” hu chiုliု၏．
3． tacyanaññya” --- jānato = sisasūā” - hu hotoyamūpaြီ”laျkyalaññya”
passato = maြငyasasūā” - hu thapyamaṃ၍ hotoyamūkhaြငya”maှာ ---
ka． anussa0 = charā mibha casūtiု’thaṃmaှ tacyachaင’yakaြာ”nāra၍ saငyasi၏ achamya”phaြင’ya sikhaြငya”，
kha． ākāraparivitakka = akaြောငya” asaင’yayuttikiု kaြံcaññya cicacya chaငyakhaြငyakhaြငya”၏achamya”phaြင’ya sikhaြငya”
hūso --- īnaှcyamaျို”so sikhaြငya”maျှ၏ achamya”phaြင’ya sikhaြငya”maျို”kiု īarā၌ aliုmaraှိapya． takayya
caငyacacyamaှာmūkā” cakkhuviññāṇyaphaြင’ya rūpāruṃtiု’kiု maြငyasakaဲ’siု’，
ka． rupya-vedanā-saññā-saṅkhāra-viññāṇya hūso upādānakkhandhāငါ”pā”tiု’kiုlaññya”koငya”，
kha． yaငya” upādānakkhandhā ငါ”pā”tiု’၏ phaြcyakaြောငya” samudayanaှင’ya phaြcyakhaြငya” samudaya = udaya sabhokiု
laññya”koငya”，
ga． yaငya” upādānakkhandhā ငါ”pā”tiု’၏ khaျုpyakaြောငya” atthaṅgamanaှင’ya khaျုpyakhaြငya” atthaṅgama = 0ya sabhokiု
laññya”koငya”，
paccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya kiုyyatiုငya maျkyamaှောkyapaြု၍ simaြငyakhaြငya”taññya”hu īsiု’so anakyaadhippāyyakiု
thaငyaraှာ”paြkhaြငya”ငှာ passato = maြငyasasūā” hu bhurā”raှငyasaññya hokaြာ”toyamūapya၏ - hu īsiု’laññya”
īarā၌ anakyaadhippāyyakiု maှtyasā”pā． (saṃ-ṭī-2-63．)
anussa0 naှင’ya ākāraparivitakka
īthaငya anussa0 naှင’ya ākāraparivitakka akaြောငya”kiု thapyamaṃ၍ raှငya”laငya”taငyapaြapyapāsaññya．
anu anu sa0naṃ anussavo． (aṃ-ṭī-2-166．)
paramparāgatassa atthassa evaṃ kirassāti anussa0naṃ． (saṃ-ṭī-2-317．)

casañña’ya thiုthiုakaြောငya”naှင’ya laျောyaññīso akaျို”tarā”cu၏ phaြcyapuṅkiု siaောငya maြငyaaောငya raှုraso
raှုkhakyakā” khaṇato udayadassana = khaṇaā”phaြင’ya samudayasabhokiု raှုkhaြငya” = khaṇaā”phaြင’ya phaြcyamaှုkiု
raှုkhaြငya” phaြcya၏． īraှုkhakyakiု raှုrā၌laññya” ---
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
14
cakkhumā viya cakkhunā rūpāni ...(saṃ-ṭṭha-2-49．)
rūpāni viya cakkhuviññāṇena rūpādīni tesaṃ ca samudayādike paccakkhe kathā dassanaṃ ...
(saṃ-ṭī-2-63．)
īsiု’ phhaင’yachiုthā”toyamūkaြso aṭṭhakathā ṭīkātiု’naှင’ya aññī --- maျkyaciamaြငyaraှိso yokyaျာ”ka
rūpāruṃtiု’kiု cakkhuviññāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyasakaဲ’siု’ alā”tūpaငya yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya yaငya”tarā”tiု’kiု simya”chaññya”
raှုphā”neso ñāṇyakaြောင’ya phaြcyapoyalāso laငya”roငyakhaြññya၏ akūaññīphaြင’ya yaငya”tarā”tiု’kiု sammādiṭṭhi
ñāṇyataññya”hūso paccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya kiုyyatiုငyamaျkyamaှောkya thhaငya”phokyasimaြငyaaောငya simya”chaññya” raှုphā”ramaññya
phaြcyasaññya．
yaငya”siု’ raှုniုငyare”athakya yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya ---
1． avijjā taṇaှာ upādānya saṅkhāra kaṃ caso chiုငyarāchiုငyarā akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’kiုlaññya” simya”chaññya”-
thā”paြီ” phaြcyara၏．
2． rupya-vedanā-saññā-saṅkhāra-viññāṇyataññya”hūso chiုငyarāchiုငyarā akaျို”tarā”tiု’kiုlaññya” simya”-
chaññya”thā”paြီ” phaြcyara၏．
3． yaငya” chiုငyarāchiုငyarā akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’kaြောင’ya chiုငyarāchiုငyarā akaျို”tarā”tiု’၏ thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyapuṃtaññya”ha
lso kaြောငya”-kaျို” chakyanhayyamaှု sabhotarā”kiုlaññya” simya”chaññya”thā”paြီ” phaြcyara၏．
(nāmarūpaparicchedañāṇyanaှင’ya paccayapariggahañāṇyatiု’၏ arātaññya”．)
yaငya”siု’ nāmarūpaparicchedañāṇyanaှင’ya paccayapariggahañāṇyatiု’၏ kamya”tacyabhakyasiု’ rokyaraှိpaြီ”so yo-
gā0carapuggiုlyasaññyasālaျှငya samudayadhammānupassī -- hūso ī raှုkhakyakiု raှုniုငyamaññya phaြcyapesaññya． thiုkaြောင’ya
visuddhimaggaaṭṭhakathā charātoyakalaññya” ī raှုkhakyakiု udayaba yba ñāṇyapiုငya”thaငya thañña’yashaငya”၍ phhaင’yachiုthā”-
toyamūlesaññya． (visuddhi-2-266-thaငya kaြñña’yapā．)
īraှုkhakyathaငya vipākavaṭyathaငya akaျုံ”vaငyaso paccuppanya upādānakkhandhāငါ”pā” rupyatarā” nāmyatarā”tiု’၏
akaြောငya”raငya”cacyaphaြcyaso avijjā taṇaှာ upādānya saṅkhāra kaṃtiု’kā” maññyasañña’ya akhaျိnyakālaka phaြcyapoyakhaဲ’-
kaြso tarā”tiု’ phaြcyakaြpāsanaññya”hūmū --- aphaြkeiု siliုpāka aောkyapā paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷitoya kokya-
nutyakhaျkyakiု phatyaraှုkaြñña’yapā．
paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷitoya kokyanutyakhaျkya
atityaakaြောငya”tarā” ငါ”pā”
purimakammabhavasmiṃ moho avijjā， āyūhanā saṅkhārā， nikanti taṇaှာ， upagamanaṃ upādānaṃ， cetanā
bhavoti ime pañca dhammā purimakammabhavasmiṃ idha paṭisandhiyā paccayā． (paṭisaṃ-50．)
tattha purimakammabhavasminti purime kammabhave， atītajātiyaṃ kammabhave kariyamāneti attho．
(abhi-ṭṭha-2-182． visuddhi-2-214．)
15
koငya”so ñña tacyaññapiုငya” -- paccakkhañāṇya naှင’ya anhayañāṇya akaြောငya”
atityabha0၌ kammabha0amaññyaraso kaṅkiု paြုcu paျို”thoငyakhaဲ’cañyaka ---
1． saccāle”pā” amaှnyatarā”kiု masimaှုsabho， yokyaျာ” minya”ma puggiုlya sattavā lū natya baြhmā casaññyaphaြင’ya
asimaှာ”maှုsabhokā” avijjātaññya”．
2． lū’bha0 = lū’khandhā， natyabha0 = natyakhandhā casañña’ya khandhāငါ”pā”tiု’kiု phaြcyapoyalāaောငya paြုlupyakaြောငya”
kusiုlyatarā” akusiုlyatarā”tiု’kā” saṅkhāratiု’taññya”．
3． lū’bha0 natyabha0 casañña’ya thiုthiုbha0 thiုthiုkāmavatthukiု thayyatātapyamakyatatyaso sabhokā”
taṇaှာtaññya”．
4． thiုthiုbha0 thiုthiုkāmavatthuapoya၌ cityakapyarokya chaဲnekhaြငya”sabhokā” upādānyataññya”．
5． thiုthiု kusiုlyacetanā siု’mahutya akusiုlyacetanāsaññya bha0maññya၏．
(kammabha0taññya” = kaṃtaññya”． vipassanāraှုrā၌ cetanākiု padhānathā”pā． kaြောငya” - kaျို” chakyacapyapuṅkiု
raှုrā၌ kammasatti = kaṅkiု padhānathā”pā．)
īsiု’laျှငya raှေ”bha0၌ phaြcyaso kammabha0 = kaṃsaññya thaငyaraှာ”raှိlatyasoya paြီ”kunyaso = thaငyaraှာ”
phaြcyapoyalākaြkunyaso ītarā”ငါ”pā”tiု’saññya īpaccuppanyabha0၌ paṭisandhe khandhāငါ”pā”၏ akaြောငya”tarā”-
tiု’saññya phaြcyakaြkunya၏． (paṭisaṃ-50．)
īakaြောငya”tarā” ငါ”pā”tiု’thaငya avijjā taṇaှာ upādānyatiု’kā” kilesavaṭyataññya”． saṅkhāranaှင’ya
kaṃtiု’kā” kammavaṭyataññya”． atityaakaြောငya”tarā” ငါ”pā”tiု’taññya”． yaငya”atityaakaြောငya”tarā”
ငါ”pā”kaြောင’ya aောkyapā paccuppanyaakaျို”tarā” ငါ”pā”tiု’saññya phaြcyapoyalākunya၏． yaငya”akaျို”tarā”tiု’kā”
vipākavaṭyatarā”tiု’taññya”．
paccuppanyaakaျို”tarā” ငါ”pā”
idha paṭisandhi viññāṇaṃ， okkanti nāmarūpaṃ， pasādo āyatanaṃ， phuṭṭho phasso， vedayitaṃ vedanā，
ime pauca dhammā idhūpapattibhavasmiṃ purekatassa kammassa paccayā． (paṭisaṃ-50．)
īpaccuppanyabha0vayya ---
1． atityaphaြcyaso bha0tacyapā”kiု paccuppanyabha0naှင’ya tacyaphanya capyakhaြငya”sabho capyatapyasosabho hu
chiုapyaso paṭisandhecityasaññya tacyanaññya” vipākyacityasaññya viññāṇyataññya”．
2． amivamya”siု’ sakyavaငyasakaဲ’siု’ phaြcyakhaြငya”sabhosaññya nāmyarupyataññya”．
3． cakkhucaso pasādasaññya saḷāyatanataññya”．
4． āruṅkiု the’khaြငya”sabho the’thitatyaso sabhosaññya phassataññya”．
5． āruṅkiု khaṃcā”khaြငya”sabho khaṃcā”tatyaso akhaြငya”arāā”phaြင’ya phaြcyatatyaso sabhosaññya
vedanātaññya”．
īsiု’laျှငya īpaccuppanyabha0၌ upapattibha0hūso jātisaññya thaငyaraှာ”raှိlatyasoya phaြcyapoyalākunyaso
paြီ”cī”kunyaso ītarā”ငါ”pā”tiု’saññya raှေ”bha0၌ paြုcupaျို”thoငyakhaဲ’so kaṃ၏ kaျေ”jū”paြုsaññya၏
aphaြcyakaြောင’ya phaြcyapoyalārakunya၏． (paṭisaṃ-50．)
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
16
paccuppanyaakaြောငya”tarā” ငါ”pā”
idha paripakkattā āyatanānaṃ moho avijjā， āyūhanā saṅkhārā， nikanti taṇaှာ， upagamanaṃ
upādānaṃ， cetanā bhavoti ime pauca dhammā idha kammabhavasmiṃ āyatiṃ paṭisandhiyā paccayā． (paṭisaṃ-50．)
īpaccuppanyabha0၌ āyatanatiု’၏ raင’yakaျkyasaññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya ---
1． saccāle”pā” amaှnyatarā”kiု masimaှုsabho， yokyaျာ” minya”ma puggiုlya sattavā lū natya baြhmā casaññyaphaြင’ya
asimaှာ”maှုsabhokā” avijjātaññya”．
2． lū’bha0 = lū’khandhā， natyabha0 = natyakhandhā casañña’ya khandhāငါ”pā”tiု’kiု phaြcyapoyalāaောငya paြုlupyakaြောငya”
kusiုlyatarā” akusiုlyatarā”tiု’kā” saṅkhāratiု’taññya”．
3． lū’bha0 natyabha0 casañña’ya thiုthiုbha0 thiုthiုkāmavatthukiု thayyatātapyamakyatapyaso sabhokā”
taṇaှာtaññya”．
4． thiုthiုbha0 thiုthiုkāmavatthu apoya၌ citya kapyarokya chaဲnekhaြငya”sabhokā” upādānyataññya”．
5． thiုthiု kusiုlyacetanā siု’mahutya thiုthiု akusiုlyacetanāsaññya bha0maññya၏． (kammabha0taññya” =
kaṃtaññya”．)
īsiု’laျှငya ītarā” ငါ”maျို”tiု’saññya īpaccuppanyabha0၌ kammabha0saññya raှိlatyasoya noငyaanāgatyabha0၌
paṭisandhe၏ akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’saññya phaြcyakunya၏． (paṭisaṃ-50．)
««maှtyakhaျkya ---- īpaccuppanyabha0၌ maraင’yakaျkyase”so āyatanaraှိso sūငyya၏ cityaphaြcyakhaြငya”saññya
bhavaငya akaျmaျာ”saññya phaြcya၍ maျာ”soā”phaြင’ya bha0tacyakhukiု phaြcyacetatyaso chamya”ā”raှိso bhavantara
janakakaṅkiု ā”thutyakhaြငya”ငှာ machamya”niုငyakhaဲ’rakā” -- īpaccuppanyabha0၌ āyatanatiု’၏ raင’yakaျkyasaññya၏
aphaြcyakaြောင’ya hu hokaြာ”toyamūkhaြငya” phaြcyasaññya． (mahāṭī-2-339．)»»
anāgatyaakaျို”tarā” ငါ”pā”
āyatiṃ paṭisandhi viññāṇaṃ， okkanti nāmarūpaṃ， pasādo āyatanaṃ， phuṭṭho phasso， vedayitaṃ
vedanā， ime pauca dhammā āyatiṃ upapattibhavasmiṃ idhakatassa kammassa paccayā． (paṭisaṃ-51．)
1． paccuppanya phaြcyaso bha0tacyapā”kiု anāgatyabha0naှင’ya tacyaphanyacapyakhaြငya”sabho capyatatyasosabhohu
chiုapyaso paṭisandhecityasaññya tacyanaññya” vipākyacityasaññya viññāṇyataññya”．
2． amivamya”siု’ sakyavaငyasakaဲ’ phaြcyakhaြငya”sabhosaññya nāmyarupyataññya”．
3． cakkhucaso pasādasaññya saḷāyatanataññya”．
4． āruṅkiု the’khaြငya”sabho the’thitatyaso sabhosaññya phassataññya”．
5． āruṅkiု khaṃcā”khaြငya”sabho khaṃcā”tatyaso akhaြငya”arāā”phaြင’ya phaြcyatatyaso sabhosaññya vedanā
taññya”．
ītarā” ငါ”maျို”tiု’saññya noငyaanāgatyabha0၌ upapattibha0hūso jātisaññya thaငyaraှာ”raှိlatyasoya
īpaccuppanyabha0၌ paြုcupaျို”thoငyathā”apyaso kaṃ၏ kaျေ”jū”paြုpe”saññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya phaြcyapoyalākaြra-
kunya၏．(paṭisaṃ-51．)
17
koငya”so ñña tacyaññapiုငya” -- paccakkhañāṇya naှင’ya anhayañāṇya akaြောငya”
adhhana’yakāla satyamaှtyapuṃ
ī paṭiccasamuppādyadesanātoyavayya avijjā， saṅkhāra， viññāṇya， nāmyarupya， saḷāyatana， phassa， vedanā，
taṇaှာ， upādānya， bha0， jāti， jarāmaraṇa --- hu aṅgā (12)rapya raှိ၏． yaငya” aṅgā (12)rapyatiု’kiု athakyapā
paṭisambhidāmagyapāḷitoyakaြီ”၏ achiုamina’yanaှင’ya aññī adhhana’yakālakiု abhidhammatthasaṅgahakaျmya”၌ aောkyapāatiုငya”
satyamaှtyathā”toyamū၏．
avijjā saṅkhārā atīto addhā， jāti jarāmaraṇaṃ anāgato addhā， majjhe aṭṭha paccuppanno addhā．
(abhidhammatthasaṅgaha-132．)
avijjā naှင’ya saṅkhāratiု’kā” atityaadhhana’yakāla tarā”cutiု’ phaြcyakaြ၏． jāti naှင’ya jarāmaraṇatiု’kā”
anāgatyaadhhana’yakāla tarā”cutiု’phaြcya၏． alayya၌ taññyaraှိkaြkunyaso --- viññāṇya， nāmyarupya， saḷāyatana，
phassa， vedanā， taṇaှာ， upādānya， bha0 (= kammabha0) taññya”hūso (8)maျို”so tarā”tiု’kā” paccuppanyaadhhana’ya
kāla tarā”cutiု’ phaြcyakaြ၏． (abhidhammatthasaṅgaha-132．)
īkā” paccuppanyabha0kiု bahiုalayyathā”၍ paṭiccasamuppādya aṅgā (12)rapyatiု’kiု kālaā”phaြင’ya vephanya
piုငya”khaြာ”puṃtaññya”． atitya paccuppanya anāgatya taññya”hūso bha0suṃ”khutiု’၏ athaငya”၌ taññyaraှိkaြkunyaso
paṭiccasamuppādyaaṅgārapyatiု’၏ akhaျငya”khaျငya” tacyakhunaှင’yatacyakhu kaြောငya”kaျို” chakyanhayyalaျkya athapyathapyaphaြcyapuṅkiု
hokaြာ”thā”toyamūso desanātoyapaငyaphaြcya၏． alā”tūpaငya chamya”ā”raှိsalokya atityaanāgatya
bhakyasiု’ ñāṇyakiုcelhaှtyalaျkya bha0suṃ”khusuṃ”khutiု’၏ athaငya”၌ taññyaraှိkaြkunyaso paṭiccasamuppādyaaṅgārapyatiု’၏
akhaျငya”khaျငya” aṅgārapya tacyakhunaှင’yatacyakhu kaြောငya”kaျို”chakyanhayyalaျkya athapyathapya phaြcyapuṅkiုlaññya” raှုniုငyasaññyasā
phaြcyapesaññya．
atītepi paccayā ce0 paccayasamuppannadhammā ca， anāgatepi etarahipi paccayā ce0 paccayasamuppanna-
dhammā ca， (abhi-ṭṭha-2-242．)
1． atitya၌laññya” akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’naှင’ya akaျို”tarā”tiု’sā taññyaraှိkaြkunya၏．
2． anāgatya၌laññya” akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’naှင’ya akaျို”tarā”tiု’sā taññyaraှိkaြkunya၏．
3． paccuppanya၌laññya” akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’naှင’ya akaျို”tarā”tiု’sā taññyaraှိkaြkunya၏． (abhi-ṭṭha-2-242．)
īathakyapā sammohavinodanīaṭṭhakathā၏ phhaင’yachiုkhaျkyanaှင’yaaññī atitya၌laññya” akaြောငya”tarā”
tiု’naှင’ya akaျို”tarā”tiု’sā taññyaraှိkaြkunya၏hu siraှိniုငyaranya naှcyabha0 suṃ”bha0 casañña’ya atityabha0 anaññya”ငyya၌laññya”
akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’kiု simya”chaññya”saင’yapesaññya．
ekadesato jānitabbaṃ
vipassakena pana kammantarauca vipākantarauca ekadesato jānitabbaṃ． (visuddhi-2-237．)
ekadesato jānitabbaṃ ana0sesato jānituṃ na sakkā avisayattā． sabbena sabbaṃ ajānane
paccayapariggaho na paripūrati． (mahāṭī-2-380．)
diṭṭhadhammavedanīyakaṃ = maျkyamaှောkyabha0၌ akaျို”pe”sokaṃ， upapajjavedanīyakaṃ = dutiyabha0၌ akaျို”-
pe”to’mañña’yakaṃ， aparāpariyavedanīyakaṃ = tatiyabha0 maှca၍ nibbānyarasañña’ya bha0tiုငyaaောငya akaျို”pe”-
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
18
lattaṃ’sokaṃ casaññyaphaြင’ya kaṃtiု’kā” amaျို”maျို” raှိkaြ၏． yaငya”kaṃtiု’thaငya ----
vipassanā bhā0nākammaṭṭhānya”kiု cī”phaြnya”laျkyaraှိso yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya kaṃtiု’၏ ā”raှိsaññya၏
aphaြcya ā”maraှိsaññya၏aphaြcyahu chiုapyaso kaṃtiု’၏ thū”thhekhaဲpaြာ”maှု kammantarakiုlaññya”koငya”， akaျို”vipākya
tarā”tiု’၏ yutyaññaṃ’saññya၏aphaြcya maြင’yamaြtyasaññya၏aphaြcya， maññya”ññacyasaññya၏aphaြcya phaြူcaငyasaññya၏aphaြcyacaso
vipākyatarā”tiု’၏ thū”thhekhaဲpaြာ”maှု vipākantarakiုlaññya”koငya” ekadesa = tacyacityatacyadesa ā”phaြင’ya
sisaင’ya sithiုkyapesaññya． yaငya” kammantara vipākantaratiု’kiု akaြhaငya”akaျnyamaraှိ kunyacaငyaaောငya sikhaြငya”ငှာkā”
sā0katiု’saññya machamya”niုငyakunya． sā0katiု’၏arā mahutyasokaြောင’ya (sabbaññusammāsambuddhabhurā”raှငyatiု’၏
arāsā phaြcyasokaြောင’ya) phaြcya၏． thiု kammantara vipākantarakiု = (thiု kaṃ kaṃ၏ akaျို”tarā”kiု) akhaျငya”khapyasimya”
luṃ”luṃ” masikhaဲ’soyatamūkā” akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’kiု simya”chaññya”tatya piုငya”khaြာ”yūtatyaso paccayapariggaha-
ñāṇyasaññya mapaြီ”cī” mapaြñña’yacuṃniုငya． (visuddhi-2-237． mahāṭī-2-380．)
yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya īkaဲ’siု’ kaṃ-kaṃ၏akaျို”tarā”kiု sammādiṭṭhiñāṇyaphaြင’ya siaောငya maြငyaaောငya
simya”chaññya” raှုphā”rā၌ athū”saphaြင’ya atityabha0ka avijjā taṇaှာ upādānyatiု’ khaြံraṃlaျkya paြုcupaျို”thoငyathā”
apyaso saṅkhāra kaṃ tiု’kaြောင’ya ī paccuppanya bha0vayya paṭisandhe nāmyarupya casañña’ya akaျို”vipākyatarā”tiု’
thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyapoyalāpuṅkiု siaောငya maြငyaaောငya simya”chaññya”raှုphā”rā၌ charā’apaြောnaှင’yasā lhamya”neramaññyalo
hu me”ranyaraှိ၏． aphaြmeှာ aောkyapāatiုငya”phaြcya၏．
ñāṇasamaṅgī puggalo cakkhumā viya cakkhunā rūpāni， ñāṇena vi0ṭe dhamme passati． (saṃ-ṭṭha-2-49．)
jānatoti vā 0thā na jānanaṃ anussavākāraparivitakkamatta0sena idhādhippetaṃ， atha kho rūpāni
viya cakkhuviññāṇena rūpādīni tesaṃ ca samudayādike paccakkhe kathā dassananti vibhāvetuṃ “passato”ti
vuttanti evaṃ vā ettha attho． (saṃ-ṭī-2-63．)
charā’apaြောnaှင’yasā lhamya”nerasañña’ya charā’thaṃmaှ tacyachaင’ya kaြာ”nāra၍ charāsaငyape”liု’ sirasañña’ya
saငyasi = anussa0 simaျို”kiုlaññya” īarā၌aliုmaraှိapya．“īsiု’kā” phaြcyalerā၏，īsiု’kā” phaြcyalerā၏”
hu akhaြငya”arā ākārakiု thakyavanya”kaျငya kaြံchathe”khoya၍ siraှိlāso athe”akhoya simaျှkiုlaññya”
īnerā၌ aliုmaraှိapya． caငyacacya aliုraှိapyasaññyamaှာ --- maျkyaciamaြငyaraှိsosūsaññya rūpāruṃtiု’kiု cakkhuviññāṇyaphaြင’ya
maြငyasakaဲ’siု’ paccayapariggahañāṇyacaso vipassanāñāṇyaamaြငyanaှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃso yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya
yaငya”paccayapariggahañāṇyacaso vipassanāñāṇyakaြောင’ya phaြcyapoyalāso ñāṇyaaroငyaalaငya”phaြင’ya the’thimi၍
haငya”laငya”phaင’yaneso upādānakkhandhāငါ”pā”tiု’kiုlaññya”koငya”， yaငya” upādānakkhandhāငါ”pā”tiု’၏ samudayasabhokiုlaññya”
koငya”， atthaṅgamasabhokiုlaññya”koငya” sammādiṭṭhiñāṇyataññya”hūso paccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya
kiုyyatiုငya maျkyamaှောkya thhaငya”phokya simaြငyakhaြငya”kiုsālaျှငya īarā၌ dassana = sikhaြငya” maြငyakhaြငya” --- hu
aliုraှိapyape၏． (saṃ-ṭṭha-2-49． saṃ-ṭī-2-63．)
yaငya”siု’ siniုငya maြငyaniုငyapā’malā”¿

khaြံraṃlaျkya paြုcupaျို”thoငyathā”apyaso saṅkhāra kaṃtiု’kaြောင’ya ībha0vayya paṭisandhenāmyarupya casañña’ya akaျို”vipākya

koငya”so ñña tacyaññapiုငya” -- paccakkhañāṇya naှင’ya anhayañāṇya akaြောငya”
siaောငyamaြငyaaောငya raှုniုငyapāmaññyalohulaññya” sūtoyakoငya”akhaျို’ka me”maြnya”kaြpaြnya၏． asaငyasūtoyakoငya”
saññyalaññya” raငyatamamanaှင’ya bhavaငyamakaျ phaြcyanese”pāka aောkyapāphhaင’yachiုkhaျkyamaျာ”kiု chakyalakya၍
phatyaraှုkaြñña’yapā．
nibbatti passitabbā
nāmarūpaparicchedañāṇyanaှင’ya paccayapariggahañāṇyakiု raraှိpaြီ”so yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya akaြောငya”-
tarā”naှင’yatakhaso yaငya” rupyanāmyadhamma saṅkhāratarā”tiု’kiု lakkhaṇāre”suṃ”tanyasiု’ taငyakā vipassanā raှုphā”
suṃ”sapyara၏． yaငya”siု’ vipassanā raှုphā”suṃ”sapyarā၌ nibbattilakkhaṇākiုlaññya” maြငyaaောငyaraှုranya paṭisambhidāmagga
pāḷitoyakaြီ”ka ññhaှnyakaြာ”toyamūlaျkya raှိ၏． (paṭisaṃ-53-54．) yaငya” nibbattilakkhaṇākiုlaññya” paṭisambhidāmagga
aṭṭhakathāka aောkyapāatiုငya” suṃ”maျို” raှိkaြောငya”kiု phhaင’yachiုthā”toyamū၏．
nibbattilakkhaṇanti addhā - santati- kha ṇa0sena rūpassa uppādaṃ ， uppādoye0 saṅkhatalakkhaṇattā
lakkhaṇanti ca vutto． (paṭisaṃ-ṭṭha-1-235．)
nibbattisaññya addhānibbatti santatinibbatti khaṇanibbattihu suṃ”maျို”raှိ၏．
1． bha0tacyakhuvayya paṭisandhemaှ cutitiုငyaaောငyaso rupyatarā” nāmyatarā”tiု’kā” addhāpaccuppanyatarā”cutiု’
phaြcyakaြ၏． yaငya” addhāpaccuppanyatarā”tiု’၏ phaြcyamaှု uppādasabhokā” addhānibbattitaññya”．
2． rupyasantatiacañyaatanya”tacyakhu nāmyasantatiacañyaatanya”tacyakhu athaငya”၌ taññyaraှိkaြkunyaso rupyatarā”
nāmyatarā”tiု’kā” santatipaccuppanyatarā”cutiု’ phaြcyakaြ၏． yaငya” santatipaccuppanyatarā”tiု’၏ phaြcyamaှု uppāda-
sabhokā” santatinibbattitaññya”．
3． upādya-ṭhī-bhaငya-hūso khaṇasuṃ”pā”tiု’၏ apoငya”၌ akaျုံ”vaငyakaြkunyaso rupyatarā” nāmyatarā”tiု’kā”
khaṇapaccuppanyatarā”tiု’taññya”． yaငya” khaṇapaccuppanyatarā”tiု’၏ phaြcyamaှု uppādasabhokā” khaṇanibbattitaññya”．
4． tacyaphanya visuddhimaggaaṭṭhakathā (visuddhi-2-248．)kalaññya” paṭisandhekhaṇamaှ ca၍ khaṇatiုငya” khaṇatiုငya”၌
kaṅkaြောင’ya kammajarupyatiု’ phaြcyapuṅkiုlaññya” maြငyaaောငyaraှုranya ññhaှnyakaြာ”thā”toyamūpaြnya၏． kammato
nibbattitaññya”． alā”tūpaငya cityakaြောင’ya cittajarupyaphaြcyapuṃ， utukaြောင’ya utujarupyaphaြcyapuṃ， āhārakaြောင’ya
āhārajarupyaphaြcyapuṅkiုlaññya”koငya” vipassanāñāṇyaphaြင’ya siaောငya maြငyaaောငyaraှုranya ññhaှnyakaြာ”-
thā”toyamū၏． rupyatiု’၏ ca၍phaြcyakhaြငya” nibbattilakkhaṇākiုlaññya”koငya”， khaṇamacaဲ tasaဲsaဲ phaြcyapaျkya
neso yaငya” rupyatarā”tiု’၏ phaြcyapuṃakhaြငya”arānaှင’ya phaြcyamaှု uppādataññya”hūso nibbattilakkhaṇākiု
laññya”koငya” vipassanāñāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyaaောငyaraှုkhaြငya”taññya”． (visuddhi-2-249-252．)
5． tacyaphanya raှေ”atityabha0၌ chaññya”pū”apyakhaဲ’paြီ”so kaṃ၏ chamya”aငyakaြောင’ya paṭisandhenāmyatarā”maှca၍
nāmyatarā”tiု’၏ ca၍phaြcyakhaြငya” nibbattilakkhaṇākiုlaññya”koငya”， pavattiakhā dhāra āruṃ tiုkyachiုငyakhaြငya”
caso akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’kaြောင’ya phaြcyapoyalākaြkunyaso nāmyatarā”tiု’၏ ca၍phaြcyakhaြငya” nibbattilaka
©ṇākiုlaññya”koငya” vipassanāñāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyaaောငyaraှုranya ññhaှnyakaြာ”thā”toyamū၏．
(visuddhi-2-252-253．)

raှုkhakyaatiုkhaျုpya ññhaှnyakaြာ”khaျkya
...kālena rūpaṃ sammasitabbaṃ， kālena arūpaṃ． rūpaṃ sammasantena rūpassa nibbatti passitabbā．
seyaျthidaṃ --- idaṃ rūpaṃ nāma kammādi0sena catūhi kāraṇehi nibbattati． tattha sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ rūpaṃ
nibbattamānaṃ paṭhamaṃ kammato nibbattati． paṭisandhikkhaṇeye0 hi gabbhaseyaျkānaṃ tā0 tisantati0sena
vatthu-kāya-bhā0dasakasaṅkhātāni tiṃsarūpāni nibbattanti， tāni ca kho paṭisandhicittassa uppādakkhaṇeye0．
yathā ca uppādakkhaṇe， tathā ṭhitikkhaṇepi bhaṅgakkhaṇepi．...(visuddhi-2-248-249...)
yathā ca rūpaṃ sammasantena rūpassa， evaṃ arūpaṃ sammasantenapi arūpassa nibbatti passitabbā． sā ca kho
ekāsīti lokiyacittuppāda0sena． seyaျthidaṃ --- idauှိ arūpaṃ nāma purimabhave āyūhitakamma-
0sena paṭisandhiyaṃ tā0 ekūnavīsati cittuppādappabhedaṃ nibbattati． ... (visuddhi-2-252．)
nibbatti passitabbāti paṭhamaṃ tā0 āgamānusārato anumāna0sena daṭṭhabbā． tato paraṃ anukkamena
balappatte bhā0nāñāṇe paccakkhatopi dissatīti． (mahāṭī-2-399．)
paṭisandhekhiုkyavayya kāyadasakakalāpya bhā0dasakakalāpya hadayadasakakalāpyataññya”hūso
rupyatarā”tiု’၏ kaṅkaြောင’ya ca၍phaြcyapoyalāpuṃ nibbattisabhokiုlaññya”koငya”， khaṇatiုငya” khaṇatiုငya”၌ rupyatarā”
tiု’၏ phaြcyakhaြငya” uppādataññya”hūso nibbattisabhokiုlaññya”koငya”， citya utu āhārataññya”hūso
akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’kaြောင’ya cittaja utuja āhārajarupyatiု’၏ ca၍phaြcyakhaြငya” nibbattisabhokiုlaññya”koငya”，
yaငya”rupyatiု’၏ bha0tacyalaျှောkya achakyamapaြtya athapyathapyaphaြcyamaှု uppādataññya”hūso nibbattisabhokiု
laññya”koငya”， alā”tūpaငya paṭisandhekhiုkyamaှca၍ nāmyatarā”tiု’၏ ca၍phaြcyakhaြငya” nibbattisabhokiုlaññya”koငya”，
bha0tacyalaျှောkya၌ yaငya”nāmyatarā”tiု’၏ dhāra āruṃ tiုkyachiုငyakhaြငya” casoakaြောငya”tarā”tiု’kaြောင’ya athapya
thapyaphaြcyamaှု uppādataññya”hūso nibbattisabhokiုlaññya”koငya” vipassanāñāṇyaphaြင’ya siaောငya maြငyaaောငya raှုpā．
(visuddhi-2-248-252．)
nibbatti passitabbā --- paṭisandhekhiုkyamaှca၍ bha0tacyalaျှောkyavayya rupyanāmyatiု’၏phaြcyamaှု uppādataññya”
hūso nibbattisabhokiု raှုpā - hūsaññya raှေ’ū”chā āgamataññya”hūso kaျmya”ganyadesanātoya၏ nokyasiု’
ñāṇyaphaြင’ya acañyalaျှောkyasoā”phaြင’ya anumāna = maှnya”chasaññya၏ achamya”phaြင’ya raှုapya၏． thiုsiု’ raှုsaññyamaှ
nokyakāla၌ acañyasaphaြင’ya chakyalakya၍ raှုphā”latyasoakhā bhā0nāñāṇyasaññya chamya”ā”raှိsaññya၏ aphaြcyasiု’
rokyaraှိlatyasoya paccakkhatopi dissati = paccakkhaā”phaြင’yalaññya” ñāṇya၌ thaငyalāpelattaṃ’ =
paccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’yalaññya” raှု၍ raraှိpelattaṃ’． (mahāṭī-2-399．)
ī anumānañāṇyakā” paccakkhañāṇya၏ raှေ”kaphaြcyaso anumānañāṇyataññya”． sā0katacyaū”saññya
yaငya”anumānañāṇyathaငyasā rapyatana’ya၍ nerasaññyamahutya， yaငya” anumānañāṇyamaှ tacyachaင’ya paccakkhañāṇyasiု’
chiုkyaaောငya phā”maျာ” ā”thutyara၏．
chiုliုsaññyamaှာ īsiု’ phaြcya၏． --- yogā0carapuggiုlyatacyaū”saññya samādhikiု aောငyamaြငyachā thūthoငya-
paြီ”soakhā rupyakammaṭṭhānya”kiု cataငya၍ kaြို”cā”ā”thutyasaññyaphaြcyaṃ’， thiုakhā dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”tiု’၏ kiုyyapiုငya
sabhā0lakkhaṇā asī”asī”kiု cataငya၍ naှluṃ”shaငya”ra၏．

koငya”so ñña tacyaññapiုငya” -- paccakkhañāṇya naှင’ya anhayañāṇya akaြောငya”
1． pathavīdhātya၏ māmaှုsabho，
2． āpodhātya၏ yiုcī”maှုsabho，
3． tejodhātya၏ pūmaှုsabho，
4． vāyodhātya၏ thokyakanyamaှုsabho ---
īdhātyakaြီ”le”pā”tiု’၏ kiုyyapiုငya sabhā0lakkhaṇā asī”asī”kiု cataငya၍ naှluṃ”shaငya”saññya phaြcyaṃ’，
naှluṃ”shaငya”laျှငya shaငya”khaျငya” khaျkyakhaျငya” rupyakalāpyamaျာ”kiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya the’maြငyaranya， rupyakalāpya tacyakhutacyakhu၏
athaငya”၌ pāvaငyataññyaraှိkaြso dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”tiု’၏ kiုyyapiုငyasabhā0lakkhaṇā asī”asī”taññya”hūso
paramatthadhammasabhā0siု’ ñāṇyaamaြငya chiုkyaphiု’ranya thiု”thhaငya”simaြငyaphiု’ranya simya”chaññya”niုငyaphiု’ranya akhaျkyamaှာ (araှငya
sāriputtarā araှငyabāhiyadāruciriya matheryamaြtyakaြီ”tiု’kaဲ’siု’ alhana’yaalhanya pāramīraင’yaññoငya”sañña’ya sūtoyakoငya”
mahutyakhaဲ’laျှငya) alhanyakhakyakhaဲphhayyarā raှိ၏．
rupyakalāpya tacyakhutacyakhu athaငya”၌ taññyaraှိso dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”tiု’၏ kiုyyapyiုငya sabhā0lakkhaṇāsaññya
raှိle၏ --- hu bhurā”ho kaျmya”ganyadesanātoya၏ nokyasiု’ acañyaliုkyalaျkya dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”tiု’၏
sabhā0lakkhaṇā hūso māmaှု， yiုcī”maှု， pūmaှု， thokyakanyamaှု sabhotiု’kiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya simya”chaññya”laျkya
raှုphā”ra၏． yaငya”siု’ simya”chaññya”raှုphā”rā၌ rupyakalāpya tacyakhutacyakhu၏ athaငya”၌ taññyaraှိso dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”-
tiု’၏ kiုyyapiုငya sabhā0lakkhaṇāhūso paramatyasiု’ ñāṇyaamaြငya machiုkyamī yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya (santatighana
samūhaghana kiccaghana hūsañña’ya) rupyaatuṃ”akhaဲkaြီ”maျာ”kiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya maphaြိုkhhaဲniုငyase”sañña’yaathakya santatipaññatya
samūhapaññatya hūsañña’ya paññatyanayyamaှာpaငya bhā0nāñāṇyasaññya kaျkyacā”khhaင’ya raraှိnese”၏．
siု’soya yaငya”paññatyatiု’kā”， yaငya”paññatyatiု’maှ paramatyahūsañña’ya dhātyaanaှcyakiု thutyayū၍ raraှိniုdငyasañña’ya
paññatyatiု’sā phaြcyakaြ၏． pathavīkasiṇabhā0nāñāṇyakaြောင’ya phaြcyapoyalāso arapyachayyamaျkyanaှာ၌ paျံ’naှံ’laျkyataññyara
Sdneso pathavīkasiုṇya”paññatyakaဲ’siု’so paramatthadhātyasā” thutyayū၍maraniုငyaso paññatyamaျို”kā”
mahutyape． ākāsakasiုṇya”kaဲ’siု’ paramatthadhātyasā” thutyayū၍maraniုငyaso paññatyamaျို”laññya” mahutyape．
yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya santatipaññatyacasañña’ya paññatyaatuṃ”akhaဲmaျာ” makaငya”caငyase”sañña’ya - māmaှု，
yiုcī”maှု， pūmaှု， thokyakanyamaှု - hūsañña’ya dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”tiု’၏ sabhā0kiုpaငya chakyalakya၍ simya”chaññya” raှုphā”
nera၏． yaငya”siု’ simya”chaññya”raှုphā”nesaphaြင’ya bhā0nāñāṇyasaññya chamya”aငyapaြñña’ya0khaြငya”siု’ rokyaraှိlālatyasoya
rupyakalāpya tacyakhutacyakhu athaငya”၌ taññyaraှိso dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”tiု’၏ kiုyyapiုငyasabhā0lakkhaṇātaññya”hūso
paramatthadhātyasā”tiု’kiုlaññya” sammādiṭṭhiñāṇyataññya”hūso paccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’yalaññya” kiုyyatiုငyamaျkyamaှောkya
thhaငya”phokya simaြငyaniုငyasaññyasā phaြcya၏． (raှုpuṃakaျyyakiု rupyakammaṭṭhānya”piုငya”thaငya kaြñña’yapā．)
alā”tūpaငya yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññyalaññya” īnibbattilakkhaṇākiု raှုsañña’yaapiုငya”thaငyalaññya” atityaka
kaṅkaြောင’ya paṭisandhe rupyatarā”nāmyatarā”tiု’ phaြcyapoyalārapuṅkiုlaññya”koငya”， yaငya”atityakaṅkaြောင’yapaငya
bha0tacyalaျှောkya vipākavaṭyathaငya akaျုံ”vaငyaso rupyanāmyatiု’၏ phaြcyapoyalārapuṅkiုlaññya”koငya”， paṭisandhenāmyarupya
casañña’ya rupyanāmyatiု’၏ ca၍phaြcyakhaြငya” nibbattisabhokiုlaññya”koငya” bhā0nāñāṇyaphaြင’ya laှmya”၍raှုliုkyarā၌
bhā0nāñāṇya maraင’yakaျkyase”mī၌ khaျkyakhaျငya” simaြငyaniုငyasaññyakā” mahutyase”． āgamataññya”hūso bhurā”
ho desanātoya kaျmya”ganyamaျာ”၌ lāraှိsañña’yaatiုငya” --- paṭisandhekhiုkya၌ rupyaamaျို”acā” (30) raှိ၏．
tihityasomanassa paṭisandhe phaြcyalaျှငya nāmyatarā” (34) raှိ၏ --- īsiု’ casaññyaphaြင’ya kaျmya”ganya achiုamina’yamaျာ”၏

nokyasiု’ acañyaliုkyaso anumānañāṇya၏ achamya”phaြင’ya maျkyaramya”maှnya”cha၍sā raှုra၏． siု’soya yogā-
0carapuggiုlyasaññya maျkyaramya”maှnya”cha၍ raှုrasañña’ya anumānañāṇyaachaင’yamaျှthaငyasā rapyatana’ya၍ manebhaဲ acañyasaphaြင’ya
paccakkhañāṇyasiု’ chiုkyasaññyatiုငyaaောငya chakyalakya၍ simya”chaññya” raှုphā”ramaññyasā phaြcya၏．
yaငya”siု’ anumānaā”phaြင’ya maျkyaramya”maှnya”cha၍ raှုrā၌ bhā0nāñāṇya၏ maraင’yakaျkyase”mī akhaျိnyakāla
athaငya”vayya paṭisandhebhakyasiု’ tācū၍ rupyanāmyatiု’kiု acañyaatiုငya” simya”chaññya”၍ shā”lerā， saṃsarā

akaျုံ”vaငyaso manodhārāvajjanya” khoya manasikāraka paññatyakiု naှluṃ”shaငya”mikhaြငya”kaြောင’ya yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya
raṅkhā paññatyapuṃripyamaျာ”kiုlaññya” the’neratatyase”၏． santatipaññatya samūhapaññatya saṇṭhānapaññatyacasañña’ya
paññatyaatuṃ”akhaဲmaျာ” makaငya”caငyase”sañña’ya rupyatuṃ”rupyakhaဲmaျာ”taññya”． siု’soya yaငya”paññatyatiု’kā”， yaငya”tiု’maှ
paramatyahūsañña’yadhātyaanaှcyakiု thutyayū၍raraှိniုငyaso paññatyatiု’sā phaြcyakaြsaññya． thiုkaြောင’ya yogā0carapuggiုlyaka
paññatyamakaငya”caငyase”sañña’ya yaငya”rupyatuṃ”rupyakhaဲ၌ taññyaraှိso dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”kacataငya၍ tacyaphanya paြnya၍
simya”chaññya”ra၏． rupyakalāpyamaျာ”kiု the’maြငyasoakhā rupyakalāpya tacyakhutacyakhu၌ taññyaraှိso dhātyakaြီ”
le”pā”tiု’kiု chakyalakya၍ simya”chaññya”ra၏． aောငyamaြငyamaှုrakhaဲ’soya kaြhaငya”kaျnyaso rupyanāmyatiု’kiု chakyalakya၍
simya”chaññya”ra၏． paññatyapuṃripyamaျာ” thaငyalātiုငya” īnaññya”canacyakiုpaငya asuṃ”paြုra၏． īsiု’ acañyaatiုငya”
kaျင’yakhaဲ’soya bhā0nāñāṇyasaññyalaññya” chamya”ā”raှိnyacoya ānubhoya kaြီ”raင’yakhaြငya”siု’ rokyalatyasoya paṭisandhe

maျkyamaှောkya thhaငya”phokya simaြငyaniုငyapesaññya．
alā”tūpaငya acañyaatiုငya” chakyalakya၍ kaျင’yakhaဲ’soya bhā0nāñāṇyasaññyalaññya” chamya”ā”kaြီ”mā”၍

taṇaှာ upādānya saṅkhāra kaṃtiု’kaြောင’ya paṭisandhe nāmyarupyacasañña’ya chiုငyarā chiုငyarā akaျို”rupyanāmyatiု’၏ phaြcyapuṃ

thaငya kaြñña’yapā．)
yaငya”raှုkhakyathaငya avijjā taṇaှာ upādānya saṅkhāra kaṃcaso chiုငyarā chiုငyarā akaြာငya”tarā”tiု’kaြောင’ya
paṭisandhe nāmyarupyacasañña’ya chiုငyarā chiုငyarā akaျို”tarā”tiု’၏ thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyapoyalāpuṅkiု paccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya

raှုnaññya”taññya”． akaျို”rupyanāmyatiု’၏ phaြcyamaှု uppādasabhokiု paccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya thhaငya”phokya simaြငyaaောငya
raှုsañña’yaapiုငya”kā” khaṇato udayadasana = khaṇaā”phaြင’ya aphaြcyakiု raှုnaññya”taññya”． (raှုphā”puṃ akaျyyakiု

purimakammabhavasminti purime kammabhave， atītajātiyaṃ kammabhave kariyamāneti attho．
(abhi-ṭṭha-2-182． visuddhi-2-214．)

khaဲ’kaြso tarā”cutiု’sā phaြcyakaြောငya”kiု mina’yachiုthā”toyamūkaြ၏．

khandhāငါ”pā”tiု’၏ phaြcyamaှု samudayasabhokiုlaññya”koငya”， paṭisandhekhandhāငါ”pā” acaraှိso yaငya” upādānakkhandhā
ငါ”pā”tiု’၏ ca၍phaြcyakhaြငya” nibbattilakkhaṇā = nibbattisabhokiုlaññya”koငya” paccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya sipāmaှ maြငyapāmaှsālaျှငya
sisasūā” maြငyasasūā”sālaျှငya āsavotarā”tiု’၏ kunyakhanya”kaြောငya” ariyamagyaphiုlyakiု raraှိniုငyakaြောငya”
kiု hokaြာ”thā”toyamū၏． paccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya masisasūā” mamaြငyasasūā” āsavotarā”tiု’၏

nibbattisabhohūso samudayasabho --- hūso īraှုkhakyatiု’၌laññya” naññya”tūpaငya maှtyasā”pā． (raှုkhakya
akaျyyakiု paṭiccasamuppādyapiုငya”thaငyalaññya”koငya”， vipassanāpiုငya” udayabbayañāṇyakhanya”thaငyalaññya”koငya”
kaြñña’yapāle．)

koငya”so ñña tacyaññapiုငya” -- paccakkhañāṇya naှင’ya anhayañāṇya akaြောငya”

anhayañāṇyaphaြင’ya atitya anāgatya၌ raှုpuṃ
anamataggoyaṃ bhikkhave saṃsāro， pubbā koṭi na paññāyati... (saṃ-2-121．)
īsiု’caso desanātoyamaျာ”naှင’yaaññī sattavātacyaū”၏ atityasaṃsarākharī”saññyakā” ñāṇyaphaြင’ya
acañyalaျှောkya၍ aောkyame’soyalaññya” saṃsarā၏ raှေ’achanya”kiု masiniုငyalokyaaောငya raှññyalaျာ”laှ၏．
yaငya”siု’ raှññyalaျာ”laှso saṃsarātacyakhhaငya၌ phaြcyapaျkyakhaဲ’kaြkunyaso rupyanāmyatiု’kiုlaññya”koငya”， akaြောငya”-
tarā” akaျို”tarā”tiု’kiုlaññya”koငya” sā0katacyaū” anephaြင’ya kunyacaငyaaောငyakā” maraှုniုငya， masimya”chaññya”niုငya，
ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”၍kā” mayūniုငya．
dīgho bālāna saṃsāro， saddhammaṃ avijānataṃ． (khu-1-22 - dhammapada．)
saccāle”pā”taññya”hūso sūtoyakoငya”tarā”kiု masikaြkunyase”so puthujanyaငmiုkyasā”tiု’
aphiု’laññya” anāgatya saṃsarākharī”saññya raှññyalaျာ”laှsaññyasā phaြcya၏． yaငya”anāgatya saṃsarākharī” tacyalaျှောkya၌
phaြcyapoyalattaṃ’ phaြcyakaြkunyaso rupyanāmyadhamma saṅkhāratiု’kiုlaññya”koငya”， akaြောငya”tarā” akaျို”
tarā”tiု’kiုlaññya”koငya” sā0katacyaū”anephaြင’ya akaြhaငya”akaျnyamaraှိ kunyacaငyaaောငyakā” maraှုniုငya， masimya”
chaññya”niုငya， ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”၍kā” mayūniုငya．
tacyaphanya addhāpaccuppanya amaññyaraso paṭisandhemaှsaññya cutisiု’tiုငyaaောငyaso bha0tacyalaျှောkyaathaငya”၌
phaြcyapoyashā”kaြkunyaso rupyanāmyadhamma saṅkhāratarā”tiု’kiုlaññya”koငya”， akaြောငya”tarā” akaျို”tarā”-
tiု’kiုlaññya”koငya” sā0katacyaū”anephaြင’ya akaြhaငya”akaျnyamaraှိ kunyacaငyaaောငyakā” maraှုniုငya， masimya”chaññya”niုငya，
ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”၍kā” mayūniုငya． sā0katiု’saññya ekadesa = akhaျို’avakya tacyacityatacyadesamaျှkiုsā
raှုphā”niုငya simya”chaññya”niုငya ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”yūniုငyasokaြောင’ya phaြcya၏．
thapyamaṃ၍ anaññya”ငyya raှငya”laငya”taငyapaြpārace --- paṭisandhemaှsaññya cutisiု’tiုငyaaောငya bha0tacyalaျှောkya
athaငya” phaြcyapoyapaြီ” phaြcyapoyachaဲ phaြcyapoyalattaṃ’ rupyakalāpyatiု’kā” sattavātacyaū”၏ santānyavayya alhana’yaalhanya
maျာ”paြာ”laှkunya၏． bha0tacyalaျှောkyaluṃ”၌ phaြcyapoyapaြီ” phaြcyapoyachaဲ phaြcyapoyalattaṃ’ rupyatiု’kiု thā”liုkyabhiū”，

soyalaññya”koငya”， bhaငyaano”phaြင’yasoyalaññya”koငya” taññyaraှိkhhaင’yaraှိkaြkunyaso rupyatarā”tiု’kiု aluṃ”
arapya ā”phaြင’ya alayyaalatyaphaြcyaso lūsā”tacyaū”၏ khandhākiုyya၌ rasaင’yaso alayyaalatya pamāṇa
ā”phaြင’ya paññāphaြင’ya kaြံcha၍ yūapyasaññyaraှိsoya paramāṇumaြူkhana’ya alhanyase”ငyyaso rupyakalāpyamu’nyapoငya”
doṇamattā = tacyacityasā”khana’ya raှိmaññyahu (visuddhi-1-361．) ၌ phhaင’yachiုthā”၏． yaငya” rupyakalāpyatiုငya”၌
dhātyakaြီ”le”pā” raှိkaြsaññyakhaျññya” phaြcya၏． siု’soya yaငya”rupyakalāpyatiုငya” rupyakalāpyatiုငya”၌ taññyaraှိso
dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”tiုငya”kiုkā” sā0katiု’saññya kunyacaငyaaောငya maraှုniုငya． rupyakalāpya akhaျို’avakya၌ taññyaraှိ
kaြso dhātyakaြီ” le”pā” akhaျို’avakyamaျှkiုsā raှုniုငyakaြ၏． raှုliုkyaniုငyaso pathavīdhātyalaññya” akhaျို’avakya
maျှsā raှိlerā၏， maraှုliုkyaniုငyaso pathavīdhātyalaññya” akhaျို’avakya raှိlerā၏． āpodhātya casaññyatiု’၌laññya”
naññya”tūpaငya maှtyapā． upādārupyatiု’၌laññya” naññya”tūpaငya maှtyapā．

naññya”tūpaငya maှtyapā．

alā”tūpaငya yogā0carapuggiုlyatacyaū” anephaြင’ya atitya anāgatya tarā”tiု’kiု simya”chaññya”rā
vipassanāraှုrā၌laññya” simya”chaññya”liုkyaniုငyaso vipassanāraှုphā”liုkyaniုငyaso rupyatarā” nāmyatarā”tiု’kā”

sā၍ sā၍ maျာ”laှpesaññya．

raှိ၍ masimya”chaññya”liုkyaniုငya vipassanāmaraှုliုkyaniုငyaso akaြောငya”tarā” akaျို”tarā”tiု’kā” alhana’yaalhanya

siraှိniုငyasokaြောင’ya phaြcya၏．

saññya．
yaငya” rupyatarā” nāmyatarā” akaြောငya”tarā” akaျို”tarā”tiု’kiု saṅkhāratarā”hu khoyachiု၏．
vipassanāñāṇyaphaြင’ya simya”chaññya”liုkyaniုငyaso vipassanāraှုphā”liုkyaniုငyaso saṅkhāratarā”tiု’kiု diṭṭhatarā”hu
laññya”koငya”， vipassanāñāṇyaphaြင’ya masimya”chaññya”liုkyaniုငya vipassanāmaraှုphā”liုkyaniုငyaso vipassanāmaraှုphā”-
liုkyamiso saṅkhāratarā”tiု’kiု adiṭṭhatarā”hulaññya”koငya” visuddhimaggaaṭṭhakathāthaငya khoyavoyasuṃ”chaဲthā”၏．
paccakkhato diṭṭhassa ārammaṇassa ...(visuddhi-2-280．)
vipassanāsammādiṭṭhitaññya”hūso paccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya raှုmaြငyaliုkyaso saṅkhāraāruṃ ...
īsiု’ casaññyaphaြင’ya phhaင’yachiုthā”toyamū၏．
visuddhimaggamahāṭīkācharātoyakalaññya” -- yaငya”diṭṭhatarā”kiု sampati diṭṭha = sampati upaṭṭhita saṅkhāra-
tarā”hulaññya”koငya”， adiṭṭha tarā”kiု sampati adiṭṭha = sampati anupaṭṭhita saṅkhāratarā”hulaññya”koငya”
27
koငya”so ñña tacyaññapiုငya” -- paccakkhañāṇya naှင’ya anhayañāṇya akaြောငya”
phhaင’yachiုthā”toyamū၏． (mahāṭī-2-442．)
sampati diṭṭha = sampati upaṭṭhita saṅkhāratarā”kā” paccakkhañāṇyataññya”hūso vipassanāñāṇyaphaြင’ya lakyaငငya”
thaငyathaငya raှုmaြငyaliုkyamiso saṅkhāratarā”taññya”． sampati adiṭṭha = sampati anupaṭṭhita saṅkhāratarā”kā”
paccakkhañāṇyataññya”hūso vipassanāñāṇyaphaြင’ya lakyaငငya”thaငyathaငya maraှုmaြငyaliုkyamiso maraှုmaြငyaliုkyaniုငyaso，
vipassanāñāṇya၌ paccakkhaā”phaြင’ya mathaငyalāso saṅkhāratarā”cutaññya”． yaငya”sampati adiṭṭha = sampati anupaṭṭhita
saṅkhāratarā”tiု’kiု anhayañāṇyaphaြင’yaraှုra၏． akaြောငya”tarā” akaျို”tarā”tiု’kiု simya”chaññya”sañña’ya paccayapariggaha
ñāṇyapiုငya”thaငya anhayañāṇyaphaြင’ya simya”chaññya”raှုphā”puṅkiု visuddhimaggaaṭṭhakathāthaငya īsiု’ phhaင’yachiုthā”toyamū၏．
so evaṃ paccayato nāmarūpassa pavattiṃ dishā yathā idaṃ etarahi， evaṃ atītepi addhāne
paccayato pavattittha， anāgatepi paccayato pavattissatīti samanupassati． (visuddhi-2-234．235．)
pavattiṃ dishāta d etaraha d pavatta ð dasi mG ． evanti iminā na ke0laṃ sappaccayabhā0mattame0 paccāmaṭṭhaṃ，
atha kho yādisehi paccayehi etarahi pavattati， tādisehi avijjādipaccayehe0 atītepi
pa0ttitthāti paccayasadisatāpi paccāmaṭṭhāti daṭṭhabbaṃ． (mahāṭī-2-373．)
= thiုyogā0cara rahanya”toyasaññya īsiု’ avijjā taṇaှာ upādānya saṅkhāra kaṃcaso akaြောငya”tarā”-

alā”tūpaငya --- atityaphaြcyaso adhhana’yakāla၌laññya” īnāmyarupyasaññya avijjā caso akaြောငya”tarā”-

phaြcyapoyarapelattaṃ’” --- hu

phaြcyapesaññya． atityaakaြောငya”tarā”kaြောင’ya paccuppanyaakaျို”tarā”phaြcyapuṃ， paccuppanyaakaြောငya”tarā”kaြောင’ya

kaြñña’yapā．)

2． paṭiccasamuppādatarā” paṭiccasamuppannatarā”，

paြññyacharātoyabhurā”kaြီ”၏ maှtyakhaျkya

1． avijjā taṇaှာ upādānya saṅkhāra kaṃ caso akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’၏ thaငyaraှာ” phaြcyakhaြငya”kaြောင’ya
thaငyaraှာ”raှိkhaြငya”kaြောင’ya paccuppannadhammatiု’၏ thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyapuṃ，
2． avijjā taṇaှာ upādānya saṅkhāra kaṃ caso akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’၏ anuppādanirodha sabhoā”phaြင’ya

3． yaငya” paccuppannadhammatiု’၏ phaြcyamaှု = nibbattilakkhaṇā， paျkyamaှု = vipariṇāmalakkhaṇā，
(ī naှcyamaျို”kā” khaṇato udayabbayataññya”． )
paccuppannadhammānaṃ udayabbayaṃ dishā - (mahāṭī-2-423．) hūso athakyapā mahāṭīkā cakā”rapya၌kā”
paccayato udayabbaya， khaṇato udayabbaya hūso udayabbaya naှcyamaျို”luṃ” pāvaငyasaññyahu maှtyapā． tacyaphanya
yaငya”naှcyamaျို”luṃ”soudayabbayakiု udayabbayānupassanāhūso paccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya siaောငya maြငyaaောငya raှုpaြီ”pāmaှ
atityaanāgatyatiု’၌ naññya”kiုchoငya၍ thiုnaññya”laññya”koငya”hu anhayañāṇyaphaြင’ya raှုrasaññyahūso
raှေ”thuṃ”hoငya” upadesatacyarapyakiုlaññya” riုsechā maှtyasā”thā”pā．
tacyaphanya --- visuddhimaggaaṭṭhakathā (visuddhi-2-249．) rūpanibbattipassanākārapiုငya”thaငya atityabha0ka
avijjā taṇaှာ upādānyatiု’ khaြံraṃlaျkya paြုcupaျို”thoငyakhaဲ’so saṅkhāra kaṃ kaြောင’ya paṭisandhekhiုkya kammajarupyamaျာ”
phaြcyapoyalāpuṃ nibbattisabhomaှ ca၍ bha0tacyalaျှောkyavayya kaṃ citya utu āhārataññya”hūso chiုငyarā
chiုငyarā akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’kaြောင’ya chiုငyarā chiုငyarā kammajarupya cittajarupya utujarupya āhārajarupyatiု’၏
phaြcyapoyalāpuṅkiု maြငyaaောငya raှုranyalaññya” ññhaှnyakaြာ”thā”toyamū၏．
tacyaphanya arūpanibbattipassanākārapiုငya” (visuddhi-2-252．) thaငyalaññya” alā”tūpaငya atityabha0ka
avijjā taṇaှာ upādānyatiု’ khaြံraṃlaျkya paြုcupaျို”thoငyathā”apyaso saṅkhāra kaṅkaြောင’ya paṭisandhe nāmyatarā”cu
phaြcyapuṅkiုlaññya”koငya”， bha0tacyalaျှောkyavayya chiုငyarā chiုငyarā akaြောငya”tarā”maျာ”kaြောင’ya thiုkyasaliု phaြcyane-
kaြso bhavaငyanāmyatarā”cutiု’naှင’yatakha dhāra (6)pā”၌ phaြcyanekaြso nāmyatarā”tiု’kiုlaññya”koငya” vipassanā
raှုranya ññhaှnyakaြာ”thā”toyamū၏．
thiုkaြောင’ya paccuppannadhammaarathaငya paṭisandhekhandhāငါ”pā”kaca၍ bha0tacyalaျှောkya thiုkyasaliု phaြcyanekaြso
khandhāငါ”pā”tiု’ pāvaငyakaြsaññyakiုlaññya” maှtyasā”pāle．
thiုkaြောင’ya paccayato udayabbayadassana， khaṇato udayabbayadassana hūso naှcyamaျို”so
udayabbayānupassanāñāṇyaphaြင’ya paccuppannadhammatiု’kiု vipassanā raှုphā” suṃ”sapyasoakhā paṭisandhekhandhāငါ”pā”maှ
cataငya၍ raှုphā”suṃ”sapyapā ． (raှုphā”puṅkiု vipassanāpiုငya” udayabbayañāṇyakhanya”thaငya kaြñña’yapā．)
yakhutacyaphanya bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇyapiုငya”၌ anhayañāṇyaphaြင’ya raှုpuṅkiု chakyalakya၍ re”sā”taငyapaြpeṃ’．
bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇyapiုငya”၌ anhayañāṇyaphaြင’ya raှုpuṃ
atha vā so evaṃ viratto yathādiṭṭhaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ， tathā adiṭṭhampi anhayañāṇa0sena nirodheti，
no samudeti． nirodhato0 manasikaroti． nirodhamevassa passati， no samudayanti attho．
(visuddhi-2-279．)
evaṃ virattoti evaṃ bhaṅgānupassanānusārena viratto． yathā diṭṭhaṃ sampati upaṭṭhitaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ
nirodheti nirodhaṃ manasikaroti． adiṭṭhampi atītānāgataṃ anhayañāṇa0sena yathā idaṃ etarahi，
evaṃ itarepīti anuminanto nirodheti manasikatassāpi nirodhaṃ karoti， no samudetīti etthāpi
ese0 nayo， no samudayaṃ manasikarotīti attho． (mahāṭī-2-442．)

koငya”so ñña tacyaññapiုငya” -- paccakkhañāṇya naှင’ya anhayañāṇya akaြောငya”
atha vā = tacyanaññya”soyakā”． evaṃ = ībhaṅgānupassanākiု laျှောkyasaphaြင’ya (= ībhaṅgānupassanāñāṇyasiု’
acañyalaျှောkyasaphaြင’ya )． viratto = tapyakhaြငya”kaငya”so． so yogā0caro = thiုyogā0carasaññya．
diṭṭhaṃ = maျkyamaှောkyamaြငyaapyaso，vā， raှေ”raှူthaငyalāso． saṅkhāragataṃ = saṅkhāratarā”kiု． nirodheti nirodhaṃ
manasikaroti yathā = khaျုpyakhaြငya”kiု naှluṃ”shaငya”sakaဲ’siု’． tathā = thiု’atū． adiṭṭhampi = mamaြငyaapyaso
atitya anāgatya saṅkhāratarā”kiုlaññya”． anhayañāṇa0sena = alaျောyachaso ñāṇya၏ achamya”phaြင’ya．
(etarahi = yakhumaျkyamaှောkya၌． idaṃ yathā = īpaccuppanya diṭṭhasaṅkhārakaဲ’siု’． evaṃ tathā = thiု’atū． tampi =
thiုadiṭṭhaphaြcyaso atitya anāgatya saṅkhāratarā”saññyalaññya”． evaṃ sabhā0me0 = īsiု’ khaျုpyapaျkyakhaြငya”
sabho raှိsaññyasātaññya”． iti = īsiု’． anuminanto = naှိုငya”raှñña’yalaျkya．) nirodheti = nirodhaṃ
manasikaroti = nirodhakiု naှluṃ”shaငya”၏． no samudeti = no samudayaṃ manasikaroti = samudayakiု
naှluṃ”mashaငya”． nirodhato0 = khaျုpyasoā”phaြင’ya sālaျှငya． manasikaroti = naှluṃ”shaငya”၏． assa
saṅkhāragatassa = thiု saṅkhāratarā”၏． nirodhame0 = nirodhakiု sālaျှငya． passati = raှု၏． samudayaṃ =
samudayakiု． no passati = maraှု． (paြññya-visuddhimagyanissaya-5-207-208．)
= tacyanaññya” --- ī bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇyasiု’ acañyalaျှောkyasaphaြင’ya saṅkhāratarā”tiု’ apoya၌ (vikkhambhanapaha
mnyaphaြင’ya rāgakiု khapyakaြာkaြာ khhāthā”niုငyasoā”phaြင’ya) tapyamakyakhaြငya” rāgakaငya”so thiုyogā0cara-
puggiုlyasaññya bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇyaphaြင’ya maျkyamaှောkyasimaြငyaapyaso， bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇya0၌ raှေ”raှူ thaငyalāso
saṅkhāratarā” apoငya”kiု yaငya” saṅkhāratarā” apoငya”၏ khaျုpyakhaြငya”kiု naှluṃ”shaငya”sakaဲ’siု’ thiု’atū
bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇyaphaြင’ya mathe’ mamaြငya apyase”so atitya anāgatya saṅkhāratarā” apoငya”kiုlaññya”
alaျောyacha၍ yūtatyaso anhayañāṇya၏ achamya”phaြင’ya ---- “yakhumaျkyamaှောkya bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇyataññya”
hūso lakyaငငya” paccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyaapyaso īsaṅkhāratarā”kaဲ’siု’ thiု’atū bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇyataññya”
hūso vipassanāñāṇyaphaြင’ya mamaြငyaapyase”so atitya anāgatya saṅkhāratarā”saññyalaññya” īsiု’khaျုpyakhaြငya”
sabhoraှိsaññyasātaññya” ” ---- hu īsiု’ naှိုငya”raှñña’yalaျkya khaျုpyakhaြငya” nirodhasabhokiု naှluṃ”shaငya”၏， phaြcyakhaြငya”
samudayakiု naှluṃ”mashaငya”． khaျုpyasoā”phaြင’yasālaျှငya = akhaျုpyakiုsālaျှငya naှluṃ”shaငya”၏， thiု saṅkhāratarā”-
apoငya”၏ khaျုpyakhaြငya” nirodhakiုsālaျှငya raှု၏， phaြcyakhaြငya” samudayakiု maraှု． īkā” athakyapā paṭisambhidāmagga
pāḷitoya၏ chiုliုraငya”taññya”． (visuddhi-2-279． mahāṭī-2-442．)
ārammaṇaanhayena， ubho eka0vatthanā．
nirodhe adhimuttatā， 0yalakkhaṇavipassanā． (paṭisaṃ-55．)
ārammaṇaanhayena = lakyaငငya”maျkyamaှောkya simaြငyaapyaso diṭṭhaphaြcyaso āruṅkiု acañyalaျှောkyasaphaြင’ya．
ubho = diṭṭha-adiṭṭha āruṃ naှcyamaျို”tiု’kiု． eka0vatthanā = khaṇabhaငyahūso tacyakhutaññya”so sabho
ā”phaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”maှtyasā”khaြငya”laññya”koငya”． nirodhe = saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏ khaṇamacaဲ tasaဲsaဲ khaျုpyapaျkyakhaြငya”
khaṇikanirodha၌． adhimuttatā = ññhatyakiုငya”raှိုငya”so aphaြcyalaññya”koငya”． esā = īsaññyakā”． 0ya-
lakkhaṇavipassanā = saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏ paျkyakhaြငya” 0yalakkhaṇākiု raှုso vipassanā maññya၏．
ārammaṇaanhayena ubho eka0vatthanāti paccakkhato diṭṭhassa ārammaṇassa anhayena anugamanena
yathā idaṃ， tathā atītepi saṅkhāragataṃ bhijjittha， anāgatepi bhijjissatīti evaṃ ubhinnaṃ ekasabhāve-
ne0 0vatthāpananti attho．
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
36
vuttampi cetaṃ porāṇehi ---
“saṃvijjamānamaှိ visuddhadassano，
tadanhayaṃ neti atītanāgate．
sabbepi saṅkhāragatā palokino，
ussā0bindū sūriye0 uggate”ti． (visuddhi-2-280．)
ubhoti diṭṭhādiṭṭhabhāvena dhepi ārammaṇāni． eka0vatthanāti khaṇabhaṅguratāya samānāti
0vatthāpanā． ． saṃvijjamānamaှီti paccakkhato upalabbhamāne paccuppanne． visuddhadassanoti bhaṅgadassanassa
paribandhavidhamanena visuddhañāṇo， suvisuddhabhaṅgadassanoti attho． tadanhayaṃ netīti tassa paccuppannasaṅkhāra-
bhaṅgadassino ñāṇassa anhayaṃ anugatabhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ pa0tteti． kattha pana pa0ttetīti āha “atītanāga
te”ti． atīte， anāgate ca saṅkhāragate． sabbepītiādi tassa pavattanākāradassanaṃ．
(mahāṭī-2-443．)
ñātañca ñāṇañca ubhopi vipassati． (visuddhi-2-278．)
ārammaṇaanhayena ubho eka0vatthanā --- paccakkhaā”phaြင’ya (= paccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya) kiုyyatiုငyamaျkyamaှောkya
thhaငya”phokya simaြငyaapyapaြီ”so raှုmaြငyaapyapaြီ”so ñātaamaññyaraso dukkhasaccātarā” samudayasaccā
tarā”， ñāṇaamaññyaraso (lokīmaggasaccātarā”taññya”hūso) vipassanāñāṇya --- ī ñātañāṇaamaññyara
so saṅkhāraāruṅkiု acañyalaျှောkyasaphaြင’ya， bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇyaphaြင’ya lakyaငငya”diṭṭha simaြငyaapyaso
īpaccuppannadhamma saṅkhāratarā”saññya paျkyasakaဲ’siု’ thiု’atū atitya၌laññya” saṅkhāratarā”apoငya”saññya paျkyakhaဲ’paြီ，
noငyaanāgatya၌laññya” paျkyalattaṃ’hu --- vipassanāñāṇyaphaြင’ya raှုmaြငyaapyapaြီ”so diṭṭhaāruṃ， vipassanāñāṇyaphaြင’ya
maraှုmaြငyaapyase”so adiṭṭhaāruṃhūso naှcyapā”kunyaso āruṃtiု’kiု īkhaṇabhaငyaā”phaြင’ya khaṇamacaဲ tasaဲsaဲ
paျkyakhaြငya”hūso tūsosabhoā”phaြင’yasālaျှငya koငya”chā maှtyasā”khaြငya”kiု paြုlupyaapyapesaññya． īkā”
chiုliုraငya” anakyasabhotaññya”． maှnyapesaññya --- raှေ”raှေ”aṭṭhakathācharātoyatiု’saññya īcakā”kiု mina’yachiုtoyamūkaြkunya၏．
---
saṃvijjamānamaှိ ． pa ． uggate ． (athakyathaငya kaြñña’yapā．)
saṃvijjamānamaှိ = paccakkhaā”phaြင’ya， raapyaso paccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya simaြငyaapyaso paccuppannadhamma saṅkhāra-
tarā”apoငya”၌ (= diṭṭhatarā”hūliုsaññya)． visuddhadassano = athū”saphaြင’ya caငyakaြyyaso， saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏
bhaငyakiု raှုso bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇyaamaြငyaraှိso yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya． tadanhayaṃ = thiုpaccuppannadhamma
saṅkhāratarā”၏ paျkyakhaြငya”bhaငyakiု raှုso bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇyasiု’ acañyaliုkya၍ phaြcyaso vipassanāñāṇyakiု．
atīte = atitya phaြcyaso saṅkhāratarā”၌ laññya”koငya”． anāgate = anāgatya phaြcyaso
saṅkhāratarā”၌laññya”koငya”． neti = choငya၏ = phaြcyace၏． sabbepi = kaြhaငya”maဲ’ussuṃ aluṃ”cuṃlaññya”-
phaြcyakunyaso． saṅkhāragatā = atityasaṅkhāra anāgatyasaṅkhāra paccuppanyasaṅkhāra tarā”apoငya”tiု’saññya．
palokino = paျkyakhaြငya”sabho raှိkunya၏． kimi0 = abhayyakaဲ’siု’naññya”hūmūkā” --- sūriye = nesaññya．
uggate = takyalatyasaññya raှိsoya． ussā0bindu = chī”naှငya”pokyasaññya． palokatii0 = paျောkyapaျkyasakaဲ’siု’taññya”．
(visuddhi-2-280．)
37
koငya”so ñña tacyaññapiုငya” -- paccakkhañāṇya naှင’ya anhayañāṇya akaြောငya”
= paccakkhaā”phaြင’ya raapyaso paccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya simaြငyaapyaso diṭṭhaamaññyaraso paccuppannadhamma saṅkhāra-
tarā”apoငya”၌ paျkyakhaြငya”bhaငyakiု raှုso athū”saphaြင’ya caငyakaြyyaso bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇyaamaြငyaraှိso
yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya thiုpaccuppannadhamma saṅkhāratarā”၏ bhaငyakiု raှုso bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇyasiု’ acañyaliုkya၍
phaြcyaso vipassanāñāṇyakiု atityasaṅkhāratarā” anāgatyasaṅkhāratarā”၌ naññya”kiု choငya၏， vipassanāñāṇyakiု
phaြcyace၏． kaြhaငya”maဲ’ussuṃ aluṃ”cuṃlaññya” phaြcyakunyaso atitya anāgatya paccuppanya saṅkhāratarā”
maှnyasamaျှtiု’saññya paျkyakhaြငya”sabho raှိkunya၏． abhayyakaဲ’siု’naññya”hūmūkā” ---- nekhaြññyathipaျောkya chī”naှငya”pokya
kaဲ’siု’taññya”． (visuddhi-2-280． mahāṭī-2-443．)
nirodhe adhimuttatā = khaṇanirodha၌ ññhatyakiုငya”raှိုငya”maှု
nirodhe adhimuttatāti evaṃ ubhinnaṃ bhaṅga0sena eka0vatthānaṃ kathā tasmiññe0 bhaṅgasaṅkhāte
nirodhe adhimuttatā taggarutā tanninnatā tappoṇatā tappabbhāratāti attho． 0yalakkhaṇavipassanāti
esā 0yalakkhaṇavipassanā nāmāti vuttaṃ hoti． (visuddhi-2-280．)
bhaṅgasaṅkhāte nirodhe，， na nibbānasaṅkhāteti adhippāyo． esāti yā ārammaṇanhayena ubho
diṭṭhādiṭṭhe khaṇabhaṅguratāya ekabhāvena 0vatthāpanā， esā 0yalakkhaṇe vipariṇāmalakkhaṇe vipassanā
bhaṅgānupassanāti attho． (mahāṭī-2-443．)
= nirodhe adhimuttatā = khaṇanirodha၌ ññhatyakiုငya”raှိုငya”maှု hūsaññyakā” --- īsiု’laျှငya diṭṭhasaṅkhāra
adiṭṭhasaṅkhāraā”phaြင’ya naှcyamaျို”kunyaso vipassanāñāṇya၏ araှုkhaṃāruṃtiု’၏ khaṇamacaဲ tasaဲsaဲ paျkyaneso
khaṇabhaငya၏ achamya”ā”phaြင’ya tūmaျှkunya၏ - hu piုငya”khaြာ”maှtyasā”khaြငya”kiု paြု၍ saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏ bhaငya hu
chiုapyaso thiုkhaျုpyakhaြငya” khaṇanirodha၌sālaျှငya naှluṃ”shaငya”saññya၏aphaြcyasaññya thiုkhaṇanirodha၌sālaျှငya
ale”paြုsaññya၏aphaြcyasaññya thiုkhaṇanirodha၌sālaျှငya ññhatyasaññya၏aphaြcyasaññya thiုkhaṇanirodhasiု’sālaျှငya
raှိုငya”saññya၏aphaြcyasaññya nirodhe adhimuttatā = nirodha၌ naှluṃ”shaငya”maှု maññya၏． īsiု’ paccakkhaā”phaြင’ya
raှုmaြငyaapyasañña’ya = paccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya raှုmaြငyaapyasañña’ya saṅkhāraāruṃsiု’ acañyalaျှောkyasaphaြင’ya naှcyapā”kunyaso diṭṭhaāruṃ
adiṭṭhaāruṃtiု’kiု khaṇabhaငyaā”phaြင’ya tūsaññya၏aphaြcyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”maှtyasā”khaြငya”saññya paျkyakhaြငya”hu chiုapyaso
0yalakkhaṇākiု raှုso 0yalakkhaṇānupassanā = bhaṅgānupassanā maññya၏．
(visuddhi-2-280． mahāṭī-2-443．)
bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇya၏ araှုkhaṃāruṃtarā”maျာ”
yaငya”bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇyaphaြင’ya paccakkhaā”phaြင’ya vipassanā raှုphā”suṃ”sapyaramañña’ya tarā”maျာ”kiု paṭisambhidāmaga
¾pāḷitoyakaြီ”thaငya īsiု’ hokaြာ”thā”toyamū၏．
kathaṃ ārammaṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhā bhaṅgānupassane paññā vipassane ñāṇaṃ --- rūpārammaṇatā cittaṃ uppajjithā
bhijjati， taṃ ārammaṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhā tassa cittassa bhaṅgaṃ anupassati． pa ．
vedanārammaṇatā． pa ． saññārammaṇatā． saṅkhārārammaṇatā． viññāṇārammaṇatā． ． cakkhu． pa ．
jarāmaraṇārammaṇatā cittaṃ uppajjithā bhijjati， taṃ ārammaṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhā tassa cittassa bhaṅgaṃ anupassati．
(paṭisaṃ-55．)
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
38
= rupya vedanā saññā saṅkhāra viññāṇya caso saṅkhāraāruṅkiု kunyatatya paျkyatatyaso khaya-0ya
sabhoā”phaြင’yasālaျှငya chaငyakhaြငya၍ = vipassanā raှုphā”suṃ”sapya၍， thiုsiု’ raှုneso vipassanācitya၏ paျkyakhaြငya”
bhaငyakiု tacyaphanyapaြnya၍ aphanyatalaဲlaဲ raှုtatyaso apaြာ”ā”phaြင’ya sitatyaso paññāsaññya raှိ၏． īpaññākiု
vipassanāñāṇya = bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇya hū၍ chiုapya၏． thiုñāṇyasaññya abhayyasiု’ phaြcyasanaññya”．
rupyatarā”laျှငya āruṃraှိso vipassanācityasaññya phaြcyapaြီ”laျှငya paျkya၏． thiုrupyatarā”taññya”hūso āruṅkiု
kunyatatya paျkyatatyaso khaya-0ya sabhoā”phaြင’ya maြငya၍， thiု khaya-0ya sabhoā”phaြင’ya siso vipassanācitya၏
paျkyakhaြငya” bhaငyakiု nokyavipassanācityaphaြင’ya aphanyatalaဲlaဲ vipassanāraှု၏． pa ． (paṭisaṃ-55．)
ñāta tarā” naှင’ya ñāṇa tarā”
ī bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇyapiုငya”vayya vipassanāñāṇya၏ araှုkhaṃ āruṃ tarā”maျာ”kiု -- vipassanāñāṇyaphaြင’ya
thiု”thhaငya”simaြငyaapyasañña’ya tarā”phaြcya၍ ñāta tarā”hu chiုapya၏． yaငya” ñātatarā”tiု’maှာ khandhā (5)pā”，
āyatana (12)pā”， dhātya (18)pā”， avijjāmaှsaññya jarāmaraṇasiု’tiုငyaaောငyaso paṭiccasamuppādya aṅgārapya
(12)pā”tiု’ phaြcyakaြ၏． yaငya”saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏ paျkyakhaြငya” bhaငyakiု raှုtatyaso vipassanāñāṇya = vipassanācityamaှာ
ñāṇa tarā”taññya”．
yaငya” ñātatarā”tiု’၏ apaျkya bhaငyakiု āruṃyū၍laññya” lakkhaṇāre” suṃ”tanya tacyalaှñña’yacī taငyakā
vipassanā raှုra၏． yaငya”siု’ vipassanāraှုneso ñāṇya = vipassanāraှုneso cityakiုlaññya”， yaငya” citya၏
paျkyakhaြငya”bhaငyakiု āruṃyū၍ nokyavipassanācityaphaြင’ya lakkhaṇāre”suṃ”tanya tacyalaှñña’yacī taငyakā tacyaphanyapaြnya၍
vipassanā raှုra၏． thiုkaြောင’ya raှေ”raှေ”aṭṭhakathācharātoyatiု’ka ---
ñātañca ñāṇañca ubhopi vipassati． (visuddhi-2-278． paṭisaṃ-ṭṭha-1-239．)
ñātatarā” ñāṇatarā” - ī naှcyamaျို”luṃ”kiုpaငya vipassanā raှုpā - hu ññhaှnyakaြာ”thā”toyamūkaြ၏．
yaငya”siု’ ññhaှnyakaြာ”thā”toyamūso ñātatarā” ñāṇatarā” naှcyamaျို”luṃ”kā” bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇya၏ araှုkhaṃ
saṅkhāratarā”tiု’ phaြcyakaြ၏． bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇyataññya”hūso paccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya raှုmaြငyaapyaso diṭṭhasaṅkhāra-
tarā”tiု’ phaြcyakaြ၏． yaငya” diṭṭhatarā”tiု’thaငya - avijjāmaှsaññya jarāmaraṇasiု’ tiုငyaaောငyaso paṭiccasamuppādya
aṅgā (12)rapyatiု’laññya” pāvaငyakaြsaññyakiုlaññya” satipaြုpāle．
ī၌ jāti jarāmaraṇa - tiု’ara --- jātijarāmaraṇavantānaṃ khandhānaṃ 0sena pariyāyena vuttāni．
(paṭisaṃ-ṭṭha-1-222．) jarāmaraṇasīsena cettha jarāmaraṇa0nto0 dhammā gahitā． (saṃ-ṭī-2-78．) hūso
aṭṭhakathā ṭīkāaphhaင’yamaျာ”naှင’ya aññī jāti jarāmaraṇa sabhotarā” thaငyaraှာ”raှိkaြkunyaso khandhātiု’kiုpaငya
chiုliုsaññyahu maှtyapā．
cittanti cettha sasampayuttacittaṃ adhippetaṃ． (paṭisaṃ-ṭṭha-1-239．)
īarāvayya raှေ’vipassanācitya၏ bhaငyakiု nokyavipassanācityaphaြင’ya tacyaphanyapaြnya၍ vipassanāraှုranya
ññhaှnyakaြာ”thā”toyamū၏． thiုsiု’ ññhaှnyakaြာ”thā”toyamūrā၌ citya-ara yaှñyaphakya sampayutyacetasikyatarā”-
maျာ”naှင’yatakhaso vipassanācityakiု aliုraှိapyapesaññya． yaှñyaphakya sampayutya cetasikyamaျာ”naှင’ya atūtakhaso
vipassanācityahūsaññya sekkhaariyā sūtoyakoငya”maျာ”naှင’ya puthujanya sūtoyakoငya”tiု’၏ santānya၌
39
koငya”so ñña tacyaññapiုငya” -- paccakkhañāṇya naှင’ya anhayañāṇya akaြောငya”
mahākusiုlya manodhārika vipassanājovīthi cityaacañyamaျာ”sā phaြcyakaြsaññya．
thiုkaြောင’ya yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇyaphaြင’ya yaငya”paṭiccasamuppādya aṅgārapyatiု’kiု vipassanā
raှုliုpāka ñāta - ñāṇa tarā”naှcyamaျို”luṃ”kiုpaငya vipassanā raှုramaññya phaြcyasaññya．
adhhana’yakālasuṃ”pā”phaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”thā”apyaso avijjāmaှsaññya jarāmaraṇasiု’ tiုငyaaောငyaso paṭiccasamuppādya
aṅgārapyatiု’kā” ñāta tarā”cutiု’paငyataññya”． yaငya” ñātatarā”tiု’၏ paျkyakhaြငya” bhaငyakiု āruṃpaြု၍
lakkhaṇāyāñya taငyakā vipassanā raှုphā”suṃ”sapyatatyaso vipassanāñāṇya (= bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇya) kā”
(= puthujanyanaှင’ya sekkhamaျာ”athakya mahākusiုlya manodhārika vipassanājovīthi cityaacañyakā” ) ñāṇatara
m;taññya”． yaငya” ñāṇa tarā”kiု， yaငya” ñāṇa tarā”၏ apaျkyakiုpaငya āruṃpaြု၍ tacyaphanyapaြnya၍ vipassanā
raှုtatyaso ñāṇyakā” bhaṅgānupassanā ñāṇyapaငyataññya”． yaငya” ñāta tarā” ñāṇa tarā” naှcyamaျို”luṃ”kā”
bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇyataññya”hūso paccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya thiု”thhaငya”simaြငyaapyaso diṭṭhasaṅkhāratarā”cutaññya”． yaငya”
diṭṭhasaṅkhāratarā”cukiု bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇyataññya”hūso paccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya thhaငya”phokyasimaြငyapaြီ”soakhāmaှ
thiု bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇya၏ nokyasiု’ acañyaliုkyaso anhayañāṇyaphaြင’ya adiṭṭhaphaြcyasañña’ya atitya anāgatya
saṅkhāratarā”cukiုlaññya” ၎ငya”naññya”hu naññya”kiုchoငya၍ vipassanāraှုramaññya phaြcyapesaññya． yaငya” anhayañāṇyakā”
vipassanāñāṇya၏ nokyasiု’ acañyaliုkyaso anhayañāṇyapaငyataññya”．
yakhutacyaphanya chakyalakya၍ athakyathaငya ū”taññya၍ raှငya”laငya”taငyapaြneso upanisasuttanya၌ ho-
kaြာ”thā”toyamūapyaso iti rūpassa atthaṅgamo - caso raှုkhakyakiု taငyapaြpeṃ’．
iti rūpassa atthaṅgamo ． pa ． iti viññāṇassa atthaṅgamo
iti rūpassa atthaṅgamoti evaṃ avijjānirodhādi0sena pañcahākārehi rūpassa atthaṅgamo．
vedanādīsupi ese0 nayo． ayamettha saṅkhepo ， vitthāro pana visuddhimagge udayabbayañāṇakathāya
vutto． (dī-ṭṭha-2-373．)
1． avijjānirodhā rūpanirodhoti paccayanirodhaṭṭhena rūpakkhandhassa 0yaṃ passati，
2． taṇaှာnirodhā rūpanirodhoti paccayanirodhaṭṭhena rūpakkhandhassa 0yaṃ passati，
3． kammanirodhā rūpanirodhoti paccayanirodhaṭṭhena rūpakkhandhassa 0yaṃ passati，
4． āhāranirodhā rūpanirodhoti paccayanirodhaṭṭhena rūpakkhandhassa 0yaṃ passati，
5． vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ passantopi rūpakkhandhassa 0yaṃ passati．

nānaṃ， evaṃ santepi “jānato”ti ñāṇalakkhaṇaṃ upādāya puggalaṃ niddisati． jānanalakkhaṇaṃ hi ñāṇaṃ．
“passato”ti ñāṇappabhāvaṃ upādāya． dassanappabhāvaṃ hi upādāya ñāṇasamaṅgī puggalo cakkhumā viya
puggalo cakkhunā rūpāni， ñāṇena vi0ṭe dhamme passati． (itivuttaka-ṭṭha-310．)
jānato = sisasūā”sālaျှငya， passato = maြငyasasūā”sālaျှငya． (jānato e0 passato
evāti e0mettha niyamo icchito． saṃ-ṭī-2-64．)
ī naှcyapudyatiု’kā” saddāsā khaဲpaြာ”၍ tūsoanakya raှိkaြsoyalaññya” --- jānato - hūso
pudyaka āruṃ၏ sabhomaှnyakiု hutyatiုငya”maှnyachā thiု”thhaငya”sikhaြငya” sabholakkhaṇākiု achaဲpaြု၍ sitatyaso
puggiုlyakiု ññhaှnyapaြ၏． maှnyapesaññya --- sammādiṭṭhiñāṇyasaññya āruṃ၏ sabhomaှnyakiု hutyatiုငya”maှnyachā thiု”thhaငya”
sikhaြငya” sabholakkhaṇā raှိ၏．
passato - hūso pudyaka āruṃ၏ sabhomaှnyakiု maြငyatatyaso ñāṇya၏ chamya”ā”raှိnyacoya
ānubhoyakiု achaဲpaြု၍ maြငyatatyaso puggiုlyakiု ññhaှnyapaြ၏． maှnyapesaññya --- sammādiṭṭhiñāṇyasaññya āruṃ၏
sabhomaှnyakiု maြငyakhaြငya” chamya”ā”raှိnyacoya ānubhoya raှိ၏． maျkyaciamaြငya raှိso puggiုlyasaññya rūpāruṃtiု’kiု
cakkhuviññāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyasakaဲ’siု’ sammādiṭṭhiñāṇyanaှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃso yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya āruṃ၏ sabhomaှnyakiု
maြငyaaောငya aroငyaalaငya”kiု thhanya”paြkhaြငya”kiccaraှိso ñāṇyaka phhaင’yapaြapyaso saccāle”rapyatarā”maြtyatiု’kiု
maြငyatatya၏． (itivuttaka-ṭṭha-310．)
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
44
aṭṭhakathā - dutiyaaphhaင’ya
atha vā jānatoti anubodhañāṇena jānato． passatoti paṭivedhañāṇena passato．
(itivuttaka-ṭṭha-310．)
tacyanaññya” --- jānato - hūsaññya anubodhañāṇyaphaြင’ya sisasūā”sālaျှငya hu chiုliု၏． passato
hūsaññya paṭivedhañāṇyaphaြင’ya sisasūā”sālaျှငya hu chiုliု၏．
duvidhaṃ hi saccañāṇaṃ anubodhañāṇaṃ paṭivedhañāṇañca． tattha anubodhañāṇaṃ lokiyaṃ anussa-
vādi0sena nirodhe magge ca pavattati． paṭivedhañāṇaṃ lokuttaraṃ nirodhamārammaṇaṃ kathā kiccato
cattāri saccāni paṭivijjhati． (visuddhi-1-142．)
duvidhaṃ hi saccañāṇaṃ lokiyaṃ lokuttarañca． lokikaṃ duvidhaṃ anubodhañāṇaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇañca．
anubodhañāṇaṃ ādikammikassa anussavādi0sena nirodhe magge ca pavattati， dukkhe samudaye
ca ārammaṇakaraṇa0sena． paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ paṭividdhasaccassa catūsupi saccesu ārammaṇakaraṇa0sena．
lokuttaraṃ paṭivedhañāṇaṃ nirodhamārammaṇaṃ kathā cattāri saccāni paṭivijjhati． (paṭisaṃ-ṭṭha-1-342．)
= saccāle”pā”kiု thiု”thhaငya”sitatyaso saccañāṇyasaññya lokīsaccañāṇya lokuttarāsaccañāṇyahu
saccañāṇya naှcyamaျို”raှိ၏． thiုthaငya lokīphaြcyaso saccañāṇyasaññyalaññya” anubodhañāṇya paccavekkhaṇañāṇyahu
naှcyamaျို”raှိ၏． vipassanā bhā0nākammaṭṭhānya”kiု ā”sacyacasā phaြcyaso puthujanya yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ santānyavayya
lokuttarāsaccā phaြcyakaြkunyaso asaṅkhatadhātya aငြိmya”dhātya nibbānyatarā”toyamaြtyataññya”hūso nirodha
saccātarā”၌laññya”koငya”， yaငya”nirodhasaccākiု āruṃyūtatyaso ariyamagyanaှင’ya yaှñyathaဲlaျkyaraှိso maggaငya
tarā”kiုyya (8)pā”taññya”hūso maggasaccātarā”၌laññya”koငya” ---
1． anussa0 = charāsamā”casūtiု’thaṃmaှ achaင’yakaြာ”၍ sikhaြငya”，
2． ākāraparivitakka = “sekhaြငya”tarā”saññya thaငyaraှာ”raှိpāmū maserā amaြိုkyanibbānyatarā”saññya thaငyaraှာ”
raှိlerā၏” īsiု’ casaññyaphaြင’ya akhaြငya”arā ākārakiု kaြံchakhaြငya”phaြင’ya sikhaြငya”，
3． diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantianugata = cū”ciုkyakaြñña’yaraှု၍ naှcyasakyakaျnepya၍ yūapyasoayū = cañya”cā”the”kaြံ
lakyakhaṃnaှcyasima’yasoayūnokyasiု’ acañyaliုkyaso sikhaြငya” - hūso
īsuṃ”maျို”so sikhaြငya”maျို”phaြင’yasā phaြcyapoyalā၏ si၏． yaငya” asimaျို”kiုlaññya” anubodhañāṇya
anubodhasihu khoyachiု၏． (anumānañāṇyataññya”．) siု’soya yaငya”anubodhañāṇyasaññya dukkhasaccātarā”
samudayasaccātarā”၌kā” āruṃmaျkyamaှောkyapaြုsoā”phaြင’ya phaြcyapoyalā၏ si၏． (paccakkhañāṇyataññya”．)
paccavekkhaṇañāṇyasaññyakā” saccāle”pā”kiု thiု”thhaငya”simaြငyapaြီ”so ariyāsūtoyakoငya”၏ santānya၌
saccāle”pā”luṃ”tiု’၌paငya āruṃmaျkyamaှောkyapaြုsaññya၏ achamya”phaြင’ya phaြcyapoyalā၏． lokuttarāsaccañāṇya
phaြcyaso paṭivedhañāṇyasaññyakā” asaṅkhatadhātya aငြိmya”dhātyanibbānyahūsañña’ya nirodhasaccātarā”kiု āruṃ
paြု၍ kiccaā”phaြင’ya saccāle”pā”tiု’kiု thiု”thhaငya”si၏． (visuddhi-1-142． paṭisaṃ-ṭṭha-1-342．)
e0massa pubbabhāge dhīsu saccesu uggahaparipucchāsa0nadhāraṇasammasanapaṭivedho hoti， dhīsu
sa0napaṭivedhoye0． aparabhāge tīsu kiccato paṭivedho hoti， nirodhe ārammaṇapaṭivedho．
45
koငya”so ñña tacyaññapiုငya” -- paccakkhañāṇya naှင’ya anhayañāṇya akaြောငya”
tattha sabbampi paṭivedhañāṇaṃ lokuttaraṃ． sa0nadhāraṇasammasanañāṇaṃ lokiyaṃ kāmā0caraṃ．
(abhi-ṭṭha-2-109．)
= vipassanā bhā0nākammaṭṭhānya”kiု ā”sacyacaphaြcyaso puthujanya yogā0cararahanya”toya၏ santānya၌
ariyamagyasiု’ machiုkyamī ariyamagya၏ raှေ’aphiု’၌ dukkhasaccā samudayasaccā naှcyamaျို”tiု’၌ ---
1． uggahapaṭivedha = dukkhasaccā samudayasaccānaှင’ya chakyacapyaso pāḷikiု saငyayūkhaြငya”ā”phaြင’ya thiု”thhaငya”၍
sikhaြငya”，
2． paripucchāpaṭivedha = dukkhasaccā samudayasaccānaှင’ya chakyacapyaso pāḷi၏ aṭṭhakathāanakyakiု aphanyaphanya
me”maြnya”khaြငya”ā”phaြင’ya thiု”thhaငya”၍ sikhaြငya”，
3． sa0napaṭivedha = dukkhasaccā samudayasaccātarā”tiု’kiု riုsechā nāyūkhaြငya”ā”phaြင’ya thiု”thhaငya”၍sikhaြငya”，
4． dhāraṇapaṭivedha = dukkhasaccātarā” samudayasaccātarā”tiု’kiု naှုtyaငုံchoငyarhakya maှtyasā”khaြငya”ā”phaြင’ya
thiု”thhaငya”၍ sikhaြငya”，
(īle”maျို”kā” saငyasi = kaြာ”sitaññya”．)
5． sammasanapaṭivedha = yaငya” dukkhasaccātarā” samudayasaccātarā”tiု’kiု lakkhaṇāre”suṃ”tanyataငyakā
raှုphā”suṃ”sapyakhaြငya”ā”phaြင’ya thiု”thhaငya”၍ sikhaြငya”， (vipassanāñāṇyaā”luṃ”taññya”．)
īpaṭivedha ငါ”maျို”saññya phaြcya၏． yaငya” paṭivedhakā” lokī mahākusiုlya kāmā0caratarā”taññya”．
nirodhasaccā maggasaccā naှcyamaျို”tiု’၌kā” ---
nirodhasaccaṃ iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ manāpaṃ， maggasaccaṃ iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ manāpaṃ． (saṃ-ṭṭha-3-160．)
=“nirodhasaccāsaññya aliုraှိapya naှcyasakyaapya maြtyaniု”apyaso tarā”taññya”， maggasaccāsaññya aliုraှိapya
naှcyasakyaapya maြtyaniု”apyaso tarā”taññya”” ---
īsiု’laျှငya sūtoyakoငya”tiု’thaṃmaှ nāyūrakhaြငya”ā”phaြင’ya thiု”thhaငya”၍ sikhaြငya” = sa0napaṭivedha =
saငyasimaျှsālaျှငya phaြcya၏． (ariyamagyasiု’machiုkyamī raှေ’piုငya” = pubbabhāgapaṭipadāpiုငya”taññya”．)
ariyamagya၏ upacārakhaṇamaှ nokyaaphiု’phaြcyaso ariyamagyakhaṇa၌ dukkhasaccā samudayasaccā maggasaccā
suṃ”maျို”tiု’၌ dukkhasaccākiု piုငya”khaြာ”၍ sikhaြငya” pariññākicca， samudayasaccākiု payyachana’yakhaြငya” pahānakicca， maggasaccākiု
phā”maျာ”khaြငya” bhā0nākiccahūso kiccaā”phaြင’ya pariññāpaṭivedha， pahānapaṭivedha， bhā0nāpaṭivedha hūso
thiု”thhaငya”၍ sikhaြငya” paṭivedhasaññya phaြcya၏． asaṅkhatadhātya nibbānyahūso nirodhasaccā၌ ārammaṇapaṭivedha
= āruṃpaြုsoā”phaြင’ya thiု”thhaငya”၍ sikhaြငya” = (sacchikiriyapaṭivedha = maျkyamaှောkyapaြုsoā”phaြင’ya thiု”thhaငya”၍
sikhaြငya”) saññya phaြcya၏． īpaṭivedhañāṇya ā”luṃ”saññya lokuttarātaññya”．
paṭivedhañāṇaṃ - ara lokuttarā ariyamagyakiု arakokyayūrā၌ yaငya”paṭivedhañāṇaṃ - ara
uggahapaṭivedha， paripucchāpaṭivedha， sa0napaṭivedha， dhāraṇapaṭivedha， sammasanapaṭivedhahūso paṭivedha ငါ”maျို”kiု
makokyayūra， lokuttarā sakyasakyaphaြcyaso pariññāpaṭivedha， pahānapaṭivedha， bhā0nāpaṭivedha， ā-
rammaṇapaṭivedhatiု’kiုsā arakokyayūrasaññya． thiုkaြောင’ya ---- sabbampi paṭivedhañāṇaṃ lokuttaraṃ =
paṭivedhañāṇyaā”luṃ”saññya lokuttarātaññya”hu chiုsaññya． (mūlaṭī-2-72．)
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
46
tacyanaññya” --- uggahapaṭivedha caso (5)maျို”so paṭivedhañāṇyasaññya lokuttarā paṭivedhañāṇya၏
akaြောငya”raငya” akhaြkheṃ phaြcyasokaြောင’ya uggahapaṭivedha casaññyakiုlaññya” phalūpacāraā”phaြင’ya paṭivedhañāṇyahupaငya
khoyaniုငya၏． īaliု - sabbampi paṭivedhañāṇaṃ - ara uggahapaṭivedhacaso ñāṇyatiု’kiုpā kokyayūniုငya၏．
(mūlaṭī-2-72．)
ariyasaccāle”pā”tiု’kiု anubodhañāṇyaphaြင’ya sisasūā”sālaျှငya paṭivedhañāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyasasūā”
sālaျှငya āsavotarā”tiု’၏kunyakhanya”kaြောငya” ariyamagyakiု raraှိkhaြငya”kiု bhurā”raှငyakahokaြာ”thā”toyamū၏．
anubodhañāṇyaphaြင’ya masisasūā” paṭivedhañāṇyaphaြင’ya mamaြငyasasūā” āsavotarā”tiု’၏ kunyakhanya”kaြောငya”
ariyamagyakiု raraှိkhaြငya”kiု bhurā”raှငyasaññya hokaြာ”toyamamūpe． īkā” athakyapā aṭṭhakathāaphhaင’ya၏
chiုliုraငya”taññya”． tacyaphanya aṭṭhakathācharātoyaka nokyatacyanaññya” thapyamaṃ၍ phhaင’yachiုthā”toyamūpaြnyasaññya．
aṭṭhakathā - tatiyaaphhaင’ya
paṭilomato vā dassanamaggena passato， bhā0nāmaggena jānato． (itivuttaka-ṭṭha-310．)
tacyanaññya” --- paြောငya”paြnya paṭilomaā”phaြင’ya - sotāpattimagyañāṇyaphaြင’ya saccāle”pā”kiု maြငyasasūā”
sālaျှငya， athakyamagyasuṃ”pā”phaြင’ya saccāle”pā”kiု sisasūā”sālaျှငya āsavotarā”tiု’၏ kunyakhanya”khaြငya”
kiု ငါbhurā”raှငyasaññya hokaြာ”toyamū၏， yaငya”siု’ masisasūā” mamaြငyasasūā” āsavotarā”tiု’၏
kunyakhanya”khaြငya”kiု ငါbhurā”raှငyasaññya hokaြာ”toyamamū --- hu chiုliုsaññya．
aṭṭhakathā catutthaaphhaင’ya - kecivāda
keci pana “ñātatīraṇapahānapariññāhi jānato， sikhāpattavipassanāya passato”ti 0danti．
(itivuttaka-ṭṭha-310．)
kecicharātiု’kā” - ñātapariññā tīraṇapariññā pahānapariññā hūso pariññāsuṃ”maျို”tiု’phaြင’ya
(lokīsaccāle”pā”kiု) sisasūā”， athhatyaathipyasiု’ rokyaraှိshā”so sikhāpattavipassanāñāṇyaphaြင’ya
(lokīsaccāle”pā”kiု) maြငyasasūā” āsavotarā”tiု’၏ kunyakhanya”kaြောငya” ariyamagyaphiုlyakiု raraှိniုငya
kaြောငya”kiု bhurā”raှငya hokaြာ”toyamū၏hu phhaင’yachiုtoyamūkaြ၏． (itivuttaka-ṭṭha-310．)
««maှtyakhaျkya --- pariññāsuṃ”pā”akaြောငya”kiု nokyathaငya chakyalakya၍ taငyapaြpāmaññya． lokīsaccā le”-
pā”kiု vipassanāñāṇyaphaြင’ya simaြငyapuṅkiု pañcamathaဲ - vipassanāpiုငya” - udayabbayañāṇyakhanya”thaငya kaြñña’yapā．»»
aṭṭhakathā - pañcamaaphhaင’ya
atha vā dukkhaṃ pariññābhisamayena jānato， nirodhaṃ sacchikiriyābhisamayena passato． tadubhaye
ca sati pahānabhā0nābhisamayā siddhā e0 hontīti catusaccābhisamayo vutto hoti．
(itivuttaka-ṭṭha-310．)
tacyanaññya” --- dukkhasaccākiု pariññābhisamayaphaြင’ya sisasūā”sālaျှငya， samudayasaccākiု pahānābhisamaya
phaြင’ya sisasūā”sālaျှငya， nirodhasaccākiု sacchikiriyābhisamayaphaြင’ya maြငyasasūā”sālaျှငya， maggasaccākiု
47
koငya”so ñña tacyaññapiုငya” -- paccakkhañāṇya naှင’ya anhayañāṇya akaြောငya”
bhā0nābhisamayaphaြင’ya maြငyasasūā”sālaျှငya āsavotarā”tiု’၏ kunyakhanya”kaြောငya” ariyamagyakiု raraှိkhaြငya”kiု
ငါbhurā”raှငyasaññya hokaြာ”toya mū၏， yaငya”siု’ masisasūā” mamaြငyasasūā” āsavotarā”tiု’၏
kunyakhanya”kaြောငya” ariyamagyakiု raraှိniုငyakaြောငya”kiု ငါbhurā”raှငyasaññya hokaြာ”toyamamūhu chiုliုsaññya．
(itivuttaka-ṭṭha-310．)
khadirapattasuttanya naှင’ya kūṭāgārasuttanya tarā”toya kokyanutyakhaျkya
yo ca kho bhikkhave evaṃ 0deyaျ “ahaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ yathābhūtaṃ anabhisamecca， dukkhasamudayaṃ
ariyasaccaṃ yathābhūtaṃ anabhisamecca， dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ yathābhūtaṃ anabhisamecca， dukkhanirodha-
gāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ ariyasaccaṃ yathābhūtaṃ anabhisamecca， sammā dukkhassantaṃ karissāmī”ti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati．
(saṃ-3-394． saṃ-3-383．)
anabhisameccāti ñāṇena anabhisamāganthā． appaṭivijjhithāti attho． (saṃ-ṭṭha-3-330．)
= rahanya”tiု’ ...tacyaū”tacyayokyaso puggiုlyaka --- “ငါsaññya dukkhaariyasaccātarā”kiု maphokya
mapaြnya hutyatiုငya”maှnyachā sammādiṭṭhiñāṇyapaññāphaြင’ya kiုyyatiုငyamaျkyamaှောkya thhaငya”phokyamasibhaဲ， dukkhaphaြcyakaြောငya”
samudayaariyasaccātarā”kiု maphokyamapaြnya hutyatiုငya”maှnyachā sammādiṭṭhiñāṇyapaññāphaြင’ya kiုyyatiုငyamaျkyamaှောkya
thhaငya”phokyamasibhaဲ， dukkhakhaျုpyakaြောငya” nirodhaariyasaccātarā”kiု maphokyamapaြnya hutyatiုငya”maှnyachā
sammādiṭṭhiñāṇyapaññāphaြင’ya kiုyyatiုငyamaျkyamaှောkya thhaငya”phokyamasibhaဲ， dukkhakhaျုpyarā nibbānyasiု’ rokyakaြောငya”kaျင’yacañya
maggaariyasaccātarā”kiု maphokyamapaြnya hutyatiုငya”maှnyachā sammādiṭṭhiñāṇyapaññāphaြင’ya kiုyyatiုငyamaျkyamaှောkya
thhaငya”phokyamasibhaဲ saṃsarāvaṭyachaငya”raဲdukkha၏ achuṃ”apiုငya”akhaြာ”kiု koငya”mhanyachā paြုlupyapeṃ’” --- hu
paြောchiုlāငြာ”aṃ’， thiုpuggiုlya၏ thiုpaြောchiုkhaျkyasaññya paြောchiုsañña’yaatiုငya” phaြcyaniုငyarāso thiုakaြောငya”-
arāmaျို”saññya maraှိsaññyasālaျှငyataññya”． (saṃ-3-394． saṃ-3-383．)
thiုsiု’ maphaြcyaniုငyapuṅkiု bhurā”raှငyaka aောkyaphoyapaြpā upamānaှင’ya naှိုငya”yaှñya၍ aောkyapāatiုငya” chakyalakya
hokaြာ”thā”toyamūkhaဲ’၏． chyiုliုraငya”maှာ īsiု’phaြcya၏．
rahanya”tiု’ ...puggiုlyatacyayokyaka --- “ငါsaññya aိmya၏ aောkyapiုငya”achokyaaūkiု mapaြုlupyabhaဲ
athakyapiုငya” achokyaaūkiု taငyapeṃ’ ” --- hu paြောchiုlāsaññyaphaြcyaṃ’， thiုpuggiုlya၏ thiုpaြောchiုkhaျkyasaññya

ariyasaccāle”pā”kiု maphokyamapaြnya hutyatiုငya”maှnyachā sammādiṭṭhiñāṇyapaññāphaြင’ya kiုyyatiုငyamaျkyamaှောkya thhaငya”-

yogo karaṇīyo． (saṃ-3-384． saṃ-3-394．)

2． “īkā” dukkhaphaြcyakaြောငya” samudayaariyasaccātaññya”” hu siaောငya kaြို”cā”ā”thutyapā．
