ā”thutyapā． (saṃ-3-384． saṃ-3-394．)
ī suttanyamaျာ”၌ bhurā”raှငyaka saṃsarāvaṭyachaငya”raဲdukkha kunyachuṃ”re”athakya saccāle”pā”kiု siaောငya
kaြို”cā”ā”thutyaphiု’ranya tiုkyathanya”thā”toyamūsaphaြင’ya saṃsarāvaṭyachaငya”raဲ bhe”dukkhachiု”kaြီ”maှ kaျhatyalhatya
thhakyamaြောkyaliုsū sūtoyakoငya”maှnyasamaျှtiု’saññya saccāle”pā”kiု siaောငya ā”shanyakhhanyaciုkya kaြို”pamya”-
kaြramaññyasā ekanyaphaြcyasaññyahu sanniṭṭhānyakaျ mukhaျpuṃse maှtyasā”nāyūlerāsaññya．
saccāle”pā”kiု sammādiṭṭhiñāṇyataññya”hūso paccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya kiုyyatiုငyamaျkyamaှောkya thhaငya”phokya
simaြငyaaောငya maññyasiု’ maññyapuṃ kaြို”pamya”ramaññyanaññya”hūmū aphaြmeှာ aောkyapāatiုငya” phaြcya၏．
vaṭṭasaccā - vivaṭṭasaccā
tattha purimāni dhe saccāni vaṭṭaṃ， pacchimāni vivaṭṭaṃ． tesu bhikkhuno 0ṭṭe kammaṭṭhānābhiniveso
hoti， vi0ṭṭe natthi abhiniveso． (abhi-ṭṭha-2-109． dī-ṭṭha-2-391． saṃ-ṭṭha-3-160．)
thiုsaccāle”pā”tiု’thaငya raှေ”phaြcyakaြkunyaso dukkhaariyasaccā samudayaariyasaccā naှcyapā”tiု’saññya
vaṭṭasaccātiု’taññya”． nokyaphaြcyakaြkunyaso nirodhaariyasaccā maggaariyasaccā naှcyapā”tiု’saññyakā” vivaṭṭa-
saccātiု’taññya”． thiု vaṭṭasaccā vivaṭṭasaccātiု’thaငya yogā0cara rahanya”toyaaphiု’ vaṭṭasaccā၌sā kammaṭṭhānya”
(vipassanākammaṭṭhānya”) naှluṃ”shaငya”khaြငya” = raှုphā”khaြငya”saññya phaြcya၏． vivaṭṭasaccā၌kā” (vipassanā) kammaṭṭhānya”kiု
naှluṃ”shaငya”khaြငya” = raှုphā”khaြငya”saññya maraှိsaññyasātaññya”． (abhi-ṭṭha-2-109． dī-ṭṭha-2-391． saṃ-ṭṭha-3-160．)
īathakyapā aṭṭhakathāmaျာ”၏ satyamaှtya ññhaှnyakaြာ”khaျkyanaှင’ya aññī yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya saccā
le”pā”tiု’thaငya vipassanāñāṇya၏ araှုkhaṃ āruṃphaြcyakaြkunyaso dukkhasaccātarā”naှင’ya samudayasaccātarā”tiု’kiု
uggahapaṭivedha， paripucchāpaṭivedha， sa0napaṭivedha， dhāraṇapaṭivedhataññya”hūso saငyasiphaြင’ya thiု”thhaငya”siranya
laññya”koငya”， sammasanapaṭivedhataññya” hūso vipassanāñāṇyaphaြင’ya thiု”thhaငya” siranya = kaျင’yasi siranya
laññya”koငya” kaြို”pamya”rato’maññya phaြcya၏． saငyasiphaြင’ya aောငyamaြငyamaှုkiု raraှိpaြီ”soakhā vipassanāñāṇyaphaြင’ya
kaျင’yasi siaောငya yaငya”dukkhasaccātarā” samudayasaccātarā”tiု’kiု cataငya simya”chaññya”ramaññya naှluṃ”shaငya”ramaññya
phaြcyapesaññya． īthaငya dukkhasaccātarā” samudayasaccātarā”tiု’kiု chakyalakya၍ raှငya”laငya”taငyapaြapyapāsaññya．

upādānakkhandhāhūsaññya
yaṃ kiñci bhikkhave rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṃ vā sukhumaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā
paṇītaṃ vā yaṃ dūre santike vā sāsavaṃ upādāniyaṃ， ayaṃ vuccati rūpupādānakkhandho． (saṃ-2-39．khandhasuttanya)

akhaြငya”arāā”phaြင’ya taññyaneso upādānakkhandhāငါ”pā”tiု’kiု dukkhaariyasaccātarā”hu bhurā”raှငya hokaြာ”-
thā”toyamūkaြောငya”kiု riုsechā ū”thipyarhakyapanyachaငya၍ maှtyasā”nāyūlerāsaññya．
yaငya” upādānakkhandhāငါ”pā”tiု’thaငya atitya upādānakkhandhāငါ”pā”， anāgatya upādānakkhandhāငါ”pā”tiု’laññya”
pāvaငyakaြ၏． yaငya” atitya anāgatya upādānakkhandhāငါ”pā”tiု’kiု paccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya raှုlesalo anhayañāṇyaphaြင’ya
raှုlesalohūmū aောkyapā āsavakkhayasuttanyaaṭṭhakathāaphhaင’yakiု kaြñña’yapā． ---
dassanappabhāvaṃ hi upādāya ñāṇasamaṅgī puggalo cakkhumā viya puggalo cakkhunā rūpāni， ñāṇena
vi0ṭe dhamme passati． (itivuttaka-ṭṭha-310．)
jānatoti vā 0thā na jānanaṃ anussavākāraparivitakkamatta0sena idhādhippetaṃ， atha kho rūpāni
viya cakkhuviññāṇena rūpādīni tesaṃ ca samudayādike paccakkhe kathā dassananti vibhāvetuṃ “passato”ti

vuccati． (abhi-ṭṭha-3-374． paṭṭhānaaṭṭhakathā．)

athakya၌ paြုcupaျို”thoငyaapyakhaဲ’paြီ”so mimi၏ akaျို”kiု phaြcyacekhaြငya”ငှာ chamya”niုငyaso nānākkhaṇikakammapaccaya
sattiphaြင’ya kaျေ”jū”paြုtatyaso akaြောငya”paccaññya”tarā”taññya” - hu chiုliု၏． ---
akaြောငya”paြkhaျkya --- kusiုlyakaṃ akusiုlyakaṃsaññya mimi၏ upādya-ṭhī-bhaငya ano”phaြင’ya phaြcyapoyanechaဲ
khaṇa၌ akaျို”vipākyakiု pe”niုငyasañña’ya chamya”ā”maraှိse”pe． kusiုlyakaṃ akusiုlyakaṃsaññya mimi၏ upādya-ṭhībhaငya
ano”phaြင’ya phaြcyapoyanechaဲ khaṇa၌ akayya၍ akaျို”pe”ငြာ”aṃ’． lūsā”tacyaū”saññya natyapaြññyasiု’
kapyarokyakaြောငya” phaြcyaso akaြငyakusiုlyakaṅkiု paြုcupaျို”thoငya၏， thiုkusiုlyakaṃ၏ ānubhoyakaြောင’ya
thiုkaṅkiု paြုcupaျို”thoငyachaဲkhaṇa၌paငya natyasā”saññya phaြcyalerā၏， siု’soya phaြcyakā” maphaြcyakhaဲ’pe． alaျောyaā”phaြင’ya
chiုramū --- akaြငyakhaṇa၌ thiုkaṅkiု paြုcupaျို”thoငyapaြီ” phaြcya၏． thiုkaṅkiု paြုcupaျို”thoငyachaဲkhaṇamaှ akhaြာ”tacyapā”so
khaṇa၌ yaငya”kaṃsaññya upādya-ṭhī-bhaငya ano”phaြင’ya thaငyaraှာ”maraှိpāsoyalaññya” sakyasakya kaṅkiု paြုapyapaြီ”saññya၏
aphaြcyakaြောင’yasālaျှငya ---
1． thiုkaṃsaññya diṭṭhadhammavedanīyakaṃ phaြcyaṃ’ --- maျkyamaှောkyathaငyathaငya raှုmaြငyaapyaso paccuppanyabha0၌soya
laññya”koငya”，
2． thiုkaṃsaññya upapajjavedanīyakaṃ phaြcyaṃ’ --- kapya၍phaြcyarā dutiyabha0၌soyalaññya”koငya”，
3． thiုkaṃsaññya aparāpariyavedanīyakaṃ phaြcyaṃ’ --- diṭṭhadhammabha0 upapajjabha0maှ akhaြာ”so tatiyabha0maှ
ca၍ achakyachakya rokyathiုkyaso bha0၌soyalaññya”koငya”， ---
63
koငya”so ñña tacyaññapiုငya” -- paccakkhañāṇya naှင’ya anhayañāṇya akaြောငya”
kusiုlyakaṃ phaြcyaṃ’ - gatisampatti upadhisampatti kālasampatti payogasampatti， akusiုlyakaṃ phaြcyaṃ’ -
gativipatti upadhivipatti kālavipatti payogavipattitaññya”hūso kaြhaငya”so akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’naှင’ya poငya”chuṃ
khaြငya”saññya thaငyaraှာ”raှိlatyasoya akaျို”vipākyakiု phaြcyaceniုငya၏． (abhi-ṭṭha-2-421 - kaြñña’yapā．)
abhayyakaဲ’siု’naññya”hūmū ------ raှေ”raှေ” saငyayūapyaso atatyasaငyayūmaှုsaññya nokyanokya atatya
saငyayūmaှုā” akhaြkheṃakaြောငya” athokyaapaṃ’aphaြcyaphaြင’ya kaျေ”jū”paြုrā၌ kālakhaျငya”matūbhaဲ kālatacyapā”siု’
chiုkyarokyamaှ kālatacyapā”၌ kaျေ”jū”paြုsakaဲ’siု’ kaṃhūso cetanāsaññyalaññya” kaṅkiုpaြုcupaျို”thoငyarā
khaṇa၌ akaျို”tarā”kiု phaြcyapoyalāaောငya kaျေ”jū”mapaြုbhaဲ nokyanokyakhaṇasiု’ rokyaraှိpāmaှsālaျှငya kaျေ”jū”
paြု၏． thiုkaြောင’ya nānākkhaṇika = akaျို”pe”rākhaṇamaှ asī”asī”phaြcyaso (khaဲpaြာ”so)khaṇa၌ phaြcyaso
cetanāhu khoyachiုrasaññya． (abhi-ṭṭha-3-374． paṭṭhānaaṭṭhakathā．)
dukkhasaccā naှင’ya samudayasaccā
atitya anāgatya paccuppanya casañña’ya (11) maျို”so akhaြငya”arāā”phaြင’ya taññyaneso upādānakkhandhā
ငါ”pā”saññya dukkhaariyasaccāmaññyakaြောငya”kiု athakyathaငya raှငya”laငya”paြkhaဲ’paြီ”phaြcya၏． yakhutacyaphanya samudayasaccā
akaြောငya”kiု thapyamaṃ၍ raှငya”laငya”taငyapaြliုpesaññya．
lakyaraှိpaccuppanyabha0 upādānakkhandhāငါ”pā” dukkhasaccātarā”၏ akaြောငya”raငya”cacyaphaြcyaso samudayasaccā
ara taṇaှာkiု samudayasaccāhu padhānanaññya”ā”phaြင’ya kokyayūkhaဲ’soya yaငya” taṇaှာsaññya bhayyatunya”ka
phaြcyakhaဲ’sañña’ya taṇaှာnaññya”hu chanya”cacyaranya raှိ၏．
rūpārūpaṃ pañcakkhandhā， taṃ hoti dukkhasaccaṃ， taṃ samuṭṭhāpikā purimataṇaှာ samudayasaccaṃ．
(abhi-ṭṭha-2-68-69．)
= rupyanāmyanaှcyapā”saññya khandhāငါ”pā”taññya”． thiုkhandhāငါ”pā”saññya dukkhasaccātaññya”． thiုdukkhasaccākiု phaြcyacetatyaso
raှေ”raှေ”bha0ka paြုcupaျို”thoငyakhaဲ’so taṇaှာsaññya samudayasaccātaññya”． (abhi-ṭṭha-2-68-69．)
akayya၍ samudayasaccāara athakyathaငya raှငya”paြkhaဲ’sañña’yaatiုငya” avijjā taṇaှာ upādānya saṅkhāra kaṃ
tiု’kiု， tacyanaññya” avijjā taṇaှာ upādānyatiု’ khaြံraṃ၍ paြုcupaျို”thoငyathā”apyaso saṅkhāra kaṃtiု’kiု samudaya-
saccāara kokyayūkhaဲ’soya - paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷitoyakiု kiု”kā”၍ phhaင’yachiုthā”toyamūkaြso - atīte
hetavo pañca - caso aṭṭhakathāaphhaင’yamaျာ”naှင’ya aññī - yaငya” samudayasaccātarā”maှာlaññya” atityabha0ka
paြုcupaျို”thoငyakhaဲ’so tarā”paငya phaြcyapesaññya．
sabhā0yuttibhakyaka naှိုငya”khaျိnyaniုငyaranya chakyalakya၍ taငyapaြapyapāsaññya． akaြောငya”samudayasaccātarā”
thaငyaraှာ”raှိnekhaြငya”kaြောင’ya akaျို”dukkhasaccātarā” thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyaphā”lārasaññya phaြcyarā - thiုakaြောငya”tarā”naှင’ya
akaျို”tarā”naှcyamaျို”tiု’thaငya akaြောငya”tarā”ka alaျငyaphaြcyamaññyalo， akaျို”tarā”ka alaျငyaphaြcyamaññyalo
hūso akhaျkyakiု raှေ”ū”chā cañya”cā”pā． akayya၍ asaငyayogīsūtoyakoငya”saññya akaြောငya” samudaya
saccātarā”naှင’ya akaျို” dukkhasaccātarā” naှcyamaျို”tiု’thaငya akaြောငya” samudayasaccātarā”saññya akaျို” dukkha-
saccātarā” thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyarā akaျို”pe”rākhaṇamaှ matūthū”khaြာ” khaဲpaြာ”so asī”asī”so khaṇa၌ phaြcyaso
nānākkhaṇikakammasatti phaြcyakhaြငya”kaြောင’ya akaြောငya” samudayasaccātarā”saññya akaျို” dukkhasaccātarā”kiု
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
64
phaြcyaceniုငyaso nānākkhaṇikakammasattichamya”aငya anephaြင’ya thaငyaraှာ”taññyaraှိnekhaြငya”kaြောင’ya akaျို”dukkhasaccātara
m; thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyapoyalārasaphaြင’ya -- akaြောငya” samudayasaccātarā”kasā alaျငya phaြcyapoyaramaññya， akaျို”
dukkhasaccātarā”ka nokyamaှphaြcyapoyaramaññyahu lakyakhaṃniုငyaငြာ”aṃ’， asaငyasūtoyakoငya”athakya nibbānyasiု’shā”rā
lamya”kaြောငya”poya၌taññyaraှိneso pityachiု’nesañña’ya taṅkhā”pokyakaြီ”tacyakhu phaင’yathhakyashā”paြီhusā maှtyasā”pā．
thiုsiု’ cañya”cā”rā၌ atityaakaြောငya”tarā”ငါ”pā”tiု’thaငya nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayasattiphaြင’ya kaျေ”jū”
paြုpe”niုငyasañña’ya kaṅkiု padhānathā”၍ cañya”cā”pā． thiုkaṃmaှာ nānākkhaṇikakaṃmaျို”phaြcyasaphaြင’ya akaြောငya” samudaya-
saccātarā”ka alaျငyaphaြcya၍ akaျို”dukkhasaccātarā”ka nokyamaှphaြcyasaññyahūso ayūkiု lakyakhaṃniုငyapālaျှငya
ībha0thaငya dukkhasaccātarā”naှင’ya samudayasaccātarā”tiု’thaငya maññyasañña’yatarā”ka alaျငyaca၍phaြcyasaññyakiု thapyamaṃ
cañya”cā”kaြñña’yapā．
ībha0thaငya lūsā”tacyaū”kiု ū”taññya၍ paြောchiုramū amivamya”thaငya”vayya paṭisandhe kalalarekaြññya
taññyacakhiုkya၌ kāyadasakakalāpya bhā0dasakakalāpya hadayadasakakalāpyahūso rupyakalāpya amaျို”
acā”suṃ”maျို” rupyaamaျို”acā” (30)tiု’naှင’ya tihityapuggiုlyalaññya” phaြcya၍ somanassavedanānaှင’ya yaှñya၍ paṭisane
¨nesūphaြcyamū cityacetasikyanāmyatarā” (34)luṃ”raှိmaññya phaြcyapesaññya． yaငya” nāmyatarā” (34)luṃ”tiု’maှာ
aောkyapāatiုငya” phaြcyakaြ၏． ---

2． saññākā” saññākkhandhātaññya”．

ငါ”pā”taññya”． upādānakkhandhātiု’paငyataññya”． yaငya” upādānakkhandhāငါ”pā”tiု’kā” - saṅkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhā
(saṃ-3-369．) hūso dhammacakaြာdesanātoyamaြtya၏ achiုamina’yanaှင’ya aññī dukkhasaccātarā”cutiု’sā
phaြcyakaြsaññya． thiုkaြောင’ya lūsā”tacyaū”athakya ībha0thaငya dukkhasaccātarā”kasā ū”chā ca၍ phaြcyaphā”lāra-
pesaññya．

samudayasaccā hūso akaြောငya”tarā” akaျို”tarā”naှcyamaျို”tiု’thaငya nānākkhaṇikakammasabhoara akaြောငya”

65
koငya”so ñña tacyaññapiုငya” -- paccakkhañāṇya naှင’ya anhayañāṇya akaြောငya”
samudayasaccā mahutyakaြောငya”kiုlaññya”koငya”， atityabha0tacyakhukhuka paြုcupaျို”thoငyakhaဲ’so samudaya-
saccākaြောင’yasā ī bha0thaငya dukkhasaccāphaြcyapoyalārakaြောငya”kiုlaññya”koငya” asaငyasūtoyakoငya”saññya
lhayyakūchāpaငya lakyakhaṃniုငyaphhayyarā raှိpālima’yamaññya．
avijjā taṇaှာ upādānyatiု’ khaြံraṃ၍ paြုcupaျို”thoငyathā”apyaso samudayasaccāsaññya atityabha0ka
phaြcyakhaဲ’laျှငya maññyasañña’ya atityabha0ka phaြcyakhaဲ’pāsanaññya”hu me”ranyaraှိ၏． aphaြmeှာ ---
1． upapajjavedanīyakaṃ，
2． aparāpariyavedanīyakaṃ ---
ī kaṃnaှcyamaျို”tiု’thaငya tacyamaျို”maျို” phaြcyaniုငya၏．
thiုkaṃsaññya akayya၍ upapajjavedanīyakaṃ phaြcyaṃ’， pathamaatityabha0၌ paြုcupaျို”thoငyakhaဲ’so kaṃpaငya
phaြcya၏． thiုkaṃsaññya akayya၍ aparāpariyavedanīyakaṃmaျို” phaြcyaငြာ”aṃ’， thiုkaṃmaှာ lhanyakhaဲ’so dutiyaatityabha0၌soyalaññya”
koငya”， lhanyakhaဲ’so tatiyaatityabha0 casañña’ya bha0tacyakhukhu၌soyalaññya”koငya” paြုcu
paျို”thoငyakhaဲ’so kaṃsālaျှငya phaြcyapesaññya． upapajjavedanīyakaṃpaငya phaြcyakhaျငyaphaြcyapāce， aparāpariyavedanīya-
kaṃmaျို”paငya phaြcyakhaျငyalaññya” phaြcyapāce yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya sammādiṭṭhiñāṇyataññya”hūso paccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya thiု
samudayasaccā amaññyaraso kaṅkiု tacyanaññya” thiု samudayasaccā amaññyaraso kaṅkaြောင’ya īpaccuppanyabha0thaငya
paṭisandhe upādānakkhandhāငါ”pā” acaraှိsañña’ya dukkhasaccātarā” thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyapuṅkiု siaောငya maြငyaaောငyasā raှုramaññya
phaြcyapesaññya． yaငya”siု’ sipāmaှ yaငya”siု’ maြငyapāmaှsālaျှငya āsavotarā”tiု’၏ kunyakhanya”kaြောငya” ariyamagyakiု
raraှိniုငyakaြောငya”kiု upanisasuttanya āsavakkhayasuttanyatiု’thaငya bhurā”raှငyaka hokaြာ”toyamūlaျkya raှိpesaññya．
akayya၍ thiုsamudayasaccāamaññyaraso kaṃtarā”maှာ aparāpariyavedanīyakaṃmaျို” phaြcyaneṃ’， thiု
kaṅkiု paccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya kiုyyatiုငyamaျkyamaှောkya thhaငya”phokyasimaြငyare”athakya thiုkaṅkiု thūthoငyakhaဲ’rā dutiya
atityabha0casañña’ya bha0siု’tiုငyaaောငya yaငya”kaṅkiု sammādiṭṭhiñāṇyahūso paccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyaaောငya raှုra
maññyasā phaြcyasaññya． raှုkhakya akaျyyakiု nibbānagāminipaṭipadākaျmya” tatiyathaဲ paṭiccasamuppādyapiုငya” āhāra
suttanyakiု raှငya”laငya”taငyapaြsañña’yaapiုငya” cāmaျkyanaှာ (45) casaññyatiု’၌ kaြñña’yapā．
akayya၍ atityabha0tacyakhukhuka phaြñña’yakaျင’ya chaññya”pū”khaဲ’so paြုcupaျို”thoငyakhaဲ’so samudayasaccā
amaññyarasañña’ya kaṅkaြောင’ya īpaccuppanyabha0၌ paṭisandhekhandhāငါ”pā”acaraှိso dukkhasaccātarā”cu၏ thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyapoya
lāmaှုkiု asaငyasūtoyakoငya”saññya ādānaggāhīhūso mimi၏ ayūvādakiု lakyamalhaှtyaniုငya machana’yalhaှtya
niုငya၍ chaဲmaြဲchā chupyakiုငyathā”khaြငya”kaြောင’ya lakyamakhaṃniုငyasaññya phaြcyaငြာ”aṃ’， yaငya”siု’ lakyamakhaṃniုငyakhaဲ’soya ---
1． sammāsambodhi aloငya”laျာkaြီ”maျာ”aphiု’ le”saṅkhaျneှင’ya kambhātacyasinya”，
2． paccekabodhi aloငya”laျာkaြီ”maျာ”aphiု’ naှcyasaṅkhaျneှင’ya kambhātacyasinya”，
3． aggasā0kabodhi aloငya”laျာkaြီ”maျာ”aphiု’ tacyasaṅkhaျneှင’ya kambhātacyasinya”，
4． mahāsā0kabodhi aloငya”laျာkaြီ”maျာ”aphiု’ kambhātacyasinya” ---
īkaဲ’siု’so kāla asī”asī”tiု’patyaluṃ” mimitiု’ liုlā”toင’yatanesañña’ya bodhiñāṇyabhakyasiု’
raှေ”raှူsayyachoငyape”nesañña’ya abhinihāra amaññyaraso pāramīapoငya” tarā”koငya”tiု’kiု phaြñña’yakaျင’ya
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
66

chamya”ā”raှိso tarā”tiု’ phaြcyakhaြငya”kaြောင’ya manodhārika jovīthi cityaacañyatiု’sā phaြcyakaြ၏． jocittakkhaṇa
asī”asī”၌ nāmyatarā” (34)luṃ”cī raှိ၏．
kāmā0carassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā (abhi-1-104．)
īsiု’caso desanātoyamaျာ”naှင’ya aññī yaငya”manodhārika jovīthimaှာlaññya” tacyakaြိmyatacyakhāsā
phaြcyakhaဲ’saññya mahutyabhaဲ jovīthipoငya”maျာ”chā phaြcyakhaဲ’saññyasā phaြcyapesaññya． kammavaṭyatarā”cutiု’paငyataññya”． yaငya”
kammavaṭyatarā”tiု’saññyalaññya” atityabha0thaငya phaြcyakhaဲ’kaြso vipākavaṭya amaññyarasañña’ya bhavaငyakhandhāငါ”pā”
acaraှိsañña’ya upādānakkhandhātiု’kiု chaဲmaှီ၍sā achaဲpaြု၍sā phaြcyapoyalākaြraso atityakhandhātiု’၏ acitya
apiုငya”tiု’sā phaြcyakaြ၏．
athakyapā kilesavaṭya kammavaṭya vipākavaṭya phaြcyasañña’ya atityakhandhāငါ”pā”tiု’kiု yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya
raှေ”ū”chā paccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya simya”chaññya”thā”paြီ” phaြcyaramaññya． paccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”yūthā”paြီ” phaြcyaramaññya． tacyaphanya
yaငya” kilesavaṭya kammavaṭyatiု’kaြောင’ya phaြcyapoyalāsañña’ya paṭisandhekhandhāငါ”pā” acaraှိsañña’ya vipākavaṭyatarā”-
tiု’kiုlaññya” paccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”yūthā”paြီ” simya”chaññya”thā”paြီ” phaြcyaramaññya．
yaငya”siု’ ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”yūpaြီ” simya”chaññya”paြီ”soakhāmaှ atityakilesavaṭyakaြောင’ya atitya
kammavaṭyaphaြcyapuṅkiုlaññya”koငya”， yaငya” atityakammavaṭyakaြောင’ya paccuppanyapaṭisandhekhandhāငါ”pā” acaraှိso vipākavaṭya
phaြcyapuṅkiုlaññya”koငya” tacyachaင’yatakya၍ paccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”yūniုငyamaññya simya”chaññya”niုငyamaññya phaြcyapesaññya．
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
70
siု’soya paccuppanyavipākavaṭya၏ akaြောငya”raငya”cacyaphaြcyaso atityakilesavaṭyakhandhā ， atityakammavaṭya
khandhā， yaငya”tiု’၏chaဲmaှီrā atityavipākavaṭyakhandhātiု’kiု luṃ”luṃ”masimya”chaññya”khaဲ’soya luṃ”luṃ”maraှုkhaဲ’soya paccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya
kiုyyatiုငyamaျkyamaှောkya thhaငya”phokya masimamaြငyakhaဲ’soya yaငya”siု’ masimaှုthe tacyapuṅkaြီ”thamya”thā”so yogā-
0carapuggiုlyasaññya atityakilesavaṭyakaြောင’ya atityakammavaṭya phaြcyapuṅkiုlaññya”koငya”， atityakammavaṭyakaြောင’ya
paccuppanyavipākavaṭya phaြcyapuṅkiုlaññya”koငya” paccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya kiုyyatiုငyamaျkyamaှောkya thhaငya”phokyasimaြငyakhhaင’yakiု luṃ”luṃ”
raraှိto’maññyakā” mahutyape． yaငya”siု’ atityaka paြုcupaျို”thoငyakhaဲ’so samudayasaccākaြောင’ya paccuppanyapaṭisandhe
khandhāငါ”pā”acaraှိsañña’ya vipākavaṭya dukkhasaccātarā”၏ thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyapuṅkiု paccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya kiုyyatiုငyamaျkyamaှောkya
thhaငya”phokya masipākalaññya” āsavotarā”tiု’၏ kunyakhanya”kaြောငya” ariyamagyakiု mararaှိniုငyakaြောငya”kiု
bhurā”raှငyakalaññya” hokaြာ”toyamūlaျkyapaငya raှိpesaññya．
tacyaphanya paccuppanyathaငya paြုcupaျို”thoငyalaျkyaraှိkaြso kilesavaṭya kammavaṭya amaññyarakaြsañña’ya avijjā
taṇaှာ upādānya saṅkhāra kaṃ tiု’laññya” raှိkaြ၏， yaငya” kilesavaṭya kammavaṭyatiု’maှာ anāgatyavipākavaṭyatarā”cu၏
akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’sā phaြcyakaြ၏． asaငyasūtoyakoငya”saññya anāgatyabha0vayya rahanya”bha0kiု raññyarhayya
toင’yata၍ kāmā0cara mahākusiုlya saṅkhāra-kaṃtiု’kiု paြုcupaျို”thoငyanesaññya phaြcyaṃ’．
1． rahanya”hu asimaှာ”maှုsabhokā” avijjā，
2． yaငya” rahanya”bha0kiု thayyatātapyamakyamaှုsabhokā” taṇaှာ，
3． yaငya” rahanya”bha0siု’ citya kapyarokya chaဲnemaှုsabhokā” upādānya，
īkā” kilesavaṭya suṃ”pā”taññya”． akayya၍ asaငyasūtoyakoငya”saññyalaññya” tihityaputhujanya
achaင’yathaငyasā taññyaraှိnese”saññya phaြcyaṃ’ - yaငya”kilesavaṭyatiု’maှာ yebhuyaျā”phaြင’ya lobhadiṭṭhiaုpyacutiု’
phaြcyakaြ၏． vamya”maြောkyavamya”sāphaြင’ya chutoငya”panyathhākhaဲ’soya somanassavedanānaှင’ya yaှñyasaphaြင’ya cityacetasikya
aluṃ”(20) raှိmaññya phaြcya၏． nāmyakhandhāle”pā”tiု’paငyataññya”． yaငya”nāmyakhandhātiု’၏ maှီrāvatthurupyatiု’kā” rūpakkhandhātaññya”．
ā”luṃ”poငya”soya khandhāငါ”pā”taññya”．
tacyaphanya kammavaṭya amaññyarasañña’ya saṅkhāra kaṃtiု’maှာlaññya” somanassasahagutya ñāṇasampayutya tihitya
kāmā0carakusiုlyamaျို”phaြcyalaျှငya cityacetasikya (34)luṃ” raှိmaññyaphaြcya၏． nāmyakhandhāle”pā”tiု’paငyataññya”． yaငya”tiု’၏
maှီrā vatthurupyatiု’kā” rūpakkhandhātaññya”． ā”luṃ”poငya”soya khandhāငါ”pā”tiု’paငyataññya”．
idha paripakkattā āyatanānaṃ． (paṭisaṃ-50．) hūso paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷitoyanaှင’ya aññī yaငya”kilesa
vaṭyanaှင’ya kammavaṭyatiု’maှာ indaြreင’yakaျkyasañña’ya akhaျိnyaka ca၍ phaြcyakhhaင’yaraှိkaြso tarā”cutiု’ phaြcyakaြ၏． anāgatya
paṭisandhekaျို”kiု pe”niုငyaso chamya”ā”raှိkaြso yaငya” kilesavaṭya kammavaṭya jocityatiု’maှာ manodhārika
jovīthi cityaacañya athaငya”၌ taññyaraှိkaြso jonāmyatarā”cutiု’sā phaြcyakaြsaññya．
akayya၍ asaငyasūtoyakoငya”saññya asakya (60) arhayyathaငya taññyaraှိnesaññya chiုpāciု’． bha0tacyalaျှောkya၌laññya”
kaြိmyaphanyamaျာ”chā koငya”maှုkusiုlyapaြုkā yaငya” rahanya”bha0kiု chutoငya”panyathhānesaññyalaññya”
chiုpāciု’． yaငya”siု’ phaြcyasoya yaငya” kilesavaṭya kammavaṭyatiု’maှာ asakya (60) siု’ matiုငyamīkalaññya” phaြcyakhaဲ’kaြ၍
asakya (60) ၏ nokyapiုငya”thaငya chakyalakya၍ chutoငya” panyathhānesaññyalaññya” phaြcyakhaဲ’pāmū asakya (60)၏
nokyapiုငya”thaငyalaññya” phaြcyakhhaင’yaraှိso tarā”tiု’sā phaြcyakaြ၏． yaငya”tarā”tiု’maှာlaññya” manodhāra amaññyaraso
bhavaငyakhandhāငါ”pā” acaraှိsañña’ya vipākavaṭyatiု’kiု chaဲmaှီkhhaင’ya raraှိpāmaှsālaျှငya phaြcyaniုငyakhhaင’ya raှိkaြpesaññya．

koငya”so ñña tacyaññapiုငya” -- paccakkhañāṇya naှင’ya anhayañāṇya akaြောငya”
yaငya” kilesavaṭya kammavaṭyatiု’maှာ noငyaanāgatya vipākavaṭya၏ akaြောငya”tarā”phaြcyarā yaငya” kaṃmaှာ
āciṇṇakaṃsoyalaññya” phaြcyaniုငya၏． āsannakaṃsoyalaññya” phaြcyaniုငya၏． akayya၍ asaငyasūtoyakoငya”saññya
jhānalābhīpuggiုlyaphaြcya၍ noငyaanāgatyathaငya rahanya”bha0kiု chumatoငya”bhaဲ baြhmābha0kiုsā liုlā”toင’yatanesaññya
phaြcyaṃ’， siု’mahutya chutoငya”panyathhānesaññya phaြcyaṃ’， asaငyasūtoyakoငya” raraှိthā”so jhānyasaññyalaññya”
sesañña’yatiုငyaaောငya malaျှောkaျkhaဲ’saññya phaြcyaṃ’， anāgatya baြhmābha0 baြhmākhandhā၏ akaြောငya”raငya”
kaṃmaှာ garukakaṃsoyalaññya” phaြcyaniုငya၏．
akayya၍ āciṇṇakaṃ phaြcyaṃ’， yaငya” āciṇṇakaṃmaှာ asakya (60) matiုငyamīka le’kaျkyathā”apyaso
āciṇṇakaṃsoyalaññya” phaြcyaniုငya၏， asakya (60) ၏ nokyapiုငya” masemī akhaျိnyakālaathaငya” paြုcupaျို”thoငyamañña’ya
āciṇṇakaṃsoyalaññya” phaြcyaniုငya၏． rupyanāmyakiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”yūtatya simya”chaññya”tatyaso nāmarūpapariccheda-
ñāṇya， atityaakaြောငya”kaြောင’ya paccuppanyaakaျို”phaြcyapuṃ paccuppanyaakaြောငya”kaြောင’ya anāgatyaakaျို”phaြcyapuṃ casañña’ya
kaြောငya”kaျို” chakyanhayyamaှုsabhokiု simya”chaññya”tatyaso paccayapariggahañāṇya， akaြောငya”tarā”naှင’ya takhaso
yaငya”upādānakkhandhāငါ”pā”tiု’kiု lakkhaṇāyāñyataငyakā raှုphā”suṃ”sapyatatyaso vipassanāñāṇya -- ī
ñāṇyatiု’naှင’ya yaှñyathaဲneso cetanākiု vipassanācetanāhu chiု၏． yaငya” vipassanācetanātaññya”hūso
vipassanākaṃ = āciṇṇakaṃsoyalaññya” phaြcyaniုငya၏．
ettha ca “no ce bhikkhave ceteti no ca pakappeti， atha kho anusetī”ti evaṃ bhaga0tā
dutiyanaye pubbabhāge bha0nibbattaka kusalākusalāyūhanaṃ， pakappanañca vināpi bhavesu diṭṭhādīnavassa
yogino anusayapaccayā vipassanācetanāpi paṭisandhijanakā hoti ...(saṃ-ṭī-2-83．)
cetanāsuttanyakiု kiု”kā”၍ phhaင’yachiုthā”so ī saṃyutyaṭīkāaphhaင’yanaှင’ya aññī vipassanācetanā
= vipassanākaṃtiု’kalaññya” paṭisandhekiု phaြcyaceniုငyaso chamya”ā” raှိpesaññya．
āyatiṃ paṭisandhiyā paccayo hotīti saṅkhārupekkhāsampayuttakammassa balavattā tene0
sugatipaṭisandhiyā dīyamānāya abhinandanasaṅkhāto lobhakileso anāgate kāmā0carasugatipaṭa
dsandhiyā paccayo hoti． yasmā kilesasahāyaṃ kammaṃ vipākaṃ janeti， tasmā kammaṃ janakapaccayo
hoti， kileso upatthambhakapaccayo． (paṭisaṃ-ṭṭha-1-250．)
āyatiṃ paṭisandhiyā paccayo hoti = puthujanyapuggiုlya၏ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇyakiု naှcyasakyaso
cityasaññya noငyaanāgatya၌ paṭisandhe၏ akaြောငya”tarā”phaြcya၏ hu paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷitoya (paṭisaṃ-60．) ၌
hokaြာ”thā”toyamūso cakā”၏adhippāyyamaှာ īsiု’phaြcya၏． --- saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇyanaှင’ya yaှñyathaဲlaျkyaraှိso
vipassanācetanākaṃsaññya ā”koငya”sokaြောင’ya thiု vipassanācetanākaṅkapaငya sugatipaṭisandhekaျို”kiု
pe”latyasoya saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇyakiု naှcyasakyaso abhinandanatarā”hukhoyachiုapyaso lobhakilesāsaññya
noငyaanāgatya၌ kāmā0cara sugati paṭisandhe၏ akaြောငya”tarā” phaြcya၏． saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇyakiု
naှcyasakyatatyaso lobhakilesā apoငya”phoyakiု raraှိso vipassanākaṃsaññya akaျို”vipākyakiု tiုkyariုkya
phaြcyace၏． thiုkaြောင’ya vipassanākaṃsaññya akaျို”kiု tiုkyariုkyaphaြcyacetatyaso janaka akaြောငya”tarā” phaြcya၏．
kilesāka ā”pe”thokyapaṃ’tatyaso upatthambhaka akaြောငya”tarā” phaြcya၏． (paṭisaṃ-ṭṭha-1-250．)
thiုkaြောင’ya yaငya” akaျို”pe”to’mañña’ya āciṇṇakaṃmaှာ indaြmeျာ” raင’yakaျkyasañña’ya akhaျိnyamaှca၍ masemī
capyakaြာ” bha0tacyalaျှောkya၌ ale’akaျkyamaျာ”so kaṃmaျို”phaြcyasaphaြင’ya paccuppanyasuṃ”maျို”tiု’thaငya addhāpaccuppanya amaññyanibbānaga
gminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
72
raso tarā”maျို”phaြcyasaññya． yaငya”āciṇṇakaṅka anāgatyathaငya akaျို”pe”maññyamaှnyalaျှငya yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya
yaငya” kaṅkiု sammādiṭṭhiñāṇyataññya”hūso paccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya siaောငya maြငyaaောငya raှေ”ū”chā simya”chaññya”ramaññya
phaြcyasaññya． indaြreင’yakaျkyasañña’ya akhaျိnyamaှca၍ bha0tacyalaျှောkya maññyasañña’yaakhaျိnya၌machiု phaြcyapoyashā”so kaṃmaျို”
phaြcyasaññyakiုkā” satipaြုpāle．
tacyaphanya sekhānī”kālathaငya kapya၍ paြုcupaျို”thoငyaapyaso āsannakaṅka akaျို”pe”phiု’ranya akhāakhhaင’ya
saင’ya၍ anāgatyapaṭisandhecaraှိso vipākavaṭyakiု phaြcyacemaññyaekanyamaှnyapāka yaငya”kaṅkiုlaññya” sammādiṭṭhiñāṇya
taññya”hūso paccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya kiုyyatyiုငyamaျkyamaှောkya thhaငya”phokyasimaြငyaaောငya kaြို”pamya”ramaññyasā phaြcyasaññya．
siု’soya yaငya”āsannakaṃmaှာ sekhānī”kālathaငyamaှ kapya၍ paြုcupaျို”thoငyaapyaso kaṃmaျို” phaြcyasaphaြင’ya yakhu
lolochayya akaြောငya”tarā” akaျို”tarā”tiု’kiု simya”chaññya”nesañña’ya akhaျိnyakāla၌ phaြcyapoyaneso
paccuppanyachatyachatya kaṃmaျို” mahutyasaññyakiုkā” satipaြုpāle．
tacyaphanya yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya jhānalābhīpuggiုlyaphaြcya၍ mahaggutyakusiုlyakaṃtaññya”hūso garukakaṅka
akaျို”pe”to’maññya maှnyalaျှငyalaññya” yaငya”kaṅkiု sammādiṭṭhi ñāṇyataññya”hūso paccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya kiုyyatyiုငya
maျkyamaှောkya thhaငya”phokyasimaြငyaaောငya simya”chaññya”ramaññya phaြcyapesaññya．
yaငya”siု’ akaျို”pe”mañña’yakaṅkiု simya”chaññya”paြီ”soakhā anāgatyapaṭisandhekhandhāငါ”pā” acaraှိsañña’ya
vipākavaṭyatarā”tiု’kiု sammādiṭṭhi ñāṇyataññya”hūso paccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya kiုyyatiုငya maျkyamaှောkya thhaငya”phokya
simaြငyaaောငya simya”chaññya”ra၏． thiုsiု’ simya”chaññya”paြီ”soakhāmaှ ---
paccuppanyathaငya paြုcupaျို”thoငyaliုkyasañña’ya samudayasaccā amaññyaraso avijjā taṇaှာ upādānyatiု’khaြံraṃlaျkya
paြုcupaျို”thoငyathā”apyaso saṅkhāra kaṅkaြောင’ya anāgatyapaṭisandhekhandhāငါ”pā” vipākavaṭyatarā”taññya”hūso
dukkhasaccātarā”cu၏ thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyapoyapuṅkiု sammādiṭṭhiñāṇyataññya”hūso paccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya kiုyyatiုငyamaျkyamaှောkya
thhaငya”phokya simaြငyaaောငya simya”chaññya”ramaññya phaြcyapesaññya． (simya”chaññya”puṃ akaျyyakiု paṭiccasamuppādyapiုငya”thaငya
kaြñña’yapā．)
thiုsiု’ paccuppanyasamudayasaccākaြောင’ya anāgatyadukkhasaccā phaြcyapuṅkiု paccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya simya”chaññya”၍ ra-
niုငyasaññyahūso achiုkiု asaငyasūtoyakoငya” anephaြင’ya raငyatamamanaှင’ya bhavaငyamakaျ phaြcyanese”pālaျှငya
aောkyapā aṭṭhakathā ṭīkā aphhaင’yatiု’kiု phatyaraှုkaြñña’yapā． ---
ñāṇasamaṅgī puggalo cakkhumā viya cakkhunā rūpāni， ñāṇena vi0ṭe dhamme passati．

lokīpariññā suṃ”pā”
ñātapariññā --- avijjā， saṅkhāra， viññāṇya， nāmya-rupya， saḷāyatana， phassa， vedanā， taṇaှာ， upādānya，
bha0， jāti， jarāmaraṇa caso paṭiccasamuppādya aṅgārapyatiု’၏ lakkhaṇa-rasa-paccupaṭṭhānya-padaṭṭhānya tiု’kiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya
kaြိtyakhaြneiုငya raှုphā”niုငyalaျှငya thiုñāṇyamaှာ nāmarūpaparicchedañāṇyapaငyataññya”． (simya”chaññya”puṅkiု lakkhaṇādicatukkapiုငya”
thaငya kaြñña’yapā．)
tacyaphanya avijjākaြောင’ya saṅkhāraphaြcyapuṃ， saṅkhārakaြောင’ya viññāṇyaphaြcyapuṃ， viññāṇyakaြောင’ya nāmyarupyaphaြcyapuṃ
casañña’ya kaြောငya”-kaျို”-chakyanhayyamaှုsabhokiု kiုyyatiုငyamaျkyamaှောkya ñāṇyaphaြင’ya thhaငya”phokyasimaြငyalaျှငya thiုñāṇyamaှာ
paccayapariggahañāṇyapaငyataññya”．
īnāmarūpaparicchedañāṇyanaှင’ya paccayapariggaha ñāṇyanaှcyamaျို”tiု’saññyakā” vipassanāñāṇya၏ araှုkhaṃāruṃ
phaြcyakaြkunyaso sisaင’yasithiုkyaso saṅkhāratarā”tiု’kiု koငya”chāpiုငya”khaြာ”laျkya sitatyaso ñāṇyamaျာ”
phaြcyasokaြောင’ya ñātapariññāmaññya၏．
tīraṇapariññā --- avijjā， saṅkhāra， viññāṇya， nāmya-rupya acaraှိso paṭiccasamuppādyaaṅgārapyatiု’၏---
ka． phaြcyapaြီ”laျှငya paျkyashā”so aniccaakhaြငya”arākiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyaaောငyakaြñña’ya၍ aniccahulaññya”koငya”，
kha． phaြcyakhaြငya” paျkyakhaြငya” daṇyakhaျkyaphaြင’ya amaြဲmapaြtya aññaှñya”panya” anaှိpyacakyakhaṃratatyasañña’ya dukkhaakhaြငya”arākiု
ñāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyaaောငyakaြñña’ya၍ dukkhahu laññya”koငya”，
ga． mapaျkyacī”bhaဲ akaျိtyaakhaဲ akhiုငyaamā anaှcyasāraā”phaြင’ya taññyanesañña’ya atta mahutyasañña’ya anattaakhaြငya”
arākiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyaaောငyakaြñña’ya၍ anattahulaññya”koငya”， --- īsiု’ aniccahu dukkhahu
anattahu cū”camya”chaငyakhaြငya chuṃ”phaြtyakhaျkyakhaျniုငyaso sammasanañāṇya udayabbayañāṇya，
gha． avijjā taṇaှာ upādānya saṅkhāra kaṃ caso akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’၏ thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyakhaြငya” thaငyaraှာ”raှိkhaြငya”kaြောင’ya
viññāṇya， nāmya-rupya， saḷāyatana， phassa， vedanā， caso akaျို”vipākavaṭyakhandhātiု’၏ thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyapuṅkiု
raှုmaြငyatatyaso paccayato udayadassanañāṇya， avijjā taṇaှာ upādānya saṅkhāra kaṃ caso akaြောငya”
tarā”tiု’၏ arahattamagyakaြောင’ya anuppādanirodha sabhoā”phaြင’ya khaျုpyaငြိmya”၍ shā”khaြငya”kaြောင’ya
viññāṇya， nāmya-rupya， saḷāyatana， phassa， vedanā， caso akaျို”vipākavaṭyakhandhātiု’၏ anuppādanirodha
sabhoā”phaြင’ya akaြhaငya”maဲ’ khaျုpyaငြိmya”maှုkiု raှုmaြငyatatyaso paccayato 0yadassanañāṇya， yaငya”

paṭiccasamuppādya aṅgārapyatiု’၏ phaြcyamaှု nibbattilakkhaṇākiု raှုmaြငyatatyaso khaṇato udayadassanañāṇya，
yaငya” paṭiccasamuppādyaaṅgārapyatiု’၏ paျkyamaှု 0yasabhotaññya”hūso vipariṇāmalakkhaṇākiု raှုmaြငyatatyaso

««maှtyakhaျkya --- ī paccayato udayadassanañāṇya， paccayato 0yadassanañāṇya hūso īñāṇya-
naှcyapā”kā” paccayato udayabbayadassanañāṇyataññya”． khaṇato udayadassanañāṇya， khaṇato 0ya-
dassanañāṇya hūso īñāṇyanaှcyapā”kā” khaṇato udayabbayadassanañāṇyapaငyataññya”．»»
īathakyapā sammasanañāṇya udayabbayañāṇya naှcyapā”saññya tīraṇapariññā maññya၏． paṭiccasamuppādya aṅgā-

paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷitoya၏ ññhaှnyakaြာ”khaျkya
ī paṭiccasamuppādyaaṅgārapyatiု’kiု udayabbayānupassanāñāṇyaphaြင’ya vipassanā raှုphā”suṃ”sapyaranya paṭisambhidāmaga
¾pāḷitoyakaြီ”ka īsiု’ ññhaှnyakaြာ”thā”toyamū၏．
jātā avijjā paccuppannā， tassā nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ udayo， vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ 0yo， anupassanā
ñāṇaṃ ． pa ． jāto bhavo paccuppanno， tassa nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ udayo， vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ 0yo，

1． phaြcyachaဲchaဲ phaြcyaso paramatthadhammasabhā0lakkhaṇā hūso paramattha athaññyakiုyya attabhokiု rachaဲ

akaြောငya”raငya”phaြcyasañña’ya avijjā saṅkhāratiု’ phaြcyakhaဲ’soya yaငya”avijjā saṅkhāratiု’maှာ - avijjā saṅkhārā atīto

yaငya”tarā”tiု’saññya atityaadhhana’yakālavayya upādya-ṭhī-bhaငya ano”phaြင’ya thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyakhaဲ’kaြ၏．yaငya” upādya-
ṭhī-bhaငya hūso khaṇasuṃ”pā”athaငya”၌ taññyaraှိkhiုkyavayya yaငya”tarā”tiု’kiု paccuppannadhammatiု’hū၍paငya khoyachiုra၏．
īsabhotarā”kiု aောkyapā paṭiccasamuppādyaaṅgārapyatiု’၌laññya” naññya”tūpaငya maှtyapā．»»

suttanyanaññya”ara --- viññāṇya， nāmyarupya， saḷāyatana， phassa， vedanātiု’kiု arakokyayūrāvayya
akaြောငya”phaြcyakhiုkya akaျို”phaြcyakhiုkya naှcyabhakyaluṃ”tiု’၌ vipākavaṭyatarā”tiု’kiုsālaျှငya mahāvihāravāsī charā

īaphhaင’yanaှင’ya aññī viññāṇyaara， lāmañña’ya nāmyarupyaara vipākyaviññāṇyanaှင’ya vipākavaṭya nāmyarupyatiု’kiု
kokyayūpā． yaငya” viññāṇya-nāmyarupyatiု’thaငya paṭisandhemaှsaññya cutisiု’tiုငyaaောငya phaြcyathiုkyaso vipākavaṭya
viññāṇya nāmyarupyaā”luṃ”tiု’ pāvaငyakaြ၏． paccuppanyasuṃ”maျို”tiု’thaငya addhāpaccuppanyatarā”tiု’taññya”． īthaငya asaငya
sūtoyakoငya”kiု satipe”liုso akhaျkyatacyarapya raှိne၏． asaငyasūtoyakoငya”saññya naှcyapoငya” (100)
asakyaraှññyamañña’yasū phaြcyaṃ’， yakhulaññya” asakya(60) raှိnesaññya phaြcyaṃ’， asaငyasūtoyakoငya”၏ paṭisandhe
viññāṇya-nāmyarupyatiု’maှာ lhanyakhaဲ’so naှcyapoငya” (60)khana’yaka phaြcyakhaဲ’၍ cuti viññāṇya-nāmyarupyatiု’maှာ noငyalāmañña’ya
naှcyapoငya” (40)khana’ya akhaျိnyasiု’ rokyaraှိpāmaှ phaြcyakhhaင’yaraှိso tarā”tiု’ phaြcyakaြsaññya． paṭisandhemaှsaññya cutisiု’

chiုrasoya īsiု’ phaြcya၏．
1． avijjā， saṅkhāra - (dutiyaatityaadhhana’yakālatarā”cu．)
2． viññāṇya， nāmyarupya， saḷāyatana， phassa， vedanā， taṇaှာ， upādānya， kammabha0 - (pathamaatitya
adhhana’yakālatarā”cu．)
3． jāti， jarāmaraṇa - (paccuppanyaadhhana’yakālatarā”cu．)
īsiု’ casaññyaphaြင’ya sabhopokyapāle． (raှုkhakyaakaျyyakiု paṭiccasamuppādyapiုငya”thaငyalaññya”koငya”，
udayabbayānupassanāñāṇyapiုငya”thaငyalaññya”koငya” kaြñña’yapā． )
īathakyapā udayabbayānupassanāñāṇyamaှာlaññya” tīraṇapariññāpaငya phaြcyapesaññya． paṭiccasamuppādya
aṅgārapyatiု’naှင’ya chakyacapya၍ yakhu re”sā”taငyapaြkhaဲ’so ---
1． nāmarūpaparicchedañāṇya paccayapariggahañāṇya hūso ñātapariññā，
2． sammasanañāṇya udayabbayañāṇyahūso tīraṇapariññā，
ī pariññāñāṇyatiု’saññya paccakkhañāṇyalelo anhayañāṇyalelohu asaငyasūtoyakoငya”saññya
chanya”cacyaliုsaññyaphaြcyaṃ’， aောkyapā saṃyutyapāḷitoya aṭṭhakathā ṭīkākokyanutyakhaျkyatiု’kiု phatyaraှုkaြñña’yapā．
virāgampāhaṃ bhikkhave saupanisaṃ 0dāmi， no anupanisaṃ． kā ca bhikkhave virāgassa upanisā．
“nibbidā”tissa 0canīyaṃ． nibbidampāhaṃ bhikkhave saupanisaṃ 0dāmi， no anupanisaṃ． kā ca bhikkhave nibbidāya
upanisā， “yathābhūtañāṇadassana”ntissa 0canīyaṃ． (saṃ-1-268． upanisasuttanya．)
nibbidāti nibbidāñāṇaṃ． etena bala0vipassanaṃ dasseti． bala0vipassanāti bhayatūpaṭṭhāne ñāṇaṃ
ādīnavānupassane ñāṇaṃ muñcitukamaျtāñāṇaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇanti catunnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ adhi0canaṃ． yathābhūtañāṇadassananti
yathāsabhā0jānanasaṅkhātaṃ dassanaṃ． etena taruṇavipassanaṃ dasseti． taruṇa-
vipassanā hi bala0vipassanāya paccayo hoti． taruṇavipassanāti saṅkhāraparicchede ñāṇaṃ kaṅkhā-
vitaraṇe ñāṇaṃ sammasane ñāṇaṃ maggāmagge ñāṇanti catunnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ adhi0canaṃ． (saṃ-ṭṭha-2-50．)
paccakkhakaraṇatthena ñātapariññā tīraṇapariññā ca gahitā hoti． (saṃ-ṭī-2-65．)
= rahanya”tiု’ ... rāgakaငya”kaြောငya” arahattamagyakiုlaññya” akaြောငya”naှင’yatakha phaြcya၏hu ငါbhurā” hotoyamū၏．
akaြောငya”maraှိbhaဲ phaြcya၏hu ငါbhurā” hotoyamamū． rahanya”tiု’ ...rāgakaငya”kaြောငya” arahatta
magya၏ akaြောငya”kā” abhayyanaññya”． saṅkhāratiု’၌ ငြီ”ငhe’maှု nibbidāñāṇyataññya”． rahanya”tiု’ ...saṅkhāratiု’၌
ငြီ”ငhe’maှု nibbidāñāṇyakiုlaññya” akaြောငya”naှင’yatakhaphaြcya၏hu ငါbhurā” hotoyamū၏． akaြောငya”maraှိbhaဲ phaြcya၏hu
ငါbhurā” hotoyamamū． rahanya”tiု’ ...saṅkhāratiု’၌ ငြီ”ငhe’maှု nibbidāñāṇya၏ akaြောငya”kā” abhayyanaññya”．
saṅkhāratiု’၏ sabhā0kiု hutyatiုငya”maှnyachā simaြငyatatyaso yathābhūtañāṇadassana ñāṇyaamaြငyataññya”．
(saṃ-1-268． upanisasuttanya．)
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
84
nibbidāñāṇya --- bhayatūpaṭṭhānañāṇya ādīnavānupassanāñāṇya muñcitukamaျtāñāṇya saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇyaha
lso īle”maျို”so ñāṇyatiု’kiု ā”koငya”so bala0vipassanāhu khoyachiု၏． yaငya” bala0-
vipassanāñāṇyakiုpaငya nibbidāñāṇyahuchiုsaññya． yaငya”nibbidāñāṇyasaññya arahattamagyakiု rakhaြငya”၏akaြောငya”raငya”paငya
phaြcyasaññya．
yathābhūtañāṇadassana --- hutyamaှnyasañña’ya atiုငya” saṅkhāratiု’၏ sabhā0kiု sitatya maြငyatatyaso
ñāṇyasaññya yathābhūtañāṇadassana maññya၏． taruṇavipassanā hūso nuso vipassanāñāṇyataññya”．
(1) saṅkhāraparicchedañāṇyahūso nāmarūpaparicchedañāṇya， (2) kaṅkhāvitaraṇañāṇyahūso paccayapariggahañāṇya，
(3) sammasanañāṇya， (4) maggāmaggañāṇyahūso udayabbayānupassanāñāṇya --- ī ñāṇyale”maျို”saññya taruṇa-
vipassanā = nunayyaso vipassanā maññya၏． yaငya” taruṇavipassanāsaññya bala0vipassanā၏ akaြောငya”raငya”paငya
phaြcyasaññya． (saṃ-ṭṭha-2-50．)
yathābhūtañāṇadassana --- thaငya nāmarūpaparicchedañāṇya paccayapariggahañāṇya hūso ñātapariññā，
sammasanañāṇya udayabbayānupassanāñāṇyahūso tīraṇapariññātiု’kiု yū၍ aṭṭhakathāka phhaင’yachiုthā”၏．
dukkhasaccā samudayasaccāhūsañña’ya saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏ sabhā0kiု paccakkhaā”phaြင’ya maျkyamaှောkyapaြုlaျkya sitatyaso
anakyasabhokaြောင’ya ñātapariññā tīraṇapariññā naှcyapā”kiု yathābhūtañāṇadassana arathaငya yū၍
phhaင’yachiုthā”pesaññya． (saṃ-ṭī-2-65．)
ī athakyapā pāḷitoya aṭṭhakathā ṭīkātiု’naှင’ya aññī ---
1． paṭiccasamuppādya aṅgārapyatiု’၏ sabhā0lakkhaṇāmaှnyakiု piုငya”khaြာ”yūtatyaso nāmarūpaparicchedañāṇya，
2． yaငya”paṭiccasamuppādya aṅgārapyatiု’၏ akaြောငya”naှင’ya akaျို” chakyacapyalaျkya athapyathapyaphaြcyapuṃhūso kaြောငya”-
kaျို”-chakyanhayyamaှုsabhokiု piုငya”khaြာ”yūtatyaso paccayapariggahañāṇya，
3． yaငya” paṭiccasamuppādya aṅgārapyatiု’၏ (1) paccayato udaya0ya， (2) khaṇato udaya0ya - hūso
naှcyamaျို”soakhaြငya”arāā”phaြင’ya phaြcyamaှုpaျkyamaှု udaya0yakiုlaññya”koငya”， yaငya”tiု’၏ aniccasabhā0maှnya
dukkhasabhā0maှnya anattasabhā0maှnyakiုlaññya”koငya” raှုmaြငyatatyaso sammasanañāṇya udayabbayā-
nupassanāñāṇya ---
īñāṇyatiု’kā” paccakkhañāṇyatiု’paငya phaြcyakaြsaññyahu maှtyasā”pā．
yaငya”siု’ phaြcyalaျှငya yaငya”paṭiccasamuppādya aṅgārapyatiု’kiု anhayañāṇyaphaြင’ya maraှုkoငya”to’paြီlohu me”ranya
raှိ၏． aphaြmeှာ aောkyapāatiုငya” phaြcya၏．
nayadassana0sena vā evaṃ vuttaṃ． paṭhamauှိ paccuppannadhammānaṃ udayabbayaṃ dishā atha atītānāgate nayaṃ
neti． (mahāṭī-2-423．)
tacyanaññya” --- nayadassanaā”phaြင’ya īsiု’ chiုsataññya”． raှေ”ū”chā paccuppannadhammatiု’၏ udayabbayakiု
paccakkhaphaြင’yapaြီ”၍ thiုnoငyamaှ atityaanāgatyatiု’၌ ၎ငya”naññya”hu naññya”kiုchoငyasaññya phaြcyabhisoya．
(paြññya-visuddhimagyanissaya-5-165．)
satipaြုpā --- ī udayabbayañāṇyapiုငya”၌ chiုliုso paccuppannadhammakiုlaññya”koငya”， yaငya” paccuppannadhammatiု’၏
udayabbayakiု paccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyapaြီ”pāmaှ atityaanāgatyatiု’၌ naññya”kiုchoငya၍ ၎ငya”naññya”hu raှုrasaññyakiု85
koငya”so ñña tacyaññapiုငya” -- paccakkhañāṇya naှင’ya anhayañāṇya akaြောငya”
laññya”koငya” satipaြုpāle．
paṭiccasamuppādyaaṅgārapyatiု’naှင’ya chakyacapyalaျkyaraှိso ñātapariññānaှင’ya tīraṇapariññātiု’kiု taငyapaြpaြီ”nokya
yakhutacyaphanya pahānapariññāakaြောငya”kiု chakyalakya၍ taငyapaြapyapāsaññya．
pahānapariññā --- yaငya” paṭiccasamuppādyaaṅgārapyatiု’၏ apaျkyasakyasakyakiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyaaောငyakaြñña’ya၍
lakkhaṇāre”suṃ”tanya tacyalaှñña’yacītaငya၍ kaြိtyakhaြneeso bhaṅgañāṇyamaှca၍ athakyapiုငya” vipassanāñāṇyatiု’saññyakā”
payyasaင’ya payyathiုkyaso kilesātiု’kiု tadaṅgaā”phaြင’ya payyachana’yalaျkya sisaင’ya sithiုkyaso
paṭiccasamuppādyaaṅgārapyatiု’၏ anicca-dukkha-anatta akhaြငya”arākiု piုငya”khaြာ”sisokaြောင’ya pahānapariññāhūso
amaññyakiု raraှိkaြpesaññya． īkā” lokīpariññāsuṃ”pā”taññya”．
paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷitoya (paṭisaṃ-55．) ၌ bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇya၏ araှုkhaṃ āruṃcāraငya”tiု’kiု rethakyapaြra
mthaငya avijjāmaှsaññya jarāmaraṇasiု’tiုငyaaောငyaso paṭiccasamuppādyaaṅgārapyatiု’laññya” pāvaငyakaြ၏． thiုkaြောင’ya
yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya yaငya”paṭiccasamuppādyaaṅgārapyatiု’kiုlaññya” bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇyaphaြင’ya vipassanāraှုphā”ra-
maññyasāphaြcyasaññya． yaငya”siု’ bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇyaphaြင’ya vipassanāraှုrāvayya bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇyaphaြင’ya raှုliုkyaniုငyaso
avijjāmaှsaññya jarāmaraṇasiု’ tiုငyaaောငyaso paṭiccasamuppādyaaṅgārapyatiု’kā” sampatidiṭṭha saṅkhāratarā”tiု’taññya”．
bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇyaphaြင’ya maraှုliုkyaniုငyaso mamaြငyaliုkyaniုငyaso avijjā． pa ． jarāmaraṇatiု’kā” sampatiadiṭṭha
saṅkhāratarā”tiု’taññya”． yaငya” sampatiadiṭṭha saṅkhāratarā”tiု’kiု - adiṭṭhampi atītānāgataṃ - (mahāṭī-2-
442．) casaññyaphaြင’ya phhaင’yachiုthā”pesaññya． yaငya” atitya anāgatyaphaြcyasañña’ya sampatiadiṭṭha saṅkhāratarā”tiု’kiု
anhayañāṇyaphaြင’ya vipassanāraှုranya aောkyapāatiုငya” ññhaှnyakaြာ”thā”toyamū၏．
atha vā so evaṃ viratto yathādiṭṭhaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ， tathā adiṭṭhampi anhayañāṇa0sena nirodheti，
no samudeti． nirodhato0 manasikaroti． nirodhamevassa passati， no samudayanti attho．
(visuddhi-2-279．)
evaṃ virattoti evaṃ bhaṅgānupassanānusārena viratto． yathā diṭṭhaṃ sampati upaṭṭhitaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ
nirodheti nirodhaṃ manasikaroti， adiṭṭhampi atītānāgataṃ anhayañāṇa0sena yathā idaṃ etarahi，
evaṃ itarepīti anuminanto nirodheti manasikatassāpi nirodhaṃ karoti． no samudetīti etthāpi
ese0 nayo， no samudayaṃ manasikarotīti attho． (mahāṭī-2-442．)
ñātañca ñāṇañca ubhopi vipassati． (visuddhi-2-278．)
ī paṭiccasamuppādyapiုငya”thaငya avijjāmaှsaññya jarāmaraṇasiု’ tiုငyaaောငyaso tarā”tiု’kā” bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇyaphaြင’ya
vipassanāraှုphā”suṃ”sapyaramañña’ya tarā”tiု’ phaြcyakhaြငya”kaြောင’ya ñātamaññya၏． yaငya” ñātatarā”tiု’kiု
vipassanāraှုneso bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇyakā” ñāṇamaññya၏． ī bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇyapiုငya”thaငya yogā0cara
puggiုlyasaññya yaငya” ñātatarā”tiု’၏ apaျkyakiု āruṃyū၍laññya” lakkhaṇāyāñyataငyakā vipassanā raှုra၏．
yaငya” vipassanāñāṇyahūso ñāṇatarā”၏ apaျkyakiုlaññya” āruṃyū၍ tacyaphanyapaြnya၍ vipassanā raှုra၏．
paṭivipassanātaññya”． ñāta ñāṇa naှcyamaျို”luṃ”kiုpaငya vipassanāraှုraso ñāṇyamaျို” phaြcya၏． yaငya” ñāta ñāṇa
tarā”naှcyamaျို”luṃ”kiုpaငya saṅkhāratarā”hu khoyachiု၏．
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
86
ī bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇyasiု’ acañyalaျှောkyasaphaြင’ya saṅkhāratarā”tiု’ apoya၌ (khapyakaြာkaြာ khhāthā”-
niုငyasoā”phaြင’ya ) tapyamakyakhaြငya” rāgakaငya”so thiု yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya maျkyamaှောkyasimaြငyaapyaso
ñāṇya0၌ raှေ”raှုthaငyalāso ---
1． avijjāmaှsaññya jarāmaraṇasiု’ tiုငyaaောငyaso ñātatarā”，
2． yaငya” ñātatarā”၏ apaျkyakiု raှုneso vipassanāñāṇyahūso ñāṇatarā” ---
ī ñāta - ñāṇahūso saṅkhāratarā”apoငya”kiု khaျုpyakhaြငya”kiုnaှluṃ”shaငya”sakaဲ’siု’ thiု’atū vipassanāñāṇyaphaြင’ya
mathe’mamaြငyaapyase”so maraှုrase”so vipassanāñāṇya0၌ mathaငyalāse”so sampati adiṭṭha
= sampati anupaṭṭhita phaြcyasañña’ya (avijjāmaှsaññya jarāmaraṇasiု’tiုငyaaောငyaso) saṅkhāratarā”apoငya”kiုlaññya”
alaျောyacha၍ yūtatyaso anhayañāṇya၏ achamya”phaြင’ya， yakhumaျkyamaှောkya lakyaငငya” paccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya mamaြငyaapyase”
so maraှုrase”so atitya anāgatya saṅkhāratarā”saññyalaññya” īsiု’ khaျုpyakhaြငya”sabho raှိsaññyasātaññya”
--- hu īsiု’ naှိုငya”raှñña’yalaျkya khaျုpyakhaြငya” nirodhasabhokiု naှluṃ”shaငya”၏， phaြcyakhaြငya” samudayakiု
naှluṃ”mashaငya”． khaျုpyasoā”phaြင’yasālaျှငya = akhaျုpyakiုsālaျှငyanaှluṃ”shaငya”၏， thiုsaṅkhāratarā”apoငya”၏ khaျုpyakhaြငya”
nirodhakiုsālaျှငya raှု၏， phaြcyakhaြငya” samudayakiု maraှု． (visuddhi-2-279． mahāṭī-2-442．)
lokuttarā pari ññā suṃ”pā”
ī lokīpariññāpaññāhūso vipassanāñāṇyatiု’၏ achuṃ”၌ ariyamagyatarā”saññya asaṅkhatadhātya
aငြိmya”dhātya nibbānyatarā”toyamaြtyakiု āruṃyū၍ thaငyaraှာ” phaြcyapoyalā၏． yaငya” ariyamagyatarā”saññya
payyasaင’ya payyathyiုkyaso chiုငyarā chiုငyarā kilesātiု’kiု samucchedaā”phaြင’ya akaြhaငya”maဲ’ payyasatyalaျkya
sisaင’yasithiုkyaso asaṅkhatadhātya aငြိmya”dhātya nibbānyatarā”toyamaြtyakiု thhaငya”phokyasi၏． thiုkaြောင’ya
ariyamagyatarā”saññya mukhaျā”phaြင’ya pahānapariññā hūso amaññyakiု raraှိpesaññya．
ariyamagyatarā”saññya āruṃmaျkyamaှောkyathhaငya”phokyasimaြငyakhaြငya” = ārammaṇapaṭivedha sabhoā”phaြင’ya
asaṅkhatadhātya aငြိmya”dhātyanibbānyatarā”toyamaြtyakiု maျkyamaှောkyapaြုlaျkya si၏． thiုsiု’ sirā၌ yaငya”
ariyamagyatarā”ka asaṅkhatadhātya aငြိmya”dhātyanibbānyatarā”toyamaြtya၏ ārammaṇapaccayasattiphaြင’ya kaျေ”jū”paြု maှု
akūaññīkiု raraှိsaphaြင’ya saccāle”pā”kiု masiaောငya phuṃ”lhaှmya”thā”sañña’ya mohatarā”kiုlaññya” akaြhaငya”maဲ’
payyasatyaliုkya၏． thiုsiု’ saccāle”pā”kiု masiaောငya phuṃ”lhaှmya”thā”sañña’ya mohakiု payyasatyaniုငyasañña’yaathakya
saccāle”pā”luṃ”kiု sikhaြငya”kiccasaññyalaññya” tacyapātaññya” paြီ”cī”shā”၏． yaငya”siု’ kiccasiddhiā”phaြင’ya saccāle”pā”kiု
simaှုkiု asammohapaṭivedhahu khoyachiုpesaññya． thiုthaငya ariyamagyatarā”saññya ārammaṇapaṭivedhaā”phaြင’ya
nirodhasaccākiု si၏． asammohapaṭivedha ā”phaြင’ya dukkhasaccā samudayasaccā maggasaccātiု’kiု si၏．
thiုsiု’sikhaြငya”kaြောင’ya ariyamagyatarā”saññya dukkhasaccātarā” samudayasaccātarā” amaññyarasañña’ya paṭiccasamuppādya
aṅgārapyatiု’naှင’ya yaငya” aṅgārapyatiု’၏ akhaျငya”khaျငya” kaြောငya”-kaျို”-chakyanhayyamaှု sabhotarā”tiု’kiု sikhaြငya”kiccasaññyalaññya”
kiccasiddhiā”phaြင’ya tacyapātaññya” paြီ”cī”shā”၏． thiုkaြောင’ya ariyamagyatarā”saññya ī akaြောငya”
pariyāyyaā”phaြင’ya ñātapariññā hūso amaññyakiုlaññya” raraှိpesaññya．
tacyaphanya ariyamagyatarā”saññya yaငya” dukkhasaccātarā” samudayasaccātarā”tiု’၏ aniccaakhaျkya
dukkhaakhaျkya anattaakhaျkyatiု’kiု masiaောငya phuṃ”lhaှmya”thā”sañña’ya mohakiုlaññya” akaြhaငya”maဲ’ payyasatyaliုkya၏．
87
koငya”so ñña tacyaññapiုငya” -- paccakkhañāṇya naှင’ya anhayañāṇya akaြောငya”
yaငya”siု’ payyasatyaliုkyasaphaြင’ya dukkhasaccā samudayasaccāamaññyarasañña’ya yaငya” paṭiccasamuppādyaaṅgārapyataññya”hūso
rupya-nāmya-kaြောငya”-kaျို” = saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏ aniccaakhaြငya”arā dukkhaakhaြငya”arā anattaakhaြငya”arātiု’kiု
cū”camya” chaငyakhaြငya chuṃ”phaြtyakhaြငya” lupyaငnya”kiccasaññyalaññya” kiccasiddhiā”phaြင’ya tacyapātaññya” paြီ”cī”paြီ” phaြcyashā”၏．
thiုkaြောင’ya ariyamagyatarā”saññya īakaြောငya”pariyāyyaā”phaြင’ya tīraṇapariññā hūso amaññyakiုlaññya”
raraှိpesaññya． īkā” lokuttarāpariññā suṃ”pā”taññya”．
īsiု’ lokīpariññā suṃ”pā” lokuttarāpariññā suṃ”pā”taññya”hūso attapaccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya akaြောငya”
tarā”naှင’ya akaျို”tarā”tiု’၏ kaြောငya”-kaျို”chakyanhayyamaှု paṭiccasamuppādyasabhotarā”tiု’kiု kiုyyatiုငyamaျkyamaှောkya
thhaငya”phokyasiraှိpāmaှsālaျှငya anubodhasi paṭivedhasihu khoyachiုniုငyapesaññya． thiု anubodhasi paṭivedhasi
taññya”hūso attapaccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya paṭiccasamuppādyasabhotarā”tiု’kiု kiုyyatiုငyamaျkyamaှောkya thhaငya”phokya siraှိ
pāmaှlaññya” apāyyasaṃsarāvaṭyachaငya”raဲdukkhamaှlaññya”koငya”， apāyyamaှkaြhaငya”so saṃsarāvaṭyachaငya”raဲdukkhamaှ
laññya”koငya” kaျောyalhaှာ”lhanyamaြောkyaniုငyamaññya phaြcyapesaññya． thiု anubodhasi paṭivedhasitaññya”hūso atta
paccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya paṭiccasamuppādyasabhotarā”tiု’kiု kiုyyatiုငyamaျkyamaှောkya thhaငya”phokya masipāmūkā” yaငya”siု’
masibhaဲlaျkya saṃsarāvaṭyachaငya”raဲdukkhamaှ kaျောyalhaှာ”lhanyamaြောkyashā”so tacyacuṃtacyayokyaso puggiုlyasattavā
maññyasaññya aိpyamakya၏ athaငya”၌soyamaှlaññya” maraှိkhaဲ’caphū”pe． īkā” athakyapā mahānidānasuttanya kokyanutyakhaျkya၏
chiုliုraငya”taññya”．
yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya paṭiccasamuppādyasabhotarā”tiု’kiု sammādiṭṭhiñāṇyaphaြင’ya siaောငya maြငyaaောငya
raှုrā၌ --- avijjākaြောင’ya saṅkhāraphaြcyapuṃ ， saṅkhārakaြောင’ya viññāṇyaphaြcyapuṃ - casañña’ya saṅkhāraloka၏ phaြcyacañyakiုsā
raှုrasaññya mahutyase”， avijjākhaျုpyakhaြငya”kaြောင’ya saṅkhārakhaျုpyapuṃ， saṅkhārakhaျုpyakhaြငya”kaြောင’ya viññāṇyakhaျုpyapuṃ - īsiု’
casañña’ya saṅkhāraloka၏ khaျုpyacañyakiုlaññya” raှုramaññyasā phaြcyasaññya． thiုsiု’ raှုranya kaccānagottasuttanya caso
thiုthiုsuttanyatiု’၌ bhurā”raှငyakiုyyatoyatiုငyaka ññhaှnyakaြာ”thā”toyamū၏． (saṃ-1-257 - casaññya၌ kaြñña’yapā．)
saṅkhāratiု’၏ phaြcyamaှု udayakiု lokasamudaya - hu laññya”koငya”， saṅkhāratiု’၏ paျkyakhaြငya” 0yakiု
lokanirodhahulaññya”koငya” khoyachiု၏． tacyanaññya” avijjākaြောင’ya saṅkhāraphaြcyapuṃ， saṅkhārakaြောင’ya viññāṇya
phaြcyapuṃ casañña’ya saṅkhāraloka၏ phaြcyacañyakiုlaññya” lokasamudaya hu khoyachiု၏， anulomapaccayākāra
hulaññya” khoyachiု၏． arahattamagyakaြောင’ya avijjācaso akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’၏ akaြhaငya”akaျnyamaraှိ khaျုpya-
ငြိmya”khaြငya” = asesavirāgasabho， noငyatacyaphanyamaphaြcyaso khaျုpyakhaြငya”phaြင’ya khaျုpyaငြိmya”khaြငya” = anuppādanirodha
sabhoā”phaြင’ya khaျုpyaငြိmya”khaြငya”kaြောင’ya saṅkhāracaso akaျို”tarā”tiု’၏ asesavirāga = akaြhaငya”akaျnya
maraှိ khaျုpyaငြိmya”khaြငya”， anuppādanirodha = noငyatacyaphanyamaphaြcyaso khaျုpyakhaြငya”phaြင’ya khaျုpyaငြိmya”khaြငya” - hūsañña’ya
saṅkhāraloka၏ khaျုpyacañyakiုlaññya” lokanirodhahu khoyachiု၏． paṭilomapaccayākāra hulaññya” khoyachiု၏．
yaငya” lokasamudaya， lokanirodhahu khoyachiုsañña’ya saṅkhāratiု’၏ phaြcyamaှု paျkyamaှုnaှင’ya anulomapaccaya
mkāra = anulomapaṭiccasamuppādya， paṭilomapaccayākāra = paṭilomapaṭiccasamuppādya sabhotarā”tiု’kiု
raှုkhaြငya”kaြောင’ya maññyasiု’ akaျို”raှိpāsanaññya”， thiုsiု’ raှုrā၌ charā’apaြောnaှင’yasā alhamya”kaြီ” lhamya”neramaññyalo，
anhayañāṇyasakyasakyamaျှphaြင’yasā maျkyaramya”maှnya”cha၍ raှုramaññyalo hu me”ranya raှိ၏． aphaြkeiု siliုpāka
aောkyapā kaccānagottasuttanya kokyanutyakhaျkyakiု phatyaraှုkaြñña’yapā．
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
88
kaccānagottasuttanya kokyanutyakhaျkya
tacyakhaျိnya bhurā”raှငyasaññya sāvatthipaြññyamhanya၌ sītaငya”suṃ”caṃnetoyamūchaဲ phaြcya၏． thiုakhā araှငyakaccāna
gottasaññya maြtyachābhurā”thaṃsiု’ khaျñya”kapya၍ maြtyachābhurā”kiု raှိkhiု”laျkya tacyakhuso nerā၌ thiုငyapaြီ”soya
maြtyachābhurā”ā” --- “araှငyabhurā” ...maှnyasoamaြငya = sammādiṭṭhi， maှnyasoamaြငya = sammādiṭṭhi hū၍chiုpā၏，
araှငyabhurā” ...abhayyamaျှphaြင’ya maှnyasoamaြငya = sammādiṭṭhi phaြcyapāsanaññya”” --- hu īcakā”kiု laျှောkyathā”၏．
thiုakhā bhurā”raှငyaka kaccānagottasuttanya hu amaññyatapyathā”so tarā”desanātoyakiု hokaြာ”pe”-
toyamū၏． yaငya” suttanyamaှ akhaျို’kiု kokyanutya၍ taငyapaြapyapāsaññya．
dhayanissito khhāyaṃ kaccāna loko yebhuyaျne atthitañce0 natthitañca． lokasamudayaṃ
kho kaccāna yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya passato yā loke natthitā， sā na hoti． lokanirodhaṃ
kho kaccāna yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya passato yā loke atthitā， sā na hoti． upayupādānābhinivesavinibane
¨m khhāyaṃ kaccāna loko yebhuyaျne， tañcāyaṃ upayupādānaṃ cetaso adhiṭṭhānaṃ
abhinivesānusayaṃ na upeti na upādiyati nādhiṭṭhāti “attā me”ti． “dukkhame0 uppajjamānaṃ uppajjati，
dukkhaṃ nirujjhamānaṃ nirujjhatī”ti na kaṅkhati na vicikicchati， aparapaccayā ñāṇamevassa ettha hoti． ettā0tā
kho kaccāna sammādiṭṭhi hoti． (saṃ-1-257-258．)
sammappaññāya passatoti sammāpaññā nāma savipassanā maggapaññā， tāya passantassāti attho．
(saṃ-ṭṭha-2-31．)
apica lokasamudayanti anulomapaccayākāraṃ． lokanirodhanti paṭilomapaccayākāraṃ．
lokanissaye passantassāpi hi paccayānaṃ anucchedena paccayuppannassa anucchedaṃ passato yā natthīti
ucchedadiṭṭhi uppajjeyaျ， sā na hoti． paccayanirodhaṃ passantassāpi paccayanirodhena paccayuppannanirodhaṃ passato
yā atthīti sassatadiṭṭhi uppajjeyaျ， sā na hotīti ayampettha attho． (saṃ-ṭṭha-2-31．)
aparappaccayāti na parappaccayena ， aññassa apattiyāyethā attapaccakkhañāṇamevassa ettha
hotīti． ettā0tā kho kaccāna sammādiṭṭhi hotīti evaṃ sattasaññāya pahīnattā ettakena sammā-
dassanaṃ nāma hotīti missakasammādiṭṭhiṃ āha． (saṃ-ṭṭha-2-32．)
ayampīti na ke0laṃ khaṇato udaya0yanīharaṇanayo ， atha kho paccayato udaya0ya-
nīharaṇanayopi． (saṃ-ṭī-2-37．)
na parappaccayenāti parassa asaddahanena． missakasammādiṭṭhiṃ āhāti nāmarūpaparicchedato paṭṭhāya
sammādiṭṭhiyā vuttattā lokiyalokuttaramissakaṃ sammādiṭṭhiṃ avoca． (saṃ-ṭī-2-38．)
kaccāna ...īsattavāapoငya”saññya maျာ”soā”phaြင’ya (attasaññya amaြဲraှိ၏ huyūso atta)
raှိsaññya၏ aphaြcyakiုlaññya”koငya”， (attasaññya paြtya၏ huyūso atta) maraှိsaññya၏ aphaြcyakiုlaññya”koငya”，
(sassatadiṭṭhi ucchedadiṭṭhihūso) naှcyapā”kiု maှီ၍ ne၏．
kaccāna ...saṅkhāraloka၏ phaြcyakaြောငya”sabhonaှင’ya phaြcyakhaြငya”sabhokiု hutyamaှnyaso atiုငya”
koငya”mhanya maှnyakanyaso vipassanāpaññā magyapaññāphaြင’ya maြငyasosūā” (attasaññya selaျှငyapaြtya၏hu
chaဲyūso) maraှိhūso ayūsaññya maphaြcya．

koငya”so ñña tacyaññapiုငya” -- paccakkhañāṇya naှင’ya anhayañāṇya akaြောငya”
kaccāna ...saṅkhāraloka၏ khaျုpyakaြောငya”sabhonaှင’ya khaျုpyakhaြငya”sabhokiု hutyamaှnyaso atiုငya”
koငya”mhanya maှnyakanyaso vipassanāpaññā magyapaññāphaြင’ya maြငyasosūā” saṅkhāraloka၌ (attasaññya mase
mapaျောkya amaြဲtaññya၏hu chaဲyūso atta) raှိ၏hūso ayūsaññya maphaြcya．

diṭṭhiphaြင’ya kapyarokyamaှု = diṭṭhupaya， paြငya”chāchaဲlamya”maှု = upādānya， nacyamaြုpyacū”vaငyamaှု = abhinivesatiု’saññya ī
sattavāapoငya”kiု maျာ”soā”phaြင’ya naှောငyaphhaဲ’၍ thā”apya၏．
ī ariyāphaြcyatoyamūso ငါbhurā”raှငya၏ tapañña’yasā0kasaññyakā” citya၏ taññyarā nacyamaြုpyacū”vaငyarā
kinya”aောငya”rāphaြcyaso thiုkapyarokyamaှု = upaya， paြငya”chāchaဲlamya”maှု = upādānyakiု “ငါ၏ atta”taññya”hu
makapyarokya machaဲlamya” machokyataññya．
“dukkhame0 uppajjamānaṃ uppajjati， dukkhaṃ nirujjhamānaṃ nirujjhati = phaြcyakhaဲ’soya dukkhasā phaြcya၏， khaျုpyakhaဲ’soya
dukkhasā khaျုpya၏” --- hu yuṃmaှာ”maှု maraှိ， the”tomaှု maraှိ．
aparapaccayā ñāṇamevassa ettha hoti = īarā၌ thiုtapañña’yasā0kaā” sūtacyapā”kiု ā”-
thā”၍ yuṅkaြññyasaññya mahutya， attapaccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya kiုyyatiုငyamaျkyamaှောkya sikhaြငya”saññyasālaျှငya phaြcya၏．
kaccāna ...īmaျှphaြင’ya maှnyasoamaြငya = sammādiṭṭhisaññya phaြcyape၏． (saṃ-1-257-258．)
lokasamudaya - lokanirodha
avijjāphaြcyakhaြငya”kaြောင’ya saṅkhāraphaြcyapuṃ saṅkhāraphaြcyakhaြငya”kaြောင’ya viññāṇyaphaြcyapuṃ hūsañña’ya saṅkhāraloka၏
phaြcyacañya = anulomapaccayākāra = anulomapaṭiccasamuppādya sabhotarā”kiုlaññya” lokasamudayahu
khoyachiု၏． avijjā， saṅkhāra - caso paṭiccasamuppādyaaṅgārapyatiု’၏ nibbattilakkhaṇāhūso phaြcyamaှု upādya
sabhokiုlaññya” lokasamudayahu khoyachiု၏．
arahattamagyakaြောင’ya avijjā၏ (asesavirāgasabho anuppādanirodhasabhoā”phaြင’ya) akaြhaငya”
akaျnyamaraှိ kunyacaငyaaောငya noငyatacyaphanya maphaြcyaso khaျုpyakhaြငya”phaြင’ya khaျုpyaငြိmya”shā”khaြငya”kaြောင’ya saṅkhāra caso
akaျို”tarā”၏ (asesavirāgasabho anuppādanirodhasabhoā”phaြင’ya )akaြhaငya”akaျnyamaraှိ kunyacaငyaaောငya
noငyatacyaphanya maphaြcyaso khaျုpyakhaြငya”phaြင’ya khaျုpyaငြိmya”khaြငya”hūso saṅkhāraloka၏ khaျုpyacañya = paṭilomapaccayākāra
= paṭilomapaṭiccasamuppādyasabhotarā”kiုlaññya” lokanirodhahu khoyachiု၏． avijjā， saṅkhāra caso
paṭiccasamuppādyaaṅgārapyatiု’၏ vipariṇāmalakkhaṇāhūso paျkyakhaြငya” bhaငyakiုlaññya” lokanirodhahu khoyachiု၏．
paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷitoyanaññya”ara chiုramū ----- avijjā， taṇaှာ， upādānya， saṅkhāra， kaṃ caso akaြောငya”
samudayasaccātarā”tiု’၏ thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyakhaြငya” = thaငyaraှာ”raှိnekhaြငya”kaြောင’ya viññāṇya， nāmyarupya， saḷāyatana， phassa，
vedanā hūso akaျို” upādānakkhandhāငါ”pā” dukkhasaccātarā”tiု’၏ thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyamaှု sabhotarā”kiုlaññya”
lokasamudayahu khoyachiု၏． yaငya” upādānakkhandhātiု’၏ (tacyanaññya” - akaြောငya”-akaျို” naှcyarapyaluṃ”tiု’၏)
nibbattilakkhaṇāhūso phaြcyamaှု upādya sabhokiုlaññya” lokasamudayahu khoyachiု၏．
avijjā， taṇaှာ， upādānya， saṅkhāra， kaṃ caso akaြောငya”samudayasaccātarā”tiု’၏ arahattamagyakaြောင’ya
(asesavirāgasabho anuppādanirodhasabhoā”phaြင’ya ) akaြhaငya”akaျnyamaraှိ kunyacaငyaaောငya noငyatacyaphanya
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
90
maphaြcyaso khaျုpyakhaြငya”phaြင’ya khaျုpyaငြိmya”၍shā”khaြငya”kaြောင’ya viññāṇya， nāmyarupya， saḷāyatana， phassa， vedanā hūso
akaျို” upādānakkhandhāငါ”pā” dukkhasaccātarā”tiု’၏ (asesavirāgasabho anuppādanirodhasabhoā”phaြင’ya)
akaြhaငya”akaျnyamaraှိ kunyacaငyaaောငya noငyatacyaphanya maphaြcyaso khaျုpyakhaြငya”phaြင’ya khaျုpyaငြိmya”maှု sabhotarā”kiုlaññya”
lokanirodhahu khoyachiု၏． yaငya” upādānakkhandhātiု’၏ (tacyanaññya” - akaြောငya”-akaျို” naှcyarapyaluṃ”tiု’၏)
vipariṇāmalakkhaṇāhūso khaျုpyakhaြငya” bhaငyakiုlaññya” lokanirodhahu khoyachiု၏．
ī athakyapā saṅkhāraloka၏ phaြcyacañyanaှင’ya phaြcyamaှုhūso lokasamudaya， khaျုpyacañyanaှင’ya khaျုpyamaှုhūso
lokanirodhakiု ariyāphaြcyatoyamūso bhurā”raှငya၏ tapañña’yasā0kasaññya vipassanāsammādiṭṭhiñāṇya
maggasammādiṭṭhiñāṇyatiု’naှင’ya laှmya”raှုliုkyasoakhā ---
dukkhame0 uppajjamānaṃ uppajjati， dukkhaṃ nirujjhamānaṃ nirujjhati = phaြcyakhaဲ’soya dukkhasā phaြcya၏， khaျုpyakhaဲ’soya
dukkhasā khaျုpya၏ --- hu si၏． yuṃmaှာ”maှု maraှိ， the”tomaှု maraှိ．
athakyathaငya raှငya”paြkhaဲ’sañña’yaatiုငya” avijjā taṇaှာ upādānyahūso kilesavaṭyatarā”tiု’maှာlaññya”
upādānakkhandhātiု’sā phaြcyakaြ၏， saṅkhāra - kaṃhūso kammavaṭyatarā”tiု’maှာlaññya” upādānakkhandhātiု’sā phaြcyakaြ၏．
viññāṇya， nāmyarupya， saḷāyatana， phassa， vedanā hūso vipākavaṭyatarā”tiု’maှာlaññya” upādānakkhandhātiု’sā
phaြcyakaြ၏． yaငya” upādānakkhandhātiု’maှာ --- saṅkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhā (dī-2-243． ma-1-82． ma-3-292．
abhi-2-105．) hūso desanātoyamaျာ”naှင’ya aññī phaြcyakhaြငya” paျkyakhaြငya” daṇyakhaျkyaphaြင’ya amaြဲmapaြtya aññaှñya”panya”
anaှိpyacakyakhaṃraso tarā”tiု’sā phaြcyakaြkhaြငya”kaြောင’ya dukkhatarā”tiု’sā phaြcyakaြ၏．
thiုkaြောင’ya yogā0carapuggiုlyaka saṅkhāraloka၏ phaြcyacañyanaှင’ya phaြcyapuṃ， khaျုpyacañyanaှင’ya khaျုpyapuṅkiု vipassanāsama
®mdiṭṭhiñāṇya maggasammādiṭṭhiñāṇyaphaြင’ya raှုliုkyasoakhā “ phaြcyakhaဲ’soya dukkhasāphaြcya၏， khaျုpyakhaဲ’soya dukkhasā
khaျုpya၏” - hu si၏hū၍ hotoyamūkhaြငya” phaြcya၏． yaငya” lokasamudaya， lokanirodha hūsañña’ya dukkha၏
phaြcyacañyaphaြcyamaှု khaျုpyacañyakhaျုpyamaှုkiု sirā၌ paccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya silesalo anhayañāṇyaphaြင’ya silesalohūmū -
aparapaccayā ñāṇamevassa ettha hoti． (saṃ-1-258．)
aparappaccayāti na parappaccayena ， aññassa apattiyāyethā attapaccakkhañāṇamevassa ettha
hotīti． (saṃ-ṭṭha-2-32．)
ī pāḷitoya aṭṭhakathātiု’naှင’ya aññī charā’apaြောnaှင’ya alhamya”kaြီ”lhamya”， achhe”kaြီ”chhe”， athe”kaြီ”
the”， aငေ”kaြီ”ငေ”nerasañña’ya sūmaျာ”၏ pā”capyathaငyasā lamya”chuṃ”nerasañña’ya asimaျို”kā” mahutyape．
ahutyasoyakā” --- “īarā၌ thiုtapañña’yasā0kaā” sūtacyapā”kiု ā”thā”၍ yuṅkaြññyasaññyamahutya，
attapaccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya kiုyyatiုငyamaျkyamaှောkya sikhaြငya”saññyasālaျှငya phaြcya၏．” --- hu bhurā”raှငya hokaြာ”-
thā”toyamūsañña’ya attapaccakkhañāṇyaasipaငya phaြcyapesaññya．
īsuttanya၌ bhurā”raှငyasaññya vipassanāsammādiṭṭhitaññya”hūso lokīsammādiṭṭhi lokuttarāsammādiṭṭhi
taññya”hūso maggasammādiṭṭhi - ī lokī lokuttarā sammādiṭṭhinaှcyamaျို”luṃ”kiုpaငya raññyaññhaှnya”၍ ronaှောkā
hokaြာ”thā”toyamūsaññya．
91
koငya”so ñña tacyaññapiုငya” -- paccakkhañāṇya naှင’ya anhayañāṇya akaြောငya”
nāmarūpaparicchedato paṭṭhāya sammādiṭṭhiyā vuttattā lokiyalokuttaramissakaṃ sammādiṭṭhiṃ avoca．
(saṃ-ṭī-2-38．)
nāmarūpaparicchedañāṇyamaှca၍ sammādiṭṭhiñāṇyakiု bhurā”raှငyasaññya hokaြာ”thā”toyamūapyasaññya၏
aphaြcyakaြောင’ya lokīlokuttarā ropaြhamya”so sammādiṭṭhikiု īsuttanya၌ bhurā”raှငyasaññya hokaြာ”-
toyamūapya၏ hūpe． (saṃ-ṭī-2-38．)
ī sammādiṭṭhimaှာ catusaccasammādiṭṭhipaငya phaြcyasaññya． dukkhasaccākiု siso sammādiṭṭhi， samudayasaccākiု
siso sammādiṭṭhi， nirodhasaccākiု siso sammādiṭṭhi， maggasaccākiု siso sammādiṭṭhipaငyataññya”． yaငya”
sammādiṭṭhiñāṇyakiု attapaccakkhañāṇya-hu ī kaccānagottasuttanya၌ bhurā”raှငyakalaññya” hokaြာ”thā”toyamū၏，
aṭṭhakathākalaññya” phhaင’yachiုthā”toyamū၏． tacyaphanya nāmarūpaparicchedañāṇyamaှca၍ catusaccasammādiṭṭhihūsañña’ya
attapaccakkhañāṇyakiု hokaြာ”thā”toyamūkaြောငya”kiု ṭīkācharātoyakalaññya” thapyachaင’ya၍ phhaင’yachiုthā”-
toyamū၏．
īkaဲ’siု’so bhurā”hopāḷitoyakaြီ”maျာ”naှင’ya aṭṭhakathā ṭīkāaphhaင’yatiု’kiု ū”thipyarhakyapanyachaငyalaျkya
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā - amaññyaraso īkaျmya”၌laññya” ---
1． rūpakkhandhā amaññyarasañña’ya rupyatarā”tiု’kiု paramatyasiု’ chiုkyaaောငya attapaccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya kiုyyatiုငya
maျkyamaှောkya thhaငya”phokyasimaြငyaaောငya raှုphā”puṃapiုငya”kiု rupyakammaṭṭhānya”piုငya”hūso amaññyaphaြင’ya re”sā”
taငyapaြthā”pāsaññya． (pathamathaဲ)
2． nāmakkhandhā amaññyarasañña’ya nāmyatarā”tiု’kiု paramatyasiု’ chiုkyaaောငya attapaccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya kiုyyatiုငya
maျkyamaှောkya thhaငya”phokyasimaြငyaaောငya raှုphā”puṃapiုငya”kiု nāmyakammaṭṭhānya”piုငya”hūso amaññyaphaြင’ya re”sā”
taငyapaြthā”pāsaññya． (dutiyathaဲ)
3． lokasamudayakhoyasañña’ya saṅkhāraloka၏ phaြcyacañyahūso anulomapaccayākāra = anuloma
paṭiccasamuppādya sabhotarā”tiု’kiု paramatyasiု’chiုkyaaောငya attapaccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya kiုyyatiုငyamaျkyamaှောkya
thhaငya”phokyasimaြငyaaောငya raှုphā”puṃapiုငya”kiု paṭiccasamuppādyapiုငya”hūso amaññyaphaြင’ya re”sā” taငyapaြ
thā”pāsaññya． (tatiyathaဲ)
4． yaငya” saṅkhāratarā”tiု’kiု lakkhaṇa rasa paccupaṭṭhānya padaṭṭhānya naññya”ā”phaြင’ya attapaccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya simya”chaññya”
raှုphā”puṅkiု lakkhaṇādicatukkapiုငya”hūso amaññyaphaြင’ya re”sā”taငyapaြthā”pāsaññya． (catutthathaဲ)
5． yaငya” lokasamudaya， lokanirodhahūso saṅkhāraloka၏ phaြcyacañyanaှင’ya phaြcyamaှု， khaျုpyacañyanaှင’ya khaျုpyamaှု
tiု’kiု attapaccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya kiုyyatiုငyamaျkyamaှောkya thhaငya”phokya siaောငya maြငyaaောငya vipassanā raှုphā”puṃ
apiုငya”kiု vipassanāpiုငya” hūso amaññyaphaြင’ya re”sā”taငyapaြthā”pāsaññya． athū”saphaြင’ya udayabbayā-
nupassanāñāṇyapiုငya”thaငya -- samudayadhammānupassīpiုငya”， 0yadhammānupassīpiုငya”， samudaya0yadhammānupassīpiုငya”
hūso amaññyatiု’phaြင’ya re”sā”taငyapaြthā”pāsaññya． (pañcamathaဲ)
6． adiṭṭhaphaြcyaso atitya anāgatya saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၌ anhayañāṇyaphaြင’ya vipassanāraှုphā”puṃ apiုငya”kiု
udayabbayānupassanāpiုငya” bhaṅgānupassanāpiုငya”tiု’thaငya re”sā”taငyapaြthā”pāsaññya． (pañcamathaဲ)
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
92
anhayañāṇyahūsaññya
catusaccasammādiṭṭhiñāṇyatiု’thaငya akaျုံ”vaငyaso dukkhasaccā amaññyaraso upādānakkhandhā ငါ”pā”tiု’kiု
paramatyasiု’chiုkyaaောငya thiု”thhaငya”siso sammādiṭṭhi， samudayasaccākiု thiု”thhaငya”siso = samudayasaccākaြောင’ya
dukkhasaccāphaြcyapuṅkiု thiု”thhaငya”siso sammādiṭṭhi， yaငya” dukkhasaccātarā” samudayasaccātarā”tiု’၏ aniccaakhaျkya
dukkhaakhaျkya anattaakhaျkyatiု’kiု khaṇikanirodhasiု’ chiုkyaaောငya thiု”thhaငya”siso vipassanāsammādiṭṭhi，
samudayasaccātarā”tiု’၏ anuppādanirodhasabhoā”phaြင’ya khaျုpyaငြိmya”khaြငya”kaြောင’ya dukkhasaccātarā”tiု’၏
anuppādanirodha sabhoā”phaြင’ya khaျုpyaငြိmya”puṅkiု thiု”thhaငya”siso vipassanāsammādiṭṭhi， raှုneso vipassanāñāṇyaha
lso lokīmaggasaccātarā”， yaငya” lokīmaggasaccātarā”tiု’၏ aniccaakhaျkya dukkhaakhaျkya anattaakhaျkyatiု’kiု
thiု”thhaငya”siso vipassanāsammādiṭṭhi， asaṅkhatadhātya nibbānadhātya hūso nirodhasaccākiု
ārammaṇapaṭivedha sabhoā”phaြင’ya thiု”thhaငya”siso maggasammādiṭṭhi， dukkhasaccā samudayasaccā maggasaccā tarā”-
tiု’kiု asammohapaṭivedha sabhoā”phaြင’ya thiု”thhaငya”siso maggasammādiṭṭhi --- ī sammādiṭṭhiñāṇyaā”luṃ”kiုpaငya
aparappaccayañāṇa = attapaccakkhañāṇa - hu ī kaccānagottasuttanyathaငya bhurā”raှငyakalaññya” hokaြာ”-
thā”toyamū၏． aṭṭhakathā ṭīkātiု’kalaññya” phhaင’yachiုthā”toyamū၏． yaငya”siု’phaြcyalaျှငya anhayañāṇyasaññya yaငya”
catusaccasammādiṭṭhiñāṇyatiု’thaငya akaျုံ”vaငyalesalo akaျုံ” mavaငyalesalohu me”ranyaraှိ၏． aphaြmeှာ
aောkyapāatiုငya” phaြcya၏． ---
dhamme ñāṇanti ekapaṭivedha0sena catusaccadhamme ñāṇaṃ catusaccabbhantare nirodhasacce dhamme ñāṇañca，
yathāha “tattha katamaṃ dhamme ñāṇaṃ， catūsu maggesu catūsu phalesu ñāṇa”nti．
(abhi-2-341． dī-ṭṭha-3-202．)
anhaye ñāṇanti cattāri saccāni paccakkhato dishā yathā idāni， evaṃ atītepi anāgatepi
ime0 pañcakkhandhā dukkhasaccaṃ， ayame0 taṇaှာ samudayasaccaṃ， ayame0 nirodho nirodhasaccaṃ， ayame0
maggo maggasaccanti evaṃ tassa ñāṇassa anugatiyaṃ ñāṇaṃ． (dī-ṭṭha-3-202．)
anhaye ñāṇanti anuaye ñāṇaṃ， dhammañāṇassa anugamane ñāṇaṃ， paccavekkhaṇañāṇassetaṃ nāmaṃ．
(saṃ-ṭṭha-2-62．)
dhammañāṇya --- ariyamagyañāṇyasaññya nirodhasaccā nibbānya tarā”toyamaြtyakaြီ”kiု āruṃpaြုsoā”phaြင’ya
thhaငya”phokya simaြငyakhaြငya”hūso ārammaṇapaṭivedha sabhoā”phaြင’ya si၏． dukkhasaccā samudayasaccā magga
saccātiု’kiု， yaငya” saccātiု’kiု masiaောငya phuṃ”lhaှmya”thā”sañña’ya mohakiု akaြhaငya”maဲ’payyasatyasoā”phaြင’ya
thiု”thhaငya”sikhaြငya”hūso asammohapaṭivedhasabhoā”phaြင’ya thiု”thhaငya”si၏． ariyaphiုlyañāṇyasaññya nirodha
saccā nibbānyatarā”toyamaြtyakaြီ”kiု āruṃpaြုsoā”phaြင’ya thhaငya”phokyasimaြငyakhaြငya” ārammaṇapaṭivedhasabho
ā”phaြင’ya si၏． īsiု’ siso īsiု’ maြငyaso ariyamagyale”pā”tiု’၌ taññyaraှိso ariyamagyañāṇya， ariya
phiုlya le”pā”tiု’၌ taññyaraှိso ariyaphiုlyañāṇyatiု’kiု dhammañāṇyahu khoyachiု၏．
anhayañāṇya --- anhayañāṇyahūsaññya saccāle”pā”tiု’kiု paccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya kiုyyatiုငya maျkyamaှောkya
thhaငya”phokyasimaြငyapaြီ”၍ - īyakhu paccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyasirā īyakhuakhā၌kaဲ’siု’paငya ---
“alā”tūpaငya atitya၌laññya”koငya”， anāgatya၌laññya”koငya” ī khandhāငါ”pā”tiု’saññyasālaျှငya
dukkhasaccātaññya”， ī taṇaှာsaññyasālaျှငya samudayasaccātaññya”， ī nirodhanibbānyatarā”toyamaြtyasaññyasā
93
koငya”so ñña tacyaññapiုငya” -- paccakkhañāṇya naှင’ya anhayañāṇya akaြောငya”
laျှငya nirodhasaccātaññya”， ī maggaငya (8)pā”saññyasālaျှငya maggasaccātaññya” ” ---
īsiု’laျှငya thiုdhammañāṇya၏ nokyasiု’ acañyaliုkyaso ñāṇyataññya”． (dī-ṭṭha-3-202．)
anhayañāṇyahūsaññya dhammañāṇyaā” laျောyalaျောkyapatyasoā”phaြင’ya sikhaြငya”၌ phaြcyaso ñāṇyataññya”．
dhammañāṇya၏ nokyasiု’ acañyaliုkya၍ sikhaြငya”၌phaြcyaso ñāṇyataññya”． ī anhayañāṇyahūso amaññyasaññya
paccavekkhaṇañāṇya၏ amaññyapaငya phaြcyapesaññya． (saṃ-ṭṭha-2-62．)
thiုkaြောင’ya ariyamagyañāṇya phiုlyañāṇyahūso dhammañāṇya၏ nokyasiု’ acañyaliုkya၍ phaြcyaso pacca
vekkhaṇañāṇyakiုpaငya = chaငyakhaြငyatatyasoñāṇyakiုpaငya anhayañāṇyahukhoyachiုsaññya maှtyapā． lokuttarā
catusaccasammādiṭṭhiñāṇyathaငya paccavekkhaṇāñāṇya hūso yaငya” anhayañāṇya mapāvaငyasaññyakiုkā” satipaြုpā．
īkā” lokuttarā ariyamagyañāṇya phiုlyañāṇya၏ nokyasiု’ acañyaliုkyaso anhayañāṇyataññya”．
vipassanāñāṇya၏ nokyasiု’ acañyaliုkyaso anhayañāṇya
nāmarūpaparicchedato paṭṭhāya sammādiṭṭhiyā vuttattā lokiyalokuttaramissakaṃ sammādiṭṭhiṃ avoca．
(saṃ-ṭī-2-38．)
īathakyapā ṭīkācharātoya၏ raှငya”laငya”phhaင’yachiုkhaျkyanaှင’yaaññī bhurā”raှငyasaññya nāmarūpaparicchedañāṇyamaှ
ca၍ sammādiṭṭhiñāṇyakiု hokaြာ”thā”toyamūsokaြောင’ya lokīcatusaccasammādiṭṭhi amaññyarasañña’ya vipassanāsama
®mdiṭṭhiñāṇya၏ nokyasiု’ acañyaliုkyaso anhayañāṇyalaññya”raှိpesaññya． ariyamagyañāṇya phiုlyañāṇya၏
nokyasiု’ acañyaliုkyaso anhayañāṇyamaှာ chaငyakhaြငyatatyaso paccavekkhaṇañāṇyamaျှsāphaြcyasakaဲ’siု’， lokuttara
m catusaccasammādiṭṭhiñāṇyathaငya akaျုံ”mavaငyasakaဲ’siု’ alā”tūpaငya lokīcatusaccasammādiṭṭhi amaññyarasañña’ya
vipassanāsammādiṭṭhiñāṇya၏ nokyasiု’ acañyaliုkya၍phaြcyaso anhayañāṇyamaှာlaññya” paccavekkhaṇañāṇya tacyamaျို”-
sāphaြcya၏． lokīcatusaccasammādiṭṭhiñāṇyathaငya akaျုံ”mavaငyape． akaြောငya”mū lokīcatusaccasammādiṭṭhiñāṇyakiု
aparappaccayañāṇa hu athakyapā kaccānagottasuttanyathaငya bhurā”raှငyaka hokaြာ”thā”toyamū၍ aṭṭhakathākalaññya”
yaငya” aparappaccayañāṇakiု attapaccakkhañāṇahu phhaင’yachiုthā”toyamūsokaြောင’ya phaြcya၏．
lokīvipassanāakhiုkya၌ saccāle”pā” thaငyaraှာ”puṅkiု ī nibbānagāminipaṭipadākaျmya” - pañcamathaဲ -
vipassanāpiုငya” - udayabbayānupassanāpiုငya”thaငya kaြñña’yapā． alā”tūpaငya vipassanāsammādiṭṭhiñāṇya၏ nokyasiု’
acañyaliုkyaso anhayañāṇyaphaြင’ya atityaanāgatyasaṅkhāratiု’၌ raှုpuṃapiုငya”kiု vipassanāpiုငya” - udayabbayā
nupassanāpiုငya”， bhaṅgānupassanāpiုငya”tiု’thaငya kaြñña’yapā．
lokīcatusaccasammādiṭṭhi
bhurā”raှငyasaññya mahāsatipaṭṭhānasuttanya dhammānupassanāpiုငya” saccapabba - maggasaccāpiုငya”thaငya maggaငyatarā”kiုyya
(8)pā”tiု’kiု vephanyapiုငya”khaြာ”၍ hokaြာ”thā”toyamū၏． yaငya” maggaငya (8)pā”tiု’thaငya sammādiṭṭhikiု īsiု’ (4)maျို”
khhaဲ၍ hokaြာ”thā”toyamū၏． ---
katamā ca bhikkhave sammādiṭṭhi． yaṃ kho bhikkhave dukkhe ñāṇaṃ， dukkhasamudaye ñāṇaṃ， dukkhanirodhe
ñāṇaṃ， dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya ñāṇaṃ． ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave sammādiṭṭhi． (ma-1-88．)
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
94
rahanya”tiု’ ...sammādiṭṭhihūsaññya abhayyanaññya”． rahanya”tiု’ ...
1． dukkhasaccā၌ simaြငyatatyasoñāṇya，
2． dukkhaphaြcyakaြောငya” samudayasaccā၌ simaြငyatatyasoñāṇya，
3． dukkhakhaျုpyarā nirodhasaccā၌ simaြငyatatyasoñāṇya，
4． dukkhakhaျုpyarā nibbānyasiု’ rokyakaြောငya”kaျင’yacañya maggasaccā၌ simaြငyatatyasoñāṇya ---
īle”maျို”so ñāṇyasaññya raှိ၏． rahanya”tiု’ ...yaငya”le”maျို”so ñāṇyakiု sammādiṭṭhihū၍ chiုapya၏．
(ma-1-88．)
raှေ”matheryamaြtyakaြီ”tiု’၏ chhe”nhe”phaဲ
ī satipaṭṭhānyadesanātoya၌ maggasaccāpiုငya”vayya maggaငya (8)pā”tiု’kiု khhaဲkhaြာ” vephanya၍ bhurā”raှငyasaññya
hokaြာ”thā”toyamūkhaဲ’၏． īarāvayya raှေ”raှေ” matheryamaြtyakaြီ”tiု’၏ athaငya”၌ dhammasākacchākhoyasañña’ya
chhe”nhe”phaဲtacyakhu phaြcyakhaဲ’phū”၏． ī mahāsatipaṭṭhānasuttanya၌ lāraှိso maggaငya (8)pā” satipaṭṭhānya kaျင’yacañyatarā”
saññya ---
1． pubbabhāgasatipaṭṭhānamagya = ariyamagya၏ raှေ”aphiု’၌ phaြñña’yakaျင’yaapyaso lokīsatipaṭṭhānamagyalelo，
2． lokīlokuttarā naှcyamaျို”ropaြhamya”၍ hokaြာ”thā”toyamūapyaso missakamagyalelohu ---
chhe”nhe”khaဲ’kaြphū”၏． tipiṭakacūḷanāgamatheryamaြtyaka -- pubbabhāgasatipaṭṭhānamagya = ariyamagyasiု’ machiုkyamī
ariyamagya၏ raှေ”aphiု’၌ phaြñña’yakaျင’yaapyaso lokīsatipaṭṭhānamagya hu chiု၏． tipiṭakacūḷanāgamatherya၏
charāphaြcyatoyamūso tipiṭakacūḷasumamatheryamaြtyakaြီ”ka pubbabhāgasatipaṭṭhānamagya hūso lokīsatipaṭṭha
mnamagyanaှင’ya lokuttarāsatipaṭṭhānamagya naှcyamaျို”tiု’kiု ropaြhamya”၍ hokaြာ”thā”toyamūapyaso missakamagya
hu chiုtoyamū၏． tapañña’yakalaññya” pubbabhāgasatipaṭṭhānamagya phaြcyakaြောငya” taငyapaြlaျှောkyathā”၏． charākalaññya”
missakamagya phaြcyakaြောငya”kiု thapyakāthapyakā mina’yachiုtoyamū၏． charāka thapyakāthapyakā mina’yachiုsoya tapañña’yakalaññya”
matā”maြcyato’bhaဲ chityachityasā netoyamūliုkya၏．
nokyapiုငya”thaငya charāphaြcyatoyamūso cūḷasumamatheryamaြtyakaြီ”saññya - aphaြmeှnyakiု siraှိranya mahāsatipaṭṭha
mnasuttanya pāḷitoyakiု rhatyachiုtoyamūlerā mahāsatipaṭṭhānasuttanyaniguṃ”thaငya bhurā”raှငya၏ vanyakhaṃ
kaြေငြာkhaျkyasiု’ rokyaraှိsoakhā aphaြmeှnyakiု raraှိshā”toyamū၏．
yo hi koci bhikkhave ime cattāro satipaṭṭhāne evaṃ bhāveyaျ satta vassāni ...
(ma-1-90．)
= rahanya”tiု’ ...tacyacuṃtacyayokyaso yogā0cararahanya”toyasaññya īsatipaṭṭhānyatarā” le”pā”
tiု’kiု īsiု’ ငါbhurā”raှငya hokaြာ”thā”toyamūsañña’yaatiုငya” khunacyanaှcyatiု’kālapatyaluṃ” phā”maျာ”ā”thutya
ငြာ”aṃ’ ...(arahattamagyakiုsoyalaññya”koငya” kilesāakaြhaငya” raှိnese”pāka anāgāmimagyakiုsoya
laññya”koငya” raraှိniုငya၏．) ---
ī cāpiုdyasiု’ rokyaraှိshā”soakhā koငya”chā amaှtyararaှိshā”toyamū၏．
lokuttaramaggo uppajjithā satta vassāni tiṭṭhamāno nāma natthi． (ma-ṭṭha-1-235．)
95
koငya”so ñña tacyaññapiုငya” -- paccakkhañāṇya naှင’ya anhayañāṇya akaြောငya”
lokuttarāmagyasaññya phaြcyapaြီ”nokyakhunacyanaှcyatiု’kālapatyaluṃ” taññyanesomaññyasaññya maraှိcakoငya”pe．
(ma-ṭṭha-1-235．)
ငါpaြောchiုapyaso missakamagyakiု ī mahāsatipaṭṭhānasuttanya၌ maraniုငya， cūḷanāgasimaြငyaapyaso
pubbabhāgasatipaṭṭhānamagyakiုsālaျှငya raniုငya၏ --- hu chuṃ”phaြtyakhaျkya khaျtoyamūniုငyalesaññya． (ma-ṭṭha-1-235．)
yaငya”pubbabhāgasatipaṭṭhānamagyathaငya athakyapā sammādiṭṭhiñāṇyale”maျို”laññya” pāvaငyapesaññya． yogā0cara
puggiုlyasaññya ariyamagyasiု’ machiုkyarokyamī raraှိaောငya kaြို”pamya”thā”ramañña’ya sammādiṭṭhiñāṇyale”maျို”tiု’ phaြcyakaြ၏．
1． atitya anāgatya paccuppanya ajjhatta bahiddha oḷārika sukhuma hīna paṇīta dūra santika hūso (11)
maျို”so akhaြငya”arāā”phaြင’ya taññyaneso upādānakkhandhāငါ”pā”saññya dukkhasaccātarā”taññya”． yaငya” dukkhasaccā
tarā”kiု kiုyyatiုငyamaျkyamaှောkyathhaငya”phokya simaြငyatatyaso attapaccakkhañāṇyasaññya dukkhe ñāṇaṃ ara dukkha-
saccā၌ simaြငyatatyaso sammādiṭṭhitaññya”． yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya ariyamagyasiု’machiုkyamī ariyamagya၏ raှေ”aphiု’၌
yaငya”sammādiṭṭhiñāṇyakiုlaññya” raraှိaောငya kaြို”pamya”thā”paြီ” phaြcyara၏． yaငya”siု’ kaြို”pamya”saphaြင’ya dukkhasaccātarā”tiု’kiု
attapaccakkhañāṇya taññya”hūso sammādiṭṭhiñāṇyaphaြင’ya kiုyyatiုငya maျkyamaှောkya thhaငya”phokya simaြငyasoakhā
nibbānyasiု’ shā”rā maggaငyalamya”makaြီ”poyasiု’ cataငyarokyaraှိpaြီ phaြcyapesaññya． yaငya”siု’ thiု”thhaငya”siramañña’ya dukkhasaccā
tarā”cuthaငya atityaupādānakkhandhāငါ”pā” anāgatyaupādānakkhandhāငါ”pā”tiု’laññya” pāvaငyanekaြsaññyakiု satipaြုpā．
2． paccuppanya paṭisandhekhandhāငါ”pā” acaraှိsañña’ya vipākavaṭya upādānakkhandhāငါ”pā”tiု’၏ akaြောငya”raငya”cacya phaြcyakaြso
avijjā taṇaှာ upādānya ū”choငyasañña’ya kilesavaṭya upādānakkhandhā， saṅkhāra-kaṃhūso kammavaṭya upādānakkhandhā
tiု’kā” -- atīte hetavo pañca - caso desanātoyamaျာ”naှင’yaaññī atityaadhhana’yakāla upādānakkhandhā
tiု’sā phaြcyakaြ၏． tacyaphanya paccuppanyathaငya paြုcupaျို”thoငyaliုkyaso kilesavaṭya upādānakkhandhā kammavaṭya upādānaka
©ndhātiု’kaြောင’ya phaြcyapoyalāmañña’ya jāti (jarāmaraṇa) amaññyarasañña’ya upādānakkhandhāငါ”pā”tiု’kā” --- idāni
hetavo pañca， āyatiṃ phalapañcakaṃ --- hūso desanātoyamaျာ”naှင’ya aññī anāgatyaadhhana’yakāla upādānaka
©ndhātiု’sā phaြcyakaြ၏．
atityakilesavaṭya kammavaṭya amaññyarasañña’ya upādānakkhandhātiု’kaြောင’ya paccuppanyavipākavaṭya upādānakkhandhā
ငါ”pā” thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyapuṅkiုlaññya”koငya”， paccuppanyathaငya paြုcupaျို”thoငyaliုkyaso kilesavaṭya kammavaṭya upādānakkhandhātiု’kaြောင’ya
anāgatyavipākavaṭya upādānakkhandhāငါ”pā” thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyapuṅkiုlaññya”koငya” kiုyyatiုငyamaျkyamaှောkya thhaငya”-
phokyasimaြငyaso attapaccakkhañāṇyasaññya dukkhasamudaye ñāṇaṃ - ara dukkhaphaြcyakaြောငya” samudayasaccā၌
simaြငyatatyaso sammādiṭṭhitaññya”． yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya ariyamagyasiု’machiုkyamī ariyamagya၏raှေ”aphiု’၌ ī
sammādiṭṭhiñāṇyaamaြငyakiုlaññya” raraှိaောငya kaြို”pamya”thā”paြီ” phaြcyara၏． pubbabhāgasatipaṭṭhānamagya phaြcyasokaြောင’ya
taññya”．
yaငya”siု’ kaြို”pamya”rā၌ anhayañāṇyaphaြင’ya anumānamaျkyaramya”cha၍ simaြငyaaောငya kaြို”pamya”ramaññyalo，
attapaccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya kiုyyatiုငyamaျkyamaှောkya thhaငya”phokyasimaြငyaaောငya kaြို”pamya”ramaññyalohūmū ---
aparapaccayā ñāṇamevassa ettha hoti． (saṃ-1-258．)
aparappaccayāti na parappaccayena， aññassa apattiyāyethā attapaccakkhañāṇamevassa ettha
hotīti． (saṃ-ṭṭha-2-32．)
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
96
ī pāḷitoyaaṭṭhakathātiု’naှင’ya aññī anhayañāṇyaphaြင’ya anumānamaျkyaramya”cha၍ simaြငyaaောငya kaြို”pamya”
ramaññyalaññya”mahutya． charā’apaြောnaှင’ya lhamya”nerasañña’ya asimaျို”， sūtacyapā”tiု’ā” kiု”cā”yuṅkaြññyasañña’ya
asimaျို”phaြင’ya siaောငya kaြို”pamya”ramaññyalaññya”mahutya． attapaccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya kiုyyatiုငyamaျkyamaှောkya thhaငya”phokya
simaြငyaaောငyasā kaြို”pamya”ramaññya phaြcyapesaññya．
yaငya”siု’ phaြcyalaျှငya paccuppanya paṭisandhekhandhāငါ”pā” acaraှိso paccuppanyavipākavaṭya upādānakkhandhātiု’၏ akaြောငya”
raငya” phaြcyaso atityaadhhana’yakāla၌ akaျုံ”vaငyaso kilesavaṭya upādānakkhandhā kammavaṭya upādānakkhandhātiု’kiု
laññya”koငya”， paccuppanyakilesavaṭya kammavaṭyatiု’kaြောင’ya phaြcyapoyalāmañña’ya jāti (jarāmaraṇa) amaññyarasañña’ya
anāgatyaadhhana’yakāla vipākavaṭyaupādānakkhandhātiု’kiုlaññya”koငya” attapaccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya kiုyyatiုငyamaျkyamaှောkya
thhaငya”phokya simaြငyaaောငya raှုphā”ramaññyasāhu mukhaျpuṃse nāyūmaှtyasā”lerāsaññya．
īmaျှsāmakase” āhārasuttanya (saṃ-1-253．) desanātoyanaññya”ara atityabhakyasiု’ ñāṇyakiု
raှေ”raှုchoငyayū၍laññya” paṭiccasamuppādya kaြောငya”-kaျို”-chakyanhayyamaှုsabhotarā”tiု’kiု simya”chaññya”raှုphā”niုငyasaññyasāphaြcyapesaññya．
(raှုpuṃakaျyyakiု paṭiccasamuppādyapiုငya”thaငya kaြñña’yapā．) (atityasaṃsarātacyalaျှောkya
ā”luṃ”kiု raှုramaññyahu machiုliုpā．)
3． avijjā taṇaှာ upādānya saṅkhāra kaṃ caso akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’ thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyakhaြငya”kaြောင’ya akaျို” vipāka
vaṭya upādānakkhandhātiု’၏ thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyapuṅkiု raှုmaြငyatatyaso attapaccakkhañāṇyakā” paccayato udayadassana
ñāṇyataññya”． yaငya” paccayato udayadassanañāṇyaphaြင’ya upādānakkhandhātiု’kiု tiုkyariုkyaphaြcyacetatyaso janaka
akaြောငya”tarā”kiု thiု”thhaငya”sikhaြငya”kaြောင’ya samudayasaccāsaññya thaငyaraှာ”lā၏． (visuddhi-2-267．)
4． avijjā taṇaှာ upādānya saṅkhāra kaṃ caso akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’၏ arahattamagyakaြောင’ya asesavirāga
sabho anuppādanirodhasabhoā”phaြင’ya akaြhaငya”akaျnyamaraှိ kunyacaငyaaောငya noငyatacyaphanya maphaြcyaso khaျုpyakhaြငya”
phaြင’ya khaျုpyaငြိmya”၍ shā”khaြငya”kaြောင’ya khandhaparinibbānya caṃpaြီ”soakhā anāgatyakhandhātiု’၏ noငyatacyaphanya maphaြcyaso
khaျုpyakhaြငya”phaြင’ya khaျုpyaငြိmya”puṅkiု raှုmaြငyatatyaso attapaccakkhañāṇyakā” - paccayato 0yadassanañāṇyataññya”．
paccayato udayadassanañāṇyanaှင’ya paccayato 0yadassanañāṇya naှcyamaျို”kiု poငya”liုkyasoya paccayato
udayabbayadassanañāṇyataññya”．
īarā၌laññya” udayabbayañāṇyakiု ā”sacyanechaဲphaြcyaso puthujanyaachaင’yathaငyasā raှိnese”so
yogā0carapuggiုlyaaphiု’ arahattamagyakiု ramañña’yaakhaျိnyasaññyalaññya”koငya” khandhaparinibbānya caṃyūramañña’ya akhaျိnyasaññya
laññya”koငya” anāgatyasālaျှငya phaြcya၏． yaငya”anāgatyamaှာ ībha0anāgatyasoyalaññya” phaြcyakhaျငyaphaြcyamaññya，
noငyalāmañña’yabha0tacyakhukhuhūso anāgatyasoyalaññya” phaြcyakhaျငyaphaြcyamaññya． yaငya”anāgatyavayya akaြာငya”tarā”-
tiု’၏ anuppādanirodhasabhoā”phaြင’ya khaျုpyaငြိmya”shā”khaြငya”kaြောင’ya akaျို”khandhātiု’၏ anuppādanirodhasabho
ā”phaြင’ya khaျုpyaငြိmya”puṅkiု yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya attapaccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya kiုyyatiုငyamaျkyamaှောkya thhaငya”phokyasimaြငyaaောငya
kaြို”pamya”ramaññya phaြcyapesaññya． yaငya” anuppādanirodhasabhokā” lokīnirodhasaccātarā”taññya”．
akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’၏ anuppādanirodhasabhoā”phaြင’ya khaျုpyaငြိmya”၍ shā”khaြငya”kaြောင’ya akaြောငya”tarā”
raှိkaြkunyaso akaျို”tarā”tiု’၏ anuppādanirodhasabhoā”phaြင’ya khaျုpyaငြိmya”maှုkiု thiု”thhaငya” simaြငyasokaြောင’ya，
yaငya” paccayato 0yadassanañāṇyakaြောင’ya nirodhasaccātarā”saññya thaငyaraှာ”lā၏． (visuddhi-2-267．)
97
koငya”so ñña tacyaññapiုငya” -- paccakkhañāṇya naှင’ya anhayañāṇya akaြောငya”
akaြောငya” upādānakkhandhā， akaျို” upādānakkhandhātiု’၏ phaြcyamaှု upādyakiု raှုmaြငyatatyaso ñāṇyakā”
khaṇato udayadassanañāṇyataññya”． yaငya” khaṇato udayadassanañāṇyaphaြင’ya upādānakkhandhātiု’၏ phaြcyamaှု jāti-
dukkhakiု thiု”thhaငya”simaြငyakhaြငya”kaြောင’ya dukkhasaccāsaññya thaငyaraှာ”lā၏． ． yaငya”upādānakkhandhātiု’၏ paျkyamaှု bhaငyakiု
raှုmaြငyatatyaso ñāṇyakā” khaṇato 0yadassanañāṇyataññya”． yaငya” khaṇato 0yadassanañāṇyaphaြင’ya upādānaka
©ndhātiု’၏ khaṇamacaဲ tasaဲsaဲ sekaျpeျkyacī”rakhaြငya” maraṇadukkhakiု thiု”thhaငya”၍ simaြငyakhaြငya”kaြောင’ya dukkhasaccā
saññyapaငya thaငyaraှာ”lā၏． (visuddhi-2-267．) dukkhasaccāamaññyaraso upādānakkhandhātiု’၏ dukkhaphaြcyapuṅkiု siso
ñāṇyatiု’paငyataññya”． khaṇato udayadassanañāṇyanaှင’ya khaṇato 0yadassanañāṇya naှcyakhukiု poငya”liုkyasoya
khaṇato udayabbayadassanañāṇyataññya”．
athakyapā paccayato udayabbayadassana， khaṇato udayabbayadassana hūso īnaှcyamaျို”so udaya-
bbayadassanañāṇyaamaြငyakā” vipassanāsammādiṭṭhitaññya”． yaငya” vipassanāsammādiṭṭhisaññya - paccayato udayabbaya，
khaṇato udayabbaya hūso saṅkhāratiု’၏ naှcyamaျို”so udayabbayakiု mamaြငyaaောငya phuṃ”lhaှmya”thā”tatyasañña’ya
sammohatarā”kiု tadaṅgaā”phaြင’ya payyasatyaniုငyasokaြောင’ya lokīmaggasaccātaññya”． yaငya”naှcyamaျို”so
udayabbayadassanañāṇyaamaြငyakaြောင’ya thiုyogā0carapuggiုlya၏ santānya၌ lokīmaggasaccātarā”saññya thaငyaraှာ”
lā၏． (visuddhi-2-268．)
arūpasattakavipassanāraှုnaññya”phaြင’ya - raှေ’cityahu khoyachiုapyaso raှေ” manodhārika vipassanājovīthi
nāmyatarā”cukiု， nokyacityahu khoyachiုapyaso nokyavipassanā manodhārikajovīthi nāmyatarā”cuphaြင’ya
tacyaphanyapaြnya၍ vipassanāraှုniုငyasoakhā၌laññya”koငya”， ñāṇaamaññyaraso vipassanāñāṇya = vipassanā
manodhārikajovīthināmyatarā”cukiု bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇyaphaြင’ya tacyaphanyapaြnya၍ vipassanāraှုniုငyaso akhā၌

sabhotarā”tiု’kiု thiု”thhaငya”simaှု lokīsaccāle”pā”tiု’kiု thiု”thhaငya”simaှုtiု’naှင’ya chakyacapyalaျkya hokaြာ”-

phaြcyaphhayyarāraှိpesaññya． paññāraှိsoyalaññya” satiphaြcyakhaဲ၏．

ñāṇyasaññyaphaြcyapoyalā၏， īñāṇyakiု anhayañāṇyahū၍ chiုapya၏． (abhi-2-341-342．)

te paccavekkhaṇañāṇasaṅkhātaṃ nayaṃ neti． (abhi-ṭṭha-2-398．)
ariyamagyatarā”saññya ārammaṇapaṭivedhasabhoā”phaြင’ya nirodhasaccānibbānyatarā”toyamaြtyakaြီ”kiု
āruṃtiုkyariုkyamaျkyamaှောkyapaြုlaျkya thiု”thhaငya”si၏． kaျnyasaccāsuṃ”pā”tiု’kiု saccāle”pā”kiု masiaောငya
phuṃ”lhaှmya”thā”tatyasañña’ya mohakiု payyasatyasoā”phaြင’ya asammohapaṭivedha sabhoā”phaြင’ya thiု”thhaငya”si၏．
thiုkaြောင’ya ariyamagyañāṇyasaññya āruṃmaျkyamaှောkyapaြုsoā”phaြင’ya nirodhasaccākiု， kiccasiddhiā”phaြင’ya
kaျnyasaccāsuṃ”pā”kiု sisaphaြင’ya saccāle”pā”luṃ”kiု magyañāṇyaka sālaျှငya si၏． ariyaphiုlyañāṇyasaññyakā”
nirodhasaccātacyakhukiုsālaျှငya āruṃmaျkyamaှောkyapaြုkhaြငya” ārammaṇapaṭivedha sabhoā”phaြင’ya si၏． yaငya”kaဲ’siု’
simaှုkiုpaငya raññyarhayyatoyamū၍ ariyamagyañāṇyale”pā” ariyaphiုlyañāṇyale”pā”tiု’၌ taññyasoñāṇyakiု
dhammañāṇyahu chiုsaññya． (abhi-ṭṭha-2-398．)
ī yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññyakā” saccāle”pā”laျှငya kaျkyacā”rā āruṃraှိso yaငya” ariyamagyañāṇyakiု
raraှိ၏． thiုariyamagyañāṇyakaြောင’ya atityaanāgatya၌ naññya”kiုchoငya၍ raှုtatyaso paccavekkhaṇāñāṇyahu
khoyachiုso anhayañāṇyasaññya phaြcyapoyalā၏． yaငya” anhayañāṇyaphaြင’ya atityaanāgatya၌ naññya”kiုchoငya၍
raှု၏． (abhi-ṭṭha-2-398．)

koငya”so ñña tacyaññapiုငya” -- paccakkhañāṇya naှင’ya anhayañāṇya akaြောငya”
ī anhayañāṇyakā” ariyamagyañāṇya phiုlyañāṇyatiု’၏ nokyasiု’ acañyaliုkya၍phaြcyaso paccavekkhaṇañāṇyatacyamaျို”

paccavekkhaṇañāṇyasātaññya”．

yaငya” pariññātiု’kiု chakyalakya၍ raှငya”laငya”taငyapaြpeṃ’． --- īapiုငya”thaငyalaññya” pariññāsaññya lokī pariññā

lokī ñātapariññā
tattha “ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ rūpaṃ， vedayitalakkhaṇā vedanā”ti evaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paccattalakkhaṇasallaka
©ṇa0sena pavattā paññā ñātapariññā nāma． pa ． tattha saṅkhāraparicchedato paṭṭhāya yā0
paccayapariggahā ñātapariññāya bhūmi． (visuddhi-2-241．)
= thiုpariññā suṃ”maျို”tiု’thaငya “phokyapaြnyatatyaso sabholakkhaṇāraှိso tarā”kā” rupyataññya”， khaṃcā”
tatyaso sabholakkhaṇāraှိso tarā”kā” vedanātaññya”．” --- īsiု’casaññyaphaြင’ya thiုthiု khandhāငါ”pā”
paramatthadhātyasā”tiု’၏ asī”asī”so kiုyyapiုငyasabhā0lakkhaṇākiု koငya”chā piုငya”khaြာ” maှtyasā”saññya၏
achamya”phaြင’ya phaြcyapoyalāso rupyanāmyakiု piုငya”khaြာ”yūtatya simya”chaññya”tatyaso nāmarūpaparicchedañāṇyapaññānaှင’ya
atitya anāgatya paccuppanya kālasuṃ”pā”luṃ”၌ akaြောငya”tarā” akaျို”tarā”tiု’kiု piုငya”khaြာ”yūtatya simya”chaññya”-
tatyaso paccayapariggahañāṇyapaññāsaññya ñātapariññā maññyapesaññya． (visuddhi-2-241．)
so “idaṃ nāmarūpaṃ na ahetu na appaccayā nibbattaṃ， sahetu sappaccayā nibbattaṃ． ko panassa
hetu， ko pana paccayo”ti upaparikkhanto “avijjāpaccayā taṇaှာpaccayā kammapaccayā āhārapaccayā
cā”ti tassa paccayaṃ 0vatthapethā “atītepi paccayā ce0 paccayasamuppannadhammā ca， anāgatepi etarahipi
paccayā ce0 paccayasamuppannadhammā ca， tato uddhaṃ satto vā puggalo vā natthi， suddhasaṅkhārapuñjo evā”ti

= upādānakkhandhāငါ”pā” = āyatanatacyachaya’yanaှcyapā” = rupyanāmyatarā”tiု’kiု paramatthadhammasabhā0lakkhaṇāsiု’

“rūpaṃ aniccaṃ， vedanā aniccā”tiādinā nayena tesaṃye0 dhammānaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇaṃ āropethā
