na bhikkhave suta0to ariyasā0kassa evaṃ hoti “ka ð nu kho --- kisma ð sati kiṃ hoti，
kissuppādā kiṃ uppajjati， kismiṃ sati saṅkhārā honti， kismiṃ sati viññāṇaṃ hoti， kismiṃ sati nāmarūpaṃ
hoti， kismiṃ sati saḷāyatanaṃ hoti， kismiṃ sati phasso hoti， kismiṃ sati vedanā hoti，
kismiṃ sati taṇaှာ hoti， kismiṃ sati upādānaṃ hoti， kismiṃ sati bhavo hoti， kismiṃ sati jāti
hoti， kismiṃ sati jarāmaraṇaṃ hotī”ti．
atha kho bhikkhave suta0to ariyasā0kassa aparappaccayā ñāṇamevettha hoti “imasmiṃ
sati idaṃ hoti， imassuppādā idaṃ uppajjati， avijjāya sati saṅkhārā honti， saṅkhāresu sati viññāṇaṃ
hoti， viññāṇe sati nāmarūpaṃ hoti， nāmarūpe sati saḷāyatanaṃ hoti， saḷāyatane sati
phasso hoti， phasse sati vedanā hoti， vedanāya sati taṇaှာ hoti， taṇaှာya sati
upādānaṃ hoti， upādāne sati bhavo hoti， bhave sati jāti hoti， jātiyā sati jarāmaraṇaṃ
hotī”ti． so evaṃ pajānāti “e0mayaṃ loko samudayatī”ti．
na bhikkhave suta0to ariyasā0kassa evaṃ hoti “kiṃ nu kho --- kismiṃ asati kiṃ na
hoti， kissa nirodhā kiṃ nirujjhati， kismiṃ asati saṅkhārā na honti， kismiṃ asati viññāṇaṃ na
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
122
hoti， kismiṃ asati nāmarūpaṃ na hoti， kismiṃ asati saḷāyatanaṃ na hoti， kismiṃ asati
phasso na hoti， kismiṃ asati vedanā na hoti， kismiṃ asati taṇaှာ na hoti． pa ． upādānaṃ ．
bhavo． jāti． kismiṃ asati jarāmaraṇaṃ na hotī”ti．
atha kho bhikkhave suta0to ariyasā0kassa aparappaccayā ñāṇamevettha hoti “imasmiṃ
asati idaṃ nahoti， imassa nirodhā idaṃ nirujjhati， avijjāya asati saṅkhārā na honti， saṅkhāresu
asati viññāṇaṃ na hoti， viññāṇe asati nāmarūpaṃ na hoti， nāmarūpe asati saḷāyatanaṃ na
hoti． pa ． jātiyā asati jarāmaraṇaṃ na hotī”ti． so evaṃ pajānāti “e0mayaṃ loko
nirujjhatī”ti．
yato kho bhikkhave ariyasā0ko evaṃ lokassa samudayañca atthaṅgamañca yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti．
ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave ariyasā0ko diṭṭhisampanno itipi， dassanasampanno itipi， āgato
imaṃ saddhammaṃ itipi， passati imaṃ saddhammaṃ itipi， sekkhena ñāṇena samannāgato itipi， sekkhāya
vijjāya samannāgato itipi， dhammasotaṃ samāpanno itipi， ariyo nibbedhikapañño itipi， amatadhāraṃ
āhacca tiṭṭhati itipīti． (saṃ-1-306-308．)
aparappaccayāti na parappaccayena， aññassa apattiyāyethā attapaccakkhañāṇamevassa ettha
hotīti． (saṃ-ṭṭha-2-32．)
na parappaccayenāti parassa asaddahanena． (saṃ-ṭī-2-38．)

nikāyyaငါ”rapyatiု’thaငya majjhimanikāyya၌ avaငyaapā phaြcyaso uparipaṇṇāsapāḷitoya vibhaṅgavagya thaငya -

bhaddekarattasuttanyakā” sabbaññusammāsambuddha bhurā”raှငya kiုyyatoyatiုငya hokaြာ”thā”toya mūapyaso
sammāsambuddhabhāsitasuttanya phaြcya၏．
dutiyasuttanyakā” asaျှငyaānandākiုyyatoyamaြtya hokaြာ”toyamūapyaso suttanya phaြcya၏．
tatiyasuttanyakā” asaျှငyamahākaccaññya”matheryamaြtya hokaြာ”toyamūapyaso suttanya phaြcya၏．
catutthasuttanyamaှာ asaျှငyalomasakaṅgiyamatheryanaှင’ya chakyacapya၍ phaြcyapoyalāso sammāsambuddhabhāsita
suttanyapaငya phaြcya၏．
pathama - dutiya - catutthasuttanyatiု’thaငya khandhāငါ”pā”naññya”phaြင’ya tatiyasuttanyathaငya āyatana tacyachaya’ya-
naှcyapā”naññya”phaြင’ya bhaddekaratta = koငya”so ñña tacyañña - adhippāyyakiု raှငya”laငya” hokaြာ”thā”toya
mūpesaññya．

naှcyapā”athaငya”၌ taññyaraှိneso akaြောငya”tarā”naှင’yatakhaso khandhāငါ”pā” siု’mahutya āyatana tacyachaya’ya-
naှcyapā”tiု’kiု khaṇapaccuppanyasiု’ chiုkyaaောငya aniccānupassanācaso khunacyamaျို”so anupassanātiု’phaြင’ya ne’ññaña’yatiု’
patyaluṃ” vipassanābhā0nākammaṭṭhānya”kiု cī”phaြnya”neso rahanya”toyakiု koငya”so ñña tacyañña raှိso
rahanya” thiုññakiု koငya”so ñña tacyaññahu hokaြာ”thā”toyamūpesaññya．

asaṃhīraṃ asaṅkuppaṃ， taṃ vidhā manubaြူhaye．

na hi no saṅgaraṃ tena， mahāsenena maccunā．
4． evaṃ vihāriṃ ātāpiṃ， ahorattamatanditaṃ．

atiုငya” adhippāyyaraှငya”laငya”laျkya hokaြာ”thā”toyamūkhaဲ’lesaññya．

viññāṇyatiု’၌ naှcyasakyamaှု nandītarā”kiု phaြcyacelaျှငya atityakiု acañyaliုkyane၏ - hūso liုraငya”
cakā”rapyakiု chaဲchaဲmaြဲmaြဲ maှtyasā”thā”pā． tacyaphanya araှငyamahākaccaññya”matheryamaြtyakalaññya” atityaliုkyapuṅkiု
īsiု’ raှငya”laငya”hokaြာ”thā”toyamūkhaဲ’paြnya၏．

thiုkaဲ’siု’ raှုsaññyaraှိsoya thiု’siု’raှုkhaြငya”phaြင’ya vipassanāñāṇyasaññya tiု”phā”lāsaññyaraှိsoya rāgacaso
chana’yakaျငyabhakya kilesātiု’saññya thiုvipassanāñāṇyakiု paျkyacī”aောငya maphaျkyachī”niုငyato’pe． paññāraှိ
sūtoyakoငya”saññya taṇaှာ-diṭṭhi casañña’ya chana’yakaျငyabhakya kilesātiု’kaြောင’ya mapaျkyacī”niုငyaso thiုvipassanāñāṇyakiု
tiု”phā”aောငya aphanyaphanya athapyathapya phā”maျာ”ā”thutyalerā၏．
īcakā”kā” pariyāyyacakā”maျှsā phaြcya၏． akaြောငya”mū vipassanāñāṇyasaññya chana’yakaျငyabhakya
kilesātiု’kiု tadaṅgaā”phaြင’yasā payyaniုငyasañña’ya chamya”ā”raှိsaphaြင’ya vipassanāñāṇyasaññya tadaṅgaā”phaြင’yasālaျှငya
chana’yakaျငyabhakya kilesātiု’kaြောင’ya mapaျkyacī”niုငyape．
mukhaျā”phaြင’yakā” asaṅkhatadhātyaamaññyarasañña’ya nibbānyatarā”toyamaြtyasaññyasālaျှငya rāgacasañña’ya
chana’yakaျငyabhakya kilesātiု’kaြောင’ya mapaျkyacī”niုငyape． siု’athakya paññāraှိsūtoyakoငya”saññya vipassanāñāṇya
tiု’၏ achuṃ”၌ poyalāso magyañāṇya phiုlyañāṇyatiု’kiု raraှိaောငya vipassanābhā0nākiု phā”maျာ”paြီ”laျှငya
mimiraraှိthā”so phiုlyañāṇyaphaြင’ya asaṅkhatadhātya aငြိmya”dhātya nibbānyakiု aphanyaphanya athapyathapya āruṃpaြုpaြီ”
neniုငyaaောငya phalasamāpatyakiု kaြိmyaphanyamaျာ”chā vaငyacā”nepā． īkā” naṃpātya (2 ) gāthā၏ chiုliုraငya”taññya”．
raraှိlāsañña’ya upadesa
athakyapā gāthānaှcyagāthātiု’kiု khaြုံkaြñña’yapāka - bhurā”raှငyasaññya ---
1． atityakhandhā (5) pā” apoya၌laññya” taṇaှာ-diṭṭhi maphaြcyaranya，
2． anāgatyakhandhā (5) pā” apoya၌laññya” taṇaှာ-diṭṭhi maphaြcyaranya，
3． paccuppanyakhandhā (5) pā” apoya၌laññya” taṇaှာ-diṭṭhi maphaြcyaranya --
ññhaှnyakaြာ”netoyamūkaြောငya” thaငyaraှာ”nepesaññya．
thiုthaငya paccuppanyakhandhā (5) pā”tiု’ apoya၌ taṇaှာ-diṭṭhi maphaြcyare”athakya paccuppanyakhandhā (5) pā”tiု’kiု
aniccānupassanā caso (7) maျို”so anupassanāñāṇyatiု’phaြင’ya aphanyaphanya athapyathapya vipassanāraှုranyakiုpā
pū”thaဲññhaှnyakaြာ”thā”toyamū၏．
yaငya”siု’phaြcyalaျှငya atityakhandhāငါ”pā” apoya၌laññya” taṇaှာ-diṭṭhi maphaြcyaranya， anāgatyakhandhāငါ”pā” apoya၌laññya”
taṇaှာ-diṭṭhi maphaြcyaranya， maññyasiု’paြုkaျင’yaramaññyanaññya”hu me”ranyaraှိ၏ -- aphaြmeှာ aောkyapāatiုငya” phaြcya၏．
144
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷitoya kokyanutyakhaျkya
kathaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ dhammānaṃ saṅkhipithā 0vatthāne paññā sammasane ñāṇaṃ ----
yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṃ vā sukhumaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā
yaṃ dūre santike vā， sabbaṃ rūpaṃ aniccato 0vatthapeti ekaṃ sammasanaṃ． dukkhato 0vatthapeti ekaṃ sammasanaṃ，
anattato 0vatthapeti ekaṃ sammasanaṃ．
yā kāci vedanā． pa ． yā kāci saññā． ye keci saṅkhārā． yaṃ kiñci viññāṇaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ
ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṃ vā sukhumaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā yaṃ dūre santike vā， sabbaṃ viññāṇaṃ
aniccato 0vatthapeti ekaṃ sammasanaṃ． dukkhato 0vatthapeti ekaṃ sammasanaṃ， anattato 0vatthapeti
ekaṃ sammasanaṃ． (paṭisaṃ-51．)
= atitya anāgatya paccuppanyatarā”tiု’kiု akaျñya”khaျုံ”၍ piုငya”khaြာ”chuṃ”phaြtyaniုငyaso paññāsaññya abhayyasiု’laျှငya
sammasanañāṇya maññyasanaññya”．
atitya anāgatya paccuppanya ajjhatta bahiddha oḷārika sukhuma hīna paṇīta dūra santikaphaြcyaso
rupyaā”luṃ”kiု aniccahu piုငya”khaြာ”maှtyasā”khaြငya”saññya tacyakhusosuṃ”sapyachaငyakhaြငyakhaြငya” = sammasana maññya၏． dukkhahu
piုငya”khaြာ”maှtyasā”khaြငya”saññya tacyakhusosuṃ”sapyachaငyakhaြငyakhaြငya” = sammasana maññya၏． anattahu piုငya”khaြာ”maှtyasā”khaြငya”-
saññya tacyakhusosuṃ”sapyachaငyakhaြငyakhaြငya” = sammasana maññya၏．
atitya anāgatya paccuppanya ajjhatta bahiddha oḷārika sukhuma hīna paṇīta dūra santikaphaြcyaso vedanā
． pa ． saññā． saṅkhāra． viññāṇyaā”luṃ”kiု aniccahu piုငya”khaြာ”maှtyasā”khaြငya”saññya tacyakhuso suṃ”sapyachaငyakhaြငyakhaြငya”
= sammasana maññya၏． dukkhahu piုငya”khaြာ”maှtyasā”khaြငya”saññya tacyakhusosuṃ”sapyachaငyakhaြငyakhaြငya” = sammasana maññya၏．
anattahu piုငya”khaြာ”maှtyasā”khaြငya”saññya tacyakhusosuṃ”sapyachaငyakhaြငyakhaြငya” = sammasana maññya၏． (paṭisaṃ-51．)
tasmā esa yaṃ atītaṃ rūpaṃ， taṃ yasmā atīteye0 khīṇaṃ， nayimaṃ bhavaṃ sampattanti aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhena．
yaṃ anāgataṃ rūpaṃ anantarabhave nibbattissati， tampi tatthe0 khīyissati， na tato paraṃ bhavaṃ gamissatīti
aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhena． yaṃ paccuppannaṃ rūpaṃ， tampi idhe0 khīyati， na ito gacchatīti aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhena．
(visuddhi-2-245． paṭisaṃ-ṭṭha-1-229．)
thiုkaြောင’ya īyogā0cararahanya”toyasaññya īsiု’raှု၏． ----
1． akaြငya atityarupyatarā”saññya raှိ၏， thiုatityarupyatarā”saññya atitya၌sālaျှငya kunyachuṃ”paျkyapaြုnya”khaဲ’၏，
īpaccuppanyabha0siု’ machiုkyarokyalā， īsiု’ kunyatatya paျkyatatyaso anakyasabhokaြောင’ya aniccahu raှု၏．
2． akaြငya anāgatyarupyatarā”saññya anāgatyabha0၌ phaြcyapoyalālattaṃ’， thiုanāgatyarupyasaññyalaññya”
thiုanāgatyabha0၌sālaျှငya kunyachuṃ”paျkyapaြုnya”၍ shā”pelattaṃ’， thiုanāgatyabha0maှ nokyathapya akhaြာ”
anāgatyabha0siု’ mashā”rokyapelattaṃ’， īsiု’ kunyatatya paျkyatatyaso anakyasabhokaြောင’ya aniccahu
raှု၏．
3． akaြငya paccuppanyarupyatarā”saññya raှိ၏， thiုpaccuppanyarupyatarā”saññyalaññya” ī paccuppanyabha0၌sālaျှငya kunyachuṃ”
paျkyapaြုnya”၏． īpaccuppanyabha0maှ akhaြာ”tacyapā”so bha0siု’ mashā”pe． īsiု’ kunyatatya paျkyatatyaso anakya
sabhokaြောင’ya aniccahu raှု၏． (visuddhi-2-245． paṭisaṃ-ṭṭha-1-229．)
145
koငya”so ñña tacyaññapiုငya” -- bhaddekarattasuttanyaraှငya”laငya”khaျkya
««maှtyakhaျkya ---- ī rūpakkhandhānaññya”tū vedanā saññā saṅkhāra viññāṇyahūso nāmyakhandhā le”pā”tiု’kiု
laññya”koငya” āyatanatacyachaya’yanaှcyapā” dhātyatacyachaya’yaraှcyapā” paṭiccasamuppādyaaṅgātacyachaya’yanaှcyarapya casaññya
tiု’kiုlaññya”koငya” puṃcaṃtūpaငya chakyalakyahokaြာ”thā”toyamūpesaññya． paṭisaṃ- 51-52 - kaြñña’yapā．»»
evaṃ saṅkhāre anattato passantassa diṭṭhisamugghāṭanaṃ nāma hoti． aniccato passantassa mānasamuga
¢gṭanaṃ nāma hoti． dukkhato passantassa nikantipariyādānaṃ nāma hoti． iti ayaṃ vipassanā
attano attano ṭhāneye0 tiṭṭhatīti． (visuddhi-2-264．)
= īsiု’laျှငya saṅkhāratarā”tiု’kiု anattahu simaြငyasū၏ santānya၌ diṭṭhisamu gghāṭana = diṭṭhikiု payyakhhākhaြငya”
maññyasaññyaphaြcyapoyalā၏． aniccahu simaြငyasū၏ santānya၌ mānasamu gghāṭana = mānakiု payyakhhākhaြငya” maññyasaññya
phaြcyapoyalā၏． dukkhahu simaြငyasū၏ santānya၌ nikantipariyādāna = taṇaှာnikantikiု kunyakhanya”cekhaြငya” maññyasaññya
phaြcyapoyalā၏． īsiု’laျှငya īvipassanāsaññya mimi mimi၏ arāṭhāna၌sālaျှငya taññyanepesaññyahu maှtyasā”pā．
(visuddhi-2-264．)
īthaငya mahāṭīkācharātoya၏ raှငya”laငya”khaျkyakiု liုraငya”kokyanutya၍ taငyapaြapyapāsaññya． (akaျyya
kiု mahāṭīkā dutiyathaဲ - cāmaျkyanaှာ - 415-416-tiု’၌laññya”koငya”， īnibbānagāminipaṭipadākaျmya” pañcamathaဲ
sammasanañāṇyakhanya” - cāmaျkyanaှာ - 152-153-tiု’၌laññya”koငya” kaြñña’yapā．)
anattānupassanāñāṇyaka diṭṭhichaဲkiု payyakhhāniုငyasaññyachiုsoyalaññya” anattānupassanāñāṇya sakyasakya
phaြင’ya payyakhhāniုငyasaññyakā” mahutya， aniccānupassanāñāṇya dukkhānupassanāñāṇyanaှcyamaျို”tiု’ka ā”kaြီ”so
maှီrā upanissayapaccayasattiphaြင’ya kaျေ”jū”paြုpe”pāmaှsālaျှငya chamya”aငyapaြñña’ya0lāso sana’yaraှငya” thakyamaြkya cū”raှ
lāso anattānupassanāñāṇyaka diṭṭhichaဲkiု payyakhhāniုငyapesaññya．
alā”tūpaငya aniccānupassanāñāṇyaka mānachaဲkiု payyakhhāniုငyasaññyachiုsoyalaññya” anattānupassanā
ñāṇya dukkhānupassanāñāṇyanaှcyapā”tiု’ka ā”kaြီ”so maှီrā upanissayapaccayasattiphaြင’ya kaျေ”jū”paြုpe”pāmaှ
sālaျှငya chamya”aငya paြñña’ya0lāso sana’yaraှငya” thakyamaြkya cū”raှlāso aniccānupassanāñāṇyaka mānachaဲkiု
payyakhhāniုငyapesaññya．
aniccasaññā bhāvetabbā asmimānasamugghāṭāya = asmimānakiု payyakhhākhaြငya”ငှာ aniccasaññākiု
phā”maျာ”pāhu bhurā”raှငyahokaြာ”thā”toyamū၏． (mahāṭī-2-416．)
tacyaphanya dukkhānupassanāñāṇyaka taṇaှာchaဲ nikantikiု kunyakhanya”ceniုငyasaññyachiုsoyalaññya” aniccānupassanā
ñāṇya anattānupassanāñāṇyanaှcyamaျို”tiု’ka ā”kaြီ”so maှီrā upanissaya paccayasattiphaြင’ya kaျေ”jū”paြုpe”pāmaှ
sālaျှငya chamya”aငya paြñña’ya0lāso sana’yaraှငya” thakyamaြkya cū”raှlāso dukkhānupassanāñāṇyaka taṇaှာchaဲkiု
payyakhhāniုငyapesaññya．
thiုkaြောင’ya aniccānupassanā sakyasakyaphaြင’ya dukkhānupassanā sakyasakyaphaြင’ya anattānupassanā
sakyasakyaphaြင’ya taṇaှာchaဲ mānachaဲ diṭṭhichaဲ tiု’kiု maphaြိုkhhaဲniုငyasaphaြင’ya lakkhaṇāre”suṃ”tanyaluṃ” tacyalaှñña’yacītaငya၍
saṅkhāratarā”tiု’kiု vipassanāraှုramaññyaphaြcyasaññya． thiုsiု’ vipassanāraှုrā၌ raṅkhā aniccalakkhaṇākiု ū”cā”pe”၍
raှုliုka raှုniုငya၏， raṅkhā dukkhalakkhaṇākiု ū”cā”pe”၍ raှုliုka raှုniုငya၏， raṅkhā anattalakkhaṇākiု ū”cā”pe”၍
raှုliုka raှုniုငya၏．
146
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
thiုsiု’ kaြိmyaphanyamaျာ”chā thapyakāthapyakā vipassanāraှုsaphaြင’ya akaြငyaakhā၌ anattānupassanāñāṇyasaññya
aniccānupassanāñāṇya dukkhānupassanāñāṇyatiု’၏ ā”pe”thokyapaṃ’maှုkaြောင’ya thakyamaြkyalā၏ sana’yaraှငya”lā၏
cū”raှlā၏ raဲraင’yalā၏， attachaဲkiု phaြိုkhhaဲniုငyalokyaaောငya chamya”aငya paြñña’ya0lā၏ tiု”phā”lā၏． thiုakhā၌
yaငya” anattānupassanāñāṇyaka attadiṭṭhichaဲkiု phaြိုkhhaဲniုငya၏．
akaြငyaakhā၌kā” aniccānupassanāñāṇyasaññya dukkhānupassanāñāṇya anattānupassanāñāṇyatiု’၏
ā”pe”thokyapaṃ’maှုkaြောင’ya thakyamaြkyalā၏ sana’yaraှငya”lā၏ cū”raှlā၏ raဲraင’yalā၏， mānachaဲkiု phaြိုkhhaဲniုငyalokyaaောငya
chamya”aငya paြñña’ya0lā၏ tiု”phā”lā၏． thiုakhā၌ yaငya”aniccānupassanāñāṇyaka mānachaဲkiု phaြိုkhhaဲniုငya၏．
akaြငyaakhā၌kā” dukkhānupassanāñāṇyasaññya aniccānupassanāñāṇya anattānupassanāñāṇyatiု’၏ ā”
pe”thokyapaṃ’maှုkaြောင’ya thakyamaြkyalā၏ sana’yaraှငya”lā၏ cū”raှlā၏ raဲraင’yalā၏， taṇaှာchaဲkiု phaြိုkhhaဲniုငyalokyaaောငya
chamya”aငya paြñña’ya0lā၏ tiု”phā”lā၏． thiုakhā၌ yaငya”dukkhānupassanāñāṇyaka taṇaှာchaဲkiု phaြိုkhhaဲniုငya၏．
(mahāṭī-2-415-416-kaြñña’ya．)
lokiyabhā0nā၏ chamya”ā”
lokiyabhā0nāya hi kāye pahīnaṃ na vedanādīsu pahīnaṃ hoti． yadipi na pa0tteyaျ， na
paṭipakkhabhā0nāya tattha sā abhijjhā domanassassa appavatti hotīti puna tappahānaṃ vattabbamevāti．
ekattha pahīnaṃ sesesupi pahīnaṃ hotīti maggasatipaṭṭhānabhā0naṃ， lokiyabhā0nāya vā sabbattha
appavattimattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ． (ma-ṭī-1-347．)
lokuttarāmaggasatipaṭṭhānabhā0nā၏ chamya”ā”naှင’ya lokiyasatipaṭṭhānabhā0nā၏ chamya”ā”kā”
matūññīpe． yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya kāya vedanā citta dhammahūsañña’ya vipassanāñāṇya၏ araှုkhaṃ paramattha
dhātyasā”tiု’kiု akaြောငya”tarā”naှင’yatakha simya”chaññya”laျkya vipassanāacañyaatiုငya” lakkhaṇāyāñyataငyakā
vipassanāraှုphā”suṃ”sapyalārā ariyamagyasiု’ chiုkyalukhānī” akhaျိnya၌ yaငya” kāya vedanā citta dhammatiု’thaငya
maññyasañña’yatarā”kiုmachiု vipassanāraှုkhiုkya ariyamagyasiု’ chiုkyaniုငyasaññyasāphaြcya၏． akayya၍ kāyaamaññyarasañña’ya
rupyatarā”kiု vipassanāraှုkhiုkya ariyamagyasiု’chiုkyakhaဲ’laျှငya yaငya” ariyamagyañāṇyaka kāyaamaññyarasañña’ya rupya
tarā”apoya၌ chaဲnesañña’ya taṇaှာchaဲ mānachaဲ diṭṭhichaဲkiုsāmaka vedanā citta dhammatiု’apoya၌ chaဲnesañña’ya taṇaှာchaဲ
mānachaဲ diṭṭhichaဲtiု’kiုpā phaြိုkhhaဲniုငya၏ payyasatyaniုငya၏． vedanā citta dhammatiု’kiု vipassanāraှုkhiုkya ariyamagyasiု’ chiုkya
rā၌laññya” naññya”tūpaငya maှtyapā． siု’soya lokuttarā ariyamagyatarā”hūsaññya vipassanāñāṇyatiု’ka
achaင’yachaင’ya ā”kaြီ”so maှီrā upanissaya paccayasattiphaြင’ya kaျေ”jū”paြုpe”pāmaှ phaြcyapoyalāniုငyaso tarā”
phaြcyapesaññya．
siု’soya lokiyasatipaṭṭhānabhā0nākā” thiုmaျှ achamya”mathakyape． kāya amaññyarasañña’ya rupyatarā”
kiု lakkhaṇāyāñyataငyakā vipassanāraှုkhaဲ’soya kāyaamaññyaraso rupyatarā”apoya၌ chaဲnesañña’ya taṇaှာchaဲ
mānachaဲ diṭṭhichaဲkiုsā tadaṅgaā”phaြင’ya phaြိုkhhaဲniုငya၏． yaငya”kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānabhā0nāka vedanā citta
dhammatiု’apoya၌ chaဲnesañña’ya taṇaှာchaဲ mānachaဲ diṭṭhichaဲkiု maphaြိုkhhaဲniုငyape． alā”tūpaငya vedanā citta dhammatiု’kiု
vipassanāraှုrā၌laññya” naññya”tūpaငya sabhopokyapā．

koငya”so ñña tacyaññapiုငya” -- bhaddekarattasuttanyaraှငya”laငya”khaျkya
thiုkaြောင’ya lokiyasatipaṭṭhānabhā0nāarā၌ --- kāyaapoya၌ chaဲneso taṇaှာchaဲ mānachaဲ diṭṭhichaဲkiု
phaြိုkhhaဲniုငyaranya kāyakiု vipassanāraှုra၏． vedanāapoya၌ chaဲneso taṇaှာchaဲ mānachaဲ diṭṭhichaဲkiု phaြိုkhhaဲniုငyaranya
vedanākiု vipassanāraှုra၏． cittaapoya၌ chaဲneso taṇaှာchaဲ mānachaဲ diṭṭhichaဲkiု phaြိုkhhaဲniုငyaranya cittakiု vipassanāraှုra၏．
dhammaapoya၌ chaဲneso taṇaှာchaဲ mānachaဲ diṭṭhichaဲkiု phaြိုkhhaဲniုငyaranya dhammakiု vipassanāraှုra၏．
kāya vedanā citta dhammatiု’hūsaññya upādānakkhandhāငါ”pā”tiု’paငyataññya”． thiုkaြောင’ya paccuppanyakhandhāငါ”pā”tiု’
apoya၌ chaဲneso taṇaှာchaဲ mānachaဲ diṭṭhichaဲkiု phaြိုkhhaဲniုငyaranya paccuppanyakhandhāငါ”pā”tiု’kiု vipassanāraှုra၏． atitya
khandhāငါ”pā”tiု’apoya၌ chaဲneso taṇaှာchaဲ mānachaဲ diṭṭhichaဲkiု phaြိုkhhaဲniုငyaranya atityakhandhāငါ”pā”tiု’kiု vipassanāraှုra၏．
anāgatyakhandhāငါ”pā”tiု’apoya၌ chaဲneso taṇaှာchaဲ mānachaဲ diṭṭhichaဲkiု phaြိုkhhaဲniုငyaranya anāgatyakhandhāငါ”pā”tiု’kiု
vipassanāraှုra၏． ---- īkā” atitya anāgatya paccuppanya khandhātiု’apoya၌ taṇaှာ-diṭṭhi maphaြcyaaောငya kaျင’yaramañña’ya
kaျင’yacañyataññya”．
thiုkaြောင’ya ---- raraှိlāso upadesamaှာ īsiု’ phaြcya၏．

2． atityakhandhāငါ”pā”apoya၌ taṇaှာ-diṭṭhimaphaြcyaranya atityakhandhāငါ”pā”kiုlaññya” vipassanāraှုpā．
3． anāgatyakhandhāငါ”pā”apoya၌ taṇaှာ-diṭṭhimaphaြcyaranya anāgatyakhandhāငါ”pā”kiုlaññya” vipassanāraှုpā．
īkā” raraှိlāsañña’ya upadesaphaြcyasaññya．

nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
= ī paccuppanyaāruṃ maññyasaññya ----
1． khaṇa paccuppanya
2． santati paccuppanya
3． addhā paccuppanya - hu suṃ”maျို”paြာ”၏．
1． thiုsuṃ”maျို”tiု’thaငya thiုthiု akaြောငya”tarā”kiု achaဲpaြု၍ phaြcyachaဲphaြcyaso upādya-ṭhī-bhaငya = phaြcya-taññyapaျkya
khaṇasuṃ”pā”siု’ rokyachaဲphaြcyaneso citya-cetasikya-rupyatarā”cusaññya khaṇapaccuppanya maññya၏．
2． rupyaacañya nāmyaacañyakiု santatihu khoya၏． tacyautu tacyahāra naှcyautu naှcyahārakaြောင’ya phaြcyaso
rupyasantatiacañya၌ akaျုံ”vaငyaso tacyakaြိmya naှcyakaြိmyaso rupyasantatiacañyasaññyalaññya”koငya”， tacyavīthi
naှcyavīthihūso tacyakhuso naှcyakhuso cityaacañya၏ alaှñña’yaakaြိmya၌ akaျုံ”vaငyaso cityacetasikya
nāmyatarā”cusaññyalaññya”koငya” santatipaccuppanyamaññya၏．
3． tacyakhuso bha0phaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”apyaso rupya-nāmyasaññya addhāpaccuppanya maññya၏， yaငya” addhāpaccuppanyakiုpaငya
raññyarhayyatoyamū၍ araှငyamahākaccaññya” kiုyyatoyamaြtyakaြီ”saññya mahākaccāna - bhaddekarattasuttanya၌
īsiု’ hokaြာ”thā”toyamū၏．
“sītaငya”suṃ”phoya phaြcyatoyamūkaြkunyaso araှငyabhurā”tiု’ ...akaြငya bhavaငyamanoakaြññyadhātyahūso
cityasaññyalaññya”koငya”， akaြငyadhammāruṃtarā”cutiု’saññyalaññya”koငya” raှိkaြkunya၏． ī mana-dhammāruṃ naှcyapā”cuṃ

liုlā”tapyamakyamaှု chandarāganaှင’ya capyaso tapyamakyatatyaso viññāṇyasaññya akayya၍ phaြcyaငြာ”aṃ’， yaငya”
asicityaviññāṇya၏ liုlā”tapyamakyamaှု chandarāganaှင’ya capyashayyanesaññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya (thiုpuggiုlyasaññya) thiု

yaငya” addhāpaccuppanyatarā”tiု’thaငya yane’phaြcyapaြီ”khandhāငါ”pā”thaငyasāmaka mane’ka khandhāငါ”pā”， tacyane’ka khandhāငါ”pā”
casaññyaphaြင’ya paṭisandhe khandhāငါ”pā”siု’tiုငyaaောငya bha0tacyalaျှောkyavayya phaြcyapaြီ” khandhātiု’laññya” pāvaငyakaြ၏． alā”-
tūpaငya yane’phaြcyalattaṃ’ khandhāငါ”pā”thaငyasāmaka nakyaphaြnya၌ phaြcyalattaṃ’so khandhāငါ”pā”， tacyamaြnyane’၌ phaြcyalattaṃ’so
khandhāငါ”pā”， nokyala၌ nokyanaှcya၌ phaြcyamañña’ya khandhāငါ”pā” casaññyaphaြင’ya cutitiုငyaaောငya phaြcyalattaṃ’so khandhāငါ”pā”
tiု’laññya”pāvaငyakaြ၏． maျkyamaှောkyakhetyathaငya repanya”cā”neso paccuppanyanaှင’yakā” tūññīmaှု maraှိsaññyakiု satipaြုlera
msaññya．

m;tiု’sā phaြcyakaြောငya” aṭṭhakathācharātoyamaျာ”ka phhaင’yachiုtoyamūkaြkhaြငya” phaြcyapesaññya． siု’soya
īsiု’sophhaင’yachiုkhaျkyatiု’kā” - suttantapariyāyanaññya”sā phaြcya၏． abhidhammaniddesanaññya”kā” mahutyape．
siု’athakya suttantapariyāyanaññya” naှင’ya abhidhammaniddesanaññya”tiု’atiုငya” paccuppanyayūchapuṅkiုlaññya” chakyalakya

atitya anāgatya paccuppanya satyamaှtyapuṃ
yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ atītaṃnāgatapaccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṃ vā sukhumaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā
yaṃ dūre santike vā， tadekajjhaṃ abhisaṃyūhithā abhisaṅkhipithā ayaṃ vuccati rūpakkhandho． yā kāci
vedanā． yā kāci saññā． ye keci saṅkhārā． yaṃ kiñci viññāṇaṃ atītanāgatapaccuppannaṃ． pa ． abhisaṅkhipithā
ayaṃ vuccati viññāṇakkhandho． (abhi-2-1-10．)
idaṃ pana atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ nāma suttantapariyāyato abhidhammaniddesatoti duvidhaṃ． taṃ
suttantapariyāye bhavena paricchinnaṃ． paṭisandhito hi paṭṭhāya atītabhavesu nibbattaṃ rūpaṃ anantarabhave vā
nibbattaṃ hotu kappakoṭisatasahassamatthake vā， sabbaṃ atītame0 nāma． cutito paṭṭhāya anāgatabhavesu
nibbattanakarūpaṃ anantarabhave vā nibbattaṃ hotu kappakoṭisatasahassamatthake vā． sabbaṃ
anāgatame0 nāma． cutipaṭisandhiantare pavattarūpaṃ paccuppannaṃ nāma． (abhi-ṭṭha-2-7．)
pāḷitoyabhāsāpaြnya
atitya-anāgatya-paccuppanyaphaြcyaso aluṃ”cuṃso rupyatarā”saññyalaññya”koငya”， ajjhattasantānya၌
mūlaññya”phaြcyaso， bahiddhasantānya၌mūlaññya” phaြcyaso， runa’yaraငya”kaြmya”tamya”so oḷārikasaññyamūlaññya” phaြcyaso，
simyamhe’nū”ññaṃ’so sukhumasaññyamūlaññya” phaြcyaso， yutyaññaṃ’saññyamūlaññya” phaြcyaso， mhanyamaြtyasaññyamūlaññya” phaြcyaso
aluṃ”cuṃso rupyatarā”saññyalaññya”koငya”， (asiñāṇyanaှင’ya) ve”so akaြငyadūrarupyasaññyalaññya”koငya”，
(asiñāṇyanaှင’ya) nī”so akaြငyasantikarupyasaññyalaññya”koငya” raှိ၏． thiု (11) maျို”so okāsa = taññyarā၌
paြapyaso aluṃ”cuṃso rupyakiု phokyapaြnyatatyaso ruppanalakkhaṇā tacyakhu၌ tacyapoငya”taññya”paြု၍ ruṃ”cu၍
khaျုံ”၍ ī (11) maျို”soapaြာ”ā”phaြင’ya khaဲpaြာ”so， phokyapaြnyatatyaso， ruppanalakkhaṇāā”phaြင’ya tacyapoငya”
tacyacutaññya” poငya”curuṃ”khaျñya”apyaso rupyasabhotarā” aluṃ”cuṅkiု rupyaacu = rūpakkhandhāhū၍ khoyachiုapya၏．
(nāmyakhandhātiု’၌laññya” naññya”tūpaငya maှtyapā．) (abhi-2 -1-10．)

khoyachiုsaññyahu maှtyasā”thā”pā．
152
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
suttantapariyāyanaññya”
paramatthasabhā0dhammamaှ paြောငya”lhaှဲ၍ phaြcyakhaြငya”saññya pariyāyamaññya၏． suttanyadesanātoyakā” pariyāya
desanātoya phaြcyakhaြငya”kaြောင’ya suttantapariyāyanaññya”hu phhaင’yachiုkhaြငya” phaြcyasaññya． abhidhammā၌ “phassa-vedanā”
casaññyaphaြင’ya chuṃ”phaြtyakhaျkyakhaျsoā”phaြင’ya hotoyamūkhaြငya”kiု “abhidhammaniddesa”hu khoyachiုsaññya．
ī atitya anāgatya paccuppanyarupya maññyasaññya ---
1． paramatthasabhā0dhammamaှ paြောငya”lhaှဲ၍ phaြcyaso suttantapariyāya = suttanyadesanātoyanaññya”，
2． abhidhammā၌ chuṃ”phaြtyakhaျkyakhaျ၍ hotoyamūapyaso abhidhammaniddesa = abhidhammādesanātoyanaññya”-
īsiု’ā”phaြင’ya naှcyamaျို”apaြာ” raှိ၏．
thiုatitya-anāgatya-paccuppanyarupyakiု paramatthasabhā0dhammamaှ paြောငya”lhaှဲ၍phaြcyaso suttanyadesanātoya၌
bha0phaြင’yapiုငya”khaြာ” thā”apya၏． piုငya”khaြာ”puṃmaှာ īsiု’phaြcya၏． ---
1． paṭisandhemaှ ca၍ atityabha0tiု’၌ phaြcyakhaဲ’paြီ”so rupyahūsamaျှsaññya - akhaြာ”maဲ’ lhanyakhaဲ’paြီ”so dutiya
bha0၌mūlaññya” phaြcyakhaဲ’paြီ”saññya phaြcyakhaျငyaphaြcyapāce， lhanyakhaဲ’so kambhākuṭetacyasinya”thakya၌mūlaññya” phaြcyakhaဲ’
paြီ”saññya phaြcyakhaျငya phaြcyapāce - īaluṃ”cuṃsorupyasaññya atityarupyasā maññya၏．
2． ībha0cutimaှ ca၍ anāgatyabha0tiု’၌ phaြcyalattaṃ’so rupyahūsamaျှsaññya akhaြာ”maဲ’lālattaṃ’so dutiya
bha0၌mūlaññya” phaြcyalattaṃ’saññya phaြcyakhaျငyaphaြcyapāce， noငyalālattaṃ’so anāgatya kambhākuṭetacyasinya”
thakya၌mūlaññya” phaြcyalattaṃ’saññya phaြcyakhaျငyaphaြcyapāce - īrupyaā”luṃ”saññya anāgatyarupyasālaျှငya maññya၏．
3． ībha0 cuti - ībha0 paṭisandhe - īnaှcyakhutiု’၏ akaြာ”၌ phaြcyaso rupyasaññya paccuppanyarupya maññya၏．
(abhi-ṭṭha-2-7．)
abhidhammaniddesanaññya”
abhidhammaniddese pana khaṇena paricchinnaṃ． tayo hi rūpassa khaṇā uppādo ṭhiti bhaṅgoti． ime
tayo khaṇe pathā niruddhaṃ rūpaṃ samanantaraniruddhaṃ vā hotu atīte kappakoṭisatasahassamatthake vā，
sabbaṃ atītame0 nāma． tayo khaṇe asampattaṃ rūpaṃ ekacittakkhaṇamattena vā asampattaṃ hotu anā-
gate kappakoṭisatasahassa matthake vā ， sabbaṃ anāgatame0 nāma． ime tayo khaṇe sampattaṃ rūpaṃ
pana paccuppannaṃ nāma． tattha kiñcāpi idaṃ suttantabhājanīyaṃ， evaṃ santepi abhidhammaniddesene0 atītānāgatapaccuppanna
rūpaṃ niddiṭṭhanti veditabbaṃ． (abhi-ṭṭha-2-7．)
abhidhammaniddesa = abhidhammadesanā၌ atitya anāgatya paccuppanyakiု khaṇaā”phaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”thā”apya၏．
piုငya”khaြာ”thā”puṃmaှာ īsiု’ phaြcya၏． ---
rupyatarā”၏ akhiုkyaatana’ya khaṇatiု’saññya -- -
1． phaြcyakhaြငya” upādyakhaṇa，
2． taññyakhaြငya” ṭhīkhaṇa，
3． paျkyakhaြငya” bhaငyakhaṇa --- īsiု’ khaṇa suṃ”maျို” raှိkunya၏．
153
koငya”so ñña tacyaññapiုငya” -- bhaddekarattasuttanyaraှငya”laငya”khaျkya
1． īkhaṇasuṃ”pā”tiု’siု’ rokyaraှိ paြီ”၍ khaျုpyalepaြီ”so rupyasaññya koငya”chā akhaြာ”maဲ’ phaြcya၍ (= akhaြာ”
maraှိmū၍) khaျုpyanaှင’yalepaြီ”so rupyamūlaññya” phaြcyakhaျငyaphaြcyapāce， atitya kambhākuṭetacyasinya”thakya၌ khaျုpyanaှင’ya
lepaြီ”so rupyamūlaññya” phaြcyakhaျငyaphaြcyapāce， aluṃ”cuṃso khaျုpyalepaြီ”so rupyahūsamaျှsaññya atitya
rupyasālaျှငya maññya၏．
2． suṃ”pā”kunyaso khaṇatiု’siု’ marokyaraှိse”sorupyasaññya tacyakhuso cittakkhaṇamaျှphaြင’yamūlaññya” marokya-
raှိse”so rupyasaññya phaြcyakhaျငyaphaြcyapāce， noငyaanāgatyavayya kambhākuṭetacyasinya”thakya၌mūlaññya”
phaြcyalattaṃ’so rupya phaြcyakhaျငyaphaြcyapāce， khaṇasuṃ”pā”siု’ machiုkyarokyase”so rupyamaှnyasamaျှ ā”luṃ”saññya
anāgatyarupyasālaျှငya maññya၏．
3． ī khaṇasuṃ”pā”tiု’siု’ chiုkyarokyalāso chiုkyarokyanechaဲphaြcyaso rupyamaှnyasamaျှsaññya paccuppanyarupya
maññya၏． īsiု’ siraှိpāle． (abhi-ṭṭha-2-7．)

santati၏ achamya”phaြင’ya atitya anāgatya paccuppanyarupyatiု’kiု paြpaြီ”၍ samaya၏ achamya”phaြင’ya atitya anāgatya
paccuppanyarupyatiု’kiု aṭṭhakathā၌ aောkyapāatiုငya” chakyalakya phoyapaြthā”၏． ---

koငya”so ñña tacyaññapiုငya” -- bhaddekarattasuttanyaraှငya”laငya”khaျkya
samaya၏ achamya”phaြင’ya atitya-anāgatya-paccuppanyarupya yūchapuṃ

2． naṃnakya akhā，
3． ññanekhaျmya” akhā，
4． ññaña’ya akhā，
5． ne’ akhā ---
acaraှိkunyaso samaya = akhātiု’၌ santatiacañya၏ achamya”phaြင’ya phaြcyaso thiုthiု akhā၌ phaြcyaso rupya
acañyasaññya paccuppanya maññya၏． thiုthiု santatiacañya၏ achamya”phaြင’yaphaြcyaso thiုthiု samayarupyamaှ raှေ”၌ phaြcyapaြီ”so
rupyasaññya atitya maññya၏， nokya၌ phaြcyalattaṃ’so rupyasaññya anāgatya maññya၏．

2． santatikiုlaññya” masuṃ”sapyamū၍sālaျှငya samaya၏ achamya”phaြင’ya atityarupya anāgatyarupya paccuppanyarupyakiု

nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
khaṇaā”phaြင’ya atitya-anāgatya-paccuppanya khhaဲpuṃ

tacyanaññya”phhaင’yachiုpuṃ
tacyanaññya” --- lhanyalepaြီ”so hetukicca paccayakiccaraှိso rupyasaññya atitya maññya၏． paြီ”paြီ”so
hetukiccaraှိso mapaြီ”se”so paccayakiccaraှိso rupyasaññya paccuppanyarupya maññya၏． naှcyapā”cuṃso hetukicca
paccayakiccasiု’ marokyase”so rupyasaññya anāgatyarupya maññya၏．
tacyanaññya” --- mimikiccakiု paြုchaဲkhaṇa၌ phaြcyanechaဲrupyasaññya paccuppanyarupya maññya၏． thiုrupyamaှ raှေ”၌phaြcyaso
rupyasaññya atityarupya maññya၏， nokya၌ phaြcyasorupyasaññya anāgatyarupya maññya၏．
rupyatarā”tiု’kiု tiုkyariုkyaphaြcyapoyacetatyaso janaka akaြောငya”tarā”saññya hetu akaြောငya” maññya၏．
ā”pe”thokyapaṃ’tatyaso upatthambhaka akaြောငya”tarā”saññya paccayaakaြောငya” maññya၏．
janaka (= hetu) akaြောငya”tarā”ka rupyakiု tiုkyariုkyaphaြcyacekhaြငya”saññya hetukiccataññya”． ā”pe”
thokyapaṃ’tatyaso upatthambhaka akaြောငya” (= paccayaakaြောငya”) tarā”ka ā”pe”thokyapaṃ’khaြငya”saññya
paccayakiccataññya”．
upamā --- maျို”ce’၏ aññhana’yakiု phaြcyacekhaြငya”saññya maျို”ce’၏ lupyaငnya”kiccataññya”． re-maြေ-utu (= pathavīrasaāpora
sa-neroငyakhaြññya) casaññyatiု’၏ thiုaññhana’yakiု phaြcyacerāvayya ā”pe”thokyapaṃ’khaြငya”saññya re-maြေ-
utu casaññyatiု’၏ lupyaငnya”kiccapaငya phaြcya၏． (īkā” lokaupamātaññya”．)
kaṃ၏ kaṭattārupya = kammajarupyanaှင’ya vipākya nāmyatarā”tiု’kiု phaြcyacekhaြငya”saññya yaငya”kaṃ၏ lupyaငnya”kiccapaငya
phaြcya၏． āhāracasaññyatiု’၏ thiု kaṭattārupyanaှင’ya vipākyanāmyatarā”tiု’kiု ā”pe”thokyapaṃ’khaြငya”saññya
yaငya”āhāracasaññyatiု’၏ lupyaငnya”kiccapaငyataññya”． (īkā” sāsanātoya upamātaññya”．)
ī upamāatūpaငya --- tacyakhutacyakhuso rupyakalāpyakiုlaññya”koငya”， cityacetasikyahūso cittuppādya
= vipākyanāmyatarā”kiုlaññya”koငya” kaṃsaññya tiုkyariုkya phaြcyacetatyaso janakasattiphaြcya၍ nānākkhaṇikakama
®satti upanissayasatti， āhārasatticaso paccayasattitiု’phaြင’ya kaျေ”jū”paြုpe”၏． yaငya” vipākya rupyanāmya
tarā”tiု’thaငyalaññya” nāmyakhandhāle”pā” paramatyatarā”tiု’saññya akhaျငya”khaျငya” sahajātacaso paccayasattitiု’phaြင’ya
ā”pe”thokyapaṃ’laျkyaraှိkaြ၏． bhūtarupya dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”tiု’saññyalaññya” akhaျငya”khaျငya”ā”， bhūtarupyasaññya
upādārupyaā” sahajātacaso paccayasattitiု’phaြင’ya kaျေ”jū”paြုlaျkya raှိkaြ၏．
īsiု’laျှငya hetukicca (= janakakicca)， upatthambhakakicca (= paccayakicca) hūso mimi kiccakiု paြုchaဲkhaṇa၌
phaြcyanechaဲ rupyasaññya paccuppanyarupya maññya၏． thiု rupyamaှ raှေ”၌phaြcyapaြီ”so rupyasaññya atityarupya maññya၏． nokya၌
phaြcyalattaṃ’so rupyasaññya anāgatyarupya maññya၏． --- hu chiုliုpesaññya． (mūlaṭī-2-7． anuṭī-2-12-13．)

nāmyapiုငya”၌ atitya-anāgatya-paccuppanya khhaဲpuṃ

2． tacyakhuso manodhāravīthi၌ akaျုံ”vaငyaso vedanā，

paြုkaြkunyaso tadanuvattika manodhāravīthi caso manodhāravīthi၌ pāvaငyaso vedanātiု’saññya

vedanātiု’taññya”．

hutyamaှnyatiုငya”so sabhohuchiုapyaso kiုyyapiုငyasabhā0lakkhaṇā ā”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya” amaျာ”chiုငya
sāmaññalakkhaṇāā”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya” ñāṇacakkhuphaြင’ya simaြငyasaññyaphaြcya၍ paramatthaā”phaြင’ya thaငyaraှာ”raှိso
khandhāငါ”pā”apoငya”kiု ငြီ”ငhe’khaြငya”ငှာ thayyatātapyamakyakhaြငya” kaငya”khaြငya”ငှာ thayyatā tapyamakyamaှု rāga khaျုpyaငြိmya”
cekhaြငya”ငှာ kaျင’ya၏． rahanya”tiု’ ...īsiု’laျှငya hutyatiုငya”maှnyachā simaြငyatatyaso yathābhūtañāṇadassana
hūso ñāṇacakkhunaှင’ya paြñña’yacuṅkunyaso sūtiု’saññya maphokyamapaြnya hutyamaှnyasañña’yaatiုငya” simaြငyakaြkunya၏．
(khu-1-224． itivuttaka-diṭṭhigatasutya．)
ī khandhāငါ”pā”apoငya”saññya nāmyarupyamaျှsātaññya”． thiု khandhāငါ”pā”apoငya”၌ “ī pathavī acaraှိkunyaso
dhammatiု’kā” rupyataññya”， ī phassa acaraှိkunyaso dhammatiု’kā” nāmyataññya”． īsaññyatiု’kā” thiုrupyanāmyatiု’၏
lakkhaṇa-rasa-paccupaṭṭhānya-padaṭṭhānyatiု’taññya”． īsaññyatiု’kā” thiုrupyanāmyatiု’၏ avijjā taṇaှာ upādānya saṅkhāra
kaṃ caso akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’taññya””hu īsiု’laျှငyaakaြောငya”tarā”naှင’ya takhaso nāmyarupyakiု simaြငyasaññya၏
achamya”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya”，
“akaြောငya”tarā”naှင’yatakhaso ī rupyanāmyadhamma saṅkhāratarā” ā”luṃ”tiု’saññya maphaြcyamī raှေ”ka maraှိkunyamū၍
yakhumaှ rutyakhaျññya” phaြcyapoyalākaြkunya၏， phaြcyapoyapaြီ”nokya rutyakhaျññya” khaျုpyapaျkya၍shā”kaြkunya၏， thiုkaြောင’ya
aniccatiု’taññya”， aniccaphaြcyasokaြောင’ya dukkhatiု’taññya”， dukkhaphaြcyasokaြောင’ya anattatiု’taññya”” - hu īsiု’laျှငya
aniccānupassanā casaññyatiု’၏ achamya”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya” simaြငya၏． īkā” - bhūtaṃ bhūtato passati =
araှိkiု araှိatiုငya” maြငya၏ hūrā၌ chiုliုraငya”anakyasabhotaññya”． īmaျှso cakā”acañyaphaြင’ya taruṇa-
vipassanālaျှငya achuṃ”apiုငya”akhaြာ”raှိso vipassanābhūmi = vipassanāñāṇya၏ taññyarābhuṅkiု ññhaှnyapaြtoya
mūapyapesaññya． (itivuttaka-ṭṭha-170-171．)
««maှtyakhaျkya ---- taruṇavipassanā = nusovipassanāhūsaññya saṅkhāraparicchedañāṇya (= nāmarūpapariccheda-
ñāṇya)， kaṅkhāvitaraṇañāṇya (= paccayapariggahañāṇya)， sammasanañāṇya， maggāmaggañāṇya (= udayabbayañāṇya)
ī ñāṇyale”maျို”tiု’၏ amaññyaphaြcyasaññya． - saṃ-ṭṭha-2-50．»»
nibbidāya = ငြီ”ငhe’khaြငya”ငှာhūsaññya bhūtahukhoyachiုapyaso bhuṃsuṃ”pā”athaငya”၌ taññyaraှိso tebhūmaka
tarā”apoငya”kiု ငြီ”ငhe’khaြငya”ငှာ - huchiုliုsaññya． ī nibbidāya - hūso cakā”rapyaphaြင’ya bala0vipassanā =
ā”koငya”so vipassanākiု ññhaှnyapaြtoyamū၏． (itivuttaka-ṭṭha-171．)
««maှtyakhaျkya ---- bala0vipassanāhūsaññya bhayatūpaṭṭhānañāṇya， ādīnavānupassanāñāṇya， muñcitukamaျtāñāṇya，
saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇyahūso ñāṇyale”maျို”tiု’၏ amaññyaphaြcyasaññya． saṃ-ṭṭha-2-50．»»
virāgāya = hūsaññya thayyatātapyamakyakhaြငya” kaငya”khaြငya”ငှာ kaျင’ya၏hu chiုliု၏． ī virāgahūso
cakā”rapyaphaြင’ya ariyamagyakiု ññhaှnyapaြtoyamū၏． nirodhāya = hūsaññya thayyatātapyamakyamaှု rāgakiု khaျုpyaငြိmya”ce164

khaြငya”ငှာ kaျင’ya၏hu chiုliု၏． ī nirodhāya hūso cakā”rapyaphaြင’yalaññya” ariyamagyakiုpaငya ññhaှnyapaြtoyamū၏．
tacyanaññya” - nirodhāyahūso īcakā”rapyaphaြင’ya kilesāapūmī”kiု aငြိmya”kaြီ”ငြိmya”aောငya thapyachaင’ya၍
ငြှိmya”tatyaso (= ငြိmya”aေ”cetatyaso) paṭipassaddhinirodha amaññyaraso ariyaphiုlyanaှင’ya anupādisesa
nibbānya amaññyaraso khandhaparinibbānyakiု ññhaှnyapaြtoyamū၏． (itivuttaka-ṭṭha-171．)
evaṃ kho bhikkhave cakkhumanto passanti = rahanya”tiု’ ...īsiု’laျှငya hutyatiုငya”maှnyachā simaြငyatatyaso
yathābhūtañāṇadassanahūso ñāṇacakkhunaှင’ya paြñña’yacuṅkunyaso sūtiု’saññya maphokyamapaြnya hutyamaှnyasañña’ya
atiုငya” simaြငyakaြkunya၏ -- hūsaññya ----- īsiု’laျှငya paññācakkhuamaြငya raှိkaြkunyaso sūtoyakoငya”tiု’saññya
ariyamagya၏ raှေ”aphiု’၌phaြcyaso pubbabhāgasatipaṭṭhānamagyataññya”hūso vipassanāpaññācakkhunaှင’yatakha magga-
paññācakkhuphaြင’ya catusaccadhammaamaññyarasañña’ya saccāle”rapya tarā”maြtyakiု simaြငyakaြkunya၏hu chiုliုsaññya．
(itivuttaka-ṭṭha-171．)
īaṭṭhakathāaphhaင’yanaှင’yaaññī ----- bhūtaṃ bhūtato passati = araှိkiု araှိatiုငya” simaြငya၏ ----
hūsaññya vipassanāpaññācakkhu ariyamaggapaññācakkhuphaြင’ya catusaccadhammaamaññyarasañña’ya saccāle”rapyatarā”maြtyakiု
simaြငyamaှုkiု chiုliုsaññyahu maှtyapā． īkaဲ’siု’so adhippāyyakiု raှငya”laငya”taငyapaြrā၌ aṭṭhakathācharātoyaka
mūlapaṇṇāsapāḷitoya mahātaṇaှာsaṅkhayasuttanya၌ lāraှိso ----- bhūtamidaṃ bhikkhave samanupassatha -
caso cakā”rapyamaျာ”kiု kiု”kā”laျkya phhaင’yachiုshā”toyamū၏． thiုkaြောင’ya yaငya”cakā”rapyatiု’kiု kokyanutya၍
taငyapaြapyapāsaññya．
mahātaṇaှာsaṅkhayasuttanya kokyanutyakhaျkya
bhūtamidanti bhikkhave passathāti． evaṃ bhante． tadāhārasambhavanti bhikkhave passathāti． evaṃ bhante．
tadāhāranirodhā yaṃ bhūtaṃ， taṃ nirodhadhammanti bhikkhave passathāti． evaṃ bhante． (ma-1-326．)
bhūtamidanti idaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ jātaṃ bhūtaṃ nibbattaṃ， tumaှpei taṃ bhūtamidanti bhikkhave passathāti．
tadāhārasambhavanti taṃ panetaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ āhārasambhavaṃ paccayasambhavaṃ， sati paccaye uppajjati evaṃ passathāti
pucchati． tadāhāranirodhāti tassa paccayassa nirodhā． (ma-ṭṭha-2-207．)
hetupaccayehi jātaṃ nibbattaṃ “bhūta”nti idhādhippetaṃ， taṃ atthato pañcakkhandhā tabbinimuttassa
sappaccayassa abhā0to， yañca khandhapañcakaṃ attano tesañca bhikkhūnaṃ， taṃ “bhūtamida” nti bhagavā avocāti
āha “idaṃ khandhapañcaka”nti ． attano phalaṃ āharatīti āhāro， paccayo． sambha0ti etasmāti
sambhavo， āhāro sambhavo etassāti āhārasambhavaṃ． tenāha “]paccayasambha0”nti． tassa paccayassa
nirodhāti yena avijjādinā paccayena khandhapañcakaṃ sambha0ti， tassa paccayassa anuppādanirodhā．
khaṇanirodho pana kāraṇanirapekkho． (ma-ṭī-2-225．)

īsuttanyathaငya saṃsarā၏ phaြcyacañyahūso anulomapaccayākārakhoyasañña’ya anulomapaṭiccasamuppādya
desanātoyakiုlaññya”koငya”， saṃsarā၏ khaျုpyacañya hūso paṭilomapaccayākārakhoyasañña’ya paṭiloma
paṭiccasamuppādya desanātoyakiုlaññya”koငya” bhurā”raှငyasaññya chakyalakyahokaြာ”thā”toyamūpesaññya．
īdesanātoyamaျာ”naှင’ya aññī ----- bhūtaṃ bhūtato passati = araှိkiု araှိatiုငya” simaြငya၏hūsaññya-
1． atitya anāgatya paccuppanya ajjhatta bahiddha oḷārika sukhuma hīna paṇīta dūra santikahūso (11)
maျို”so akhaြငya”arāā”phaြင’ya taññyaneso āsavotarā”tiု’၏ āruṃyūrā taṇaှာ-diṭṭhitiု’phaြင’ya
ငါ-ငါ’hā-hu chaဲyūrāphaြcyaso upādānakkhandhāငါ”pā” dukkhasaccātarā”kiုlaññya” attapaccakkhañāṇyahūsañña’ya
vipassanāpaññānaှင’yalaññya” simaြငya၏． asammohapaṭivedhasabhoā”phaြင’ya thiု”thhaငya”simaြငyatatyaso
ariyamaggapaññānaှင’yalaññya” simaြငya၏．
2． raှေ”kammabha0kiု thūthoငyakhaဲ’cañya atityabha0ka paြုcupaျို”thoငyakhaဲ’so samudayasaccā amaññyarasañña’ya
avijjā taṇaှာ upādānya saṅkhāra kaṃtiု’kiုlaññya”koငya”， yaငya”akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’kaြောင’ya paccuppanya paṭisandhe
khandhāငါ”pā”acaraှိso akaျို” upādānakkhandhāငါ”pā” dukkhasaccātarā”tiု’၏ thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyapuṃ samudaya
sabhokiုlaññya”koငya”， paccuppanyathaငya paြုcupaျို”thoငyaliုkyaso samudayasaccāamaññyarasañña’ya avijjā
taṇaှာ upādānya saṅkhāra kaṃtiု’kiုlaññya”koငya”， yaငya”akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’kaြောင’ya anāgatya paṭisandhe
khandhāငါ”pā”acaraှိso akaျို” upādānakkhandhāငါ”pā” dukkhasaccātarā”tiု’၏ thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyapuṃ samudayasabhokiုlaññya”
koငya” attapaccakkhañāṇyahūsañña’ya vipassanāpaññānaှင’yalaññya” simaြငya၏． asammohapaṭivedha
sabhoā”phaြင’ya thiု”thhaငya” simaြငyatatyaso ariyamaggapaññānaှင’yalaññya” simaြငya၏．
(paccayato udayadassanataññya”． visuddhi-2-267-kaြñña’yapā．)
3． akaြောငya” samudayasaccānaှင’yatakhaso akaျို” dukkhasaccātarā”tiု’kiု lakkhaṇāyāñyataငyakā vipassanā
raှုphā” suṃ”sapyaliုkyasoakhā yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya yaငya” dukkhasaccātarā” samudayasaccā
tarā”taññya”hūso saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏ phaြcyamaှု paျkyamaှုkiုlaññya”koငya”， yaငya”saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏ anicca
sabho dukkhasabho anattasabhotiု’kiုlaññya”koငya” attapaccakkhañāṇyahūsañña’ya vipassanāpaññā
naှင’yalaññya” simaြငya၏． asammohapaṭivedha sabhoā”phaြင’ya thiု”thhaငya” simaြငyatatyaso ariyamagga-
paññānaှင’yalaññya” simaြငya၏． (saṅkhāratiု’၏ phaြcyamaှု jātidukkhanaှင’ya paျkyamaှု maraṇadukkhakiု thiု”thhaငya” simaြငyakhaြငya”
kaြောင’ya dukkhasaccākiု simaြငyakhaြငya”paငyataññya”． visuddhi-2-267．)

4． akaြောငya” samudayasaccātarā”tiု’၏ arahattamagyakaြောင’ya noငyatacyaphanyamaphaြcyaso khaျုpyakhaြငya”phaြင’ya
khaျုpyaငြိmya”khaြငya”hūso anuppādanirodha sabhoā”phaြင’ya khaျုpyaငြိmya”soakhā akaျို”upādānakkhandhātiု’၏ya
khandhaparinibbānyacaṃso akhā၌noငyatacyaphanyamaphaြcyaso khaျုpyakhaြငya”phaြင’ya khaျုpyaငြိmya”khaြငya” hūso anuppādanirodha
sabhoā”phaြင’ya khaျုpyaငြိmya”puṅkiုlaññya” attapaccakkhañāṇyahūsañña’ya vipassanāpaññānaှင’yalaññya” simaြငya၏．
asammohapaṭivedha sabhoā”phaြင’ya thiု”thhaငya” simaြငyatatyaso ariyamaggapaññānaှင’yalaññya” simaြငya၏．
(paccayato 0yadassanañāṇyataññya”． lokīnirodhasaccākiု sisoñāṇyataññya”． visuddhi-2-267．)
5． paṭivipassanāhūsañña’ya raှုtatyaso vipassanāñāṇyakiု tacyaphanyapaြnya၍ vipassanāraှုniုငyasoakhā yaငya”raှု
neso vipassanājothaငya akaျုံ”vaငyaso vipassanāñāṇyaū”choငyasañña’ya - sammādiṭṭhi (= vipassanā
ñāṇya)， sammāsaṅkappa (= vitakya)， sammāvāyāma (= vīriya)， sammāsati， sammāsamādhi (= ekaggatā)
hūsañña’ya lokīmaggasaccātarā”tiု’kiုlaññya” attapaccakkhañāṇyahūso vipassanāñāṇyaphaြင’yalaññya”
simaြငya၏． asammohapaṭivedhasabhoā”phaြင’ya thiု”thhaငya”simaြငyatatyaso ariyamagyapaññāphaြင’yalaññya”
simaြငya၏． (saṅkhāratiု’၏ udaya0yasabhokiု masiaောငyaphuṃ”lhaှmya”thā”sañña’ya mohakiု yaငya”lokīmaggaငya
tarā”tiု’ka tadaṅgaā”phaြင’ya payyaraှာ”niုငyasokaြောင’ya maggasaccā hūso amaññyakiု raraှိsaññya． lokī
maggasaccātaññya”． visuddhi-2-267-268．)
6． vipassanāñāṇyatiု’၏ achuṃ”၌ ariyamagyañāṇyasaññya thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyapoyalāsoakhā attapaccakkhañāṇya
amaññyaraso yaငya”ariyamagyapaññāphaြင’ya asaṅkhatadhātya aငြိmya”dhātyanibbānyataññya”hūso nirodhasaccā
tarā”toyamaြtyakiုlaññya” simaြငya၏． (lokuttarā nirodhasaccātaññya”． ārammaṇapaṭivedhataññya”．)
7． yaငya” ariyamagyanaှင’yayaှñyaso maggaငyatarā”kiုyya (8)pā”kā” maggasaccātaññya”． ariyamagyapaññāsaññya
asammohapaṭivedhasabhoā”phaြင’ya yaငya”maggasaccātarā”kiုlaññya”simaြငya၏． (lokuttarā maggasaccā
taññya”． asammohapaṭivedhataññya”．)

yañca bhikkhave ratti Htathāgato anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhi Habhisambujjhati， yañca ratti H anupādisesāya

= rahanya”tiု’ akaြငya ññaña’ya၌laññya” tathāgata amaññyaratoyamūso saငyatiု’charā ငါbhurā”saññya atu
maraှိso arahattamagyañāṇya sabbaññutañāṇyahu khoyachiုapyaso sammāsambodhi ñāṇyatoyamaြtyakiု thiု”thhaငya”
simaြငyatoyamū၏． akaြငya ññaña’ya၌yalaññya” khandhā (5)pā”tiု’၏ noငyatacyaphanya maphaြcyaso khaျုpyaငြိmya”khaြငya”hu khoyachiုapyaso
anupādisesanibbānadhātyaphaြင’ya parinibbānya vaငyacaṃtoyamū၏． thiုnaှcyaññaña’yatiု’၏ athaငya”၌ akaြငyatarā”
cakā”toyakiု paြောchiုtoyamū၏ mina’yamaြhakyatoyamū၏， ññhaှnyakaြာ”toyamū၏． thiုaluṃ”cuṃso tarā”cakā”toya
saññya paြောchiုsañña’yaatiုငya” mina’yamaြhakyasañña’yaatiုငya” ññhaှnyakaြာ”sañña’yaatiုငya” maှnyasaññyasālaျှငya phaြcyape၏． mamaှnya
hūso akhaြာ”tacyamaျို”so akhaြငya”arāā”phaြင’ya phaြcyakhaြငya” maññyasaññya maraှိsaññyasātaññya”． thiုkaြောင’ya saငyatiု’
charā ငါbhurā”kiု tathāgatahū၍ khoyachiုapyapesaññya． (aṃ-1-332．)
athakyapā pāḷitoyaara sabbaññutañāṇyatoyamaြtyakiု ratoyamūsañña’ya ññaña’yamaှca၍ parinibbānya vaငyacaṃtoya
mūsañña’ya ññaña’yaathi (45)vāathaငya”၌ bhurā”raှငya၏ hokaြာ”paြsa chiုchuṃ”matoyamūapyaso tarā”cakā”hūsamaျှ
saññyakā” hokaြာ”paြsa chiုchuṃ”matoyamūsañña’yaatiုငya” amaှnyakhaျññya”sā phaြcyasokaြောင’ya mamaှnyahūso akhaြာ”
tacyamaျို”so akhaြငya”arāā”phaြင’yalaññya” phaြcyariု”dhammatā maraှိsokaြောင’ya bhurā”raှငya၏ suttaamaññyaratoya
mūsañña’ya tarā”toyamaျာ”kiု asaငya yogīsūtoyakoငya” anephaြင’ya lakyamakhaṃliုbhaဲ payyalaှnyaliုsaññya phaြcyaṃ’，
le”saṅkhaျneှင’ya kambhātacyasinya”tiု’ kālapatyaluṃ” pāramī (10)pā” apaြာ” (30)tiု’kiု phaြñña’yakaျင’yachaññya”pū”toya
mūpaြီ”maှ raraှိlāsañña’ya sabbaññutañāṇyatoyamaြtyaphaြင’ya khhaဲkhaြာ” cityaphaြာ၍ hokaြာ”thā”toyamūsañña’ya tarā”toya
maျာ”kiု payyaraှာ”liုso asaငya yogīsūtoyakoငya”၏ santānya၌ sabbaññutañāṇyatoyamaြtyanaှင’ya tūññīneso
ñāṇyamaျို”soyalaññya”koငya”， sabbaññutañāṇyatoyathakya sālhanyasañña’ya ñāṇyamaျို”soyalaññya”koငya”
raraှိthā”paြီ”phaြcyaphiု’ liုapyapelima’yamaññya． siု’maှsālaျှငya sabbaññutañāṇyatoyamaြtyanaှင’ya yaှñyapaြိုငya၍ caငyapaြိုငyasāsanā
tacyarapyakiု thūthoငyaniုငyamaññya phaြcyapesaññya．
siု’soya sabbaññutañāṇyatoyamaြtyathakya sālhanyaso ñāṇyamaျို”saññyalaññya”koငya”， sabbaññutañāṇya
naှင’ya tūññīso ñāṇyamaျို”saññyalaññya”koငya” īsāsanātoyathaငya”၌kā” raှိniုငyasañña’yaarā mahutyakaြောငya”kiု
bhurā”raှငyakiုyyatoyatiုငyaka nāmaññyakaျောya upakakaြီ”ā” hokaြာ”thā”toyamūpaြီ”paငya phaြcyapesaññya．

thā”toyamūapyasañña’ya apyacapyasañña’ya aphaျောya (8)maျို”tiု’naှင’ya chīlaျောyanekaြkunya၏． thiု’kaြောင’ya rahanya”tiု’ā”
mhanya”lhaဲpiုငya”၌ chāloငyamhatyasipyakhaြငya”hūso pipāsa akaြောငya”tarā” thaငyaraှာ”raှိkhaဲ’soya sokyasuṃ”khaြငya”ငှာ
apyakunya၏． (vi-ṭṭha-3-385．)
174
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
īkā” vinaññya”arā၌ mahāpadesatarā” (4)pā”naှင’ya naှိုငya”ññaှိ၍ apyasaññyanaှင’yachīlaျောyapāka apya၏hu，
maapyasaññyanaှင’yachīlaျောyapāka maapyahu saṅgāyanāmahātheryamaြtyatiု’ chuṃ”phaြtyathā”apyaso suttānuloma
amaññyaraso tarā”puṃcaṃakhaျို’ phaြcyasaññya．
suttanyamahāpadesatarā” le”pā”
khapyasimya”ussuṃ aluṃ”cuṃso tarā”hūsamaျှkiု akaြhaငya”akaျnya maraှိ kunyacaငyaaောငya charāmakū sayambhū
ñāṇyaphaြင’ya mimialiုliု kiုyyatoyatiုငyasālaျှငya thhaငya”phokyasimaြငyatoyamūsañña’ya sabbaññubhurā”raှငyaaphaြcya vanyakhaṃ
toyamūso sammāsambuddhabhurā”raှငyasaññya parinibbānyacaṃtoyamūmañña’yanaှcya tapiု’thaဲlapaြñña’yane’၌ vesālīpaြññya cāpāla
cetīvayya satisampajañya ñāṇyayaှñyatoyamūlaျkya asakyaraှññyaranya sakyatoyakiု thinya”simya”coင’yaraှောkya paြုpaြငyamaှု
taññya”hūso āyusaṅkhāra， āyupālaka， jīvitasaṅkhāra amaññyasuṃ”maျို”raraှိso arahattaphiုlya phalasamāpatya
vaငyacā”maှု lupyaငnya”rapyakiု īne’maှ noငya kachunyalapaြñña’yane’ tiုငyaaောငyasā vaငyacā”to’maññyahu chuṃ”phaြtyakhaျkya
khaျkhaြငya”kiု paြုtoyamū၏． yaငya”siု’ chuṃ”phaြtyakhaျkya khaျtoyamūkhaြငya”saññyakā” āyusaṅkhārakiု lhaှtyatoyamūkhaြငya”paငya
phaြcya၏． thiု’noငya acañyaatiုငya” chakyalakya၍ kharī”desacārī kaြhakhaျီtoyamūlārā bhogamaြို’siု’ chiုkyarokya
toyamū၏． thiုbhogamaြို’ ānandacetī၌ sītaငya”suṃ”toyamūkhiုkya bhurā”raှငyasaññya rahanya”tiု’kiု suttanyamahā
padesatarā” (4) pā”tiု’kiု hokaြာ”toyamūlesaññya． yaငya” (4)pā”tiု’maှာ īsiု’taññya”．
pathama - mahāpadesatarā”
1． rahanya”tiု’ ...īsāsanātoya၌ tacyacuṃtacyayokyaso rahanya”saññya īsiု’ paြောchiုlāငြာ”aṃ’，
“ငါ’raှငyatiု’ ...ငါsaññya ītarā”kiု maြtyachābhurā”maျkyamaှောkyatoyamaှ kaြာ”nākhaဲ’rapā၏， khaṃyūkhaဲ’rapā၏， īkā”
tarā”toyapātaññya”， īkā” vinaññya”toyapātaññya”， īkā” maြtyachābhurā”၏ achuṃ”amatoyapātaññya”” - hu
paြောchiုlāငြာ”aṃ’．
rahanya”tiု’ ...thiုrahanya”၏ cakā”kiု alhayyatakūnaှင’ya lakyalaññya” makhaṃapyase”， payyalaññya” mapayyaapyase”，
alhayyatakūnaှင’ya lakyalaññya” makhaṃse”bhaဲ payyalaññya” mapayyase”bhaဲ thiုrahanya” paြောchiုlāso
cakā”rapya၌ akaျုံ”vaငyakunyaso pudyabaျññya”tiု’kiု koငya”chāmaှtyasā”၍ sutyatarā”toya၌ shaငya”၍ kaြñña’yakaြ
ramaññya， vinaññya”tarā”toya၌ naှီ”naှောkaြñña’yakaြramaññya．
yaငya”siု’ sutyatarā”toya၌ shaငya”၍ kaြñña’yalatyasoya vinaññya”tarā”toya၌ naှီ”naှော၍ kaြñña’yalatyasoya
thiုrahanya”paြောchiုso cakā”၌ akaျုံ”vaငyakunyaso pudyabaျññya”tiု’saññya sutyatarā”toya၌laññya” masakyavaငyakaြ
laျှငya vinaññya”tarā”toya၌laññya” manaှီ”naှောmikaြlaျှငya “īrahanya”၏ paြောchiုlāsocakā”saññya maြtyachābhurā”၏
cakā”toyacaငyacacya mahutyakhaျေ， īrahanya”၏ maှာ”yhaငya”chā saငyayūthā”apyaso cakā”sā phaြcyakhaျseññya”hu
īarā၌ chuṃ”phaြtyakaြramaññya． rahanya”tiု’ ...īsiု’ chuṃ”phaြtyapaြီ”laျှငya thiုcakā”kiု payyachana’yakaြle．
siု’mahutya sutyatarā”toya၌ shaငya”၍ kaြñña’yalatyasoya， vinaññya”tarā”toya၌ naှီ”naှော၍ kaြñña’yalatyasoya
thiုrahanya”paြောchiုlāso cakā”၌ akaျုံ”vaငyakunyaso pudyabaျññya”tiု’saññya sutyatarā”toya၌laññya” sakyavaငya
khaဲ’laျှငya， vinaññya”tarā”toya၌laññya” naှီ”naှောmikhaဲ’laျှငya “īrahanya”၏ paြောchiုlāsocakā”saññya thiုmaြtyachābhurā”
၏ cakā”toyacaငyacacya phaြcyapesaññya， īrahanya”၏ koငya”chā saငyayūthā”apyaso cakā”laññya” phaြcyapesaññya”

saññya”hu īarā၌ chuṃ”phaြtyaramaññya． rahanya”tiု’ ...naှcyakhumaြောkyaso īmahāpadesakiု maှtyasā”thā”kaြ

tatiya mahāpadesatarā”
rahanya”tiု’ ...thiုpaြငya īsāsanātoya၌ tacyacuṃtacyayokyaso rahanya”saññya īsiု’ paြောchiုlā
ငြာ”aṃ’，
“īmaññyaso kaျောငya”tiုkya၌ āgamasuta = saငyasi， adhigamasuta = kaျင’yasihūso akaြာ”amaြငya
bahusutalaññya” maျာ”kunyaso， pāḷitoyakiုlaññya” naှုtyaငုံchoငyathā”kunyaso， sutyaabhidhammātarā”toya
kiုlaññya” naှုtyaငုံchoငyathā”kunyaso， vinaññya”toyakiုlaññya” naှုtyaငုံchoငyathā”kunyaso， mātikākiုlaññya”
naှုtyaငုံchoငyathā”kunyaso maျာ”chākunyaso matheryarahanya”tiု’saññya sītaငya”suṃ”nethiုငyalaျkya raှိkaြpākunya၏，
ငါsaññya thiုmatheryatiု’၏ maျkyamaှောkyamaှ kaြာ”nākhaဲ’ra， khaṃyūkhaဲ’rapā၏． īkā” tarā”toyapātaññya”， īkā”
vinaññya”toyapātaññya”， īkā” maြtyachābhurā”၏ achuṃ”amatoyapātaññya””hu paြောchiုlāငြာ”aṃ’．

toyapātaññya””hu tacyaū”tacyayokyaso rahanya”ka ---

kaြုံlālaျှငya suttanyakaျmya”lā mahāpadesa (4)pā”tiု’phaြင’ya naှိုငya”khaျိnya၍ phaြreှငya”chuṃ”phaြtyaramaññya． īmahā
padesa (4)pā”tiု’၌ ññīññhatyaso cakā”kiုsā amaှnyahū၍ maှtyayūrā၏， maññīññhatyaso cakā” phaြcyakhaဲ’
laျှငya cakā”raှငyarahanya”ka maññyamaျှpaငya naှုtyasaramya”၍ maြññyatamya”paြောchiုcekāmū amaှnyahū၍ mamaှtyayūra．
tacyabhakyapuggiုlyaka taငyapaြpaြောchiုlāso cakā”saññya mahāpadesa (4)pā”naှင’ya ññaှိnaှိုငya”၍ paြောchiု
lāso suttānuloma cakā”phaြcyakhaဲ’laျှငya thiုcakā”kiု suttakhoyaso piṭakapāḷitoyanaှင’ya ññīññhatyamaှsā
lakyakhaṃmaှtyayūrā၏． maññīññhatyalaျှငya mamaှtyayūra．
tacyaphanya tacyabhakyapuggiုlyaka kiု”kā” taငyapaြlāso pāḷisaññya “saṅgāyanātaငya pāḷi phaြcyapāsaññya”hu
paြောchiုcekāmū raှေ”phoyapaြpā tarā”vaငya saṅgāyanākaြီ” suṃ”rapya၌ taငyathā”apyasañña’ya ataññyapaြုthā”apyasañña’ya
pāḷitoyaphaြcyapāmaှsā pamāṇagaruale”paြု၍ maှtyayūrā၏． īsaṅgāyanāsuṃ”tanya၌ mataငyaapyasañña’ya suttanyamaျို”
phaြcyaka kaဲ’raဲ’apyasañña’ya suttasā phaြcya၍ amaှnyahu mamaှtyayūra． (dī-ṭṭha-2-157．)

yāti suttādīniye0 anugatabuddhiyā． attano paṭibhānanti attano e0 tassa atthassa vuttanayena

tacyaphanya bhurā”raှငya hokaြာ”thā”toyamūsañña’ya rupya (28)pā”， cityacetasikya nāmyatarā”tiု’kyiု sā0ka
maျာ”saññya raှု၍ maraniုငyahu akayya၍ asaငyayogīsūtoyakoငya”saññya paြောchiုlāsaññya phaြcyaṃ’， thiုcakā”kā”
bhurā”raှငya၏ dhammakiု adhammahu thaငyaraှာ”paြsakhaြငya”paငya phaြcya၏．
rupyatiု’maññyasaññya kalāpyakhoyasañña’ya rupyakalāpyaamaှုnyaanephaြင’yasā phaြcyariု”dhammatā raှိkaြ၏． yaငya”rupya
kalāpyaamaှုnyamaျာ”kiု dhātyakhhaဲniုငyapāmaှ rupyaparamatyasiု’ asiñāṇyachiုkyamaññya phaြcya၏． thiုrupyatarā”maျာ”kiု sā0ka
tiု’saññya raှု၍ maraniုငyahu ayūraှိkaြkhaြငya” phaြcya၏．
tacyaphanya nāmyatarā”tiု’saññya vīthimutyanaှင’ya vīthikhoyasañña’ya cittaniyāmalamya”kaြောငya”atiုငya”sā phaြcyariု”
dhammatā raှိkaြ၏． yaငya”cittaniyāma dhammatālamya”riု”atiုငya” phaြcyashā”kaြso nāmyatarā”tiု’saññya cittakkhaṇa
tiုငya”vayya cityanaှင’yacetasikyatiု’saññya thiုkyasaliု atūyaှñyathaဲ၍sā phaြcyariု”dhammatā raှိkaြ၏． maျkyaci tacyamaှိtya
182
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
laျှpyatacyapaြkya lakyaphaျcyatacyathakyahūso akhaျိnyakāla tacyakhuathaငya”၌ cittakkhaṇaakaြိmyapoငya” kuṭetacya
sinya”maka phaြcyapaြီ” paျkyaniုငya၏． yaငya”niyāmalamya”kaြောငya”atiုငya” alhanya laျငyalaျငyamaြnyamaြnya phaြcyapaြီ” paျkyaneso
bhavaငyacityanaှင’ya takhaso vīthicityatiု’kiုlaññya” sā0katiု’saññya raှု၍ maraniုငyahu ayūraှိkaြpaြnya၏．
yaငya”siု’ ayūraှိkaြso charātiု’၏ cakā”maှာ ---
“bhurā”raှငyasaññya sā0kamaျာ” raှု၍ maraniုငyasañña’ya rupyanāmyatiု’kiု hokaြာ”shā”toyamūsaññya”hu machiု
soyalaññya” chiုrārokyane၏． yaငya”charātiု’saññya thiုsiု’ mapaြောsoyalaññya” paြောrārokyane၏． dhammakiု
adhammahu paြkhaြငya”tacyamaျို”paငya phaြcya၏．
tacyaphanya bhurā”hosañña’ya rupya-nāmyamaျာ”kiု sā0katiု’saññya raှု၍ maraniုငyahu tacyaphakyaka lakyakhaṃ၍
“dīrupya-dīnāmyakiု dīliု raှုpā”hu bhurā”mahosañña’ya rupyanāmyamaျာ”kiု raှုphiု’ranya acā”thiု”၍ ññhaှnyakaြာ”lāpaြnya၏．
īññhaှnyakaြာ”khaျkyamaျာ”kā” adhammakiု dhammalupya၍ thaငyaraှာ”paြkhaြငya” tacyamaျို”paငya phaြcyasaññya．
tacyaphanya bhurā”raှငyasaññya athakyapā bodhipakkhiyatarā” (37)pā”tiု’thaငya maggaငya (8)pā”kiု thañña’yashaငya”၍
hokaြာ”thā”toyamūkhaဲ’၏． nibbānyasiု’ rokyakaြောငya” kaျင’yacañyahu satyamaှtyalaျkya maggaငya (8)pā” kaျင’yacañyatarā”
maျာ”kiု ññhaှnyakaြာ”toyamūkhaဲ’၏． thiုmaggaငya (8)pā”tiု’thaငya sammāsamādhimaggaငyalaññya” pāvaငyalaျkya raှိ၏． īhokaြာ”-
toyamūkhaျkya ññhaှnyakaြာ”toyamūkhaျkyatiု’kā” dhammapaငya phaြcya၏．
akayya၍ asaငyayogīsūtoyakoငya”saññya samādhi thūthoငyaphiု’ maliုpāhu paြောchiုlāsaññya phaြcyaṃ’，
thiုpaြောchiုkhaျkyakā” dhammakiု adhamma lupya၍ paြkhaြငya”paငya phaြcya၏．
bhurā”raှငyasaññya mahāsatipaṭṭhānasuttanya (dī-2-250-251．)thaငya pathamajhānyasamādhi， dutiyajhānyasamādhi，
tatiyajhānyasamādhi， catutthajhānyasamādhitiု’kiု sammāsamādhi khoyachiုkaြောငya” hokaြာ”thā”toya mūkhaဲ’၏．
(akaျyyakiု samādhithūthoငyasaင’yapuṃapiုငya”thaငya phoyapaြthā”pāsaññya．)
visuddhimaggaaṭṭhakathāthaငyalaññya” ----- cittavisuddhi nāma saupacārā aṭṭha samāpattiyo． (visuddhi-2-
222．) = upacārasamādhinaှင’yatakha samāpatya (8)pā”tiု’saññya cittavisuddhimaññyakaြောငya” phhaင’yachiုthā”toyamūkhaဲ’၏．
īhokaြာ”toyamūkhaျkya mina’yamaြhakyatoyamūkhaျkyatiု’kā” dhammapaငyaphaြcya၏． samādhithūthoငyaphiု’ maliုpāhu asaငya
yogīsūtoyakoငya”saññya paြောchiုlāငြာ”aṃ’ ， thiုpaြောchiုkhaျkyasaññyakā” dhammakiု adhammahu thaငyaraှာ”paြnekhaြငya”paငya
phaြcya၏．
tacyaphanya bhurā”raှငyasaññya mahāsatipaṭṭhānasuttanya (dī-2-239．)၌ dhammānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānyapiုငya”thaငya
khandhapabbahūso amaññyaphaြင’ya khandhā (5)pā”naññya”ā”phaြင’ya rupya-nāmya-kaြောငya”-kaျို” = saṅkhāratarā”cutiု’kiု vipassanā
raှုphā”suṃ”sapyaranya arahattaphiုlyapokya hokaြာ”thā”toyamū၏． īsaññyamaှာlaññya” satipaṭṭhānya (4)pā”thaငya
akaျုံ”vaငyalaျkyaraှိso dhammapaငya phaြcya၏． bhurā”raှငyasaññya le”saṅkhaျneှင’ya kambhātacyasinya” pāramī (10)pā” apaြာ”
(30)tiု’kiု phaြñña’yachaññya”pū”toyamūpaြီ”maှ raraှိlāsañña’ya sabbaññutañāṇyatoyamaြtyaphaြင’ya khhaဲkhaြာ”cityaphaြာ၍ hokaြာ”
thā”toyamūapyaso yaငya”khandhāငါ”pā” (= rupyanāmya) tarā”tiု’kiု sā0kamaျာ”saññya raှု၍ maraniုငyahu asaငya
yogā0carapuggiုlyasūmaြtyasaññya paြောchiုlāsaññya phaြcyaငြာ”aṃ’， “dāthehā cātarā”thepā”hu paြောchiုlā
saññya phaြcyaငြာ”aṃ’， thiုpaြောchiုkhaျkyasaññyalaññya” dhammakiု adhammahu thaငyaraှာ”paြnekhaြငya”paငya phaြcya၏．

koငya”so ñña tacyaññapiုငya” -- sāsanā’maṇḍiုငyakaြီ”maျာ”
akayya၍ asaငyayogīsūtoyakoငya”saññya “khandhā (5)pā” raှုkhakyasaññya cātarā”thesā phaြcyasaññya，
alupyacakhanya”၌kā” īsiု’sā raှုrapāsaññya” - hu paြောchiုlāငြာ”aṃ’， thiုpaြောchiုkhaျkyamaှာlaññya” adhammakiု dhammahu
thaငyaraှာ”paြlākhaြငya” tacyamaျို”sā phaြcya၏． akaြောငya”mū aluṃ”cuṃso upādānakkhandhā (5)pā” = rupyanāmyatarā”tiု’kiု
pariññāpaññā (3)khaျkyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ” masipāka saṃsarāvaṭyachaငya”raဲdukkhakaြီ” makunyachuṃ”niုငyakaြောငya”kiု aparijānana
suttanya (saṃ-2-249-250．) tiု’thaငya sabbaññusammāsambuddha bhurā”raှငyakiုyyatoyatiုငya hokaြာ”thā”toyamūsokaြောင’ya
phaြcya၏．
tacyaphanya anattalakkhaṇasuttanya casañña’ya thiုthiု teparivaṭṭadhamma desanātoyatiု’၌ atityakhandhā (5)pā”
anāgatyakhandhā (5)pā”tiု’kiုlaññya” vipassanāraှုphā”suṃ”sapyaranya bhurā”raှငyasaññya ññhaှnyakaြာ”thā”toyamūkhaဲ’၏． khandhavagga
saṃyutyapāḷitoya tacyalaျှောkyathaငyalaññya”koငya” thiုthiု nikāyyatiု’thaငyalaññya”koငya” akhhaင’yasaင’yasaliု akaြိmya
poငya” rāpoငya”maျာ”chā hokaြာ”thā”toyamūkhaဲ’၏， īsaññyamaှာlaññya” dhammapaငya phaြcya၏． akayya၍ asaငya
yogīsūtoyakoငya”saññya atitya anāgatyakiု vipassanā maraှုra maraှုkoငya”hu paြောchiုlāsaññya phaြcyaṃ’，
thiုpaြောchiုkhaျkyamaှာlaññya” dhammakiု adhammahu thaငyaraှာ”paြkhaြငya” tacyamaျို”paငya phaြcya၏．
vipassanāhūsaññya atitya anāgatya paccuppanya hūso kāla (3)pā”， ajjhatta bahiddha hūso santānya
naှcyapā” athaငya”၌ taññyaraှိso khandhā (5)pā” = rupyatarā” nāmyatarā”tiု’kiု -----
so kālena ajjhattaṃ sammasati， kālena bahiddhā， (abhi-ṭṭha-1-270．)
so kālena rūpaṃ sammasati， kālena arūpaṃ． (abhi-ṭṭha-1-271．)
hūso aṭṭhakathāmaျာ”၏ ññhaှnyakaြာ”thā”toyamūkhaျkyaatiုငya” -----
1． raṅkhā ajjhatta khandhā (5)pā”，
2． raṅkhā bahiddha khandhā (5)pā”，
3． raṅkhā rupyatarā”，
4． raṅkhā nāmyatarā”tiု’kiု --- kāla (3)pā”tiု’၌ ---
lakkhaṇāre”suṃ”tanya tacyalaှñña’yacītaငya၍ raှုphā”suṃ”sapyaraso lupyaငnya”khhaငyasā phaြcya၏． paññatya paramatya
makhhaဲbhaဲ， paññatya paramatya makhaဲbhaဲ paññatyaatuṃ”akhaဲmaျာ”kiု raှုkhaျငyasaliု raှုnesañña’ya lupyaငnya”khhaငyamaျို”kā” mahutyape．
tacyaphanya mahānidānasuttanya (dī-2-47-60．) ၌ bhurā”raှငyakiုyyatoyatiုငyaka kaြောငya”-kaျို”chakya paṭicca
samuppādya sabhotarā”tiု’kiု anubodhañāṇya paṭivedhañāṇya naှcyamaျို”tiု’phaြင’ya kiုyyatiုငyamaျkyamaှောkya thhaငya”phokya
masikhaြငya”kaြောင’ya saṃsarāvaṭyachaငya”raဲdukkhamaှ makaျောyalhaှာ” malhanyamaြောkyaniုငyakaြောငya” hokaြာ”thā”toyamūkhaဲ’၏．
aṭṭhakathākaြီ”maျာ”kalaññya” (visuddhi-2-221． abhi-ṭṭha-2-189．) “miု”kaြို”cakyavanya”kaဲ’siု’ sattavātiု’kiု
amaြဲmapaြtya saṃsarāvaṭyadukkha၌ mhaှneှောkyalaျkya ññaှñya”panya”naှိpyacakyatatyaso kaြောငya”-kaျို”chakya paṭiccasamuppādya
taññya”hūso saṃsarābha0cakyakiု samādhitaññya” hūso maြtyaso kaျောkyaphaြာthakya၌ maြmaြthakyaaောငya
she”thā”apyaso ñāṇyataññya”hūso sanyalaျkyaphaြင’ya maphokyakhhaဲniုငyabhaဲ saṃsarāvaṭyachaငya”raဲbhe”dukkhachiု”kaြီ”maှ
laှlaှkaြီ” kaျောyalhaှာ” lhanyamaြောkyashā”so tacyacuṃtacyayokyaso puggiုlyamaññyasaññya aိpyamakya၏ athaငya”၌
soyamaှlaññya”bhaဲ tacyaraṃtacyachacyamaျှ maraှိkhaဲ’caphū”pe”hu atiakaျ phhaင’yachiုlaျkyaraှိ၏． īhokaြာ”khaျkya phhaင’yachiုkhaျkya
tiု’saññyakā” dhammapaငya phaြcyakaြ၏．

nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
tacyaphanya atityabha0tacyakhuthaငya paြုcupaျို”thoငyakhaဲ’so avijjā，taṇaှာ， upādānya， saṅkhāra， kaṃ hūso
atityaakaြောငya”tarā” (5)pā”kaြောင’ya paccuppanyathaငya viññāṇya， nāmyarupya， saḷāyatana， phassa， vedanā hūso
paccuppanyaakaျို”tarā” (5)pā” thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyapuṅkiုlaññya”koငya”， paccuppanyathaငya paြုcupaျို”thoငyathā”so avijjā， taṇaှာ，
upādānya， saṅkhāra， kaṃ hūso paccuppanyaakaြောငya”tarā” (5)pā”kaြောင’ya noငyaanāgatyathaငya viññāṇya， nāmyarupya，

kaျို”chakya paṭiccasamuppādyasabhotarā”tiု’kiု kiုyyatiုငya sisaññya maññyapesaññya．
thiုthaငya atityaakaြောငya”tarā” (5)pā”tiု’hūsaññya atityakhandhā (5)pā”tiု’၏ acityaapiုငya” tacyakhumaျှsā
phaြcya၏， paccuppanyaakaျို”tarā” (5)pā”， paccuppanyaakaြောငya”tarā” (5)pā”tiု’hūsaññyamaှာlaññya” paccuppanyakhandhā (5)pā”tiု’၏
acityaapiုငya” tacyakhumaျှsāphaြcya၏． anāgatyaakaျို”tarā” (5)pā”tiု’hūsaññyamaှာlaññya” anāgatyakhandhā (5)pā”tiု’၏
acityaapiုငya” tacyakhumaျှsāphaြcya၏． siု’athakya kaြောငya”-kaျို”chakya paṭiccasamuppādyasabhotarā”hūsaññya atityaanāga
tya khandhātiု’naှင’ya kaငya”၍ phaြcyacakoငya”so sabhā0tacyakhukā” mahutyape． atitya-anāgatya khandhā
(5)pā”tiု’naှင’yalaññya” kaငya”၍ raှု၍ raniုငyasoarā mahutyape．
siု’athakya asaငya yogīsūtoyakoငya”saññya akayya၍ atitya-anāgatyakiု maraှုkoငya”pāhu
lakyakhaṃthā”sū phaြcyaငြာ”aṃ’， kaြောငya”-kaျို”chakya paṭiccasamuppādyasabhotarā”tiု’kiု kiုyyatiုငyamaျkyamaှောkya thhaငya”-
phokya simaြငyare”maှာ asaငya yogīsūtoyakoငya”athakya adhippāyyakaငya”maဲ’sañña’ya lupyaငnya”khhaငya tacyamaျို”sā
phaြcyanepemaññya． asaငyayogī၏ thiုlakyakhaṃthā”khaျkyasaññyalaññya” dhammakiု adhammahu thaငyaraှာ”paြnekhaြငya”paငya phaြcyapesaññya．
akayya၍ asaငyayogīsūtoyakoငya”saññya “ atitya-anāgatya khandhā (5)pā”tiု’kiု paccakkhañāṇyaphaြင’ya

thiုpaြောchiုkhaျkyamaှာlaññya” adhammakiု dhammahu thaငyaraှာ”paြnekhaြငya”paငya phaြcyapesaññya． akaြောငya”mū - ariyā sūtoyakoငya”

sotāpannānañca nāma paccayākāro uttānako0 huthā upaṭṭhāti． (dī-ṭṭha-2-83．)
athakyathaငyaphoyapaြkhaဲ’so aṅguttiုryapāḷitoya၌ (aṃ-1-18-19．) bhurā”raှငya hokaြာ”thā”toyamūsañña’ya
atiုငya” dhammakiု adhammahu thaငyaraှာ”paြkhaြငya”saññya sattavāapoငya”၏ chaငya”raဲdukkharokyaphiု’ranya acī”aphā”maဲ’ akhaျmya”-
sāmaဲ’phiု’ranya akaြောငya”laññya” phaြcya၍ bhurā”raှငya၏ achuṃ”ama sāsanātoyakiု khayyapaျောkyacesaññyalaññya”
maññyarakā” asaငya yogīsūtoyakoငya”saññyalaññya” sāsanātoyakiု phaျkyachī”sū maphaြcyaliုpāka maှnyakanyaso
dhammamaျာ”kiု maှnyakanyasodhammahusā thaငyaraှာ”paြranya maှnyakanyasodhammaatiုငya”sā kaျင’yaranya athū”liုapyapesaññya．
dhammakiု adhamma， adhammakiု dhamma paြုlupya၍ thaငyaraှာ”paြmiso kaျင’yamiso kassapabhurā”raှငya၏ sāsanātoyaka
kapilarahanya”၏ thuṃ”hoငya”kiု naှluṃ”mū၍ asaငyayogīsūtoyakoငya”saññyalaññya” mimi kaျင’yaneso
paṭipatyakaျင’yacañyasaññya mimi thaငyaraှာ”paြneso paṭipatyakaျင’yacañyasaññya vinaya (4)pā”naှင’ya ññīññhatyaso kaျင’yacañya
hutya၏ mahutya၏ hūso akhaျkyakiု athū”saphaြင’ya suttaamaññyaraso piṭakapāḷitoyanaှင’ya ññīññhatyaso

samādhithūthoငyasaင’yapuṃpiုငya”
chiုsaññya， paramāṇumaြူhu atiakaျ machiုpā． yaငya”kalāpyaamaှုnya tacyakhutacyakhu၌ pathavī-āpo-tejo-
vāyo-vaṇṇa-gandha-rasa-ojā hu rupyasabhotarā” (8)maျို” anaññya”chuṃ” pāvaငya၏．
akhaျို’rupyakalāpya၌ (9)maျို” akhaျို’rupyakalāpya၌ (10)maျို” casañña’ya rupyasabhotarā”maျာ” pāvaငyakaြ၏．
yaငya”rupyasabhotarā”maျာ”kā” paramatyaacacya rupyatiု’taññya”． yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya yaငya”paramattharupyaacacya
tiု’kiု maြငyaaောငya raှုramaññya phaြcyasaññya． thiုsiု’ maြငyaaောငya raှုniုငyare”athakya ----
1． raှေ”ū”chā rupyakalāpyakiု maြငyaaောငya raှုramaññya．
2． yaငya”rupyakalāpyamaျာ”kiု (8)maျို” (9)maျို” (10)maျို” caso rupyaparamatyasiု’ ñāṇyaamaြငyachiုkyaaောငya dhātyakhhaဲ
niုငyaramaññya， ñāṇyaphaြင’ya khhaဲkhaြာ”cityaphaြာ၍ raှုniုငyaramaññya．
thiုsiု’ rupyakalāpyamaျာ”kiု dhātyakhhaဲlaျkya paramatyasiု’ ñāṇyaamaြငya chiုkyaaောငya raှုniုငyapāmaှ rupya (28)pā”kiု
kunyacaငyaaောငya siraှိniုငyamaññya phaြcyasaññya．
mahāgopālakasuttanya - achiုtacyarapya
mūlapaṇṇāsapāḷitoya mahāgopālakasuttanya (ma-1-281-286．) thaငya --- “bhūtarupya dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”
naှင’ya thiုdhātyakaြီ”le”pā”kiု maှီthayya၍ phaြcyapoyaneso upādārupyahūso rupyatarā”ā”luṃ”kiု khaဲkhaဲpaြာ”paြာ”
masika rupyatarā”kiု masisaññya maññya၏． nhā”apoငya”kiု thinya”kaျောငya”neso nhā”kaျောငya”sā”saññya mimi
thinya”kaျောငya”neso nhā”apoငya”kiု bhayyanaှcyakoငyaraှိsaññyahu arethakyaā”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya”， nhā”phaြူ
bhayyanaှcyakoငya nhā”nī bhayyanaှcyakoငya casaññyaphaြင’ya aroငyaachaငya”ā”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya” hutyatiုငya”maှnyachā
masipāka thiုnhā”kaျောငya”sā”saññya nhā”apoငya”kiု thinya”kaျောငya”khaြငya”ငှာ mathiုkyatanyasakaဲ’siု’ thinya”kaျောငya”
soyalaññya” nhā”apoငya”၏ kaြီ”phā”tiု”takyamaှုkiု paြုlupyaranya machamya”niုငyasakaဲ’siု’ - īupamāatū īsāsanā
toya၌ yogā0cara rahanya”toyasaññya bhūtarupya upādārupya apaြာ”raှိso aluṃ”cuṃso rupyatarā”kiု ----
1． arethakyaā”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya”，
2． akaြောငya” samuṭṭhānyaā”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya” ---- khaဲkhaဲpaြာ”paြာ” masiraှိpāka magyañāṇya phiုlyañāṇya rasañña’ya
tiုငyaaောငya tiု”takyacaññyakā”kaြီ”phā”khaြငya” maphaြcyaniုငya - hu bhurā”raှငya hokaြာ”thā”toyamūkhaဲ’၏． yaငya”
mahāgopālakasuttanya aṭṭhakathākalaññya” ----
so gaṇanato (samuṭṭhānato) rūpaṃ ajānanto rūpaṃ pariggahethā arūpaṃ 0vatthapethā rūpārūpaṃ
pariggahethā paccayaṃ sallakkhethā lakkhaṇaṃ āropethā kammaṭṭhānaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetuṃ na sakkoti．
(ma-ṭṭha-2-163．)
= thiုyogā0cara rahanya”saññya ----
(1) arethakyaā”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya”，
(2) akaြောငya” samuṭṭhānyaā”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya” ----
rupyatarā”kiု masikhaဲ’saññyaraှိsoya ----
1． rupyatarā”kiု simya”chaññya”၍
2． nāmyatarā”kiု piုငya”khaြာ” maှtyasā”၍

nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
3． rupya + nāmya kiု simya”chaññya”၍
4． akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’kiုkoငya”chā piုငya”khaြာ”maှtyasā”၍
5． akaြောငya”tarā”naှင’yatakhaso thiု rupya-nāmya = saṅkhāra tarā”tiု’kiု lakkhaṇāyāñyasuṃ”khaျkyasiု’ taငya၍
vipassanābhā0nākammaṭṭhānya”kiု cī”phaြnya”phā”maျာ” ā”thutyalaျkya vipassanāñāṇyakiု magyañāṇya phiုlyañāṇya
hūso athhatyaathipyasiု’ rokyaceṃ’soငှာ machamya”niုငya - hu phhaင’yachiုre”sā”thā”pesaññya．
asaငyayogīsūtoyakoငya”saññya magyañāṇya phiုlyañāṇya nibbānyakiု liုlā”toင’yatalaျှငyakā” ībhurā”
ho desanātoyamaျာ”kiု ū”thipyarhakya panyachaငyaramaññyasā phaြcyasaññya．
thiုsiု’ rupyatarā”maျာ”kiု ----
1． rupya (28)pā” hūso arethakyaā”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya”，
2． (ka) maññyasañña’yarupyatarā”maျာ”ka kaṅkaြောင’ya phaြcyasaññya，
( kha ) maññyasañña’yarupyatarā”maျာ”ka cityakaြောင’ya phaြcyasaññya，
( ga ) maññyasañña’yarupyatarā”maျာ”ka utukaြောင’ya phaြcyasaññya，
(gha) maññyasañña’yarupyatarā”maျာ”ka āhārakaြောင’ya phaြcyasaññya，
( င ) maññyasañña’yarupyatarā”maျာ”ka maññyasañña’yaakaြောငya”tarā”kaြောင’yamaျှ maphaြcya ----
hūso phaြcyakaြောငya” samuṭṭhānyaā”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya” hutyatiုငya”maှnyachā siraှိniုငyare”maှာ rupyakalāpyatacyakhu
tacyakhu athaငya”၌ taññyaraှိso (8) maျို”， (9) maျို”， (10) maျို” caso rupyasabhotarā”maျာ”kiု tacyaluṃ”cī tacyaluṃ”
cī ñāṇyaphaြင’ya khhaဲkhaြာ”cityaphaြာ၍ raှုniုငyapāmaှsālaျှငya siniုငyasoarā phaြcyasaññya． rupyakalāpyamaျာ”kiု mamaြငyalaျှငyasoya
laññya”koငya”， maြငyasoyalaññya” rupyakalāpyamaျာ”kiု paramatyasiု’chiုkyaaောငya dhātyamakhhaဲtatyase”laျှငya = rupyakalāpya
tacyakhuathaငya”၌ taññyaraှိso rupyaparamatyatarā”tiု’kiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya khhaဲkhaြာ”cityaphaြာ၍ maraှုtatyase”laျှငyasoyalaññya”-
koငya” ----
(ka) maññyasañña’yarupyatarā”maျာ”ka kaṅkaြောင’ya phaြcyasaññya，
( kha ) maññyasañña’yarupyatarā”maျာ”ka cityakaြောင’ya phaြcyasaññya，
( ga ) maññyasañña’yarupyatarā”maျာ”ka utukaြောင’ya phaြcyasaññya，
(gha) maññyasañña’yarupyatarā”maျာ”ka āhārakaြောင’ya phaြcyasaññya，
( င ) maññyasañña’yarupyatarā”maျာ”ka maññyasañña’yaakaြောငya”tarā”kaြောင’yamaျှ maphaြcya - hu
khhaဲkhaြာ”cityaphaြာ၍ siraှိniုငyare”maှာ maññyasañña’yanaññya”naှင’yamaျှ maphaြcyaniုငyape．
rupyakalāpyamaျာ”kiု dhātyamakhhaဲniုငyase”pāka = rupyakalāpya tacyakhutacyakhu athaငya”၌ taññyaraှိso rupyaparamatya
sabhotarā”tiု’kiု tacyaluṃ”cī tacyaluṃ”cī ñāṇyaphaြင’ya khhaဲkhaြာ”cityaphaြာ၍ maraှုtatyase”pākalaññya” rupyaparamatya
nayyamaြseiု’laññya” maññyasañña’yanaññya”naှင’yamaျှ machiုkyarokyaniုငyase”pe． siု’athakya rupyakalāpyakiု maြငyare” rupyakalāpya
maျာ”kiု dhātyakhhaဲlaျkya rupyaparamatyanayyamaြseiု’chiုkyaaောငya raှုphā”niုငyare”athakya are”akaြီ”chuṃ” liုapyakhaျkyakā”
samādhipaငya phaြcyasaññya．
tacyaphanya nāmyatarā”maျာ”kiုlaññya” āyatanadhāraaliုkya simya”chaññya”ranya visuddhimaggaaṭṭhakathā (visuddhi-
2-223．)naှင’ya sammohavinodanīaṭṭhakathā (abhi-ṭṭha-2-241．)tiု’၌ ññhaှnyakaြာ”thā”toyamū၏． dhāra၏ achamya”phaြင’ya
191
samādhithūthoငyasaင’yapuṃpiုငya”
nāmyatarā”tiု’kiု simya”chaññya”khaြငya”saññya anākula = royaှkyaraှုpyathhe”khaြငya” kaငya”saññyahu naှluṃ”piုkya၍ aṭṭhakathā
charātoyamaျာ” mina’yachiုtoyamūkaြောငya”kiုlaññya” mahāṭīkā (mahāṭī-2-352．)၌ phhaင’yachiုthā”pesaññya．
buddhaabhidhammā၌ dhāraasuṃ” naှcyamaျို” raှိ၏． kāyadhāra， 0cīdhāra， manodhāra hūso dhāra (3)pā”kiု kammadhārahu
khoya၏． cakkhudhāra， sotadhāra， ghānadhāra， jivaှါdhāra， kāyadhāra， manodhāra hūso dhāra (6)pā”kiု
āyatanadhārahu khoyachiု၏． (mahāṭī-2-410．)
nāmyatarā”tiု’kiု simya”chaññya”rā၌ āyatanadhārahu khoyachiုso cakkhudhāravīthi sotadhāravīthi ghāna
dhāravīthi jivaှါdhāravīthi kāyadhāravīthi manodhāravīthihūso vīthicityaacañyaatiုငya” simya”chaññya”ramaññya phaြcyasaññya．
akaြောငya”mū cityatiု’၏ kinya”semaြဲso phaြcyariု”dhammatā niyāmalamya”kaြောငya”kā” yaငya” vīthikhoyasañña’ya citya
acañyamaျာ”paငya phaြcyasaññya．
vīthicityatiု’maññyasaññya vīthikhoyasañña’ya cittaniyāma lamya”kaြောငya”atiုငya”sā phaြcyariု”dhammatā raှိ၏． yaငya”
dhammatā lamya”kaြောငya”maှ lhaဲ၍ puṃcaṃpaြောငya”၍ phaြcyariု”dhammatā maraှိpe． yaငya”tiု’phaြcyanekaျ dhammatālamya”kaြောငya”
atiုငya”paငya liုkya၍ nāmyatarā”tiု’kiု simya”chaññya”raှုphā”rapesaññya． tacyaphanya yaငya” dhammatālamya”kaြောငya”atiုငya”
phaြcyapoyashā”so cityatiု’thaငya cittakkhaṇatiုငya” cittakkhaṇatiုငya”၌ cityacetasikyatiု’saññya yaှñyathaဲ၍ aုpyacu
aliုkya phaြcyakaြra၏． tacyaluṃ”khaျငya” phaြcyaniုငyasañña’ya chamya”ā” maraှိkaြpe．
anaññya”chuṃ” pamāṇaā”phaြင’ya asicitya-phassa-vedanā-saññā-cetanā-ekaggatā-jīvita-manasikāra
hūso (8)luṃ” poငya”capyamaှ phaြcyaniုငyasañña’ya chamya”ā” raှိpesaññya． yaငya”siု’ cittaniyāmalamya”kaြောငya”hu khoyachiု
apyaso vīthicityaacañyaatiုငya” phaြcyapoyashā”so nāmyatarā”tiု’kiု cittakkhaṇatiုငya”၌ tacyaluṃ”cī tacyaluṃ”cī
khhaဲkhaြာ”cityaphaြာ၍ raှုphā”suṃ”sapyaniုငyapāmaှ nāmyaparamatyanayyamaြseiု’ chiုkyamaññya phaြcyapesaññya． thiုsiု’ nāmyatarā”tiု’kiု
paramatyasiု’chiုkyaaောငya raှုphā”tatyare” raှုphā”niုငyare”athakya are”akaြီ”chuṃ”so liုapyakhaျkyakā” samādhipaငya
phaြcyasaññya．
««maှtyakhaျkya ---- ī၌ vīthimaှ alhatyaphaြcyaso vīthimutyacityatiု’kiု machiုliုpā， vīthicityatiု’kiုsā athū”
raññyaññhaှnya”၍ cittaniyāmakiု phoyapaြkhaြငya” phaြcyapāsaññya．»»
tacyaphanya yaငya” rupya-nāmyatarā”tiု’၏ akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’kiု hutyatiုငya”maှnyachā sire”maှာlaññya” samādhiraှိpāmaှ
siniုငyaso arāphaြcyasaññya． akaြောငya”tarā”naှင’yatakhaso thiုrupyanāmyatiု’kiု lakkhaṇāre”suṃ”tanyasiု’ taငya၍
vipassanābhā0nākammaṭṭhānya”kiု magyañāṇya phiုlyañāṇyahūso athhatyaathipyasiု’ rokyaaောငya cī”phaြnya”tatyare”
cī”phaြnya”niုငyare”maှာlaññya” samādhiraှိso sūtoyakoငya”tiု’၏ arāsā phaြcyapesaññya．
cittavisuddhimaှ diṭṭhivisuddhisiု’
tattha nāmarūpānaṃ yāthā0dassanaṃ diṭṭhivisuddhi nāma． (visuddhi-2-222．)
lakkhaṇa-rasa-paccupaṭṭhāna-padaṭṭhāna0sena nāmarūpapariggaho diṭṭhivisuddhi nāma． (abhidhammatthasaṅgaha．)
= nāmyarupyatiု’kiု paramatyasiု’ chiုkyaaောငya hutyatiုငya”maှnyachā simaြငyakhaြငya”saññya， lakkhaṇa-rasa-paccupaṭṭhānyapadaṭṭha
mnyatiု’၏ achamya”phaြင’ya nāmyatarā” rupyatarā”tiု’kiု simya”chaññya”khaြငya” ñāṇyaphaြင’yapiုငya”khaြာ”yūkhaြငya”saññyapaငya diṭṭhivisuddhi
maññyapesaññya． yaငya” diṭṭhivisuddhikiု paြñña’yacuṃceliုso yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya cittavisuddhinaှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃaောငya
192
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
kaြို”cā”ā”thutyaramaññya phaြcyasaññya．
cittavisuddhi nāma saupacārā aṭṭha samāpattiyo． (visuddhi-2-222．)
= upacārasamādhinaှင’ya takhaso lokījhānyasamāpatya (8)pā”tiု’saññya cittavisuddhimaññya၏hu phhaင’yachiုthā”
saphaြင’ya cittavisuddhinaှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃre”athakya upacārasamādhikiုsoyalaññya”koငya”， appanāsamādhi amaññyaraso
jhānyasamāpatya (8)maျို”tiု’thaငya tacyamaျို”maျို”kiုsoyalaññya”koငya”， (8)maျို”luṃ”kiုsoyalaññya”koငya” raraှိaောငya
kaြို”cā”ā”thutyaramaññya phaြcyapesaññya．
īsaññyatiု’kā” samādhithūthoငyasaင’yasaññya (= thūthoငyaramaññya) hūso bhurā”ho desanātoya
maျာ”naှင’ya aṭṭhakathāachiုamina’yatiု’taññya”．
khaṇikasamādhi
akhaျို’so yogā0carapuggiုlyathū” puggiုlyamhanya phaြcyatoyamūkaြkunyaso charāmaြtyatiု’kā” suddhavipassanā
yānikapuggiုlyasaññya samādhithūthoငyaphiု’ maliု， vipassanāsiု’ khaṇikasamādhinaှင’ya shā”၍laññya” raniုငyasaññyahu
ayū raှိtoyamūkaြ၏． visuddhimagya mahāṭīkācharātoya၏ cakā”kiု kiု”kā”၍ mina’yachiုtoyamūkaြkhaြငya” phaြcya၏．
siု’athakya ----
1． visuddhimagya mahāṭīkācharātoya၏ chiုliုraငya” khaṇikasamādhi，
2． suddhavipassanāyānika puggiုlya၏ khaṇikasamādhi，
3． vipassanāakhiုkya၌ raှိso khaṇikasamādhi ----
īsuṃ”maျို”so khaṇikasamādhitiု’၏ akaြောငya”kiု chakyalakya၍ raှငya”laငya”taငyapaြapyapāsaññya．
mahāṭīkācharātoya၏ achiု
samathayānikassa hi upacārappanāppabhedaṃ samādhiṃ， itarassa khaṇikasamādhiṃ， ubhayesampi vimokkha-
mukhattayaṃ vinā na kadācipi lokuttarādhigamo sambha0ti． (mahāṭī-1-15．)
īmahāṭīkā၏ chiုliုraငya”maှာ īsiု’ phaြcya၏．
1． samathayānikapuggiုlyaā” upacārasamādhi appanāsamādhihūso naှcyamaျို”so samādhinaှင’ya kaငya”၍
lokuttarātarā”thū”kiု raraှိkhaြငya”saññya tacyaraṃtacyachacyamaျှlaññya” maphaြcyasaင’yape．
2． suddhavipassanāyānikapuggiုlyaā” khaṇikasamādhinaှင’ya kaငya”၍ tacyaraṃtacyachacyamaျှlaññya” lokuttarā
tarā”thū” tarā”maြtyakiု raraှိkhaြငya”saññya maphaြcyasaင’yape．
3． samathayānikapuggiုlya suddhavipassanāyānikapuggiုlya naှcyamaျို”luṃ”tiု’ā”laññya” saṃsarāvaṭyachaငya”raဲdukkhamaှ
thhakyamaြောkyakaြောငya”phaြcyasañña’ya vimokkhamukha amaññyarasañña’ya aniccānupassanāñāṇya， dukkhānupassanāñāṇya，
anattānupassanāñāṇya suṃ”maျို”naှင’yakaငya”၍ tacyaraṃtacyachacyamaျှlaññya” lokuttarā tarā”thū” tarā”maြtya
kiု raraှိkhaြငya”saññya maphaြcyasaင’yape． īkā” chiုliုraငya”taññya”．
193
samādhithūthoငyasaင’yapuṃpiုငya”
mahāṭīkācharātoyasaññya visuddhimaggaaṭṭhakathā၌ akhaြteññyathā”so - sīle patiṭṭhāya naro

chiုliုraငya”maှာ īsiု’ phaြcya၏．
1． tihityapaṭisandhe ñāṇyapaññāmaျို”ce’raှိso lūsā”tacyaū”saññya siု’mahutya yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya -
2． sīlataññya”hūso maြေ၌ rapyataññya၍

4． paññā amaññyaraso vipassanāñāṇyakiုlaññya”koငya” phā”maျာ” ā”thutyarā၏．
5． kilesātiု’kiု pūpanyacetatya loငyakaျhamya”cetatyaso sammappadhānya luṃ’lavīriyaraှိso
6． saṅkhāratarā”tiု’kiု simya”chaññya”tatyaso sati， khaဲkhaဲpaြာ”paြာ” sitatyaso sampajañyañāṇya hūso

īkā” chiုliုraငya”taññya”．

yānikapuggiုlyaā” upacārasamādhi appanāsamādhihu naှcyamaျို”paြာ”so samādhikiု， suddhavipassanāyānikapuggiုlya
ā” khaṇikasamādhikiု， samathayānika suddhavipassanāyānikapuggiုlya naှcyamaျို”luṃ”tiု’ā”laññya” vimokkhamukha
amaññyarasañña’ya aniccānupassanāñāṇya dukkhānupassanāñāṇya anattānupassanāñāṇyahūso anupassanā

samathayānikalamya”
taṃ sampādetukāmena samathayānikena tā0 ṭhapethā ne0saññānāsaññāyatanaṃ avasesa-
rūpārūpā0carajjhānānaṃ aññatarato vuṭṭhāya vitakkādīni jhānaṅgāni taṃsampayuttā ca dhammā lakkhaṇarasādi-
0sena pariggahetabbā． pariggahethā sabbampetaṃ ārammaṇābhimukhaṃ namanato namanaṭṭhena nāmanti 0vatthapetabbaṃ．
tato yathā nāma puriso antogehe sappaṃ dishā taṃ anubandhamāno tassa āsayaṃ
passati， e0me0 ayampi yogā0caro taṃ nāmaṃ upaparikkhanto “idaṃ nāmaṃ kiṃ nissāya pavattatī”ti
pariyesamāno tassa nissayaṃ hadayarūpaṃ passati． tato hadayarūpassa nissayabhūtāni， bhūtanissitāni
ca sesupādāya rūpānīti rūpaṃ pariggaṇaှာti． so sabbampetaṃ ruppanato rūpanti 0vatthapeti．
tato namanalakkhaṇaṃ nāmaṃ， ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ rūpanti saṅkhepato nāmarūpaṃ 0vatthapeti． (visuddhi-2-222．)
= thiု diṭṭhivisuddhikiု paြñña’yacuṃceliုso samathayānikapuggiုlyasaññya raှေ”ū”chā ne0saññānāsaññāyatana
jhānyakiု thā”၍ kaြhaငya”so rūpā0carajhānya arūpā0carajhānyatiု’thaငya jhānyatacyapā”pā”kiု vaငyacā”၍ thiုjhānyamaှ
thapaြီ”laျှငya vitakyacaso jhānyaaṅgātiု’kiုlaññya”koငya”， thiုjhānyanaှင’ya yaှñyaso yaှñyaphakya citya+cetasikya

paṭibhāganimityacaso samathapaṭibhāganimityaāruṃbhakyasiု’ raှေ”raှုññhatyatatyasokaြောင’ya āruṃsiု’ ññhatyatatya

tiု’kiုlaññya”koငya”， bhūtarupya (= dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”)kiု maှီthayya၍ phaြcyanekaြkunyaso hadayavatthumaှ kaြhaငya”so

thiုsiု’ jhānyanāmyatarā”cutiု’naှင’ya takha yaငya”jhānya nāmyatarā”tiု’၏ maှီrā phaြcyaso bhūtarupya upādārupyatiု’kiု

suddhavipassanāyānikalamya”

kunyapaြီ”so thiုthiု dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”tiု’kiု simya”chaññya”kaြောငya” naññya”lamya”tiု’thaငya tacyanaññya”naññya”၏ achamya”phaြင’ya
akaျñya”naññya”ā”phaြင’yasoyalaññya”koငya”， akaျyyanaññya”ā”phaြင’yasoyalaññya”koငya” dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”tiု’kiု
simya”chaññya”ra၏． (visuddhi-2-222．)

ā”phaြင’ya samathayānikapuggiုlyaā”sālaျှငya aliုraှိapya၏． (ma-ṭī-1-369．)

satyamaှtyakhaျkyapaငya phaြcyasaññya． siု’soya samathayānika puggiုlyasaññyalaññya” rupyakammaṭṭhānya”kaca၍ simya”chaññya”liုka
