taññyaneniုငyaso pamāṇaraှိso alhanyaā”koငya”so pīti．
5． pharaṇāpīti = lephaြင’ya paြñña’yaneso sā”reိtyakaဲ’siု’， kaြီ”chāso relaျñyaphaြင’ya cī”chaငya”ne
so toငyavaှmya”kaဲ’siု’ tacyakiုyyaluṃ”siု’ paြna’yanaှံ’cima’yavaငya၍ taññyaneso pīti． (pītinaှင’ya
takhaso cityakaြောင’yaphaြcyaso mhanyamaြtyaso paṇītacittajarupyatiု’၏ tacyakiုyya
luṃ”siု’ paြna’yanaှံ’၍ taññyanemaှု phaြcyanemaှုkiု chiုliုsaññya．)
jhānyaaṅgā ငါ”pā”tiု’thaငya pāvaငyaso thiု ငါ”maျို”so pītisaññya citya cetasikyatiု’၏ ငြိmya”aေ”khaြငya” =
passaddhi၏ taññyarā nerāhūso kiုyyavanyakiု yūlaျkya raင’yakaျkyakhaြငya”siု’ rokyalatyasoya kāyapassaddhi
cittapassaddhitaññya”hūso cityacetasikyatiု’၏ ငြိmya”aေ”maှု (= passaddhi) naှcyamaျို”kiု paြñña’yacuṃceniုငya၏． passaddhi
saññya sukha၏ taññyarā nerāhūso kiုyyavanyakiု yūlaျkya raင’yakaျkyakhaြငya”siု’ rokyalatyasoya kāyikasukha
cetasikasukhahūso naှcyamaျို”so sukhakiု paြñña’yacuṃceniုငya၏． sukhasaññya samādhi၏ taññyarā nerāhūso
kiုyyavanyakiု yūlaျkya raင’yakaျkyakhaြငya”siု’ rokyalatyasoya khaṇikasamādhi upacārasamādhi appanāsamādhihūso
samādhi suṃ”maျို”kiု paြñña’yacuṃceniုငya၏． (visuddhi-1-140． abhi-ṭṭha-1-160．)
samathanayyathaငya parikammasamādhi upacārasamādhi appanāsamādhihū၍ samādhisuṃ”maျို”raှိrā upacārasamādhi၏
anī”၌ kapya၍ phaြcyale’raှိso parikammasamādhikiုpaငya khaṇikasamādhihū၍ athakyapā aṭṭhakathāka khoyavoya
suṃ”chaဲthā”pesaññya． īkā” samathanayyathaငya suṃ”naှုnya”thā”so khaṇikasamādhi phaြcyasaññya．
īaṭṭhakathā၏ asuṃ”anaှုnya”siု’ liုkya၍ ṭīkācharātoyakalaññya” suddhavipassanāyānikapuggiုlya၏
dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”kiု āruṃyū၍ thūthoငyathā”so athhatyaathipyasiု’ rokyaneso kāmā0carasamādhi
kiုlaññya” mukhaျā”phaြင’ya khaṇikasamādhihū၍paငya khoyavoyasuṃ”chaဲthā”pesaññya． dhātyakammaṭṭhānya”lamya”cañyamaှ thūthoငya
thā”so athhatyaathipyasiု’ rokyaneso kāmā0carasamādhiphaြcyaso yaငya”samādhikiုpaငya aṭṭhakathāka
upacārasamādhiacacyanaှင’ya achaင’yaatanya”khaျငya” tūññīso sabholakkhaṇā raှိsokaြောင’ya sadisūpacāraā”phaြင’ya
upacārasamādhihu khoyavoyasuṃ”chaဲthā”pesaññya． aṭṭhakathācakā”kā” upacā， ṭīkācakā”kā” mukhaျ - īsiု’
mukhaျnaှင’ya upacāsā khāhasaññya， chana’yakaျငyamaှုkā” maraှိhu maှtyapā． īkā” suddhavipassanāyānika puggiုlya၏
dhātyakammaṭṭhānya”lamya”maှ thūthoငyathā”so athhatyaathipyasiု’ rokyaneso kāmā0carasamādhikiု upacāra
samādhi khaṇikasamādhihu amaññya naှcyamaျို”phaြင’ya khoyavoyasuṃ”chaဲpuṃnaှင’ya chakyacapya၍ raှငya”laငya”taငyapaြkhaျkyataññya”．
alā”tūpaငya buddhānussati acaraှိso， kaြhaငya”kaျnyaso， upacārasamādhikiု rhakyachoငyape”niုငyaso
kammaṭṭhānya”tiု’thaငya tacyamaျို”maျို”so kammaṭṭhānya”phaြင’ya athhatyaathipyasiု’ rokyaaောငya thūthoငyathā”so kāmā-
0carasamādhikiုlaññya” mukhaျ-upacā naှcyamaျို” khhaဲ၍ khaṇikasamādhi upacārasamādhihu amaññyanaှcyamaျို”phaြင’ya khoyavoya
suṃ”chaဲniုငyakaြောငya”kiုlaññya” sabhopokyalerāsaññya． tacyaphanya chakyalakya၍ vipassanāpiုငya”၌ khoyavoyasuṃ”chaဲ
thā”so khaṇikasamādhiakaြောငya”kiု raှငya”laငya”taငyapaြapyapāsaññya．
201
samādhithūthoငyasaင’yapuṃpiုငya”
vipassanāpiုငya” - khaṇikasamādhi
1． rūpapariggaha = rupyatarā”kiု simya”chaññya”khaြငya” (= ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”yūkhaြငya”)，
2． arūpapariggaha = nāmyatarā”kiု simya”chaññya”khaြငya” (= ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”yūkhaြငya”)，
3． rūpārūpapariggaha = rupyanāmyakiု simya”chaññya”khaြငya” (= ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”yūkhaြငya”)，
4． paccayapariggaha = paccuppanya၌ akaြောငya”tarā” akaျို”tarā”tiု’kiု simya”chaññya”khaြငya” (= ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”
yūkhaြငya”)，
5． addhānapariggaha = atitya anāgatya၌laññya” akaြောငya”tarā” akaျို”tarā”tiု’kiု simya”chaññya”khaြငya”
(= ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”yūkhaြငya”) ----
īkā” pariggaha ငါ”maျို”taññya”． pariggaha-hūsaññya ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”yūkhaြငya” simya”chaññya”khaြငya”taññya”． ī
pariggahaငါ”maျို” tacyaphakyakamya”khapyaaောငya pokyarokyapaြñña’yacuṃneso yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññyasālaျှငya sammasana
ñāṇya caso vipassanāñāṇyamaျာ”kiု paြñña’yacuṃaောငya kaြို”cā”ā”thutyaranya (visuddhi-2-244．) casaññya၌ ññhaှnyakaြာ”
thā”pesaññya． akaြောငya”kā” īsiု’ phaြcya၏．
aniccādi0sena vividhehi ākārehi dhamme passatīti vipassanā． (abhi-ṭṭha-1-175．)
atitya anāgatya paccuppanyahūso kālasuṃ”pā”， ajjhatta bahiddhahūso santānyanaှcyapā”athaငya”၌ taññyaraှိ
kaြkunyaso rupyatarā” nāmyatarā” akaြောငya”tarā” akaျို”tarā”tiု’kā” vipassanāñāṇya၏ araှုkhaṃ āruṃ
paramatthatarā”tiု’ phaြcyakaြ၏． chiုငyarā chiုငyarā akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’ka aññīaññhatya poငya”cupaြုpaြငya၍ pe”pāmaှ
phaြcyapoyalākaြraso tarā”maျာ” phaြcyakhaြငya”kaြောင’ya saṅkhāratarā”tiု’hū၍laññya” khoyachiု၏． yaငya” saṅkhāratarā”
tiု’kā” saccādesanātoyanaññya”ara dukkhasaccātarā”naှင’ya samudayasaccātarā”cutiု’sā phaြcyakaြ၏．
yaငya”saṅkhāratarā”cutiု’၏ ----
1． phaြcyakhaြငya”-paျkyakhaြငya”sabhokiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyaaောငyakaြñña’ya၍ aniccahulaññya”koငya”，
2． phaြcyakhaြငya”-paျkyakhaြငya” daṇyakhaျkyaphaြင’ya amaြဲmapaြtya ññaှñya”panya”naှိpyacakyakhaṃramaှု sabhokiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyaaောငya
kaြñña’ya၍ dukkhahulaññya”koငya”，
3． mapaျkyacī”bhaဲ akaျိtyaakhaဲ akhiုငyaamā anaှcyasāraanephaြင’ya taññyanesañña’ya attamahutyasañña’yasabhokiု
ñāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyaaောငyakaြñña’ya၍ anattahulaññya”koငya” ----
īsiု’ casaññyatiု’၏ achamya”phaြင’ya athū”thū”so akhaြငya”arātiု’phaြင’ya saṅkhāratarā”tiု’kiု raှုtatyaso
ñāṇyapaññāsaññyasālaျှငya vipassanāhūso amaññyathū”kiု khaṃyūthiုkyasokaြောင’ya phaြcya၏．
siု’athakya vipassanācakhanya”hūso maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhicaso visuddhicakhanya”maျာ”siု’ takyalaှmya”liု
so yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya ----
1． nāmarūpaparicchedañāṇyahūso diṭṭhivisuddhi，
2． paccayapariggahañāṇyahūso kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhitiု’kiု paြñña’yacuṃpaြီ” phaြcyaramaññya． ñāṇyaamaြငya sana’yaraှငya”paြီ”
phaြcyaramaññya． akaြောငya”mūkā” yaငya”visuddhinaှcyapā”thaငya akaျုံ”vaငyaso rupya-nāmya-kaြောငya”-kaျို” = saṅkhāra
tarā”tiု’kiုpaငya lakkhaṇāyāñyasuṃ”khaျkya taငya၍ vipassanāraှုramaññya phaြcyasokaြောင’yataññya”．
202
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
thiုsiု’ vipassanāraှုrā၌ ----
1． raṅkhā ajjhatta khandhāငါ”pā”tiု’kiု，
2． raṅkhā bahiddha khandhāငါ”pā”tiု’kiု - thiုthaငyalaññya” ----
3． raṅkhā rupyatarā”tiု’kiု，
4． raṅkhā nāmyatarā”tiု’kiု ---- lakkhaṇāyāñyasuṃ”khaျkya tacyalaှñña’yacī taငya၍ vipassanāraှုramaññya phaြcyasaññya．
(abhi-ṭṭha-1-270-271． visuddhi-2-300．)
atitya၌laññya” naññya”tū anāgatya၌laññya” naññya”tū raှုramaññya phaြcyasaññya． tacyaphanya paṭiccasamuppādya aṅgārapya
tiု’kiုlaññya” vipassanāraှုranya sammasanañāṇyapiုငya” (visuddhi-2-244．)， udayabbayañāṇyapiုငya” (visuddhi-2-265．)
casaññyatiု’၌laññya” ññhaှnyakaြာ”thā”၏．
siု’athakya vipassanāhūsaññya kālasuṃ”pā” santānyanaှcyapā” athaငya”၌ taññyaraှိso rupyatarā” nāmyatarā”
akaြောငya”tarā” akaျို”tarā”tiု’kiု ajjhattatacyalaှñña’ya bahiddhatacyalaှñña’ya rupyatacyalaှñña’ya nāmyatacyalaှñña’ya akaြောငya”
tacyalaှñña’ya akaျို”tacyalaှñña’ya laှñña’yalaññya၍ lakkhaṇāre”suṃ”tanyathaငyalaññya” aniccatacyalaှñña’ya dukkhatacyalaှñña’ya
anattatacyalaှñña’ya tacyalaှñña’yacītaငya၍ raှုphā”neraso lupyaငnya”rapya phaြcyasaphaြင’ya thiုvipassanāñāṇyanaှင’ya yaှñyathaဲlaျkya
raှိso samādhikiုlaññya” (samathapiုငya”၌kaဲ’siု’ samathanimityaāruṃtacyakhutaññya”poya၌ cū”cū”ciုkyaciုkya taññyaneso
samādhimaျို” mahutyasaphaြင’ya) khaṇikasamādhihū၍ khoyachiုkhaြငya” phaြcyasaññya．
siု’soya yaငya”siု’ canacyatakaျ vipassanāraှုniုငyare”maှာ mukhaျā”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya” upacāraā”phaြင’yalaññya”-
koငya” upacārasamādhi amaññyaraso kāmā0carasamādhikiုlaññya”koငya”， appanāsamādhi amaññyaraso
rūpā0carasamādhi arūpā0carasamādhi tacyamaျို”maျို”kiုsoyalaññya”koငya” vipassanā၏ akhaြpodakapaြု၍ kāla
suṃ”pā” santānyanaှcyapā”athaငya”၌ taññyaraှိso rupyatarā” nāmyatarā” akaြောငya”tarā” akaျို”tarā”tiု’kiု lakkhaṇa
-rasa-paccupaṭṭhānya-padaṭṭhānyaā”phaြင’ya nerātakaျ simya”chaññya”thā”niုငyaso simya”chaññya”thā”paြီ”so ñāṇyaphaြင’ya
piုငya”khaြာ”yūthā”paြီ”so akhaျိnyamarhe” lhayyakūchā simya”chaññya”niုငyaso yogā0carapuggiုlyatiု’၏ arāsā phaြcyape
saññya． yaငya”tarā”tiု’kiု masimya”chaññya”niုငyase”so yogā0carapuggiုlyatiု’၏ arākā” mahutyape．
siု’athakya upacārasamādhi appanāsamādhi tacyakhukhukiု vipassanā၏ akhaြpodaka paြု၍ kālasuṃ”pā”
santānyanaှcyapā” athaငya”၌ taññyaraှိso rupya-nāmya-kaြောငya”-kaျို” = saṅkhāratarā”tiု’kiု lakkhaṇāre” suṃ”tanya
tacyalaှñña’yacītaငya၍ thaငyathaငyakaြီ” vipassanāraှုneso yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ santānya၌ phaြcyapoyaneso vipassanā
ñāṇyanaှင’ya yaှñyathaဲlaျkyaraှိso samādhikiုsālaျှငya vipassanāakhiုkya၌ khaṇikasamādhihū၍ khoyachiုsaññya maှtyapā．
rupyakalāpya nāmyakalāpyakiုlaññya” mamaြငyase”， rupyakalāpya nāmyakalāpyakiုlaññya” paramatyasiု’ chiုkyaaောငya
tacyaluṃ”cī tacyaluṃ”cī ñāṇyaphaြင’ya khhaဲkhaြာ”cityaphaြာ၍ maraှုtatyase” maraှုniုငyase” dhātyamakhhaဲtatyase”， kālasuṃ”pā”၌
akaြောငya”tarā”achakyachakya akaျို”tarā”achakyachakyakiု masimya”chaññya”tatyase” maraှုtatyase”saphaြင’ya
paramatyaacacya phaြcyaso rupyatarā” nāmyatarā” akaြောငya”tarā” akaျို”tarā”tiု’kiု lakkhaṇāre”suṃ”tanyataငya၍
vipassanā maraှုniုငyase”so yogā0carapuggiုlya၏santānya၌ phaြcyapoyaneso samādhimaျို”kiု vipassanānayyapayya၌
khaṇikasamādhihū၍ makhoyachiုthiုkyase”saññyakiုkā” chaဲmaြဲchā satipaြု၍ maှtyasā”lerāsaññya．
ī athakyapā khaṇikasamādhi ayūachanaှင’ya patyasakya၍ bhavaငya makaျniုငyase” phaြcyakhaဲ’pālaျှငya aောkyapā
pāḷitoya-aṭṭhakathā-ṭīkā achiုamina’yatiု’kiု chakyalakya၍ phatyaraှုpā．
203
samādhithūthoငyasaင’yapuṃpiုငya”
khaṇikacittekaggatā-samādhi
samādahaṃ cittaṃ assasissāmīti sikkhati， samādahaṃ cittaṃ passasissāmīti sikkhati．
(saṃ-3-279． vi-1-88． ma-3-125．)
samādahaṃ cittanti paṭhamajjhānādi0sena ārammaṇe cittaṃ samaṃ ādahanto samaṃ ṭhapento tāni vā
pana jhānāni samāpajjithā vuṭṭhāya jhānasampayuttaṃ cittaṃ khayato 0yato sampassato vipassanākkhaṇe
lakkhaṇapaṭivedhena uppajjati khaṇikacittekaggatā． evaṃ uppannāya khaṇikacittekaggatāya 0senapi ārammaṇe
cittaṃ samaṃ ādahanto samaṃ ṭhapento “samādahaṃ cittaṃ assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhatī”ti
vuccati． (visuddhi-1-281．)
khaṇikacittekaggatāti khaṇamattaṭṭhitiko samādhi． sopi hi ārammaṇe nirantaraṃ ekākārena
pavattamāno paṭipakkhena anabhibhūto appito viya cittaṃ niccalaṃ ṭhapeti． (mahāṭī-1-342．)
ī athakyapā pāḷitoya-aṭṭhakathā-ṭīkātiု’၏ chiုliုraငya”maှာ īsiု’ phaြcya၏．
bhurā”raှငyasaññya ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya” raှုphā”puṅkiု catukkale”maျို”tiု’phaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”၍ (16)maျို”so akhaြငya”
arātiု’phaြင’ya phā”maျာ”ā”thutyapuṃ naññya”canacyamaျာ”kiု uparipaṇṇāsapāḷitoya ānāpānassatisuttanyacaso thiုthiု
suttanyatiု’၌ arahattaphiုlyapokya hokaြာ”thā”toyamūkhaဲ’၏． thiုthaငya ----
1． pathamacatukkakiု kāyānupassanā၏ achamya”phaြင’ya hokaြာ”thā”toyamū၏．
tacyaphanya ānāpānajhānyakiု raraှိpaြီ”so yogā0carasūtoyacaငya puggiုlyaathakya ----
2． dutiyacatukkakiု vedanānupassanā၏ achamya”phaြင’ya，
3． tatiyacatukkakiု cittānupassanā၏ achamya”phaြင’ya，
4． catutthacatukkakiု dhammānupassanā၏ achamya”phaြင’ya ----
asī”asī” khhaဲkhaြmya”vephanya၍ hokaြာ”thā”toyamū၏． (visuddhi-1-269．)
(akaျyyakā” īkaျmya”cā၏ nokyapiုငya”thaငya thaငyaraှာ”lattaṃ’．)
thiုthaငya cittānupassanā၏achamya”phaြင’ya hokaြာ”thā”toyamūapyaso tatiyacatukkathaငya akaျုံ”vaငyaso
tatiyamaြောkya ññhaှnyakaြာ”khaျkyamaှာ īsiု’ phaြcya၏．
“samādahaṃ cittaṃ assasissāmī”ti sikkhati，
“samādahaṃ cittaṃ passasissāmī”ti sikkhati． (ma-3-125．)
= “āruṃ၌ cityakiု aññīaññhatya koငya”chā raှေ”raှုthā”laျkya vaငyasakyalekiု phaြcyaceṃ’”hu kaျင’ya၏．
(kaျင’yapā．)
“āruṃ၌ cityakiု aññīaññhatya koငya”chā raှေ”raှု thā”laျkya thhakyasakyalekiု phaြcyaceṃ’”hu kaျင’ya၏．
(kaျင’yapā．) (ma-3-125．)
ī athakyapā bhurā”raှငya၏ ññhaှnyakaြာ”toyamūkhaျkyavayya āruṃ၌ cityakiု aññīaññhatya koငya”chā raှေ”raှု

kaျင’yane၏”hū၍ khoyachiုapyapesaññya．
khaṇikacittekaggatā - hūsaññya khaṇamaျှ taññyakhaြငya”sabhoraှိso vipassanāñāṇyanaှင’ya yaှñyathaဲlaျkya

sabbopi panesa pabhedo manodhārikaja0neye0 labbhati． (abhi-ṭṭha-2-308．)
īathakyapā sammohavinodanīaṭṭhakathā achiုamina’yaara vipassanāñāṇyahūsaññyamaှာlaññya” puthujanya
sekkhatiု’aphiု’ mahākusiုlya kāmā0cara manodhārikajovīthi cityaacañyasā phaြcyasaphaြင’ya yaငya” vipassanā
ñāṇyanaှင’yayaှñyaso samādhimaှာlaññya” kāmā0carasamādhipaငya phaြcya၏． thiုsamādhisaññyalaññya” saṅkhāraāruṃ၌ akhaြာ”
maraှိ raှေ”samādhinaှင’ya nokyasamādhi chakyacapyalaျkya aniccaakhaြငya”arāā”phaြင’ya phaြcyace， dukkhaakhaြငya”arāā”phaြင’ya
phaြcyace， anattaakhaြငya”arāā”phaြင’ya phaြcyace tacyamaျို”maျို”so akhaြငya”arāā”phaြင’ya achakyamapaြtya chakyatiုkya
phaြcyanelatyasoya chana’yakaျငyabhakya nī0raṇatarā”tiု’ka malhaှmya”miု”niုငya， maphicī”niုငya， malhaှmya”miု”apya maphicī”apyasaññya
phaြcya၍ saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏ aniccaakhaြငya”arā siု’mahutya dukkhaakhaြငya”arā siု’mahutya anattaakhaြငya”arāhūso
āruṃ၌ raှေ”raှုtaငyathā”bhisakaဲ’siု’ vipassanābhā0nācityasaññya tunyalaှုpyamaှု maraှိbhaဲ chaဲmaြဲchā taññyanepesaññya．
thiု’kaြောင’ya yaငya”samādhimaျို”kiု khaṇikacittekaggatāsamādhi siု’mahutya khaṇikasamādhihū၍ khoyachiုkhaြငya” phaြcyape
saññya． īkā” athakyapā pāḷitoya-aṭṭhakathā-ṭīkātiု’၏ chiုliုraငya”taññya”．
īathakyapā aṭṭhakathā ṭīkātiု’၌ vipassanā၏ akhaြpodakaphaြcyaso jhānyakiု vaငyacā”၍ thiုjhānyamaှtha၍
thiုjhānyaathaငya”၌ taññyaraှိso saṅkhāratarā”tiု’kiု lakkhaṇāyāñya suṃ”khaျkya tacyalaှñña’yacī taငya၍ raှုphā”suṃ”sapya
neso vipassanāakhiုkya၌ taññyaraှိso samādhikiုsālaျှငya khaṇikacittekaggatāsamādhi (= khaṇikasamādhi)
hu khoyachiုthā”saññyakiု satipaြု၍ maှtyasā”thā”pā． appanājhānyacitya phaြcyakhiုkyakiုsā appanāsamādhihu khoyachiု
niုငya၏． appanājhānyanaှင’ya kapyalaျkyaraှိso samādhikiုsā upacārasamādhihu mukhaျā”phaြင’ya khoyachiုniုငya၏． jhānyamaှ
tha၍ jhānyanāmyatarā”tiု’kiု vipassanāraှုkhiုkya၌kā” mūla ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityakiု āruṃpaြုsaññya mahutya，
ānāpānajhānya nāmyatarā”tiု’၏ anicca dukkha anattaakhaြငya”arā tacyamaျို”maျို”kiုsā āruṃpaြုnesaphaြင’ya appanā
samādhi upacārasamādhihu makhoyachiုniုငyabhaဲ khaṇikasamādhihū၍ khoyachiုkhaြငya” phaြcyapesaññya． tacyaphanya bhurā”raှငyasaññya
ānāpānacatutthacatukka၌ ----
aniccānupassī assasissāmīti sikkhati， aniccānupassī passasissāmīti sikkhati．
(saṃ-3-279． vi-1-88． ma-3-125．)
aniccahu aphanyaphanya raှု၍ vaငyale-thhakyalekiု phaြcyaaောငya kaျင’yaranya ññhaှnyakaြာ”thā”toyamū၏． thiုthaငya
aniccahu raှုramañña’yatarā”maျာ”kiု īsiု’ phhaင’yachiုthā”toyamū၏． ----
anicca nti pañcakkhandhā． (visuddhi-1-281． abhi-ṭṭha-2-47．)
tattha aniccassa， aniccanti vā anupassanā aniccānupassanā． tebhūmakadhammānaṃ aniccataṃ gahethā
pavattāya vipassanāya etaṃ nāmaṃ． (mahāṭī-1-343．)
aniccahūsaññya kāma-rūpa-arūpa hūso bhuṃsuṃ”pā”athaငya”၌ taññyaraှိso upādānakkhandhāငါ”pā”tiု’ phaြcya
kaြောငya”kiု phhaင’yachiုthā”toyamū၏． siု’athakya pakiṇṇakasaṅkhāra amaññyaraso bhuṃsuṃ”pā”athaငya”raှိ saṅkhāra

tarā”tiု’kiု vipassanā raှုkhiုkya၌ thiုsaṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏ aniccaakhaြငya”arā dukkhaakhaြငya”arā anattaakhaြငya”
arā၌ koငya”chā taññyaneso samādhikiုlaññya” khaṇikasamādhihū၍paငya khoyachiုniုငyapesaññya． appanājhānya
kiု vaငyacā”nesaññya mahutyakhaြငya”kaြောင’ya upacārasamādhi appanāsamādhihū၍kā” makhoyachiုniုငyape．
««pakiṇṇakasaṅkhāreti pādakajjhānato aññasaṅkhāre． tena pādakajjhānasakhāresu sammasitesu
vattabbame0 natthīti dasseti． (mūlaṭī-1-116．)
pakiṇṇakasaṅkhāra (= paြို”paြhamya”so saṅkhāra) hūsaññya vipassanā၏ akhaြpodaka phaြcyaso (ānāpāna
jhānyakaဲ’siု’so) jhānyamaှtacyapā”so akhaြာ”saṅkhāratarā”tiု’taññya”． vipassanā၏ akhaြpodaka phaြcyaso
(ānāpānajhānyakaဲ’siု’so) jhānyasaṅkhāratarā”tiု’၌ vipassanā raှုphā”suṃ”sapyakhaြငya”tiု’၌ chiုphhayyarāpaငya maraှိhu
paြ၏． (mūlaṭī-1-116．)»»
alā”tūpaငya mukhaျā”phaြင’ya phaြcyace， sadisūpacāraā”phaြင’ya phaြcyace upacārasamādhi amaññyaraso athhatya
athipyasiု’ rokyaneso kāmā0carasamādhisaññyalaññya” cittavisuddhimaññyakaြောငya” (visuddhi-2-222)thaငya phhaင’yachiု
thā”saphaြင’ya yaငya” upacārasamādhikiု vipassanā၏ akhaြpodakaaphaြcya thūthoငya၍ thiုsamādhimaှ thalaျkya rupyanāmya-
kaြောငya”-kaျို” = saṅkhāratarā”tiု’kiု simya”chaññya”paြီ”laျှငya yaငya”saṅkhāratarā”tiု’kiု lakkhaṇāyāñya suṃ”khaျkya
tacyalaှñña’yacī taငya၍ vipassanā raှုphā”suṃ”sapyakhiုkya yaငya”vipassanāñāṇyanaှင’ya yaှñyathaဲlaျkyaraှိso samādhikiုlaññya”
khaṇikacittekaggatāsamādhi = khaṇikasamādhihū၍paငya khoyachiုniုငyapesaññya． athakyathaငya phoyapaြkhaဲ’so (mahāṭī
-1-15．) achiုamina’yakiု thokyapā． īkā” vipassanāakhiုkya၌ maññyasañña’yasamādhikiု khaṇikasamādhihu
khoyachiုkaြောငya” raှငya”laငya”khaျkyamaျာ”taññya”．
liုraငya”akhaျုpya maှtyasā”ranya
1． samathapiုငya”၌ suddhavipassanāyānika puggiုlya၏ dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”kiု āruṃyū၍ thūthoငyathā”so
athhatyaathipyasiု’ rokyaneso kāmā0carasamādhikiုlaññya” sadisūpacāraā”phaြင’ya upacārasamādhi
mukhaျā”phaြင’ya khaṇikasamādhihū၍ khoyachiုsaññyahu maှtyapā． (visuddhi-1-140 - achiုamina’yakiု thokyapā，，)
alā”tūpaငya buddhānussati acaraှိso upacārakammaṭṭhānya” tacyakhukhukiု akhaြkheṃ၍ thūthoငyathā”so
athhatyaathipyasiု’ rokyaneso kāmā0carasamādhikiုlaññya” sadisūpacāraā”phaြင’ya upacārasamādhi，
mukhaျā”phaြင’ya khaṇikasamādhihū၍ khoyachiုsaññyahu maှtyapā．
2． vipassanāpiုငya”၌ suddhavipassanāyānikapuggiုlya၏ sadisūpacāraā”phaြင’ya upacārasamādhi amaññyaraso
samādhikiု vipassanā၏ akhaြpodakapaြု၍ thiုsamādhikiု siု’mahutya thiုupacārajhānyakiု vaငyacā”၍ thiုsamādhi
maှ siု’mahutya thiုupacārajhānyamaှ tha၍ saṅkhāratarā”tiု’kiု vipassanāraှုkhiုkya thiုsaṅkhāraāruṃpoya၌ kaျrokya
laျkyaraှိso vipassanāñāṇyanaှင’ya yaှñyathaဲlaျkyaraှိso samādhikiုlaññya” khaṇikasamādhihū၍khoyachiုsaññya
maှtyapā．
3． tacyaphanya samathapiုငya”၌ samathayānikapuggiုlya၏ upacārasamādhinaှင’ya nī”kapyalaျkyaraှိso raင’yakaျkyaneso
parikammasamādhikiုlaññya” khaṇikasamādhihū၍ khoyachiုsaññya maှtyapā．
4． tacyaphanya vipassanāpiုငya”၌ samathayānikapuggiုlya၏ upacārasamādhi appanāsamādhitiု’thaငya tacyamaျို”maျို”so
samādhikiု vipassanā၏ akhaြpodakapaြု၍ thiုupacārajhānya siု’mahutya appanājhānyakiု vaငyacā”၍ thiုjhānyamaှ

1． vipassanā၏ akhaြpodaka phaြcyaniုငyaso sadisūpacāraā”phaြင’ya phaြcyace mukhaျā”phaြင’ya phaြcyace upacārasamādhi

laññya”koငya” - ī upacārasamādhi appanāsamādhi hūso naှcyamaျို”so samādhitiု’thaငya tacyamaျို”maျို”so
samādhikiုlaññya” mathūthoငyabhaဲ mararaှိse”bhaဲ ----
2． rupyakalāpya nāmyakalāpyakiုlaññya” mamaြငyase”bhaဲ maြငyasoyalaññya” rupyakalāpya nāmyakalāpyakiု dhātyamakhhaဲniုငya
se”saphaြင’ya rupyaparamatyaacacya nāmyaparamatyaacacyakiုlaññya” masise”bhaဲ ----
3． atitya anāgatya paccuppanyahūso kālasuṃ”pā”luṃ”၌ akaြောငya”tarā”-akaျို”tarā”tiု’kiု masimya”chaññya”
niုငyase”bhaဲ = rupya-nāmya paramatyatarā”tiု’၏ kālasuṃ”pā”athaငya”၌ kaြောငya”-kaျို”chakyanhayyalaျkya phaြcyanemaှု
kaြောငya”-kaျို”-chakya = paṭiccasamuppādyasabhotarā”kiုlaññya” kiုyyatiုငyamaျkyamaှောkya thhaငya”phokya simaြငya
aောငya maraှုtatyase”bhaဲ maraှုniုငyase”bhaဲ ----
masimaှုthe tacyapuṅkaြီ” thamya”၍ kammaṭṭhānya”kaျောငya”athaငya”siု’ vaငyarokyalaျkya thiုငyaneso yogā0cara
puggiုlya၏ santānya၌ thiုငyalaျှငyathiုငyakhaျငya” khaျkyakhaျငya” khaṇikasamādhi maphaြcyaniုငyase”saññyakiုkā” nibbānyakiု acacyaamaှnya
liုlā”toင’yatalaျkyaraှိso asaငyayogīsūtoyakoငya”saññya sabhopokyalerāsaññya， lakyakhaṃlerā
saññya． akaြောငya”mū samathapiုငya”thaငyalaññya” khaṇikasamādhi phaြcyaniုငyalokyasañña’ya samathanimityatacyakhukhukiု naññya”maှnya
lamya”maှnya desanātoyamaျñya”kaြောငya”atiုငya” matimya”macoငya”bhaဲ naှluṃ”shaငya”raှုphā”niုငyapāmaှ， vipassanāpiုငya”thaငyalaññya”
paramatyaacacya phaြcyaso ghana asī”asī” paြိုneso saṅkhāranimitya amaññyaraso rupya-nāmya-kaြောငya”-kaျို”-
saṅkhāratarā”tiု’kiု lakkhaṇāyāñyasuṃ”khaျkya tacyalaှñña’yacītaငya၍ thaငyathaငyakaြီ” naှluṃ”shaငya”niုငya vipassanāraှုphā”suṃ”
sapyaniုငyapāmaှ khaṇikasamādhi phaြcyapoyalāniုငyasokaြောင’yaphaြcyasaññya． akayya၍ asaငyayogīsūtoyakoငya”
saññya samādhithūthoငyamaှုkiု cakyachupyanese”laျှငya aောkyapā lakkhaṇāre”suṃ”tanya akaြောငya”kiု chakyalakya၍
phatyaraှုkaြñña’yapā．
lakkhaṇāre” suṃ”tanya
eko ādito0 aniccato saṅkhāre sammasati． yasmā pana na aniccato sammasanamattene0
vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti， dukkhatopi anattatopi sammasitabbame0， tasmā dukkhatopi anattatopi sammasati．
tassevaṃ paṭipannassa aniccato sammasanakāle vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti， ayaṃ aniccato abhinivisithā aniccato
vuṭṭhāti nāma．
sace panassa dukkhato anattato sammasanakāle vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti， ayaṃ aniccato abhinivisithā
dukkhato anattato vuṭṭhāti nāma． esa nayo dukkhato anattato abhinivisithā sesa-
vuṭṭhānesupi． (visuddhi-2-301．)

nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
= tacyaū”so yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya vipassanākiု raှေ”ū”chā ā”thutyakhāca၌maှာpaငya dukkhasaccā samudaya
saccā amaññyarasañña’ya rupya-nāmya-kaြောငya”-kaျို” = saṅkhāratarā”tiု’kiု yaငya”saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏ phaြcyamaှု-paျkyamaှု udaya
0ya sabhokiုlaññya”koငya”， yaငya”saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏ kunyakunyapaျkyapaျkyanesañña’ya khaya-0ya sabhokiု
laññya”koငya” ñāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyaaောငyakaြñña’ya၍ aniccahu suṃ”sapyaraှုphā”၏． siု’soya aniccahu suṃ”sapya raှုphā”neruṃ
sakyasakyamaျှphaြင’yakā” vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāsaññya siု’mahutya vuṭṭhānaamaññyaraso ariyamagyañāṇyasaññya maphaြcya
poyaniုငya． thiုsaṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏ phaြcyakhaြငya”-paျkyakhaြငya” daṇyakhaျkyaphaြင’ya amaြဲmapaြtya ññaှñya”panya”naှိpyacakyakhaṃramaှုsabhokiု
laññya”koငya”， thiုsaṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏ paြိုpaြိုpaျkyapaျkyanesaphaြင’ya kaြောkyalana’yaphhayyakoငya”sañña’ya anakyasabhokiု
laññya”koငya” ñāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyaaောငyakaြñña’ya၍ dukkhahulaññya”koငya”， thiုsaṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏ mapaျkyacī”bhaဲ akaျိtyaakhaဲ
akhiုငyaamā anaှcyasāraā”phaြင’ya taññyanesañña’ya attamahutyasañña’yasabhokiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyaaောငyakaြñña’ya၍
anattahulaññya”koငya” suṃ”sapyaraှုphā”၏． īsiု’ kaျင’yaneso yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ santānya၌ aniccahu raှုphā”
suṃ”sapyakhiုkya၌ vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāsaññya siု’mahutya vuṭṭhāna amaññyaraso ariyamagyañāṇyasaññya phaြcyapoyalā
ငြာ”aṃ’， īyogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya aniccahu saṅkhāratarā”tiု’kiု cataငyanaှluṃ”shaငya”raှုphā”၍ aniccaā”phaြင’ya saṅkhāra
tarā”tiု’maှ thasaññya maññya၏．
nokyatacyamaျို”kā” thiုyogā0carapuggiုlya၏santānyavayya akayya၍ dukkhahu siု’mahutya anattahu suṃ”sapya
raှုphā”khiုkya၌ya vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāsaññya siု’mahutya vuṭṭhānaamaññyaraso ariyamagyañāṇyasaññya phaြcyapoyalāငြာ”aṃ’，
īyogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya aniccahu saṅkhāratarā”tiု’kiု cataငya naှluṃ”shaငya”raှုphā”၍ dukkhaā”phaြင’ya siု’mahutya
anattaā”phaြင’ya saṅkhāratiု’maှ thasaññya maññya၏． dukkhahu siု’mahutya anattahu saṅkhāratarā”tiု’kiု cataငya naှluṃ”shaငya”၍
kaြhaငya”so saṅkhāratiု’maှ thakhaြငya”tiု’၌laññya” īnaññya”tūpaငya siraှိpāle． (visuddhi-2-301．)
««maှtyakhaျkya ---- vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāhūsaññya saṅkhāratarā”tiု’maှ lhatyarā nibbānyabhakyasiု’ tacyahunyataññya”
paြေ”shā”so maggavīthicityaacañyanaှင’ya yaငya”maggavīthi၏ raှေ”၌ kapyalaျkyaraှိso manodhārika vipassanājo
vīthi anaññya”ငyya tacyakhu naှcyakhukiု chiုliုpesaññya．»»
īathakyapā visuddhimaggaaṭṭhakathāara saṅkhāratarā”tiု’kiု aniccasakyasakyaraှုruṃphaြင’ya dukkhasakyasakyaraှုruṃphaြင’ya
anattasakyasakyaraှုruṃphaြင’yakā” ariyamagyasiု’ machiုkyaniုငya， lakkhaṇāre”suṃ”tanyaluṃ”cuṃaောငya laှñña’yalaññya၍ suṃ”sapya
raှုphā”niုငyamaှsālaျှငya ariyamagyasiု’ chiုkyarokyaniုငyamaññyahu maှtyasā”pā． anattalakkhaṇasuttanya caso thiုthiု
teparivaṭṭadhammadesanātiု’၌ bhurā”raှငya၏ ññhaှnyakaြာ”toyamūkhaျkyamaျာ”naှင’ya gaṅgārenaှင’ya yamunāre roliုkyaka
tacyasā”taññya” phaြcyashā”sakaဲ’siု’ ññīññhatyaneso achuṃ”aphaြtyamaျာ”paငya phaြcyakaြsaññya． bhurā”raှငyakalaññya”
saṅkhāratarā”tiု’kiု lakkhaṇāre”suṃ”tanya taငya၍ vipassanāraှုphā”ranya ññhaှnyakaြာ”toyamū၏． (anattalakkhaṇasuttanya
casaññyakiု thokyaraှုpā．) aṭṭhakathāmaျာ”kalaññya” lakkhaṇāre”suṃ”tanya cuṃaောငya raှုphā” suṃ”sapyapāmaှ ariyamagya
siု’ chiုkyaniုငyamaññya． lakkhaṇātacyamaျို”taññya” taငya၍ suṃ”sapyaraှုphā”neruṃmaျှphaြင’yakā” ariyamagyasiု’ machiုkyaniုငyahu
chuṃ”phaြtyatoyamū၏． “maြဲrā၌ saṃpatya， taငya”rā၌ sapyapaငya””hū၏siု’ bhurā”hodesanātoyakiု piု၍ khiုငyakhaṃ’aောငya
khaျññyanaှောငya tutyanaှောငyathā”so achuṃ”aphaြtyamaျာ”paငya phaြcyakaြsaññya． akaြောငya”kā” īsiု’ phaြcya၏．
evaṃ saṅkhāre anattato passantassa diṭṭhisamu gghāṭanaṃ nāma hoti． aniccato passantassa mānasamuga
¢gṭanaṃ nāma hoti． dukkhato passantassa nikantipariyādānaṃ nāma hoti． (visuddhi-2-264．)

samādhithūthoငyasaင’yapuṃpiုငya”
chiုliုraငya” ----
1． aniccānupassanāñāṇyaka mānachaဲkiု payyakhhāniုငya၏．
2． dukkhānupassanāñāṇyaka nikantikhoya taṇaှာchaဲkiု payyakhhāniုငya၏．
3． anattānupassanāñāṇyaka attachaဲkiု payyakhhāniုငya၏．
thiုsiု’ payyarā၌ anupassanāñāṇyatacyapā”kiု kaျnyaanupassanāñāṇya naှcyapā”ka ā”kaြီ”so maှီrā upa
nissayasattiphaြင’ya kaျေ”jū”paြုpe”pāmaှ = anupassanāñāṇyatacyapā”saññya kaျnyaanupassanāñāṇya naှcyapā”tiု’၏
ā”pe”thokyapaṃmaှုhūso ā”kaြီ”so maှီrākiု raraှိpāmaှ thiုanupassanāñāṇyasaññya thakyamaြkyacū”raှlā၏，
raဲraင’yalā၏， sana’yaraှငya”lā၏， tiု”takyakaြီ”phā”lā၏， bhā0nāaraှိnya ā”koငya”lā၏． thiုsiု’ thakyamaြkyacū”raှ
lāso raဲraင’yalāso sana’yaraှငya”lāso tiု”takyakaြီ”phā”lāso bhā0nāaraှိnya ā”koငya”lāso
anupassanāñāṇyakasālaျှငya chiုငyarā chiုငyarā kilesāachaဲkiု phaြိုkhhaဲphaျkyachī”niုငyapesaññya．
(mahāṭī-2-415-416 - kaြñña’yapā．)
siု’soya anupassanāñāṇyatiု’ka chiုငyarā chiုငyarā kilesāachaဲtiု’kiု phaြိုkhhaဲphaျkyachī”rā၌ tadaṅgaā”phaြင’yasā
phaြိုkhhaဲphaျkyachī”niုငya၏． ariyamagyañāṇyakasālaျှငya chiုငyarā chiုငyarā kilesātiု’kiု samucchedaā”phaြင’ya akaြhaငya”maဲ’
phaြိုkhhaဲphaျkyachī”niုငyapesaññya． siု’soya ariyamagyatarā”tiု’maññyasaññya anupassanāñāṇya amaññyaraso vipassanā
ñāṇyatiု’ka achaင’yachaင’ya upanissayasattiphaြင’ya kaျေ”jū”paြုpe”pāmaှ phaြcyapoyalāniုငyaso ñāṇyamaျို”phaြcya၏． siု’athakya
bhurā”raှငyasaññya susimasuttanyathaငya īsiု’ hokaြာ”thā”toyamū၏．
pubbe kho susima dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ， pacchā nibbāne ñāṇaṃ． (saṃ-1-344．)
= khaျcyasā” susima ...saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏ anicca dukkha anatta akhaြငya”arā၌ koငya”chā taññyaso
dhammaṭṭhiti amaññyaraso vipassanāñāṇyasaññya raှေ”ka phaြcya၏． nibbānyatarā”toyamaြtya၌ āruṃpaြုsoā”phaြင’ya
siso ariyamagyañāṇyasaññya nokyakāla၌ phaြcya၏． (saṃ-1-344．)
susima paribiုjyabha0maှ sāsanābhoငyasiု’ vaငyarokya၍ raှငyarahanya”paြုlāso susima rahanya”toyaka
ariyamagyañāṇyasaññya abhiññāṇya၏ akaျို”chakyahu yūcha၍ me”maြnya”laျှောkyathā”lāsaphaြင’ya ariyamagyañāṇya
saññya abhiññāṇya၏ akaျို”chakya mahutya， saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏ anicca-dukkha-anattaakhaြငya”arā၌ koငya”chā
taññyaneso dhammaṭṭhiti amaññyaraso vipassanāñāṇya၏ akaျို”chakyasā phaြcyasaññya． vipassanāñāṇyatiု’၏
achuṃ”၌sā phaြcyapoyalāso ñāṇyaphaြcyasaññyahu paြnyalaññya၍ mina’yakaြာ”toyamūso cakā”maျာ” phaြcyakaြ၏．
(susimasuttanyaaṭṭhakathā၌ kaြñña’yapā．)
siု’athakya ariyamagyañāṇyakiု liုlā” toင’yatalaျkya raှိso asaငya yogīsūtoyakoငya”saññya
aniccānupassanāñāṇya dukkhānupassanāñāṇya anattānupassanāñāṇyahūso anupassanāñāṇyatiု’kiု thakyamaြkyacū”ra

anattaroငyakhaြññyatoya
thiု lakkhaṇāre” suṃ”tanyatiု’thaငya anattalakkhaṇākā” bhurā”raှငyatiု’ phaင’yathhanya”rā sāsanāthaငya”၌sā

paြtoyamūliုsaññyaraှိsoya ----
210
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
1． aniccalakkhaṇāphaြင’yasoyalaññya” thaငyaraှာ”paြtoyamū၏．
2． dukkhalakkhaṇāphaြင’yasoyalaññya” thaငyaraှာ”paြtoyamū၏．
3． aniccalakkhaṇā dukkhalakkhaṇā naှcyamaျို”tiု’phaြင’yasoyalaññya” thaငyaraှာ”paြtoyamū၏．
thiုsuṃ”maျို”tiု’thaငya aniccalakkhaṇāphaြင’ya anattalakkhaṇākiု thaငyaraှာ”paြ၍ hotoyamūpuṃmaှာ īsiု’ phaြcya၏．
cakkhu attāti yo 0deyaျ， taṃ na upapajjati． cakkhussa uppādopi 0yopi paññāyati． yassa kho
pana uppādopi 0yopi paññāyati， attā me uppajjati ca veti cāti iccassa e0māgataṃ hoti， tasmā
taṃ na upapajjati， cakkhu attāti yo 0deyaျ． iti cakkhu anattā． (ma-3-329 - chachakkasuttanya．)
= “cakkhuakaြññyadhātya (= cakkhudhāra) saññya attataññya””hu tacyaū”tacyayokyaso sūsaññya paြောchiုlā
ငြာ”aṃ’， thiုpaြောchiုkhaြငya”saññya maphaြcyasaင’ya， cakkhuakaြññyadhātya (= cakkhudhāra )၏ phaြcyakhaြငya”saññyalaññya”koငya”， paျkyakhaြငya”
saññyalaññya”koငya” thaငyaraှာ”၏． akaြငyatarā”ā” phaြcyakhaြငya”saññyalaññya”koငya” paျkyakhaြငya”saññyalaññya”koငya”
thaငyaraှာ”၏． thiုtarā”kiု (attahuchiုkhaဲ’laျှငya) “ငါ၏attasaññya phaြcyalaññya” phaြcya၏， paျkyalaññya” paျkya၏”hu chiုrā
rokya၏， thiုkaြောင’ya“cakkhuakaြññyadhātya (= cakkhudhāra ) saññya attataññya””hu tacyaū”tacyayokyasosūsaññya
paြောchiုlāငြာ”aṃ’， thiုpaြောchiုkhaြငya”saññya masaင’ya， thiုkaြောင’ya cakkhuakaြññyadhātya (= cakkhudhāra ) saññya anattataññya”．
(ma-3-329．)
īphoyapaြpā chachakkasuttanya၌ aniccaphaြင’ya anattalakkhaṇākiု thaငyaraှာ”paြtoyamū၏．
rūpaṃ bhikkhave anattā， rūpañca hidaṃ bhikkhave attā abhavissa， nayidaṃ rūpaṃ ābādhāya saṃ0tteyaျ，
labbhetha ca rūpe “evaṃ me rūpaṃ hotu， evaṃ me rūpaṃ mā ahosī”ti． yasmā ca kho bhikkhave rūpaṃ
anattā， tasmā rūpaṃ ābādhāya saṃvattati， na ca labbhati rūpe “evaṃ me rūpaṃ hotu， evaṃ me rūpaṃ mā
ahosī”ti． (saṃ-2-55． vi-3-18．)
= rahanya”tiု’ ...rupyasaññya attamahutya = anattataññya”， rahanya”tiု’ ...īrupyasaññya attaphaြcyakhaဲ’laျှငya ī
rupyasaññya nākaျငyakhaြငya”ငှာ maphaြcyalerā， “ငါ၏ rupyasaññya īsiု’ phaြcyace， ငါ၏ rupyasaññya īsiု’ maphaြcyacelaင’ya”hū၍
laññya” rupya၌ya (cīraငya၍) ralerā၏． rahanya”tiု’ ...rupyasaññya atta mahutyasokaြောင’ya (= anattasā phaြcya
sokaြောင’ya) nākaျငyakhaြငya”ငှာ phaြcya၏． “ငါ၏ rupyasaññya īsiု’ phaြcyace， ငါ၏ rupyasaññya īsiု’ maphaြcyacelaင’ya”hū၍
laññya” rupya၌ (cīraငya၍) maraapya． (saṃ-2-55． vi-3-18．)
īphoyapaြpā anattalakkhaṇasuttanya၌ dukkhaphaြင’ya anattalakkhaṇākiု thaငyaraှာ”aောငya ññhaှnyakaြာ”paြsatoya
mū၏．
rūpaṃ bhikkhave aniccaṃ， yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkhaṃ， yaṃ dukkhaṃ tadanattā， yadanattā taṃ “netaṃ mama， nesohamasmi，
na meso attā”ti e0metaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya passati． (saṃ-2-19．)
= rahanya”tiု’ ...rupyasaññya aniccataññya”， aniccaphaြcyaso thiုrupyasaññya dukkhataññya”， dukkhaphaြcyaso thiုrupyasaññya
anattataññya”．anattaphaြcyaso thiုrupyakiု “ငါ’hā mahutya， ငါ mahutya， ငါ၏atta mahutya”hu īsiု’laျှငya maphokya
mapaြnya hutyatiုငya”maှnyachā rupyatuṃ”rupyakhaဲ nāmyatuṃ”nāmyakhaဲ phaြိုkhhaဲphokyathhaငya” vipassanāñāṇyaalaငya”dhātyaphaြင’ya raှုpā．

nayyamaြheūso sammasanacārakhetyakā” ññītūlaျkyapaငya raှိpāsaññya．

raှိnesaññya phaြcyapālaျkya mūlapaṇṇāsaaṭṭhakathāthaငya lāraှိso ekadesa hūso cakā”tacyaluṃ” apoya၌
adhippāyya akokya ayūacha lhaဲmaှာ”saphaြင’ya (1) rupyadhātyatacyaluṃ”， (2) nāmyadhātyatacyaluṃ”， (3) rupyadhātya
tacyaluṃ”naှင’ya nāmyadhātyatacyaluṃ”maျှkiု lakkhaṇāyāñyataငya၍ vipassanāraှုphā” suṃ”sapyalaျှငyalaññya” nibbānyasiု’ rokyaniုငya
saññyahu yūchatoyamūkaြpaြnyasaññya． thiုpaြssanākiု paြleññyachā phaြreှငya” taငyapaြniုငyaranya athakya ekadesa
akaြောငya”kiု atiုkhaျုpya၍ phoyapaြapyapāsaññya．
mānabhañjanatthaṃ sabbadhammamūlapariyāyanti desanaṃ ārabhi． (ma-ṭṭha-1-18．)
bedaငyasuṃ”puṃtiု’၌ kamya”tacyabhakyasiု’ rokyaaောငya tatyamaြောkyakaြsañña’ya puṇṇā”lulaငya (500)tiု’saññya
vedakaျmya”tiု’၌ anaှcyasārakiု raှာphhe၍ mathe’raှိkaြsaphaြင’ya bhurā”raှငya၏ sāsanātoya၌ anaှcyasārakiု raှာphheranya
hūso ū”taññyakhaျkyaphaြင’ya sāsanābhoငyasiု’ vaငyarokya၍ raှငyarahanya”paြုlākaြ၏． nokyachuṃ”bha0raှိsañña’ya =
pacchimabhavikasā”maျာ” phaြcyakhaြငya”kaြောင’ya ñāṇyapaññāmaျာ” alhanya thakyamaြkyacū”raှsūmaျာ” phaြcyakaြ၏． bhurā”raှငya၏
piṭakatyatarā”desanātoyatiု’kiု saငyayūliုkyasañña’ya akhā alhayyatakūpaငya tatyamaြောkyashā”toyamūkaြ၏．
thiုsiု’ pariyatyatarā”toya၌ alhayyatakūsaငyayū၍ aောငyamaြငyamaှုrakhaြငya”kiု akaြောငya”khaṃ၍ pariyatyamānyachayyamaျာ”
thoငyalāsaphaြင’yabhurā”raှငyaapoya၌ raှေ”yakhaငyakakaဲ’siု’ riုsekiုငya”raှိုငya” vapyathā”maှုmaျာ” maraှိkaြto’pe． raှငyagotama
hosañña’ya tarā”tiု’kiု saငyayūliုkyapāka lhayyalhayyanaှင’yapaငya tatyasaññya， sipya athaငyakaြီ”carā maraှိpāhu cityakaြီ”
225
samādhithūthoငyasaင’yapuṃpiုငya”
vaငyalākaြ၏． thiုrahanya”tiု’၏ thiုpariyatyamānyasaññya arahattaphiုlya၏ akaြောငya”upanissayamaျာ”kiု paျkyacī”
ceniုငyasaññyahu sitoyamū maြငyatoyamūso bhurā”raှငyasaññya pariyattimānyatakyanekaြkunyaso rahanya” (500)
tiု’၏ pariyattimānyachayyakiု naှိmyanaငya”khaျို”phaျkyaranya raññyarhayyatoyamū၍ mūlapariyāyasuttanyakiု hokaြာ”toya
mūpesaññya． (vipassanāñāṇya၏ araှုkhaṃāruṃtiု’kiု hokaြာ”paြsanesaññya mahutyasaññyakiု satipaြုpā．) thiုsiု’
hokaြာ”toyamūrāvayya dhammādhiṭṭhānapiုငya”thaငya dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”tiု’kiု ----
1． puthujanyatiု’ka taṇaှာchaဲ mānachaဲ diṭṭhichaဲ achaဲsuṃ”maျို”phaြင’ya sipuṃ，
2． sekkhapuggiုlyatiု’ka diṭṭhichaဲpaြုtya၍ taṇaှာchaဲ mānachaဲ akhaျို’avakyaphaြင’ya sipuṃ，
3． asekkha (= rahantā) puggiုlyatiု’ka taṇaှာchaဲ mānachaဲ diṭṭhichaဲ achaဲsuṃ”maျို” paြုtya၍ sipuṃ，
4． tathāgata bhurā”raှငyatiု’kalaññya” taṇaှာchaဲ mānachaဲ diṭṭhichaဲ achaဲsuṃ”maျို”luṃ”paငya paြုtya၍ sipuṃtiု’kiု ----
le”maျို”le”piုငya” piုငya”၍ asī”asī” tacyaluṃ”cī tacyaluṃ”cī khhaဲkhaြာ”cityaphaြာ၍ hokaြာ”toyamū၏． thiုnokya
dhammādhiṭṭhānapiုငya”maှ puggalādhiṭṭhānapiုငya”bhakyasiု’ desanātoyaacañyakiု paြောငya”rhaှေ’ hokaြာ”toyamūliုkya၏．
(akaျyyakiု mūlapariyāyasutyathaငya kaြñña’yapā．)
thiုsiု’ hokaြာ”toyamūliုkyasaphaြင’ya athakyapā puggiုlyale”maျို”tiု’saññya dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”tiု’၌sālaျှငya
sipuṅkhaျငya” khāhakhaျkya raှိsaññya， kaျnyaparamatthadhātyasā” saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၌ sipuṅkhaျငya” khāhakhaျkya maraှိniုငyato’paြီ
lohu paြssanātacyarapya poyalā၏． thiုpaြssanākiု phaြreှငya”ranyaathakya aṭṭhakathācharātoyaka (ma-ṭṭha-1-
32．) thaငya nettipāḷitoya၌ lāraှိso lakkhaṇāhāranettinaññya”kiု thutyachoငya၍ lakkhaṇāhāranettinaññya”
ara lakkhaṇākhaျငya” tūññīrākiု cupoငya”၍ bhurā”raှငya hokaြာ”shā”toyamūkhaြငya” phaြcyakaြောငya”kiု raှငya”paြthā”၏．
(ma-ṭṭha-1-32．)
thiုraှငya”laငya”khaျkyaara dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”kiု kokyayūkhaဲ’soya dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”naှင’ya ruppanalakkhaṇā =
phokyapaြnyatatyaso sabholakkhaṇāā”phaြင’ya tūññīso upādārupya (24)maျို”kiုlaññya” kokyayūra၏．
phokyapaြnyatatyaso ruppanalakkhaṇākhaျငya” tūññīnesokaြောင’ya upādārupya (24)pā”kiု dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”၌
poငya”cu hokaြာ”thā”toyamūsokaြောင’ya phaြcya၏． tacyaphanya rūpakkhandhākiု kokyayūkhaဲ’soya rūpakkhandhānaှင’ya
0dhakalakkhaṇā = lūsatyasamā”lakkhaṇākhaျငya” tūññīneso kaျnya nāmyakhandhāle”pā”kiုlaññya” kokyayūra၏．
evaṃ rūpamukhena saṅkhāravatthukaṃ maññanaṃ 0thā (ma-ṭṭha-1-33．) caso aṭṭhakathācakā”kiု thokyaraှုpā．
siု’athakya athakyapā puggiုlyale”maျို”tiု’saññya saṅkhāratarā”ā”luṃ”tiု’ apoya၌paငya athakyaphoyapaြpā
atiုငya” dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”tiု’apoya၌ sipuṅkhaျငya” khāhakhaျkyaraှိsakaဲ’siု’ alā”tūpaငya sipuṅkhaျငya” matūññībhaဲ khāha
khaျkya raှိkaြsaññyahu maှtyapā． chiုliုsaññyamaှာ īsiု’ phaြcya၏．
1． puthujanyapuggiုlyatiု’saññya saṅkhāratarā” ā”luṃ”tiု’apoya၌ taṇaှာchaဲ mānachaဲ diṭṭhichaဲ achaဲsuṃ”maျို”phaြင’ya si၏．
2． sekkhapuggiုlyatiု’saññya diṭṭhichaဲpaြုtya၍ taṇaှာchaဲ mānachaဲ akhaျို’avakyaphaြင’ya saṅkhāratarā”tiု’ apoya၌ si၏．
3． asekkha rahantāpuggiုlyatiု’saññya saṅkhāratarā” ā”luṃ”tiု’apoya၌ taṇaှာchaဲ mānachaဲ diṭṭhichaဲ achaဲsuṃ”maျို”
paြုtya၍ si၏．
4． tathāgata = bhurā”raှငyatiု’saññyalaññya” saṅkhāratarā” ā”luṃ”tiု’apoya၌ taṇaှာchaဲ mānachaဲ diṭṭhichaဲ achaဲ
suṃ”maျို”luṃ”paငya paြုtya၍ sitoyamū၏． īsiု’laျှငya sipuṃ khāhakhaျkya raှိsaññyahu chiုliုpesaññya．

nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
dhātyakaြီ” (4)pā”kiုpaငya tiုkyariုkyahotoyamūsoyalaññya” lakkhaṇāhāranettinaññya”ara saṅkhāratarā”
ā”luṃ”kiုpaငya kokyayūrapuṅkiု raှေ”ū”chā satipaြု၍ maှtyasā”thā”pā．
pari ññānayya khāhakhaျkyaraှိpuṃ
tacyaphanya asekkha rahantāaraှငyamaြtyatiု’saññyalaññya” saṅkhāratarā”tiု’apoya၌ achaဲsuṃ”maျို” paြုtya၍ sitoya
mūkaြ၏． tathāgatabhurā”raှငyatiု’saññyalaññya” saṅkhāratarā”tiု’apoya၌ achaဲsuṃ”maျို” paြုtya၍paငya sitoyamūkaြ၏．
thiုsiု’ sitoyamūkaြrā၌ pariññānayyakhaျငya” khāhakhaျkyaraှိpuṅkiု aṭṭhakathāka īsiု’ raှငya”paြthā”၏．
pari ññātantaṃ nāma pariññātapāraṃ pariññātā0sānaṃ ana0sesato pariññātanti vuttaṃ hoti．
buddhānauှိ sā0kehi saddhi H kiñcāpi tena tena maggena kilesappahāne viseso natthi． pariññāya pana
atthi． sā0kā hi catunnaṃ dhātūnaṃ ekadesame0 sammasithā nibbānaṃ pāpuṇanti， buddhānaṃ pana aṇupamāṇampi
saṅkhāragataṃ ñāṇena adiṭṭhamatulitamatīritamasacchikataṃ natthi． (ma-ṭṭha-1-54．)
= tathāgatabhurā”raှငyasaññya sisaင’yasithiုkyaso pariññeyaျtarā”cukiု pariññātanta = chuṃ”aောငya piုငya”piုငya”
khaြာ”khaြာ” sitoyamū၏ --- hūrāvayya pariññātanta maññyasaññyakā” sisaင’yasithiုkyaso pariññeyaျtarā”cukiု
kamya”tacyabhakyasiု’rokyaaောငya piုငya”piုငya”khaြာ”khaြာ” sitoyamū၏， achuṃ”siု’tiုငyaaောငya piုငya”piုငya”khaြာ”khaြာ” sitoyamū၏，
akaြhaငya”akaျnya maraှိ kunyacaငyaaောငya piုငya”piုငya”khaြာ”khaြာ” sitoyamū၏hu chiုliုpesaññya． maှnyapesaññya --- bhurā”raှငya
tiု’၏ thiုthiုariyamagyaphaြင’ya kilesākiု payyakhaြငya”၌ sā0katiု’naှင’ya atūsā phaြcya၏， thū”khaြာ”maှုkā” maraှိpe．
siု’soya sisaင’yasithiုkyaso pariññeyaျtarā”cutiု’kiု piုငya”piုငya”khaြာ”khaြာ” sirā pariññānayya၌kā” thū”khaြာ”maှု
khāhamaှု raှိne၏． thaငyaraှာ”ceṃ’ --- sā0katiု’saññya dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”tiု’၏ tacyacityatacyadesamaျှkiုsālaျှငya
lakkhaṇāyāñyataငyakā raှုphā” suṃ”sapyakaြ၍ nibbānyasiု’ rokyaraှိkaြkunya၏． siု’soya bhurā”raှငyatiု’kā” cakaြ0ḷā
kuṭetacyasinya”athaငya”၌ taññyaraှိkaြso saṅkhāratarā”hūsamaျှtiု’thaငya vipassanāñāṇyatoyamaြtyaphaြင’ya mamaြငyaliုkya
miso makhaျိnyathiု”liုkyamiso lakkhaṇāyāñyasuṃ”khaျkya taငyakā macū”camya” machaငyakhaြငya machuṃ”phaြtyaliုkyamiso
maျkyamaှောkya mapaြုliုkyamiso paramāṇumaြူ pamāṇakhana’ya saṅkhāratarā”apoငya”soyalaññya” maraှိpe． (īkā”
athakyapā aṭṭhakathā၏ chiုliုraငya”taññya”．)
īathakyapā aṭṭhakathācakā”rapyavayya --- sā0kā hi catunnaṃ dhātūnaṃ ekadesame0 sammasithā
nibbānaṃ pāpuṇanti = sā0katiု’saññya dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”tiု’၏ tacyacityatacyadesamaျှkiုsālaျှငya lakkhaṇāyāñya
taငyakā raှုphā”suṃ”sapyakaြ၍ nibbānyasiု’ rokyaraှိkaြkunya၏ --- hūso cakā”rapya၌ ekadesa = tacyacityatacyadesanaှင’ya
patyasakya၍ ayūacha lhaဲmaှာ”kaြkhaြငya” phaြcya၏．
thiုekadesakiု dhātyatacyaluṃ”hu bhāsāpaြnya၍ adhippāyyaayūacha lhaဲmaှာ”khaြငya” phaြcyasaññya． pāḷicāpe၌
eka-saññya tacyakhukiု hosaññyakā” maှnya၏． siု’soya eka-noငya၌ desa-hūso cakā”tacyaluṃ” tiု”၍
ekadesa-hu phaြcyalāsoakhā tacyakhukiု mahobhaဲ tacyakhukiုsā machiုliုbhaဲ “tacyacityatacyadesa”kiုsā
ho၏， “tacyacityatacyadesakiုsā” chiုliု၏． tacyakhunaှင’ya tacyacityatacyadesamaှာ maျာ”chā adhippāyya khāhalaျkya
raှိ၏． satipaြုpāle． tacyacityatacyadesanaှင’ya tacyakhaျို’tacyavakya hūsaññya adhippāyya tūññīlaျkyapaငya raှိ၏．
upamā --- aုnya”sī” aluṃ”tacyarā cupuṃthā”saññya chiုkaြpāciု’． thiုaုnya”sī”puṃthaဲmaှ ---
227
samādhithūthoငyasaင’yapuṃpiုငya”
1． aုnya”sī”tacyaluṃ”kiု yūkhaဲ’pāhūso cakā”
2． aုnya”sī”tacyakhaျို’kiု yūkhaဲ’pāhūso cakā” ---
īcakā”naှcyamaျို”tiု’ adhippāyya matūññīkaြsaliုhu maှtyapā．
ī ekadesa = tacyacityatacyadesa၏ adhippāyyakiု kokyayūpuṃnaှင’ya patyasakya၍ athakyathaငya raှငya”laငya”
taငyapaြthā”khaဲ’so lakkhaṇāhāranettinaññya”kiု mame’pānaှင’ya， satipaြုthā”pā． mūlapariyāyasutya pāḷitoyathaငya
dhammādhiṭṭhānapiုငya”၌ dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”kiုsālaျှငya bhurā”raှငyasaññya sarupyathutya၍ tiုkyariုkya hokaြာ”thā”toya
mū၏． lakkhaṇāhāranettinaññya” ara lakkhaṇākhaျငya” tūññī၍ dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”၌ saṅkhāratarā” ā”luṃ”kiု
cupoငya”၍ bhurā”raှငyahokaြာ”toyamūkhaြငya” phaြcya၏． thiုpāḷitoyakiု phhaင’yachiုso aṭṭhakathākalaññya” thiုpāḷitoya
shā”puṃ pāḷitoyagatisiု’ liုkya၍ - “sā0katiု’saññya dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”tiု’၏ tacyacityatacyadesa = tacyakhaျို’
tacyavakyakiုsālaျှငya lakkhaṇāyāñyataငyakā raှုphā”suṃ”sapyakaြ၍ nibbānyasiု’ rokyaraှိkaြkunya၏” - hu phhaင’yachiုkhaြငya”
phaြcyasaññya． thiုphhaင’yachiုkhaျkyakiုlaññya” lakkhaṇāhāranettinaññya”naှင’ya ññaှိ၍ ---
1． dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”tiု’၏ tacyacityatacyadesakiု，
2． dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”naှင’ya phokyapaြnyatatyaso ruppanalakkhaṇākhaျငya” tūso upādārupyatiု’၏ tacyacitya
tacyadesakiု，
3． thiု rūpakkhandhānaှင’ya 0dhakalakkhaṇā (= lūsatyasamā”lakkhaṇā) khaျငya” tūññīso kaျnya nāmyakhandhāle”pā”
tiု’၏ tacyacityatacyadesakiု ---
īsuṃ”maျို”so saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏ tacyacityatacyadesakiုsālaျှငya lakkhaṇāyāñyataငyakā raှုphā”suṃ”sapya
kaြ၍ nibbānyasiု’ rokyaraှိkunya၏hu īsiု’ adhippāyyakiု kokyayūramaññya phaြcyasaññya． chiုliုsaññyamaှာ rupya-nāmyakaြောငya”-
kaျို” saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏ tacyacityatacyadesa = tacyakhaျို’tacyavakyakiုsālaျှငya lakkhaṇāyāñyataငyakā
raှုphā”suṃ”sapyakaြ၍ sā0katiု’saññya nibbānyasiု’ rokyaraှိkaြkunya၏ - hū၍sā chiုliုraငya” phaြcyasaññya．
««maှtyakhaျkya --- “bhurā”raှငyatiု’၏ thiုthiုariyamagyatarā”phaြင’ya kilesākiု payyakhaြငya”၌ sā0katiု’naှင’ya
atūsā phaြcya၏， thū”khaြာ”maှုkā” maraှိpe” --- hūso cakā”rapyanaှင’ya patyasakya၍ nā”maraှုpyathhe”ceranya thapyamaṃ၍
taငyapaြapyapāsaññya． bhurā”raှငya၏ ariyamagyañāṇyasaññya vāsanāaငhe’dhātyanaှင’ya takha kilesātiု’kiု payya၏，
sā0katiု’၏ ariyamagyañāṇyasaññyakā” vāsanāaငhe’dhātyakiု mapayyaniုငya， īsiု’kā” thū”khaြာ”maှု raှိsaññyasā
phaြcya၏， thiုthū”khaြာ”maှုkiုkā” aṭṭhakathāka mapayyamaြcyapā， aṭṭhakathāka chiုliုsaññyamaှာ bhurā”raှငya၏ sotāpatti
magyañāṇyasaññyalaññya” sakkāyadiṭṭhinaှင’ya vicikicchākiု payya၏， sā0katiု’၏ sotāpattimagyañāṇya
saññyalaññya” sakkāyadiṭṭhinaှင’ya vicikicchākiုpaငya payya၏， īsiု’ casaññyaphaြင’ya thiုthiုariyamagyatarā”ka chiုငyarā
chiုငyarā thiုthiုkilesākiု payyakhaြငya”၌ kilesāamaျို”acā” arethakya thū”khaြာ”maှု maraှိsaññyakiုsālaျှငya
raññyarhayya၍ aṭṭhakathāka phhaင’yachiုnekhaြငya” phaြcyasaññyahu maှtyapā．»»
ṭīkā aphhaင’yamaျာ”

1． thiုkaြောင’ya mimi၏ kiုyyathaငya”ajjhattasantānya၌ phaြcyaphā”taññyaraှိso aluṃ”cuṃso rupyatarā” nāmyatarā”
tiု’kiု lakkhaṇāyāñya suṃ”khaျkyataငya၍ vipassanāñāṇyaphaြင’ya raှုphā”suṃ”sapyakhaြငya”saññyalaññya”koငya”，
2． bahiddhaphaြcyaso sūtacyapā”santānya၌ phaြcyaphā”taññyaraှိso aluṃ”cuṃsorupyatarā” nāmyatarā”tiု’kiုlaññya”
thiုthiုsattavātiု’kiု yokyaျာ” minya”macasaññyaphaြင’ya puggiုlyasantānya khhaဲkhaြာ”vephanyakhaြငya”kiု mapaြုmū၍ bahiddhaaphaြcyaphaြင’ya
tūsokaြောင’ya tacyapoငya”taññya”paြု၍ khaြုံငုံ၍ lakkhaṇāyāñya suṃ”khaျkyataငyakā vipassanāñāṇyaphaြင’ya raှုphā”
suṃ”sapyakhaြငya”saññyalaññya”koငya” - ī naှcyamaျို”so raှုphā”suṃ”sapyakhaြငya”saññya sā0katiု’၏ sammasanacārakhetyapaငya
phaြcyapesaññya． (īkā” athakyapā anupadasuttanyaṭīkā၏ chiုliုraငya”taññya”．)
īathakyapā ṭīkā၏ raှငya”laငya”khaျkyaara mimi၏ kiုyyathaငya”ajjhattasantānya၌ phaြcyaso rupyatarā” nāmya
tarā” ā”luṃ”naှင’ya sakyamaဲ’ bahiddha saṅkhāratarā”maျာ” avaငyaapā bahiddha apasantānya၌ taññyaraှိso rupyatarā”
nāmyatarā”ā”luṃ”saññya ekadesa = tacyacityatacyadesa - maññyapesaññyahu maှtyapā．
tacyacityatacyadesa = tacyakhaျို’tacyavakya yūchapuṃ
yaငya”siု’phaြcyalaျှငya sā0katiု’၏ vipassanāñāṇya၏ araှုkhaṃāruṃmaှာ ajjhatta khandhāငါ”pā” bahiddha khandhāငါ”pā”
hupaငya paြောsaင’yapālaျkya abhayyakaြောင’ya ekadesa = tacyacityatacyadesa = tacyakhaျို’tacyavakya hu paြောnera
pāsanaññya”hu me”ranyaraှိ၏． aphaြko” īsiု’ phaြcya၏．
naှcyamaျို”luṃ”paငya aṭṭhakathātiု’၌ phhaင’yachiုlaျkya paြောchiုlaျkyapaငya raှိpesaññya． aṭṭhasālinīaṭṭhakathānaှင’ya
visuddhimagyaaṭṭhakathātiု’thaငya vuṭṭhānagāminīvipassanā amaျို”maျို”tiု’kiု raှငya”paြthā”၏． thiုraှငya”laငya”khaျkyamaျာ”maှ ī၌
tiုkyariုkyasakyachiုငyaneso apiုငya”akhaျို’kiု kokyanutya၍ aṭṭhasālinīachiုkiု mūtaññya၍ phoyapaြapyapāsaññya．
idhekacco ādito0 ajjhattaṃ pañcasu khandhesu abhinivisati， abhinivisithā te aniccādito
passati． yasmā pana na suddhaajjhattadassanamattene0 maggavuṭṭhānaṃ hoti， bahiddhāpi daṭṭhabbame0． tasmā parassa
khandhepi anupādinnasaṅkhārepi “aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti passati． so kālena ajjhattaṃ sammasati， kālena
bahiddhāti． (abhi-ṭṭha-1-270．)
aparo ādito0 rūpe abhinivisati， abhinivisithā bhūtarūpañca upādārūpañca paricchindithā aniccā-
dito passati． yasmā pana na suddharūpadassanamattene0 vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti， arūpampi daṭṭhabbame0． tasmā taṃ rūpaṃ
ārammaṇaṃ kathā uppannaṃ vedanaṃ saññaṃ saṅkhāre viññāṇañca “idaṃ arūpa”nti pari cchindithā aniccādito passati，
so kālena rūpaṃ sammasati kālena arūpaṃ． (abhi-ṭṭha-1-271．)
= īsāsanātoya၌ akhaျို’so yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya vipassanāñāṇya၏ araှုkhaṃāruṃ phaြcyaso

raှု၏． thiုyogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya raṅkhā ajjhatta khandhāငါ”pā”kiု lakkhaṇāre”suṃ”tanya tacyalaှñña’yacī taငyalaျkya
vipassanā raှုphā”suṃ”sapya၏， raṅkhā bahiddha khandhāငါ”pā”kiု lakkhaṇāre”suṃ”tanya tacyalaှñña’yacī taငyalaျkya vipassanā
raှုphā”suṃ”sapya၏． (abhi-ṭṭha-1-270．)
akhaြာ”tacyayokyaso yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya (ajjhatta-bahiddha naှcyamaျို”luṃ”၌ rupyanaှင’ya nāmya naှcyamaျို”raှိrā
vayya) rupyatarā”၌ ca၍ naှluṃ”shaငya”raှုphā”၏ = simya”chaññya”၏ = ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”yū၏． naှluṃ”shaငya”paြီ”၍ simya”
chaññya”paြီ”၍ ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”yūpaြီ”၍ bhūtarupyadhātyakaြီ”le”pā”kiုlaññya”koငya”， thiုdhātyakaြီ”le”pā”kiု maှီ
thayya၍ phaြcyapoyaneso upādārupyakiုlaññya”koငya” ñāṇyaphaြင’ya khhaဲkhaြာ”cityaphaြာ piုငya”khaြာ”၍ anicca-dukkha-anattahu
lakkhaṇāre”suṃ”tanya tacyalaှñña’yacītaငyakā vipassanāraှု၏， siု’soya rupyatarā”sakyasakyakiု vipassanāraှုneruṃmaျှ
phaြင’yakā” vuṭṭhāna amaññyaraso ariyamagyañāṇyasaññya siု’mahutya vuṭṭhānagāminīvipassanāsaññya maññyasañña’yanaññya”naှင’yamaျှ
maphaြcyapoyalāniုငyasokaြောင’ya nāmyatarā”kiုlaññya” vipassanā raှုramaññyasālaျှငya phaြcyapesaññya． thiုkaြောင’ya thiု
rupyatarā”kiု āruṃpaြု၍ phaြcyapoyalāso vedanā-saññā-saṅkhāra-viññāṇyakiုlaññya” “īkā” nāmyatarā””hu
tacyaluṃ”cī tacyaluṃ”cī ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”၍ anicca-dukkha-anattahu lakkhaṇāre”suṃ”tanya tacyalaှñña’yacītaငyakā
vipassanā raှု၏． thiုyogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya raṅkhā rupyatarā”kiု lakkhaṇāre”suṃ”tanya tacyalaှñña’yacītaငyakā
vipassanā raှုphā”suṃ”sapyane၏， raṅkhā nāmyatarā”kiု lakkhaṇāre”suṃ”tanya tacyalaှñña’yacītaငyakā vipassanā raှုphā”
suṃ”sapyane၏． (abhi-ṭṭha-1-271．)
visuddhimaggaaṭṭhakathā-dutiyathaဲ-cāmaျkyanaှာ (300-301)tiု’၌laññya” adhippāyyatūpaငya phhaင’yachiုlaျkya raှိpe
saññya． thiုaṭṭhakathāmaျာ”၏ chuṃ”phaြtyakhaျkyaara ajjhatta khandhāငါ”pā”sakyasakyakiု vipassanā raှုruṃmaျှphaြင’yalaññya”
ariyamagyañāṇyasaññya maphaြcyapoyaniုငya， anupādinnasaṅkhāraamaññyarasañña’ya sakyamaဲ’rupyatarā”maျာ”pā pāvaငyasañña’ya bahiddha
khandhāငါ”pā”sakyasakyakiု vipassanāraှုruṃmaျှphaြင’yalaññya” ariyamagyañāṇyasaññya maphaြcyapoyaniုငyasaphaြင’ya raṅkhā ajjhatta
khandhāငါ”pā”kiု raṅkhā bahiddha khandhāငါ”pā”kiု lakkhaṇāyāñyataငyakā vipassanā raှုphā”suṃ”sapyara၏．
thiုsiု’ raှုrā၌ ajjhatta bahiddha naှcyamaျို”luṃ”၌paငyalaျှငya rupyatarā”sakyasakyakiု vipassanā raှုruṃmaျှphaြင’yalaññya”
ariyamagyañāṇyasaññya maphaြcyapoyaniုငya， nāmyatarā”sakyasakyakiု vipassanāraှုruṃmaျှphaြင’yalaññya” ariyamagyañāṇyasaññya
maphaြcyapoyaniုငyasaphaြင’ya raṅkhā rupyatarā”kiု lakkhaṇāyāñyataငyakā raှုphā”suṃ”sapyara၏， raṅkhā nāmyatarā”kiု lakkhaṇā
yāñya taငyakā raှုphā”suṃ”sapyara၏． thiုsiု’ raှုrā၌ rupyatarā”kiု vipassanāraှုrāvayya bhūtarupya upādārupyatiု’kiု
ñāṇyaphaြင’ya khhaဲkhaြာ”cityaphaြာ၍ vipassanāraှုpā， nāmyakiု raှုrā၌ rupyatarā”kiု āruṃpaြု၍ phaြcyapoyalāso nāmyakhandhā
le”pā”kiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya khhaဲkhaြာ”cityaphaြာ၍ vipassanāraှုpāhu mina’yachiုthā”pesaññya． (akaျyyakiု - abhi-ṭṭha-1-270-
271． visuddhi-2-300-301-tiု’၌ kaြñña’yapā．)
īathakyapā aṭṭhakathātiု’၏ mina’yachiုkhaျkyamaျာ”saññya aောkyapā satipaṭṭhānakaျင’yacañyadesanātoyamaျာ”naှင’ya
tacyasā”taññya” ññīññhatyaneso achiုamina’yamaျာ”paငya phaြcyakaြpesaññya．

ī athakyapā satipaṭṭhānyadesanātoyamaြtya၌ kāya-vedanā-citta-dhamma amaññyaraso khandhāငါ”pā”
tiု’kiု ajjhatta bahiddha naှcyamaျို”luṃ”၌ vipassanā raှုphā”suṃ”sapyaranya bhurā”raှငyakiုyyatoyatiုငya ññhaှnyakaြာ”thā”toya
mūpesaññya．
bhurā”raှငyakiုyyatoyatiုငyakalaññya” ajjhatta bahiddha naှcyamaျို”luṃ”၌ khandhāငါ”pā”tiု’kiု raှုphā”suṃ”sapyaranya ññhaှnya
kaြာ”toyamū၏， aṭṭhakathāmaျာ”kalaññya” ajjhatta khandhāငါ”pā”sakyasakyakiု vipassanāraှုruṃmaျှphaြင’yalaññya” ariyamagya
siု’ machiုkyaniုငya， bahiddha khandhāငါ”pā”sakyasakyakiု vipassanāraှုruṃmaျှphaြင’yalaññya” ariyamagyasiု’ machiုkyaniုငyahu chuṃ”phaြtya
toyamūkaြ၏． “maြဲrā၌ saṃpatya， taငya”rā၌ sapyapaငya””hū၏siု’ aṭṭhakathāmaျာ”၏ chuṃ”phaြtyakhaျkyasaññya bhurā”ho
pāḷitoyakiု khiုငyakhaṃ’aောငya tutyanaှောငyathā”so cakā”maျာ”paငya phaြcyapesaññya．
thiုsiု’ajjhatta bahiddha khandhāငါ”pā”tiု’kiု vipassanāraှုrā၌ tacyakhaျို’tacyavakyalokyakiုsā raှုniုငyasaphaြင’ya
ekadesahulaññya” phhaင’yachiုrakhaြငya” phaြcyapesaññya． chiုliုsaññyamaှာ ajjhatta khandhāငါ”pā” bahiddha khandhāငါ”pā”tiု’kiု vipassanā
raှုranya ññhaှnyakaြာ”khaြငya”maှာ paramatthadhātyasā” tarā”luṃ”amaျို”acā”anephaြင’yasā ññhaှnyakaြာ”khaြငya” phaြcyasaññya． paramattha
tarā” tacyamaျို” tacyamaျို”၌ arethakyakā” maျာ”chā raှိne၏． thiုarethakyakiုkā” kunyacaငyaaောငya maraှုniုငya
saphaြင’ya ekadesa = tacyacityatacyadesa = tacyakhaျို’tacyavakyakiုsā raှုphā”suṃ”sapyakaြsaññyahu phhaင’yachiုkhaြငya” phaြcyasaññya．
tacyacityasā”khana’ya
athakyapā satyamaှtyakhaျkyakiု nā”raှငya”ceranya thapyamaṃ၍ raှငya”laငya”taငyapaြapyapāsaññya． ī khandhāaိmya၌ tacyakhu
so rupyakhaṇattayaathaငya”၌ paြိုငyatū phaြcyapaျkyanekaြso paramāṇumaြူkhana’ya pamāṇa raှိkaြkunyaso rupyakalāpya
amaှုnyatiု’kiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya maှnya”chakhaြငyathayyakaြñña’yakhaဲ’soya doṇamattā = tacyacityasā”khana’yalokya raှိmaññyahu (visuddhi-
1-361．)၌ phoyapaြthā”၏． thiုrupyakalāpyaamaှုnyatiုငya” amaှုnyatiုငya”၌ dhātyakaြီ”le”pā” pāvaငyalaျkya raှိ၏， thiုrupya
kalāpyatiုငya”၌ raှိso dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”tiုငya”kiု sā0katiု’saññya kunyacaငyaaောငya raှုniုငyapāsalā”hu me”soya
tacyacityatacyadesa tacyakhaျို’tacyavakyalokyasā raှုniုငyasaññyahu chiုliုsaññya． thiုtacyacityatacyadesamaှာlaññya”
vipassanāñāṇya၏ chamya”ā”raှိnyacoya ānubhoyaka kaြီ”mā”laျှငya khapyamaျာ”maျာ” tacyacityatacyadesakiု raှုniုငya၍
vipassanāñāṇya၏ chamya”ā”raှိnyacoya ānubhoyaka se”laျှငya khapyanaññya”naññya” tacyacityatacyadesakiုsā raှုniုငyasaññya．
dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”tiု’kiု maှီ၍phaြcyakaြkunyaso upādārupyatiု’၌laññya” alā”tūpaငya tacyacityatacyadesakiုsā raှု
niုငya၏hu maှtyapā．
nāmyaloka
ekaccharakkhaṇe koṭisatasahassasaṅkhā uppajjithā nirujjhati． (saṃ-ṭṭha-2-295．)
= lakyaphaျcyatacyathakya = maျkyacitacyamaှိtya = laျှpyatacyapaြkya = tacyacakkana’yahu khoyachiုapyaso alhanyatiုtoငya”

achiုraှိrā thiုcittakkhaṇatiုငya” cittakkhaṇatiုငya”၌ phassa-vedanā-saññā-cetanā-viññāṇyahūso phassapañcamaka

samādhithūthoငyasaင’yapuṃpiုငya”
tarā”ငါ”pā” ū”choငyasañña’ya nāmyatarā”tiု’ pāvaငyakaြrā raှုliုkyaniုငyaso phassapañcamakatarā” ū”choငyasañña’ya
nāmyatarā”tiု’kā” akhaျို’avakyasāphaြcya၏． maraှုliုkyaniုငyaso phassapañcamakatarā” ū”choငyasañña’ya nāmyatarā”cu
tiု’laññya” akhaျို’avakya raှိkaြ၏． bahiddha rupyatarā” nāmyatarā”tiု’၌laññya” ajjhattanaññya”tū sabhopokyapā．
siု’athakya tarā”luṃ”amaျို”acā”ano”phaြင’ya ajjhatta၌laññya” khandhāငါ”pā”， bahiddha၌laññya” khandhāငါ”pā”
ā”luṃ”kiု raှုramaññya phaြcyasaññya． thiုsiု’ raှုpāmaှ magya-phiုlya-nibbānyasiု’ chiုkyarokyaniုငyamaññya phaြcyasaphaြင’ya rupyanāmyaā”luṃ”
kiု pariññāpaññā suṃ”maျို”phaြင’ya piုငya”piုငya”khaြာ”khaြာ” siaောငya raှုranya ññhaှnyakaြာ”toyamūkhaြငya” phaြcyasaññya．
thiုsiု’ raှုrā၌ paramatthadhātyasā”tiုငya” dhātyasā”tiုငya” tarā”luṃ”tiုငya” tarā”luṃ”tiုငya”၌ arethakya
maျာ”chā raှိnesaphaြင’ya thiုthiု rupyakalāpyatiုငya” rupyakalāpyatiုငya”၌ taññyaraှိneso dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”tiုငya” upādā
rupyatiုငya”kiုlaññya”koငya”， thiုthiုnāmyakalāpyatiုငya” nāmyakalāpyatiုငya”၌ phaြcyaphā”taññyaraှိneso phassapañcamakatarā”
ū”choငyasañña’ya nāmyatarā”tiုငya”kiုlaññya”koငya” - īsiု’ rupyakalāpyatiုငya” nāmyakalāpyatiုငya”၌ taññyaraှိso
paramatthadhātyasā”tiုငya”hūso arethakyakiုkā” sā0katiု’saññya kunyacaငyaaောငya vipassanāmaraှုniုငyasaphaြင’ya
(cakaြ0ḷā kuṭetacyasinya”phaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”thā”apyaso nayyamaြေathaငya”၌ bhurā”raှငyasaññyasālaျှငya saṅkhāratarā”
tiု’kiု kunyacaငyaaောငya vipassanāraှုphā” suṃ”sapyaniုငyasaphaြင’ya) sā0katiု’saññya ekadesa = saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏
tacyacityatacyadesa = tacyakhaျို’tacyavakyakiု vipassanāraှုphā”suṃ”sapyaniုငyapākalaññya” nibbānyasiု’ rokyaraှိniုငyakaြောငya”
mina’yachiုrakhaြငya” phaြcyapesaññya．
īmaျှchiုlaျှငya maññyasañña’yatarā”maျာ”kiု maññyamaျှlokya maññyasiု’ maññyapuṃ sā0katiု’saññya vipassanā raှုphā”
suṃ”sapyaniုငyapāmaှ nibbānyasiု’ chiုkyarokyaniုငyakaြmaññyakiု sabhopokyalokyapaြီ phaြcyapesaññya． siု’soya cañya”cā”ranya
akhaျkyatacyarapyakiု thapyamaṃ၍ taငyapaြapyapāsaññya．
thapyamaṃcañya”cā”ranya akhaျkyatacyarapya
athakyapā ekadesaakaြောငya”kiု phhaင’yachiုso aṭṭhakathāmaှာ mūlapariyāyasutyaaṭṭhakathā phaြcyasaññya．
thiုmūlapariyāyasutyasaññya mūlapaṇṇāsapāḷitoyavayya suttanyapoငya” (50)tiု’anakya naṃpātya (1) suttanya
phaြcyasaññya． thiုmūlapaṇṇāsapāḷitoyathaငya (33)khumaြောkya suttanyakā” mahāgopālakasuttanyapaငya phaြcyasaññya．
thiု mahāgopālakasuttanyaaṭṭhakathāthaငya athakya (naှာ-189-190) thaငya phoyapaြkhaဲ’sañña’yaatiုငya” aṭṭhakathā
charātoyaka rupyatarā”kiု ---
1． rupya (28)pā”hūso arethakyaā”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya”，
2． rupyatarā”kiု phaြcyapoyacetatyasañña’ya akaြောငya”samuṭṭhānyaā”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya” ---
īnaှcyamaျို”so akhaြငya”arāā”phaြင’ya hutyatiုငya”maှnyachā masikhaဲ’soya ---
1． rupyatarā”kiု simya”chaññya”၍，
2． nāmyatarā”kiု piုငya”khaြာ”maှtyasā”၍，
3． rupya-nāmyakiု simya”chaññya”၍，
4． yaငya”rupyanāmyatiု’၏ akaြောငya”tarā”kiု piုငya”khaြာ”maှtyasā”၍，
5． rupya-nāmya-kaြောငya”-kaျို” = saṅkhāratarā”tiု’kiု lakkhaṇāyāñyataငya၍ --- vipassanāñāṇyakiု magyañāṇya

phiုlyañāṇyahūso athhatyaathipyasiု’ rokyaceṃ’soငှာ maññyasañña’ya naññya”naှင’yamaျှ machamya”niုငya (ma-ṭṭha-2-163．)
hu atiakaျ chuṃ”phaြtyathā”၏． thiုsiု’so alhanyatikaျso chuṃ”phaြtyakhaျkyakiု re”sā”thā”so aṭṭhakathā

yogīsūtoyakoငya” kiုyyatiုငyapaငya vephanyachuṃ”phaြtyalerāsaññya．
maggaငyaraှcyapā” paြñña’yapāraဲ’lā”
nibbānyakiု aliုraှိso asaငyayogīsūtoyakoငya”saññya īakhaျkyatacyarapyakiုlaññya” thapyamaṃ၍ cañya”cā”
pāū”． dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadā = dukkhakhaျုpyarā nibbānyasiု’ rokyakaြောငya”kaျင’yacañya phaြcyaso maggaariyasaccākiု
sammādiṭṭhiaca sammāsamādhiachuṃ”raှိso maggaငyatarā”kiုyya (8)pā” phaြcyakaြောငya”kiု dhammacakaြာdesanātoya (saṃ-

mū၏． yaငya” maggaငya (8)pā” cuṃññīpāmaှ dukkhakhaျုpyarā nibbānyasiု’ rokyaraှိniုငyamaññya phaြcyasaññya． thiုmaggaငya (8)pā”tiု’thaငya
akaျုံ”vaငyaso sammāsamādhihūsaññya maññyakaဲ’siု’so samādhimaျို”kiု khoyachiုsaññyahu bhurā”raှငyasaññya mahā
satipaṭṭhānasuttanyathaငya īsiု’ hokaြာ”thā”toyamū၏．
katamo ca bhikkhave sammāsamādhi．
1． idha bhikkhave bhikkhu vivicce0 kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ
pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati．

pītisukhaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati．

yaṃ taṃ ariyā ācikkhanti “upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī”ti， tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati．

upekkhāsatipārisuddhi H catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati． ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave sammāsamādhi．

pathamajhānya dutiyajhānya tatiyajhānya catutthajhānyahūso jhānyacityamaျာ”kaြောင’ya phaြcyakaြso cittajarupyatiု’kā”
mhanyamaြtyaso paṇītacittajarupyatiု’taññya”． yaငya”cittajarupyatiု’kā” yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ rūpakāyatacyakhuluṃ”၌
anaှံ’apaြာ” paျံ’naှံ’၍ phaြcyanekaြ၏． yaငya”rupyatiု’kā” ojālaျှငya (8)khumaြောkyaraှိso ojaṭṭhamakarupyatiု’taññya”．
yaငya”mhanyamaြtyaso paṇītacittajarupyatiု’phaြင’ya the’thiapyaso khandhāaိmyaraှိso yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya kiုyya၏
247
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
khaျmya”sākhaြငya” kāyikasukhakiု thiုakhaျိnya၌ raraှိne၏． siု’athakya yaငya”ānāpānajhānyacityamaျာ”kaြောင’ya phaြcyapoya
lāso mhanyamaြtyaso paṇītacittajarupyatiု’phaြင’ya the’thiapyaso khandhāaိmyaraှိsaññya၏ achamya”phaြင’ya yaငya”ānā
pāna jhānyacityamaျာ”ka kiုyya၏ khaျmya”sākhaြငya” kāyikasukhakiု raraှိphiု’ranya phaြcyacesaññyahu maှtyapā． thiုsiု’ kiုyya၏
khaျmya”sākhaြငya” kāyikasukhakiု raraှိaောငya jhānyacityaka phaြcyacemaှုkiု yogā0carapuggiုlya siraှိkhhaင’yarakhaြငya”maှာ siု’mahutya
kiုyya၏khaျmya”sākhaြငya” kāyikasukhakiု yogā0carapuggiုlyararaှိkhaြငya”maှာ ānāpānajhānyamaှ thalāso akhaျိnya
kāla၌sā raraှိsaññyahu maှtyapā． akaြောငya”mū jhānyavaငyacā”chaဲ khaṇa၌ cetasikasukha amaññyarasañña’ya citya
khaျmya”sāmaှုkiုsā yogā0carapuggiုlyaka khaṃcā”nesokaြောင’ya phaြcya၏． pathamajhānya dutiyajhānya tatiyajhānya
tiု’kā” sukhavedanānaှင’yayaှñya၍ thiုakhaျိnya၌ cetasikasukhahūsañña’ya cityakhaျmya”sāmaှု raှိsaññyakā” maှnya၏， catuttha
jhānyakā” upekkhāvedanānaှင’ya yaှñyanesaphaြင’ya maññyasiု’laျှငya thiုcatutthajhānya vaငyacā”chaဲkhaṇa၌ cetasikasukha
hūsañña’ya cityakhaျmya”sāmaှုkiု thiုcatutthajhānyaka phaြcyaceniုငyapaြnyapāsanaññya”hu me”ranya raှိ၏． upekkhāya vā
santabhāvena sukhagatikattā = upekkhāvedanāsaññyalaññya” ငြိmyasakyasañña’ya sabhā0chamya”ā”raှိkhaြငya”kaြောင’ya
sukhavedanānaှင’ya alā”tūrakā” thiုcatutthajhānyakiု vaငyacā”chaဲkhaṇa၌laññya” cityakhaျmya”sāmaှု cetasikasukha
raှိsaññyasāhu siraှိpāle． (mahāṭī-1-313．)
tacyaphanya ānāpānassatisamādhisaññya mimi၏ rupyanāmyasantānyaacañya၌ jhānyaphaြင’ya mapayyakhhāapya manaှုtyapayya
apyakunyase”so miုkyamaဲsañña’ya avijjāakaြောငya”khaṅkaြောင’ya phaြcyapoyalākaြkunyaso phaြcyapoyalātiုငya”
phaြcyapoyalātiုငya”kunyaso akusiုlyaayutyatarā”tiု’kiု mimi (= jhānyacitya) phaြcyaso khaṇa၌paငyalaျှငya payyakhhā
thā”niုငya၏， koငya”chā (vikkhambhanapahānyaphaြင’ya) ငြိmya”aေ”ceniုငya၏． tacyanaññya”chiုsoya lobha dosa moha
caso kilesāthu aciုငyaakhaဲkiု phokyakhhaဲlaျkya saccāle”pā”kiု thiု”thhaငya”simaြငyakhaြငya”aphiု’ raှိsaññya၏aphaြcya
kaြောင’ya ānāpānacatutthajhānyasamādhikiု vipassanā၏ akhaြpodakapaြု၍ vipassanāñāṇyatiု’kiု acañyaatiုငya”
raraှိaောငya kaျင’yakaြံkaြို”kutya ā”thutyakhaြငya”phaြင’ya ariyamagyañāṇyataññya”hūso kaြီ”phā”khaြငya”siု’ rokyaraှိ
latyasoya kilesāthu aciုငyaakhaဲkiု ariyamagyañāṇyaphaြင’ya akaြhaငya”maဲ’ payyasatyaniုငya၏， ariyaphiုlyañāṇyaphaြင’ya
kilesāapūmī” hūsamaျှkiု ငြိmya”aောငya ငြှိmya”niုငya၏， ငြိmya”aေ”ceniုငya၏． īkā” athakyapā pāḷitoya၏
chiုliုraငya” phaြcyapesaññya． (visuddhi-1-259-260．)
ānāpāna - paြññyataññyakhanya”
idha bhikkhave bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā nisīdati pallaṅkaṃ
ābhujithā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapethā， so sato0 assasati， sato0
passasati． (saṃ-3-280． ma-1-70． vi-1-88．)
rahanya”tiု’ ...īsāsanātoya၌ rahanya”saññya tosiု’ shā”rokya၍phaြcyace， sacyapaငyaraငya”siု’ shā”
rokya၍phaြcyace， chityaငြိmyarāarapyasiု’ shā”rokya၍ phaြcyace taငyapallaငyakhhepaြီ”laျှငya athakyapiုငya” phaြcyaso
khandhākiုyyakiု phaြောင’yamatyachāthā”၍ satikiု ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”siု’ raှေ”raှု phaြcyacelaျkya thiုငyane၏， thiုrahanya”
saññya satiraှိlaျkyasālaျှငya vaငyasakyalekiု raှူshaငya”၏， satiraှိlaျkyasālaျှငya thhakyasakyalekiု raှူthutya၏．
(saṃ-3-280． ma-1-70． vi-1-88．)
248
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
tosiု’ shā”rokya၍ phaြcyace， sacyapaငyaraငya”siု’ shā”rokya၍phaြcyace， chityaငြိmyarāarapyasiု’ shā”rokya၍
phaြcyacehūso īcakā”saññyakā” ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု phā”maျာ”ā”thutyaso ā”thutyaliုso yogā
0cara rahanya”toya၏ ānāpānassatisamādhibhā0nāā” laျောyalaျောkyapatya koငya”maြtyaso kaျောငya”
aိpyarā nerākiု simya”chaññya”phiု’ranya maှီvaဲphiု’ranya ññhaှnyapaြso cakā”toyaphaြcyasaññya． ne’ññaña’yasaṃsarā raှññyamaြင’yachā
so kālapatyaluṃ” achaငya” asaṃ casaññyaphuṃphuṃ thiုthiုāruṃmaျို”cuṃtiု’၌ acañyamapaြtya paြေ”shā” cū”vaငyaneso
īyogā0cara rahanya”toya၏ cityasaññya ānāpānassatisamādhi၏ taññyarāāruṃphaြcyaso ānāpāna
āruṃsiု’ takyarokyakhaြငya”ငှာ aliုmaraှိ phaြcyane၏， kokyakaျcyacañya”laဲ akhiုငya”rakhakyakhaဲsonhā” tapyathā”so
laှññya”saññya kharī”mahutyarā laှññya”lamya”mahutyarā arapyasiု’sālaျှငya paြေ”shā”sakaဲ’siု’ alā”tūpaငya īyogā
0cara rahanya”toya၏ cityasaññya ānāpānaāruṃtaññya”hūso ānāpānabhā0nā kharī”maှnyalamya”kaြောငya”maှ
timya”coငya”nesañña’ya ငါ”phaြာāruṃ kāmaguṇyakhaျုံputyatiု’raှိrā bhā0nākharī”maှnya mahutyarā arapyasiု’sālaျှငya
paြေ”shā”၍ netatya၏， thiုkaြောင’ya naှိုငya”khiုငya”phhayyarā lokaupamā maññyasaññyakā” -- nhā”thinya”yokyaျာ”saññya
kokyakaျcyaso， mikhaငyanhā”ma၏ niု’raññyakiု sokyasuṃ”ra၍ kaြီ”paြငya”lāraso nhā”sā”ငyyakiု chiုchuṃ”maliုsaññya
raှိsoya thiုnhā”sā”ငyyakiု mikhaငyanhā”makaြီ”maှ phayyaraှာ”၍ saင’yataင’yalaျောkyapatyaso tacyanerā၌ khiုငyakhaṃ’sañña’ya
tiုငyakaြီ”tacyatiုငyakiု ciုkya၍ thiုtiုငya၌ thiုnhā”sā”ငyyakiု khiုငyakhaṃ’so kaြို”phaြင’ya phhaဲ’khaျññyathā”lerā၏． thiုsiု’
phhaဲ’khaျññyathā”saññyaraှိsoya thiုnhā”thinya”yokyaျာ”၏ thiုkokyakaျcyaso nhā”sā”ငyyasaññya īmaှ thiုmaှlaññya”
tunyalaှုpya၍ paြေ”khaြငya”ငှာ machamya”niုငyasaññyaphaြcya၍ thiုkhaျññyatiုငyakiုpaငyalaျှငya maှီ၍ thiုငyamūlaññya” thiုငyalerāsakaဲ’siု’
maှီ၍ aိpyamūlaññya” aိpyalerāsakaဲ’siု’ - īupamāatūpaငyalaျှငya ne’ññaña’yasaṃsarā raှññyamaြင’yachāso akhaျိnyaakhā
kālapatyaluṃ” rūpāruṃcasañña’ya thiုthiုāruṅkiု achaဲpaြု၍ phaြcyapoyalāso sāyāapyaso khaျmya”sāsañña’yakhaṃcā”maှု
sukhavedanāhūso āruṃ၏ rasāraññyakiု sokyasuṃ”rasaphaြင’ya kaြီ”paြငya”၍lāraso rāga dosa moha
casañña’ya ayutyatarā”tiု’ka phaျkyachī”thā”saphaြင’ya paျkyacī”၍neso mimi၏cityakiု yañyakaျေ”aောငya chiုchuṃ”ma
liုso īyogā0cara rahanya”toyasaññyalaññya” rūpāruṃcasañña’ya thiုthiုāruṃmaှ mimi၏cityakiု phayyaraှာ”laျkya
toarapyasiု’ phaြcyace， sacyapaငyaraငya”siု’phaြcyace， chityaငြိmyarā arapyasiု’phaြcyace vaငyarokyalaျkya thiုarapya၌ vaငyale
thhakyalehūso khaျññyatiုငya၌ mimi၏ cityakiု satitaññya”hūso kaြို”phaြင’ya phhaဲ’khaျññyathā”apyapesaññya． īsiု’
phhaဲ’khaျññyathā”saññyaraှိsoya thiုyogā0cararahanya”၏ thiုcityasaññya raှေ”၌ le’lākaျkyacā”phū”so āruṅkiု
mararaှိsaññyaphaြcya၍ īmaှ thiုmaှlaññya” tunyalaှုpyakhaျောkyakhaျာ”saññya phaြcya၍laññya” satitaññya”hūso kaြို”kiု phaြtya
tokya၍ paြေ”khaြငya”ငှာ machamya”niုငyasaññyaphaြcya၍ thiုānāpānaāruṅkiုsālaျှငya upacārasamādhi appanāsamādhihu
naှcyamaျို”paြာ”so samādhi၏ achamya”phaြင’ya maှီ၍mūlaññya” thiုငyane၏， maှီ၍mūlaññya” aိpyane၏． thiုkaြောင’ya raှေ”raှေ”
aṭṭhakathācharātoyatiု’saññya aောkyapā gāthākiု mina’yachiုtoyamūkaြlesaññya．
yathā thambhe nibandheyaျ， 0cchaṃ damaṃ naro idha．
bandheyaျveṃ sakaṃ cittaṃ， satiyārammaṇe daḷaှံ．

ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
tacyanaññya”chiုrasoya
tacyanaññya”chiုrasoya kammaṭṭhānya” amaျို”maျို”thaငya ū”thipyasaphhayya phaြcyaso kammaṭṭhānya”kā” ī ānāpāna
kammaṭṭhānya”paငya phaြcya၏． ī ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kā” gaṅgāvāḷu saဲcumaka phaင’yapoyatoyamūkaြpaြီ”kunyaso khapyasimya”
ussuṃ aluṃ”cuṃso sammāsambuddhabhurā”raှငya， akhaျို’so paccekabuddhabhurā”raှငya， akhaျို’so sammāsambuddhabhurā”
raှငya၏ tapañña’yasā0katiု’၏ magyañāṇya phiုlyañāṇyahūso tarā”thū” tarā”maြtyakiု rakhaြငya”၏ anī”kapyachuṃ”
akaြောငya”tacyarapyalaññya” phaြcya၏． ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”maှ tacyapā”so akhaြာ”akhaြာ”so kammaṭṭhānya”tacyamaျို”maျို”
phaြင’ya vipassanā၏ akhaြpodakaaphaြcya samādhithūthoငya၍ saṅkhāratarā”tiု’kiု simya”chaññya”laျkya vipassanā
bhā0nākammaṭṭhānya”kiု cī”phaြnya”phā”maျာ”ā”thutyatoyamūkaြsaphaြင’ya magyañāṇya phiုlyañāṇyahūso tarā”thū” tarā”
maြtyakiု raraှိpaြီ”so ariyāsūtoyakoငya”tiု’aphiု’ ī ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”saññya maျkyamaှောkyaso kiုyya၏
aphaြcyahūso īpaccuppanyabha0၌ jhānyakhaျmya”sāphaြင’ya khaျmya”sāchānerakhaြငya”၏ anī”kapyachuṃ” akaြောငya”tacyarapyalaññya”
phaြcya၏． īkaဲ’siု’so guṇyaapoငya”tiု’naှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃneso īānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု amaျို”smī”saṃ amaျို”sā”saṃ
chaငyasaṃ maြငya”saṃcaso asaṃmaျို”cuṃtiု’phaြင’ya ropaြhamya”laျkya raှိso rhānī”kaျောငya”kiု machana’yalhaှtyamū၍ phā”maျာ” ā”
thutyakhaြငya”ငှာ malhayyakūlaှpe． akaြောငya”mū ---- saddakaṇṭakattā jhānassa = jhānya၏ asaṃhūso chū”ငြောင’ya
raှိsaññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’yataññya”．
akayyacaငyacacyaā”phaြင’yamū rhānaှင’yamanī”so toarapya၌ yogā0cara rahanya”toyasaññya ī ānāpāna
kammaṭṭhānya”kiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”yū၍ ānāpāna (= vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale)laျှငya āruṃraှိso catutthajhānya
kiု phaြcyace၍ (31)bhuṃathaငya”၌ taññyaraှိso tebhūmakasaṅkhāratarā”tiု’kiု lakkhaṇāre” suṃ”tanyataငyakā
vipassanā raှုphā”suṃ”sapya၍ amaြtyachuṃ”phiုlyahu khoyachiုapyaso arahattaphiုlyasiု’ rokyaraှိaṃ’soငှာ paြုlhayya

kunyalo”hu ññhaှnyapaြ၏． khaျmya”khaျmya”sāsā lhayyalhayyakūkū khaျောkhaျောmomophaြင’ya maြို’kiု taññyathoငyaphanyachaငya”
paြီ”latyasoya maငya”maျို”maှ kaြီ”chāso pūjoyasakkārakiု raraှိsakaဲ’siု’ ī upamāatūpaငyalaျှငya thiုbhurā”raှငyasaññya
yogā0cara rahanya”toyaā” laျောyakanyalaျောkyapatya koငya”maြtyaso kaျောငya”aိpyarā nerākiု ñāṇyatoya
maြtyaphaြင’ya cū”camya”chaငyakhaြငyatoyamūlaျkya “ītoarapya casaññya၌ kammaṭṭhānya”tarā”kiု kaျင’yakaြံkaြို”kutya phā”maျာ”
ā”thutyapā”hu ññhaှnyakaြာ” paြsatoyamū၏． thiုnoငya bhurā”raှငya၏ ññhaှnyakaြာ”toyamūkhaျkyakiု ū”thipyarhakya panyachaငya
laျkya thiုtoarapyacasaññya၌ kammaṭṭhānya”tarā”kiု kaျင’yakaြံkaြို”kutyaphā”maျာ”ā”thutyaso yogā0cara
rahanya”toyasaññya sīla-samādhi-paññā sikkhāsuṃ”rapya akaျင’yamaြtyakiု acañyaatiုငya” kaျင’yakaြံkaြို”kutya phā”maျာ”
ā”thutyasaphaြင’ya arahattaphiုlyasiု’ chiုkyarokyakhaဲ’saññyaraှိsoya “thiုmaြtyachābhurā”saññya caငyacacyaekanya amaှnya
ā”phaြင’ya sisaင’yasithiုkyasañña’ya saccāññeyaျ tarā”maှnyasamaျှkiု charāmakū sayambhūñāṇyaphaြင’ya mimialiုliု kiုyya

nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
alhanyaamaငya” raှိsetupyavapyakhaြငya”kiု paြုtoyamū၏． īsiု’laျှငya bhurā”raှငyasaññya lhanyamaြtyaso pūjoyakhaြငya”kiု
raraှိtoyamū၏． (visuddhi-1-261．)
amaြtyachuṃ” pūjoyamaှု
bhurā”raှငyasaññya parinibbānyacaṃto’mañña’ya kachunyalapaြñña’yane’ ññaña’yaakhā၌ mallāmaငya”tiု’၏ aငyakaြငya”uyaျာñya
athaငya”vayya aငyakaြငya”paငyapaျိုacuṃtiု’၏ akaြာ”၌ khaငya”thā”apyaso ññoငyacoငya”thakya၌ lakyaျာnaṃtoငya”phaြင’ya
coငya”laျkya lakyaျာkhaြteoyapoya၌ lakyavaဲkhaြteoyakiု anaññya”ငyyalhanyaaောငya taငyathā”toyamūlaျkya sati
sampajañya ñāṇyayaှñyatoyamūlaျkya maြtyasoaိpyakhaြငya” laျောငya”cakyakhaြငya” iriyāputhyakiု paြုtoyamū၏．
thiုakhaျိnyaakhā၌ aငyakaြငya”paငyapaျိုacuṃtiု’saññya araငya”maှsaññya aphaျာ”siု’tiုငyaaောငya akhāmaဲ’ panya”tiု’phaြင’ya
paငyaluṃ”kaျhatya phaင’ya၍ nekaြkunya၏． acuṃacuṃso aငyakaြငya”paငyapaျိုtiု’sāmaka sacyapaငyaā”luṃ”tiု’saññyalaññya”
paငyaluṃ”kaျhatya phaင’yalaျkya raှိkaြlekunya၏． thiုmallāmaငya”tiု’၏ aငyakaြငya”uyaျာñyaathaငya”၌ sāmaka aluṃ”cuṃso
cakaြ0ḷā lokadhātyapoငya” tiုkyatacyasoငya”athaငya”၌ aphaင’yaphaင’yaso apaငyamaှnyasamaျှ phaင’yakaြkunya၏， asī”
sī”so apaငyamaှnyasamaျှ sī”kaြkunya၏， aluṃ”cuṃsosacyapaငyatiု’၏ paငyacaññyatiု’၌ paငyacaññya padummākaြာpanya”tiု’saññya，
akhakyatiု’၌ akhakyapadummākaြာpanya”tiု’saññya， nhayyatiု’၌ nhayyapadummākaြာpanya”tiု’saññya， koငya”kaငyatiု’၌ koငya”
kaငya ākāsapadummākaြာpanya”tiု’saññya， maြpeြငya၌ maြpeြငyakiု phokyakhhaဲlaျkya tutyakaဲ’siု’ sanyamāso ariု”
raှိso padummākaြာpanya”tiု’saññya phaင’ya၍ lākaြkunya၏． aluṃ”cuṃso mahāsamuddarāsaññya aroငya (5)maျို”raှိso
padummākaြာpanya”tiု’phaြင’ya phuṃ”aုpyalaျkyaraှိ၏． yūjanā suṃ”thoငya apaြောkaျyyaso himavantā totoငyasaññya
laññya” tacyakhaဲnakyathūthapyachā phhaဲ’khaျññyathā”apyaso udoငya”maြီ”caññya”kaဲ’siု’， tacyakhunaှင’yatacyakhu akaြာ”apaြtya maraှိ
aောငya chakyacapyaneso panya”chiုငya”khaျုံputyakaဲ’siု’， koငya”chā caññya”laျkya phhaဲ’khaျññyathā”apyaso panya”chiုငya”kaဲ’siု’，
koငya”chā apaြñña’yathañña’yathā”so panya”cakokaဲ’siု’ alhanya mhe’laျောyaphhayya phaြcyane၏．
bhummaciု”natyatiု’ka koငya”chā laှုpyaapyaso paငyacaññya akhakyaakhha raှိkaြkunyaso thiုaငyakaြငya”paငya acuṃ
tiု’saññya bhurā”raှငyaā” pūjoyaranya aliု’ငှာ bhurā”raှငya၏ khandhākiုyyathakyasiု’ thiု akhāmaဲ’phaင’yaso panya”tiု’kiု
kaြဲphaြna’yakaြkunya၏， bhurā”raှငya၏ khandhāaိmya rūpakāyatoya tacyakhuluṃ”kiု lhaှmya”khaြုံthā”liုkyabhisakaဲ’siု’ kaြဲphaြna’ya
kaြkunya၏， aphanyaphanya athapyathapya mapaြtya kaြဲphaြna’yakaြkunya၏． natya၌ phaြcyakunyaso mandāra0natyapanya”casañña’ya natyapanya”
maျို”cuṃtiု’saññyalaññya” koငya”kaငyamaှ kaျchaငya”lākaြkunya၏， bhurā”raှငyaā” pūjoyaranyaaliု’ငှာ thiုnatyapanya”maျို”cuṃtiု’kiု
bhurā”raှငya၏ khandhākiုyyathakyasiု’ kaြဲphaြna’yakaြkunya၏， bhurā”raှငya၏ khandhāaိmya rūpakāyatoya tacyakhuluṃ”kiု lhaှmya”khaြုံ
thā”liုkyabhisakaဲ’siု’ kaြဲphaြna’yakaြkunya၏， aphanyaphanya athapyathapya mapaြtya kaြဲphaြna’yakaြkunya၏． natya၌phaြcyakunyaso
candakū”naṃ’sāmaှုna’ya maျို”cuṃtiု’saññyalaññya” koငya”kaငyamaှ kaျchaငya”lākaြkunya၏， bhurā”raှငyaā” pūjoyaranyaaliု’ငှာ
thiုcandakū”naṃ’sāmaှုna’ya maျို”cuṃtiု’kiု bhurā”raှငya၏ khandhākiုyyathakyasiု’ kaြဲphaြna’yakaြkunya၏， bhurā”raှငya၏ khandhāaိmya rūpa
kāyatoya tacyakhuluṃ”kiု lhaှmya”khaြုံthā”liုkyabhisakaဲ’siု’ kaြဲphaြna’yakaြkunya၏， aphanyaphanya athapyathapya mapaြtya kaြဲphaြna’ya
kaြkunya၏． bhurā”raှငyaā” pūjoyaranyaaliု’ငှာ natya၌ phaြcyakaြkunyaso tūriyāmaျို”cuṃtiု’kiုlaññya” koငya”kaငya၌
tī”maှုtyanekaြkunya၏， bhurā”raှငyaā” pūjoyaranyaaliု’ငှာ bhurā”raှငya၏ ñāṇyatoyamaြtyakiု āruṃpaြု၍ phaြcyapoya
lākaြkunyaso natya၌ phaြcyakunyaso natyasīkhaျငya”saṃtiု’saññyalaññya” koငya”kaငya၌ phaြcyapoyanekaြkunya၏．
thiုakhā၌ bhurā”raှငyasaññya araှငyaānandāmatheryamaြtyakiု īsiု’ mina’yakaြာ”toyamū၏． ----

viharissanti． āmisapūjā ca nāmesā sāsanaṃ ekadi0sampi ekayāgupānakālamattampi sandhāretuṃ na
sakkoti． mahāvihārasadisauှိ vihārasahassaṃ mahācetiyasadisañca cetiyasahassampi sāsanaṃ
dhāretuṃ na sakkonti． yena kammaṃ kataṃ， tasse0 hoti． sammāpaṭipatti pana tathāgatassa anucchavikā
pūjā． sā hi tena patthitā ce0， sakkoti sāsanañca sandhāretuṃ， tasmā taṃ dassento yo kho
ānandātiādimāha． (dī-ṭṭha-2-169．)

ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
īakaြောငya”naှcyarapyakaြောင’ya ī mahāparinibbānasuttanya၌ īmaျှ kaြီ”kaျyyaso pūjoyamaှုkiု payyamaြcya
toyamūkhaြငya” phaြcyapesaññya．
akayya၍kā” bhurā”raှငyasaññya īsiု’ payyatoyamamūငြာ”aṃ’， īsiု’ payyatoya mamūsaññyaraှိsoya noငya
anāgatyakāla၌ sīla၏phaြñña’yakaျင’yaphiု’rā lārāṭhāna၌ sīlakiု maphaြñña’yakaျင’yakaြkunyato’lattaṃ’， samādhi၏
phaြñña’yakaျင’yaphiု’rā lārāṭhāna၌ samādhikiု maphaြñña’yakaျင’yakaြkunyato’lattaṃ’， vipassanā၏ phaြñña’yakaျင’yaphiု’rā lārā
ṭhāna၌ vipassanātaññya”hūso kiုyyavanyakiု malhayyayūkaြcekunyato’lattaṃ’． mimitiု’kiု paccaññya”le”pā”phaြင’ya
paြုculupyakaျhe”nekaြkunyaso alupyaakaျhe” dāyakātiု’kiု pūjoyamaှုlupyaငnya”rapya၌ chokyataññyacelaျkya
pūjoyamaှုkiုsālaျှငya paြုcekunyalaျkya nethiုငyakaြkunyalattaṃ’． īmaျှsāmakase” - īpaccaññya”le”pā”phaြင’ya pūjoya
khaြငya” āmisapūjāmaññyasaññya sīla samādhi paññāhūso sikkhāsuṃ”rapya akaျင’yamaြtyaphaြင’ya simya”kaျုံ” rethakya
apyaso bhurā”raှငya၏ achuṃ”amatoyataññya”hūso sāsanātoyakiု tacyane’tāmaျှsoyalaññya”， yāgu
tacyakaျိုkyasokyarā akhaျိnyakālamaျှ tiုငyaruṃsoyalaññya” koငya”chā choငyathā”khaြငya”ငှာ machamya”niုငyape．
thaငyaraှာ”aောငya chiုrasoya --- mahāvihārakaျောငya”tiုkyanaှင’ya tūso kaျောငya”tiုkyakaြီ”poငya” tacyathoငya
saññyasoyalaññya”koငya”， mahācetītoyakaြီ”naှင’ya tūso cetītoyakaြီ”poငya” tacyathoငyasaññyasoya
laññya”koငya” sāsanātoyakiု taññyataṃ’aောငya choငyathā”khaြငya”ငှာ machamya”niုငyakaြlekunya， akaြငyapuggiုlyasaññya
kaျောငya”chokyakhaြငya” cetītoyakiု taññyathā”kiု”khayyakhaြငya”caso koငya”maှုkusiုlyakaṅkiု paြုlupya၏， thiု
koငya”maှုkusiုlyakiု paြုlupyasūathakyasālaျှငya phaြcyapesaññya． sīla samādhi paññāhūso sikkhāsuṃ”rapya
akaျင’yamaြtyakiု koငya”mhanya maှnyakanyachā kaျင’yakhaြငya”taññya”hūso sammāpaṭipattikaျင’yacañyasaññyakā” bhurā”raှငyaā”
laျောkyapatyaso pūjoyakhaြငya”taññya”． maှnyapesaññya ---- thiုsammāpaṭipatyakaျင’yacañyasaññyakā” thiုbhurā”raှငyasaññya
liုlā”toင’yatatoyamūapyaso arālaññya” phaြcya၏， sāsanātoyakiု araှññyakhiုငyakhaṃ’ taññyataṃ’aောငya choငya
thā”khaြငya”ငှာ chamya”laññya” chamya”niုငyapesaññya． thiုkaြောင’ya thiုsammāpaṭipatyakaျင’yacañyakiု ññhaှnyakaြာ”paြsatoyamūliုsaññya
phaြcya၍ lokuttarātarā” kiု”pā”ā” laျောyaso kaျင’yavatyapaṭipatyakiု kaျင’yakaြံkaြို”kutya phā”maျာ”ā”thutya

khaြငya”kā” amaြtyachuṃ” pūjoyakhaြငya”paငya phaြcyape၏． thiုkaြောင’ya sā0katacyaū”saññya bhurā”raှငya ññhaှnyakaြာ”paြsa
chiုchuṃ”matoyamūsañña’yaatiုငya” toarapyacasañña’ya arapyatacyakhukhu၌ rahanya”tarā”kiု kaျင’yakaြံkaြို”kutya phā”maျာ”

pūjoyalaျှငya bhurā”raှငyasaññya tapañña’yasā0kathaṃmaှ lhanyamaြtyaso pūjoyasakkārakiု raraှိsaññyamaññyakaြောငya” athakya
thaငya visuddhimaggaaṭṭhakathāka phhaင’yachiုkhaြငya” phaြcyapesaññya．

၌ maြkyatoraှုpyakiုlaññya”koငya”， sacyatoraှုpyakiုlaññya”koငya”， toငyaathapyathapyataññya”hūso toငyaraှုpyakiု
laññya”koငya” amaှီpaြု၍ punya”aောငya”laျkya tokaျhaဲ， ciုငya， vakya acaraှိso sā”koငyatiု’kiု araphamya”yū
sakaဲ’siု’ īupamāatūpaငya toarapyacasaññyatiု’၌ samathavipassanā naှcyaphaြာso bhā0nākammaṭṭhānya”kiု aphanyaphanya
athapyathapya phā”maျာ”ā”thutyalaျkya raှိso īyogā0cara rahanya”toyasaññya acañyaatiုငya” kaျင’yakaြံkaြို”kutya
phā”maျာ”ā”thutyakhaြငya”phaြင’ya sotāpattimagya sakadāgāmimagya anāgāmimagya arahattamagyatiု’kiုlaññya”koငya”，
maြtyaso ariyaphiုlyakiုlaññya”koငya” rayūniုငyapesaññya． thiုkaြောင’ya thiုyogā0cara rahanya”toya၏ bhā0nākiု
ā”thutyaneso parakkamachamya”ā”naှင’ya saင’yataင’yalaျောkyapatya koငya”maြtyaso maြneerāphaြcyaso arañña
senāsana hūso tokaျောငya” toငyakaျောငya”kiု ññhaှnyakaြာ”paြsatoyamūliုso bhurā”raှငyasaññya ----
“rahanya”tiု’ ...īsāsanātoya၌ rahanya”saññya tosiု’ shā”rokya၍ phaြcyace， sacyapaငyaraငya”siု’ shā”
rokya၍ phaြcyace， chityaငြိmyarā arapyasiု’ shā”rokya၍ phaြcyace taငyapallaငyakhhepaြီ”laျှငya kiုyyakiု phaြောင’yamatyachā
thā”၍ satikiု ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”siု’ raှေ”raှု phaြcyacelaျkya thiုငyane၏， thiုrahanya”saññya satiraှိlaျkyasālaျှငya
vaငyasakyalekiု raှူshaငya”၏， satiraှိlaျkyasālaျှငya thhakyasakyalekiု raှူthutya၏” ---- īsiု’ caso cakā”
toyakiု mina’yakaြာ”toyamūkhaြငya” phaြcyapesaññya． (visuddhi-1-261-262．)
arañña - rukkhamūla - suññāgāra
abhidhammānaññya”ā”phaြင’ya rhātaṅkhā”khuṃ၏ paြငyabhakya၌ taññyaraှိso arapyaā”luṃ”saññya arañña maññya၏．
(abhi-2-260．) suttanyanaññya”ā”phaြင’ya rhā၏ achanyaaphaျာ”kaျso aိmya၏ khaြံ0maှ aောkyathacyachuṃ”ā”phaြင’ya
kulale”tā apaြnya (500) khāve”soarapyasaññya āraññaka senāsana maññya၏． (vi-1-377．) īsiု’
hokaြာ”thā”toyamūapyakunyaso amaှtyalakkhaṇā raှိkunyaso toarapyatiု’thaငya amaှtyamaraှိ aluṃ”cuṃso
chityaငြိmyamaှု tityachityamaှု khaျmya”sāsukhakiု pe”chamya”niုငyaso arapyasaññya arañña maññya၏． thiုarañña amaññya
raso toarapyasiု’ kapyarokya၍ phaြcyace arahattaphiုlya athhatyatapyathā”so ī ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု
phā”maျာ”ā”thutyaranya raှေ”ū”chā bhurā”raှငyasaññya ññhaှnyakaြာ”toyamūpesaññya．
nemhanya”tañña’ya akhaျိnyaakhā၌ sacyapaငya၏ vanya”kaျငyapatyakhaျာ arapyachayyamaျkyanaှာluṃ”၌ sacyapaငyaripyasaññya paြna’yanaှံ’
laျkya taññyane၏， lematiုkyasoakhā၌ sacyarhakyatiု’saññya kaြhekaျkunya၏， īmaျှso atiုငya”atāphaြင’ya
rukkhamūla (= sacyapaငyaraငya”) hu khoyachiုpesaññya． īsiု’so rukkhamūlahu khoyachiုapyaso sacyapaငyaanī”siု’
khaျñya”kapya၍phaြcyace ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု phā”maျာ”ā”thutyaranya dutiya ññhaှnyakaြာ”toyamūsaññya．
toငya， khaျောkyakamya”pā”， toငyakhoငya”， susānya， toaုpya， lhaငyatī”khoငya， kokyariု”puṃ hūso
arañña-rukkhamūlamaှ kaြhaငya”so (7)maျို”so chityaငြိmyarāarapyasaññya suññāgāra maññya၏． thiု suññāgāra amaññya
raso tityachityaငြိmyasakyamaှု khaျmya”sāsukhakiု pe”chamya”niုငyasoarapyasiု’ khaျñya”kapya၍phaြcyace ānāpānassati
bhā0nākiု phā”maျာ”ā”thutyaranya bhurā”raှငyasaññya tatiyamaြောkya ññhaှnyakaြာ”toyamūsaññya．
nheutukāla၌ arañña amaññyaraso toarapyasaññya， choငya”utukāla၌ rukkhamūlaamaññyaraso
sacyapaငyaraငya”arapyasaññya， miု”utukāla၌ suññāgāra amaññyaraso tityachityaငြိmyasakyaso arapyasaññya
ānāpānassatibhā0nākiု phā”maျာ”ā”thutyaranyaathakya saင’yalaျောyalaျောkyapatya koငya”maြtya၏．

ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
tacyaphanya salipyadhātya thūpaြောso paငyakiုyyapakatiā”phaြင’ya salipyadhātyaā”koငya”so yogā
0cara puggiုlyaā” arañña maññyaso toarapyasaññya， saññya”khaြdhotya thūpaြောso yogā0carapuggiုlyaā”
rukkhamūlaamaññyaraso sacyapaငyaraငya”arapyasaññya， ledhātyathūpaြောso yogā0carapuggiုlyaā” suññāgāra
amaññyaraso tityachityaငြိmyasakyarā arapyasaññya ānāpānassatibhā0nākiု phā”maျာ” ā”thutyaranyaathakya
saင’yalaျောyalaျောkyapatya koငya”maြtya၏．
tacyaphanya mohacariုkya thūpaြောso puggiုlyaā” arañña amaññyaraso toarapyasaññya， dosacariုkya
thūpaြောso puggiုlyaā” rukkhamūlaamaññyaraso sacyapaငyaraငya”arapyasaññya， rāgacariုkya thūpaြောso puggiုlyaā”
suññāgāra amaññyaraso tityachityaငြိmyasakyarā arapyasaññya ānāpānassatibhā0nākiု phā”maျာ”ā”thutya
ranyaathakya saင’yalaျောyalaျောkyapatya koငya”maြtya၏． (mahāṭī-1-315-316．)
iriyāputhya rhe”khaျyyamaှု
īchiုapyakhaဲ’paြီ”sañña’yaatiုငya” thiုyogā0cararahanya”toyaā” utusuṃ”pā” dhātyasuṃ”pā” cariုkyasuṃ”pā”ā”
laျောyalaျောkyapatya koငya”maြtyaso ānāpānassatibhā0nānaှင’ya laျောyaso kaျောငya”aိpyarā nerākiု
ññhaှnyakaြာ”toyamūpaြီ”၍ ānāpānaāruṃmaှ cityamathana’yachutyashā”khaြငya” cityamapaျံ’lhaင’yakhaြငya” aphiု’raှိso ငြိmyasakya
so iriyāputhyakiု ññhaှnyakaြာ”paြsatoyamūliုso bhurā”raှငyasaññya thiုငya၍ ā”thutyaranya mina’yakaြာ”toya
mūpaြnyasaññya． aိpyakhaြငya” iriyāputhyakā” paျငya”rikhaြငya” kosajjaaphiု’ raှိ၏， ānāpānabhā0nālupyaငnya”rapyamaှ
cityadhātya thana’yachutyashā”tatya၏． rapyakhaြငya”， caṅkaြံlaျှောkyakhaြငya” iriyāputhyatiု’kā” cityapaျံ’lhaင’yakhaြငya” uddhaccaaphiု’
raှိkunya၏． ānāpānaāruṃmaှ cityapaျံ’lhaင’yanetatya၏． thiုငyakhaြငya” iriyāputhyakā” thiုkaဲ’siု’ paျငya”rikhaြငya”， bhā0nā
lupyaငnya”maှ cityadhātyakaျchaငya”khaြငya”， thana’yachutyakhaြငya”， cityapaျံ’lhaင’yakhaြငya”maျာ” maphaြcyatatyape． siု’athakya thiုငya၍
ā”thutyaranya bhurā”raှငya ññhaှnyakaြာ”toyamūpesaññya． (mahāṭī-1-316．)
tacyaphanya thiုsiု’ thiုငya၍ ā”thutyarā၌ taငyapallaငyakhhe၍ thiုငyakhaြငya”phaြင’ya thiုyogā0cara rahanya”toya၏
thiုငyakhaြငya”iriyāputhya၏ maြဲmaြံmaှုraှိsaññya၏ aphaြcyakiုlaññya”koငya”， athakyapiုငya”phaြcyaso khandhākiုyyakiု phaြောင’ya
phaြောင’yathā”khaြငya”phaြင’ya vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’kiု phaြcyacekhaြငya”၌ khaျmya”sālhayyakūmaှု raှိsaññya၏aphaြcyakiု
laññya”koငya”， vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalehūso kammaṭṭhānya”āruṃsiု’ satikiု raှေ”raှု kapyathā”khaြငya”phaြင’ya
vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalehūso ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”āruṅkiု simya”chaññya”khaြငya”၏ akaြောငya”tarā”kiု
laññya”koငya” ññhaှnyakaြာ”paြsatoyamūliုso bhurā”raှငyasaññya - “taငyapallaငyakhhepaြီ”laျှငya athakyapiုငya”phaြcyaso
khandhākiုyyakiု phaြောင’yamatyachāthā”၍ satikiု ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”siု’ raှေ”raှု phaြcyacelaျkya thiုငyanepā”hu mina’yamaှာ
toyamūlesaññya．

nākaျငyakiုkyakhaဲmaှု casañña’ya chaငya”raဲsañña’ya dukkhavedanātiု’saññya phaြcyapoyakaြlekunyarā၏， thiုvedanātiု’saññya
athakyapiုငya” khandhākiုyyakiု phaြောင’yaphaြောင’yathā”၍ thiုငyaneso yogā0cara rahanya”toya၏ santānya၌ maphaြcyapoya
niုငyakaြkunya， thiုchaငya”raဲsañña’ya dukkhavedanātiု’saññya maphaြcyapoyakaြkunyasaññyaraှိsoya thiုyogā0cara rahanya”toya၏
cityasaññya vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalehūso tacyakhutaññya”so ānāpānaāruṃ၌ taññyakaြññyalā၏，
ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”saññya malaျှောkaျto’bhaဲ， magyañāṇya phiုlyañāṇya nibbānyarasaññyatiုငyaaောငya tiု”takyacaññyakā”
kaြီ”phā”khaြငya”siု’ rokyaraှိniုငya၏． thiုkaြောင’ya taငyapallaငyakhhe၍ athakyapiုငya”kiုyyakiု phaြောင’yaphaြောင’yathā”kā ānāpāna
kammaṭṭhānya”kiု phā”maျာ”ā”thutyaranya bhurā”raှငyasaññya ññhaှnyakaြာ”toyamūkhaြငya” phaြcyasaññya． (visuddhi-1-262．)
thiုsiု’ ā”thutyarā၌ vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalehūso ānāpānaāruṃmaှ akhaြာ”tacyapā”so
āruṃamaျို”maျို”siု’ cityapaျံ’lhaင’yashā”maှုkiု tā”maြcyalaျkya ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”āruṃsiု’sālaျှငya satikiု raှေ”raှု
taññyacelaျkya ā”thutyaramaññya phaြcyasaññya．
so sato0 assasati， sato0 passasati
thiု yogā0cara rahanya”toyasaññya īsiု’laျှငya taငyapallaငyakhhe၍ athakyapiုငya”kiုyyakiု phaြောင’yaphaြောင’ya
thā”paြီ”soya īchiုapyakhaဲ’paြီ”sañña’yaatiုငya” vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalehūso ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”āruṃ၌
satikiု raှေ”raှုtaññyacelaျkya thiုsatikiု machana’yalhaှtyabhaဲ satiraှိsaññyaphaြcya၍sālaျှငya vaငyasakyalekiု raှူshaငya”၏，
satiraှိsaññyaphaြcya၍sālaျှငya thhakyasakyalekiု raှူthutya၏， satiraှိsaññyaphaြcya၍sālaျှငya vaငyasakyale thhakya
sakyalekiု paြုkaျင’yale’ raှိ၏， thiုyogā0cara rahanya”toya၏ santānya၌ satimaှ kaငya”lhatyaneso vaငyasakya
le thhakyasakyale၏ phaြcyakhaြငya”saññya maraှိhu chiုliုpesaññya．
yakhuakhā၌ akaြငyaakhaြငya”arātiု’phaြင’ya satiraှိsaññyaphaြcya၍sālaျှငya vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalekiု
paြုkaျင’yale’ raှိ၏， thiုakhaြငya”arātiု’kiု ññhaှnyakaြာ”paြsatoyamūliုsaññyaphaြcya၍ bhurā”raှငyasaññya catukkale”maျို”
tiု’phaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”laျkya， (16)maျို”so akhaြငya”arātiု’phaြင’ya ānāpānassatisamādhibhā0nākiု phā”maျာ”ā”thutya
puṅkiု ññhaှnyakaြာ”paြsatoyamūlesaññya． (visuddhi-1-263．) siု’athakya yaငya”catukkale”maျို”tiု’kiု raှေ”ū”chā
phoyapaြapyapāsaññya．

pabbakiု hokaြာ”toyamūrāvayya appanākammaṭṭhānya”aphaြcyanaှင’ya hokaြာ”thā”toyamūsaññyahu maှtyapā． appanā
kammaṭṭhānya”hūsaññya kaြññyalaငyatokyapaneso ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityakiု āruṃyū၍ upacārasamādhi khoya
upacārajhānyakiုlaññya”koငya”， siု’mahutya appanāsamādhi khoya appanājhānyakiုlaññya”koငya” raှေ”ū”chā raaောငya
ā”thutyapaြီ”pāmaှ thiုupacārasamādhi siု’mahutya thiုappanājhānyasamādhikiု vipassanā၏ akhaြpodaka paြု၍
vipassanāsiု’ kū”ranya hokaြာ”thā”toyamūsaññyahu chiုliုraငya” phaြcyasaññya． īsatyamaှtyakhaျkya achiုamina’yaara
īānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု phā”maျာ”ā”thutyaliုso asaငyayogīsūtoyakoငya”saññya vipassanāsiု’ makū”mī
siု’mahutya diṭṭhivisuddhicakhanya”siု’ makū”mī raှေ”ū”chā upacārasamādhijhānya siု’mahutya appanāsamādhijhānyakiု raaောငya
ā”thutyaramaññyahu kaြိုtaငyamaှtyasā”thā”pā．
