ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
(ga) assāsa-passāsa (2) maျို”
ānāpāna khoya assāsa-passāsa (= vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale) kiု raှုphā”puṃnaှင’ya patyasakya၍
bhurā”raှငyasaññya dhātyakammaṭṭhānya”lamya”maှ raှုphā”puṃnaññya”naှင’ya appanājhānyalamya”maှ raှုphā”puṃnaññya”hu naှcyanaññya” khhaဲkhaြာ”၍
hokaြာ”thā”toyamūkhaဲ’pesaññya．
mahāhatthipadopamasuttanya (ma-1-242-249．) mahārāhulovādasuttanya (ma-2-83-89．) dhātu
vibhaṅgasuttanya (ma-3-281-290．) abhidhammā dhātuvibhaငya”pāḷitoya (abhi-2-84-86．) casaññyatiု’၌ dhātya
kammaṭṭhānya” akaျyyaraှုphā”naññya”maျာ” lāraှိ၏． thiုdhātyakammaṭṭhānya” akaျyyaraှုphā”naññya” (42)koṭṭhāsatiု’thaငya
vāyokoṭṭhāsa (6)pā” lāraှိrā thiုvāyokoṭṭhāsa (6)pā”tiု’thaငya assāsa-passāsa vāyo
koṭṭhāsalaññya” pāvaငya၏．
thiုassāsa-passāsa vāyokoṭṭhāsa = vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalehūso vāyokoṭṭhāsa
hūsaññya cityakaြောင’ya phaြcyaso cittajarupyatarā”tiု’၏ siု’mahutya cittajarupyakalāpyatiု’၏ apoငya”acumaျှsā
phaြcyakaြောငya”kiု visuddhimaggaaṭṭhakathā၌ aောkyapāatiုငya” phhaင’yachiုthā”၏．
cittaje assāsapassāsakoṭṭhāsepi ojaṭṭhamakañce0 saddo cāti na0． (visuddhi-2-223．)
thiုaṭṭhakathāara assāsapassāsa = vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalehūsaññya cityakaြောင’ya phaြcyaso
cittajarupyakalāpyatiု’၏ apoငya”acumaျှsā phaြcyasaññya． yaငya” vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalehūso rupyakalāpyatiု’
thaငya rupyakalāpya asī”asī”၌ paramatthasaccānayyamaှ ñāṇyapaññāmaျkyaciphaြင’ya khhaဲkhaြာ”cityaphaြာ၍ dhātyakhhaဲkaြñña’yasoya
pathavī-āpo-tejo-vāyo-vaṇṇa-gandha-rasa-ojā-sadda (= asaṃ) hu rupyasabhotarā” (9)maျို”cī asī”
asī” raှိ၏． yaငya” rupyaparamatyasabhotarā”tiု’kiု ñāṇyapaññāmaျkyaciphaြင’ya khhaဲkhaြာ”cityaphaြာ၍ maြငyaaောငya raှုramaññya
phaြcyasaññya． yaငya” assāsa-passāsahūso vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale၌ taññyaraှိso dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”kiု
ciုkya၍ raှုliုkyapāka (6-dhāra၌ taññyaraှိso rupyatarā”tiု’kiု paramatyasiု’ ñāṇyaamaြငyachiုkyaaောငya simya”chaññya”
tatyaso yogā0carapuggiုlyaaphiု’) rupyakalāpyaamaှုnyamaျာ”kiုsā lhayyalhayyakūkū the’raှိmaññya phaြcyapesaññya．
yaငya”rupyakalāpya tacyakhu tacyakhu athaငya”၌ taññyaraှိso (9)maျို”so rupyatarā”tiု’kiု dhātyakhhaဲniုငyapāka paramatya
siု’ ñāṇyaamaြငya chiုkyashā”maññya phaြcyasaññya． (raှုpuṃnaññya”canacyamaျာ”kiု dhātyakammaṭṭhānya”piုငya” akaျyyaraှုphā”naññya”thaငya
kaြñña’yapā．)
īsiု’laျှငya rupyakalāpyamaျာ”kiုlaññya”koငya”， rupyakalāpya asī”asī”၌ taññyaraှိso dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”
tiု’၏ sabhā0satti asī”asī”kiုlaññya”koငya”， dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”kiု maှီthayya၍ phaြcyanekaြkunyaso upādārupya
asī”asī”kiုlaññya”koငya” ñāṇyaphaြင’ya khhaဲkhaြာ”cityaphaြာ၍ raှုrasaphaြင’ya īraှုphā”naññya”maှာ dhātyakammaṭṭhānya”lamya”cañyamaှ
raှုphā”naññya” phaြcyasaññya． akaြောငya”mū dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”kiု paြññyataññya၍ raှုpāmaှ thiုsiု’ paramatyasiု’ ñāṇyaamaြငya
chiုkyasañña’yatiုငyaaောငya raှုniုငya maြငyaniုငyasokaြောင’ya phaြcyasaññya．
tacyaphanya assāsa-passāsa = vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale၏ ----
1． araှññyakiု，
2． atiုkiု，
3． aca-alayya achuṃ” akunyaluṃ”kiု thaငyathaငyaraှာ”raှာ” siaောငya raှုramaññya．
4． vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalekiု ငြိmya”aောငya kaျင’yaramaññya ---- hūso
262
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
īññhaှnyakaြာ”khaျkyamaျာ”kā” jhānyaraaောငya raှုphā”naññya” ññhaှnyakaြာ”khaျkyamaျာ” phaြcyakaြsaññya． vaငyasakyale
thhakyasakyale၏ thimaှုthaငyaraှာ”rā naှာsī”phaျာ” siု’mahutya athakyanaှုtyakhamya”phaျာ” nimitya၌ vaငyasakyale thhakya
sakyale hūso parikammanimitya， thiုmaှtacyachaင’ya thiုvaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalekiု maှီ၍ phaြcyapoyalāso
uggahanimitya paṭibhāganimityahūso nimitya (3)maျို”kiု āruṃyū၍ acañyaatiုငya” raှုphā”raso kaျင’yacañya phaြcyasaññya．
īkaျင’yacañyakā” jhānyaraaောငya ā”thutyasañña’ya kaျင’yacañyaphaြcyasaphaြင’ya jhānyalamya”phaြcyasaññya． īsiု’laျှငya assāsapassāsa
= vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale၌ ---- dhātyakammaṭṭhānya”lamya”naှင’ya jhānyalamya”hu naှcyamaျို”raှိkaြောငya”kiု
kaြိုtaငya၍ khhaဲkhaြာ”maှtyasā”thā”pā．
(gha) aroငyanaှင’ya lakkhaṇākiု naှluṃ”mashaငya”ra
athānena taṃ nimittaṃ ne0 vaṇṇato manasikātabbaṃ， na lakkhaṇato paccavekkhitabbaṃ．
(visuddhi-1-278．)
vaṇṇatoti picupiṇḍatārakarūpādīsu viya upaṭṭhitavaṇṇato． lakkhaṇatoti kharabhāvādisabhā0-
to， aniccādilakkhaṇato vā． (mahāṭī-1-337．)
īathakyapā aṭṭhakathā ṭīkātiု’၏ maှာkaြာ”khaျkyaara ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု jhānyalamya”maှ cī”phaြnya”
ā”thutyaliုso asaငyayogīsūtoyakoငya”saññya vipassanāsiု’ makū”mī samādhi cataငyathūthoငyasañña’ya
apiုငya”၌ vāghamya”ciုငya kaြyyatārā casaññyatiု’kaဲ’siု’so ānāpānanimityapoyakhaဲ’soya thiုānāpānanimityakiု
vāghamya”ciုငya kaြyyatārā casaññyatiု’၌kaဲ’siု’ thaငyalāso aphaြူroငya casañña’ya aroငyaachaငya”ā”phaြင’yalaññya”
naှluṃ”mashaငya”pānaှင’ya．
akayya၍ aroငyaachaငya”ā”phaြင’ya naှluṃ”shaငya”khaဲ’soya vaṇṇakasiုṇya” (= aroငyakasiုṇya”) bhakyasiု’
rokyaraှိshā”maññya phaြcyasaññya， ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya” mahutyato’pe．
tacyaphanya vaငyale thhakyale၌ taññyaraှိso ----
1． pathavīdhātya၏ khakyamākaြmya”tamya”maှုsabho (= māmaှုsabho = kaြmya”maှုsabho)，
2． āpodhātya၏ yiုcī”maှုsabho phhaဲ’caññya”maှုsabho，
3． tejodhātya၏ pūmaှုsabho aေ”maှုsabho，
4． vāyodhātya၏ thokyakanyamaှုsabho ----
hūso dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”tiု’၏ kiုyyapiုငyasabhā0lakkhaṇākiုlaññya” naှluṃ”mashaငya”pānaှင’ya． dhātyakaြီ”
le”pā”tiု’၏ kiုyyapiုငyasabhā0lakkhaṇā asī”asī”kiု naှluṃ”shaငya” raှုphā”khaဲ’soya dhātyakammaṭṭhānya” phaြcyashā”maññya，
ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya” mahutyato’pe．
siု’athakya asaငyayogīsūtoyakoငya”saññya vaṇṇakasiုṇya” (= aroငyakasiုṇya”)kiု phā”maျာ”ā”
thutyaliုpāka vaṇṇakasiုṇya” caññya”kamya”naññya”lamya”atiုငya” tashematimya” liုkyanā၍ ā”thutyaramaññya phaြcyasaññya．
akayya၍ asaငyayogīsūtoyakoငya”saññya dhātyakammaṭṭhānya”kiု phā”maျာ”ā”thutyaliုpāka dhātya
kammaṭṭhānya” caññya”kamya”naññya”lamya”atiုငya”sālaျှငya liုkyanā၍ riုsechā ā”thutyaramaññya phaြcyasaññya．
akayya၍ jhānyalamya” ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု phā”maျာ”ā”thutyaliုpāka ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya” caññya”kamya”
naññya”lamya”atiုငya”sā liုkyanā၍ phā”maျာ”ā”thutyaramaññya phaြcyapesaññya． siု’maှsālaျှငya asaငyayogīsūtoya
263
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
koငya” liုlā”toင’yataneso liုapyaso akaျို”tarā”maျာ”saññya paြီ”cī” paြñña’yacuṃlāmaññya phaြcyasaññya．
akayya၍ ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု dhātyakammaṭṭhānya”paြုlupya၍ ā”thutyakhaဲ’soya kaျီ”laññya” mamaññya
kaြkyalaññya” mahutyasaphaြင’ya - sapityakhaဲ kiုyyakaြေ - phā”maျာ”ā”thutyarakaျို” manapya raှိkhaျmeññya， satipaြုpāle．
akaြောငya”kā” īsiု’ phaြcya၏
ānāpānapathamacatukkathaငya vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale၌ araှññyaatiု raှုranya bhurā”raှငyaka ññhaှnyakaြာ”
thā”toyamūlaျkya raှိ၏． raှññyamaှု tiုmaှုnaှင’ya patyasakya၍ aṭṭhakathā-ṭīkātiု’ka īsiု’ raှငya”paြthā”၏．
yā pana tesaṃ dīgharassatā， sā addhāna0sena veditabbā． pa ． tasmā tesaṃ kāla0sena
dīghamaddhānaṃ nikkhamantā ca pavisantā ca te “dīghā”， ittaramaddhānaṃ nikkhamantā ca pavisantā ca “rassā”ti veditabbā．
(visuddhi-1-263-264．)
addhāna0senāti kāladdhāna0sena． (mahāṭī-1-318．)
īathakyapā visuddhimaggaaṭṭhakathānaှင’ya mahāṭīkātiု’၏ adhippāyyaphhaင’yachiု raှငya”laငya”khaျkyaara vaငyasakyale
thhakyasakyaletiု’၏ raှññyamaှု tiုmaှု hūsaññyamaှာ ---- akhaျိnyakāla khapyaraှññyaraှññya khapyakaြာkaြာphaြcyaso vaငyasakyale
thhakyasakyalekiု dīgha (= araှññya) hū၍laññya”koငya”， akhaျိnyakāla khapyatiုtiု khapyamaြnyamaြnyaphaြcyaso vaငyasakyale
thhakyasakyalekiု rassa (= atiု) hū၍laññya”koငya” bhurā”raှငya khoyachiုtoyamūliုkaြောငya” siraှိrapesaññya．
akayya၍ īānāpānapabbakiု dhātyakammaṭṭhānya”lamya”cañya paြုlupya၍ ā”thutyakhaဲ’soya vāyoledhātya
paramatyatarā”၌ siု’mahutya dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”tiု’၌laññya” araှññya atiု raှိsaññyahupaငya lakyakhaṃrato’maññya phaြcyasaññya．
kāladdhāna = akhaျိnyakāla raှññyamaှု tiုmaှု， okāsaddhāna = arapyadesa (= arāvatthu ) ၏ raှññyamaှု tiုmaှုhu addhāna
= araှññya atiု naှcyamaျို”raှိrāthaငya īānāpānapabbapiုငya”၌ kāladdhānahūso akhaျိnyakāla၏ raှññyamaှု tiုmaှုkiုsā
aliုraှိapyasaphaြင’ya ----
1． vāyoledhātya paramatyatarā”၌ akhaျိnyakāla khapyaraှññyaraှññya khapyakaြာkaြာphaြcyaso vāyoledhātya
paramatyatarā”ka tacyamaျို”，
2． akhaျိnyakāla khapyatiုtiု khapyamaြnyamaြnya phaြcyaso vāyoledhātya paramatyatarā”ka tacyamaျို” ----
īsiု’ naှcyamaျို”raှိsaññyahu lakyakhaṃrato’maññya phaြcyasaññya．
alā”tūpaငya dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”luṃ”kiု khaြုံငုံ၍chiုrasoya dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”tiု’၌laññya” akhaျိnyakāla
khapyaraှññyaraှññya khapyakaြာkaြာphaြcyaso dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”ka tacyamaျို”， akhaျိnyakāla khapyatiုtiု khapyamaြnyamaြnyaphaြcyaso
dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”ka tacyamaျို” ---- īsiု’ naှcyamaျို”raှိsaññyahupaငya lakyakhaṃrato’maññya phaြcyasaññya． siု’soya paramattha
saccānayya၌kā” araှññyaatiု maraှိpe．
paramatthasaccānayya၌ araှ ññya atiု maraှိ
tāni pana sattarasa cittakkhaṇāni rūpadhammānamāyū． (abhidhammatthasaṅgaha vīthipiုငya”．)
athakyapā saṅgaြိုhyakaျmya”lā cakā”naှင’ya sammohavinodanīaṭṭhakathā cāmaျkyanaှာ (26)， pañcapakaraṇa
aṭṭhakathā cāmaျkyanaှာ (316)， visuddhimaggaaṭṭhakathā dutiyathaဲ cāmaျkyanaှာ (249)tiု’၌ lāraှိso phhaင’yachiုraှငya”
264
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
laငya”khaျkyamaျာ”ara viññatyarupya (2)khu， lakkhaṇarupya (4)khumaှ tacyapā”so (22)maျို”so rupyatarā”tiု’၏ sakya
tamya”kiု siု’mahutya rupyaacacyatiု’၏ sakyatamya” akhaျိnyakālakiု cittakkhaṇa (17)khaျkyaphaြင’ya puṃsetiုငya”tā၍ paြ
thā”pe၏． thiုcittakkhaṇa (17)khaျkya sakyatamya”kālathakya akhaျိnyakāla raှññyaraှññyakaြာkaြာ piု၍ asakyaraှññya
so rupyatarā”laññya” maraှိ， thiုcittakkhaṇa (17)khaျkyaaောkya sakyatamya”akhaျိnyakāla yutyalaျော’၍ akhaျိnyakāla
tiုtiု asakyaraှññyaso rupyatarā”laññya” maraှိpe， siု’athakya paramatthasaccānayya၌kā” araှññya atiု maraှိpe．
araှññya atiု maraှိso vāyoledhātya paramatyatarā”kiု tacyanaññya” dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”kiု yaငya” paramatya
tarā”tiု’၏ araှññya atiုkiု siaောငya kaြို”cā”ā”thutyanepālaျှငya asaငya yogīsūtoyakoငya”၏ bhā0nā
lupyaငnya”saññya khutyarā takhaြာ”， raှrā takhaြာ”sā phaြcyanepelima’yamaññya．
tacyaphanya īpathamacatukkathaငya akaျုံ”vaငyaso naṃpātya (4) ññhaှnyakaြာ”khaျkya phaြcyasañña’ya passambhayaṃ kāya
saṅkhāraṃ ---- ara vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalekiု alhana’yaalhanya simyamhe’nū”ññaṃ’aောငya kaျင’yaramaññya phaြcyasaññya．
thiုsiု’ kaျင’yarā၌ ----
catutthajjhāne atisukhumo appa0ttime0 pāpuṇāti． (visuddhi-1-267．)
catutthajhānyasiု’ chiုkyarokyashā”soakhā vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’၏ alhana’yaalhanya nū”ññaṃ’saphaြင’ya
0ငsya kaaf la thakha sya kaaf la၏ maraှိkhaြငya”sabhosapiု’ င f chakiု af rākasya mG ;pesañña．ya 0si du mdhi gaga ṭṭhakathā pathamathaဲ
cāmaျkyanaှာ (275)၌ asakyamaraှူso， vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale khaျုpyaငြိmya”neso puggiုlyamaျာ”၏ cāraငya”kiု
thutyaphoyarethakya၍ paြrāvayya catutthajjhānasamāpannānaṃ - hu phoyapaြthā”saphaြင’ya catutthajhānyasamāpatyakiု
vaငyacā”nekaြso puggiုlyamaျာ”laññya” pāvaငyakaြ၏．
siု’athakya īānāpānapathamacatukkakiု dhātyakammaṭṭhānya”lamya”cañya paြုlupya၍ asaငyayogīsūtoya

kiုsā the’raှိmaññya phaြcyasaññya． thiုrupyakalāpyatacyamaှုnya tacyamaှုnyakiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya khhaဲkhaြာ”cityaphaြာ၍ dhātyakhhaဲkaြñña’yapāka
asaṃlaျှငya (9)khumaြောkya raှိso rupyatarā”tiု’၏ apoငya”acumaျှsā phaြcyasaññyakiု the’raှိmaññya phaြcyapesaññya．
cityakaြောင’yaphaြcyasañña’ya cittajasaddana0kakalāpyapaငya phaြcyasaññya． maှုna’yamaှုna’yaññakyaññakya kaြneeso maျာ”chāso
thiုrupyakalāpyatiု’၏ apoငya”acukiု assāsa-passāsa (= vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale) hu samutisaccā
nayyamaှ khoyavoyasuṃ”chaဲkhaြငya” phaြcyasaññya． thiုvaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale athaငya”၌ taññyaraှိso rupyakalāpyatiု’kiု
paramatyasiု’ ñāṇyaamaြငya chiုkyaaောငya dhātyakhhaဲlaျkya yaငya”rupyatarā”tiု’kiု cataငya၍ simya”chaññya”so puggiုlyakiု
assāsa-passāsatiု’kiု simya”chaññya”so puggiုlyahu chiုliုsaññya maှtyapā， assāsa-passāsa kammikapuggiုlya
hu khoyachiုpesaññya． yaငya” assāsa-passāsa kammikapuggiုlyasaññya arahattaphiုlyapokya shā”liုkhaဲ’soya
raှေ’siု’ maññyasiု’ chakyalakya၍ kaျင’yaramaññyanaññya”¿ akaျñya”khaျုpya aphaြmeှာ aောkyapāatiုငya” phaြcyapesaññya．

yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya -- “ī assāsapassāsa = vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’saññya abhayyakiု maှီ၍

maññyasaññyakā” karajakāyataññya”． (cityacetasikyatiု’၏ maှီ၍phaြcyarā ṭhāna phaြcyasokaြောင’ya karajakāyasaññya
vatthu maññyapesaññya． ---- ma-ṭī-1-349．) karajakāya maññyasaññyakā” mahābhutya = dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”naှင’ya
thiုdhātyakaြီ”le”pā”tiု’kiု maှီ၍ phaြcyakaြkunyaso upādārupya (24)maျို”tiု’taññya””hu īsiု’laျှငya rupyatarā”kiု
simya”chaññya”၏， ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”yū၏． thiုmaှ nokya၌ thiုrupyatarā”kiု āruṃpaြု၍ phaြcyapoyalākaြkunyaso

ñāṇaṃ， tattha yathābhūtā0bodho． (mahāṭī-1-320．)
īmahāṭīkā၏ chiုliုraငya”maှာ īsiု’ phaြcya၏． īānāpānalupyaငnya”khhaငyakiု bhurā”raှငyasaññya kāyā-
nupassanāsatipaṭṭhānyapiုငya”thaငya thañña’yashaငya”၍ hokaြာ”thā”toyamūkhaဲ’၏． kāyānupassanā၌ anupassanā
ñāṇyahūsaññyamaှာ samathapiုငya”၌ ānāpānanimityakiု aphanyatalaဲlaဲraှုneso ñāṇyataññya”． vipassanāpiုငya”၌kā”
1． assāsa passāsa kāya-hūso cityakaြောင’yaphaြcyaso asaṃlaျှငya kiု”khumaြောkya raှိso (= cittaja
saddana0ka) kalāpyatiုငya”၌ taññyaraှိso paramattharupyatarā”maျာ”，
2． thiု assāsapassāsakāya amaññyaraso paramattharupyatarā”tiု’၏ maှီrā karajakāya amaññyaraso
tacyakiုyyaluṃ”၌ taññyaraှိso kaṃ-citya-utu-āhārahūso akaြောငya”tarā” le”pā”kaြောင’ya thaငyaraှာ”
phaြcyanekaြkunyaso bhūtarupya， upādārupyamaျာ” -- īnaှcyamaျို”so rupyatarā”maျာ”kiု “rupya”hulaññya”koငya”，
3． asicityakiုlaññya”koငya”， thiုasicityanaှင’ya yaှñyaphakya cetasikyatarā”cukiုlaññya”koငya” “nāmya”hu
piုငya”khaြာ”maှtyasā”၍ nāmyarupyakiု aphanyaphanya athapyathapya raှုkhaြငya”saññya kāyānupassanāñāṇyataññya”． thiု
nāmyarupya၌ya hutyatiုငya”maှnyachā kiုyyatiုငyamaျkyamaှောkya thhaငya”phokyasimaြငyamaှုtaññya”． (mahāṭī-1-320．)
īkā” ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု cī”phaြnya”neso yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya samathapiုငya” vipassanāpiုငya”
naှcyapiုငya”luṃ”tiု’၌ maññyasañña’yatarā”maျာ”kiု raှုphā”suṃ”sapyanepāmaှ kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānyakiု phā”maျာ”nesaññya
maññyakaြောငya” phhaင’yachiုkhaျkyamaျာ”paငyataññya”．
siု’athakya ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု cī”phaြnya”phā”maျာ” ā”thutyanesopuggiုlyasaññya upacārasamādhi，
appanāsamādhihu naှcyamaျို”paြာ”so ānāpānasamādhi tacyakhukhukiု vipassanā၏ akhaြpodaka paြု၍ ----
272
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
1． assāsapassāsa kāya amaññyaraso paramattha rupyatarā”maျာ”，
2． thiုassāsa passāsa rupyatarā”tiု’၏ maှီrā karajakāya amaññyaraso tacyakiုyyaluṃ”၌ taññyaraှိso
bhūtarupya upādārupyamaျာ”，
3． thiုrupyatarā”kiု āruṃpaြု၍ phaြcyapoyalākaြkunyaso nāmyatarā”maျာ” ----
ī rupyatarā”， nāmyatarā”tiု’kiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya koငya”chā raှုniုငyapaြီ”pāmaှ kiုyyatiုငyamaျkyamaှောkya thhaငya”phokya
simaြငyapaြီ”pāmaှ thiုrupya-nāmyatiု’၏ akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’kiု raှာphhelaျkya akaြောငya”tarā”naှင’ya takhaso thiုrupyanāmyatiု’kiုsālaျှငya
lakkhaṇāyāñyasuṃ”khaျkya taငya၍ vipassanāraှုramaññya vipassanāraှုkoငya”saññyahu pāḷitoyaaṭṭha
kathā-ṭīkātiု’ apoya၌ yuṅkaြññyamaြtyaniု” kiု”cā”so cityathā”phaြင’ya riုsechā nāyūmaှtyasā”thā”le
rāsaññya． (thiုrupya-nāmyatiု’kiုlaññya”koငya”， raှုphā”puṃcanacyamaျာ”kiုlaññya”koငya” rupyakammaṭṭhānya”piုငya” nāmyakammaṭṭhānya”
piုငya”tiု’thaငya ase”citya phoyapaြmaññya phaြcyapesaññya．)
īkā” ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု cī”phaြnya”so yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya ānāpānanimitya poyalāsoya
thiု ānāpānanimityakiု ----
1． aroငyaā”phaြင’ya naှluṃ”mashaငya”saင’yapuṃ，
2． khakyamākhaြငya”caso sabhā0lakkhaṇāā”phaြင’ya naှluṃ”mashaငya”saင’yapuṃ，
3． anicca-dukkha-anattahūso sāmaññalakkhaṇākiုlaññya” naှluṃ”mashaငya”saင’yapuṃnaှင’ya patyasakya၍ raှငya”laငya”
taငyapaြkhaျkyamaျာ”paငyataññya”．
siု’soya ānāpānakiု phā”maျာ”ā”thutyacaphaြcyaso yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya ānāpānanimitya mapoyamī
athaငya”၌laññya” ānāpānaamaññyaraso vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalekiု āruṃyū၍ samādhi cataငyathūthoငya
khiုkya၌laññya” sabhā0lakkhaṇānaှင’ya sāmaññalakkhaṇātiု’kiု naှluṃ”mashaငya”saင’yasaññyasā phaြcyapesaññya． khakyamākhaြငya”
caso sabhā0lakkhaṇākiု naှluṃ”shaငya”nepāka ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု phā”saññya mamaññyato’bhaဲ dhātyakammaṭṭhānya”
kiု phā”nesaññyasā maññyapelima’yamaññya．
tacyaphanya akayya၍ asaငyayogīsūtoyakoငya”saññya vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale၌ rupyakalāpyamaျာ”
kiုlaññya” mamaြငyase”pābhaဲlaျkya， maြငyasoyalaññya” rupyakalāpyamaျာ”kiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya khhaဲkhaြာ”cityaphaြာ၍ dhātyamakhhaဲniုငya
se”saphaြင’ya assāsapassāsakāya amaññyaraso rupyaparamatyaacacyakiုlaññya” ñāṇyaphaြင’ya mamaြငyase”pābhaဲlaျkya
yaငya” vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalekiု phaြcya-paျkya raှုnepāka anicca-dukkha-anattahu sāmaññalakkhaṇākiု naှluṃ”
shaငya”nepāka paññatyakiုsālaျှငya phaြcya-paျkyaraှုnesaññya， paññatyakiုsālaျှငya anicca-dukkha-anattahu lakkhaṇā
re”taငyakā vipassanā raှုnesaññya maññyapesaññya．
dasa kasiṇā， dasa asubhā， ānāpānassati， kāyagatāsatīti imāni dhāvīsati nimittā-
rammaṇāni． (visuddhi-1-109．)
īathakyapā visuddhimaggaaṭṭhakathā၏ phhaင’yachiုkhaျkyaara ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānya”kā” nimityakiု āruṃ
paြုso kammaṭṭhānya”taññya”．
sesāni mahaggatacittāni sabbānipi paññattārammaṇāni．
(abhidhammatthasaṅgaha， pakiṇya”piုငya”， ārammaṇasaṅgaha．)
273
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
ī athakyapā saṅgaြိုhyakaျmya”၏ phhaင’yachiုkhaျkyaara paññatyakiု āruṃpaြုso mahaggutyacitya amaျို”acā”thaငya
īānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”laññya” pāvaငyapesaññya． ī၌ vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalekiု santatighana samūhaghana
kiccaghanahūso rupyatuṃ”rupyakhaဲtiု’kiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya phaြိုkhhaဲphaျkyachī”laျkya rupyaparamatya acacyasiု’ ñāṇyaamaြငyachiုkyaaောငya
maraှုphā”niုငyase”saphaြင’ya vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalehūso atuṃ”akhaဲkiုlaññya” paññatyahupaငya khoyachiုsaññya．
yaငya” pakati vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalekiု akaြောငya”khaṃ၍ phaြcyapoyalāso vāghamya”ciုငyakaဲ’siု’ chhatyachhatyaphaြူ
neso ānāpānauggahanimitya， kaြyyatārā casaññyatiု’kaဲ’siု’ kaြññyalaငyatokyapaneso ānāpāna
paṭibhāganimityatiု’kiုlaññya” rupyaghanahūso atuṃ”akhaဲ mapaြိုse”saphaြင’ya paññatyahupaငya khoyachiုkhaြငya” phaြcyasaññya．
siု’athakya ānāpānassatisamādhi၏ āruṃmaှာ paññatyaphaြcyasaññyahu maှtyapā． paññatyakā” phaြcya-paျkya maraှုkoငya”
vipassanā maraှုkoငya”， paramatyakiုsā phaြcya-paျkya raှုkoငya”saññya vipassanā raှုkoငya”saññya．
paññatya-paramatya
ī၌ ānāpāna = vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale၌ paññatya-paramatya ayūachanaှင’ya patyasakya၍ saṃsaya
kaငya”raှငya”shā”aောငya aṭṭhakathā ṭīkātiု’၏ achiုamina’yamaျာ”kiု chakyalakya၍ taငyapaြapyapāsaññya．
cuṇṇavicuṇṇavisaṭe assāsakāye passāsakāye vā ... (visuddhi-1-265．)
cuṇṇavicuṇṇavisaṭeti anekakalāpatāya cuṇṇavicuṇṇabhāvena visaṭe． (mahāṭī-1-321．)
īathakyapā aṭṭhakathā ṭīkātiု’၏ achiုamina’yamaျာ”ara vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalehūsaññya maှုna’yamaှုna’ya
ññakyaññakya paြna’yakaျဲneso rupyakalāpyapoငya”maျာ”chātiု’phaြင’ya poငya”cutaññyachokyathā”so rupyakalāpyatiု’၏
apoငya”acumaျှsā phaြcyasaññya． thiုapoငya”acusaññyakā” vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalethaငya”၌ taññyaraှိso
rupyakalāpyamaျာ”kiု mamaြငyase”pāka， thiုkalāpyamaျာ”kiုlaññya” ñāṇyaphaြင’ya khhaဲkhaြာ”cityaphaြာ၍ rupyakalāpyatacyakhucī
tacyakhucī athaငya”၌ taññyaraှိso pathavī-āpo-tejo-vāyo-vaṇṇa-gandha-rasa-ojā-asaṃ hūso rupya
paramatya acacyamaျာ”kiု paramatyasiု’ ñāṇyaamaြငyachiုkyaaောငya yaငya” (9)maျို”so rupyatarā”tiု’၏ kiုyyapiုငyasabhā0
satti sabhā0lakkhaṇāsiု’ ñāṇyaamaြငyachiုkyaaောငya maraှုniုငyase” dhātyamakhhaဲniုငyase”pāka santatipaññatya samūha
paññatya makhāse”saphaြင’ya paññatyanayyamaှာsā raှိnese”saññya． santatipaññatya samūhapaññatya makhāse”so
paññatyanayyamaှာsā raှိnese”so ghanaatuṃ”akhaဲ mapaြိုse”so vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalekā” vipassanā
ñāṇya၏ araှုkhaṃāruṃ mahutyape． vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalethaငya”၌ taññyaraှိso rupyakalāpyatiုငya” rupya
kalāpyatiုငya”၌ pāvaငyaso (9)maျို”so paramattha rupyasabhotarā”tiု’saññyasālaျှငya vipassanāñāṇya၏ araှုkhaṃ
āruṃ phaြcyapesaññya． thiုkaြောင’ya paññatyakiုkā” vipassanā maraှုkoငya” paramatyakiုsā vipassanā raှုkoငya”saññya
hu athakya၌ paြောchiုkhaြငya” phaြcyapesaññya．
siု’soya ānāpānalamya”cañyamaှ upacārasamādhihūso upacārajhānya， appanāsamādhihūso appanā
jhānyakiု aliုraှိkhaဲ’pāmū vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale athaငya”၌ taññyaraှိso rupyakalāpyatiုငya”၌ taññyaraှိso
(9)maျို”so paramattharupyatarā”tiု’kiု āruṃyū၍ samādhithūthoငyakhaဲ’soya upacārajhānya appanājhānyatiု’kiု maraniုငya．
akaြောငya”mū ānāpānajhānyalamya”kā” nimitta amaññyaraso ānāpānapaññatyakiုsā āruṃyū၍ samādhi
thūthoငyarasokaြောင’ya phaြcyasaññya． siု’athakya liုraငya” akhaျုpyamaှtyasā”ranyakā” ----
1． ānāpānajhānyakiု aliုraှိkhaဲ’soya nimittaamaññyaraso ānāpānapaññatyakiု āruṃyū၍ raှုpā．
274
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
2． vipassanāñāṇyakiု aliုraှိkhaဲ’soya paramatyakiု āruṃyū၍ raှုpā hū၏． yaငya” paramatyatarā”tiု’kā” ----
(ka) assāsa passāsakāya (kha) karajakāya khoya rūpakāya， (ga) nāmakāyatiု’paငya phaြcyakaြsaññya．
(င) nimitya (3) maျို”
īthaငya nimitta amaññyaraso ānāpānanimityaakaြောငya”kiု chakyalakya၍ taငyapaြapyapāsaññya． īānā
pānakammaṭṭhānya”၌ nimityasuṃ”maျို” raှိ၏．
1． parikammanimitya，
2． uggahanimitya，
3． paṭibhāganimityahu nimityasuṃ”maျို” raှိ၏．
thiုsuṃ”maျို”tiု’thaငya uggahanimityanaှင’ya paṭibhāganimityaakaြောငya”kā” nokyapiုငya”thaငya thaငyaraှာ”lāpālima’yamaññya．
parikammanimitya akaြောငya”kiု īthaငya anaññya”ငyya raှငya”laငya”taငyapaြapyapāsaññya．
parikammanimitya
ime hi dīghanāsikassa nāsāpuṭaṃ ghaṭṭe ntā pavattanti， rassanāsikassa uttaroṭṭhaṃ． tasmānena
imaṃ nāma ṭhānaṃ ghaṭṭe ntīti nimittaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ． (visuddhi-1-275．)
= ī vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’saññya naှာkhoငya”raှññyasosūā” naှာkhoငya”phukiု (= naှာsī”phaျာ”kiု)
thikhiုkyalaျkya phaြcyakaြkunya၏． naှာkhoငya”tiုso sūā” athakyanaှုtyakhamya”kiု thikhiုkyakunyalaျkya phaြcyakaြkunya၏．
thiုkaြောင’ya ī yogā0cararahanya”toyasaññya īvaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’saññya īmaññyaso nerākiု
thikhiုkyakunya၏hu nimityakiု thā”apya၏． (visuddhi-1-275．)
ī၌ nimityahūso ayūachanaှင’ya patyasakya၍ piု၍ asiñāṇya raှငya”laငya”shā”ranya paṭisambhidāmagga aṭṭha-
kathā၏ phhaင’yachiုkhaျkyakiု īthaငya chakyalakya၍ phoyapaြapyapāsaññya．
1． nimittanti assāsapassāsānaṃ phusanaṭṭhānaṃ． assāsapassāsā hi dīghanāsikassa nāsāpuṭaṃ
ghaṭṭento pavattanti， rassanāsikassa uttaroṭṭhaṃ．
2． yadi hi ayaṃ yogī taṃ nimittame0 āvajjati， tassa nimittame0 āvajjamānassa assāse
cittaṃ vikampati， na patiṭṭhātīti attho． tassa tasmi H citte appatiṭṭhite samādhissa abhā0to
taṃ vikampanaṃ samādhissa paripantho． yadi assāsame0 āvajjati， tassa cittaṃ abbha ntarapavesana0sena
vikkhepaṃ ā0hati， nimitte na patiṭṭhāti， tasmā nimitte vikampati． iminā nayena sesesupi
yojanā kātabbā． (paṭisaṃ-ṭṭha-2-73．)
īathakyapā aṭṭhakathācakā”rapya၌ amaှtya (1) cakā”rapyasaññyakā” nimityakiု raှငya”paြso cakā”rapya
taññya”． amaှtya (2) cakā”rapyamaှာmū ānāpānassatisamādhi၏ ññacyanhamya”kaြောငya” upakkilesakiု phoyapaြso
cakā”rapyataññya”．
1． amaှtya (1) cakā”rapya၏ chiုliုraငya”maှာ īsiု’ phaြcya၏． nimityahūsaññya assāsa passāsa vaငyasakyale
thhakyasakyaletiု’၏ thirāṭhānataññya”． maှnyapesaññya vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’saññya naှာtaṃraှññyasūā”
275
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
naှာkhoငya”phu (= naှာsī”phaျာ”)kiု thikhiုkyalaျkya phaြcyakaြkunya၏． naှာtaṃtiုsūā” athakyanaှုtyakhamya”phaျာ”kiု thikhiုkyalaျkya
phaြcyakaြkunya၏． (paṭisaṃ-ṭṭha-2-73．)
īathakyapā aṭṭhakathāmaျာ”၏ cakā”ara naှာtaṃraှññyasūathakya naှာkhoငya”phu (= naှာsī”phaျာ”) saññya
nimityataññya”． naှာtaṃtiုsūathakya athakyanaှုtyakhamya”phaျာ”saññya nimityataññya”hu maှtyapā． liုraငya”maှာ vaငyasakyale
thhakyasakyale၏ thirāṭhānasaññya nimityamaññyasaññyahu maှtyasā”thā”pā．
yaငya”siု’phaြcyalaျှငya ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု cataငyaā”sacyaso yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya naှာtaṃ raှññyakhaဲ’
laျှငya naှာsī”phaျာ”kiု raှုrato’maññyalo， naှာtaṃ tiုkhaဲ’laျှငya athakyanaှုtyakhamya”phaျာ”kiု raှုrato’maññyalohu me”maြnya”
phhayyaraှိ၏． thiုame”kiု amaှtya (2) paြ aṭṭhakathācakā”rapyaka tacyacityatacyadesaā”phaြင’ya raှငya”paြthā”pāsaññya．
2． amaှtya (2)paြ cakā”rapya၏ chiုliုraငya”maှာ īsiု’ phaြcya၏． akayya၍ īyogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya naှာsī”phaျာ”
siု’mahutya athakyanaှုtyakhamya”phaျာ”taññya”hūso thiုnimityakiုsālaျှငya tacyaphakyasatya chaငyakhaြငyaငြာ”aṃ’， nimityakiု
sālaျှငya tacyaphakyasatya chaငyakhaြငya၍neso thiုyogīpuggiုlyaā” vaငyasakyale၌ cityasaññya tunyalaှုpya၏，
koငya”chā mataññyahu chiုliုsaññya． thiုvaငyasakyale၌ koငya”chā ငြိmyavapyachā cityataññyamaneso thiုyogā0cara
puggiုlyaā” vaငyasakyaloruṃ၌ cityataññyakaြññyamaှု samādhi၏ maraှိsaññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya thiုcityatunyalaှုpyamaှု
saññya samādhikiု tā”maြcyatatya၏， samādhi၏ bhe”ranya anaှောင’yaayaှkya phaြcya၏．
akayya၍ yogīpuggiုlyasaññya vaငyasakyalekiုsālaျှငya tacyaphakyasatya chaငyakhaြငyamiငြာ”aṃ’， thiု yogī
puggiုlya၏ cityasaññya athaငya”bhakyasiု’ vaငyashā”khaြငya”၏achamya”phaြင’ya (vaငyasakyale၏ shā”rālamya”kaြောငya”nokyasiု’
acañyatokyalaျှောkya cityaliုkyashā”maှုkiု chiုliုsaññya，) citya၏ paျံ’lhaင’yamaှုkiု rhakyachoငyatatya၏， naှာsī”phaျာ”
siု’mahutya athakyanaှုtyakhamya”phaျာ”taññya”hūso nimitya၌ cityamataññya phaြcyatatya၏． thiုkaြောင’ya nimitya၌ tunyalaှုpya
netatya၏． īnaññya”atiုငya” kaြhaငya”socakā”rapyatiု’၌laññya” anakyaadhippāyya yaှñyacapyamaှုkiု paြုpāle． (paṭisaṃ-
ṭṭha-2-73．) thiုkaြောင’ya thhakyasakyale၌laññya” naññya”tū sabhopokyapāle．
(ca) ānāpānassatisamādhi၏ ññacyanhamya”kaြောငya” upakkilesa (18) pā”
athakyapā aṭṭhakathācakā”rapya၌ kaြhaငya”socakā”rapyatiု’၌laññya” naññya”tū anakyaadhippāyya yaှñyacapya
maှုkiု paြုlupyaranya ññhaှnyakaြာ”thā”saphaြင’ya paṭisambhidāmagyapāḷitoya၌ lāraှိso ānāpānassatisamādhi၏ ññacyanhamya”
kaြောငya” upakkilesa (18)maျို”kiု īthaငya chakyalakya phoyapaြapyapāsaññya．

mhe”phhā”khāca kale”sūငyyasaññya raှေ”ū”chā athaငya”maှ lesaññya apaြငyasiု’ thhakya၏． nokyamaှ apaြငyaka lesaññya
athaငya”siု’ vaငya၏． īphaြcyacañyakiု kaြñña’ya၍ vinaññya”aṭṭhakathāka mina’yachiုtoyamūkhaြငya” phaြcyasaññya． suttanyaaṭṭhakathā
maျာ”၌kā” bhā0nālupyaငnya”khhaငyakiု bhā0nālupyaငnya”cañyakiု kaြñña’ya၍ ----

īathakyapā paṭisambhidāmaggaaṭṭhakathā၏ phhaင’yachiုtoyamūkhaျkya ara ----

2． passāsamaှာ thhakyasakyale phaြcyasaññyahu maှtyapā．
tacyaphanya īpaṭisambhidāmagyapāḷitoyanaှင’ya paṭisambhidāmagyaaṭṭhakathātiု’၏ mina’yamaှာtoyamūkhaျkyaara ---- ānā

athakyanaှုtyakhamya”maှsaññya naှluṃ”， tacyaphanya naှluṃ”maှsaññya khaျkyasiု’tiုငyaaောငya vaငyasakyale၏ nokyasiု’ satiphaြင’ya
acañyaliုkya၍ maraှုpānaှင’ya． khaျkyamaှsaññya naှluṃ”， tacyaphanya ---- naှluṃ”maှsaññya naှာsī”phaျာ” siု’mahutya athakyanaှုtyakhamya”
siု’mahutya apaြငyaākāsasiု’ tiုငyaaောငya thhakyasakyale၏ nokyasiု’laññya” satiphaြင’ya acañyaliုkya၍ maraှုpānaှင’ya．
thiုsiု’ vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale shā”rālamya”kaြောငya” tacyalaျှောkyasiု’ acañyataciုkya liုkya၍ raှုnesoya
cityasaññya āruṃtacyakhutaññya” tacyanerātaññya”၌ ငြိmyavapyachā kapya၍ mataññyato’bhaဲ athaငya”apaြငya naှcyabhakyaluṃ”
siု’ paျံ’lhaင’yanesaphaြင’ya samādhimaphaြcyaniုငya jhānyamaraniုငyahu maှtyapā．
siု’athakya ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု raှုphā”neso， ānāpānakiု āruṃpaြု၍ samādhithūthoငyaneso
yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya samādhithūthoငyakhiုkya၌ naှာsī”phaျာ” naှုtyakhamya”phaျာ”maှsaññya khaျkyavamya”biုkyasiု’tiုငyaaောငya
satiphaြင’ya liုkya၍ maraှုmiranya athū”satipaြုpā． thiု’paြငya naှာsī”phaျာ” siု’mahutya naှုtyakhamya”phaျာ”၏ paြငyabhakya ākāsa
siု’laññya” satiphaြင’ya liုkya၍ maraှုmiranyalaññya” athū”satipaြုpā．
dutiya chakka - apaြcya (6) pā”
1． nimityakiု chaငyakhaြငyaso puggiုlya၏ cityasaññya vaငyasakyale၌ tunyalaှုpya၏， samādhikiု tā”maြcyatatya၏．
2． vaငyasakyalekiု chaငyakhaြငyaso puggiုlya၏ cityasaññya nimitya၌ tunyalaှုpya၏， samādhikiု tā”maြcyatatya၏．
3． nimityakiု chaငyakhaြငyasopuggiုlya၏ cityasaññya thhakyasakyale၌ tunyalaှုpya၏， samādhikiု tā”maြcyatatya၏．
4． thhakyasakyalekiု chaငyakhaြငyasopuggiုlya၏ cityasaññya nimitya၌ tunyalaှုpya၏， samādhikiု tā”maြcyatatya၏．
5． vaငyasakyalekiု chaငyakhaြငyaso puggiုlya၏ cityasaññya thhakyasakyale၌ tunyalaှုpya၏， samādhikiု tā”maြcya
tatya၏．
6． thhakyasakyalekiု chaငyakhaြငyaso puggiုlya၏ cityasaññya vaငyasakyale၌ tunyalaှုpya၏， samādhikiု tā”maြcya
tatya၏． -- thiုkaြောင’ya ----

nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
1． nimityakiု chaငyakhaြငyaso puggiုlya၏ vaငyasakyale၌ paျံ’lhaင’yasocitya，
2． vaငyasakyalekiု chaငyakhaြငyaso puggiုlya၏ nimitya၌ tunyalaှုpyasocitya，
3． nimityakiု chaငyakhaြငyasopuggiုlya၏ thhakyasakyale၌ paျံ’lhaင’yasocitya，
4． thhakyasakyalekiု chaငyakhaြငyasopuggiုlya၏ nimitya၌ tunyalaှုpyasocitya，
5． vaငyasakyalekiု chaငyakhaြငyasopuggiုlya၏ thhakyasakyale၌ paျံ’lhaင’yasocitya，
6． thhakyasakyalekiု chaငyakhaြငyasopuggiုlya၏ vaငyasakyale၌ tunyalaှုpyasocitya ----
ī (6)pā”tiု’saññya ānāpānassatisamādhi၏ ññacyanhamya”kaြောငya” = upakkilesatarā”tiု’taññya”．
(paṭisaṃ-164．)
««maှtyakhaျkya ---- ī၌ nimityahūsaññya vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyaletiု’၏ thirāṭhānaphaြcyaso naှာkhoငya”phu
(= naှာsī”phaျာ”)， siု’mahutya athakyanaှုtyakhamya”phaျာ”hūso ṭhānaarapyakiု chiုliုsaññya．»»
tatiya chakka - apaြcya (6) pā”
1． vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyale၏ thirāṭhānakiု kaျောyalhanya၍ vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyale nokyasiု’
acañyaliုkyaso cityasaññya paျံ’lhaင’yakhaြငya”phaြင’ya acañyaliုkya၍ (= paျံ’lhaင’yakhaြငya”siု’ acañyaliုkya၍) samādhi၏
anaှောင’yaayaှkya bhe”ranya phaြcya၏．
2． vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyale၏ thirāṭhānasiု’ marokyaraှိlāse”so vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyalekiု
toင’yataso cityasaññya tunyalaှုpya၍ samādhi၏ anaှောင’yaayaှkya bhe”ranya phaြcya၏．
3． vīriyalaျော’lhanya”saphaြင’ya bhā0nāmaှု၌ thana’yachutyaso cityasaññya paျငya”risaññya၏ aphaြcyasiု’ acañyaliုkya၍
samādhi၏ anaှောင’yaayaှkya bhe”ranya phaြcya၏．
4． alhanyakhaျီ”maြှင’ya ā”thutyathā”apyaso cityasaññya (= alhanyatakyakaြhalhanya”so cityasaññya) paျံ’lhaင’yakhaြငya”siု’
acañyaliုkya၍ samādhi၏ anaှောင’yaayaှkya bhe”ranya phaြcya၏．
5． sāyāphhayya vatthutiု’၌ alhanyaññhatyaso cityasaññya rāgasiု’ acañyaliုkya၍ samādhi၏ anaှောင’yaayaှkya
bhe”ranya phaြcya၏．
««īarā၌ vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyale nimityakiု naှluṃ”shaငya”neso yogā0carapuggiုlya sūmaြtya၏
santānyavayya phaြcyapoyalāso pīti sukha၌laññya”koငya”， raှေ”ka paျောyarhaှငyamaြူ”thū” paြောငyalaှောငya paြောchiုphū”
kacā”phū”so vatthutiု’၌laññya”koငya” rāgaacañyaliုkyakhaြငya”kiု chiုliုsaññya． (paṭisaṃ-ṭṭha-2-73．)»»
6． sāyāphhayyavatthutiု’၌ ññhatyakhaြငya”kaငya”so cityasaññya baျာpādasiု’ acañyaliုkya၍ samādhi၏ anaှောင’ya
ayaှkya bhe”ranya phaြcya၏．
««īarā၌ vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale nimityakiု naှluṃ”shaငya”rā၌ sāyāphhayyakaငya”khaြငya”siု’ rokyaso
cityadhātyaraှိso yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ santānya၌ phaြcyapoyalāso cityanaှluṃ” masāyākhaြငya” = domanassa၏
achamya”phaြင’yasoyalaññya”koငya”， raှေ”၌ le’kaျkyaphū”kunyaso ranyaငြို”phhaဲ’khaြငya” āghātathā”khaြငya” āghāta
vatthutiု’၌laññya”koငya” baျာpāda (= dosa) acañyaliုkya၍ phaြcyakhaြငya”kiု chiုliုsaññya． (paṭisaṃ-ṭṭha-2-73．)»»
īkā” ānāpānassatisamādhi၏ ññacyaññū”kaြောငya”tarā” = upakkilesa (18)pā”taññya”．
279
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
(cha) siaောငya ā”thutyaramañña’ya akhaျkya
ī athakyapā caññya”kamya”satyamaှtyakhaျkyamaျာ”kiု aphanyaphanya athapyathapya phatyaraှုpā， chiုliုraငya”kiု sabho
miaောငya kaြံpā． athakyapā arapyarapyaso cakā”tiု’၏ chiုliုraငya”kā” īsiု’ phaြcya၏．
1． vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale sakyasakyakiုsā naှာsī”phaျာ” siု’mahutya athakyanaှုtyakhamya”maှsaññya khaျkyasiု’
tiုငyaaောငya， tacyaphanya khaျkyamaှsaññya naှာsī”phaျာ” siု’mahutya athakyanaှုtyakhamya”siု’ tiုငyaaောငya tacyaphakyasatya
acañyataciုkya liုkya၍ siaောငya maraှုra．
2． vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale၏ thirāṭhānahūso nimityasakyasakyakiုlaññya” kaြñña’ya၍ manera．
ī chiုliုraငya” akhaျkya naှcyakhaျkyakiု maှtyasā”thā”pā． siု’phaြcyalaျှငya maññyasiု’ kaျင’yaramaññyanaññya”hu me”ranya

saphaြင’ya alhanya lhayyakūnemaññyasā phaြcya၏． tacyaphanya thiုsamādhikiု akhaြkheṃ၍ nokyathapya samādhikiု tacyachaင’ya
paြောငya”၍ thūthoငyasoya acimya”sakyasakyathakyakā” piု၍lhayyakūsaññyakiု yogī toyatoya khapyamaျာ”maျာ”၌
the’raှိrapesaññya．

ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
akayya၍ odātakasiုṇya” ālokakasiုṇya”caso kasiုṇya”tiု’phaြင’ya samādhi mathūthoငyarase”
so yogā0carapuggiုlyaphaြcyalaျှငya ānāpānacaññya”kamya” naññya”lamya”atiုငya” acañyaatiုငya” achaင’yachaင’ya ā”
thutyaranya phaြcyapāsaññya．
kasiုṇya”tacyakhukhuphaြင’ya samādhithūthoငyapaြီ”so puggiုlyaphaြcyalaျှငya thiုsamādhikiု thūthoငyapaြီ”maှ thiုsamādhimaှ
thasoakhā ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု naှluṃ”shaငya”khaဲ’pālaျှငya ñāṇyathakyamaြkyaso yogā0carapuggiုlyalaññya”phaြcyapā
mū tacyathiုငya naှcyathiုငya athaငya”maှာpaငya uggahanimitya paṭibhāganimityamaျာ” poyalātatya၍ catutthajhānyasamādhisiု’
tiုငyaaောငya pokyarokyashā”so yogā0carapuggiုlyamaျာ”laññya” raှိtatya၏． ñāṇyaalayyaalatya raှိso
yogā0carapuggiုlyaphaြcyamū naှcyarakya suṃ”rakya athaငya”maှာpaငya uggahanimitya paṭibhāganimityamaျာ” poyalātatya၍
acañyaatiုငya” catutthajhānyasamādhisiု’ tiုငyaaောငya pokyarokyashā”so yogā0carapuggiုlyamaျာ”laññya” raှိ
tatyapesaññya． siု’athakya raှေ”raှေ”bhā0nāsamādhitiု’၏ araှိnyaavākiု chakyakhaṃliု၍， raှေ”raှေ” bhā0nāsamādhi
tiု’၏ nokyanokyaso bhā0nāsamādhiā” upanissayasattiphaြင’ya kaျေ”jū”paြုpe”maှု chamya”aငyasattithū”kaြီ”
kiု aliုraှိ၍sālaျှငya ānāpānakiု ā”masacyamī raraှိpaြီ” samādhikiု raှေ”ū”chā thūthoငyakhaြငya”paငya phaြcyapāsaññya．
thiုsiု’ ā”thutyakoငya”pāsalā”
kammaṭṭhānya”maျာ”kiု īsiု’ ā”thutyakoငya”pāsalā”hulaññya” me”maြnya”phhayyarā raှိlāpaြnya၏． aphaြko”
ā”thutyakoငya”saññyahū၍paငya phaြcyapesaññya．
majjhimapaṇṇāsapāḷitoya bhikkhuvagya (ma-2-83．) mahārāhulovādasuttanya၌ bhurā”raှငyasaññya araှငya
rāhulāā” rupyatarā”apoya၌ thayyatātapyamakyaneso chandarāgakiု payyaphaျောkyaranyaathakya raññyarhayya
toyamū၍ dhātyakammaṭṭhānya”akaျyyaraှုphā”naññya”kiု hokaြာ”paြsa chiုchuṃ”mape”toyamū၏． tacyaphanya araှငyarāhulā
၏ mūlame”maြnya”laျှောkyathā”khaျkyaara ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု phā”maျာ”ā”thutyapuṃmaျာ”kiုlaññya” arahatta
phiုlyapokya hokaြာ”pe”toyamūsaññyasā phaြcya၏． (akaျyyakiု siliုpāka mahārāhulovādasuttanyathaငya
kaြñña’yapā．) siု’athakya dhātyakammaṭṭhānya”kiု ā”thutyapaြီ”laျှငya ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု chakyalakyaā”thutyaliုpāka
ā”thutyaniုငyasaññyasā phaြcyapesaññya． dhātyakammaṭṭhānya”kiု ā”thutyathā”so puggiုlyasaññya ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု
paြောငya”၍ ā”thutyaliုpāka ā”thutyaniုငyasañña’ya akhhaင’yaalamya” phaင’yalanya”laျkya raှိpālaျှငya kaျnyakammaṭṭhānya”maျာ”kiု
ā”thutyapaြီ”so yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññyalaññya” ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု paြောငya”၍ā”thutyaliုpāka ā”
thutyaniုငyasaññyasā phaြcyapesaññya． siု’soya kammaṭṭhānya”khaျငya” maroyaှkyamiphiု’kā” satipaြုramaññyasā phaြcyapesaññya．
akhaျိnyakana’yasatya၍ tacyakhupaြီ”maှ tacyakhu ā”thutyaniုငyasaññyasā phaြcyasaññya．
rhaှlekyathakyatoya akhaျိnyakālaka thaငyaraှာ”kaျောyakaြာ”toyamūkaြsañña’ya asaျှငyasāriputtarā asaျှငya
mahāmoggallānyacaso abhiññāṇyaarā၌ kaျhamya”kaျငyatoyamūkaြsañña’ya matheryamaြtyakaြီ”tiု’kā” kasiုṇya”
(10)pā”casañña’ya thiုthiုkammaṭṭhānya”tiု’၌ alhanyakaျhamya”kaျငyalimmātoyamūkaြso matheryamaြtyakaြီ”maျာ”paငya phaြcyakaြ၏．
akaြောငya”mū abhiññāṇyahūsaññya kasiုṇya”kiု akhaြkheṃrasokaြောင’ya phaြcya၏． thiုmatheryamaြtyakaြီ”tiု’saññya
laññya” ānāpānakiု ā”thutyatoyamūkaြse”၏． yaငya” mahārāhulovādasuttanya၌paငyalaျှငya asaျှငya sāri
puttarā matheryamaြtyakaြီ”ka asaျှငyarāhulāā” asaျှငyarāhulā၏ tarā”thiုငyanepuṃ iriyāputhyakiု kaြñña’ya၍
thiုငyanepuṃ iriyāputhyamaှာ ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”naှင’ya saင’yalaျောyaso iriyāputhya phaြcyanesaphaြင’ya ānāpāna

nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
kammaṭṭhānya”kiု phā”maျာ”ā”thutyaranya ññhaှnyakaြာ”toyamūkaြောငya” lāraှိpe၏． tacyaphanya paṭisambhidāmagyapāḷitoyakaြီ”၌
laññya” asaျှငyasāriputtarā kiုyyatoyamaြtyakaြီ”saññya ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kaျင’yacañyakiု apaြñña’yacuṃchuṃ” akaျyya
paြna’yachuṃ” hokaြာ”shā”toyamūpe၏． yaငya”hokaြာ”toyamūkhaျkyamaျာ”kā” asaျှငyasāriputtarā kiုyyatoya
maြtyakaြီ”saññya kammaṭṭhānya”kaျင’yacañyaā”luṃ”၌ kaျhamya”kaျငyatoyamūkaြောငya” khiုငyaluṃso athokyaathā”maျာ”paငya
phaြcyapesaññya．
siု’athakya yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya mimiraraှိthā”paြီ”phaြcyaso raှေ”raှေ” bhā0nāsamādhitiု’၏ akūaññī
kiု yū၍ nokyanokyaso bhā0nāsamādhikiု thūthoငyakhaြငya”saññya apaြcyamaraှိsaññyasā phaြcyasaññyahu yuṅkaြññya
cityakhaျchā maှtyasā”nāyūlerāsaññya．
thapyamaṃ me”maြnya”phhayya akhaျkyatacyarapya
thiုsiု’ dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”maှ ca၍ odātakasiုṇya” siု’mahutya ālokakasiုṇya” casaññyatiု’phaြင’ya catuttha
jhānyasamādhisiု’ chiုkyaaောငya samādhithūthoငyapaြီ”soakhā thiုsamādhimaှ tha၍ vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale
thimaှုthaငyaraှာ”rāṭhāna၌ satiphaြင’ya kapya၍ vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalekiုsā raှုnepāhu chiုsaphaြင’ya aṭṭhakathā
kaြီ”maျာ”၌ (visuddhi-1-270．) rethakyakhaြငya” gaṇanānaññya”maှ ca၍ ā”thutyaranya ññhaှnyakaြာ”thā”rakā” ī၌ rethakya
khaြငya” gaṇanānaññya”kiု maraှုrato’paြီlohu me”maြnya”phhayyarālaññya” raှိlāpaြnya၏．

ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
sakyale āruṃ၌ satimaြဲnekaြောငya”kiုsā paြောchiုliုraငya” phaြcyapāsaññya． thiုsiု’ satimaြဲrakhaြငya”၏ akaြောငya”
raငya”naှင’ya patyasakya၍ cityavaငyacā”phhayyarā akhaျkyatacyarapyakiု thapyamaṃ၍ taငyapaြapyapāsaññya．
samāpatyanaှင’ya vipassanā
yassa hi samādhipi taruṇo， vipassanāpi． tassa vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapethā aticiraṃ nisinnassa kāyo
kilamati， anto aggi viya uṭṭhahati， kacchehi sedā muccanti， matthakato usumavaṭṭi viya uṭṭhahati， cittaṃ
haññati vihaññati vipphandati． so puna samāpatti H samāpajjithā taṃ paridamethā mudukaṃ kathā samassāsethā
puna vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapeti． tassa puna aticiraṃ nisinnassa tathe0 hoti． so puna samāpatti H
samāpajjithā tathe0 karoti． vipassanāya hi bahūpakārā samāpatti． pa．
kiñcāpi hi samāpatti H nissāya vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapeti， vipassanā pana thāmajātā samāpattimpi rakkhati．
thāmajātaṃ karoti． (ma-ṭṭha-1-387-388．)
= akaြငyayogā0carapuggiုlya၏ santānyavayya samādhisaññyalaññya” nunayyanese”၏． vipassanāñāṇyaka
laññya” nunayyanese”၏． vipassanāñāṇyakiု phaြcyacelaျkya alhanyakaြာmaြင’yachā thiုငyaneso thiုyogā0cara
puggiုlya၏ kiုyyasaññya paငyapanya”nhamya”nayyalā၏， khandhākiုyyaathaငya”၌ mī”kaဲ’siု’ apūdhātyamaျာ” thatokyane၏，
lakyakatī”kaြာ”tiု’maှ khaျhe”sī”khaျhe”pokyatiု’saññyalaññya” yiုthhakyalākaြkunya၏， ū”thipyathakyamaှ apūkhiု”lipyakaဲ’siု’
so apūdhātyaငhe’maျာ” thalā၏， cityasaññya paငyapanya”ne၏， nhamya”nayyane၏， tunyalaှုpyane၏．
thiုyogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya tacyaphanya samāpatyakiု vaငyacā”၏． thiုkiုyyapaငyapanya”nhamya”nayyamaှု cityapaငyapanya”

lhanyachākaျေ”jū”maျာ”laှpesaññya． pa ． (ma-ṭṭha-1-387．)

īathakyapā aṭṭhakathā၏ phhaင’yachiုraှငya”laငya”khaျkyaara vipassanāñāṇyanaှင’ya jhānyasamāpatyatiု’kā” apaြnya
alaှnya akhaျငya”khaျငya” tacyakhusaññya tacyakhukiု khiုငyakhaṃ’aောငya chamya”aငyapaြñña’ya0lāaောငya coင’yaraှောkyape”neso

akhaြpodakapaြု၍ vipassanāsiု’kū”khaဲ’soya thiုjhānyasamāpatyakiု amaှီpaြုra၍ vipassanāñāṇyalaññya” chamya”aငyamaျာ”

ava phaြcyapoyalāniုငya၏． tacyaphanya chamya”aငyapaြñña’ya0lāso vipassanāñāṇyakalaññya” thiုodātakasiုṇya”casañña’ya

nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
pañcasandhika = achacyaapiုငya” ငါ”rapya
bhurā”raှငyasaññya īānāpāna pathamacatukkakiု kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānya၏ achamya”phaြင’ya hokaြာ”
toyamūkhaဲ’pesaññya． tacyaphanya īānāpāna pathamacatukkakiုpaငya ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု cataငyaā”sacyacaphaြcyaso
yogā0carapuggiုlyaathakya samathakammaṭṭhānya”၏ achamya”phaြင’ya hokaြာ”thā”toyamūapyapesaññya． kaျnya catukka
suṃ”maျို”tiု’kiုkā” īpathama catukka၌ rathā”paြီ”so jhānyaraှိso， jhānyakiု rathā”paြီ”so yogā0carapuggiုlya
athakya vedanānupassanā， cittānupassanā， dhammānupassanātiု’၏ achamya”phaြင’ya hokaြာ”thā”toyamūapyakunya၏．
thiုkaြောင’ya īānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု phā”maျာ”ā”thutya၍ ānāpānacatutthajhānyalaျှငya anī”kapyachuṃ”so
akaြောငya”raငya” padaṭṭhānyaraှိso vipassanāñāṇyaphaြင’ya paṭisambhidāle”pā”tiု’naှင’ya atūtakha arahattaphiုlyasiု’ rokya
raှိliုso amaျို”koငya”sā” amaျို”koငya”smī”saññya sīlakiု caငyakaြyyaaောငya sutyasaငyakhaြငya”caso lupyaငnya”
kiccaā”luṃ”kiု paြီ”cī”aောငya choငyarhakyapaြုlupya၍ charāsamā”၏athaṃ၌ achacyaapiုငya” ငါ”rapyaraှိso ānāpāna
kammaṭṭhānya”kiု saငyayūapyapesaññya． (visuddhi-1-269．)
1． uggaha ---- kammaṭṭhānya”kaျmya”kiု pāḷisakyasakyaā”phaြင’ya saငyayūkhaြငya”saññya uggaha maññya၏． tacyanaññya” kammaṭṭhānya”
kiု pāḷinaှင’ya anakyaā”phaြင’ya saငyayūkhaြငya”saññya uggaha maññya၏．
2． paripu cchā ---- kammaṭṭhānya”kaျmya”၏ anakyaadhippāyyakiု saငyayūkhaြငya” chhe”nhe”me”maြnya”khaြငya” che”kaြော
sutyasaငyakhaြငya”saññya paripucchā maññya၏． tacyanaññya” kammaṭṭhānya”၌ saṃsayamakaငya”so akhaျkyaalakyamaျာ”kiု
che”kaြောsutyasaငyakhaြငya” me”maြnya”khaြငya”saññya paripucchā maññya၏．
3． upaṭṭhāna ---- īsiု’laျှငya ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု phā”maျာ”ā”thutyaso yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ santānya၌
īarā၌ īkaဲ’siု’so nimityasaññya thaငyalātatya၏hu nimityathaငyakhaြငya”kiု maှtyasā”khaြငya”saññya upaṭṭhāna
maññya၏．
4． appanā ---- īsiု’ ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု phā”maျာ”ā”thutyaso yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ santānyavayya
īsiု’so jhānyasaññya kaျrokyaphaြcyapoyalā၏， īsiု’ appanājhānyasiု’ chiုkyashā”၏hu ānāpānajhānya
kaျrokyalāpuṃ phaြcyapoyalāpuṃ akhaြငya”arākiု maှtyasā”khaြငya”saññya appanā maññya၏．
5． lakkhaṇā ---- rethakyakhaြငya” = gaṇanānaññya”， acañyaliုkyakhaြငya” = anubandhanānaññya”， ānāpāna thimaှုthaငyara
Sm;rā nerā၌ vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalekiု raှုkhaြငya” = phusanānaññya”tiု’၏ achamya”phaြင’ya ānāpāna
bhā0nākiု luṃ’lakaြို”kutya ā”thutyacekhaဲ’saññyaraှိsoya vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale āruṃ၌ tacyanaññya”
vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalekiု akaြောငya”khaṃ၍ phaြcyapoyalāso kaြññyalaငyatokyapaneso ānā
pāna paṭibhāganimityaāruṃ၌ ānāpānassatinaှင’ya yaှñyathaဲlaျkya raှိso ānāpānabhā0nācityakiု ငြိmya
vapyachā kapya၍ taññyataṃ’aောငya thā”niုငyakhaြငya”kaြောင’ya ṭhapanā amaññyaraso appanājhānyanaှင’ya paြñña’yacuṅkhaြငya”
sabholakkhaṇā， thiုānāpānajhānyakiု vipassanā၏ akhaြpodakapaြု၍ tacyaphanya vipassanāsiု’ kū”khaဲ’
soya akaြောငya”tarā”naှင’ya takhaso assāsa passāsa kāya， rūpakāya， nāmakāyahūso
saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏ anicca dukkha anatta akhaြငya”arākiု koငya”chā piုငya”khaြာ”maှtyasā”tatya raှုphā”tatya
sokaြောင’ya sallakkhaṇā amaññyaraso vipassanāñāṇya casaññyatiု’၏ achamya”phaြင’ya arahattaphiုlyahūso
athhatyaathipyasiု’ chiုkyarokyapuṃ sabholakkhaṇā īsiု’caso ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”၏ sabho
lakkhaṇātiု’kiု koငya”chā piုငya”khaြာ” maှtyasā”khaြငya”saññya sallakkhaṇā maññya၏．

gaṇanā anubandhanā， phusanā ṭhapanā sallakkhaṇā．
vivaṭṭanā pārisuddhi， tesañca paṭipassanā． (visuddhi-1-270．)
1． gaṇanā ---- vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’kiု rethakyakhaြငya”saññya gaṇanā maññya၏．
2． anubandhanā ---- thimaှုthaငyaraှာ”rā nerāmaှ coင’ya၍ vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’kiု acañyaliုkyakhaြငya”
ā”phaြင’ya satikiု choငyakhaြငya”， sati၏ akaြာ”alapya maraှိaောငya tacyachakyataññya” achaင’yachaင’ya phaြcyane
khaြငya”saññya anubandhanā maññya၏．
3． phusanā ---- naှာsī”phaျာ” siု’mahutya athakyanaှုtyakhamya”phaျာ”hūso ṭhānakiု vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale
tiု’၏ thipā”khaြငya”saññya phusanā maññya၏．
4． ṭhapanā ---- appanājhānyasiု’ sakyavaငyataññyakhaြငya”saññya ṭhapanā maññya၏． appanājhānyasaññya ānāpānapaṭibhāga
nimityaāruṃ၌ bhā0nācityakiု koငya”chā taññyaaောငya thā”tatyasokaြောင’ya ṭhapanā maññyapesaññya．
5． sallakkhaṇā ---- akaြောငya”tarā”naှင’ya takhaso assāsapassāsakāya， karajakāya， nāmakāya
hūso saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏ anicca-dukkha-anatta akhaြငya”arākiု koငya”chā piုငya”khaြာ” maှtyasā”tatya
sokaြောင’ya vipassanāñāṇyasaññya sallakkhaṇā maññya၏．
290
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
6． vivaṭṭanā ---- akaြောငya”tarā”maျာ” thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyakhaြငya”kaြောင’ya akaျို”tarā”maျာ” thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyakhaြငya”hūso
upādinnakapavattamaှlaññya”koငya”， saṅkhāratarā”tiု’maှlaññya”koငya” thamaြောkyalaျkya asaṅkhatadhātya aငြိmya”
dhātya nibbānyabhakyasiု’ ariyamagyatarā”saññya tacyahunyataññya” paြေ”vaငyashā”၏． thiုsiု’ paြေ”vaငyashā”so
akhā ariyamagyañāṇyasaññya avijjā-taṇaှာ-upādānya caso chiုငyarā chiုငyarā akaြောငya”tarā”maျာ”kiု
achaင’yachaင’ya payyasatyaliုkya၏， arahattamagyachiုkyasoakhā akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’saññyalaññya” noငya
tacyaphanya maphaြcyaso khaျုpyakhaြငya”hūso anuppādanirodhasabhoā”phaြင’ya khaျုpyaငြိmya”shā”kaြ၏． akaြောငya”
tarā”maျာ” anuppādanirodhasabhoā”phaြင’ya khaျုpyaငြိmya”shā”khaြငya”kaြောင’ya akaြောငya”tarā” thaငyaraှာ”raှိpāmaှ
phaြcyapoyaniုငyaso chamya”ā”raှိso akaျို”tarā”cutiု’saññyalaññya” parinibbānacuti၏ nokyachhayyathaငya phaြcyakhhaင’ya
maraှိto’saphaြင’ya noငyatacyaphanya maphaြcyaso khaျုpyakhaြငya”hūso anuppādanirodhasabhoā”phaြင’ya khaျုpyaငြိmya”၍
shā”kaြ၏． thiုkaြောင’ya ariyamagyatarā”saññya upādinnakapavattanaှင’ya saṅkhāranimityamaှ rupyanāmyasantānyaacañyakiု
nacyamaြုpyacesokaြောင’ya saṃsarācakyarahatya laññyapatyamaှုkiု rapyatana’yacetatyasokaြောင’ya vivaṭṭanā maññya၏．
7． pārisuddhi ---- aluṃ”cuṃso kilesā aññacyaakaြေ”hūsamaျှkiု aငြိmya”kaြီ” ငြိmya”aောငya ငြိmya”aေ”ce
tatyaso sabhosatti thaငyaraှာ”raှိkhaြငya”kaြောင’ya akhaြငya”khapyasimya” caငyakaြyyarakā” ariyaphiုlyasaññya pāri
suddhi maññya၏．
8． paṭipassanā ---- magyañāṇya， phiုlyañāṇya， nibbānya， payyapaြီ”kilesā， mapayyarase”so kilesātiု’kiု
asī”asī” chaငyakhaြငyatatyaso paccavekkhaṇāñāṇyasaññya paṭipassanā maññya၏． īkā” ānāpānassati
kammaṭṭhānya”kiု naှluṃ”shaငya”so yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ naှluṃ”shaငya”ramañña’ya acīacañyapaငya phaြcyasaññya．
gaṇanā = rethakyanaññya”
thiုraှcyamaျို”so ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānya” lupyaငnya”khhaငya acīacañyatiု’thaငya īānāpāna kammaṭṭhānya”kiု
cataငyaā”sacyaliုso ā”thutyaca ādikammika amaျို”koငya”sā” amaျို”koငya”smī”saññya rethakyakhaြငya”
gaṇanānaññya”phaြင’ya īānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု cataငya၍ naှluṃ”shaငya”pā．
gaṇentena ca pañcannaṃ heṭṭhā na ṭhapetabbaṃ． dasannaṃ upari na netabbaṃ． antarā khaṇḍaṃ na dassetabbaṃ．
(visuddhi-1-270．)
vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyalekiု rethakyaso yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya ငါ”khukunyaso vaငyasakyalethhakyasakyaletiု’၏
aောkya၌ mataññyacepya， ငါ”khuaောkya laျော’၍ marethakyaapya． chayyakhukunyaso
vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyaletiု’၏ athakya၌ machoငyaapya， chayyakhuthakyalaññya” piု၍ marethakyaapya． tacyasuṃ”-
ငါ” - īsiု’ casaññyaphaြင’ya akaြာ”akaြာ”၌ rethakyakhaြငya” paြtyasaññyakiု mapaြapya． tacyanaññya”chiုsoya naှcyarakya
suṃ”rakyaathaငya”၌ rethakyakhaြငya” gaṇanānaññya”kiု asuṃ”mapaြုse”bhaဲ vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale āruṃ၌ sati
maြဲaောငya kaြို”cā”kaြñña’yapā． naှcyarakya suṃ”rakya athaငya”၌ vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale āruṃ၌ satimaြဲkhaဲ’soya
rethakyakhaြငya” gaṇanānaññya”kiု asuṃ”mapaြုto’bhaဲ araှññya-atiုkiု siaောငya ā”thutyakhaြငya”caso pathama
ānāpānacatukka acīaraငyaatiုငya” kaြို”cā”pā． akayya၍ naှcyarakya suṃ”rakya athaငya”၌ vaငyasakyale thhakyasakya
le āruṃ၌ satika makapyabhaဲ raှေ”raှုmataññyabhaဲ raှိnekhaဲ’soya tacyaphanya rethakyakhaြငya” gaṇanānaññya”kiု asuṃ”paြုpā．
thiုsiု’ rethakyakhaြငya” gaṇanānaññya”kiု asuṃ”paြုrā naှluṃ”shaငya”rā၌ akaြာ”akaြာ”၌ paြtyatokyakhaြငya” maraှိcera．
291
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
akaြောငya”kā” īsiု’taññya”． ငါ”khukunyaso vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyaletiု’၏ aောkya၌ rethakyakhaြငya”
kiု taññyaceso， ငါ”khuaောkya yutyalaျော’၍ rethakyaso yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ santānyavayya kaျñya”maြောငya”
so rethakyakhaြငya” acīaraငyahūso arāṭhāna၌ citya၏phaြcyakhaြငya”saññya tunyalaှုpya၏， kaျñya”maြောငya”so nhā”khaြံ၌
pityalaှောငyakhaṃraso nhā”apoငya”kaဲ’siု’ tunyalaှုpyanetatya၏． tacyaphanya chayyakhukunyaso vaငyasakyale-thhakya
sakyaletiု’၏ athakya၌ rethakyakhaြငya” gaṇanānaññya”kiု choငyaneso chayyakhuthakya piု၍ rethakyaneso
yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ cityaphaြcyakhaြငya”saññyalaññya” rethakyakhaြငya” saṅkhaျာkiုsālaျှငya maှီ၍ phaြcyanetatya၏， vaငyasakya
le thhakyasakyale āruṃ၌ bhā0nācitya maphaြcyato’bhaဲ rethakyakhaြငya” saṅkhaျာnokyasiု’sā acañyaliုkya၍
cityaphaြcyanetatya၏． akaြာ”akaြာ”၌ rethakyakhaြငya” kaျို”maှု pokyamaှု paြtyamaှုkiု phoyapaြneso yogā0cara
puggiုlya၏ santānyavayya ---- “ငါ၏ kammaṭṭhānya”saññya chuṃ”khanya”tiုငyaaောငya athhatyaathipyasiု’ rokyasaññya phaြcyapā
aṃ’lo， maphaြcyapāaṃ’lo”hu cityasaññya tunyalaှုpyanetatya၏． thiုkaြောင’ya īchiုapyakhaဲ’paြီ”so ငါ”khuaောkya
yutyalaျော’၍ rethakyakhaြငya”， chayyakhuthakyapiု၍ rethakyakhaြငya”， akaြာ”akaြာ”၌ rethakyamaှု kaျို”paြtyakhaြငya”taññya”
hūso suṃ”maျို”so apaြcyatiု’kiု raှောငyakaြñya၍ rethakyaapyapesaññya． (visuddhi-1-270．)
capā”khaြငyasamā” rethakyanaññya”
vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyalekiု rethakyaso yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya raှေ”ū”chā naှေ”naှေ”rethakyakhaြငya”
hūso capā”khaြငyasamā”၏ rethakyanaññya”phaြင’ya rethakyaapya၏． capā”khaြငyaso sūsaññya raှေ”ū”chā taငya”kiု capā”
paြñña’yaaောငya thañña’ya၍ tacyahu chiု၍ loငya”liုkya၏． loငya”paြီ”laျှငya nokyathapya tacyaphanya loငya”aṃ’hūso
raññyarhayyakhaျkyaphaြင’ya taငya”kiု capā”paြñña’yaaောငya thañña’yapaြီ”soya thiုdutiyaloငya”mañña’ya taငya”၌ amaှိုkyakiု maြငya၍ thiု
amaှိုkyakiု rhe”kokya၍ pacyachana’yasoyalaññya” rethakyamaှု alaျñyamapaြtyacemū၍ thiုpathamataငya”kiုsā cityaka
maှtya၍ dutiyataငya” maloငya”mī tacya-tacyahusā naှုtyamachityachiုkā rethakya၏． thiုnoငyamaှ dutiyataငya”kiု
raှေ”pathamataငya”naှင’ya poငya”၍ naှcyahu chiု၍ loငya”၏． ī၌laññya” raှေ”naññya”atū tatiyataငya” maloငya”mī
akaြာ”kālapatyaluṃ” naှcya-naှcyahu rethakyamaှု alaျငyamapaြtyaaောငya naှုtyamachityachiုkā rethakya၏ ---- īsiု’
caso rethakyanaññya”kiု dhaññamāpaka gaṇana = capā”khaြငyasū၏ rethakyanaññya”hu khoya၏．
īupamā atūpaငyalaျှငya īyogā0cara rahanya”toyasaññyalaññya” - vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’thaငya
1． vaငyasakyale thaငyaraှာ”aṃ’， vaငyasakyalekiု yū၍
2． thhakyasakyale thaငyaraှာ”aṃ’， thhakyasakyalekiု yū၍
3． vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyale naှcyamaျို”luṃ” thaငyaraှာ”aṃ’， vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyalenaှcyamaျို”luṃ”kiုyū၍ --
tacya-tacya īsiု’casaññyaphaြင’ya rethakyakhaြငya”kiု paြု၍ chayyakhu chayyakhu tiုငyaaောငya phaြcyatiုငya” phaြcyatiုငya”so
vaငyasakyale siု’mahutya thhakyasakyale siု’mahutya vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalekiု maှtyasā”၍sālaျှငya
rethakyapā． īchiုapyakhaဲ’paြီ”so naññya”atiုငya” rethakyaso yogā0carapuggiုlyaā” thhakyasaññyalaññya” phaြcya
kunyaso vaငyasaññyalaññya” phaြcyakunyaso vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyaletiု’saññya thaငyaraှာ”lākunya၏．
(visuddhi-1-270．)
īathakyapā aṭṭhakathācakā”rapya၏ chiုliုraငya”maှာ īsiု’ phaြcya၏． vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyale naှcyamaျို”
tiု’thaငya vaငyasakyale thaငyaraှာ”so yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya thaငyaraှာ”so vaငyasakyalekiု yū၍ thhakyasakyale
thaငyaraှာ”so yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya thhakyasakyalekiု yū၍ vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyale naှcyamaျို”luṃ” thaငya

“assāsapassāsesu yo upaṭṭhāti， taṃ gahethā”ti idaṃ assāsapassāsesu yassa
eko0 paṭhamaṃ upaṭṭhāti， taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ， yassa pana ubhopi upaṭṭhahanti， tena ubhayampi gahethā
gaṇetabbaṃ． (mahāṭī-1-328．)
= vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyaletiု’thaငya thaငyaraှာ”rā lekiုyū၍ rethakyapāhu aṭṭhakathā mina’yachiုso

chiုsaphaြင’ya naှာ0 naှာkhoငya”pokya naှcyakhumaှthhakyaso naှcyamaျို”so letiု’thaငya akaြငya naှာ0 naှာkhoငya”pokyamaှ

ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
raှေ”ū”chā vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyalenaှcyamaျို”tiု’thaငya tacyakhukhusālaျှငya thaငyasoyalaññya” chiုapyakhaဲ’paြီ”so
naññya”ā”phaြင’ya maှtyasā”၍sālaျှငya rethakyaso yogā0carapuggiုlyaā” acañyasaphaြင’ya vaငyasakyale-thhakya
sakyale naှcyamaျို”luṃ”tiု’saññyalaññya” thaငyaraှာ”lāsaññyasā phaြcyakunya၏． rethakyakhaြငya” gaṇanānaññya”၏ achamya”kaြောင’ya

kaြောင’yalaññya”koငya”， raှေ”raှေ”satisaññya nokyanokyaso sati၏ kapya၍taññyarā phaြcyasokaြောင’ya

ñāṇyaphaြင’ya aphanyaphanya athapyathapya raှုkhaြငya”kiု vipassanāpiုငya”၌ kāyānupassanā satipaṭṭhānabhā0nāhu khoyachiုsaññya
maှtyapā．
are”kaြီ”laှso ayūachatacyarapya

ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
liုkaြpe． īakhaျkyanaှင’ya patyasakya၍ paṭisambhidāmagga aṭṭhakathākaြီ”၏ raှငya”laငya”khaျkyakiု chakyalakya၍ taငyapaြ

īpāḷitoya၏ maြnyamāpaြnyakiု athakyathaငya phoyapaြkhaဲ’paြီ” phaြcyapesaññya， siု’soya chiုliုso adhippāyya

kāyānupassanā satipaṭṭhānabhā0nāhu chiုapya၏．

paneso ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityahūso assāsa-passāsa kāyakiု kokyayūrakaြောငya”kiု laññya”
koငya”， vipassanāaliုā”phaြင’ya rupyatarā”apoငya”hūso rūpakāyanaှင’ya nāmyatarā”apoငya”hūso
nāmakāyakiု kokyayūrakaြောငya”kiုlaññya”koငya” athakyathaငya phoyapaြkhaဲ’paြီ” phaြcyasaññya． thiုsiု’ kokyayūrā၌
vipassanāpiုငya”thaငya kāyaara rūpakāya nāmakāyakiု kokyayūsaင’yapuṃnaှင’ya patyasakya၍ paṭisambhidāmagga aṭṭha-
kathāka thapyamaṃ၍ raှငya”laငya”taငyapaြthā”paြnyasaññyamaှာ īsiု’ phaြcya၏．
taṃ kāyanti aniddiṭṭhepi nāmarūpakāye kāyasaddena tassāpi saṅgahitattā niddiṭṭhaṃ viya kathā

= aphanyaphanya athapyathapya raှု၏hūsaññya abhayyasiု’laျှငya thiုkāyakiု aphanyaphanya athapyathapya raှုsanaññya” ¿ -

īsiု’ casaññyaphaြင’yasā hokaြာ”thā”toyamū၏． anicca-dukkha-anattahūso lakkhaṇāyāñya suṃ”khaျkya
taငya၍ raှုramañña’ya kāyakiု sarupyathutya၍ ññhaှnyakaြာ”thā”maှု maraှိpe． thiုsiု’paငya rūpakāya nāmakāyakiု sarupya
thutya၍ ññhaှnyakaြာ”thā”maှု maraှိsoyalaññya” kāyasaddāphaြင’ya thiုrūpakāya nāmakāyakiုlaññya” simya”kaျုံ” rethakya
apyasaññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya sarupyathutyakā ññhaှnyakaြာ”paြsasakaဲ’siု’ paြု၍hokaြာ”shā”toyamūkhaြငya” phaြcyape
saññya． maှnyapesaññya - aniccaā”phaြင’ya aphanyaphanya athapyathapya raှုkhaြငya”casañña’ya aniccānupassanāñāṇya casaññyatiု’saññya

īkā” athakyapā paṭisambhidāmaggaaṭṭhakathā cakā”rapya၏ chiုliုraငya” sabhoadhippāyyataññya”． ī
aṭṭhakathācakā”rapyamaှာlaññya” sabbakāyapaṭisaṃvedīpiုငya”thaငya chakyalakyaphoyapaြmañña’ya paṭisambhidāmagyapāḷitoya
atiုငya”sā phhaင’yachiုthā”khaြငya” phaြcyapesaññya．
304
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
īaṭṭhakathāara ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု cī”phaြnya”phā”maျာ” ā”thutyaso yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya
samathapiုငya”၌ parikammanimitya uggahanimitya paṭibhāganimityahūso assāsapassāsa nimittakāyakiု raှုra၏，
vipassanāpiုငya”၌kā” rūpakāya nāmakāyakiု lakkhaṇāyāñyasuṃ”khaျkya tacyalaှñña’yacītaငya၍ raှုra၏． thiုsiု’ raှုkhaဲ’soya
kāye kāyānupassanā satipaṭṭhānabhā0nākiု phā”maျာ” ā”thutyasaññyahupaငya khoyachiုsaññya maှtyapā．
siု’athakya kāyānupassanā satipaṭṭhānyahūsaññya rupyatarā”sakyasakyakiုsā raှုphā”raso satipaṭṭhānyamahutya，
rupyatarā”kiု aū”mūsaphaြင’ya saṅkhāratarā”ā”luṃ”kiုpaငya raှုphā”raso satipaṭṭhānyaphaြcyasaññyahu maှtyapā． akayya၍
asaငyasūtoyakoငya”saññya īmaျှphaြင’ya makaျnepyase”pālaျှငya lakyamakhaṃniုငyase”pālaျှငya aောkyapā paṭisambhidāmagya
pāḷitoyakaြီ”၏ hokaြာ”toyamūkhaျkyakiုlaññya” chakyalakya၍ maြññya”camya”kaြñña’yapāū”， khaျိုmaြိnyaso arasā
thū”kaြီ”kiု khaṃcā”ralima’yamaññyahu maျှောyalaင’yapāsaññya．
paṭisambhidāmagyapāḷitoya၏ mina’yachiုtoyamūkhaျkya
kāyoti dhe kāyā nāmakāyo ca rūpakāyo ca． katamo nāmakāyo vedanā saññā
cetanā phasso manasikāro． nāmañca nāmakāyo ca， ye ca vuccanti cittasaṅkhārā， ayaṃ nāmakāyo．
katamo rūpakāyo， cattāro ca mahābhūtā catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyarūpaṃ assāso ca
passāso ca nimittañca upanibandhanā ye ca vuccanti kāyasaṅkhārā， ayaṃ rūpakāyo． (paṭisaṃ-181．)
cetanādīhi saṅkhārakkhandho vutto． evaṃ tīsu khandhesu vuttesu taṃnissayo viññāṇakkhandho
vutto0 hoti． (paṭisaṃ-ṭṭha-2-112．)
aniccanti ki H aniccaṃ． pañcakkhandhā aniccā． (paṭisaṃ-191．)
īathakyapā paṭisambhidāmagyapāḷitoyakaြီ”naှင’ya aṭṭhakathātiု’kā” ānāpānapathamacatukkathaငya suṃ”khu
maြောkyaaphaြcya lāraှိso sabbakāyapaṭisaṃvedīhūso desanātoya၌ kāyaara tarā”kiုyya kokyayū
puṅkiု phoyapaြso cakā”toyamaျာ” phaြcyakaြ၏． kāyānupassanā satipaṭṭhānyapiုငya”thaငya kāyaara maññyakaဲ’siု’
so kāyamaျို”kiု chiုliုkaြောငya”kiု raှငya”paြso cakā”toyamaျာ” phaြcyakaြ၏． thiုpāḷitoya aṭṭhakathātiု’၏
chiုliုraငya”maှာ īsiု’ phaြcya၏．
īkāyānupassanā satipaṭṭhānyapiုငya”၌ kāyahūsaññya ----
1． nāmakāya = nāmyatarā”apoငya”，
2． rūpakāya = rupyatarā”apoငya” ----
īnaှcyamaျို”kunyaso kāyatiု’paငyataññya”．
nāmakāya (= nāmyatarā”apoငya”) hūsaññya abhayyanaññya” ¿
phassa， vedanā， saññā， cetanā， manasikāra tarā”apoငya”saññyalaññya”koငya”， nāmyamaññyaso
nāmyatarā” apoငya”saññyalaññya”koငya”， cittasaṅkhāra amaññyaraso vedanā saññā tarā”apoငya”saññya
laññya”koငya” nāmakāya maññya၏． ««īcakā”rapyaphaြင’ya vedanā， saññā， saṅkhāra， viññāṇya hūso nāmyakhandhā
le”pā”apoငya”saññya nāmakāya maññya၏hu chiုliုsaññya． athakyapā aṭṭhakathāaphhaင’yakiု kaြñña’yapā．»»

ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
rūpakāyahūsaññya abhayyanaññya”¿ ----

2． mahābhutya = dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”kiု chaဲmaှီ၍ phaြcyaso (24)maျို”so upādārupya (paṭisaṃ-ṭṭha-2-112-kaြñña’ya)，

pudyaara aniccahu vipassanāraှုramañña’ya tarā”maျာ”kiုlaññya” pañcakkhandhā aniccā = khandhāငါ”pā”tiု’saññya aniccahu
hokaြာ”thā”toyamūpesaññya．
siု’athakya athakyathaငya phoyapaြthā”khaဲ’so ----
1． assāsa passāsa kāya，
2． rūpakāya，
3． nāmakāyatiု’saññya ----

le၏ aca-alayya-achuṃ” akunyaluṃ”kiုpaငya siaောငya chakyalakya၍ kaြို”cā”ā”thutyapā． ----

aောငya kapyathā”niုငyasoyalaññya” ānāpānanimityasaññya mapoyaphaြcyanese”aṃ’， thiုakhaျိnyaakhāmaျို”၌laññya” vaငya

kaြို”cā”ā”thutyapā． thiုvaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyaletiု’၏ aca-alayya-achuṃ” akunyaluṃ”kiု thaငyathaငyaraှာ”

aca-alayya-achuṃ” akunyaluṃ”kiု thaငyathaငyaraှာ”raှာ” silaျkya asakyaraှူniုငyaaောငya kaျင’yakaြံkaြို”kutya phā”maျာ”
