ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
sabbakāyapaṭisaṃvedī-pudya၌ (1) sabba-tacyapudya (2) kāya-tacyapudya (3) paṭi-tacyapudya (4) saṃ-tacyapudya
(5) vedī-tacyapudya poငya”soya cakā”luṃ”pudyapoငya” (5)pudya pāvaငyalaျkya raှိ၏．
1． sabba-pudyaka sakala (= aluṃ”cuṃ) hūso anakyakiု ho၏．
2． kāya-pudyaka assāsakāya passāsakāyakiု ho၏．
3． sabba - kāya - naှcyapudyaphaြင’ya assāsakāya passāsakāya၏ aca-alayya-achuṃ” hūso aluṃ”cuṃ
so assāsakāya passāsakāyakiု ññhaှnyapaြpesaññya．
4． paṭi-pudyakā” vicchāanakya၌ phaြcya၏． paṭi paṭi paccekaṃ = asī”asī”hu adhippāyyathhakya၏． assāsakāya
passāsakāyahūso vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyale apoငya”kā” rupyakalāpyapoငya”maျာ”chātiု’kiု
poငya”cuthā”so apoငya”acumaျှsā phaြcyasokaြောင’ya aluṃ”cuṃso assāsakāya passāsakāya
aphiု’bhāgakiု siaောငyakaျင’yaranya ññhaှnyakaြာ”paြsatoyamūliုsañña’yaathakya paṭi-saddākiု thañña’yashaငya”၍ ho
kaြာ”thā”toyamūpesaññya．
5． saṃ-pudyaka sammā-anakyakiု ho၏． sakkacca kārī = koငya”mhanyariုsechā ānāpānabhā0nālupyaငnya”kiု
paြုlupyaranya ññhaှnyapaြkhaြငya”akaျို”ငှာ saṃ-saddākiု thañña’yashaငya”၍ hokaြာ”thā”toyamūpesaññya．
6． vedī-၌ vida-kā” ñāṇa (= sikhaြငya”) anakya hotaññya”． vedī-၌ ṇī-paccaññya”kā” tassīla-atthiattha-
suddhakattā” - suṃ”nakya၌ phaြcya၏． (mahāṭī-1-321 - kaြñña’yapā．)
siု’athakya ---- sabbakāyapaṭisaṃvedī assasissāmīti sikkhati． pa ． passasissāmīti sikkhati --
hūso cakā”rapyatacyakhuluṃ”၏ chiုliုraငya” adhippāyyamaှာ īsiု’ phaြcya၏．
1． assāsakāyahūso vaငyasakyale apoငya”၏ aca-alayya-achuṃ” akunyaluṃ”kiု asī”asī”
koငya”mhanyariုsechā ñāṇyayaှñyaso ñāṇasampayutyacityaphaြင’ya sile’raှိsaññya phaြcya၍ vaငyasakyalekiု raှူshaငya”
aṃ’hu kaျင’ya၏． ． passāsakāyahūso thhakyasakyale apoငya”၏ aca-alayya-achuṃ” akunyaluṃ”kiု
asī”asī” koငya”mhanyariုsechā ñāṇyayaှñyaso ñāṇasampayutyacityaphaြင’ya sile’raှိsaññya phaြcya၍ thhakyasakya
lekiု raှူthutyaṃ’hu kaျင’ya၏． (tassīlaanakya．)
2． assāsakāyahūso vaငyasakyalepoငya”၏ aca-alayya-achuṃ” akunyaluṃ”kiု asī”asī”
koငya”mhanyariုsechā ñāṇyayaှñyaso ñāṇasampayutyacityaphaြင’ya sikhaြငya”raှိsaññya phaြcya၍ vaငyasakyalekiု raှူshaငya”aṃ’hu
kaျင’ya၏． ． passāsakāyahūso thhakyasakyalepoငya”၏ aca-alayya-achuṃ” akunyaluṃ”kiု asī”
asī” koငya”mhanyariုsechā ñāṇyayaှñyaso ñāṇasampayutya cityaphaြင’ya sikhaြငya”raှိsaññya phaြcya၍ thhakyasakyalekiု
raှူthutyaṃ’hu kaျင’ya၏． (atthiattha = assatthianakya．)
3． assāsakāyahūso vaငyasakyalepoငya”၏ aca-alayya-achuṃ” akunyaluṃ”kiု asī”asī”
koငya”mhanyariုsechā ñāṇyayaှñyaso ñāṇasampayutyacityaphaြင’ya sitatyasaññyaphaြcya၍ vaငyasakyalekiု raှူshaငya”aṃ’
hu kaျင’ya၏． ． passāsakāyahūso thhakyasakyalepoငya”၏ aca-alayya-achuṃ” akunyaluṃ”kiု
asī”asī” koငya”mhanyariုsechā ñāṇyayaှñyaso ñāṇasampayutyacityaphaြင’ya sitatyasaññyaphaြcya၍ thhakyasakyale
kiု raှူthutyaṃ’hu kaျင’ya၏． (suddhakattā”anakya)
īkā” athakyapā aṭṭhakathā၏ chiုliုraငya”taññya”．
310
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
maှnyapesaññya ---- īānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု phā”maျာ”ā”thutyarā၌ tacyaū”naှင’ya tacyaū” matūññītatyape．
tacyaū”so yogā0cara rahanya”toyaā” maျာ”chāso rupyakalāpyaamaှုnyatiု’phaြင’ya poငya”cutaññyachokyathā”
sañña’ya athakyakaြောင’ya muna’yamuna’yaññakyaññakya၏ aphaြcyaphaြင’ya paျံ’kaြဲlaျkyaraှိso assāsakāya = vaငyasakyale
apoငya”၌soyalaññya”koငya”， passāsakāya = thhakyasakyale apoငya”၌soyalaññya”koငya” acasā
thaငyaraှာ”၍ alayyanaှင’ya achuṃ”kā” mathaငyaraှာ” phaြcyatatya၏． thiုyogā0cara rahanya”toyasaññya aca၌sālaျှငya
ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”yūkhaြငya” simya”chaññya”khaြငya”ငှာ chamya”niုငyapesaññya， alayyanaှင’ya achuṃ”၌kā” paငyapanya”netatya၏．
tacyaū”so yogā0cara rahanya”toyaā” alayyathaငyaraှာ”၍ acanaှင’ya achuṃ”kā” mathaငyaraှာ” phaြcyane
tatyapaြnya၏． thiုpuggiုlyamaျို”saññya alayyakiုsā ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”yūniုငya simya”chaññya”niုငya၍ acanaှင’ya achuṃ”၌
paငyapanya”netatyapaြnya၏．
tacyaū”so yogā0cara rahanya”toyaā” achuṃ”sā thaငyaraှာ”၍ acanaှင’ya alayyakā” mathaငyaraှာ”
phaြcyanetatyapaြnya၏， thiုpuggiုlyamaျို”saññya achuṃ”kiုsā ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”yūniုငya simya”chaññya”niုငya၍ acanaှင’ya alayya
၌ paငyapanya”netatyapaြnya၏．
tacyaū”so yogā0cara rahanya”toyaā” vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyalepoငya”၏ aca-alayyaachuṃ”
akunyaluṃ”saññya thaငyaraှာ”၏， thiုpuggiုlyamaျို”saññya vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyale apoငya” ၏ aca-alayyaachuṃ”
akunyaluṃ”kiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”yūkhaြငya” simya”chaññya”khaြငya”ငှာ chamya”niုငya၏， aca- alayya-achuṃ” maññyasañña’ya
nerā၌machiု paငyapanya”maှု maraှိpe．
īcatutthapuggiုlyamaျို”naှင’ya tūchā assāsakāya passāsakāya = vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyalepoငya”
hūso kammaṭṭhānya”āruṃ၌ satikiုlaññya”koငya”， ñāṇyakiုlaññya”koငya” raှေ”raှုtaññyace၍ phaြcyace၍ vaငyasakya
le-thhakyasakyalepoငya”၏ aca-alayya-achuṃ” akunyaluṃ”၌paငya ñāṇyanaှင’yayaှñyasaññyasālaျှငya phaြcyaso
ñāṇasampayutyacityakiု phaြcyacepya၏hu ññhaှnyapaြtoyamūliုso bhurā”raှငyasaññya ---- sabbakāyapaṭisaṃvedī
assasissāmīti． pa ． passasissāmīti sikkhati ---- hu hokaြာ”toyamūkhaြငya” phaြcyapesaññya．
(visuddhi-1-265．)
sikkhati - thañña’ya၍ horakhaြငya”akaြောငya”
sabbakāya paṭisaṃvedī assasissāmīti． pa ．passasissāmīti sikkhati = vaငyasakyale၏ acaalaya
f-achuṃ” akunyaluṃ”kiု thaငyathaငyaraှာ”raှာ” silaျkya vaငyasakyalekiု raှူshaငya”aṃ’hu kaျင’ya၏ (= kaျင’yapā)．
thhakyasakyale၏ aca-alayya-achuṃ” akunyaluṃ”kiု thaငyathaငyaraှာ”raှာ” silaျkya thhakyasakyalekiု raှူthutyaṃ’hu
kaျင’ya၏ (= kaျင’yapā) --- hūso thiုpāḷitoyacakā”rapya၌ sikkhati (= kaျင’ya၏ = kaျင’yapā) hūso cakā”rapyakiု
thañña’ya၍ hokaြာ”thā”toyamūpuṃnaှင’ya patyasakya၍ visuddhimaggaaṭṭhakathā၌ aောkyapāatiုငya” raှငya”laငya”taငyapaြ
thā”၏．
sikkhati (= kaျင’ya၏ = kaျင’yapā) hūsaññyakā” athakya၌ chiုkhaဲ’paြီ”sañña’yaatiုငya” vaငyasakyalepoငya”၏
aca-alayya-achuṃ” akunyaluṃ”kiု， thhakyasakyalepoငya”၏ aca-alayya-achuṃ” akunyaluṃ”kiု asī”asī”
koငya”mhanyariုsechā ñāṇyanaှင’ya yaှñyaso ñāṇasampayutyacityaphaြင’ya sikhaြငya”၏ achamya”phaြင’yasālaျှငya ā”thutya၏
luṃ’lapaြု၏ (= ā”thutyapā luṃ’lapaြုpā) hu chiုliုsaññya．
311
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
tacyanaññya”ā”phaြင’ya chiုrasoya ---- thiုsiု’so ānāpānassatisamādhikiု phā”ceso phā”maျာ”neso
yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ santānya၌ = thiုsiု’so vaငyasakyalepoငya” thhakyasakyalepoငya”၏ aca-alayyaachuṃ”
akunyaluṃ”kiု asī”asī” koငya”mhanyariုsechā ñāṇyayaှñyaso ñāṇasampayutyacityaphaြင’ya thaငyathaငyaraှာ”raှာ”
simaှုkiု paြုkaျင’yaneso thaငyathaငyaraှာ”raှာ” siaောငya kaြို”cā”ā”thutyaneso yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ santānya၌
ānāpānaāruṅkiု satiphaြင’ya coင’yacaññya”maှုtaññya”hūso satisaṃ0ra， vīriyaphaြင’ya coင’yacaññya”maှုtaññya”hūso
vīriyasaṃ0rasaññyakā” adhisīlasikkhā maññya၏． ānāpānaāruṃ၌ cityataññyakaြññyamaှု cityataññyaငြိmyamaှု samādhi
saññyakā” adhicittasikkhā maññya၏． ānāpānaāruṅkiု aca-alayya-achuṃ” akunyaluṃ”kiု asī”asī”
koငya”mhanya riုsechā khaဲkhaဲpaြာ”paြာ” sineso paññākā” adhipaññāsikkhā maññya၏．
īsikkhāsuṃ”pā”tiု’kiု thiုānāpānaāruṃ၌ thiုānāpānakiု āruṃpaြု၍phaြcyaso satinaှင’ya thiုsati
raှေ’shā”raှိso ānāpānaāruṅkiု phā”maျာ”naှluṃ”shaငya”khaြငya” bhā0nāmanasikāranaှင’ya atūtakha le’kaျင’ya၏
maှီvaဲ၏ phā”ce၏ akaြိmyamaျာ”chāpaြု၏ (= le’kaျင’yapā maှီvaဲpā phā”maျာ”pā akaြိmyamaျာ”chā paြုpā) ---- īsiု’laျှငya ī
sikkhatihūso pudya၌ chiုliုraငya” anakyasabhokiု maှtyasā”pā． (visuddhi-1-266．)
assasissāmi passasissāmi-hu anāgatyavibhatyaphaြင’ya hotoyamūrakhaြငya”၏ akaြောငya”raငya”
īānāpāna catukkale”maျို”tiု’၌ ---- pathamacatukkathaငya akaျုံ”vaငyaso assāsa passāsatiု’၏
araှññyakiု siaောငya raှုrasañña’ya pathamanaññya”， atiုkiု siaောငya raှုrasañña’ya dutiyanaññya”tiု’၌ vaငyasakyale
raှူshaငya”kāmaျှ thhakyasakyale raှူthutyakāmaျှ sakyasakyasālaျှငya phaြcyapesaññya． akhaြာ” tacyacuṃtacyarā paြုlupyaphhayya
rā maraှိpe． aca-alayya-achuṃ” akunyaluṃ”kiု siaောငya kaျင’yaramañña’ya ītatiyanaññya”maှ ca၍ ānāpāna
āruṃpoya၌ ñāṇyakiု phaြcyacekhaြငya”， assāsa passāsa kāyasaṅkhārakiု ငြိmya”cekhaြငya”， pītikiု asī”asī”
koငya”chā ñāṇasampayutyacityaphaြင’ya sisaññyakiု thaငyaraှာ”saññyakiု paြုlupyakhaြငya” casaññyatiု’၌ kaြို”cā”ā”thutyamaှု
kiု athū”paြုapyapesaññya． thiုkaြောင’ya vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyaletiု’၏ araှññya atiုkiု siaောငya ā”thutya
rasañña’ya raှေ”naññya”၌ ---- assasāmīti pajānāti， passasāmīti pajānāti = raှññyaso vaငyasakyalekiု
phaြcyacesaññyaraှိsoya raှññyaso vaငyasakyalekiု phaြcyace၏hu si၏， tiုso vaငyasakyalekiု phaြcyacesaññyaraှိsoya
tiုso vaငyasakyalekiု phaြcyace၏hu si၏ ---- hū၍sālaျှငya paccuppanyakāla၏ achamya”phaြင’ya pāḷitoyakiု
hokaြာ”thā”toyamūpesaññya． thiုsiု’ hotoyamūpaြီ”nokya vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale apoငya”၏ acaalaya
f-achuṃ” akunyaluṃ”kiု thaငyathaငyaraှာ”raှာ” siaောငya kaျင’yaramañña’ya ītatiyanaññya”maှ ca၍ paြုsaင’yapaြုthiုkya
so ñāṇyakiု phaြcyacekhaြငya”， assāsapassāsa kāyasaṅkhārakiု ငြိmya”cekhaြငya”， pītikiု asī”asī” koငya”chā
ñāṇyanaှင’ya yaှñyaso ñāṇasampayutyacityaphaြင’ya sisaññyakiု thaငyaraှာ”saññyakiု paြုlupyakhaြငya” caso akhaြငya”arākiု
ññhaှnyapaြtoyamūkhaြငya”ငှာ ---- sabbakāyapaṭisaṃvedī assasissāmīti sikkhati ---- casaññyaphaြင’ya anāgatyavibhatya၏
achamya”phaြင’ya pāḷitoyakiု taငyathā”toyamūapyapesaññyahu sipāle． (visuddhi-1-266．)
vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyaletiု’၏ raှññyamaှု tiုmaှုkiု siaောငya kaြို”cā”ā”thutyarasañña’ya raှေ”bhā0nānaññya”
naှcyanaññya”၌laññya” vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyaletiု’၏ hutyamaှnyaso sabhoatiုငya” raှññyamaှု tiုmaှု၏ aphaြcyakiု
thiု”thhaငya”simaြငyanekhaြငya” sabhoraှိsaññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya ñāṇyakiု phaြcyacekhaြငya”kiု akayya၍kā” raapyasaññya
sālaျှငya phaြcyapesaññya， siု’soya thiု raှññyamaှု tiုmaှုkiု sikhaြငya”saññya phaြcyatiုငya”kunyaso vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyale
tiု’kiု phaြcyanesañña’yaatiုငya” āruṃyūnekhaြငya”maျှsā phaြcyasokaြောင’ya lhanyachā makhaဲyañya”laှpe． thiုkaြောင’ya thiုraှေ”naññya”
312
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
naှcyamaျို”၌ - raှññyaso (tiုso) vaငyasakyale (thhakyasakyale)kiု phaြcyacesaññyaraှိsoya raှññyaso (tiုso)
vaငyasakyale (thhakyasakyale)kiု phaြcyace၏hu si၏ - hu paccuppanyakālanaှင’ya yaှñyakhaြငya”kiု paြုtoyamūapyapesaññya．
vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyale၏ aca-alayya-achuṃ” akunyaluṃ”kiု thaငyathaငyaraှာ”raှာ” siaောငya kaြို”cā”ā”
thutyarakhaြငya” caso ītatiyacaso naññya”saññyakā” paြုniုငyakhaဲlaှ၏， tacyaū”so yokyaျာ”၏ saငyadhunya”shā”
poya၌ siု’mahutya saငyadhunya”shā”raှိso lamya”poya၌ shā”nerakhaြငya”naှင’ya tūlaှ၏， thiုkaြောင’ya ītatiyanaññya”
casaññyatiု’၌ raှေ”aphiု’၌phaြcyaso paြုpaြငyakhaြငya”saññya lhanyalhanyakaဲkaဲ phaြcyasaင’ya phaြcyathiုkyalaှpe၏． īsabhotarā”kiု
thaငyaraှာ”paြkhaြငya”ငှာ ---- sabbakāyapaṭisaṃvedī assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhati = vaငyasakyale
(thhakyasakyale ) ၏ aca-alayya-achuṃ” akunyaluṃ”kiု thaငyathaငyaraှာ”raှာ” silaျkya vaငyasakyalekiု raှူshaငya”aṃ’
thhakyasakyalekiု raှူthutyaṃ’hu kaျင’ya၏ ---- īsiု’ casaññyaphaြင’ya assasissāmi passasissāmi - raှူshaငya”aṃ’
raှူthutyaṃ’ - hu anāgatyakālanaှင’ya yaှñyakhaြငya”kiု paြုtoyamūapyapesaññya． īsabhoadhippāyyakiု thaငyaraှာ”
paြkhaြငya”ငှာ aṭṭhakathācharātoyasaññya athakyapā cakā”rapyakiု mina’yachiုtoyamūkhaြငya” phaြcyapesaññya．
(mahāṭī-1-322．)
vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyaletiု’၏ aca-alayya-achuṃ” akunyaluṃ”kiု satiphaြင’ya acañyakapya၍ achakya
mapaြtya tokyalaျှောkyasiaောငya kaြို”cā”ā”thutyarasonaññya”kiု aṭṭhakathākaြီ”maျာ”၌ anubandhanānaññya”hu
amaññyatapyathā”toyamūpesaññya．
anubandhanānaññya”
anubandhanā nāma gaṇanaṃ paṭisaṃharithā satiyā nirantaraṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ anugamanaṃ． tañca kho
na ādimajjhapariyosānā nugamana0sena． bahi nikkhamanavātassa hi nābhi ādi， hadayaṃ majjhaṃ， nāsikaggaṃ
pariyosānaṃ． abbha ntaraṃ pavisanavātassa nāsikaggaṃ ādi， hadayaṃ majjhaṃ nābhi pariyosānaṃ． tañcassa
anugacchato vikkhepagataṃ cittaṃ sāraddhāya ce0 hoti iñjanāya ca． yathāha ----
“assāsādimajjhapariyosānaṃ satiyā anugacchato ajjhattaṃ vikkhepagatena cittena kāyopi
cittampi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā ca． passāsādimajjhapariyosānaṃ satiyā anugacchato
bahiddhā vikkhepagatena cittena kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā cā”ti．
(paṭisaṃ-165． visuddhi-1-272．)
īathakyapā aṭṭhakathānaှင’ya paṭisambhidāmagyapāḷitoyatiု’၏ chiုliုraငya”maှာ īsiု’ phaြcya၏． yogā
0carapuggiုlyasaññya gaṇanānaññya” (= rethakyanaññya”) casañña’yanaññya”tiု’phaြင’ya ānāpānaāruṃ၌ satimaြဲlāsoya
anubandhanānaññya”phaြင’ya ānāpānaāruṅkiု naှluṃ”shaငya”apyapesaññya． ānāpānaāruṃ၌ satimaြဲlāsoya yogā
0carapuggiုlyasaññya vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyale၏ raှññyamaှု tiုmaှုkiု siaောငya chakyalakya kaြို”cā”ra၏． athakya
thaငya raှငya”paြkhaဲ’sañña’yaatiုငya” vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyaletiု’၏ araှññyaatiုkiု siaောငya kaြို”cā”ā”thutya
sañña’ya apiုငya”၌laññya” ānāpānanimityasaññya poyalātatyasaññyasā phaြcyapesaññya． nimityapoyasaññyaphaြcyace
mapoyasaññyaphaြcyace vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyale၏ araှññyaatiုāruṃ၌ satimaြဲlāsoya thiုvaငyasakyalethhakyasakyale၏
aca-alayya-achuṃ” akunyaluṃ”kiု thaငyathaငyaraှာ”raှာ”siaောငya chakyalakya၍ kaြို”cā”
ā”thutyaramaññya phaြcyasaññya． yaငya”siု’ kaြို”cā”ā”thutyakhaြငya”saññya anubandhanānaññya”phaြင’ya vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakya
le āruṅkiု naှluṃ”shaငya”khaြငya” maññyapesaññya．
313
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyale āruṃ၌ satimaြဲlāsoakhā rethakyakhaြငya” gaṇanānaññya”kiု khokyathā”
liုkya၍ rupyasimya”liုkya၍ phaြcyapoyalātiုငya” phaြcyapoyalātiုငya”kunyaso vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyaletiု’kiု
āruṃpaြုsaññya၏ achamya”phaြင’ya vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyaletiု’၏ nokyasiု’ satiphaြင’ya akaြာ”alapya apaြtya
maraှိaောငya acañyalaျှောkya၍ liုkyakhaြငya”saññya anubandhanānaññya” maññya၏．
vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyaletiု’၏ thimaှုthaငyaraှာ”rā (= phuṭṭha) ṭhāna၌ vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyalekiု
naှluṃ”shaငya”maှုsaññyapaငya vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyaletiု’siု’ nokyathapyamapaြtya liုkyasaññya maññya၏． tacyanaññya”
chiုrasoya phaြcyatiုငya”phaြcyatiုငya”kunyaso vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyaletiု’kiု āruṃpaြုsoā”phaြင’ya sati၏
thapyakāthapyakā alaျñyamacaဲ phaြcyakhaြငya”saññyapaငya vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyale၏ nokyasiု’ acañyalaျှောkya၍
liုkyakhaြငya” anubandhanānaññya” maññya၏， anugamana maññya၏． (mahāṭī-1-329． paြññya-2-242．)
thiုsiု’ vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyaletiု’၏ nokyasiု’ satiphaြင’ya acañyalaျှောkya၍ liုkyakhaြငya”saññyalaññya”
vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyaletiု’၏ shā”tiုငya” shā”tiုငya”so thiုthiုarapyasiု’tiုငyaaောငya aca-alayya-achuṃ”
siု’ acañyalaျှောkya၍ liုkyakhaြငya”၏ achamya”phaြင’ya liုkyarasaññyakā” mahutyape． apasiု’ thhakyasole၏ khaျkya
saññya acataññya”， naှluṃ”saññya alayyataññya”， naှာsī”phaျာ”saññya achuṃ”taññya”．
athaငya”siု’ vaငyasole၏ naှာsī”phaျာ”saññya acataññya”， naှluṃ”saññya alayyataññya”， khaျkyasaññya achuṃ”
taññya”．
khaျkya-naှluṃ”-naှာsī”phaျာ”， naှာsī”phaျာ”-naှluṃ”-khaျkya hūso thiုaca-alayya-achuṃ”kiု nokyamaှ acañya
laျှောkya၍ liုkyaso paျံ’lhaင’yaso thiုyogā0carapuggiုlya၏ cityasaññya pūpanyakhaြငya”naှင’yatakhaso phaြcyakhaြငya”ငှာ
laññya”koငya”， ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု naှluṃ”shaငya”khaြငya”၏ laှုpyaraှာ”khaြငya”ငှာlaññya”koငya” phaြcyape၏． paṭisambhidā
magya pāḷitoya၌ īsiု’ hokaြာ”thā”toyamū၏．
vaငyasakyale၏ aca-alayya-achuṃ” phaြcyaso naှာsī”phaျာ”-naှluṃ”-khaျkyahūso thiုthiုarapyasiု’ satiphaြင’ya
acañyalaျှောkya၍ liုkyaneso yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ santānyavayya mimi၏ kiုyyathaငya” ajjhattabhakyasiု’ paျံ’lhaင’ya၍
shā”so cityakaြောင’ya kiုyyasaññyalaññya”koငya” cityasaññyalaññya”koငya” pūpanyakhaြငya”naှင’yatakha phaြcyakunyasaññya
laññya”koငya”， ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု naှluṃ”shaငya”khaြငya”၌ tunyalaှုpyakunyasaññyalaññya”koငya” phaြcyanetatyakunya၏．
thhakyasakyale၏ aca-alayya-achuṃ” phaြcyaso khaျkya-naှluṃ”-naှာsī”phaျာ”hūso thiုthiုarapyasiု’ satiphaြင’ya
acañyalaျှောkya၍ liုkyaneso yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ santānyavayya paြငyapa bahiddha၌ paျံ’lhaင’ya၍shā”so citya
kaြောင’ya kiုyyasaññyalaññya”koငya” cityasaññyalaññya”koငya” pūpanyakhaြငya”naှင’yatakha phaြcyakunyasaññyalaññya”koငya”
ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု naှluṃ”shaငya”khaြငya”၌ tunyalaှုpyakunyasaññyalaññya”koငya” phaြcyanetatyakunya၏．(paṭisaṃ-165．)
thiုkaြောင’ya anubandhanānaññya”phaြင’ya ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု cī”phaြnya”naှluṃ”shaငya”neso yogā0carapuggiုlya
saññya naှာsī”phaျာ”-naှluṃ”-khaျkya， khaျkya-naှluṃ”-naှာsī”phaျာ” hūso vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale၏ aca-alayyaachuṃ”
phaြcyasañña’ya thiုthiုarapyasiု’ satiphaြင’ya acañyalaျှောkya၍ liုkyasaññya၏ achamya”phaြင’ya naှluṃ”mashaငya”apyape．
caငyacacyasoyakā” phusanānaññya”၏ achamya”phaြင’yasoyalaññya”koငya”， ṭhapanānaññya”၏ achamya”phaြင’yasoyalaññya”koငya”
naှluṃ”shaငya”ramaññya phaြcyasaññya．
gaṇanānaññya”၏ achamya”phaြင’ya ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု naှluṃ”shaငya”puṃ， anubandhanānaññya”၏ achamya”phaြင’ya ānāpāna
kammaṭṭhānya”kiု naှluṃ”shaငya”puṃmaျာ” asī”akhaြာ” thaငyaraှာ”raှိsakaဲ’siု’ phusanānaññya”၏ achamya”phaြင’ya ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု
naှluṃ”shaငya”puṃ， ṭhapanānaññya”၏ achamya”phaြင’ya ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု naှluṃ”shaငya”puṃ asī”akhaြာ”maraှိpe． rethakyakhaြငya”
314
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
gaṇanānaññya”naှင’yalaññya”koငya”， acañyaliုkyakhaြငya” anubandhanānaññya”naှင’yalaññya”koငya” kaငya”၍ acañyaatiုငya” phusanā
naññya” sakyasakyaā”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya”， ṭhapanānaññya” sakyasakyaā”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya” ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု
naှluṃ”shaငya”puṃ acīacañyakā” maraှိpe hūliုsaññya．
yaငya”siု’phaြcyasoya thimaှုthaငyaraှာ”rā ṭhāna၌ vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyaletiု’kiု raှုkhaြငya”hūso phusanā
naññya”naှင’ya kaငya”၍ appanājhānyahūso ṭhapanānaññya”ā”phaြင’ya ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု naှluṃ”shaငya”khaြငya”saññya maraှိ
sakaဲ’siု’ alā”tūpaငya phusanānaññya”naှင’ya kaငya”၍ rethakyakhaြငya” gaṇanānaññya”ā”phaြင’yalaññya” ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”
kiု naှluṃ”shaငya”khaြငya”saññya maraှိsaññyasā mahutyalohūmū - maraှိsaññyakā” maှnya၏． siု’soya rethakyakhaြငya”
gaṇanānaññya”kiု ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု naှluṃ”shaငya”raှုphā”khaြငya”၏ mūlaakhaြkheṃakaျchuṃ” akaြောငya”raငya”tacyarapya
phaြcyasokaြောင’ya padhānaā”phaြင’ya rethakyakhaြငya” gaṇanānaññya”hu raှုphā”naှluṃ”shaငya”puṃ naññya”canacyatacyakhuaphaြcya yūapya
sakaဲ’siု’ thiု’atū acañyaliုkya၍ raှုkhaြငya” anubandhanānaññya”kiုlaññya” appanājhānyahūso ṭhapanānaññya”၏ mūla
bhūta akhaြkheṃ akaျchuṃ”so akaြောငya”raငya”tacyarapyaphaြcya၍ padhānaā”phaြင’ya anubandhanānaññya”hu sī”sana’yanaññya”
tacyanaññya”aphaြcya yūthā”khaြငya” phaြcyapesaññya． akaြောငya”mū acañyaliုkya၍ raှုkhaြငya”hūso thiုanubandhanānaññya”naှင’ya
kaငya”၍ appanājhānyahūso ṭhapanā၏ maphaြcyasaင’ya maphaြcyaniုငyasokaြောင’yapaငya phaြcyasaññya．
ānāpānassatibhā0nā lupyaငnya”khhaငyasaññya thimaှုthaငyaraှာ”rāṭhāna၌ vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyalekiု
naှluṃ”shaငya”khaြငya”hūso phusanānaññya”naှင’ya kaငya”၍ maphaြcyaniုငyasaññya makaငya”cakoငya”saññya maှnyasoyalaññya” rethakyakhaြငya”
gaṇanānaññya”naှင’ya acañyaliုkya၍ raှုkhaြငya” anubandhanānaññya”tiု’kiုsā mūlabhūta akaြောငya”raငya”cacya phaြcyasokaြောင’ya
padhānaaphaြcyaphaြင’ya yū၍ rethakyakhaြငya” (= gaṇanā) naññya”， acañyaliုkya၍ raှုkhaြငya” (= anubandhanā) naññya”maှ tacyapā”
phusanānaññya” ṭhapanānaññya”tiု’၏ padhānaaphaြcya maraှိsaññyakiု paြliု၍ ---- “rethakyakhaြငya” gaṇanānaññya”၏ achamya”phaြင’ya
ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု naှluṃ”shaငya”puṃ， acañya liုkya၍ raှုkhaြငya” anubandhanānaññya”၏ achamya”phaြင’ya ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု
naှluṃ”shaငya”puṃmaျာ” asī”akhaြာ” thaငyaraှာ”raှိsakaဲ’siု’ phusanānaññya”၏ achamya”phaြင’ya ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု naှluṃ”shaငya”puṃ，
ṭhapanānaññya”၏ achamya”phaြင’ya ānāpāna kammaṭṭhānya”kiု naှluṃ”shaငya”puṃ asī”akhaြာ” maraှိpe”hu aṭṭhakathācharātoya
mina’yachiုtoyamūkhaြငya” phaြcyapesaññya． (visuddhi-1-272． mahāṭī-1-329-330．)
“phusanānaññya”၏ achamya”phaြင’ya ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု naှluṃ”shaငya”puṃ， ṭhapanānaññya”၏ achamya”phaြင’ya ānāpāna
kammaṭṭhānya”kiု naှluṃ”shaငya”puṃ， asī”akhaြာ” maraှိpā”hūso cakā”rapyaphaြင’yalaññya” ---- vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyale၏
thimaှုthaငyaraှာ”rāṭhāna၌ vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalekiု rethakyakhaြငya”hūso gaṇanā-phusanāphaြင’ya ānāpāna
kammaṭṭhānya”kiု naှluṃ”shaငya”puṃ raှိsakaဲ’siု’ thiု’atū vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalekiု acañyaliုkya၍ raှုkhaြငya” = anubandha-
nānaññya”kiု kaြñya၍ ṭhapanānaññya”sakyasakya phusanānaññya”sakyasakyaphaြင’ya ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု naှluṃ”shaငya”puṃ
acīaraငyasaññya thaငyaraှာ”maraှိhu paြtoyamūliုso aṭṭhakathācharātoyasaññya rethakyakhaြငya” gaṇanānaññya”kiု
rupyasimya”၍ akaြငyarhe’lokya appanājhānyasaññya maphaြcyapoyalāse”， thiုrhe’lokyaso kālapatyaluṃ”
vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalekiု acañyaliုkya၍ raှုkhaြငya” anubandhanānaññya”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya”， thiုsiု’ vaငyasakyale
thhakyasakyalekiု acañyaliုkya၍ raှုrā၌ vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale၏ thimaှုthaငyaraှာ”rāṭhāna၌sālaျှငya the’thi
neso vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalekiုsā naှluṃ”shaငya”khaြငya” (= phusanā) naññya”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya” ānāpāna
kammaṭṭhānya”kiု naှluṃ”shaငya” raှုphā”khaြငya”kiု paြုlupyaapya၏． appanājhānyatarā”saññya thaငyaraှာ”chā phaြcyapoya၍ lālatya
soyakā” anubandhanānaññya”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya”， ṭhapanānaññya”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya” ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု naှluṃ”shaငya”
khaြငya”kiု paြုsaññyamaññya၏hūso anakyasabhokiု paြapyapesaññya．
315
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
yaငya”siု’ phusanānaññya” ṭhapanānaññya”tiု’၏ achamya”phaြင’ya ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု naှluṃ”shaငya” raှုphā”puṃ asī”akhaြာ”
maraှိpābhaဲlaျkya abhayyakaြောင’ya ānāpānalupyaငnya”khhaငyakiု akaျñya”paြchiုrā uddesa cakā”cañya၌ phusanānaှင’ya
ṭhapanātiု’kiု asī”akhaြာ”yūthā”apyapāsanaññya”hu me”maြnya”phhayyarā raှိlāpaြnya၏． aောkyapāatiုငya” aṭṭhakathā
charātoyaka phaြcheiုthā”toyamūpesaññya．
1． gaṇanā-phusanā
2． anubandhanā-phusanā-ṭhapanā
phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneye0 pana gaṇento gaṇanāya ca phusanāya ca manasi karoti． tatthe0 gaṇanaṃ
paṭisaṃharithā te satiyā anubandhanto appanā0sena ca cittaṃ ṭhapento anubandhanāya ca phusanāya ca
ṭhapanāya ca manasi karotīti vuccati． (visuddhi-1-272．)
1． amaှnyacaငyacacyasoyakā” vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale၏ thirā thirā arapya၌sālaျှငya rethakyasaññya
raှိsoya siု’mahutya rethakyaso yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya gaṇanānaññya”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya”， phusanānaññya”phaြင’ya
laññya”koငya” ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု naှluṃ”shaငya”saññya maññya၏．
2． thiုvaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale၏ thirā thirā arapya၌sālaျှငya rethakyakhaြငya” gaṇanānaññya”kiု khokyathā”
liုkya၍ rupyasimya”liုkya၍ thiုvaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’kiု satiphaြင’ya acañyalaျှောkya၍ liုkyalaျkya mapaြtya
raှုphā”suṃ”sapyanesoyalaññya”koငya”， appanājhānya phaြcyapoyalāniုငyalokyaso akhaြငya”arāā”phaြင’ya thaငyalā
tiုငya”so alhanyakaြññyalaငyatokyapalaျkyaraှိso ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityaāruṃ၌ bhā0nācityakiု ငြိmyavapya
chā kapya၍ thā”niုငyasoyalaññya”koငya” anubandhanānaññya”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya”， phusanānaññya”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya”， ṭhapanā
naññya”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya” ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု naှluṃ”shaငya”raှုphā”saññya maññya၏hu khoyachiုapyapesaññya．
(visuddhi-1-272． mahāṭī-1-330．)
īathakyapā satyamaှtyakhaျkyamaျာ”ara ---- vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale၏ thimaှု thaငyaraှာ”rānerākasā
coင’ya၍ vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalekiု aca-alayya-achuṃ” akunyaluṃ”kiု thaငyathaငyaraှာ”raှာ” siaောငya
acañyaliုkya၍ raှုphā” naှluṃ”shaငya”ramaññyahu liုraငya”akhaျkyakiု maှtyasā”thā”pāle．
siု’soya vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale၏ thimaှုthaငyaraှာ”rāṭhāna၌ satimaြဲsoakhā vaငyasakyale thhakya
sakyaletiု’၏ araှññya atiု၌ya satimaြဲaောငya chakyalakya၍ kaြို”cā”ramaññya phaြcyasaññya． araှññya atiု၌ya sati
khiုငyamaြဲlā၍ ānāpānanimityapoyalākhaဲ’soyalaññya”koငya”， araှññya atiု၌ya satikhiုငyamaြဲnepālaျkya kaြာmaြင’ya
chā ā”thutyasoyalaññya” ānāpānanimityasaññya mapoyaphaြcyanekhaဲ’soyalaññya”koငya” anubandhanānaññya”ara
vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’၏ aca-alayya-achuṃ” akunyaluṃ”kiု thaငyathaငyaraှာ”raှာ” siaောငya vaငyasakyale
thhakyasakyale thimaှုthaငyaraှာ”rānerākasā coင’ya၍ vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalenokyasiု’ acañyaliုkya၍
naှluṃ”shaငya” raှုphā”pā． īsiု’ raှုphā”rā၌ aṭṭhakathāmaျာ”ka aောkyapā upamāmaျာ”phaြင’ya adhippāyya chiုliုraငya” anakya
sabhomaျာ” thaငyaraှာ”aောငya raှငya”laငya”taငyapaြthā”pesaññya．
paṅgulopamā = sūchhaṃ’ upamā
sūchhaṃ’saññya pukhakyaphaြင’ya maြူ”thū”paျောyapā”nekaြkunyaso sā”amitiု’၏ pukhakyakiု lhaှဲ၍ thiု pukhakyatiုငyaraငya”၌
sālaျှငya thiုငyanelaျkya acañyasaphaြင’ya lāsaññyalaññya”phaြcyaso shā”saññyalaññya”phaြcyaso pukhakyapaျñya၏ naှcyaphakya
316
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
kunyaso achanya”tiု’kiုlaññya”koငya”， alayyakiုlaññya”koငya” maြငyathe’ne၏， siု’soya pukhakyapaျñya၏ naှcyaphakya
kunyaso achanya”tiု’naှင’ya alayyatiု’kiု maြငyakhaြငya”ငှာ kaြောင’yakaြciုkyamaှု ā”thutyamaှုkā” maraှိpe． īupamā atū
yogā0cara rahanya”toyasaññya (mikhaငyanhā”ma၏ niု’kiု khiု”ciု’le’raှိso nhā”sā”ငyyakiု khaျñya”kapyayaှñyathaဲ၍ phhaဲ’khaျññya
rātiုငyanaှင’ya tūso) naှာsī”phaျာ” athakyanaှုtyakhamya”hūso assāsa-passāsa nimityatiုငyaraငya”၌ sati၏
achamya”phaြင’ya rapyataññya၍， satimaြဲaောငya kapyathā”၍， assāsa-passāsa (= vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale)
taññya”hūso pukhakyakiု lhaှဲ၍， assāsa-passāsakiု raှုso bhā0nācityakiု khaျñya”kapyayaှñyathaဲ၍ phhaဲ’khaျññyarā
tiုငyanaှင’yatūso thiုnaှာsī”phaျာ” athakyanaှုtyakhamya”taññya”hūso assāsa-passāsanimityatiုငyaraငya”၌sālaျှငya
vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalekiု raှုphā”suṃ”sapyatatyaso satiphaြင’ya (sati၏ achamya”phaြင’ya) thiုငyanelaျkya， acañya
saphaြင’ya lāsaññyalaññya” phaြcyakunyaso shā”saññyalaññya” phaြcyakunyaso vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’၏ thimaှု
thaငyaraှာ”rā (= phuṭṭhaṭṭhāna)arapya၌sālaျှငya vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’၏ aca-alayya-achuṃ” akunyaluṃ”siု’
satiphaြင’ya acañyaliုkyasaññya phaြcya၍laññya”koငya”， thiုvaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’၏ thirāṭhāna၌ vaငyasakyale
thhakyasakyalekiု raှုphā”tatya naှluṃ”shaငya”tatyaso bhā0nācityakiု thā”saññyaphaြcya၍laññya”koငya” vaငyasakyale
thhakyasakyalekiု raှု၏． siု’soya thiုvaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’၏ aca-alayya-achuṃ” akunyaluṃ”kiု
maြငyakhaြငya”ငှာ kaြောင’yakaြciုkyamaှု ā”thutyamaှုkā” maraှိpe． īkā” paṅgulopamā (= sūchhaṃ’ upamā) taññya”．
(visuddhi-1-272．)
dovārikūpamā = taṅkhā”coင’ya upamā
taṅkhā”coင’yasaññya maြို’thaငya”၌laññya”koငya”， maြို’paြငya၌laññya”koငya” “saငyasaññya abhayyaamaññya raှိsanaññya”，
abhayyaarapyamaှmūlaññya” lāsanaññya”， saငya၏ lakyathaဲ၌mūlaññya” abhayyaarāvatthunaññya””- īsiု’ casaññyaphaြင’ya
macuṃcamya” macacyache”pe． maှnyapesaññya ---- thiု maြို’thaငya”၌ laှñña’yalaññyasū maြို’paြငya maြို’pa၌ laှñña’yalaññyasū thiုsūtiု’၏
lakyathaဲ၌ pāraှိso lakyanakyabhaṇḍātiု’saññya thiုtaṅkhā”maှူ” taṅkhā”coင’ya၏ tāvanyavattarā”maျာ” mahutyakaြpe．
caငyacacyasoyakā” -- taṅkhā”0siု’ rokyalaှာ rokyalaှာso sūkiုsālaျှငya cuṃcamya”cacyache”sakaဲ’siု’ -- īupamā
atūsālaျှငya īyogā0cara rahanya”၏ athaငya”siု’ (= naှာsī”phaျာ”maှ khaျkyasiု’tiုငyaaောငya athaငya”bhakyasiု’)
vaငyashā”so letiု’saññyalaññya”koငya”， naှာsī”phaျာ”၏ paြငyapasiု’ thhakyakhhāshā”so letiု’saññyalaññya”koငya”
raှုranyatāvanyakā” mahutyakaြlekunya． naှာsī”phaျာ” siု’mahutya athakyanaှုtyakhamya”taññya”hūso taṅkhā”0siု’ rokya
laှာ rokyalaှာso assāsa-passāsa = vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’saññyasālaျှငya raှုranya tāvanya
vattarā”tiု’ phaြcyakaြkunyasaññya -- hu maှtyasā”thā”pāle． īkā” taṅkhā”coင’ya upamātaññya”．
(visuddhi-1-273． paṭisaṃ-ṭṭha-2-96．)
tacyaphanya paṭisambhidāmagyapāḷitoya၌ aောkyapā lhaှ-upamākiုlaññya” hokaြာ”thā”toyamūpesaññya．
kakacūpamā = lhaှ upamā
nimittaṃ assāsapassāsā， anārammaṇamekacittassa．
ajānatoca tayo dhamme， bhā0nānupalabbhati．
nimittaṃ assāsapassāsā， anārammaṇamekacittassa．
jānatoca tayo dhamme， bhā0nā upalabbhatīti． (paṭisaṃ-169． visuddhi-1-273．)
317
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
nimittanti upanibandhananimittaṃ nāsikaggaṃ mukhanimittaṃ vā． anārammaṇamekacittassāti assāsapassāsānaṃ
ekakkhaṇe appavattanato ekassa cittassa tayopi ārammaṇaṃ na honti， nimittena saha assāso
passāso vāti dheye0 ekakkhaṇe ārammaṇaṃ hontīti attho． ajānato ca tayo dhammeti
nimittaṃ assāso passāsoti ime tayo dhamme ārammaṇakaraṇa0sena avindantassa．
(vimati-1-216-217．)
= (1) assāsa-passāsakiု raှုso bhā0nācityakiု phhaဲ’khaျññyarāṭhāna phaြcyaso naှာsī”phaျာ” siု’mahutya
athakyanaှုtyakhamya”hūso nimityasaññyalaññya”koငya”， (2 ) vaငyasakyale， (3) thhakyasakyaletiု’saññyalaññya”koငya”
īsuṃ”pā”kunyaso tarā”tiု’saññya tacyakhuso citya၏ āruṅkā” mahutyakaြlekunya． thiုsiု’paငya mahutyakaြ
kunyasoyalaññya” suṃ”pā”kunyaso tarā”tiု’kiု āruṃmūsoā”phaြင’ya masisasūā” ānāpānassatisamādhi
bhā0nākiု maraapyape．
««maှtyakhaျkya ---- vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’saññyakā” tacyakhuso cittakkhaṇa၏ athaငya”၌ paြိုငyatū
maphaြcyakaြsokaြောင’ya nimitya-vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyalehūso suṃ”pā”kunyaso tarā”tiု’saññya tacyakhu
so citya၏ āruṅkā” maphaြcyaniုငyakaြpe． tacyakhusocityaka suṃ”pā”kunyaso tarā”tiု’kiု paြိုငyatū masi
niုငyape． nimityanaှင’ya assāsasaññyalaññya”koငya”， nimityanaှင’ya passāsasaññyalaññya”koငya” tacyakhuso
cittakkhaṇaathaငya”၌ tacyakhuso citya၏ sicarāāruṃ phaြcyaniုငyakaြpesaññya． siု’athakya tacyakhuso cittakkhaṇa
athaငya”၌ suṃ”pā”kunyaso tarā”tiု’saññya paြိုငyatū maphaြcyakaြsokaြောင’ya tacyakhuso citya၏ sicarāāruṃ
maphaြcyaniုငyakaြkunyasoyalaññya” nānācittakkhaṇa (= asī”asī”so cittakkhaṇa)၏kā” sicarāāruṃ phaြcyaniုငya
kaြsaññyahu chiုliုsaññya． īcakā”kiု paṭibhāganimityasiု’ machiုkyamī akhaျိnyakiု raññya၍ chiုsaññyahulaññya” maှtya
sā”pā． cāmaျkyanaှာ-346-347 - kaြñña’yapā．»»
(1) assāsa-passāsakiု raှုso bhā0nācityakiု phhaဲ’khaျññyarāṭhānaphaြcyaso naှာsī”phaျာ” siု’mahutya
athakyanaှုtyakhamya”hūso nimityasaññyalaññya”koငya”， (2) vaငyasakyale， (3) thhakyasakyaletiု’saññyalaññya”koငya”
īsuṃ”pā”kunyaso tarā”tiု’saññya tacyakhuso citya၏ sicarāāruṃ mahutyakunya， thiုsiု’paငya sicarā āruṃ
mahutyakunyasoyalaññya” suṃ”pā”kunyaso tarā”tiု’kiု sisasūā”sālaျှငya ānāpānassatisamādhibhā0nākiု
raapyape၏． (paṭisaṃ-169．)
tacyaphanya paṭisambhidāmagyapāḷitoya၌ aောkyapāatiုငya” ame”aphaြmeျာ” paြုlupyalaျkya ānāpānalupyaငnya”
khhaငyakiု chakyalakya၍ raှငya”laငya”taငyapaြthā”apyapesaññya．
1． ītarā”suṃ”pā”tiု’saññya abhayyasiု’laျှငya tacyakhuso citya၏ sicarāāruṃ mahutyakunyasanaññya”．
2． ītarā”suṃ”pā”tiု’saññya abhayyasiု’laျှငya yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ asiñāṇya၌ mathaငyasaññya mahutyakunya
sanaññya”．
3． abhayyasiု’laျှငya cityapaျံ’lhaင’yakhaြငya”siု’ marokyasanaññya”．
4． abhayyasiု’laျှငya ānāpānassatisamādhibhā0nākiု ā”thutyaso vīriyasaññyalaññya” thaငyaraှာ”sanaññya”．
5． abhayyasiု’laျှငya nī0raṇakiု payyakhhātatyaso jhānyakiုlaññya” paြီ”cesanaññya”．
6． abhayyasiု’laျှငya saṃyojañyakiု payyatatyaso magyakiု rasanaññya”．
318
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
upamāā”phaြင’ya ññīññhatyaso maြpeြငya၌ sacyatuṃ”kiု khaျthā”၏． thiုsacyatuṃ”kiု yokyaျာ”saññya lhaှphaြင’ya
phaြtyalerā၏． (tacyabhakyathiု”lhaှphaြင’ya tacyayokyataññya” sacyatuṃ”kiု phaြtyanesaññyakiု raññyarhayyathā”saññyahu
maှtyapā．) sacyatuṃ”၌ thiso lhaှshā”tiု’၏ achamya”ā”phaြင’ya yokyaျာ”၏ satisaññya thaငya၏， mimi၏ anī”siု’
(mimibhakyasiု’) lāso lhaှshā”tiု’kiုlaññya”koငya”， tacyabhakyasiု’ shā”so lhaှshā”tiု’kiုlaññya”koငya” naှluṃ”
mashaငya”pe． naှluṃ”mashaငya”soyalaññya” mimi၏anī”siု’ (mimibhakyasiု’) lāso lhaှshā”， tacyabhakyasiု’ shā”so
lhaှshā”tiု’saññya mathaငyasaññyakā” mahutyakunya (lhaှshā”tiု’kiု masisaññya mahutyakunya sikunya၏hu chiုliုsaññya)．
sacyatuṃ”kiု phaြtyaso vīriyasaññyalaññya” thaငyaraှာ”၏， sacyatuṃ”kiု phaြtyakhaြငya” luṃ’lakiုlaññya” paြီ”cī”ce၏．
1． ññīññhatyaso maြေapaြငya၌ khaျthā”apyaso sacyatuṃ”kaဲ’siု’ īatū satiphaြင’ya phhaဲ’khaျññyaapyaso vaငya
sakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’၏ thirāṭhāna phaြcyaso naှာsī”phaျာ” siု’mahutya athakyanaှုtyakhamya”hūso
nimityakiု maှtyaapya၏． (sacyatuṃ”naှင’ya nimitya tūsaññya hū၏．)
2． lhaှshā”tiု’kaဲ’siု’ īatū vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’kiု maှtyaapyakunya၏． (lhaှshā”naှင’ya vaငyasakyale
thhakyasakyale tūsaññya hū၏．)
3． (ka) sacyatuṃ”၌ thiso lhaှshā”tiု’၏ achamya”ā”phaြင’ya yokyaျာ”၏ satisaññya thaငyasakaဲ’siု’ (lhaှshā”
thirā sacyatuṃ”၌sā cityakiု ciုkyathā”sakaဲ’siု’hu chiုliုsaññya) ，
( kha ) chhaဲliုkyasaphaြင’ya mimibhakyasiု’lāso lhaှshā”， thanya”liုkyasaphaြင’ya tacyabhakyasiု’shā”so lhaှshā”kiု
naှluṃ”mashaငya”sakaဲ’siု’ ，
( ga ) chhaဲliုkyasaphaြင’ya mimibhakyasiု’ lāso lhaှshā”， thanya”liုkyasaphaြင’ya tacyabhakyasiု’ shā”so lhaှshā”
tiု’saññya mathaငyasaññyalaññya” mahutyakunyasakaဲ’siု’ ，
(gha) sacyatuṃ”kiု phaြtyaso vīriyasaññyalaññya” thaငyaraှာ”sakaဲ’siု’ ，
( င ) sacyatuṃ”kiု phaြtyakhaြငya” luṃ’lakiုlaññya” paြီ”cī”cesakaဲ’siု’ ，
ī upamāatūpaငyalaျှငya ----
(ka) yogā0cara rahanya”toyasaññya naှာsī”phaျာ”၌laññya”koငya”， siု’mahutya athakyanaှုtyakhamya”phaျာ”၌laññya”
koငya” satikiု raှေ”raှုthā”၍ thiုငyane၏．
( kha ) athaငya”siု’ vaငyalākunyaso vaငyasakyale， apasiု’ thhakyashā”kunyaso thhakyasakyaletiု’kiု
naှluṃ” mashaငya”kunya． (vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale shā”rālamya”kaြောငya”hu khoyachiုapyaso athaငya”
bhakya apaြငyabhakyasiု’ acañyalaျှောkya၍ cityaliုkya mashā”khaြငya”kiု chiုliုsaññya．)
( ga ) athaငya”siု’ vaငyalākunyaso vaငyasakyale， apasiု’ thhakyashā”kunyaso thhakyasakyaletiု’saññya
asiñāṇya၌ mathaငyasaññyakā” mahutyakunya， thaငyakunyasaññyasātaññya”．
(gha) vīriyasaññya thaငya၏，
( င ) jhānyakiုlaññya” paြီ”ce၏，
( ca ) saṃyojañyakiု payyatatyaso magyakiုlaññya” ra၏，
(cha) padhāna maññyaso vīriyasaññyalaññya” phaြcya၏．
padhāna-hūsaññya abhayyanaññya”， ā”thutyaapyaso vīriyaraှိso puggiုlya၏ kiုyyasaññyalaññya”koငya”
cityasaññyalaññya”koငya” ānāpānassatisamādhi bhā0nākaṃā” laျောya၏， īkā” padhāna maññya၏．
319
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
payoga-hūsaññya abhayyanaññya”， ā”thutyaapyaso vīriyaraှိso puggiုlyasaññya cityaññacyanhamya”kaြောငya”
phaြcyasañña’ya jhānyamagyaphiုlya၏ atā”achī” apityaapaငya phaြcyasañña’ya upakkilesa nī0raṇatiု’kiု payyachana’yaapyakunya၏，
vitakyatiု’saññya ငြိmya”kunya၏， īkā” payogamaññya၏．
visesa-hūsaññya abhayyanaññya”， ā”thutyaapyaso vīriyaraှိso puggiုlyaā” saṃyojañyatiု’saññya
paျောkyakunya၏， anusayadhātyatiု’saññya kaငya”kunya၏， īkā” visesa maññya၏．
īsiု’laျှငya nimitya， assāsa， passāsa - ītarā”suṃ”pā”tiု’saññya tacyakhuso citya၏ āruṅkā”
mahutyakunya， thiုsiု’ tacyakhusocitya၏ āruṃ maphaြcyalaှñña’yaငြာ”laññya” īsuṃ”pā”tiု’saññya yogā0carapuggiုlya၏
ñāṇya0၌ mathaငyasaññyakā” mahutyakunya， thaငyapākunya၏．
akayya၍taññya” mathaငyaငြာ”mū ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”āruṃmaှ akhaြာ”āruṃsiု’ cityapaျံ’lhaင’yamaှု phaြcyapeto’
maññya， ānāpānassati samādhibhā0nākiု paြီ”cī”cetatyaso vīriyasaññyalaññya” mathaငyaphaြcyato’maññya， nī0raṇa
aññacyaakaြေ”kiု payyakhhātatyaso chamya”ā”raှိso samādhikiု choငyatatyaso phaြcyacetatyaso bhā0nā
kiု ā”thutyakhaြငya” payogakiုlaññya” yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya mapaြီ”cī”ceniုငyaphaြcyato’maññya． thiုsiု’kā”mahutya
nimitya， assāsa， passāsa ---- ītarā”suṃ”pā”tiု’saññya yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ ñāṇya0၌ thaငyapākunya
sokaြောင’yapaငyalaျှငya cityasaññyalaññya” mapaျံ’lhaင’ya taññyakaြññyachā phaြcyakhaဲ’၏， ānāpānassati samādhibhā0nākiု
paြီ”cī”cetatyaso luṃ’lavīriyasaññyalaññya” thaငyapākhaဲ’၏， nī0raṇaaññacyaakaြေ”kiု payyakhhātatyaso chamya”aငya
raှိso samādhikiု choငyatatya phaြcyacetatyaso bhā0nākiု ā”thutyakhaြငya” payogakiုlaññya” yogā0cara
puggiုlyasaññya paြီ”cī”ceniုငyasaññya phaြcyakhaဲ’၏， saṃyojañyakiု payyasatyatatyaso achaင’yachaင’yaso lokī lokuttara
m guṇyakaျေ”jū”athū”kiုlaññya” raraှိniုငyapesaññya phaြcyakhaဲ’၏． (paṭisaṃ-169-170． paြññya-2-248-249-kaြñña’ya，，)
ānāpānassati yassa， paripuṇṇā subhāvitā．
anupubbaṃ paricitā， yathā buddhena desitā．
so imaṃ lokaṃ pabhāseti， abbhā mutto0 candimā． (paṭisaṃ-170．)
= ānāpānassatisamādhibhā0nākiု sammāsambuddhabhurā”raှငyasaññya hokaြာ”paြsa chiုchuṃ”mathā”toyamū

kaြkunya၏． ā”kaြီ”kunya runa’yaraငya”kunyasaññya phaြcya၍ phaြcyapoyalākaြkunya၏． vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyalephaြင’ya

apoငya”saññyalaññya”koငya” (= kiုyyasaññyalaññya”koငya”) cityasaññyalaññya”koငya” simya”chaññya”apyakunyasaññya
= ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”yūthā”apyakunyasaññya phaြcyakunya၏． thiုakhā၌ thiုsiု’ ñāṇyaphaြင’ya simya”chaññya”thā”apya piုငya”khaြာ”
yūthā”apyakunyaso kiုyyacityanaှcyapā”tiု’saññya ငြိmyasakyakunyasaññya athū”saphaြင’ya ငြိmyasakyakunyasaññyaphaြcyalā
kaြkunya၏． thiု kiုyyacityanaှcyapā”tiု’saññya athū”saphaြင’ya ငြိmyasakyakunyasaññyaraှိsoya vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyale
tiု’saññya nū”ññaṃ’kunyasaññyaphaြcya၍ simyamhe’kunyasaññyaphaြcya၍ phaြcyapoyalākaြkunya၏， raှိse”salo， maraှိto’paြီ
lohu īsiု’ cū”camya”raှာphhepyasaññya၏ aphaြcyataññya”hūso akhaြငya”arāsiု’ rokyaraှိlākaြkunya၏．

akhaျိnyakālapiုငya”၌kā” yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya kiုyyacityanaှcyapā”tiု’kiု masimya”chaññya”rase”saññya maññya၏．

nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
thiုcityanaှင’ya karajakāya amaññyaraso rupyatarā”apoငya”kiု amaှီpaြု၍ phaြcyapoyalākaြkunyaso vaငyasakyale

upamāā”phaြင’yakā” ---- paြေ”paြီ”၍ taññyaneso yokyaျာ”ā”， siု’mahutya toငyamaှmūlaññya” sakyachaငya”
၍ taññyaneso yokyaျာ”ā”， siု’mahutya le”laṃso vanyathupyavanyapiု”kiု ū”khoငya”thakyamaှ khaျ၍taññyane
so yokyaျာ”ā” runa’yaraငya”kaြmya”tamya”kunyaso vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyaletiု’saññya phaြcyapoyanekaြkunya၏，
naှာkhoငya”machaṃ’ phaြcyane၏ (= naှာkhoငya”phaြင’ya asakyaraှူ၍ ma0 phaြcyane၏)， khaṃthaငya”phaြင’ya vaငyasakyalekiု raှူnera
saññyaphaြcya၍laññya”koငya”， thhakyasakyalekiု thutyanerasaññya phaြcya၍laññya”koငya” taññyanera၏．
nokyatacyamaျို”soyakā” ---- akaြငyaakhā၌ īyokyaျာ”saññya thiုpaငyapanya”khaြငya”kiု payyaphaျောkya၍ rekhaျို”
၍laññya”koငya”， resokya၍laññya”koငya” ciုneso puchiု”kiု raငyabhatyapoya၌ taငyathā”၍ aေ”maြso
aripyaaောkya၌ laျောငya”cakyane၏． thiုakhā၌ thiုyokyaျာ”ā” thiုvaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’saññya
nū”ññaṃ’lākunya၏． raှိlesalo maraှိlesalohu īsiု’ cū”camya”raှာphhepyasaññya၏ aphaြcyataññya”hūso
akhaြငya”arāsiု’ rokyaraှိlākunya၏．
īupamāatūsālaျှငya īyogā0cara rahanya”toya၏ raှေ”yakhaငya ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု ā”mathutyamī
kāla၌ kiုyyasaññyalaññya”koငya”， cityasaññyalaññya”koငya” paငyapanya”khaြငya” raှိkunya၏ = pūpanyamaှုnaှင’yatakha phaြcyakunya၏，
runa’yaraငya”kaြmya”tamya”kunya၏． kiုyyacitya naှcyapā”tiု’၏ runa’yaraငya”kaြmya”tamya”saññya၏ aphaြcyasaññya athū”saphaြင’ya maငြိmya”
latyasoya vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’saññyalaññya” runa’yaraငya” kaြmya”tamya”kaြkunya၏． ā”kaြီ”kunya runa’yaraငya”
kunyasaññyaphaြcya၍ phaြcyapoyalākaြkunya၏， naှာkhoငya”machaṃ’ phaြcyane၏， khaṃthaငya”phaြင’ya vaငyasakyalekiု raှူlaျkya thhakya
sakyalekiု thutyalaျkya taññyanera၏．
nokyatacyamaျို”soyakā” ---- akaြငyaakhā thiုyogā0cara rahanya”toya၏ kiုyyasaññyalaññya”koငya”，
cityasaññyalaññya”koငya” simya”chaññya”apyakunya၏， ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”yūthā”apyakunya၏． thiုakhā thiုsiု’ ñāṇyaphaြင’ya
simya”chaññya”thā”apya piုငya”khaြာ”yūthā”apyakunyaso kiုyyacityatiု’saññya ငြိmyasakyakunyasaññya athū”saphaြင’ya ငြိmya
sakyakunyasaññyaraှိsoya vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’saññya nū”ññaṃ’kunyasaññya phaြcya၍ phaြcyapoyalākaြkunya၏，
raှိlesalo maraှိto’paြီlohu īsiု’ cū”camya” raှာphhepyasaññya၏ aphaြcyataññya”hūso akhaြငya”arāsiု’
rokyaraှိlākaြkunya၏． (visuddhi-1-266-267．)
akaြောငya”paြkhaျkya
thiုsiု’ phaြcyarakhaြငya”၏ akaြောငya”raငya”kā” īsiု’taññya”． thiုthiု yogā0cara rahanya”toya၏ santānyavayya
raှေ”yakhaငya vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’kiု masimya”chaññya”mī akhaျိnya၌ runa’yaraငya” runa’yaraငya”kunyaso vaငyasakyale
thhakyasakyalehūso kāyasaṅkhāratiု’kiု ငြိmya”ceṃ’hu ----
1． pathamaū”chā chaငyakhaြငyakhaြငya” = ābhoga ，
2． vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalehūso kāyasaṅkhāra၏ ငြိmya”aောငya koငya”chā aphanyatalaဲlaဲ chaင’yakā
chaင’yakā raှေ”raှုchoငyakhaြငya” (= ငြိmya”maှုkiု phaြcyacekhaြငya”) = samannāhāra ，
323
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
3． vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalehūso kāyasaṅkhāra၏ ငြိmya”maှုsabhokiု cityanaှluṃ”၌ thā”khaြငya” = manasi
kāra ，
4． vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalehūso kāyasaṅkhārakiု ငြိmya”aောငya cū”camya”chaငyakhaြငyakhaြငya” = paccavekkhaṇāī
le”maျို”so sabhotarā”saññyakā” thaငyaraှာ”maraှိse”pe．
siု’soya vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalekiု simya”chaññya”so ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”yūso akhaျိnyaakhākāla
၌kā” īle”maျို”so sabhotarā”maျာ”saññya thiုyogā0cara rahanya”toya၏ santānya၌ thaငyaraှာ”raှိnepe၏．
thiုkaြောင’ya thiုyogā0cara rahanya”toya၏ santānyavayya vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalehūso kāyasaṅkhāratiု’
kiု masimya”chaññya”rase”so ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ” mayūrase”so akhaျိnyakālathakya vaငyasakyale thhakyasakya
lehūso kāyasaṅkhāratiု’kiု simya”chaññya”neso ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”yūneso akhaျိnyakāla၌ vaငyasakyale
thhakyasakyalehūso kāyasaṅkhārasaññya piု၍ simyamhe’nū”ññaṃ’maှု raှိnekhaြငya” phaြcyapesaññya． (visuddhi-1-267．)
thiုsiု’ vaငyale thhakyalesaññya simyamhe’nū”ññaṃ’lāsoakhā vaငyale thhakyalekiု maျှaောငya raှူpā． vaငyale
maျာ”၍ thhakyalenaññya”soya nokyasiု’ lanyatatya၏． thhakyalemaျာ”၍ vaငyale naññya”soya raှေ”siု’ kunya”tatya၏．
satiraှိce．
oḷārika - sukhuma
tacyaphanya visuddhimaggaaṭṭhakathā၌ samathapiုငya” vipassanāpiုငya”tiု’၌ oḷārika = runa’yaraငya”kaြmya”tamya”puṃ， sukhuma
= simyamhe’nū”ññaṃ’puṃmaျာ”kiုlaññya” aောkyapāatiုငya” chakyalakya၍ phoyapaြthā”pesaññya．
dīghabhāṇaka-saṃyuttabhāṇakatiု’၏ achiု
1． vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale၏ araှññya-atiု， aca-alayya-achuṃ” akunyaluṃ”kiု thaငyathaငyaraှာ”raှာ”
siaောငya ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”yūkhaြငya” simya”chaññya”khaြငya”၌laññya” oḷārika = runa’yaraငya” kaြmya”tamya”se”၏．
pathamajhānya၏ upacārasamādhiakhiုkya၌ sukhuma = simyamhe’nū”ññaṃ’၏．
2． thiုpathamajhānya၏ upacārasamādhi akhiုkya၌laññya” runa’yaraငya”kaြmya”tamya”se”၏， pathamajhānya akhiုkya၌kā”
piု၍ nū”ññaṃ’၏．
3． pathamajhānya akhiုkya၌laññya”koငya”， dutiyajhānya၏ upacārasamādhi akhiုkya၌laññya”koငya” runa’yaraငya”
kaြmya”tamya”se”၏， dutiyajhānya akhiုkya၌kā” piု၍ nū”ññaṃ’၏．
4． dutiyajhānya akhiုkya၌laññya”koငya”， tatiyajhānya၏ upacārasamādhi akhiုkya၌laññya”koငya” runa’yaraငya”
kaြmya”tamya”se”၏， tatiyajhānya akhiုkya၌ piု၍ nū”ññaṃ’၏．
5． tatiyajhānya akhiုkya၌laññya”koငya”， catutthajhānya၏ upacārasamādhi akhiုkya၌laññya”koငya” runa’yaraငya”
kaြmya”tamya”se”၏， catutthajhānya akhiုkya၌kā” alhanyanū”ññaṃ’ simyamhe’၏， maphaြcyakhaြငya”sabhosiု’sālaျှငya
rokyaraှိshā”pe၏． īsiု’ maှtyasā”pāle．
catutthajjhāne atisukhumo appavattime0 pāpuṇātīti． (visuddhi-1-267．)
īkā” dīghanikāyyakiု choငyaso dīghabhāṇaka， saṃyuttanikāyyakiု choငyaso saṃyuttabhāṇaka
matheryamaြtyatiု’၏ aliုtaññya”．
324
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
majjhimabhāṇakatiု’၏ achiု
majjhimanikāyyakiု choငyaso majjhimabhāṇaka matheryamaြtyatiု’၏ aliုkā” ---- pathamajhānya akhiုkya၌
vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalesaññya runa’yaraငya”kaြmya”tamya”၏， dutiyajhānya၏ upacārasamādhi akhiုkya၌ simyamhe’
nū”ññaṃ’၏ - hu īsiု’laျှငya aောkyaaောkyaso jhānyathakya athakyaathakyaso jhānya၏ upacārasamādhi
akhiုkya၌laññya” sālhanya၍ nū”ññaṃ’maှုkiု aliုraှိtoyamūkaြkunya၏． (visuddhi-1-267．)
khapyasimya”so matheryamaြtyatiု’၏ tūññīsovāda
siု’soyalaññya” khapyasimya”kunyaso dīghabhāṇaka saṃyuttabhāṇaka majjhimabhāṇakatiု’၏ aliုā”phaြင’ya
assāsa-passāsakiု masimya”chaññya”rase”mī ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”mayūrase”mī akhaျိnyakāla၌ phaြcyapoyaneso
assāsa-passāsahūso kāyasaṅkhārasaññya assāsa-passāsakiု simya”chaññya”paြီ”rā ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”
yūpaြီ”rāakhā၌ ငြိmya”shā”saññyasātaññya”． assāsa-passāsakiု simya”chaññya”paြီ”rā ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”yūpaြီ”rā
akhaျိnyakāla၌ phaြcyapoya neso assāsa-passāsahūso kāyasaṅkhārasaññya pathamajhānya၏ upacāra
samādhiakhiုkya၌ ငြိmya”shā”saññyasātaññya”．
pathamajhānya၏ upacārasamādhiakhiုkya၌ phaြcyapoyaneso kāyasaṅkhārasaññya pathamajhānyaakhiုkya၌ ငြိmya”
shā”saññyasātaññya”．
pathamajhānyaakhiုkya၌ phaြcyapoyaneso kāyasaṅkhārasaññya dutiyajhānya၏ upacārasamādhi akhiုkya၌
ငြိmya”shā”saññyasātaññya”．
dutiyajhānya၏ upacārasamādhi akhiုkya၌ phaြcyapoyaneso kāyasaṅkhārasaññya dutiyajhānya akhiုkya၌
ငြိmya”shā”saññyasātaññya”．
dutiyajhānyaakhiုkya၌ phaြcyapoyaneso kāyasaṅkhārasaññya tatiyajhānya၏ upacārasamādhi akhiုkya၌
ငြိmya”shā”saññyasātaññya”．
tatiyajhānya၏ upacārasamādhiakhiုkya၌ phaြcyapoyaneso kāyasaṅkhārasaññya tatiyajhānya akhiုkya၌
ငြိmya”shā”saññyasātaññya”．
tatiyajhānya akhiုkya၌ phaြcyapoyaneso kāyasaṅkhārasaññya catutthajhānya၏ upacārasamādhi akhiုkya၌
ငြိmya”shā”saññyasātaññya”．
catutthajhānya၏ upacārasamādhiakhiုkya၌ phaြcyapoyaneso kāyasaṅkhārasaññya catutthajhānya akhiုkya၌
ငြိmya”shā”saññyasātaññya”． īkā” raှေ”ū”chā samathabhā0nāpiုငya”၌ assāsa-passāsa = kāyasaṅkhāra၏
achaင’yachaင’ya ငြိmya”puṃtaññya”． (visuddhi-1-267．)
vipassanāpiုငya”၌ achaင’yachaင’ya ငြိmya”puṃ
tacyaphanya vipassanāpiုငya”၌laññya” vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’၏ achaင’yachaင’ya runa’yaraငya”kaြmya”tamya”rāmaှ
tacyachaင’yapaြီ” tacyachaင’ya simyamhe’nū”ññaṃ’၍ shā”puṃtiု’kiုlaññya” visuddhimaggaaṭṭhakathāthaငya chakyalakya၍ phoyapaြthā”၏．
īphoyapaြkhaျkyakā” ānāpānaalupyacakhanya”naှင’ya patyasakya၍ samathamaှ vipassanāsiု’ kū”shā”puṃlaññya” phaြcyapesaññya，
325
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
taphaြññya”phaြññya” sukhuma phaြcyashā”puṃlaññya” phaြcyapesaññya．
1． vipassanāpiုငya”၌kā” assāsapassāsakammika = vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale athaငya”၌ taññyaraှိso
rupyatarā”kaca၍ simya”chaññya”liုso yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya rupyatarā”kiု aū”mū၍ simya”chaññya”liုlatyasoya
mahābhutyadhātyakaြီ”le”pā”tiု’kiု masimya”chaññya”rase”mī ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”mayūrase”mī akhaျိnyakāla၌ phaြcya
poyaneso assāsa-passāsahūso kāyasaṅkhārasaññya runa’yaraငya”kaြmya”tamya”၏， mahābhutya dhātyakaြီ”
le”pā”tiု’kiု simya”chaññya”neso ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”yūso akhaျိnyakāla၌ phaြcyapoyaneso assāsa
passāsa kāyasaṅkhārakā” simyamhe’nū”ññaṃ’pe၏． «catudhātumukhena vipassanābhinivesaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ =
dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”kiု aū”mūsaphaြင’ya vipassanāñāṇya၏ araှုkhaṃ āruṃphaြcyaso rupya-nāmya kaြောငya”-kaျို” = saṅkhāra
tarā”tiု’kiု naှluṃ”shaငya” raှုphā”khaြငya”kiု raññyarhayyatoyamū၍ īmahābhutya dhātyakaြီ”le”pā”tiု’kiု simya”chaññya”ne
so ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”yūneso akhaျိnyaakhākāla၌ phaြcyapoyaneso assāsapassāsa kāyasaṅkhāra
kā” simyamhe’nū”ññaṃ’pe၏ - hu aṭṭhakathācharātoya mina’yachiုtoyamūkhaြငya” phaြcyapesaññya． (mahāṭī-1-324．)»»
2． thiုkāyasaṅkhārasaññyalaññya” runa’yaraငya”se”၏， upādārupyatiု’kiု simya”chaññya”rā akhaျိnyakāla၌ phaြcyaso
kāyasaṅkhārasaññyakā” piု၍ nū”ññaṃ’simyamhe’၏．
3． thiုkāyasaṅkhārasaññyalaññya” runa’yaraငya”se”၏， rupyatarā”ā”luṃ”kiု khaြုံငုံ၍ simya”chaññya”rā akhaျိnyakāla၌
phaြcyapoyaneso kāyasaṅkhārakā” piု၍ nū”ññaṃ’simyamhe’၏． (bhā0nāya uparūpari paṇītabhā0to = bhā0nā
၏ tacyachaင’yathakya tacyachaင’ya achaင’yachaင’ya maြင’yamaြtyasaññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’yataññya”． mahāṭī-1-324．)
4． thiုkāyasaṅkhārasaññyalaññya” runa’yaraငya”se”၏， nāmyatarā”kiု simya”chaññya”rā akhaျိnyakāla၌ phaြcyapoyaneso
kāyasaṅkhārakā” piု၍ nū”ññaṃ’simyamhe’၏．
5． thiုkāyasaṅkhārasaññyalaññya” runa’yaraငya”se”၏， rupyanāmyakiု simya”chaññya”rā akhaျိnyaakhākāla၌ phaြcyapoya
neso kāyasaṅkhārakā” piု၍ nū”ññaṃ’simyamhe’၏．
6． thiုkāyasaṅkhārasaññyalaññya” runa’yaraငya”se”၏， rupyanāmyatiု’၏ akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’kiု simya”chaññya”rā akhaျိnya
akhā kāla၌ phaြcyapoyaneso kāyasaṅkhārakā” piု၍ nū”ññaṃ’simyamhe’၏．
7． thiုkāyasaṅkhārasaññyalaññya” runa’yaraငya”se”၏， akaြောငya”tarā”naှင’ya takhaso nāmya-rupyatiု’kiု simyachaññya”
rā ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”yūrā akhaျိnyaakhākāla၌ phaြcyapoya၍neso kāyasaṅkhārakā” piု၍ nū”ññaṃ’simyamhe’၏．
8． thiုkāyasaṅkhārasaññyalaññya” runa’yaraငya”se”၏， akaြောငya”tarā”naှင’ya takhaso yaငya” nāmya-rupyatiု’၏ anicca
akhaြငya”arā dukkhaakhaြငya”arā anattaakhaြငya”arāhūso sāmaññalakkhaṇākiု āruṃpaြု၍ anicca-dukkha-
anatta lakkhaṇāre”suṃ”tanya tacyalaှñña’yacītaငyakā raှုphā”suṃ”sapyaneso vipassanāñāṇyapiုငya”၌ piု၍ nū”ññaṃ’
simyamhe’၏． (atitya-anāgatya-paccuppanya-ajjhatta-bahiddha-oḷārika = akaြmya”， sukhuma = anu， hīna = ayutya，
paṇīta = amaြtya， dūra = ave”， santika = anī”hūso tacyachaya’yatacyamaျို”so akhaြငya”arāā”phaြင’ya
taññyaneso khandhāငါ”pā” (= rupyatarā”-nāmyatarā”) tiု’kiု aုpyacualiုkya poငya”cukhaြုံငုံ၍ lakkhaṇāre”suṃ”tanya
tacyalaှñña’yacī taငyalaျkya raှုphā”suṃ”sapyaneso kalāpasammasanapiုငya”kiု raññyaññhaှnya”thā”pesaññya．)
9． thiုkāyasaṅkhārasaññyalaññya” runa’yaraငya”se”၏， ā”naññya”so dubbala vipassanāhu khoyachiုapyaso
udayabbayañāṇya bhaṅgañāṇya bhayañāṇya ādīna0ñāṇyapiုငya”၌ piု၍ nū”ññaṃ’simyamhe’၏．
326
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
10． thiုkāyasaṅkhārasaññyalaññya” runa’yaraငya”se”၏， ā”koငya”so bala0vipassanāhu khoyachiုapyaso
nibbidānupassanāñāṇyacaso athakyapiုငya” vipassanāñāṇyamaျာ”akhiုkya၌ piု၍ nū”ññaṃ’simyamhe’၏．
thiုvipassanāpiုငya”၌ raှေ”samathapiုငya”၌ chiုapyakhaဲ’paြီ”so naññya”atiုငya”sālaျှငya raှေ”raှေ”phaြcyaso kāya
saṅkhāra၏ nokyanokyaphaြcyaso kāyasaṅkhāra phaြcyapoyalāsoakhā achaင’yachaင’ya ငြိmya”aေ”maှုkiု siraှိpāle．
īchiုkhaဲ’paြီ”saññyaatiုငya” samathapiုငya” vipassanāpiုငya”tiု’၌ kāyasaṅkhāra၏ oḷārika sukhuma = runa’yaraငya”puṃ
simyamhe’nū”ññaṃ’puṅkiုlaññya”koငya”， passaddhi = ငြိmya”puṅkiုlaññya”koငya” siraှိpāle．
(visuddhi-1-266-268． mahāṭī-1-323-324．)
paṭisambhidāmagya pāḷitoya၏ raှငya”laငya”khaျkya
paṭisambhidāmagya pāḷitoya၌laññya” passambhayaphaြcyapuṅkiု ame”aphaြmeျာ” paြုlupyalaျkya aောkyapāatiုငya”
raှငya”laငya” hokaြာ”thā”toyamūpesaññya． (paṭisaṃ-183．)
runa’yaraငya”so kāyasaṅkhārakiု ငြိmya”celaျkya vaငyasakyalekiု raှူshaငya”aṃ’hu abhayyasiု’laျှငya ā”thutya
sanaññya”， runa’yaraငya”so kāyasaṅkhārakiု ငြိmya”celaျkya thhakyasakyalekiု raှူthutyaṃ’hu abhayyasiု’laျှငya ā”
thutyasanaññya”．
kāyasaṅkhāratiု’hūsaññya abhayyasaññyatiု’naññya”．
1． raှññyaso vaငyasakyaletiု’saññya kiုyya၌ phaြcyakunya၏， ««kāyikāti rūpakāye bhavā (paṭisaṃ-ṭṭha-2-
113． mahāṭī-1-324) = karajakāyahu khoyachiုso bhūtarupya-upādārupya hūso rūpakāya = rupyatarā”
apoငya”kiု maှီ၍ vaငyasakyale (thhakyasakyale)tiု’saññya phaြcyapoyalākaြkunya၏hu chiုliုsaññya．»» thiုtarā”tiု’
saññya (= thiုvaငyasakyaletiု’saññya) kiုyyanaှင’ya (= karajakāyakhoya rupyatarā”apoငya”naှင’ya) capyakunyasaññyaphaြcya၍ =
chakyacapyalaျkya phaြcyanekaြkunyasaññyaphaြcya၍ thiုkarajakāyasaññya paြုpaြငyaapyasokaြောင’ya kāyasaṅkhāratiု’
maññyakunya၏． thiုkāyasaṅkhāratiု’kiု ငြိmya”cesaññyaphaြcya၍ khaျုpyacesaññya phaြcya၍ ငြိmya”khaြငya”siု’ rokyacesaññya phaြcya၍
ā”thutya၏． (runa’yaraငya”so kāyasaṅkhārakiု achaင’yachaင’ya nū”ññaṃ’cemaှု khaျုpyacemaှုkiု chiုliုsaññya．)
2． raှññyaso thhakyasakyaletiု’saññya kiုyya၌ (karajakāya khoya rupyatarā”apoငya”၌ maှီ၍) phaြcyakunya၏，
thiုtarā”tiု’saññya (= thiုthhakyasakyaletiု’saññya) kiုyyanaှင’ya (= karajakāya khoya rupyatarā”apoငya”naှင’ya) capyakunya
saññyaphaြcya၍ = chakyacapyalaျkya phaြcyanekaြkunyasaññyaphaြcya၍ thiုkarajakāyasaññya paြုpaြငyaapyasokaြောင’ya kāya
saṅkhāratiု’ maññyakunya၏， thiုkāyasaṅkhāratiု’kiု ငြိmya”cesaññya phaြcya၍ khaျုpyacesaññya phaြcya၍ ငြိmya”khaြငya”siု’ rokyace
saññya phaြcya၍ ā”thutya၏．
3． tiုso vaငyasakyaletiု’saññya ． pa ．
4． tiုso thhakyasakyaletiု’saññya ． pa ．
5． vaငyasakyale၏ aca-alayya-achuṃ” akunyaluṃ”kiု thaငyathaငyaraှာ”raှာ” siaောငya paြုkaျင’ya၍ thā”apya
kunyaso vaငyasakyaletiု’saññya ． pa ．
6． thhakyasakyale၏ aca-alayya-achuṃ” akunyaluṃ”kiု thaငyathaငyaraှာ”raှာ” siaောငya paြုkaျင’ya၍ thā”apya
kunyaso thhakyasakyaletiု’saññya kiုyya၌ (= karajakāya khoya rupyatarā”apoငya”၌ maှီ၍) phaြcyakunya၏． thiု
327
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
tarā”tiု’saññya (= aca-alayya-achuṃ” akunyaluṃ”kiု thaငyathaငyaraှာ”raှာ” siaောငya paြုkaျင’ya၍ thā”apyakunya
so thhakyasakyaletiု’saññya) kiုyyanaှင’ya (= karajakāya khoya rupyatarā” apoငya”naှင’ya) capyakunyasaññya phaြcya၍ =
chakyacapyalaျkya phaြcyanekaြkunyasaññyaphaြcya၍ thiုkarajakāyasaññya paြုpaြငyaapyasokaြောင’ya kāyasaṅkhāratiု’
maññyakunya၏， thiုkāyasaṅkhāratiု’kiု ငြိmya”cesaññyaphaြcya၍ khaျုpyacesaññyaphaြcya၍ ငြိmya”khaြငya”siု’ rokyacesaññyaphaြcya၍
ā”thutya၏．
akaြငyasiု’ sabhoraှိkunyaso runa’yaraငya”kunyaso kāyasaṅkhāratiု’phaြင’ya kiုyyakiု (= rūpakāyakiု) ----
1． ānamanā = akaြငya nokyamaှ raှေ”raှု (= raှေ’siု’) ññhatyakhaြငya”saññya，
2． vinamanā = akaြငya naṃpā” naှcyaphakyasiု’ (= bhe”naှcyaphakyasiု’) ññhatyakhaြငya”saññya ，
3． sannamanā = akaြငya koငya”chā thakyavanya”kaျငyasiု’ ññhatyakhaြငya”saññya tacyanaññya” - lhanyachā ññhatyakhaြငya”saññya，
4． paṇamanā = akaြငya raှေ’maှ nokyasiု’ ññhatyakhaြငya”saññya，
5． iñjanā = akaြငya cañya”ငyya raှေ”raှု laှုpyakhaြငya”saññya，
6． phandanā = akaြငya cañya”ငyya naṃpā”siု’ laှုpyakhaြငya” (= tunyakhaြငya”)saññya，
7． calanā = akaြငya cañya”ငyya thakyavanya”kaျငya laှုpyakhaြငya”saññya，
8． pakampanā = akaြငya cañya”ငyya nokyasiု’ laှုpyakhaြငya”saññya ----
raှိ၏， thiုsiု’ sabhoraှိso runa’yaraငya”so kāyasaṅkhārakiု ငြိmya”celaျkya vaငyasakyalekiု raှူshaငya”aṃ’hu
ā”thutya၏， kaျင’ya၏． thiုsiု’ sabhoraှိso runa’yaraငya”so kāyasaṅkhārakiု ငြိmya”celaျkya thhakyasakyalekiု
raှူthutyaṃ’hu ā”thutya၏， kaျင’ya၏．
akaြငyasiု’ sabhoraှိkunyaso kāyasaṅkhāratiု’phaြင’ya kiုyyakiု ----
1． akaြငya nokyamaှ raှေ”raှု (= raှေ’siု’) maññhatyakhaြငya”saññya，
2． akaြငya naṃpā” naှcyaphakyasiု’ maññhatyakhaြငya”saññya，
3． akaြငya koငya”chā thakyavanya”kaျငyasiု’ maññhatyakhaြငya”saññya，
4． akaြငya raှေ’maှ nokyasiု’ maññhatyakhaြငya”saññya，
5． akaြငya cañya”ငyya raှေ”raှု malaှုpyakhaြငya”saññya，
6． akaြငya cañya”ငyya naṃpā”siု’ malaှုpyakhaြငya”saññya，
7． akaြငya cañya”ငyya thakyavanya”kaျငya malaှုpyakhaြငya”saññya，
8． akaြငya cañya”ငyya nokyasiု’ malaှုpyakhaြငya”saññya ----
raှိ၏， thiုsiု’ sabhoraှိso ငြိmyasakyaso simyamhe’so kāyasaṅkhārakiု ငြိmya”celaျkya vaငyasakyalekiု
raှူshaငya”aṃ’hu ā”thutya၏， kaျင’ya၏． thiုsiု’sabhoraှိso ငြိmyasakyaso simyamhe’so kāyasaṅkhārakiု
ငြိmya”celaျkya thhakyasakyalekiု raှူthutyaṃ’hu ā”thutya၏， kaျင’ya၏．
īchiုapyakhaဲ’paြီ”so apaြာ”ā”phaြင’ya alhanya nū”ññaṃ’simyamhe’so kāyasaṅkhārakiု ငြိmya”celaျkya vaငya
sakyalekiု raှူshaငya”aṃ’hū၍ akayya၍ ā”thutyasaññya phaြcyaṃ’， kaျင’yasaññyaphaြcyaṃ’， alhanyanū”ññaṃ’simyamhe’so
kāyasaṅkhārakiု ငြိmya”celaျkya thhakyasakyalekiု raှူthutyaṃ’hū၍ akayya၍ā”thutyasaññya phaြcyaṃ’ kaျင’ya
saññya phaြcyaṃ’， īsiု’ phaြcyasaññyaraှိsoya ----
328
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
1． vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalekiု āruṃmūsoā”phaြင’ya kapya၍ siso bhā0nācityakiု phaြcyacekhaြငya”
phā”cekhaြငya”saññyalaññya” maphaြcyalerā．
2． bhā0nāchamya”ā”kaြောင’ya simyamhe’nū”ññaṃ’kunyaso vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’၏ khaျုpyaငြိmya”shā”
khaြငya”kaြောင’ya simyamhe’so vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’kiု phā”cekhaြငya” phaြcyacekhaြငya”saññyalaññya” maphaြcya
lerā．
3． vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’၏ maraှိkhaြငya”kaြောင’yapaငyalaျှငya thiုvaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalelaျှငya āruṃ
raှိso bhā0nācityanaှင’ya yaှñyathaဲlaျkyaraှိso ānāpānassatikiုlaññya” phā”cekhaြငya” phaြcyacekhaြငya”saññya
maphaြcyalerā．
4． thiုsiု’ ānāpānalaျှငya āruṃraှိso ānāpānassati၏ maphaြcyakhaြငya”kaြောင’yapaငyalaျှငya thiုānāpānassati
naှင’ya yaှñyathaဲlaျkyaraှိso ānāpānassatisamādhikiု phā”cekhaြငya” phaြcyacekhaြငya”saññyalaññya” maphaြcyalerā．
5． thiုānāpānalaျှငya āruṃraှိso jhānyasamāpatyakiု paññāraှိsūtoyakoငya”tiု’saññya vaငyacā”niုငyasaññyalaññya”
maphaြcyalekunyarā．
6． thiုsiု’ mavaငyacā”niုငyakhaြငya”kaြောင’ya thiုānāpānalaျှငya āruṃraှိso jhānyasamāpatyamaှ thasaññyalaññya” maphaြcya
lekunyarā． ----
īkā” codanā cakā”rapyataññya”．
īsiု’ chiုapyakhaဲ’paြီ”so akhaြငya”arāā”phaြင’ya kāyasaṅkhārakiု ငြိmya”celaျkya vaငyasakyalekiု raှူshaငya”
aṃ’hu akayya၍ ā”thutyasaññyaphaြcyaṃ’， kaျင’yasaññyaphaြcyaṃ’， kāyasaṅkhārakiု ငြိmya”celaျkya thhakyasakyalekiု
raှူthutyaṃ’hu akayya၍ ā”thutyasaññya phaြcyaṃ’， kaျင’yasaññyaphaြcyaṃ’， īsiု’ runa’yaraငya” runa’yaraငya”so kāyasaṅkhāra
kiု ငြိmya”cesaññya khaျုpyacesaññya phaြcyalatyasoya ----
1． vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalekiု āruṃmūsoā”phaြင’ya kapya၍siso bhā0nācityakiု phaြcyacekhaြငya”
phā”cekhaြငya”saññyalaññya” phaြcyaperā၏．
2． bhā0nāchamya”ā”kaြောင’ya simyamhe’nū”ññaṃ’kunyaso vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’saññya khaျုpyaငြိmya”shā”
kunyasoyalaññya” vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’kiု phā”cekhaြငya” phaြcyacekhaြငya”saññyalaññya” phaြcyaperā၏．
3． ānāpānalaျှငya āruṃraှိso bhā0nācityanaှင’ya yaှñyathaဲlaျkyaraှိso ānāpānassatikiု phā”cekhaြငya”
phaြcyacekhaြငya”saññyalaññya” phaြcyaperā၏．
4． ānāpānalaျှငya āruṃraှိso ānāpānassatinaှင’ya yaှñyathaဲlaျkyaraှိso ānāpānassatisamādhikiု
phā”cekhaြငya” phaြcyacekhaြငya”saññyalaññya” phaြcyaperā၏．
5． siု’phaြcyarakā” thiုānāpānalaျှငya āruṃraှိso jhānyasamāpatyakiု paññāraှိsūtoyakoငya”tiု’saññya vaငyacā”
kaြsaññyamūlaññya” phaြcyapekunyarā၏．
6． thiုsiု’ vaငyacā”niုငyasokaြောင’ya thiုānāpānalaျှငya āruṃraှိso jhānyasamāpatyamaှ thaniုငyasaññyamūlaññya”
phaြcyapekunyarā၏．

ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
yakhaငya chiုapyakhaဲ’paြီ”so runa’yaraငya” runa’yaraငya”so kāyasaṅkhārakiု khaျုpyaငြိmya”celaျkya nū”ññaṃ’simyamhe’saññya
thakya alhanyanū”ññaṃ’simyamhe’so kāyasaṅkhārakiု phā”ceso bhā0nāacīaraငyakiု abhayyakaဲ’siု’ maှtyaapya
pāsanaññya”hūmū ----
naှိုငya”khiုငya”phhayyarā lokaupamāā”phaြင’yakā” -- kaြေ”khhakyakiု khokyaapyasaññyaraှိsoya raှေ”ū”chā runa’yaraငya”
kaြmya”tamya”kunyaso asaṃtiု’saññya phaြcyapoyalākunya၏， runa’yaraငya”kaြmya”tamya”kunyaso asaṃtiု’၏ āruṃnimityakiု
(īasaṅkā” īsiု’hu) koငya”chā yūthā”apyakhaြငya”kaြောင’ya koငya”chā naှluṃ”shaငya”mikhaြငya”kaြောင’ya koငya”chā
citya၌ maှtyasā”thā”apyapaြီ”saññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya runa’yaraငya”kaြmya”tamya”kunyaso asaṃtiု’saññya khaျုpyakunyasoya
laññya” thiု’nokya simyamhe’se”ငyyaso achaင’yachaင’yamaြññyaso asaṃtiု’saññya phaြcyapoyalākunya၏．
simyamhe’se”ငyyaso achaင’yachaင’yamaြññyaso asaṃtiု’၏ āruṃnimityakiု koငya”chā yūthā”apyakhaြငya”
kaြောင’ya koငya”chā naှluṃ”shaငya”mikhaြငya”kaြောင’ya koငya”chā citya၌ maှtyasā”thā”apyapaြီ”saññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya
simyamhe’se”ငyyaso achaင’yachaင’yamaြññyaso asaṃsaññya khaျုpyashā”soyalaññya” thiုnokya simyamhe’so asaṃ
āruṃnimityalaျှငya āruṃraှိso cityasaññya phaြcyasakaဲ’siု’ ----
īupamāatūsālaျှငya raှေ”ū”chā runa’yaraငya”kaြmya”tamya”so vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’saññya phaြcya
kunya၏， runa’yaraငya”kaြmya”tamya”so vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’၏ āruṃnimityakiု koငya”chā yūthā”apyakhaြငya”
kaြောင’ya koငya”chā naှluṃ”shaငya”mikhaြငya”kaြောင’ya koငya”chā citya၌ maှtyasā”thā”khaြငya”kaြောင’ya runa’yaraငya”kaြmya”tamya”
so vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’saññya khaျုpyakunyasoyalaññya” thiုnokya simyamhe’so vaငyasakyale thhakya
sakyaletiု’saññya phaြcyapoyalākunya၏．
simyamhe’se”ငyyakunyaso vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’၏ āruṃnimityakiု koငya”chā yūthā”apya
khaြငya”kaြောင’ya koငya”chā naှluṃ”shaငya”mikhaြငya”kaြောင’ya koငya”chā citya၌ maှtyasā”thā”khaြငya”kaြောင’ya simyamhe’kunyaso
vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’saññya khaျုpyakunyasoyalaññya” thiုnokya simyamhe’so vaငyasakyale thhakyasakya
le āruṃnimityalaျှငya āruṃraှိso bhā0nācityasaññya phaြcyapoyane၏， paျံ’lhaင’yakhaြငya”siု’ marokyaraှိpe． īsiု’
phaြcyalatyasoya ----
1． vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalekiု āruṃmūsoā”phaြင’ya kapya၍ siso bhā0nācityakiု phaြcyacekhaြငya”
phā”cekhaြငya”saññyalaññya” phaြcya၏．
2． bhā0nāchamya”ā”kaြောင’ya simyamhe’nū”ññaṃ’kunyaso vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’saññya khaျုpyaငြိmya”shā”
kunyasoyalaññya” vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’kiု phā”cekhaြငya” phaြcyacekhaြငya”saññyalaññya” phaြcya၏．
3． ānāpānalaျှငya āruṃraှိso ānāpānassatikiု phā”cekhaြငya” phaြcyacekhaြငya”saññyalaññya” phaြcya၏．
4． ānāpānalaျှငya āruṃraှိso ānāpānassatinaှင’ya yaှñyathaဲlaျkyaraှိso ānāpānassatisamādhikiု
phā”cekhaြငya” phaြcyacekhaြငya”saññyalaññya” phaြcya၏．
5． siု’phaြcyasokaြောင’ya thiုānāpānalaျှငya āruṃraှိsojhānyasamāpatyakiု paññāraှိsūtoyakoငya”tiု’saññya
vaငyacā”kaြsaññyamūlaññya” phaြcyakunya၏．
6． thiုsiု’ vaငyacā”niုငyakunyasokaြောင’ya thiုānāpānalaျှငya āruṃraှိso jhānyasamāpatyamaှ thaniုငyasaññyamūlaññya”
phaြcyakunya၏．
330
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ = kāyasaṅkhārakiု ငြိmya”celaျkya - hu īsiု’ casaññyaphaြင’ya hokaြာ”toya
mūapyaso pāḷitoyacakā”rapya၌ ----
vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’saññya (= assāsa-passāsakāya， rūpakāya， nāmakāyatiု’saññya)
kāya maññya၏． satisaññya thiု assāsapassāsakāya (rūpakāya， nāmakāya) hūso āruṃsiု’ kapya၍
taññyatatyasokaြောင’ya upaṭṭhāna maññya၏， thiုkāyakiု aphanyatalaဲlaဲ raှုtatyaso paññāsaññya ñāṇya maññya၏．
kāyasaññya sati၏ kapya၍ taññyarāphaြcyasokaြောင’ya upaṭṭhāna maññya၏， sati mamaññya． satisaññya
(suṃ”maျို”so kāyahūso) āruṃsiု’ kapya၍ taññyatatyasokaြောင’ya upaṭṭhānalaññya” maññya၏， āruṅkiု amaှtya
ratatyasokaြောင’ya satilaññya” maññya၏． thiုsatiphaြင’ya thiုñāṇyaphaြင’ya thiုsuṃ”maျို”so kāyakiု aphanyaphanya raှု၏，
thiုkaြောင’ya kāye kāyānupassanā satipaṭṭhānabhā0nāhu chiုapya၏． (paṭisaṃ-183-184．)
thapyamaṃ raှငya”laငya”khaျkyamaျာ”
bhā0nāvisuddhiyā kāyasaṅkhāre passambhamānepi oḷārikaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ passambhemīti yogino
ābhoge sati tenādarena ativiya passambhati． anupaṭṭhahantampi sukhumaṃ suānayaṃ hoti．
(paṭisaṃ-ṭṭha-2-115．)
ānāpānabhā0nālupyaငnya”rapyakiု raှငyatoyabhurā” ññhaှnyakaြာ”paြsa chiုchuṃ”mathā”toyamūsañña’yaatiုငya” ----
1． araှññyakiု siaောငya，
2． atiုkiု siaောငya，
3． aca-alayya-achuṃ” akunyaluṃ”kiု siaောငya，
4． ānāpāna khaျုpyaငြိmya”aောငya ----
īsiု’ achaင’yachaင’yakaျင’yakhaဲ’soya bhā0nā၏ caငyakaြyyamaှုkaြောင’ya vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale hūso
kāyasaṅkhārasaññya khaျုpyaငြိmya”shā”soyalaññya” runa’yaraငya”kaြmya”tamya”so kāyasaṅkhārakiု ငြိmya”ceṃ’hu yogā
0carapuggiုlya၏ ābhoga = naှluṃ”shaငya”maှု raှိkhaဲ’soya thiုriုsele”cā”maှုkaြောင’ya kāyasaṅkhārasaññya alhanyalaျှငya
ငြိmyasakyashā”၏， runa’yaraငya”so kāyasaṅkhārasaññya asiñāṇya0၌ mathaငyamaြငyalāsoyalaññya” simyamhe’nū”ññaṃ’
so kāyasaṅkhārakiု koငya”chā choငyathā”niုငya၏． (paṭisaṃ-ṭṭha-2-115．)
bhā0nāphaြcyapuṃ = koငya”chā choငyathā”niုငyapuṃ
pabhā0nā hotīti yadipi oḷārikā kāyasaṅkhārā paṭippassambha nti， sukhumā pana atthevāti
anukkamena paramasukhumabhāvappattassa 0sena nimittuppattiyā ānāpānassatiyā ānāpānassatisamādhissa
ca pabhā0nā ijjhatevāti adhippāyo． (mahāṭī-1-326．)
assāsapassāse nissāya uppannanimittampettha assāsapassāsasamaññame0 vuttaṃ．
(mahāṭī-1-319．)
= vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’saññya khaျုpyaငြိmya”shā”khaဲ’soya ānāpānabhā0nākiု phā”maျာ”ā”thutyakhaြငya”
lupyaငnya”rapyasaññya maññyasiု’ maññyapuṃ phaြcyaniုငyapāto’aṃ’naññya”hūmū ---- runa’yaraငya”kaြmya”tamya”kunyaso vaငyasakyale
thhakyasakyalehūso kāyasaṅkhāratiု’saññya akayya၍kā” ငြိmya”shā”kaြkunya၏． siု’soyalaññya” simyamhe’

ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
nū”ññaṃ’kaြkunyaso kāyasaṅkhāratiု’kā” raှိkaြkunyasaññyasālaျှငya phaြcyapesaññya． thiုkaြောင’ya acañyasaphaြင’ya nū”ññaṃ’
simyamhe’saññyathakya alhanyanū”ññaṃ’simyamhe’saññya၏ aphaြcyasiု’ rokyaraှိshā”so vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale
hūso kāyasaṅkhāra၏ achamya”phaြင’ya (vāghamya”ciုငyakaဲ’siု’ phaြူphhe”neso uggahanimitya) sokyaraှူ”kaြyyakaဲ’siု’
alhanyakaြññyalaငyatokyapaneso paṭibhāganimitya phaြcyapoyalākhaြငya”kaြောင’ya bhā0nācityasaññya pakatiso
vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale āruṃmaှ nacya၍ (uggahanimitya) paṭibhāganimityahūso ānāpānanimityakiု āruṃ
mūsaphaြင’ya āruṃpaြုnesaphaြင’ya ānāpānalaျှငya āruṃraှိso ānāpānassati၏laññya”koငya”， ānāpānalaျှငya
āruṃraှိso ānāpānassatinaှင’ya yaှñyathaဲlaျkyaraှိso ānāpānassatisamādhi၏laññya”koငya” phā”cekhaြငya”
bhā0nālupyaငnya”rapyasaññya paြñña’yacuṃsaññyasālaျှငya phaြcyapesaññya． (mahāṭī-1-326．)
īṭīkācharātoya၏ mina’yakaြာ”toyamūso cakā”maျာ”ara ---- ānāpānaāruṃsaññya alhana’yaalhanya
simyamhe’nū”ññaṃ’၍ nokyachuṃ” khaျုpyaငြိmya”shā”soyalaññya” ānāpānabhā0nālupyaငnya”rapyamaှာ chakyalakya၍ taññyaraှိ
laျkyasā raှိsaññyahu maှtyapā． akaြောငya”mū vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’saññya alhana’yaalhanya simyamhe’
nū”ññaṃ’lākhaျိnya၌ (uggahanimitya) paṭibhāganimityasaññya phaြcyapoyalā၏， thiုakhā bhā0nācityasaññya pakatiso
assāsa passāsakiု āruṃmamūto’paဲ (uggahanimitya) paṭibhāganimityakiု āruṃmūshā”၏． thiုpaṭibhāganimityakiု
āruṃmū၍ bhā0nāsamādhikiု chakyalakya thūthoငyakhaဲ’soya pathamajhānyasamādhi dutiyajhānyasamādhi tatiyajhānya
samādhi catutthajhānyasamādhimaျာ” acañyaatiုငya” phaြcyapoyalākā catutthajhānyasamādhi akhiုkyasiု’ rokyaraှိlā
latyasoya pakatiso vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’saññya luṃ”0 khaျုpyaငြိmya”shā”kaြpekunyasaññya． siု’soya
ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityakā” paျောkyapaျkya၍ mashā”bhaဲ thaငyaraှာ”raှိmaြဲ raှိnesaññyasā phaြcyasaññya． thiု ānāpāna
paṭibhāganimityakiု bhā0nācityasaññya chakyalakya āruṃmūnerasaphaြင’ya ānāpānassatinaှင’ya ānāpānassati
samādhibhā0nātiု’kiု phā”maျာ”ā”thutyamaှု bhā0nālupyaငnya”rapyasaññya paြñña’yacuṃnesaññyasā phaြcyapesaññyahu maှtyapā．
siု’athakya ānāpānabhā0nālupyaငnya”rapyakiု phā”maျာ”ā”thutyarāvayya pakatiso assāsapassāsasaññya
yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ asiñāṇya0၌ mathaငyalā mamaြငyalāsoyalaññya” pakatiso assāsapassāsakiု
amaှီpaြု၍ phaြcyapoyalāso paṭibhāganimityasaññyalaññya” assāsapassāsa amaññyarasaññyasā phaြcyasokaြောင’ya
thiုpaṭibhāganimityahūso assāsapassāsakā” alhanyanū”ññaṃ’simyamhe’rakā” sukhumaṃ suānayaṃ hoti =
alhanya nū”ññaṃ’simyamhe’so assāsapassāsakā” ānāpānabhā0nālupyaငnya”rapyakiု tana’yarapyamashā”aောငya
chakyalakya၍ koငya”chā choငyathā”niုငyasaññyahu paṭisambhidāmagyaaṭṭhakathāka mina’yachiုkhaြငya” phaြcyapesaññya．
(paṭisaṃ-ṭṭha-2-115．)
riုsele”cā”chā liုkyanāramaññya
asaငyayogīsūtoyakoငya”saññya ānāpānacatutthajhānyasamādhikiု vipassanā၏ akhaြpodaka paြု၍
vipassanāsiု’ kū”liုkhaဲ’soya raှေ”ū”chā ānāpānacatutthajhānyasamādhikiု thūthoငyaramaññya phaြcyasaññya， thiုsiု’ samādhi
thūthoငyarā၌ athakyapā pāḷitoya aṭṭhakathā ṭīkā achiုamina’yamaျာ”kā” ū”thipyarhakya panyachaငyalaျkya riုse
le”cā”chā liုkyanāramañña’ya caññya”kamya”upadesamaျာ”paငya phaြcyakaြpesaññya． īcaññya”kamya” upadesamaျာ”ara yo
gā0carapuggiုlyasaññya ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု phā”maျာ”ā”thutyarā၌ vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalekiု athū”
garupaြု၍ nū”ññaṃ’simyamhe’aောငyakā” kaျင’yaramaññya phaြcya၏， runa’yaraငya”kaြmya”tamya”aောငyakā” athū”paြုpaြငya၍ makaျင’ya
koငya”hu khiုငyamaြဲchā maှtyasā”pāle．
332
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
bhā0nālupyaငnya”khhaငya achaင’yachaင’ya
īānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု bhurā”raှငya hokaြာ”paြsa chiုchuṃ”matoyamūsañña’yaatiုငya” ----
1． vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyale၏ araှññyakiု siaောငya，
2． vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyale၏ atiုkiု siaောငya，
3． vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyale၏ aca-alayya-achuṃ” akunyaluṃ”kiု thaငyathaငyaraှာ”raှာ” siaောငya = araှññya၌
phaြcyace atiု၌yaphaြcyace aca-alayya-achuṃ” akunyaluṃ”၌ satimaြဲaောငya，
4． vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyalekiု achaင’yachaင’ya simyamhe’saññyathakya piု၍ simyamhe’aောငya ----
naှluṃ”shaငya” raှုphā”neso yogā0cara rahanya”akhaျို’၏ santānyavayya makaြာmaြင’yamī akhaျိnyakālaathaငya”
maှာpaငya ānāpāna (uggahanimitya) paṭibhāganimityasaññyalaññya” phaြcyapoyalātatya၏． vitakya vicāra pīti sukha
ekaggatā hūso jhānyaaṅgātiု’phaြင’ya tanyachāchaငyathā”apyaso appanājhānyahu khoyachiုapyaso samādhi
saññyalaññya” paြီ”cī”paြñña’yacuṃlātatya၏．
akhaျို’so yogā0carapuggiုlyaā” rethakyakhaြငya” gaṇanānaññya”၏ achamya”phaြင’yasālaျှငya vaငyasakyalethhakyasakyalekiု
naှluṃ”shaငya”rā akhaျိnyakālamaှ ca၍ acañyasaphaြင’ya kaျင’yalārā runa’yaraငya”so vaငyasakyale
thhakyasakyaletiု’၏ khaျုpyaငြိmya”khaြငya”၏ achamya”phaြင’ya kiုyya၏ pūpanyamaှုsaññya ငြိmya”aေ”latyasoya kiုyyasaññyalaññya”
koငya”， cityasaññyalaññya”koငya” po’po’pā”pā” phaြcyalā၏， khandhākiုyyasaññya koငya”kaငya၌ khunyalhaှာ”paျံtakya
aṃ’so akhaြငya”arāsiု’ rokyaraှိnesakaဲ’siု’ phaြcyalātatya၏．
lokaupamāā”phaြင’yakā” ---- akhaျို’paငyapanya”so kiုyya raှိsasūsaññya khutaငyaññoငyacoငya”thakya၌
laññya”koငya”， aငya”paျñya kulā”thiုငya၌laññya”koငya” thiုငyanecañya khutaငyaññoငyacoငya” aငya”paျñya kulā”thiုငyasaññya
kaြို”paြာ”akhaငya” paျñyapaြာ”akhaငya” casaññyatiု’၏ aောkyasiု’ chhaဲsaphaြင’ya ññhatyanetatya၏， kaြိmyamaျkyakhakya kaြိmyayakya
kaြာphaင’ya casaññyatiု’၏ thicapyaneso arāṭhānacasaññyatiု’၌ kaျိtyakaျိtyaasaṃ maြññyatatya၏． aိpyarākhaငya”saññya
kiုyya taငyapā” tatoငyachacya casaññyatiု’၏ the’thichakyacapyamirā arapyatiု’၌ thana’yalipyanetatya၏．
akhaျို’so mapaငyapanya”so kiုyya raှိsasūsaññya khutaငyaññoငyacoငya”thakya၌laññya”koငya”， aငya”paျñya
kulā”thiုငya၌laññya”koငya” thiုငyanecañya khutaငyaññoငyacoငya”， kulā”thiုငyaaငya”paျñyasaññya maññhatya， kaျိtyakaျိtya
asaṃmamaြññya， aိpyarākhaငya”saññya kiုyyataငyapā” tatoငyachacya casaññyatiု’၏ the’thi chakyacapyamirā arapyatiု’၌
thana’yalipyamaှု maraှိsakaဲ’siု’ khutaငyaññoငyacoငya” aငya”paျñya kulā”thiုငyasaññya laဲvāghamya”phaြင’ya paြñña’yanesakaဲ’siု’ phaြcya
tatya၏． akaြောငya”mū mapaငyapanya”so kiုyyasaññya po’po’pā”pā” phaြcyanetatya၏， thiုkaြောင’ya laဲvāghamya”phaြင’ya
paြñña’yanesakaဲ’siု’ phaြcyanepe၏．
īupamāatūpaငyalaျှငya rethakyakhaြငya” gaṇanānaññya”၏ achamya”phaြင’ya vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalekiု naှluṃ”
shaငya”rā akhaျိnyakālamaှca၍ acañyasaphaြင’ya ānāpānalupyaငnya”khhaငyakiု kaျင’yakaြံ kaြို”kutya phā”maျာ” ā”thutya၍
lārā runa’yaraငya”so vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’၏ khaျုpyaငြိmya”khaြငya”၏ achamya”phaြင’ya kiုyya၏ pūpanyamaှုsaññya
ငြိmya”aေ”latyasoya kiုyyasaññyalaññya”koငya”， cityasaññyalaññya”koငya” po’po’pā”pā” phaြcyalā၏， khandhākiုyya
saññya koငya”kaငya၌ khunyalhaှာ”paျံtakyaṃ’so akhaြငya”arāsiု’ rokyaraှိnesakaဲ’siု’ phaြcyalātatya၏．
(visuddhi-1-274．)
