ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
satipaြုramañña’ya akhaျkyatacyarapya
īachaင’yasiု’ rokyaraှိlāso akhaျို’so yogā0carapuggiုlyatiု’saññya tarā”thiုငyaneso mimi
khandhākiုyyaka koငya”kaငyasiု’ paျံtakyasaliု phaြcyanesaphaြင’ya cityamaျာ” athū”laှုpyaraှာ” lātatyakaြkunya၏． thiု
cityalaှုpyaraှာ”maှုkā” vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalehūso mimiraှုphā”nesañña’ya bhā0nāāruṃmaှ cityapaျံ’lhaင’yashā”maှု
uddhaccatacyamaျို” phaြcyasaphaြင’ya samādhi၏ bhe”antarāyyatacyakhupaငya phaြcya၏． raraှိpaြီ” samādhimaှ laျှောkaျshā”tatya၏．
akhaျို’puggiုlyatiု’၌ pukhakyacī”nerasakaဲ’siု’ danya”cī”nerasakaဲ’siု’ raငyathaဲthaငya pītilaှိုငya”maျာ” thakā tasima’yasima’ya phaြcya
netatyakaြpaြnya၏． thiုakhāmaျို”thaငya pītisambojjhaငyatarā”ka ā”koငya”nesaphaြင’ya passaddhi-samādhi-upekkhā
sambojjhaငyamaျာ”kiု phā”maျာ”pe”ra၏． mimi mūlaraှုphā”neso vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale āruṃ၌sālaျှငya
bhā0nācityakiု ငြိmyavapyachā kapya၍taññyaneောငya kaြို”cā”pā． īkaဲ’siု’so akhaျိnyaakhāmaျို”၌ passaddhi-samādhi-
upekkhā sambojjhaငyamaျာ” athū” ā”koငya”phiု’ liုapyapesaññya．
1． citya aေ”aေ”khaျmya”khaျmya”phaြင’ya vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyale āruṅkiုsā raှုnepāka passaddhisambojjhaငya
ā”koငya”lāmaññya phaြcya၏．
2． vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale āruṃ၌sālaျှငya bhā0nācityasaññya kaျောkyaphaျာkaြီ”tacyakhukiု rethaဲ၌
khaျthā”liုkyabhisiု’ ငြိmyavapyachā kapya၍ taññyanepāka samādhisambojjhaငya ā”koငya”lāmaññya phaြcya၏．
3． thiုakhāthaငya pītimaှာlaññya” dīgarīcaṅkhaျိnya laျော’tanyasalokya laျော’lā၍ vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale
āruṃ၌ athū”kaြောင’yakaြ maciုkyarato’bhaဲ cityakiု alayyaalatya laျcyalaျူsabho၌ thā”niုငyaso
tataြmajjhattupekkhāhūso upekkhāsambojjhaငyatarā”saññyalaññya” ā”koငya”lāmaññya phaြcya၏．
īapiုငya”၌ khandhākiုyyakaြီ” apoyasiု’ maြောkyatakyanesaphaြင’ya danya”cī”nerasakaဲ’siု’ dayimya”dayiုငya phaြcyane
saphaြင’ya yogīpuggiုlyabhakyaka kaြောkyacitya mavaငyaphiု’ piု၍are”kaြီ”laှpesaññya． kaြောkyacityakā” chutyanacya
so dosatacyamaျို” phaြcyasaphaြင’ya samādhi၏ bhe”ranyatacyakhupaငya phaြcyapesaññya． mimi raှုnekaျ vaငyasakyale thhakya
sakyale āruṅkiုsā malhaှtyatamya” satikapyathā”phiု’ alhanyaare”kaြီ”laှpesaññya．
kaြေ”khhakyatī”naှkyasañña’ya upamā
yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyale āruṃ၌ bhā0nācityasaññya ငြိmyavapyachā kapya၍
taññyalāsoakhā ----
1． vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale၏ raှññyalaျှငya raှññyamaှုkiု siaောငya，
2． vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale၏ tiုlaျှငya tiုmaှုkiု siaောငya，
3． vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale၏ aca-alayya-achuṃ” akunyaluṃ”kiု thaငyathaငyaraှာ”raှာ” siaောငya acañya
atiုငya” chakyalakya၍ kaြို”cā” ā”thutyaramaññya phaြcyasaññya．
satipaြုranya ---- vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’၏ araှññya， atiု， aca-alayya-achuṃ” = akunyaluṃ”tiု’kiု
siaောငya raှုrā၌ ----
1． araှññyakiု araှññyahu mamaှtyapānaှင’ya，
2． atiုkiုlaññya” atiုhu mamaှtyapānaှင’ya，
334
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
3． aca-alayya-achuṃ” akunyaluṃ”kiုlaññya” = īkā” aca， īkā” alayya， īkā” achuṃ”hu liုkya
mamaှtyapānaှင’ya．
thiုsiု’ liုkyamaှtyanekhaဲ’soya bhā0nāsamādhimaှာ naှောင’yanaှေ”netatyasaññya． siု’mahutya samādhi paျkyashā”
tatyapāsaññya． raှññyalaျှငya raှññyasañña’yaatiုငya”， tiုlaျှငya tiုsañña’yaatiုငya”， aca-alayya-achuṃ” akunyaluṃ”kiု thaငyathaငya
raှာ”raှာ” sinephiု’sā liုraငya” phaြcyasaññya． siု’soya mamaှtyabhaဲ maneniုငyapāka suṃ”chaင’yaluṃ”maှာpaငya vaငyale-thhakyale
husā maှtyapā．
thiုsiု’ kaြို”cā”ā”thutyarā၌ asaငyayogā0cara sūtoyacaငyasaññya vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyaletiု’၏
(1) raှññyamaှု (2) tiုmaှု (3) aca-alayya-achuṃ” akunyaluṃ”kiု thaငyathaငyaraှာ”raှာ” sineောငya achakyamapaြtya
taracapya sineောငyasā raှုnepā． yaငya” vaငyale thhakyalekiု sakyasakyaraှññyaaောငya paြုpaြငyamaှု， sakyasakya
tiုaောငya paြုpaြငyamaှု malupyapānaှင’ya， asakyaraှူmaြဲ sabhā0atiုငya”sā asakyaraှူnepā． sakyasakyasāsāphaြင’yasā
asakyaraှူnepā． paငyakiုyyasabhā0 raှူmaြဲtiုငya” phaြcyapoyaneso vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale၏ raှññyalaျှငya
raှññyamaှု， tiုlaျှငya tiုmaှုkiုsā siaောငya raှုnepā． raှññyalaျှငya raှññyaso vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale၏ acaalaya
f-achuṃ” akunyaluṃ”kiု thirāṭhānamaှsā coင’ya၍ satiphaြင’ya acañyaliုkyalaျkya thaငyathaငyaraှာ”raှာ” siaောငya
kaျင’yapā． tiုlaျှငya tiုso vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale၏ aca-alayya-achuṃ” akunyaluṃ”kiု thirāṭhānamaှsā
coင’ya၍ satiphaြင’ya acañyaliုkyalaျkya thaငyathaငyaraှာ”raှာ” siaောငya kaျင’yapā． thiုsiု’ kaျင’yarā၌ vaငyasakyale thhakya
sakyalemaျာ”kiု achaင’yachaင’ya simyamhe’aောငyasā kaျင’yapā． achaင’yachaင’ya simyamhe’ceramaññyahūso ābhoga
= naှluṃ”shaငya”dhātyakhaṃphaြင’yasā kaျင’yapā． thiုsiု’ kaျင’yapāmaှsālaျှငya runa’yaraငya”kaြmya”tamya”so vaငyasakyale thhakyasakya
lemaျာ” achaင’yachaင’ya khaျုpyaငြိmya”၍ shā”maññya phaြcyasaññya． kiုyyacityatiု’ po’pā”lāmaññya phaြcyasaññya． ««araှññya atiု၌ya
satikhiုငyamaြဲlāsoakhā araှññya atiု၏ aca-alayya-achuṃ” akunyaluṃ”kiု siaောငya chakya၍ ā”thutya
nepā．»»
thiုyogā0carapuggiုlya၏ santānyavayya runa’yaraငya”so vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalesaññya khaျုpyaငြိmya”shā”khaဲ’
soya simyamhe’so assāsa-passāsanimityalaျှငya āruṃraှိso bhā0nācityasaññya phaြcyapoyalā၏． thiု
simyamhe’so assāsa-passāsanimityalaျှငya āruṃraှိso bhā0nācityasaññyalaññya” khaျုpyapaျkya၍ shā”khaဲ’soya
achaင’yachaင’ya thiုthakyasā၍ simyamhe’so sā၍ simyamhe’so assāsa-passāsanimityalaျှငya āruṃraှိso
bhā0nācityasaññya phaြcyapoyalāsaññyasālaျှငya phaြcyapesaññya． abhayyasiု’ phaြcyapoyalāsanaññya”hūmū ---
yokyaျာ”saññya saṅkhaျောငya”kaြီ”phaြင’ya kaြေ”khhakyakiု tī”naှkyalerā၏， tacyakhaျkya tī”liုkyaruṃmaျှphaြင’ya kaြီ”chā
so asaṃsaññya phaြcyapoyalālerā၏， thiုyokyaျာ”၏ santānyavayya runa’yaraငya”so asaṃlaျှငya āruṃraှိso
cityasaññya phaြcyapoyalālerā၏， runa’yaraငya”so asaṃsaññya khaျုpyapaျkyashā”khaဲ’saññyaraှိsoya thiုnoငyamaှ simyamhe’
so asaṃnimityalaျှငya āruṃraှိso cityasaññya phaြcyapoyalālerā၏， thiုsimyamhe’so asaṃsaññyalaññya”
khaျုpyapaျkya၍ shā”khaဲ’saññyaraှိsoya achaင’yachaင’ya thiုthakyasā၍ simyamhe’ sā၍ simyamhe’so asaṃnimityalaျှငya
āruṃraှိso cityasaññya phaြcyapoyalāsaññyasālaျှငya phaြcyasakaဲ’siု’ īupamāatūpaငya sā၍ simyamhe’ sā၍
simyamhe’so assāsa-passāsa nimityalaျှငya āruṃraှိso bhā0nācityasaññya phaြcyapoyanesaññyasālaျှငya
taññya”． īsiု’ siraှိpāle． (visuddhi-1-275．)
335
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
akhaြာ”kammaṭṭhānya”maျာ”naှင’ya matūso thū”khaြာ”khaျkya
akhaြာ” akhaြာ”kunyaso kammaṭṭhānya”tiု’naှင’ya matūso thū”khaြာ”khaျkyakā” īsiု’taññya”．
ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”maှ tacyapā”kunyaso akhaြာ”akhaြာ”so kammaṭṭhānya”tiု’saññyakā” bhā0nā၏ chamya”
ā”kaြောင’ya achaင’yachaင’ya bhā0nāraင’yakaျkyalāsaññyanaှင’ya amaျှ tacyacatacyaca thaငyaraှာ”saññyathakya thaငyaraှာ”၍sā
lākaြkunya၏． siု’soya īānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kā” thiုkaဲ’siု’ mahutyape． amaှnyacaငyacacyamaှာmū īānāpāna
kammaṭṭhānya”saññya achaင’yachaင’ya tacyachaင’yapaြီ” tacyachaင’ya bhurā”raှငya၏ ññhaှnyakaြာ”toyamūkhaျkyaatiုငya” phā”maျာ”ā”thutya
neso yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ santānyavayya simyamhe’saññya၏ aphaြcyasiု’sā rokyaraှိshā”tatya၏， yogā
0carapuggiုlya၏ ñāṇya0၌ vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalesaññya thaငyakhaြငya”siု’soyalaññya” marokyabhaဲ raှိnetatya၏，
thiုsiု’paငya thaငyakhaြငya”siု’ marokyabhaဲ raှိnesoyalaññya” īsiု’ ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”saññya asiñāṇya၌ thaငyakhaြငya”siု’
marokyalatyasoya thiုrahanya”saññya tarā”thiုငyasañña’ya nerāmaှtha၍ sā”renhayyapiုငya”kiု khā၍ mashā”apya，
“abhayyakiု ငါsaññya paြုlupyasaင’yasanaññya”， charāsmā”kiုsoyalaññya” shā”၍ me”maြnya” laျှောkyathā”ramaññyalo”
hu naှluṃ”piုkya၍laññya”koငya”， “yakhuakhā၌ ငါ၏kammaṭṭhānya”saññya paျောkyapaျkya၍ shā”lepaြီlo”hu naှluṃ”
piုkya၍laññya”koငya” tarā”thiုငyanesañña’ya nerāmaှ mathaapya． apaြcyakā” īsiု’taññya”．
iriyāpathaṃ vikopethā gacchato hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ na0na0me0 hoti， tasmā yathānisinnene0
desato āharitabbaṃ． (visuddhi-1-275．)
= iriyāputhyakiု phaျkya၍ tarā”thiုငyarāmaှ tha၍ shā”so rahanya”toya၏ santānyavayya ānāpāna
kammaṭṭhānya”saññya asacyaasacyasā phaြcyanetatya၏． thiုkaြောင’ya thiုငyanemaြဲtiုငya” thiုငyanelaျkyasālaျှငya raှေ”ka
mimimaှtyayūphū”so pakatiso vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale၏ thirā arapyadesaṭhānamaှ choငyayūapya၏．
(visuddhi-1-275．)
īathakyapā cakā”rapya၌ iriyāputhyakiု phaျkya၍ tarā”thiုငyarāmaှ tha၍ shā”so rahanya”toya၏
santānyavayya ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”saññya asacyaasacyasā phaြcyanetatya၏hūso aṭṭhakathācharātoya၏
cakā”rapyakiု kiု”kā”၍ akhaျို’akhaျို’so charāmaြtyatiု’kā” tarā”thiုငyarā၌ iriyāputhyakiု mapaြငyakoငya”hu
ayū raှိtoyamūkaြpaြnya၏． īcakā”rapyamaှာ - ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု ā”thutyaneso puggiုlyaathakya pakati
so vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyaletiု’ bhā0nāchamya”ā”kaြောင’ya achaင’yachaင’ya simyamhe’rāmaှ mathaငyamaraှာ” phaြcyashā”
soakhā iriyāputhyaphaျkya၍ thamashā”ranya raññyaññhaှnya”paြောchiုneso cakā”maျှsā phaြcyasaññya． tarā”thiုငyalaျှငya
iriyāputhya maphaျkyakoငya”hu kammaṭṭhānya”ā”luṃ”athakya simya”kaျုံ”၍ paြောneso cakā” mahutyasaññyakiု
athū”satipaြု၍ maှtyasā”ramaññya phaြcyasaññya． iriyāputhya paြငyasaင’ya mapaြငyasaင’ya paြငyakoငya” mapaြငyakoငya”hūso
ayūachanaှင’ya patyasakya၍ thevemaှု maraှိceranya aောkyapāaṭṭhakathātiု’၏ satipe”khaျkyakiု chakyalakya၍
phatyaraှုkaြñña’yapā．
iriyāputhya paြငyasaင’ya-mapaြငyasaင’ya
samiñjite pasāriteti pabbānaṃ samiñjanapasāraṇe． tattha citta0sene0 samiñjanapasāraṇaṃ akathā
hatthapādānaṃ samiñjanapasāraṇapaccayā atthānatthaṃ pariggahethā atthapariggahaṇaṃ sātthakasampajaññaṃ． tattha
hatthapāde aticiraṃ samiñjethā pasārethā e0 vā ṭhitassa khaṇe khaṇe vedanā uppajjanti， cittaṃ ekaggaṃ na
labhati， kammaṭṭhānaṃ paripatati， visesaṃ nādhigacchati． kāle samiñjentassa kāle pasāre ntassa pana tā
336
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
vedanā na uppajjanti， cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti， kammaṭṭhānaṃ phāti H gacchati， visesamadhigacchatīti evaṃ atthānatthapariggahaṇaṃ
veditabbaṃ． (ma-ṭṭha-1-268． dī-ṭṭha-1-176． saṃ-ṭṭha-3-228． abhi-ṭṭha-2-342．)
= khe”rā chana’yarā၌hūsaññya lakyachacya khaြchecyatiု’kiု khe”rā chana’yarāakhā၌hu chiုliုpesaññya． thiုsiု’
khe”rā chana’yarā၌ citya၏ aliုatiုငya”sālaျှငya khe”khaြငya” chana’yakhaြငya”kiု mapaြုmū၍ lakya-khaြteiု’kiု khe”khaြငya”
chana’yakhaြငya”taññya”hūso akaြောငya”tarā”kaြောင’ya akaျို”raှိmaှု akaျို”maraှိmaှုkiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”yū၍ akaျို”
maraှိso khe”khaြငya” chana’yakhaြငya”kiု raှောငyaraှာ”၍ akaျို”raှိso khe”maှု chana’yamaှုkiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”yūniုငyakhaြငya”saññya
sātthakasampajañya maññya၏．
thiုsiု’ khe”rā chana’yarā၌ lakyakhaြteiု’kiု alhanyakaြာmaြင’yachā khe”laျkyasālaျှငya taññyaneso yogā
0cara rahanya”toya၏ santānya၌laññya”koငya”， lakyakhaြteiု’kiု alhanyakaြာmaြင’yachā chana’yatanya”laျkyasālaျှငya
taññyaneso yogā0cararahanya”toya၏ santānya၌laññya”koငya” khaṇatiုငya” khaṇatiုငya”၌ chaငya”raဲsañña’ya dukkha
vedanātiု’saññya phaြcyapoyalātatyakaြkunya၏， cityasaññyataññyakaြññyamaှု samādhikiု mararaှိniုငya， kammaṭṭhānya”saññya laျှော
kaျshā”tatya၏， achaင’yachaင’yaso lokī lokuttarā tarā”thū” tarā”maြtyakiု mararaှိniုငya． khe”saင’yaso
akhaျိnyaakhākāla၌ khe”so chana’yasaင’yaso akhaျိnyaakhā kāla၌ chana’yaso yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ santānya
၌kā” thiုchaငya”raဲsañña’ya dukkhavedanātiု’saññya phaြcyapoya၍ malākaြkunya， cityasaññya taññyakaြññyalā၏， kammaṭṭhānya”
saññya kaြီ”phā”tiု”takyakhaြငya”siု’ rokyaraှိlā၏， achaင’yachaင’yaso lokī lokuttarā tarā”thū” tarā”maြtya
kiု raraှိniုငya၏ - hu īsiု’laျှငya akaျို”raှိmaှု maraှိ maှုkiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”yūniုငyakhaြငya”kiု siraှိpāle．
(ma-ṭṭha-1-268． dī-ṭṭha-1-176． saṃ-ṭṭha-3-228． abhi-ṭṭha-2-342．)
īathakyapā aṭṭhakathātiု’၏ mina’yachiုtoyamūkhaျkyaara - khe”saင’yaso akhaျိnyaakhākāla၌ khe”khaြငya”，
chana’yasaင’yaso akhaျိnyaakhākāla၌ chana’yakhaြငya”saññya kammaṭṭhānya”tarā” kaြီ”phā”tiု”takyakhaြငya”၏ akaြောငya”raငya”cacya
tacyakhuphaြcya၏， achaင’yachaင’yaso lokī lokuttarā tarā”thū” tarā”maြtyakiု raraှိkhaြငya”၏ akaြောငya”raငya”cacya
tacyakhu phaြcya၏hūso thuṃ”hoငya” upadesatacyakhukiုkā” nibbānyakiု liုlā”toင’yatalaျkyaraှိso asaငya
yogīsūtoyakoငya”saññya me’mathā”saင’yape．
asacyaasacya phaြcyarapuṃ
ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု ā”thutyacañya bhā0nāsamādhi chamya”ā”raှိnyacoya ānubhoyakaြောင’ya vaငyasakyale
thhakyasakyaletiု’saññya achaင’yachaင’yasimyamhe’rāmaှ yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ ñāṇya0၌ mathaငyalā mamaြငyalāsaphaြင’ya
nerāmaှ tha၍ shā”khaဲ’soya kammaṭṭhānya”asacyaasacya phaြcyarakhaြငya”maှာ īsiု’ phaြcya၏ --- nokyathapyatacyaphanya paြnya၍
ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု ā”thutyapaြnyalaျှငyalaññya” thiုsiု’paငya vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’saññya mathaငyamaraှာ”
tacyaphanyapaြnya၍ phaြcyalākaြū”maññyasā phaြcyasaññya． mathaငyaraှာ”tiုငya” tha၍ tha၍sā shā”nepāka tacyaphanyapaြnya၍
tarā”thiုငyatiုငya” thiုငyatiုငya” mathaငyamaraှာ”sā paြnya၍ phaြcyaneū”maññya phaြcyasaññya． siု’athakya kammaṭṭhānya” asacya
asacyasā phaြcyanemaññyahu mina’yachiုkhaြငya” phaြcyapesaññya．
akaြောငya” upāyya
yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ ñāṇya0၌ vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalesaññya mathaငyamaraှာ” phaြcyalatyasoya raှေ”ka
mimi maှtyayūphū”so pakatiso vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale၏ thirā arapyadesaṭhānamaှ vaငyasakyale

ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
thhakyasakyalekiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyaaောငya choငyayūramaññya phaြcyasaññya． choငyayūpuṃ akaြောငya”upāyyakā” īsiု’
taññya”．
thiုyogā0cara rahanya”toyasaññya vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyalehūso kammaṭṭhānya”၏ ñāṇya0၌ mathaငya
raှာ”saññya၏ aphaြcyakiု sisaññyaraှိsoya īsiု’ aphanyatalaဲlaဲ cū”camya”chaငyakhaြငyaapya၏ --- īvaငyasakyale thhakya
sakyaletiု’ maññyakunyasaññya abhayyaarapya၌ raှိkunyasanaññya”， abhayyaarapya၌ maraှိkunyasanaññya”， abhayyapuggiုlya၏
santānya၌mūlaññya” raှိkunyasanaññya”， abhayyapuggiုlya၏ santānya၌mūlaññya” maraှိkunyasanaññya” - īsiု’ aphanyatalaဲlaဲ
cū”camya” chaငyakhaြငyaapya၏．
assāsapassāsa maraှိso puggiုlyamaျာ”
1． amivamya”thaငya”၌ taññyaneso sattavā，
2． rethaဲ၌ nacyamaြုpyaneso sattavā，
««īpuggiုlyanaှcyaū”tiု’kā” assāsa-passāsa phaြcyarāṭhāna mahutyasokaြောင’ya assāsa-passāsa
maraှိkhaြငya” phaြcyasaññya．»»
3． thevemina’yamoneso (me’maြောneso) sattavā， tacyanaññya” asaññasatyabhuṃ၌ phaြcyakunyaso sattavā，
4． senekunyasosattavā (aloငya”koငyakiု chiုliုsaññya)，
5． nirodhasamāpatya vaငyacā”neso anāgāmya rahantā，
««ī 3-4-5 amaှtyapaြ puggiုlyatiု’၏ santānya၌kā” assāsa-passāsakiု phaြcyacetatyaso citya၏
maraှိkhaြငya”kaြောင’ya assāsa-passāsa maraှိkhaြငya” phaြcyasaññya．»»
6． catutthajhānyasamāpatyakiု vaငyacā”nesopuggiုlya，
««īpuggiုlya၏ santānya၌ dhammatāā”phaြင’ya assāsa-passāsatiု’၏ maphaြcyakhaြငya”paငyataññya”．»»
7． rūpabha0 arūpabha0naှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃso baြhmāpuggiုlya (dhammatāpaငyataññya”) ----
īkā” assāsa-passāsa maraှိsopuggiုlyamaျာ”taññya”． thiုpuggiုlyamaျာ”cāraငya”thaငya mimi mapāvaငyasaññyakiု
mimikiုyyakiု mimikiုyyatiုငya codanā၍ ---
“sūtoyakoငya” īchiုkhaဲ’paြီ”so khunacyaṭhānatiု’maှlhatyaso assāsa-passāsatiု’၏ maphaြcyarā ṭhāna၏
maraှိkhaြငya”kaြောင’ya saငya၏santānya၌ assāsa-passāsatiု’saññya raှိsaññyasālaျှငyataññya”， thiုsiု’paငya raှိpāsoyalaññya”
paññānuṃ’sañña’yaathakya ā”naññya”sañña’yaathakyakaြောင’ya assāsa-passāsakiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”yūkhaြငya”ငှာ
simya”chaññya”khaြငya”ငှာ machamya”niုငyakhaြငya” phaြcya၏” - hu īsiု’ tacyaphanyapaြnya၍ mimikiုyyakiု mimi codanāpā．
thiုnoငya īyogā0cara rahanya”toyasaññya pakatiā”phaြင’ya vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’၏ thimaှု
thaငyaraှာ”rāṭhāna၌sālaျှငya bhā0nācityakiု ငြိmyavapyachā kapyathā”၍ vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalekiု naှluṃ”shaငya”
maှုkiု phaြcyacepā． ī vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’saññya naှာkhoငya”raှññyasosūā” naှာkhoငya”phukiု thikhiုkya
kunyalaျkya phaြcyapoyakaြkunya၏， naှာkhoငya”tiုsosūā” athakyanaှုtyakhamya”kiု thikhiုkyakunyalaျkya phaြcyapoyalā
kaြkunya၏． thiုkaြောင’ya īvaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale mathaငyaraှာ”so yogā0cara rahanya”toyasaññya (thaငya
raှာ”aောငya sakyasakyapaြုpaြငya၍ asakyaraှူ maှု， kaြmya”kaြmya”raှူ maှုkiု mapaြုbhaဲ) īmaññyasonerākiု vaငyasakyale
338
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
thhakyasakyaletiု’saññya thikhiုkyakunya၏hu naှluṃ”piုkya၍ assāsa-passāsakiု raှုphā”neso bhā0nācityakiု

kapyathā”pā．

bhā0nāsamādhichamya”ā”maျာ” kaြီ”mā”sathakya kaြီ”mā”aောငyasā chakyalakya၍ kaြို”cā”pā．

nimityaāruṃ၌ ငြိmyavapyachā kapya၍ taññyalātatyapesaññya， taññyaaောငyalaññya” kaြို”cā”ramaññyasā phaြcyasaññya．

akaြငyapuggiုlyasaññyakā” samādhikammaṭṭhānika puggiုlya phaြcya၏． samatha (= samādhi) kammaṭṭhānya”၏mūlaññya”

araှငyasoṇamatherya
khaြphevā”apaြငya၌ nū”ññaṃ’simyamhe’so amhe”maျာ” pokyalaျkyaraှိso alhanyasimyamhe’nunayyaso araှငya

“mama sarīraṃ sukhumālaṃ， na ca sakkā sukhene0 sukhaṃ adhigantuṃ， kāyaṃ kilamethāpi samaṇadhammo
kātabbo” ----
= “ငါ၏kiုyyasaññyakā” alhanya simyamhe’nū”ññaṃ’၏， khaျmya”sāphaြင’yasālaျှငya khaျmya”sākiု raraှိkhaြငya”ငှာlaññya” matatya
koငya”pe， ငါsaññya kiုyyakiု paငyapanya”ce၍soyalaññya” rahanya”tarā”kiု kaြို”cā”ā”thutyathiုkya၏” ----
īsiု’ naှluṃ”shaငya”၍ rapyakhaြငya” iriyāputhya， caṅkaြံshā”khaြငya” iriyāputhya naှcyamaျို”kiုsā asuṃ”paြုlaျkya

ā”thutyalatyasoya khaြphevā”apaြငyatiု’၌ aphualuṃ”tiု’saññya pokyalākaြkunya၏． thiုsiု’ khaြphevā”apaြငyatiု’၌
aphualuṃ”tiု’ phaြcyapoyalākunyasoyalaññya” chaငya”raဲsañña’ya dukkhavedanākiု laျcyalaျူ raှုthā”၍ vīriyakiု maြဲmaြံchā

siု’ kaြhashā”toyamū၏． araှငyasoṇamatheryamaြtyasaññyalaññya” bhurā”raှငya khaျီ”maြှင’yape”sanā”toyamūsañña’ya
naññya”nānissayaatiုငya” vīriyanaှင’ya samādhikiု ññīmaျှaောငya yaှñyacapyalaျkya vipassanākammaṭṭhānya”kiု luṃ’lakaြို”kutya
ā”thutyatoyamūsaññyaraှိsoya arahattaphiုlya၌ taññyaraှိtoyamūlesaññya． (mahāṭī-1-152．)

alā”tūpaငya saddhā-vīriyatiု’maှ kaြhaငya”kunyaso sati-samādhi-paññindaြteiု’thaငyalaññya” indaြေ tacyapā”pā”၏
ā”koငya”moငya”sanyamaှု raှိlatyasoya nuṃ’neso indaြteiု’၏ mimi mimitiု’၏ chiုငyarā lupyaငnya”kiccarapyatiု’၌

athū”ā”phaြင’ya aliုraှိapyasaññyasālaျှငya phaြcyapesaññya． yaငya”siု’ aliုraှိapyasokaြောင’ya thiုsaddhānaှင’ya paññā
tarā”naှcyapā”tiု’၏ ññīmaျှso vanyachoငyamaှုraှိkhaဲ’soya appanājhānyasaññya paြီ”cī”paြñña’yacuṃlāniုငyasakaဲ’siု’ alā”tūpaငya
paျငya”rikhaြငya” kosajjabhakyasiု’ yiုငyalaဲshā”tatyaso aphiု’raှိso samādhinaှင’ya bhā0nāāruṃmaှ cityapaျံ’lhaင’ya
thhakyashā”khaြငya” uddhaccabhakyasiု’ yiုငyalaဲshā”tatyaso aphiု’raှိso vīriyatarā”tiု’၏ ññīmaျှso kiccaraှိmaှုsaññya
thaငyaraှာ”raှိkhaဲ’soya akhaျငya”khaျငya” tacyapā”kiု tacyapā”ka mayiုငyalaဲaောငya thokyapaṃ’thā”khaြငya”kaြောင’ya yaှñyaphakya citya
cetasikya sampayutyatarā”tiု’၏ bhā0nāāruṃ၌ paျငya”rikhaြငya”， bhā0nāāruṃmaှ cityapaျံ’lhaင’yashā”khaြငya”hūso
achanya”naှcyaphakyasiု’ kaျrokyakhaြငya” maraှိto’saphaြင’ya koငya”chāsālaျှငya appanājhānyasaññya paြီ”cī”paြñña’yacuṃlāpe၏．
(mahāṭī-1-153．)
saddhālhanya၍ paññāā”naññya”soya - paññālhanya၍ saddhāā”naññya”soya
bala0saddho hi mandapañño muddhappasanno hoti， avatthusmi H pasīdati． bala0pañño mandasaddho
kerāṭikapakkhaṃ bhajati， bhesajjasamuṭṭhito viya rogo atekiccho hoti． ubhinnaṃ samatāya
vatthusmi aH ya0 pasīdati． (visuddhi-1-126． ma-ṭṭha-1-295．)
= akaြောငya”paြkhaျkyakā” īsiု’ phaြcya၏． puggiုlyatacyaū”saññyakā” alhanyaā”kaြီ”so saddhātarā” yuṅkaြññya
khaျkya chamya”ā”naှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃ၏， nuṃ’sopaññā ā”naññya”sopaññā raှိ၏， masana’yaraှငya”so asiñāṇya raှိ၏． thiု
puggiုlyamaျို”saññya titthitiု’၏ tapañña’yasā0katiု’kaဲ’siု’paငya sūtoyakoငya”tarā”taññya”hūso anaှcyasāra kaငya”
maဲ’neso akhaျññya”naှီ”so puggiုlya၌ kaြññyaññiုnetatya၏， akhaျññya”naှီ”so arāvatthu၌ kaြññyaññiုnetatya၏，
miုkyamiုkyakanya”kanya” chaငyakanya”totiု” kaြññyaññiုnetatya၏， ñāṇyaphaြင’yasakyavaငya၍ kaြññyaññiုthiုkyasañña’ya ratanā
suṃ”tanya kaṃ-kaṃ၏akaျို”tarā” casañña’ya saddheyaျvatthumaှnya၌ makaြññyaññiုtatya， koငya”maှုtaññya”hūso maျို”ce’၏
kaြဲkhaျciုkyapaျို”rā layyayāmaြkeoငya”saphhayya mahutyasañña’ya vatthutiု’၌ kaြññyaññiုnetatya၏． paññālhanya၍ saddhā
tarā” nuṃ’sasūkā” kokyakaျcyacañya”laဲsoaphiု’bhakyasiု’ yiုငyalaဲshā”tatya၏． saddhāka yutyalaျော’laျkya
paññāka liုapyasaññyathakya piုnesaphaြင’ya paññāphaြင’ya kaျောyalhanyapaြေ”shā”neso puggiုlyasaññya akaြောငya”tarā”
atuapatiု’ka laှñña’yacā”thā”apyasaññyaphaြcya၍ “laှူphhayyavatthukiု pe”kamya”chana’yakaြဲkhaြငya” cāgatarā”naှင’ya kaငya”၍
takayya laှူphhayyavatthukiု malaှူbhaဲ cityaphaြcyakāmaျှphaြင’ya (= cityathaဲka laှူruṃmaျှphaြင’ya)soyalaññya” dānamaya koငya”maှု
kusiုlyasaññya phaြcyapoyalā၏”- īsiု’ casaññyatiု’kiု kaြံchatatya၏． īsiု’sabhoraှိso puggiုlyasaññya khaြောkya
kapyaso kaြံcaññyacityakū”maှုphaြင’ya luyakyaphaျkyachī”khaṃraso cityadhātyaraှိnesaññya phaြcya၍ paññāraှိ sūtoyakoငya”
tiု’၏ cakā”kiု manāyūtatyape， paññāraှိsūtoyakoငya”tiု’ka nā”laññyaaောငya asiñāṇya pe”pāsoyalaññya”
siraှိnā”laññyakhaြငya” achaင’yasiု’ marokyaraှိniုငyape． thiုkaြောင’ya che”kaြောင’ya phaြcyapoyalāso anārogāsaññya
akurakhakyasakaဲ’siု’ paññālhanya၍ saddhāā”naññya”neso īkaဲ’siု’so puggiုlyamaျို”saññyalaññya” kucā”phiု’ranya
alhanyakhakyakhaဲlaှpesaññya． saddhā paññā tarā”naှcyapā”tiု’saññya ññīmaျှmaှုraှိpāmaှsālaျှငya kaြññyaññiုsaင’ya kaြññyaññiုthiုkya
so koငya”maှုtaññya”hūso maျို”ce’၏ kaြဲkhaျciုkyapaျို”rā layyayāmaြkeoငya”saphhayyaphaြcyaso bhurā”cacya
bhurā”maှnya， tarā”cacya tarā”maှnya， saṅghācacya saṅghāmaှnya casañña’ya saddheyaျvatthu၌sālaျှငya kaြññyaññiုtatyapesaññya．
īငါ”pā”so indaြteiု’thaငya saddhānaှင’yapaññā naှcyapā”tiု’၏ tacyakhukhuka lhanyakaဲnesaphaြင’ya akhaျငya”khaျငya” kaငya”
khā၍ nekhaြငya” (= khāhakhaျkyaraှိnekhaြငya”) saññya samatha vipassanā bhā0nālupyaငnya”rapyatiု’၌ akaျို”cī”phā”kiု
marhakyachoငyato’bhaဲ akaျို”maဲ’kiုsālaျှငya rhakyachoငyatatyasakaဲ’siု’ alā”tūpaငya samādhinaှင’ya vīriyatiု’၏

366
tacyakhukhuka lhanyakaဲnesaphaြင’ya akhaျငya”khaျငya” kaငya”khā၍nekhaြငya” (= khāhakhaျkya raှိnekhaြငya”)saññya avikkhepa amaññya
raso bhā0nāāruṃmaှ cityapaျံ’lhaင’ya၍ mashā”maှု (= samādhi) kiု rhakyachoငya၍ mape”to’bhaဲ bhā0nā āruṃmaှ
cityapaျံ’lhaင’yanekhaြငya” (= vikkhepa)kiုsā rhakyachoငya၍ pe”tatyapesaññya． (visuddhi-1-126． mahāṭī-1-153．)
samādhi naှင’ya vīriya
bala0samādhi H pana mandavīriyaṃ samādhissa kosajjapakkhattā kosajjaṃ abhibha0ti． bala0vīriyaṃ
mandasamādhi H vīriyassa uddhaccapakkhattā uddhaccaṃ abhibha0ti． samādhi pana vīriyena saṃyojito kosajje
patituṃ na labhati． vīriyaṃ samādhinā saṃyojitaṃ uddhacce patituṃ na labhati， tasmā tadubhayaṃ samaṃ
kātabbaṃ． ubhayasamatāya hi appanā hoti． (visuddhi-1-126． ma-ṭṭha-1-295-296．)
= ā”kaြီ”so samādhiraှိso nuṃ’so vīriyaraှိso sūkiု (= samādhilhanya၍ vīriya laျော’naññya”neso
yogā0carapuggiုlyakiု) samādhi၏ paျငya”rikhaြငya” kosajjaaphiု’ raှိsaññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya paျငya”rikhaြငya” kosajja

lupyaငnya”naှင’ya naှိpyakhapyakhaြငya” (= niggaha) lupyaငnya”kiု paြုlupya၍ maphaြcyaniုငyape． thiုkaြောင’ya bhurā”raှငyasaññya satikiု
sabbatthikā = aluṃ”cuṃso samathabhā0nā vipassanābhā0nā lupyaငnya”rapya maှnyasamaျှ၌ aliုraှိapya၏hu ho
kaြာ”toyamūkhaြငya” phaြcyapesaññya． (visuddhi-1-126． ma-ṭṭha-1-296． saṃ-ṭṭha-3-195．)
ītiုငyaaောငya indaြေငါ”pā”naှင’ya chakyacapya၍ phoyapaြthā”apyaso cakā”arapyarapyatiု’kā” appanā
kosallatarā” (10)pā”tiု’thaငya pāvaငyaso indaြိyasamattapaṭipādanā = indaြေ ññīmaျှaောငya kaျင’yapuṃnaှင’ya chakya
capya၍ phoyapaြapyaso naှcyakhumaြောkya appanākosallatarā”paငya phaြcyasaññya．
yakhu ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”phaြင’ya samādhithūthoငyaneso asaငyayogā0carapuggiုlyasaññyalaññya” saddhānaှင’ya
paññā， vīriyanaှင’ya samādhikiု ññīmaျှaောငya kaြို”cā”ā”thutyaramaññya phaြcyasaññya． samādhithūthoငyanekhiုkyaphaြcyasaphaြင’ya
samādhianaññya”ငyya lhanyasoyalaññya” saင’yamaြtyasaññyasā phaြcyapesaññya．
alhanyakaြññyalaငyatokyapaneso ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityacaso samathanimityakiု thhaငya”phokya
simaြငyakhaြငya” thiု”thhaငya”simaြငyakhaြငya” sabhotarā”kā” paññātaññya”． yaငya”paññākā” bhā0nācityaacañyakiု ā
nāpānapaṭibhāganimityakaဲ’siု’so samathanimityaāruṃmaှ khaျhatyakhaျောyatimya”coငya”၍ bhe”siု’ makaျrokyaaောငya
thinya”khaျုpyathā”niုငyaso chamya”ā”maျာ” raှိnekhaြငya”kaြောင’ya paññindaြheūso amaññyakiုlaññya” raraှိpesaññya．
yaငya”ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityacaso samathanimityaāruṃ၌ bhā0nācitya၏ ငြိmyavapyachā kapya၍ taññyane
khaြငya” sabhokā” samādhitaññya”． yaငya”samādhisaññyalaññya” bhā0nācityaacañyakiု ānāpānapaṭibhāganimitya
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
370
kaဲ’siု’so samathanimityaāruṃmaှ lhaဲkhaျောya၍ kaျmashā”aောငya thinya”khaျုpyathā”niုငyaso chamya”aငyaraှိkhaြငya”kaြောင’ya
samādhindaြheūso amaññyakiုlaññya” raraှိpesaññya． ī samathapiုငya”၌laññya” samādhinaှင’ya paññā tarā”naှcyapā”kiု
yuganaddhanaññya”ara ññīmaျှmaှုraှိaောငya cuṃthaဲ၍ kaျင’yaramaññya phaြcyasaññya． thiုsiု’kaျင’yarā၌ paññākiု saddhāphaြင’ya ā”pe”
thokyapaṃ’maှု samādhikiု vīriyaphaြင’ya ā”pe”thokyapaṃ’maှုkā” athū”liုapyasaññyasā phaြcyapesaññya．
ratanāsuṃ”pā”tiု’၏ guṇyakaျေ”jū”tiု’၌laññya”koငya”， kaṃ-kaṃ၏akaျို”tarā”hūso kaြောငya”-kaျို”-chakya
paṭiccasamuppādyasabhotarā”tiု’၌laññya”koငya”， athū”saphaြင’ya sikkhāsuṃ”rapyathaငya pāvaငyaso samādhisikkhā =
samādhikaျင’yacañya lupyaငnya”khhaငya၌laññya”koငya” sakyavaငyayuṅkaြññyaneso saddhātarā”saññyalaññya” bhā0nā
cityaacañyakiု bhā0nālamya”kaြောငya”maှ timya”coငya”၍ bhe”siု’ makaျ marokyaaောငya thinya”khaျုpyathā”niုငyaso
chamya”aငyaraှိsokaြောင’ya saddhindaြheūso amaññyakiုlaññya” raraှိpesaññya． alhanya kaြññyalaငyatokyapaneso
ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityakiု āruṃpaြုneraso bhā0nālupyaငnya”khhaငyaathaငya”siု’ sakyachaငya”kaျrokyaneso
asaငya yogā0carapuggiုlyaaphiု’ bhurā”raှငya၏ achuṃ”amaphaြcyaso ānāpānassati samādhikaျင’yacañya samādhi
sikkhāmaြtya၌ alhanyaamaငya” yuṅkaြññyakhaျkya saddhāchamya”ā”maျာ” poyathhakyalāmaññyasā phaြcyapesaññya． yaငya”yuṅkaြññya
khaျkya saddhāchamya”aငya၏ kaြီ”mā”so athokyaapaṃ’kiု raraှိso paññindaြko” athū”saphaြင’ya īapiုငya”thaငya
ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityakiု thhaငya”phokyasineso paññindaြko” ā”koငya”moငya”sanyalāmaññya phaြcyapesaññya．
tacyaphanya yaငya”ānāpānapaṭibhāganimitya āruṃ၌ bhā0nācitya၏ ငြိmyavapyachā kaျrokya taññyaငြိmyanekhaြငya”
sabhohūso samādhindaြko” yaငya”ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityaāruṃ၌ bhā0nācitya၏ ငြိmyavapyachā kapya၍
taññyaငြိmyaneောငya kaြို”cā”ā”thutyakhaြငya”hūso vīriyindaြေ၏ athokyaapaṃ’kiု rakhaဲ’soya， yaငya”ānāpāna
paṭibhāganimitya āruṅkiု thiု”thhaငya”sineောငya kaြို”cā”ā”thutyakhaြငya”hūso vīriyindaြေ၏ ā”pe”thokyapaṃ’
maှုkiု rakhaဲ’soya ā”koငya”moငya”sanyalā၏， taññyaငြိmyamaှု chamya”ā” kaြီ”mā”lā၏． siု’athakya īarāmaျို”၌
vīriyasaññyalaññya” bhā0nācityaacañyakiု ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityakaဲ’siု’so bhā0nāāruṃmaှ timya”coငya”၍
khaျောyakaျmashā”aောငya thinya”khaျုpyathā”niုငyaso chamya”ā”maျာ”raှိnesañña’yaathakya vīriyindaြheūso amaññyakiု
laññya” raraှိpesaññya． ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityakaဲ’siု’so samathaāruṃ၌ bhā0nācitya၏ ငြိmyavapyachā kapya၍
taññyakaြññyanemaှု sabhotarā”hūso samādhisaññya thiုtaññyakaြññyanemaှု samādhikiု bhā0nāāruṃmaှ laျှောkaျ
mashā”aောငya khaျီ”paင’yathā”tatyaso paggahalupyaငnya”kiccaraှိso vīriyindaြေ၏ ā”pe”thokyapaṃ’maှု akūaññī
kiု rakhaဲ’soya khhanyaā”kaြီ”mā”lā၏， chamya”aငyamaျာ” paြñña’ya0lā၏． bhā0nācityaacañyakiု tacyanārī naှcyanārī
casaññyaphaြင’ya bhā0nāāruṃmaှ laျှောkaျmashā”aောငya ငြိmyavapyachā kapya၍ bhā0nāāruṃ၌ taññyaneောငya bhā0nā
āruṃmaှ mapaျံ’lhaင’yashā”aောငya rhakyachoငyape”niုငya၏．
thiုsaddhānaှင’ya paññā， samādhinaှင’ya vīriyatiု’ ññīmaျှaောငya satiphaြင’ya thinya”pe”ramaññya phaြcyasaññya． yakhuakhaျိnyathaငya
asaငyayogīsūtoyakoငya”saññya phā”maျာ”neso， satiphaြင’ya simya”chaññya”neso sati၏ taññyarā āruṃmaှာ
ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityaāruṃ phaြcyasaññyakiုkā” athū”garupaြု၍ maှtyasā”thā”pā． thiု alhanyakaြññyalaငyatokya
paneso ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityakiု simya”chaññya”neso amaှtyaranesosabho mame’paျောkyakhaြငya”
sabhokā” satindaြpeငyataññya”． bhā0nācityaacañyakiု ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityaāruṃmaှ malaျှောkaျaောငya
timya”coငya”mashā”aောငya thinya”khaျုpyathā”niုငyaso chamya”aငyatacyamaျို”paငya phaြcyasaññya．
ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityakiု āruṃmūneso saddhānaှင’ya paññā， samādhinaှင’ya vīriyatiု’kiု ññīmaျှaောငya yaငya”
ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityakiုpaငya āruṃmūneso simya”chaññya”neso satika coင’yakaြpyathinya”khapyape”ramaññya
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
371
phaြcyapesaññya． thiုkaြောင’ya satikiု kammaṭṭhānya”ā”luṃ”tiု’၌ akhākhapyasimya” aliုraှိapyakaြောငya”kiု bhurā”raှငyaka
mina’yakaြာ”toyamūkhaြငya” phaြcyapesaññya． īthaငya indaြññeīmaျှaောငya kaျင’yapuṃapiုငya”kiု rapyachiုငya”liုkyapāsaññya． bojjhaငya
(7)pā” ññīmaျှaောငya kaျင’yaramañña’ya kaျင’yacañyamaျာ”naှင’ya chakyacapya၍ phatyaraှုpāka piုmiု၍ nakyaraှိုငya”chā sabhopokyalā
niုငyapesaññya．
3． nimittakosalla
nimittakosallaṃ nāma pathavīkasiṇādikassa cittekaggatānimittassa akatassa karaṇakosallaṃ，
katassa ca bhā0nākosallaṃ， bhā0nāya laddhassa rakkhaṇakosallañca， taṃ idha adhippetaṃ．
(visuddhi-1-126．)
cittekaggatānimittassāti cittekaggatāya nimittassa， cittekaggatāsaṅkhātassa ca nimittassa．
cittassa hi samāhitākāraṃ sallakkhethā samathanimittaṃ rakkhantoye0 kasiṇanimittaṃ rakkhati． tasmā
pathavīkasiṇādikassāti ādi-saddena nake0laṃ paṭibhāganimittasse0， atha kho samathanimittassāpi
gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ． tanti rakkhaṇakosallaṃ． idha appanākosallakathāyaṃ “nimittakosalla”nti adhippetaṃ．
karaṇabhā0nā kosallānaṃ page0 siddhattāti adhippāyo． (mahāṭī-1-154．)
athakyapā aṭṭhakathā ṭīkā cakā”rapyatiု’၏ chiုliုraငya”maှာ īsiု’ phaြcya၏． ī nimittakosallapiုငya”၌ -
karaṇakosalla， bhā0nākosalla， rakkhaṇakosallahu kosallatarā” suṃ”maျို”raှိ၏． tacyaphanya cittekaga
¾tānimityamaှာlaññya” paṭibhāganimitya， samathanimityahu naှcyamaျို” raှိ၏．
cittekaggatā nimitya naှcyamaျို”
1． pathavīkasiုṇya” paṭibhāganimitya， ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityacaso thiုthiု samathabhā0nācityatiု’၏ araှုkhaṃ
āruṃ phaြcyaso alhanyakaြññyalaငyatokyapaneso paṭibhāganimityasaññya yaငya”paṭibhāganimityahūso āruṃ
tacyakhutaññya”poyasiု’ bhā0nācityakiု kaျrokyaneောငya ငြိmyavapyachākapya၍ taññyaneောငya ārammaṇapaccaya
sattiphaြင’ya kaျေ”jū”paြုpe”laျkya raှိ၏． siု’athakya yaငya”paṭibhāganimityasaññya bhā0nācitya၏ paṭibhāganimitya
āruṃtacyakhutaññya”poyasiု’ kaျrokya၍ taññyaငြိmyanekhaြငya” (= cittekaggatā) ၏ taññyarāakaြောငya”raငya” nimitya
phaြcyakhaြငya”kaြောင’ya cittekaggatānimitya maññya၏．
2． pathavīkasiုṇya” paṭibhāganimitya ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityatiု’kaဲ’siု’so paṭibhāganimityaāruṃtacyakhutaññya”
poyasiု’ cityakaျrokyataññyaငြိmyanekhaြငya” (= cittekaggatā) amaññyaraso raှေ”raှေ”so samādhisaññya nokya
nokyaso samādhi (= nokyanokyaso samatha)၏ akaြောငya”raငya” nimitya phaြcyasokaြောင’ya samathanimitya
maññya၏． maှnyapesaññya ---- kasiုṇya”paṭibhāganimitya ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityatiု’kaဲ’siု’so paṭibhāganimityakiု
āruṃmūneso samathabhā0nācitya၏ yaငya”paṭibhāganimityaāruṃ၌ ငြိmyavapyachā kapya၍ taññyanepuṃhūso
taññyakaြññyaso akhaြငya”arākiု koငya”chā piုငya”khaြာ”maှtyasā”၍ yaငya”cityataññyakaြññyamaှု samādhihūso
samathanimityakiု coင’yaraှောkyaso sūsaññyasālaျှငya kasiုṇya”nimitya (siု’mahutya ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityakiု)
coင’yaraှောkyasaññya maññyapesaññya． yaငya”samathanimityahūso samādhisaññyalaññya” kasiုṇya”nimitya ānāpāna
nimityacaso paṭibhāganimityakiုsā āruṃmūnesaphaြင’ya yaငya”paṭibhāganimityaāruṃ၌ ငြိmyavapyachākapya၍ taññyakaြññya
nemaှု samādhikiု malaျှောkaျ mapaျkyacī”aောငya taññyataṃ’aောငya coင’yaraှောkyaliုso yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
372
yaငya”paṭibhāganimityakiုpaငya kaြိmyaphanyamaျာ”chā naှluṃ”shaငya”nera၏． naññya”maှnyalamya”maှnya naှluṃ”shaငya”maှု yoniso
manasikārakiု kaြိmyaphanyamaျာ”chā paြုlupyara၏． siု’athakya raှေ”raှေ”so bhā0nāsamādhihūso samathanimityakiု
coင’yaraှောkyakhaြငya”saññya kasiုṇya”paṭibhāganimitya ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityacaso paṭibhāganimitya āruṅkiုpā
pū”thaဲ၍ coင’yacaññya”khaြငya”kicca paြီ”cī”shā”၏． siု’athakya īarā၌ cittekaggatānimityaara paṭibhāganimityanaှင’ya
samathanimitya naှcyamaျို”luṃ”kiုpaငya arakokyayūpā．
kosallatarā” suṃ”pā”
1． karaṇakosalla ---- cityataññyakaြññyamaှု bhā0nācitya၏ tacyakhutaññya”so āruṃpoyasiု’ kaျrokya
taññyaငြိmyanemaှု (= cittekaggatā) ၏ akaြောငya”raငya”cacyaphaြcyaso mapaြုlupyarase”so pathavīkasiုṇya”vanya”
caso kasiုṇya”nimityakiု paြုlupyaranya kaျhamya”kaျငyalimmākhaြငya”saññya karaṇakosalla maññya၏．
2． bhā0nākosalla ---- paြုlupyaapyapaြီ”so yaငya”cittekaggatānimityakiု (paṭibhāganimitya + samatha
nimityakiု) phaြcyacekhaြငya” phā”cekhaြငya”၌ kaျhamya”kaျငyalimmākhaြငya”saññya bhā0nākosalla maññya၏． paြုlupyaapyapaြီ”
so pathavīkasiုṇya” caso kasiုṇya”nimityakiု arapyachayyamaျkyanaှာsiု’ tiုငyaaောငya anantacakaြ0ḷāsiု’ tiုငya
aောငya phaြna’yakaြkyaniုငyamaှုsaññya kasiုṇya”paṭibhāganimityahūso cittekaggatānimityakiု phā”cekhaြငya” bhā0nā
kosallapaငya phaြcya၏． kasiုṇya”nimityamaျာ”kā” nimityakiု tiု”phā”aောငya paြုlupyakhaဲ’soya cittabhā0nā vepullattha
(visuddhi-1-147) = bhā0nācityasaññya appanājhānyasiု’ tiုငyaaောငya paြna’yapaြောcaññyapaငyakhaြငya”siု’ rokyaraှိshā”maññya
phaြcyapesaññya． (siု’soya ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityakiုkā” tiု”phā”aောငya mapaြုlupyakoငya”pe． nokyathaငya
thaငyaraှာ”lattaṃ’．)
raှေ”raှေ”so cittekaggatā amaññyaraso samādhi (= samatha) nimityakiုlaññya” tiု”phā”aောငya paြုlupya
khaြငya”၌ limmākaျhamya”kaျငyamaှု raှိkhaြငya”saññyalaññya” bhā0nākosallapaငya maññyapesaññya．
3． rakkhaṇakosalla ---- kasiုṇya”nimityakiု āruṃyū၍ phā”neso kasiṇabhā0nā， ānāpānapaṭibhāga
nimityakiု āruṃyū၍ phā”neso ānāpānassatisamādhibhā0nā caso bhā0nā၏ chamya”ā”kaြောင’ya raraှိ
lāso cittekaggatānimitya amaññyaraso paṭibhāganimityanaှင’ya samathanimityakiု coင’yaraှောkyakhaြငya”၌ kaျhamya”kaျငya
limmāmaှု raှိkhaြငya”saññya rakkhaṇakosalla maññya၏． thiု rakkhaṇakosallakiု īappanākosallapiုငya”၌ nimitta
kosallahu aliုraှိapyapesaññya． karaṇakosalla， bhā0nākosallatiု’kā” raှေ”machhakapaငya paြီ”cī”paြီ”
phaြcyasokaြောင’yataññya”．
ī athakyapā aṭṭhakathā ṭīkātiု’၏ satyamaှtyakhaျkyaara ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityakiု āruṃyū၍
samādhithūthoငyaneso asaငyayogā0carapuggiုlyasūmaြtyasaññya ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityakiုlaññya”koငya”，
ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityakiု āruṃmūneso ānāpānassatisamādhi hūso samathanimityakiုlaññya”koငya”
mapaျောkyapaျkyaaောငya araှññyakhiုငyakhaṃ’ taññyataṃ’aောငya kaျhamya”kaျငyalimmāchā thinya”simya”coင’yaraှောkyatatyaphiု’ liုpe

satipaṭṭhānyale”pā”kiု ū”taññya၍ chakyalakya၍ raှငya”laငya”taငyapaြapyapāsaññya．
satipaṭṭhānyale”pā”tiု’thaငya sati၏ taññyarāāruṃmaှာ kāya-vedanā-citta-dhammahu le”maျို”paြာ”၏． yaငya”
le”maျို”tiု’anakya kāyānupassanā satipaṭṭhānyakaျင’yacañyapiုငya”thaငya yakhure”sā”nechaဲphaြcyaso ānāpāna
kaျင’yacañyakiုlaññya” sati၏ taññyarāāruṃ kammaṭṭhānya”tacyakhuaphaြcya thañña’yashaငya”၍ hokaြာ”thā”toyamūpesaññya．
yakhuapiုငya”kā” vipassanāpiုငya” mahutyase”saphaြင’ya samathapiုငya”sā phaြcyanese”saphaြင’ya samādhithūthoငyapuṃapiုငya”
kiုsā khakya၍ taငyapaြapyapāsaññya．
ānāpānalupyaငnya”piုငya”thaငya ----
1． pakatiso vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyalesaññyalaññya” satisambojjhaငya၏ taññyarāāruṃpaငya phaြcyasaññya．
2． pakatiso vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyalekiု amaှီpaြု၍ bhā0nāchamya”hunyakaြောင’ya phaြcyapoyalāso
vāghamya”ciုငyakaဲ’siု’ phaြူphhe”neso uggahanimityahūso ānāpānanimityasaññyalaññya” satisambojjhaငya၏
taññyarāāruṃpaငya phaြcyasaññya．

««maှtyakhaျkya ---- rupya-vedanā-citta-dhamma- hūso paramatyatarā”tiု’saññyalaññya” satisambojjhaငya၏ taññyarā

phā”maျာ”nesaññyapaငya maññyapesaññya． satisambojjhaငya၏ taññyarāāruṃ၌ saင’yalaျောyasoā”phaြင’ya hutyamaှnyaso

1． kusiုlya akusiုlyacaso paramatthadhammahūsamaျှtiု’၌ --- kusiုlyatarā”tiု’၏ apaြcyamaraှိkhaြငya” koငya”so

so akaျို”kiုpe”khaြငya” (= sāvajjadukkhavipāka) lakkhaṇā， phassa၏ āruṅkiု the’thiso akhaြငya”arāā”phaြင’ya

ññhatyakiုငya”raှိုငya”khaြငya”hūso namanasabholakkhaṇā ---- īsabholakkhaṇātiု’kā” rupyatarā”ā”luṃ” nāmya

bhā0nāñāṇya paြñña’yacuṃluṃlokyasaññyatiုငyaaောငya kaြီ”phā”tiု”takyaranya athakyapaငya phaြcyapesaññya． tacyanaññya”

nekhaြငya”paငya phaြcyapesaññya． ««paramatthadhammatiု’၏ sabhā0lakkhaṇā， sāmaññalakkhaṇātiု’kiု thiု”thhaငya”sineso

manodhārāvajjanya”saññyalaññya” joyūsañña’ya āruṅkiုpaငya naှluṃ”shaငya”tatyaso sabhoraှိrakā” jonaှင’ya alā”tū
saññyasā phaြcya၏． thiု’kaြောင’ya yaငya”manodhārāvajjanya”kiုlaññya” yonisomanasikārahupaငya khoyachiုsaññya．
(mahāṭī-1-156．)»»
vīriyasambojjhaငya
satisambojjhaငya dhammavicayasambojjhaငyatarā”tiု’၏ taññyarāāruṃphaြcyakaြso kāya-vedanā-citta-dhamma
amaññyarakaြso paramatthadhammatiု’၏ sabhā0lakkhaṇānaှင’ya sāmaññalakkhaṇākiု thiု”thhaငya”simaြငyaaောငya lakyamhanya
aca kaြို”cā”ā”thutyamaှု vīriyakā” āra mbhadhātyamaññya၏． bhā0nālupyaငnya”khhaငya၌ paျငya”rinekhaြငya” kosajja
tarā”maှ thhakyamaြောkyaniုငyasaññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya thiု āra mbhadhātya vīriyathakya lhanyakaဲthakyasanyaso kaြို”cā”
ā”thutyamaှု luṃ’lavīriyakā” nikkamadhātya maññya၏． lhanyakaဲkunya athū”saphaြင’ya lhanyakaဲkunyaso chana’yakaျငyabhakya
tarā”maှnyasamaျှtiု’kiု payyaphaျောkyakhaြငya”ငှာ chamya”niုငyaso vīriyasaññya thakyamaြkyasaññyathakya athū”saphaြင’ya thakyamaြkya
saññya casañña’yaaphaြcyasiု’ rokyaraှိlā၏． thiုvīriyamaျို”kā” chana’yakaျငyabhakyatarā”tiု’kiု chaင’yakāchaင’yakā kaျောyalhaှာ”
lhanyamaြောkyalaျkya mimi liုrā panya”tiုငyasiု’rokyaaောငya takyarokyashā”niုငyasañña’ya athakyakaြောင’ya thiုnikkamadhātya
vīriyathakyalaññya” lhanyakaဲsanyamaြnya၏． yaငya”nikkamadhātya vīriyathakya lhanyakaဲsanyamaြnyaso vīriyasaññya parakkama
dhātya maññya၏． ārambhadhātya-nikkamadhātya-parakkamadhātya hūso thiုsuṃ”maျို”so vīriyadhātyatiု’kiု phaြcyace
saññya၏ achamya”phaြင’ya phaြcyapoyalāso naှluṃ”shaငya”maှုsaññya thiုdhātyasuṃ”pā”tiု’၌ yonisomanasikārapaငya maññya၏．
īraှငya”laငya”khaျkyakā” athū”saphaြင’ya vipassanāpiုငya”kiု raññyaññhaှnya”thā”pāsaññya． yakhu asaငyayogīsū
toyakoငya”saññya kaြို”cā”ā”thutyanechaဲphaြcyaso samathapiုငya”၌kā” ----
1． pakatiso vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyalehūso ānāpānanimitya，
2． (parikammanimitya ) uggahanimitya，
3． paṭibhāganimityatiု’kiု ----
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
379
1． lakyamhanyaaca siaောငya kaြို”cā”ā”thutyakhaြငya” vīriyakā” āra mbhadhātyataññya”．
2． paျငya”rikhaြငya” kosajjatarā”kiု kaျောyalhaှာ”shā”so kaြို”cā”ā”thutyakhaြငya” vīriyakā” nikkamadhātyataññya”．
3． pakatiso ānāpānanimitya， uggahanimitya， paṭibhāganimityahūso nimityatiု’kiု achaင’yachaင’ya thiု”thhaငya”
siaောငya kaြို”cā”ā”thutyakhaြငya” vīriyakā” parakkamadhātyataññya”． yaငya”vīriyadhātya suṃ”maျို”tiု’ phaြcyapoya
lāaောငya pakatiso ānāpānanimitya， uggahanimitya， paṭibhāganimityatiု’kiု kaြိmyaphanyamaျာ”chā naှluṃ”
shaငya”khaြငya”saññya yonisomanasikārapaငya phaြcya၏． yaငya”yoniso manasikārakiု kaြိmyaphanyamaျာ”chā
paြုlupyakhaဲ’soya maphaြcyapoyalāse”so vīriyasambojjhaငyatarā”saññyalaññya” phaြcyapoyalāmaññya， phaြcyapoya
lāpaြီ”so vīriyasambojjhaငyatarā”saññyalaññya” bhā0nāñāṇya၏ paြñña’yacuṃluṃlokyakhaြငya”siု’ rokyaraှိ
shā”pelima’yamaññya． (visuddhi-1-128． mahāṭī-1-156． tiု’kiု kaြñña’yapā．)
pītisambojjhaငya
kāya-vedanā-citta-dhamma amaññyaraso sati၏ taññyarā āruṃtiု’kiု āruṃpaြု၍ satisambojjhaငya，
dhammavicayasambojjhaငya， vīriyasambojjhaငyatarā”tiု’ thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyapoyalāaောငya kaြို”pamya”neso yogā0cara
puggiုlya၏ santānyavayya kilesā āmisamaှ kaငya”so nirāmisa amaññyaraso naှcyasakyavamya”maြောkyakhaြငya”
pītitarā”saññya thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyapoyalātatya၏． thiုpītisaññya satisambojjhaငya amaññyaraso satitarā”， dhamma
vicayasambojjhaငya amaññyaraso paññātarā”， vīriyasambojjhaငya amaññyaraso vīriyatarā” casañña’ya yaှñyaphakya
cityacetasikyasampayutyatarā”cutiု’naှင’ya cittakkhaṇatacyakhuathaငya”၌ atūyaှñyathaဲ၍ phaြcyapoyalāra၏．
1． thiုraှေ”raှေ”so pītisaññyalaññya”koငya”，
2． thiုpītinaှင’ya yaှñyathaဲphaြcyasañña’ya sati-paññā-vīriya caso cityacetasikya sampayutyatarā”cusaññya
laññya”koငya” ----
pītisambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīya dhamma = nokyanokyaso pītisambojjhaငyatarā”၏ phaြcyarāphaြcyakaြောငya”tarā”tiု’
maññyakunya၏． thiုthaငya raှေ”raှေ”so pītisambojjhaငyatarā”saññya nokyanokyaso pītisambojjhaငyatarā”၏
thū”kaဲso akaြောငya”tarā” tacyakhupaငya phaြcyapesaññya． thiုpītikiု siု’mahutya pītinaှင’ya takhaso sampayutya
tarā”cukiု phaြcyapoyalāaောငya naှluṃ”shaငya”khaြငya”saññyapaငya yonisomanasikāra maññya၏． phaြcyapoyalāaောငya
naှluṃ”shaငya”maှု hūsaññyamaှာlaññya” sati- dhammavicaya-vīriyasambojjhaငyatarā”tiု’၏ taññyarāāruṃphaြcyaso kāya-
vedanā-citta-dhamma amaññyaraso bhā0nāāruṅkiု akaြငyasiု’so akhaြငya”arāā”phaြင’ya naှluṃ”shaငya”neso
asaငyayogī sūtoyakoငya”ā” maphaြcyapoyalāse”so pītisambojjhaငyatarā”saññya phaြcyapoyalā၏，
phaြcyapoyalāpaြီ”so pītisambojjhaငyatarā”saññyalaññya” tiု”phā”lā၏． thiုkaဲ’siု’so akhaြငya”arāā”phaြင’ya
phaြcyaso naှluṃ”shaငya”khaြငya”saññya pītisambojjhaငyatarā”kiု siု’mahutya pītisambojjhaငyanaှင’ya takhaso sampayutya
tarā”cukiု phaြcyapoyalāaောငya naှluṃ”shaငya”khaြငya” (= uppādakamanasikāra) maññya၏． yaငya”uppādakamanasikāra
saññyapaငya yonisomanasikāra maññyapesaññya． (visuddhi-1-128． mahāṭī-1-156． paြññya-1-344-345．)
athū”saphaြင’ya yakhutaငyapaြneso apiုငya”kā” ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityakiု āruṃyū၍ pītisambojjhaငya

thiုsiု’kaြို”pamya”rā၌ maññyasiု’ kaြို”pamya”pāka pītisambojjhaငyatarā” phaြcyapoyalātatyapāsanaññya”hu satipaြုthā”pā．

yonisomanasikārapaငya phaြcyasaññya．
yaငya”yonisomanasikārakiု kaြိmyaphanyamaျာ”chā paြုlupyapā， kaြိmyaphanyamaျာ”chā phā”maျာ”pā． kaြိmyaphanyamaျာ”chā
phā”maျာ”thā”apyaso yaငya”yonisomanasikārakā” maphaြcyapoyalāse”so pītisambojjhaငyatarā”၏
phaြcyapoyalāranya， phaြcyapoyalāpaြီ”so pītisambojjhaငyatarā”၏ tiုငya”thakyaalhanya tiု”phā”ranya， bhā0nāñāṇya
paြñña’yacuṃlāranya akaြောငya”tarā”paငya phaြcyapesaññya．

thañña’yashaငya”၍ phoyapaြkhaဲ’khaြငya” phaြcyasaññya． ībojjhaငyatarā” phā”maျာ”puṃmaှာ pāḷitoyanaññya”sakyasakya phaြcyapāsaññya．

raှေ’siု’takyakhaြငya” casañña’ya thiုthiုsampajañya chiုငyarā raှုkhakyatiု’၌ raှseiု’ takyakhaြငya” casaññyatiု’kiု paြုlupyarāvayya

akaျို”raှိ၍ raှေ’siု’ takyakhaြငya” casaññyakiု paြုlupyarā၌ rāga-dosa-moha casañña’ya kilesāmaျာ”

raှိnekhaဲ’soya asappāya phaြcya၍ maraှိkhaဲ’soya sappāya phaြcya၏． yaငya” sappāya-asappāya toya-matoyakiု cū”camya”
chaငyakhaြငyalaျkya saင’yatoyasaññyakiုsā piုငya”khaြာ”yūtatyaso ñāṇyasaññya sappāyasampajañya maññya၏．

2． satilakyalhatyaneso puggiုlyatiု’kiု raှောငyakaြñyakhaြငya” ---- kaျီ”saññya tacyaphakyaso maျkyaciphaြင’ya acānaှင’ya
ranyasū naှcyamaျို”luṃ”kiု kaြñña’yatatya၏． siု’athakya thamaငya”khaဲkaဲ’siု’so acāapoya၌ khaျthā”apyaso kaျီ”kanya”၏
maျkyacisaññya thamaငya”khaဲ၌ chaဲkapyanekhiုkya nokyaka ranyasūkiု satimathā”mi raှိtatya၏． thaငyaraှာ”poyalhaငyaso
satilhatyakaငya”sañña’ya amūarātacyamaျို” phaြcya၏． satisambojjhaငyatarā”naှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃliုso sūtoyakoငya”
saññya thamaငya”khaဲ၌ khaျthā”apyaso maျkyaciraှိso kaျီ”naှင’ya tūkaြkunyaso mataññyaငြိmyaso cityadhātyaraှိsañña’ya
satikaငya”lhatyaneso puggiုlyatiု’kiု raှောငyakaြñyaramaññya phaြcyasaññya．
3． satikapya၍ taññyaneso sūtoyakoငya”tiု’kiု maှီvaဲ chaññya”kapyakhaြငya” ---- tissadattamatherya abhaya

lāphiု’ranya akaြောငya”tacyarapyapaငya phaြcyapesaññya．

2． phaြcyapoyapaြီ”so satisambojjhaငyatarā”၏ tiုငya”thakyaalhanya tiု”phā”ranya，
3． bhā0nāñāṇya၏ paြီ”paြñña’yacuṃlāranyaathakya ū”taññyalaျkya naှluṃ”shaငya” raှုphā”neramaññya phaြcyapesaññya．

dhammavicayasambojjhaငya phaြcyakaြောငya”tarā” (7) pā”
apica satta dhammā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti paripucchakatā， vatthuvisadakiriyā，
indaြိyasamattapaṭipādanā， duppaññapuggalaparivajjanā， paññavantapuggalase0nā， gambhīrañāṇacariyapaccavekkhaṇā，
tadadhimuttatāti． (visuddhi-1-128． ma-ṭṭha-1-294． dī-ṭṭha-2-376． saṃ-ṭṭha-3-193．)
1． paripucchakatā = khandhāacaraှိsaññyatiု’၌ sakyavaငya၍ me”maြnya”tatyakhaြငya”，
2． vatthuvisadakiriyā = athaငya”apaြငya vatthutiု’kiု sana’yaraှငya”aောငya paြုkhaြငya”，
3． indaြိyasamattapaṭipādanā = indaြေငါ”pā” ññīmaျှmaှုkiု paြီ”cī”cekhaြငya”，
4． duppaññapuggalaparivajjanā = paññāmaraှိso puggiုlyakiု raှောငyakaြñyakhaြငya”，
5． paññavantapuggalase0nā = paññāraှိsūtoyakoငya”kiု maှီvaဲchaññya”kapyakhaြငya”，
6． gambhīrañāṇacariyapaccavekkhaṇā = nakyanaဲso khandhācasaññyatiု’၌ phaြcyaso ñāṇya၏ athū”apaြာ”kiု chaငyakhaြငya
khaြငya”，
7． tadadhimuttatā = thiုdhammavicayasambojjhaငya phaြcyapoyalāranya chaဲchaဲmaြဲmaြဲ sakyavaငyaso cityathā”
ññhatyakiုငya”raှိုငya”so cityathā”raှိkhaြငya” ----
īkhunacyapā”tiု’kā” dhammavicayasambojjhaငya phaြcyapoyalāranya akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’ phaြcyakaြsaññya．
1． paripucchakatā ---- khandhā-āyatana-dhātya-indaြေ-biုlya-bojjhaငya-maggaငya-jhānaငya-samatha-
vipassanātarā” tiု’၏ anakyaadhippāyyakiု maှီso akaြောငya”arākiု sakyavaငya၍ me”maြnya”khaြငya”
maျာ”saññya၏ aphaြcyasaññya paripucchakatāmaññya၏． dhammavicayasambojjhaငyahūsaññya khandhācaso
paramatthadhammatiု’kiု cicacyatatyaso ñāṇyapaññātaññya”． yaငya”dhammavicayakā” amohaamaññyaraso
paññindaြေ cetasikyapaငyataññya”． yaငya”dhamma vicayapaññāsaññya ----
ka． khandhācaso paramatthadhammatiု’၏ kiုyyapiုငyasabhā0satti sabhā0lakkhaṇākiုlaññya” cicacyatatya၏．
kha． yaငya”paramatthadhammatiု’၏ kaြောငya”-kaျို” chakyanhayyamaှု sabhokiုlaññya” cicacyatatya၏．
ga． akaြောငya”tarā”naှင’ya takhaso yaငya”paramatthadhammatiု’၏ anicca-dukkha-anatta akhaြငya”arātiု’kiုlaññya”
cicacyatatya၏．
gha． magyañāṇya phiုlyañāṇya nibbānyatiု’kiုlaññya” cicacyatatya၏．
thiုkaြောင’ya khandhā-āyatana-dhātyacasaññyatiု’၏ anakyaadhippāyyakiု maှီso akaြောငya”arākiု sakyavaငya၍
me”maြnya”khaြငya”saññya dhammavicayasambojjhaငya၏ tiု”phā”kaြောငya”paငya phaြcyapesaññya． īappanākosallapiုငya”၌kā”
samathapiုငya”sā raှိnese”saphaြင’ya samathanaှင’yapatyasakyaso athū”saphaြင’ya ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityanaှင’ya patyasakya
so akhaြငya”arā akaြောငya”arānaှင’ya samādhithūthoငyapuṃ indaြññeīmaျှaောငya kaျငyapuṃcasañña’ya akaြောငya”arā
maျာ”kiု makaျhamya”kaျငyapāka kaျhamya”kaျငyalimmātoyamūkaြso sūtoyakoငya”maျာ”thaṃsiု’ khaျñya”kapya၍ me”maြnya”ramaññya
phaြcyapesaññya．

2． vatthuvisadakiriyā = athaငya”apaြငya vatthutiု’kiု sana’yaraှငya”aောငya paြုkhaြငya”，
3． indaြိyasamattapaṭipādanā = indaြေငါ”pā” ññīmaျှmaှုkiု paြီ”cī”cekhaြငya” ----
īnaှcyamaျို”kā” amaှtyatacyanaှင’ya amaှtyanaှcya appanākosallatarā”maျာ”paငya phaြcyasaññya． paြnyakaြñña’yapā．
samādhi naှင’ya paññā
vatthuvisadakiriyā indaြိyasamattapaṭipādanā saṅkhepato， vitthārato ca pakāsitā e0． tattha
pana samādhisaṃvattaniyabhāvena āgatā， idha paññāsaṃvattaniyabhāvena． yadaggena hi samādhisaṃvattanikā，
tadaggena paññāsaṃvattanikā samādhissa ñāṇapaccupaṭṭhānato． “samāhito yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”ti
vuttaṃ． (mahāṭī-1-156．)
athaငya”apavatthutiု’kiု sana’yaraှငya”aောငya paြုkhaြငya”naှင’ya indaြေငါ”pā”၏ ññīmaျှmaှုkiု paြီ”cī”cekhaြငya”kiု akaျñya”
ā”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya”， akaျyyaā”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya” raှငya”laငya” taငyapaြapyakhaဲ’paြီ”saññyasālaျှငya phaြcyapesaññya．
athū”kā” thiုpaြkhaဲ’paြီ”rāṭhāna၌ samādhikiု phaြcyacetatyasaññya၏ aphaြcyaphaြင’ya lā၏． ī dhammavicayasambojjhaငya
piုငya”၌kā” paññākiု phaြcyacetatyasaññya၏ aphaြcyaphaြင’ya lāraှိpesaññya． maှnyapesaññya akaြငyaaphiု’acuā”phaြင’ya
thiုtarā”naှcyamaျို”tiု’saññya (sana’yaraှငya”maှုnaှင’ya indaြññeīmaျှmaှု naှcyamaျို”tiု’saññya) samādhikiု phaြcyacetatyakunya၏， thiုaphiု’acu
ā”phaြင’ya paññākiုlaññya” phaြcyacetatyakunya၏． akaြောငya”kā” ---- samādhi၏ ñāṇyakiု raှေ”raှု phaြcyapoyacetatya
khaြငya”hūso ñāṇyalaျှငya phalapaccupaṭṭhānya (= akaျို”paccupaṭṭhānya) raှိsaññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’yataññya”． “taññyakaြññyaso
samādhiraှိso puggiုlyasaññya maphokyamapaြnya hutyatiုငya”maှnyachā khaဲkhaဲpaြာ”paြာ” si၏．” (saṃ-2-302． saṃ-3-363)
hu bhurā”raှငya hokaြာ”thā”toyamūpesaññya． (mahāṭī-1-156．)

6． gambhīrañāṇacariyapaccavekkhaṇā = nakyanaဲso khandhā casaññyatiု’၌ phaြcyaso ñāṇya၏ athū”apaြာ”kiု
chaငyakhaြငyakhaြငya” ----
gambhīrañāṇacariyapaccavekkhaṇā nāma gambhīresu khandhādīsu pavattāya gambhīrapaññāya pabhedapaccavekkhaṇā．
(ma-ṭṭha-1-296． dī-ṭṭha-2-378． saṃ-ṭṭha-3-195．)
ñeyaျdhammassa gambhīrabhā00sena tapparicchedakañāṇassa gambhīrabhāvaggahaṇanti āha“gambhīresu khandhādīsu
pavattāya gambhīrapaññāyā”ti． taṃ hi ñeyaျံ tādisāya paññāya caritabbato gambhīrañāṇacariyaṃ， tassā
vā paññāya tattha pabhedato pavatti gambhīrañāṇacariyā， tassā paccavekkhaṇāti āha “gambhīrapaññāya
pabhedapaccavekkhaṇā”ti． (ma-ṭī-1-386．)
gambhīrañāṇacariyapaccavekkhaṇāti gambhīrañāṇehi caritabbānaṃ khandhāyatanadhātādīnaṃ saccapaccayākārā-
didīpanānaṃ vā suññatāpaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ suttantānaṃ paccavekkhaṇā． (mahāṭī-1-156．)

khandhā-āyatana-dhātya-saccā-paṭiccasamuppādyasabhotarā”tiု’kā” alhanyanakyanaဲso ñeyaျ tarā”maျာ”
phaြcyakaြ၏． yogā0carapuggiုlyatiု’ thiု”thhaငya”simaြငyaramañña’ya yaငya”nakyanaဲso tarā”maျာ”kiု ñeyaျtarā”hu khoyachiု
pesaññya． yaငya” ñeyaျtarā”cu၏ nakyanaဲsañña’yaathakyakaြောင’ya yaငya” ñeyaျ tarā”cukiု piုငya”khaြာ”sitatyasañña’ya
piုငya”khaြာ”yūtatyasañña’ya ñāṇyasaññyalaññya” nakyanaဲso ñāṇyasā phaြcyara၏． thiုkaဲ’siု’ nakyanaဲso tarā”maျာ”kiု
thiုkaဲ’siု’ nakyanaဲso ñāṇyapaññāphaြင’yasālaျှငya rokyaapya raapya siapyaniုငyapesaññya． thiုkaဲ’siု’ nakyanaဲso
ñāṇyapaññā၏ thiုkaဲ’siု’ nakyanaဲso ñeyaျtarā”cu၌ sabhā0lakkhaṇā asī”asī”kiု thiု”thhaငya”simaြငyakhaြငya”，
sāmaññalakkhaṇākiု thiု”thhaငya”simaြငyakhaြငya” casaññyaphaြင’ya athū”thū” apaြာ”paြာ”ā”phaြင’ya phaြcyakhaြငya”saññya gambhīrañāṇacariya
maññya၏． thiုnakyanaဲso khandhā-āyatana-dhātya-saccā-paṭiccasamuppādyacasaññyatiု’၌ sabhā0lakkhaṇā sāmañña
lakkhaṇākiု thiု”thhaငya”simaြငyasaññya၏ achamya”phaြင’ya phaြcyapoyalāso nakyanaဲso ñāṇya၏ athū”apaြာ”kiု chaငya
khaြငyaso yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ santānya၌laññya” dhammavicayasambojjhaငyatarā”saññya phaြcyapoyalātatyapesaññya．
(ma-ṭṭha-1-296． ma-ṭī-1-386．)
nakyanaဲso ñāṇyapaññātiု’phaြင’ya kaျkyacā”apyakunyaso siု’mahutya nakyanaဲso ñāṇyapaññā raှိkaြkunya
so sūtoyakoငya”tiု’saññya kaျkyacā”apyakunyaso khandhā-āyatana-dhātya-saccā-paṭiccasamuppādya casañña’ya
sabhotarā”tiု’kiုlaññya”koငya”， saccāle”pā”， kaြောငya”-kaျို”-chakya paṭiccasamuppādyasabhotarā”casaññyatiု’kiု
thaငyaraှာ”phoyapaြtatyakunyaso， puggiုlya-sattavā-jī0-attamaှ chityasuñya”sañña’ya suññatāsabhotarā”naှင’ya capya
yaှñyakunyaso suttanyatiု’kiုsoyalaññya”koငya” chaငyakhaြငyape”pā． thiုsiု’ nakyanaဲso ñāṇyapaññāraှိkaြkunyaso
sūtoyakoငya”tiု’saññya kaျkyacā”apyakunyaso tarā”toyatiု’kiု chaငyakhaြငyape”khaဲ’soya maphaြcyapoyalāse”so
dhammavicaya sambojjhaငyatarā”saññyalaññya” phaြcyapoyalāpelima’yamaññya， phaြcyapoyalāpaြီ”so dhammavicayasambojjhaငyatarā”
saññyalaññya” tiုငya”thakyaalhanya tiု”phā”lāmaññya phaြcyapesaññya． (mahāṭī-1-156．)

maှုkiုsā aliုraှိapyapesaññya．
7． tadadhimuttatā = thiုdhammavicayasambojjhaငya phaြcyapoyalāranya chaဲchaဲmaြဲmaြဲ sakyavaငyaso cityathā” ññhatya
kiုငya”raှိုငya”so cityathā”raှိkhaြငya” ----

vīriyasambojjhaငya phaြcyakaြောငya”tarā” (11) pā”
1． apāyyabhe” casaññyakiု chaငyakhaြငyakhaြငya”raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya”，
2． vīriya၏ akaျို”ānisaငyakiု raှုmaြငyale’raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya”，
3． shā”apyaso lamya”kaြောငya”kiု chaငyakhaြငyakhaြငya”raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya”，
4． chhamya”kiု atuṃ’paြnya၍ pūjoyakhaြငya”raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya”，
5． amhechakyakhaṃramañña’ya sūtoyakoငya”uccā၏ maြင’yamaြtyamaှုkiု chaငyakhaြငyakhaြငya”raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya”，
6． charāphaြcyatoyamūso bhurā”raှငya၏ maြင’yamaြtyamaှုkiု chaငyakhaြငyakhaြငya”raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya”，
7． amaျို”jātya၏ maြင’yamaြtyamaှုkiု chaငyakhaြငyakhaြငya”raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya”，
8． sītaငya”suṃ”phoyatiု’၏ maြင’yamaြtyapuṅkiု chaငyakhaြငyakhaြငya”raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya”，
9． paျငya”risopuggiုlyakiု raှောငyakaြñyakhaြငya”raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya”，
10． ā”thutyaapyaso luṃ’lavīriyaraှိsūkiု maှီvaဲchaññya”kapyakhaြငya”raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya”，
11． vīriyasambojjhaငya phaြcyapoyalāphiု’ranya chaဲchaဲmaြဲmaြဲ sakyavaငyaso ññhatyakiုငya”raှိုငya”so cityadhātyaraှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya”
ī (11)pā”tiု’saññya vīriyasambojjhaငya phaြcyapoyalāranya akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’ phaြcyakaြ၏．
(ma-ṭṭha-1-297． dī-ṭṭha-2-378． saṃ-ṭṭha-3-195．)
««maှtyakhaျkya ---- visuddhimaggaaṭṭhakathā၌ amaျို”jātya၏ maြင’yamaြtyamaှုkiု chaငyakhaြငyakhaြငya”， sītaငya”suṃ”phoyatiု’၏
maြင’yamaြtyamaှုkiု chaငyakhaြငyakhaြငya” - naှcyamaျို” mapābhaဲ thinamiddhakiု payyaphaျောkyakhaြငya”， sammappadhānya၏ ānubhoyakiု chaငyakhaြငya
khaြငya” - naှcyamaျို”kiု yū၍ phhaင’yachiုthā”pesaññya． alhayyaā”phaြင’ya yaငya”naှcyamaျို”kiုpā thapyapoငya”soya vīriya
sambojjhaငyaphaြcyakaြောငya”tarā” (13)maျို”hu maှtyasā”pā．»»
1． apāyyabhe”casaññyakiု chaငyakhaြငyakhaြငya” raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya”
“ငraဲtiု’၌ ငါ”pā”apaြာ”raှိso naှောငyaphhaဲ’maှုhūso ññaှñya”panya”naှိpyacakyarāakhāmaှ ca၍ kaြီ”chāso chaငya”raဲdukkhakiု
khaṃcā”၍nerā akhaျိnyaakhākāla၌laññya”koငya”， tiracchānyatiု’၏ amaျို”jātya၌ phaြcyacañya khanyapacyakhaြငya” maြှုံ”khaျkhaြငya”
casañña’ya akhaြာ”sattavātiု’၏ luṃ’lapayogaphaြင’ya aphamya”khaṃyūapyarā akhaျိnyaakhā kāla၌laññya”koငya”， thiု
tiracchānyabha0vayya naှငyataṃ saṃchū” acaraှိsaññyatiု’phaြင’ya aputyakhatyakhaṃapya athiု”chhakhaṃapyalaျkya laှññya”vanyakiု runya”
choငya၍nerā acaraှိso akhaျိnyaakhākāla၌ laññya”koငya”， paြိttābhuṃbha0vayya paြိttāphaြcyacañya thoငyapoငya”
maျာ”chāso naှcyatiု’patyaluṃ”， naှcyachūso bhurā”raှငyatiု’၏ tacyakhuso akaြာ”kālahu khoyachiုapyaso buddhantara
asaṅkhaျyeျkapya kālapatyaluṃ”laññya” chāloငyakhaြငya” mhatyasipyakhaြငya”tiု’kaြောင’ya nākaျငyamaှု chaငya”raဲdukkhaphaြcya၍
nerā akhaျိnyaakhākāla၌laññya”koငya”， kālakañcika asurātiု’bha0၌ phaြcyacañya atoငya khaြောkyachayya
atoငya raှcyachayya atiုငya”araှññyaraှိso ariု”aremaျှsāraှိso khandhākiုyyaattabhophaြင’ya lepū nepū
casaññyatiု’kaြောင’ya phaြcyaso chaငya”raဲdukkhaamaျို”maျို”kiု khaṃcā”၍ nerarā akhaျိnyaakhāmaျို”၌laññya”koငya” vīriya
sambojjhaငyatarā”kiု phaြcyapoyalāranya kaြို”cā”ā”thutyakhaြငya”ငှာ machamya”niုငyakhaဲ’pe． amoငyarahanya” ...ī lūcaငyacacya
၌ rahanya”phaြcyakhiုkya akhaျိnyaakhāsaññyasā amoငyarahanya”၏ vīriyasambojjhaငyatarā”kiု phaြcyapoyalāaောငya
paြုlupyakhaြငya”၏ akhaျိnyaakhā kālakoငya”kaြီ”petaññya”” īsiု’laျှငya apāyyabhe”kiု chaငyakhaြငyaso puggiုlya၏
santānya၌laññya” vīriyasambojjhaငyatarā”saññya phaြcyapoyalāpesaññya．
(ma-ṭṭha-1-297． dī-ṭṭha-2-379． saṃ-ṭṭha-3-195．)

390
atityasaṃsarāvaṭyachaငya”raဲlaျှငya akaြောငya”raငya”raှိso paṭisandhenemaှု aိုmaှု nāmaှု semaှု dukkhanaှင’ya apāyya
vaṭyachaငya”raဲdukkha， anāgatyavaṭyachaငya”raဲlaျှငya akaြောငya”raငya”raှိso paṭisandhenemaှု aိုmaှု nāmaှု semaှု dukkhanaှင’ya
apāyyavaṭyachaငya”raဲdukkha， paccuppanya၌ āhārakiု raှာphherakhaြငya”laျှငya akaြောငya”raငya”raှိso dukkha -- īchaငya”raဲdukkha
amaျို”maျို”tiု’kiု chaငyakhaြငyasopuggiုlya၏ santānya၌laññya” vīriyasambojjhaငyatarā”saññya phaြcyapoyalāpesaññya．
(mahāṭī-1-157．)
2． vīriya၏ akaျို”ānisaငyakiု raှုmaြငyale’raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya” ----
cakyachupyaapyachā arārā၌ thana’yachutyanacyatatyaso cityadhātyaraှိso paျငya”riso puggiုlyasaññya lokī
jhānyasamāpatyatarā”maျာ”kiုlaññya”koငya”， kiု”pā”so lokuttarā tarā”thū” tarā”maြtyakiုlaññya”koငya”
raraှိkhaြငya”ငှာ matatyakoငya”pe． apaြငya”athanya kaြို”cā”ā”thutyaapyaso luṃ’lavīriyaraှိso puggiုlyasaññya
sālaျှငya lokījhānyasamāpatyatarā”maျာ”naှင’ya kiု”pā”so lokuttarā tarā”thū” tarā”maြtyakiု raraှိkhaြငya”ငှာ
tatyakoငya”pe၏， ī lokījhānyasamāpatya tarā”maျာ”naှင’ya lokuttarātarā”kiု”pā”hūso tarā”thū”
tarā”maြtyakiု raraှိkhaြငya”saññya vīriya၏ akaျို”ānisaငyapaငyataññya”hu īsiု’laျှငya vīriyanaှင’ya capyaso vīriyakaြောင’ya
raraှိniုငyaso lokī lokuttarāhūso vīriya၏ akaျို”kiု raှုmaြငyale’raှိso yogā0carapuggiုlya၏
santānya၌laññya” vīriyasambojjhaငyatarā”saññya phaြcyapoyalātatyapesaññya．
(visuddhi-1-128． ma-ṭṭha-1-297． mahāṭī-1-157．)
3． shā”apyaso lamya”kaြောငya”kiု chaငyakhaြငyakhaြငya”raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya” ----
ငါ”pā”sīlamaှ ca၍ gotaြbhutiုငyaaောငyaso samatha-vipassanā kaျင’yacañya arapyarapyasaññya ariyamagya၏
raှေ”aphiု’၌ kaျင’yaapyaso pubbabhāgapaṭipadā maññya၏． thiု pubbabhāgapaṭipadā amaññyaraso kaျင’yacañyanaှင’ya takha
nibbānyasiု’ rokyacetatyaso nibbānyasiု’ shā”rālamya”kaြောငya”phaြcyaso phaြူcaငyamaြင’yamaြtyaso ariyātiု’၏
maggaငyaraှcyapā” akaျင’yamaြtyatarā”saññya saṃsarāvaṭyachaငya”raဲdukkhamaှ kaျhatyaliု lhatyaliု thhakyamaြောkyaliုso rahanya”
toyaaphiု’ ekanyalaျှောkyashā”ramañña’ya ekanyakaျင’yaramañña’ya kaျင’yacañyapaṭipatyalamya”riု”kaြီ” phaြcyakhaြငya”kaြောင’ya gamanavīthi
maññya၏． thiုgamanavīthi amaññyaraso lamya”kā” aluṃ”cuṃso sabbaññusammāsambuddha bhurā”raှငya， aluṃ”cuṃso
paccekabuddha bhurā”raှငya， aluṃ”cuṃso mahāsā0katiု’saññya nibbānyasiု’ kaြhashā”toyamūkaြso kaျင’yacañya lamya”riု”
kaြီ”paငya phaြcyasaññya．
“amoငyarahanya” ...saငyasaññyakā” aluṃ”cuṃso sabbaññusammāsambuddhabhurā”raှငya， aluṃ”cuṃso paccekabuddha
bhurā”raှငya， noငyato’ya noငyatoya phaြcyatoyamūkaြkunyaso aluṃ”cuṃso mahāsā0katiု’saññya kaြhashā”toya
mūapyapaြီ”so lamya”kiု shā”thiုkya၏， thiုlamya”kiုlaññya” cakyachupyaapyachā arārā၌ thana’yatiုchutyanacyaso

4． chhamya”kiု atuṃ’paြnya၍ pūjoyakhaြငya” raှိsūphaြcyakhaြငya”

kaြkunya၏， īdāyakā dāyikāma lūsā”tiု’saññya saငya၏ chhemaျို”sā”khaျငya”tiု’laññya” mahutyakaြkunya， kaျေ”kaျhanya

ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”

nekaြkunya၏． bhurā”raှငyakalaññya” ]īငါ၏ sā”toyaphaြcyaso rahanya”saññya īpaccaññya”tiု’kiု bhuñya”pe” suṃ”

mahutyakunya． ahutyasoyakā” ]īငါ၏ sā”toyaphaြcyaso rahanya”saññya īpaccaññya”tiု’kiု bhuñya”pe” suṃ”choငya
laျkya pariyatya - paṭipatya = samatha-vipassanābhā0nāhu khoyachiုapyaso rahanya”tarā”kiု kaျင’yakaြံkaြို”kutya
phā”maျာ”ā”thutya၍ saṃsarāvaṭyachaငya”raဲ dukkhathaငya”kaြီ”maှ makhaျhatyaekanya lhatyamaြောkyapelima’yamaññya}hu īsiု’
koငya”chā maြောyamaြငyatoyamūsaññyaphaြcya၍ saင’yaā” paccaññya”le”pā”tiု’kiု khhaင’yapaြုtoyamūapyakunyapaြီ， thiုsaငyasaññya
yakhuakhā၌ arārā၌ cakyachupyaapyachā arārā၌ thana’yatiုchatyanacyaso cityadhātyaraှိlaျkya paျငya”risaññya phaြcya၍
nelatyasoya thiုchhamya”kiု siု’mahutya thiုchhamya”kiု ū”taññya၍ satyamaှtyathā”apyaso paccaññya”le”pā”kiု tuṃ’laှñña’ya
tacyaphanya paြnyalaññya၍ pūjoyaniုငyalima’yamaññya mahutya． maှnyapesaññya apaြငya”athanya kaြို”cā”ā”thutyaapyaso
luṃ’lavīriyaraှိso puggiုlya၏sālaျှငya chhamya”kiု atuṃ’paြnya၍ pūjoyakhaြငya”maññyasaññya phaြcyaniုငya၏．” ---- īsiု’ chhamya”kiု
atuṃ’paြnya၍ pūjoyakhaြငya”kiု chaငyakhaြငyaso yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ santānya၌laññya” ayaျmittamatheryamaြtyakaြီ”၏
santānya၌kaဲ’siု’ vīriyasambojjhaငyatarā”saññya thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyapoyalātatyapesaññya． (ma-ṭṭha-1-297．)
rahanya”hūsaññya raṭṭhapiṇḍaamaññyarasañña’ya tiုငya”sūpaြññyasā”tiု’၏ chhamya”kiု suṃ”choငyanerasū phaြcya၏． paccaya
dāyakāhūso amaññyakiု raraှိkaြkunyaso alaှူraှငyaapoငya”tiု’၏ mimiapoya၌ paြုlupyaapyaso koငya”maှု
kusiုlya၏ mimi rahanya”toya၏ pariyatya - paṭipatya = samatha-vipassanābhā0nāhu khoyachiုapyaso koငya”mhanya
maှnyakanyaso kaျင’yavatyapaṭipatyaphaြင’yasā kaြီ”kaျyyaphhaṃ’phaြို”maျာ”maြtyaso akaျို”raှိmaှုkiု paြုlupya၍ pe”niုငya၏． thiုsiု’
paြုlupyape”khaြငya”phaြင’ya chhamya”kiု atuṃpaြnya၍ pūjoyakhaြငya”saññya piṇḍapātāpacāyana maññyapesaññya． (ma-ṭī-1-386．)
īaphhaင’yamaျာ”ara mimiā” chhamya”acaraှိso laှူ phhayyavatthu acucutiု’phaြင’ya paြုculupyakaျhe”nekaြkunyaso
alaှူraှငyaapoငya”tiု’၏ koငya”maှုkusiုlyatarā”၏ kaြီ”kaျyyaphhaṃ’phaြို” maျာ”maြtyaso akaျို”tarā”maျာ”kiု phaြcya
thhanya”poyapokyalāceliုso sammāchandadhātya kinya”vapyakhaဲ’pāmū asaငyayogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya sīla-samādhipaññā
sikkhāsuṃ”rapya akaျင’yamaြtyaphaြင’ya simya”kaျုံ”rethakyaapyaso sammāpaṭipatya amaññyarasañña’ya koငya”mhanya
maှnyakanyaso kaျင’yavatyapaṭipatyakiု riုsechā phaြñña’yakaျင’yalerāsaññya．
ayaျmittamatheryamaြtyakaြီ”
ayaျmittamatheryamaြtyakaြီ”kā” kassakaliုṇyaamaññyaraso liုṇyagū၌ sītaငya”suṃ”nethiုငyatoyamū၏．
thiုayaျmittamatheryamaြtyakaြီ”၏ chhamya”khaṃrhā၌laññya” upāsikāmakaြီ”tacyaū”saññya matheryamaြtyakaြီ”kiု sā”raငya”
paြု၍ sā”hūso amaှtyasaññā sā”raငya”hūso cityathā”phaြင’ya chhamya”acaraှိso laှူphhayyavatthuphaြင’ya paြုcu
lupyakaျhe”ne၏． thiုupāsikāmakaြီ”saññya tacyane’sa၌ tosiု’ shā”khānī”latyasoya samī”phaြcyasūkiု - “khaျcyasamī”
thiုmaññyaso arapya၌ naှcyakhaျို’chanyatiု’ raှိkaြkunya၏， thiုmaññyaso arapya၌ thopatyaraှိ၏， thiုmaññyaso arapya၌
nhā”niု’ raှိ၏， thiုmaññyaso arapya၌ taငyalaဲ raှိ၏， saငyakhaျcyasamī”၏ acyakiုkaြီ”phaြcyaso ayaျmittamatheryamaြtyakaြီ”
kaြhalātoyamūrāakhā၌ chhamya”kiု khaျkya၍ nhā”niု’ thopatya taငyalaဲtiု’naှင’ya atūtakha pe”laှူliုkyapā， saငya
khaျcyasamī”laññya” cā”pā， ငါ mikhaငyasaññyakā” yamanyane’ ññaneka khaျkyathā”paြီ”liု’ kaျnyanesañña’ya thamaငya”kaြmya”kiု
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
392
paaုံ”raññya (puṃ”raññya) naှင’ya ronaှော၍ cā”paြီ”lepaြီ” - hu īsiု’ maှာkaြာ” paြောchiုne၏．
samī”phaြcyasūka “mikhaငya ne’akhā abhayyakiု cā”maññyanaññya””hu me”soakhā “khaျcyasamī” haငya”rhakyamaျာ”
thañña’ya၍ chanyakhaဲtiု’phaြင’ya khaျñyaso baြုံ”capyayāgukiု kaျိုkhaျkyathā”liုkyapā”hu maှာkaြာ”paြောchiုne၏．
thiုakhaျိnyathaငya ayaျmitta kiုyyatoyamaြtyakaြီ”saññyakā” paṇṇasāla amaññyaraso sacyarhakyamiု” kaျောငya”
ငyyatacyakhu၏ taṅkhā”0၌ rapyataññyalaျkya chhamya”khaṅkaြhatoyamūranyaathakya saṅkanya”maျာ”ruṃlaျkya sapityaaိtyamaှ sapityakiု
thutyachoငyanekhiုkya phaြcya၏． matheryamaြtyakaြီ”kā” thiုakhaျိnyathaငya lokīabhiññāṇyaငါ”pā”kiု raraှိthā”toya
mūpaြီ”sañña’yaathakya matheryamaြtyakaြီ”saññya dibbasota abhiññāṇyakiု vaငyacā”toyamūlaျkya raှိ၏， thiုdibbasota
abhiññāṇyaphaြင’ya thiုupāsikāmakaြီ”ka samī”phaြcyasūā” maှာkaြာ”paြောchiုneso cakā”saṅkiု kaြာ”၍ mimi
kiုyyakiု mimi īsiု’ chiုchuṃ”ma၏． ... ««cakā”machuṃ”se”pā．»» (ma-ṭṭha-1-298． ma-ṭī-1-386．)
««maှtyakhaျkya ---- anuṭīkā၌ lāraှိso aphhaင’yatacyamaျို”

athakyapā anuṭīkā၌kā” ---- “totoငya arapya၌ sacyapaငya khaျုံputya toraှုpyatiု’ khaြာ”khayya၍ nepya

chiုchuṃ”mapuṃ
“upāsikāmakaြီ”saññya paaုံ”raññyaphaြင’ya yamanyane’ ññakhaျmya”ka kaျnyanesañña’ya thamaငya”kaြmya”kiု cā”paြီ”sataဲ’，
ne’akhā၌laññya” chanyakhaဲ haငya”rhakyatiု’phaြင’ya kaျိုkhaျkyathā”apyaso khaျñyaso baြုံ”capyayāgukiု cā”lima’yamaññyataဲ’，
saငya၏ akaျို”ငှာkā” naှcyakhaျို’chanya casaññyatiု’kiု cīmaṅkhaျkyapaြုtya laှူdānya”ranya paြောpaြne၏， saင’yakiု amaှီpaြု၍ ī
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
393
upāsikāmakaြီ”saññya layyakiု toင’yatasaññyalaññya” mahutya， yākiု toင’yatasaññyalaññya” mahutya， thamaငya”kiု
toင’yatasaññyalaññya” mahutya， avatyakiု toင’yatanesaññyalaññya” mahutya， ahutyasoyakā” lū-natya-nibbānya
suṃ”tanyaso khaျmya”sā caññya”cimyatiု’kiု liုlā”toင’yatalaျkya pe”laှူraှာ၏， saငyasaññya īupāsikāmakaြီ”
ā” thiု lū-natya-nibbānya suṃ”tanyaso caññya”cimyakhaျmya”sātiု’kiု pe”khaြငya”ငှာ chamya”niုငyalattaṃ’lo， machamya”niုငyalattaṃ’
lohu mimikiုyyakiု mimi me”khhanya”thutyakaြñña’ya၏． (chiုliုsaññyamaှာ saင’yaapoya၌ paြုlupyaneso dānamaya
kusiုlyakaṃ， veyaျာvaccamayakusiုlyakaṃ， koငya”maှုtaññya”hūso maျို”ce’၏ kaြဲkhaျciုkyapaျို”rā layyayāmaြkeoငya”
saphhayya phaြcyaso anuttarapuññakhetta amaññyaraso saငyakaဲ’siု’so saṅghāratanāhūso khetyathū” khetya
maြtyakaြီ”kiု chaññya”kapyarakhaြငya” taññya”hūso kusiုlyakaṃ - īkusiုlyakaṃ arapyarapyakaြောင’ya saṃsarākharī”vayya
kaျငyalaññyakhiုkya၌ lū’caññya”cimya natyacaññya”cimyatiု’kiုlaññya”koငya”， achuṃ”၌ nibbānyacaññya”cimya khaျmya”sāmaြtyakaြီ”kiု
laññya”koငya” pe”khaြငya”ငှာ chamya”niုငyalattaṃ’lohu matheryakaြီ”saññya mimikiုyyakiု mimi me”maြnya”nekhaြငya” phaြcya၏．)
tacyaphanya --- īchhamya”kiု rāgatanya”lanya”naှင’ya takhaso dosatanya”lanya”naှင’ya takhaso， mohatanya”lanya”
naှင’ya takhaso saငyakaဲ’siု’so puggiုlyasaññya makhaṃyūthiုkyato’pe”hu īsiု’laျှငya mimikiုyyakiု mimi chiုchuṃ”ma
lepaြီ．
īsiု’ chuṃ”mapaြီ”၍ sapityakiု sapityaaိtya၌ paြnyathañña’ya၍ tapyaapyapaြီ”so saṅkanya”anā”patyasī”kiု
phaြေ၍ thiုpaṇṇasāladhārahūso sacyarhakyamiု”kaျောငya”taṅkhā”0maှ nokyakaြောငya”paြnyachutyakhaဲ’၍ kassakaliုṇyasiု’
sālaျှငya kaြhashā”toyamū၍ sapityakiု ññoငyacoငya”aောkya၌ thā”laျkya saṅkanya”kiု saṅkanya”tanya”vā”poya၌
taငyalhaှာ”paြီ”laျှငya ---- “arahattaṃ apāpuṇithā na nikkhamissāmi = arahattaphiုlyasiု’ marokyamakhaျငya” kassaka
liုṇyaathaငya”maှ mathhakyato’aṃ’” - īsiု’ maြဲmaြံchā vīriyakiု chokyataññya၍ thiုငyatoyamūlepaြီ． raှññyamaြင’yachā
so akhaျိnyaakhākālapatyaluṃ” mame’malaျော’khaြငya” appamādatarā” lakyakiုငyathā”laျkya vipassanābhā0nā
kammaṭṭhānya”kiု naှluṃ”shaငya”၍ nethiုငyakhaဲ’so rahanya”toyasaññya vipassanāñāṇyakiု raင’yakaျkyaaောငya tiု”phā”ce
khaဲ’saññyaraှိsoya chhamya”၏ raှေ”aphiု’hu khoyachiုapyaso naṃnakyapiုငya” akhaျိnyaakhākāla၌paငya arahattaphiုlyasiု’
chiုkyarokyatoyamūsaññya phaြcya၍ taင’yatayyacampayyachā phaင’yalanya”laျkyaraှိso padummākaြာpanya”kaဲ’siု’ kilesā
āsavo alaျှောkaြီ” laျှော akunyakaြီ” kunyatoyamūso mahākhīṇāsa0 amaññyaratoyamūsañña’ya rahantā

rayūkhaြငya”ငှာ machamya”niုငyape． loka၌ kiုyyakaျင’yatarā” phokyapaြnyapaျkyacī”neso sā”kiု mibhatiု’ka --“īsū
saññya ငါtiု’၏sā” mahutya”- hu sā”aphaြcyamaှ chana’yalhaှtyamaှုkiု paြုkaြkunya၏， thiုsā”saññya thiုmibhatiု’ khayyalhanyarā
akhā၌ amhekiု maraniုငyasakaဲ’siု’ ī upamāatūpaငya paျငya”riso sūsaññyalaññya” thiုpaျငya”rimaှုhūso akaြောငya”
kaြောင’yapaငyalaျှငya maggaငyaraှcyapā” akaျင’yamaြtyatarā”taññya”hūso koငya”mhanyamaှnyakanyasañña’ya sammāpaṭipatyakaျင’yacañya
kiု makaျင’yakhaဲ’soya phakhaငyaphaြcyatoyamūso bhurā”raှငyathaṃmaှ rasaင’yarathiုkyaso ariyauccā khunacyaphaြာhūso amhe
kiု mararaှိniုငyape． apaြငya”athanya kaြို”cā”ā”thutyaapyaso sammappadhānya luṃ’lavīriya raှိso puggiုlyasaññya
sālaျှငya ī ariyauccā khunacyaphaြာhūso amhekiု raraှိniုငya၏hu īsiု’laျှငya mimichakyakhaṃramañña’ya amhe၏ maြင’yamaြtya
saññya၏ aphaြcyakiု chaငyakhaြငyakhaြငya”raှိso puggiုlya၏ santānya၌laññya” vīriyasambojjhaငyatarā”saññya thaငyaraှာ” phaြcyapoya

maငya”maျို”， puṇṇā”maျို”， sūṭhe”sūkaြhayya kunyasaññyamaျို”， sūchaငya”raဲmaျို”hūso amaျို”le”pā”tiု’thaငya maññyasañña’ya
amaျို”anhayyamaှ machiု bhurā”raှငya၏ sāsanātoyathaငya”၌ raှငyarahanya”paြုlāsosū maှnyasamaျှsaññya raှငyarahanya”
aphaြcyasiု’ kapyarokyaliုkyasaññyanaှင’ya tacyapaြိုငyanakya sākīvaငyamaငya”sā” bhurā”sā”toyaaphaြcya mhe”phhā”lārakhaြငya”
paငya phaြcyapesaññya． saငyasaññya ---- amaျို”jātyaā”phaြင’yalaññya” rahanya”paြုpaြီ”rā īyakhuakhā၌ yutyaññaṃ’so
amaျို”jātya raှိsūkā” mahutyato’pe． akhaြာ”akhaြာ”so amaျို”jātyatiု’naှင’ya maromacapyaso asambhinna
khattiyajātyaphaြcyasañña’ya mahāsammata maငya”chakyamaှ chaငya”sakyalāso ukkākamaငya”၏ anhayya၌phaြcyaso suddhodhana
mahārājānaှင’ya mahāmāyādevītiု’၏ maြေ”toyaphaြcyaso araှငyarāhulā၏ ññītoyataññya”， saငyasaññya īsiု’
sabhoraှိso bhurā”sā”toya phaြcyapālaျkya bhā0nālupyaငnya”khhaငyamaှ ave”kaြီ” ve”laျkya thana’yatiုchutyanacya
so cityadhātyaraှိsañña’ya paျငya”risūtacyayokya aphaြcyaphaြင’ya sāsanātoya၌ nethiုငyakhaြငya”ငှာ masaင’yatoyalaှpehu

saññya thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyapoyalāniုငyape၏． (ma-ṭṭha-1-299． saṃ-ṭṭha-3-198． ma-ṭī-1-387．)

tiု’saññya kaျောkyatoငyakaြီ”pamā maြဲkhiုငyalaှchāso samādhinaှင’yayaှñyaso cityadhātya， kaြို”cā”ā”thutyamaှု luṃ’la

mashā”lattaṃ’lelohu īsiု’laျှငya sītaငya”suṃ”phoya phaြcyatoyamūkaြkunyaso araှငyakoငya” araှငyamaြtyatiု’၏
maြင’yamaြtyapuṅkiု chaငyakhaြငyaso puggiုlya၏ santānya၌laññya” vīriyasambojjhaငyatarā”saññya thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyapoyalāniုငya၏．

9． paျငya”riso puggiုlyakiု raှောငyakaြñyakhaြငya”raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya” ----
vamya”biုkyakiု paြñña’yace၍ taññyaneso capā”kaြီ”maြhenaှင’ya tūkaြkunyaso， chana’yalhaှtyathā”apyaso kāyika

pītisambojjhaငya phaြcyakaြောငya”tarā” (11) pā”
1． bhurā”၏ guṇyatoyakiု aphanyaphanya amaှtyaraphā”maျာ”khaြငya” buddhānussati，
2． tarā”toya၏ guṇyatoyakiု aphanyaphanya amaှtyaraphā”maျာ”khaြငya” dhammānussati，
3． ariyāsaṅghātoya၏ guṇyatoyakiု aphanyaphanya amaှtyaraphā”maျာ”khaြငya” saṅghānussati，
4． mimisīla၏ makaျို”mapokyakhaြငya” caso guṇyakiု aphanyaphanya amaှtyaraphā”maျာ”khaြငya” sīlānussati，

6． natyatiု’၏ saddhātarā” acaraှိsaññyakiု sakyaserā၌ thā”၍ mimi၏ saddhātarā” casaññyakiု aphanyaphanya
amaှtyaraphā”maျာ”khaြငya” de0tānussati，

ī (11)pā”kunyaso akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’saññya pītisambojjhaငyatarā” thaငyaraှာ” phaြcyapoyalāphiု’ranya
akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’ phaြcyakaြkunya၏． (visuddhi-1-129． dī-ṭṭha-2-382． ma-ṭṭha-1-300． saṃ-ṭṭha-3-198．)
1． buddhānussati = bhurā”raှငya၏ guṇyatoyakiု aphanyaphanya amaှtyarakhaြငya” ----
bhurā”raှငya၏ guṇyatoyatiု’kiု aphanyaphanya athapyathapya amaှtyaraneso buddhānussatibhā0nākammaṭṭhānya”kiု
phā”maျာ” ā”thutyalaျkyaraှိso yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ santānya၌ upacārabhā0nātiုငyaaောငya upacārasamādhi
chiုkyaaောငya phā”maျာ”ā”thutyakhaဲ’pāmū tacyakiုyyaluṃ”kiု phaြna’yalaျkya pītisambojjhaငyatarā”saññya thaငyaraှာ” phaြcyapoya
lāniုငya၏． (dī-ṭṭha-2-382． ma-ṭṭha-1-300． saṃ-ṭṭha-3-198．)
chiုliုsaññyamaှာ īsiု’ phaြcya၏． bhurā”raှငya၏ guṇyatoyatiု’kiု āruṃpaြု၍ upacārasamādhi chiုkyaaောငya
phā”maျာ” ā”thutyaapyaso bhā0nākusiုlyajocitya acañyakaြောင’ya phaြcyapoyalākaြkunyaso mhanyamaြtyaso
paṇītacittajarupyatiု’saññya tacyakiုyyaluṃ”siု’ paျံ’laျkya naှံ’laျkya taphhā”phhā” achakyamapaြtya phaြcyaphā”nekaြ၏． thiု
manodhārika mahākusiုlyajovīthi cityaacañyamaျာ”hu khoyachiုapyaso bhā0nākusiုlyacityatiုငya” cityatiုငya”
thaငya pītipāvaငyalaျkya raှိ၏， pītiyaှñyathaဲlaျkya raှိ၏， thiု pītisaññyalaññya” bhurā”raှငya၏ guṇyatoyakiုpaငya āruṃ
yūlaျkya raှိ၏． thiုkaြောင’ya bhurā”raှငya၏ guṇyatoyamaျာ”ka pītisambojjhaငyatarā” thaငyaraှာ” phaြcyapoyalāaောငya
ārammaṇapaccayasattiphaြင’ya kaျေ”jū”paြုpe”laျkya raှိkhaြငya”kaြောင’ya bhurā”raှငya၏ guṇyatoyakiု aphanyaphanya athapyathapya
aောkyame’khaြငya” buddhānussatibhā0nāsaññya pītisambojjhaငyatarā” thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyapoyalākhaြငya”၏ akaြောငya”tacyakhu
phaြcyarapesaññya． thiုbhurā”raှငya၏ guṇyatoyakiု āruṃpaြုneso pītinaှင’ya yaှñyathaဲlaျkyaraှိso bhā0nā kusiုlya
cityakaြောင’ya mhanyamaြtyaso paṇītacittajarupyatiု’၏ tacyakiုyyaluṃ” anaှံ’apaြာ” achakyamapaြtya phaြcyaphā”nekhaြငya”
kiုpaငya pītisambojjhaငyatarā”saññya tacyakiုyyaluṃ”kiု phaြna’yalaျkya phaြcyapoyalā၏hu aṭṭhakathāmaျာ” mina’yachiုtoya
mūkaြkhaြငya” phaြcyasaññyahu maှtyapā． akaြောငya”mū thiုbuddhānussatibhā0nācityasaññyalaññya”koငya”， thiုbhā0nācitya
naှင’ya yaှñyathaဲlaျkyaraှိso pītisaññyalaññya”koငya” hadayavatthurupyakiုsā maှီthayya၍ phaြcyapoyaniုငyasokaြောင’ya
phaြcyapesaññya． ««buddhānussati casaññyatiု’saññya appanājhānyakiု machoငyaniုငya maraniုငyakhaြငya”kaြောင’ya yā0 upacārā =
