thā”pāle． īkā” pāḷitoyanaññya”ara takyakaြhatunyalaှုpyalaျkya maငြိmyamasakya paျံ’lhaင’yaneso cityakiု naှိpyakhapyapuṃ
acīaraငyataññya”． yakhutacyaphanya aṭṭhakathānaññya”ara takyakaြhatunyalaှုpyaneso cityadhātyakiု naှိpyakhapyapuṃ acī
araငyakiု chakyalakya၍ phoyapaြapyapāsaññya．
passaddhisambojjhaငya phaြcyakaြောငya”tarā” (7) pā”
apica satta dhammā passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti paṇītabhojanase0natā， utusukhase0natā，
iriyāpathasukhase0natā， majjhattapayogatā， sāraddhakāyapuggalaparivajjanatā， passaddhakāya-
puggalase0natā， tadadhimuttatāti． (visuddhi-1-130． dī-ṭṭha-2-382． ma-ṭṭha-1-300-301． saṃ-ṭṭha-3-199．)
1． mhanyamaြtyaso bhojañyakiု maှီvaဲrakhaြငya”raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya”，
2． miminaှင’ya laျောkyapatya၍ khaျmya”sācetatyaso utukiု maှီvaဲrakhaြငya”raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya”，
3． miminaှင’ya laျောkyapatya၍ khaျmya”sācetatyaso iriyāputhyakiု maှီvaဲkhaြငya”raှိsūphaြcyakhaြငya”，
4． alayyaalatya၌ taññyakhaြငya”sabhoraှိso payogaraှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya”，
5． pūpanyaso kiုyyacityaraှိso puggiုlyakiု raှောငyakaြñyakhaြငya”raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya”，
6． ငြိmya”aေ”so kiုyyacityaraှိso puggiုlyakiု maှီvaဲkhaြငya”raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya”，
7． thiု passaddhi sambojjhaငyatarā” thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyapoyalāphiု’ranya chaဲchaဲmaြဲmaြဲ sakyavaငyaso ññhatyakiုငya”raှိုငya”so
cityadhātyaraှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya” ----
ītarā”khunacyapā”tiု’saññya passaddhisambojjhaငyatarā”၏ thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyapoyalāphiု’ranya akaြောငya”tarā”maျာ”
phaြcyakaြpesaññya．
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
408
1． paṇītabhojanase0natā = mhanyamaြtyaso bhojañyakiု maှီvaဲkhaြငya”raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya” ----
mimikhandhākiုyya၏ lakyaraှိ tarā”ā”thutyakhaျိnya၌ taññyaraှိnepuṃ akhiုkyaatana’yakiု si၍ atiုငya”araှññya
ā”phaြင’ya suṃ”choငyaapyaso āhāradhātyapaြñña’ya0so achīojāraှိso miminaှင’yasappāyamaျှso mhanyamaြtya
so āhārasaññya kiုyyalakyapo’pā”khaြငya” kiုyyalakyanū”ññaṃ’khaြငya” khandhāaိmya၏ bhā0nālupyaငnya”khhaငyanaှင’ya akhaျို”
kaျ achaငyapaြkheြငya” casaññyatiု’kiု phaြcyacesaphaြင’ya cityacetasikyatiု’၏ ငြိmya”aေ”maှု passaddhi sambojjhaငyatarā”၏
thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyapoyalāphiု’ranya akaြောငya”tarā” phaြcyarapesaññya． (mahāṭī-1-158．)
2． utusukhase0natā = miminaှင’ya laျောkyapatya၍ khaျmya”sācetatyaso utukiု maှီvaဲrakhaြငya”raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya” -
sītautu = aaေ”utu， uṇaှutu = apūututiု’thaငya miminaှင’ya sappāyamaျှtaso utukiု maှီvaဲraso
yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ santānyavayya kiုyyalakyapo’pā”khaြငya” kiုyyacityatiု’nū”ññaṃ’khaြငya” kiုyyacityatiု’၏ bhā0nālupya
ငnya”khhaငyanaှင’ya akhaျို”kaျ achaငyapaြkheြငya” casaññyatiု’kiု thiုutuka phaြcyaceniုငya၏． thiုutuka ā”kaြီ”so maှီrā upa
nissayasattiphaြင’ya kaျေ”jū”paြုpe”laျkyaraှိ၏． siု’athakya miminaှင’ya laျောkyapatya၍ khaျmya”sācetatyaso utukiု
maှီvaဲrakhaြငya”raှိso yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ santānya၌laññya” passaddhisambojjhaငyatarā” thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyaphā”lārapesaññya．
(ma-ṭṭha-1-301． mahāṭī-1-158．)
3． iriyāpathasukhase0natā = miminaှင’yalaျောkyapatya၍ khaျmya”sācetatyaso iriyāputhyakiု maှီvaဲkhaြငya”raှိsū
phaြcyakhaြငya” ----
laျောငya”-thiုငya-rapya-shā” le”pā”so iriyāputhyatiု’thaငya maျှtaso iriyāputhyakiု maှီvaဲkhhaင’yaraso
yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ santānyavayya mimimaှီvaဲapyaso maျှtaso iriyāputhyaka kiုyyalakyapo’pā”khaြငya” kiုyya
citya nū”ññaṃ’khaြငya” kiုyyacityatiု’၏ bhā0nālupyaငnya”khhaငyanaှင’ya akhaျို”kaျachaငyapaြkheြငya” casaññyatiု’kiု phaြcyacesaphaြင’ya
thiုmaျှtaso iriyāputhyasaññya cityacetasikyatiု’၏ ငြိmya”aေ”maှု passaddhisambojjhaငyatarā”၏ thaငyaraှာ” phaြcyaphā”
lāphiု’ranya akaြောငya”tarā” phaြcyarapesaññya． (mahāṭī-1-158．)
akaြငya puggiုlyasaññyakā” mahāpurisa amaññyarasañña’ya yokyaျာ”maြtyajātya raှိsū phaြcya၍ aluṃ”cuṃso
utu aluṃ”cuṃso iriyāputhya၌ khaṃniုငyaraññyaraှိsaññyasā phaြcya၏． thiုmahāpurisa amaññyarasañña’ya yokyaျာ”maြtya
jātyaraှိsañña’ya puggiုlyamaျို”kiု raññyarhayya၍ īsappāyaphaြcyaso khaျmya”sācetatyaso utukiု maှီvaဲramaှုraှိkhaြငya”， sappāya
maျှso khaျmya”sācetatyaso iriyāputhyakiု maှီvaဲramaှုraှိkhaြငya”hūso cakā”rapyakiု paြောchiုnesaññyakā”
mahutyape． akaြငya yogā0carapuggiုlyatacyaū”aphiု’ maျှtaso sabhāgautu， maျှtaso sabhāgairiyāputhya，
mamaျှtaso visabhāgautu， mamaျှtaso visabhāgairiyāputhyahū၍ naှcyamaျို” raှိne၏， thiုpuggiုlyamaျို”saññyasālaျှငya
mamaျှtakunyaso visabhāgaphaြcyakunyaso utu iriyāputhyatiု’kiု raှောငyakaြñya၍ maျှtakunyaso sabhāga phaြcyakunya
so utu iriyāputhyatiု’kiု maှီvaဲkhaဲ’soya thiုpuggiုlya၏ santānya၌ passaddhisambojjhaငyatarā” thaငyaraှာ” phaြcyapoya
lāniုငyapesaññya． (dī-ṭṭha-2-383． ma-ṭṭha-1-301． saṃ-ṭṭha-3-199．)
īathakyapā ---- (1) bhojanasappāya = maျှtasobhojañya， (2) utusappāya = maျှtaso utu，
(3) iriyāpathasappāya = maျှtaso iriyāputhyahūso suṃ”maျို”so sappāya (= maျှtamaှု) kiု maှီvaဲramaှုsaññya
khandhākiုyya၏ samatha vipassanā bhā0nāmaှု၌ khaṃ’ññā”maှု akhaျို”kaျ achaငyapaြmeှုkiု paြီ”cī”cesaññya၏ achamya”phaြင’ya
citya၏ bhā0nāmaှု၌ khaṃ’ññā”maှု akhaျို”kaျ achaငyapaြmeှုkiုpā rhakyachoငyape”laျkya raှိrakā” kāyapassaddhi =
cetasikyatiု’၏ ငြိmya”aေ”maှု， cittapassaddhi = citya၏ ငြိmya”aေ”maှုhūso passaddhinaှcyamaျို”luṃ”၏ akaြောငya”tarā”
phaြcyarapesaññya． (saṃ-ṭī-2-437-438．)
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
409
4． majjhattapayogatā = alayyaalatya၌ taññyakhaြငya”sabhoraှိso payogaraှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya” ----
mimi၏laññya”koငya” sūtacyapā”၏laññya”koငya” kaṃsālaျှငya mimikiုyyapiုငyauccāraှိsaññya၏ aphaြcyakiု chaငyakhaြငya
khaြငya”kiု majjhattapayoga = alayyaalatya၌ taññyakhaြငya”sabhoraှိso payogahū၍ khoyachiုapyapesaññya．
sattavātiု’ raraှိkhaṃcā”apyaso khaျmya”sāchaငya”raဲ (= sukha dukkha) ava0saññya ahetuka (= akaြောငya”maraှိ ) hu
chaဲyūso īayūachasaññyalaññya” achanya”tacyaphakya phaြcya၏． aciု”rasū = issara， mahābaြhmā casaññyatiု’
phanyachaငya”၍ phaြcyapoyalārasaññyahu mūmamaှnyaso akaြောငya”tarā”raှိmaှုkiု chaဲlamya”yuṅkaြññyaso īayūacha
saññyalaññya” achanya”tacyaphakyapaငya phaြcya၏， ayutyatarā”hū၍laññya” khoyachiုpesaññya． īachanya”naှcyaphakya ayutya
tarā” naှcyapā”tiု’siု’ makapyarokyamū၍ sattavātiု’ raraှိkhaṃcā”apyaso khaျmya”sā chaငya”raဲ sukha dukkha ava0saññya
mimitiု’၏ kiုyyapiုငyauccāphaြcyaso kaṃā”laျောyachā kaṅkaြောင’ya phaြcyapoyalāra၏hu yūchaso īmaှnyakanyaso
sammādiṭṭhiayūachasaññya alayyaalatya majjhimapaṭipadākaျင’yacañya majjhimapaṭipatyamaññya၏． thiု’kaြောင’ya thiုkaṃ kaṃ၏
akaျို”kiု lakyakhaṃyuṅkaြññyamaှု payogaraှိso puggiုlyakiု majjhattapayogaraှိso puggiုlyahu khoyachiုapyapesaññya．
««maှtyakhaျkya ---- payogahūsaññya kaြို”cā”ā”thutyamaှုtaññya”． kaṃ-kaṃ၏akaျို”tarā”kiု lakyakhaṃyuṅkaြññya
so sammādiṭṭhi ayūvādakiု mimi၌taññyaaောငya kaြို”cā”ā”thutyamaှုkiု chiုliုsaññya．»»
maှnyapesaññya ---- ī kaṃ-kaṃ၏akaျို”kiု lakyakhaṃyuṅkaြññyamaှု majjhattapayogasaññya payyaapyapaြီ”so pūpanya
so kāyaraှိmaှုhu khoyachiုapyaso ငြိmya”aေ”so passaddhakāya raှိmaှု၏ akaြောငya”tarā” phaြcyalaျkya citya
cetasikyatiု’၏ ငြိmya”aေ”maှု kāyapassaddhi cittapassaddhi naှcyamaျို”kiု rhakyachoငyape”niုငyapesaññya．
(dī-ṭṭha-2-383． saṃ-ṭṭha-3-199． saṃ-ṭī-2-438．)
sattavātacyaū”tacyayokya၏ sukhavedanā khaṃcā”nerasaññyakiု maြငyathe’ralaျှငya sū၏ kusiုlyakaṃtarā”
kaြောင’ya īsukhavedanāmaျို”kiု raraှိkhaṃcā”rakhaြငya”phaြcyasaññyahū၍laññya”koငya”， sattavā tacyaū”tacyayokya၏
dukkhavedanākhaṃcā”nerasaññyakiု maြငyathe’ralaျှငya sū၏akusiုlyakaṅkaြောင’ya īdukkhavedanāmaျို”kiု raraှိkhaṃcā”rakhaြငya”
phaြcyasaññyahū၍laññya”koငya” naှluṃ”shaငya”tatyapālaျှငya thiုkaဲ’siု’so naှluṃ”shaငya”maှုmaျို”kiု yoniso manasikāra
hū၍laññya” khoya၏， majjhattapayogahū၍laññya” khoya၏， thiုsiု’ yoniso manasikāra majjhattapayogaraှိsū၏
santānyavayya thiုakhaျိnya၌ cityacetasikyatiု’ aေ”khaျmya”maှုraှိnesaññyakā” lakyathe’satipaြု၍ cū”camya”kaြñña’yalaျှငya
liုkyanākaြñña’yalaျှငya siniုငyasoarāpaငya phaြcyapesaññya． thiုkaြောင’ya majjhattapayoga raှိsū၏ santānya၌ passaddhi
sambojjhaငyatarā” thaငyaraှာ” phaြcyapoyalāniုငyakhaြငya”paငya phaြcyapesaññya．
īsiု’laျှငya majjhattapayoga = alayyaalatya payogaraှိmaှုsaññya cityacetasikyatiု’၏ ငြိmya”aေ”khaြငya”
kāyapassaddhi cittapassaddhinaှcyamaျို”kiု rhakyachoငyape”niုငyakhaြငya”kaြောင’yapaငyalaျှငya pūpanyakhaြငya”naှင’yatakha phaြcyaso kiုyya
cityaraှိso puggiုlyakiု raှောငyakaြñyakhaြငya”， ငြိmya”aေ”so kiုyyacityaraှိso puggiုlyakiု maှီvaဲchaññya”kapyakhaြငya”tiု’kiု thiု
passaddhisambojjhaငyatarā”kiု thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyapoyalāaောငya rhakyachoငyape”tatyasaññya၏ aphaြcyaphaြင’ya aṭṭhakathāka
phhaင’yachiုtoyamūkhaြငya” phaြcyasaññyahu maှtyapā． (saṃ-ṭī-2-438．)
5． sāraddhakāyapuggalaparivajjanatā = pūpanyakhaြငya”naှင’yatakhaphaြcyaso kiုyyacityaraှိso puggiုlyakiု raှောငyakaြñya
khaြငya”raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya” ---- akaြငyapuggiုlyasaññya khaဲ tutya acaraှိsaññyatiု’phaြင’ya sūtacyapā”kiု ññaှñya”chaဲlaျkya laှñña’ya
laññyatatya၏， īsiု’ sabhoraှိso pūpanyakhaြငya”naှင’ya takhaphaြcyaso kiုyyacityaraှိso puggiုlyakiု raှောငya
kaြñyaso puggiုlya၏ santānya၌laññya”koငya”，
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
410
6． passaddhakāyapuggalase0natā = ငြိmya”aေ”so kiုyyacityaraှိso puggiုlyakiု maှီvaဲkhaြငya”raှိsūphaြcyakhaြငya” ----
coင’yacaññya”apyaso khaြlekyaraှိso ငြိmyasakyaso kiုyyacityaraှိsopuggiုlyakiု maှီvaဲchaññya”kapyaso puggiုlya၏
santānya၌laññya”koငya”，
7． tadadhimuttatā = thiုpassaddhisambojjhaငyatarā” thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyapoyalāphiု’ranya chaဲchaဲmaြဲmaြဲ sakyavaငya ññhatyakiုငya”raှိုငya”
so cityadhātyaraှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya” ---- laျောငya” thiုငya rapya shā” le”pā”so iriyāputhyatiု’၌ cityacetasikyatiု’၏
ငြိmya”aေ”maှု passaddhikiု phaြcyacekhaြငya” akaျို”ငှာ chaဲchaဲmaြဲmaြဲ sakyavaငyataññyaneso naှluṃ”shaငya” ññhatyakiုငya”raှိုငya”laျkya
raှိso cityadhātyaraှိso puggiုlya၏ santānya၌laññya”koငya” ----
passaddhisambojjhaငyatarā”saññya thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyapoyalāniုငyapesaññya．
samādhisambojjhaငya phaြcyakaြောငya”tarā” (11) pā”
ekādasa dhammā samādhisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti vatthuvisadatā， nimittakusalatā， indaြိya-
samattapaṭipādanatā， samaye cittassa niggahaṇatā， samaye cittassa paggahaṇatā， nirassādassa cittassa
saddhā-saṃvega0sena sampahaṃsanatā， sammāpavattassa ajjhupekkhanatā， asamāhitapuggalaparivajjanatā，
samāhitapuggalase0natā， jhānavimokkhapaccavekkhaṇatā， tadadhimuttatāti． (visuddhi-1-131．)
1． kiုyyathaငya”kiုyyapa naှcyaṭhānaso vatthutiု’၏ sana’yaraှငya”maှုkiု paြုkhaြငya”raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya”，
2． indaြေငါ”pā”tiု’၏ ññīmaျှkunyasaññya၏ aphaြcyakiု paြီ”cekhaြငya”raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya”，
3． nimitya၌ kaျhamya”kaျငyalimmāmaှုraှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya”，
4． cityakiု naှိpyakhapyasaင’yarāakhā၌ cityakiု naှိpyakhapyamaှုraှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya”，
5． cityadhātyakiု maြှင’yataငyape”saင’yarāakhā၌ cityadhātyakiု maြှင’yataငyape”tatyasū phaြcyakhaြငya”，
6． bhā0nālupyaငnya”khhaငya၌ sāyāphhayya upasamasukha kaငya”socityakiု saddhā saṃvegañāṇyatiု’၏ achamya”phaြင’ya
rhaှငyalanya”naှcyasima’yacetatyasū phaြcyakhaြငya”，
7． bhā0nāāruṃ၌ aññīaññhatyakoငya”chā phaြcyaneso bhā0nācityakiု laျcyalaျူ raှုtatyasū phaြcyakhaြငya”，
8． samādhi maraှိso puggiုlyakiု raှောငyakaြñyakhaြငya”raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya”，
9． samādhiraှိso puggiုlyakiု maှီvaဲkhaြငya”raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya”，
10． jhānya vimokkhatarā”tiု’kiု asī”asī” sakyavaငya၍ chaငyakhaြငyakhaြငya”raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya”，
11． samādhisambojjhaငyatarā” thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyapoyalāphiု’ranya chaဲchaဲmaြဲmaြဲ sakyavaငyalaျkya ññhatyakiုငya”raှိုငya”so cityathā”
raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya” ----
ī (11)pā”kunyaso tarā”tiု’saññya samādhisambojjhaငyatarā”၏ thaငyaraှာ” phaြcyapoyalāphiု’ranya akaြောငya”
tarā”tiု’ phaြcyakaြkunya၏． (visuddhi-1-131．)
««maှtyakhaျkya ----
1． vatthuvisadatā = vatthuvisadakiriyatā = kiုyyathaငya”kiုyyapa naှcyaṭhānaso vatthutiု’၏ sana’yaraှငya”maှုkiု
paြုkhaြငya”raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya”，
2． indaြိyasamattapaṭipādanatā = indaြေငါ”pā”tiု’၏ ññīmaျှkunyasaññya၏ aphaြcyakiု paြီ”cekhaြငya”raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya”---
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
411
īnaှcyapā”tiု’kiု raှေ” dhammavicayasambojjhaငyapiုငya”၌ phhaင’yachiုapyakhaဲ’paြီ”sañña’ya naññya”atiုငya”sā siraှိpāle． ī
tarā” naှcyapā”tiု’saññya dhammavicaya amaññyaraso paññākiု phaြcyapoyalāaောငya rhakyachoငyape”tatyakunyasakaဲ’siု’
alā”tūpaငya samādhikiုlaññya” thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyapoyalāaောငya rhakyachoငyape”tatyakunya၏． akaြောငya”mū ---
samāhito yathābhūtaṃ jānāti passatīti 0canato samādhi tassa padaṭṭhānaṃ． (abhi-ṭṭha-1-162．) =
samādhiraှိso puggiုlyasaññya maphokyamapaြnya hutyatiုငya”maှnyachā si၏ maြငya၏hu bhurā”raှငya hokaြာ”toyamūkhaြငya”
kaြောင’ya samādhisaññya paññā၏ anī”kapyachuṃ” akaြောငya”tarā”phaြcyarakā” samādhiphaြcyaaောငya rhakyachoငyape”
niုငyapāmaှsālaျှငya paññāphaြcyaaောငya rhakyachoငyape”niုငyasokaြောင’ya phaြcyasaññya． (saṃ-ṭī-2-438．)．»»
3． nimittakusalatā = nimitya၌ kaျhamya”kaျငyalimmāsūphaြcyakhaြငya” ---- nimitya၌ kaျhamya”kaျငyalimmāsūphaြcyakhaြငya”maññyasaññya
kasiုṇya”nimityakiု saငyayūkhaြငya”၌ kaျhamya”kaျငyalimmāsū phaြcyakhaြငya”kiု chiုliုpesaññya．
(dī-ṭṭha-2-383． saṃ-ṭṭha-3-199．)
kasiုṇya”nimityakiု paြုlupyakhaြငya”၌ kaျhamya”kaျငyalimmāmaှုnaှင’ya kasiုṇya”bhā0nālupyaငnya”rapya၌ kaျhamya”kaျငyalimmāmaှု
tiု’၏ akhaျငya”khaျငya” tacyakhunaှင’ya tacyakhu makaငya”niုငyasokaြောင’ya kasiုṇya”nimityakiု coင’yaraှောkyakhaြငya”၌ limmākaျhamya”
kaျငyamaှု၏laññya” thiုkasiုṇya”bhā0nā lupyaငnya”rapya၌ kaျhamya”kaျငyalimmāmaှုlaျှငya akaြောငya”raငya”khaṃ raှိsokaြောင’ya
“nimitya၌ kaျhamya”kaျငyalimmāsūphaြcyakhaြငya”maññyasaññya kasiုṇya”nimityakiု saငyayūkhaြငya”၌ kaျhamya”kaျငyalimmāsū phaြcyakhaြငya””
hū၍sālaျှငya aṭṭhakathācharātoya mina’yachiုtoyamūkhaြငya” phaြcyasaññya． (saṃ-ṭī-2-438．)
nidassananaññya”hu maှtyapā
kasiṇanimittassāti ca nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ． asubhanimittassāpi hi yassa kassaci jhānuppattinimittassa
uggahaṇakosallaṃ nimittakusalatā evāti． (dī-ṭī-2-332．)
ī၌ kasiုṇya”nimitya၌ kaျhamya”kaျငyalimmāsū phaြcyakhaြငya”hūso īcakā”rapyakiု namūnāpuṃcaṃtacyakhukiု thutyapaြ
sañña’ya nidassananaññya”ā”phaြင’ya phhaင’yachiုso cakā”rapyahu maှtyapā． akaြောငya”mū upacārajhānya appanājhānyakiု
phaြcyaceniုငya raceniုငyaso asubhanimityacaso nimityatacyakhukhukiု raneso yogā0carapuggiုlya၏laññya” thiုnimitya
၌ kaျhamya”kaျငyalimmāsū phaြcyaaောငya saငyayūkhaြငya” phā”maျာ”ā”thutyakhaြငya” coင’yaraှောkyakhaြငya”saññya nimittakusalatā
= nimitya၌ kaျhamya”kaျငyalimmāmaှုraှိsū phaြcyasaññyasālaျှငya phaြcyasokaြောင’yapaငyataññya”．
(dī-ṭī-2-332． mahāṭī-1-154-laññya”kaြñña’ya．)
athū”maှာthā”khaျkya
īkaျmya”၌ yakhure”sā”nechaဲphaြcyaso apiုငya”maှာ ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityakiု āruṃyū၍ samādhi
thūthoငyaneso apiုငya” phaြcyapesaññya． thiု’kaြောင’ya thiုalhanyakaြññyalaငyatokyapaneso ānāpānapaṭibhāga
nimityasaññyalaññya” samathanimityamaျာ”chātiု’thaငya tacyakhuapāavaငyapaငya phaြcyapesaññya． yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya
thiုānāpāna samathanimityakiု saငyayūkhaြငya” phā”maျာ”ā”thutyakhaြငya” coင’yaraှောkyakhaြငya”၌ kaျhamya”kaျငyalimmāmaှု raှိsū
phaြcyalaျှငya nimittakusalatā = nimitya၌ kaျhamya”kaျငyalimmāmaှု raှိsūphaြcyasaññyasāhu maှtyapā． siု’athakya asaငya
yogā0carapuggiုlyasūmaြtyasaññya thiုānāpānanimityakiု saငyayūkhaြငya” phā”maျာ”khaြငya” coင’yaraှောkyakhaြငya”၌ kaျhamya”kaျငya
limmāmaှုraှိsū phaြcyaaောငya kaြို”cā”ā”thutyapāle．
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
412
4． samaye cittassa niggaṇaှnatā = naှိpyakhapyasaင’yarāakhā၌ cityadhātyakiု naှိpyakhapyakhaြငya”raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya” ----
ka． alhanyaakaဲ ā”thutyaapyaso vīriyaraှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya”，
kha． paññāluṃ’la payoga၏ ā”raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya”，
ga． vamya”maြောkyamaှုmaျာ” poyalhaငyathaငyaraှာ”lhanya”khaြငya” ----
īsiု’caso akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’kaြောင’ya paြာpuṃpoyasiု’ khaဲkaျsoakhā lhaင’yatakyalāso paြာtiု’kaဲ’siု’
bhā0nācityasaññya takyakaြhatunyalaှုpyalaျkya maငြိmyamasakya paျံ’lhaင’yalaျkyaraှိ၏ cityapaျံ’lhaင’yarā thiုakhā၌ ----
ka． passaddhisambojjhaငya，
kha． samādhisambojjhaငya，
ga． upekkhāsambojjhaငyatiု’kiု
thūthoငyathakaြhacekhaြငya” phaြcyapoyacekhaြငya”ā”phaြင’ya thiုtakyakaြhatunyalaှုpyalaျkya maငြိmyamasakya paျံ’lhaင’yaneso
cityadhātyakiု naှိpyakhapyape”ra၏． (dī-ṭṭha-2-383． saṃ-ṭṭha-3-200． saṃ-ṭī-2-439．)
5． samaye cittassa paggaṇaှnatā = cityadhātyakiု khaျီ”maြှောkyasaင’yarāakhā၌ cityadhātyakiု maြှင’yataငyape”khaြငya”
raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya” ----
ka． alhanyalaျော’lhanya”so vīriyaraှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya”，
kha． paññāluṃ’la payoga၏ ā”naññya”maှုraှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya”，
ga． mimiphā”maျာ”ā”thutyaneso samathaāruṃ siု’mahutya vipassanābhā0nāāruṅkiု mame’paျောkyakhaြငya”
appamāda khoya sati၏ khaျို’taဲ’maှု raှိnekhaြငya” ----
caso akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’kaြောင’ya bhā0nācityasaññya samathabhā0nāāruṃ siု’mahutya vipassanā
bhā0nāāruṃmaှ thana’yachutyane၏． thiုsiု’ cityadhātyathana’yachutyanerāakhā cityadhātyakaျchaငya”nerāakhā၌ ----
ka． dhammavicayasambojjhaငya，
kha． vīriyasambojjhaငya，
ga． pītisambojjhaငya ----
tarā”suṃ”pā”tiု’kiု thaငyaraှာ” phaြcyapoyacekhaြငya”ā”phaြင’ya thiု bhā0nāāruṃmaှ thana’yachutyaneso cityadhātyakiု
maြှင’yataငyape”ra၏， khaျီ”maြှောkyape”ra၏． (dī-ṭṭha-2-383． saṃ-ṭṭha-3-200． saṃ-ṭī-2-438．)
6． samaye sampahaṃsanatā = rhaှငyalanya”cesaင’yarāakhā၌ bhā0nācityakiု koငya”chā apaြာ”ā”phaြင’ya
rhaှငyalanya”cekhaြငya”raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya” ----
bhā0nācityasaññya mimiraှုphā”neso samathaāruṃ siု’mahutya vipassanāāruṃ၏ sabhomaှnyakiု thiု”thiု”
thhaငya”thhaငya” laငya”laငya”thaငyathaငya simaြငyamaှု paññāluṃ’la payoga၏ nuṃ’saññya၏aphaြcya ā”naññya”saññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya
soyalaññya”koငya”， kilesāapūtiု’maှ ငြိmya”aေ”khaြငya” upasamasukhakiု mararaှိkhaြငya”kaြောင’yasoyalaññya”koငya”
bhā0nālupyaငnya”rapya၌ sāyāmaှုmaraှိ phaြcyane၏． bhā0nālupyaငnya”rapyasaññya sāyāphhayya arasāmaှ kaငya”ne၏．
thiုakhāmaျို”၌ raှcyamaျို”so saṃvegavatthukiု chaငyakhaြငyakhaြငya”phaြင’ya cityakiု thityalana’yacera၏．
(dī-ṭṭha-2-383-384． saṃ-ṭṭha-3-200． visuddhi-1-131．)
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
413
maှnyapesaññya --- dānakā” alobhapaြdhānya”၏， sīlakā” adosa = mettāpaြdhānya”၏， bhā0nākā”
īchiုapyakhaဲ’paြီ”sañña’yaatiုငya” mimiraှုphā”neso (ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityakaဲ’siု’so) samathaāruṃ (saṅkhāra
nimityahūso) vipassanāāruṃ၏ sabhomaှnyakiု thiု”thiု”thhaငya”thhaငya” laငya”laငya”thaငyathaငya simaြငyamaှု - paññā khoya
amoha paြdhānya”၏． thiုsuṃ”maျို”tiု’thaငya akaြငyaakhā၌ paññāsaññya ā”maraှိ phaြcyane၏， thiုakhāmaျို”၌ (akayya၍
samathabhā0nāphaြcyalaျှငya ) thiုsamathabhā0nāsaññya raှေ”raှေ” samathabhā0nānaှင’ya nokyanokya samathabhā0nā
kiု upacārajhānya appanājhānyahūso tarā”thū”kiု rasañña’yatiုငyaaောငya rhakyachoငya mape”niုငyape． (akayya၍
vipassanābhā0nā phaြcyalaျှငya) thiုvipassanābhā0nāsaññya raှေ”raှေ” vipassanābhā0nānaှင’ya nokyanokya vipassanā
bhā0nākiု magyaphiုlyahūso tarā”thū” tarā”maြtyakiု rasaññyatiုငyaaောငya rhakyachoငyamape”niုငyape．
cā”khaျငyacaphhayya phaြcyaaောငya athū”talaññya paြုcīraငyamaှု maraှိso āhāratacyakhusaññya yokyaျာ”tacyaū”၏ cityadhātya
kiု naှcyasakyamaှု maphaြcyaceniုငyasakaဲ’siု’ alā”tūpaငya paññādhātya ā”naññya”neso paññādhātya ā”makoငya”so
bhā0nāsaññyalaññya” yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ cityadhātyakiု bhā0nālupyaငnya”khhaငyaapoya၌ alhanyanaှcyasakyamaှုkiု
maphaြcyaceniုငya． thiုkaြောင’ya thiုsiု’ naှcyasakyamaှုmaျို”kiု maphaြcyaceniုငyaso bhā0nāmaျို”saññya thiုyogā0carapuggiုlya
aphiု’ sāyāphhayya arasāmaှ kaငya”ne၏． alā”tūpaငya sāyāphhayyaarasāmaှ kaငya”maဲ’neso bhā0nā၏
koငya”mhanyamaှnyakanyasaññyasālaျှငya phaြcyaso bhā0nālamya”riု” lamya”hoငya” paṭipatyakaျင’yacañya၏ maraှိkhaြငya”kaြောင’ya
akhiုkyaatana’ya = tadaṅgaā”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya”， khapyakaြာkaြာ khānemaှု khhāthā”maှု = vikkhambhanaā”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya”，
akaြhaငya”maဲ’ payyasatyamaှု samucchedaā”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya” kilesātiု’၏ ငြိmya”aေ”maှု upasamasukha khaျmya”sākiု
mararaှိniုငyape． thiုsiု’ kaျင’yacañya lhaဲkhaျောyamaှုkaြောင’ya kilesātiု’၏ ငြိmya”aေ”maှု upasamasukha khaျmya”sākiု mararaှိ
khaြငya”kaြောင’yalaññya” cityadhātyasaññya bhā0nālupyaငnya”rapyamaှ sāyāmaှု maraှိ phaြcyanetatya၏， sāyāphhayyaarasāmaှ
kaငya”maဲ’netatya၏． thiုakhāmaျို”၌ saṃvegavatthukiု chaငyakhaြငyakhaြငya”phaြင’ya cityakiု thityalana’yacera၏． thiုsiု’ saṃvega
vatthukiု chaငyakhaြငyakhaြငya”phaြင’ya cityakiု thityalana’yacekhaြငya” cityakaြññyalaငyacemaှုkiု phaြcyacekhaြငya”saññya cityakiု che”
kusakhaြငya”paငya phaြcyasaññya． (saṃ-ṭī-2-439．)
maှnyapesaññya ---- samatha lamya”riု”lamya”hoငya”atiုငya” vipassanā lamya”riု”lamya”hoငya”atiုငya” shā”ne
so bhā0nāsaññya raှေ”samādhinaှင’ya nokyasamādhi， raှေ”vipassanāpaññānaှင’ya nokyavipassanāpaññā chakyacapya
laျkya phaြcyapoyalāsoya raှေ”raှေ”so bhā0nāsamādhika nokyanokyaso bhā0nāsamādhiā” raှေ”raှေ”
so vipassanāpaññāka nokyanokyaso vipassanāpaññāā” āse0na upanissayacaso paccayasatti
tiု’phaြင’ya kaျေ”jū”paြုpe”nesaphaြင’ya nokyanokyaso bhā0nāsamādhi nokyanokyaso vipassanāpaññāsaññya
raှေ”raှေ”so bhā0nāsamādhi raှေ”raှေ”so vipassanāpaññātiု’၏ kaျေ”jū”paြုpe”maှု araှိnyaavākiု chakyakhaṃra
saphaြင’ya upacārajhānya appanājhānyahūso jhānyatarā”thū”naှင’ya vipassanāñāṇya magyañāṇya phiုlyañāṇyahūso
paññātarā”thū”kiု rhakyachoငyape”niုငyaso chamya”ā”raှိlaျkya phaြcyapoyalāpesaññya． thiုsiု’ phaြcyapoyalāsoya
bhā0nācityasaññya bhā0nālupyaငnya”rapya၌ citya၏ sāyāmaှုkiုlaññya”koငya” kilesātiု’၏ (tadaṅga vikkhambhana
samucchedaā”phaြင’ya) ငြိmya”aေ”maှု upasamasukhakhaျmya”sākiုlaññya”koငya” rhakyachoငyape”tatya၏． thiုsiု’ rhakyachoငya
niုငyamaှု maraှိ phaြcyalatyasoya cityasaññya bhā0nālupyaငnya”rapya၌ sāyāphhayya arasāmaှ kaငya”maဲ’netatyapesaññya．
thiုsiု’ bhā0nālupyaငnya”rapya၌ sāyāphhayya arasāmaှ kaငya”maဲ’nerāakhā၌ ----
1． saddhā၏ achamya”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya”，
2． saṃvega၏ achamya”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya” bhā0nācityakiု rhaှငyalanya”takyakaြhaceramaññya phaြcyasaññya．
(visuddhi-1-131． mahāṭī-1-158 - kaြñña’yapā．)
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
414
saddhā၏ chamya”aငya
ratanattayaguṇānussaraṇena ca pasādaṃ janeti， ayaṃ vuccati “samaye sampahaṃsanatā”ti．
(saṃ-ṭṭha-3-200． dī-ṭṭha-2-384．)
ratanāsuṃ”pā”tiု’၏guṇyakiု amaှtyarakhaြငya”phaြင’yalaññya” cityakaြññyalaငyamaှုkiု phaြcyaceramaññya．
īachiုara ----
1． buddhānussatikammaṭṭhānya”，
2． dhammānussatikammaṭṭhānya”，
3． saṅghānussatikammaṭṭhānya” ----
īkammaṭṭhānya” suṃ”maျို”tiု’kiုlaññya” akhāā”laျောyachā cityakaြññyalaငyamaှု saddhātarā”maျာ” phaြcyathhanya” poya
pokyalāranyaathakya tiု”phā”lāranyaathakya ā”thutyape”ramaññya phaြcyapesaññya．
īsiု’laျှငya saṃvegañāṇyakiု phaြcyacekhaြငya”၏ achamya”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya”， cityakaြññyalaငyamaှု saddhātarā”kiု
phaြcyacekhaြငya”၏ achamya”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya” saṃvegañāṇya raှေ’shā”raှိso kaြññyalaငyamaှု saddhātarā”kiု phaြcyacekhaြငya”phaြင’ya
bhā0nācityakiု naှcyasakyarhaှငyalanya”cekhaြငya”saññya - bhā0nācityakiု rhaှငyalanya” cesaင’yarāakhā၌ koငya”chā apaြာ”
ā”phaြင’ya rhaှငyalanya”cekhaြငya”raှိsū maññyapesaññya． (saṃ-ṭṭha-3-200． saṃ-ṭī-2-440．)
maှtyakhaျkya ---- īre”sā”nechaဲ apiုငya”kā” ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityakiု āruṃyū၍ samādhi thūthoငya
puṅkiု phoyapaြneso apiုငya”phaြcya၏． yaငya”alhanyakaြññyalaငyatokyapaneso ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityakiု
thiု”thiု”thhaငya”thhaငya” laငya”laငya”thaငyathaငya simaြငyasañña’ya paññādhātya ā”makoငya”laျှငya thiုbhā0nāsamādhisaññya
upacārajhānyasamādhi appanājhānyasamādhihūso tarā”thū” tarā”maြtyakiု rhakyachoငyape”niုငyamaññya mahutya
pe． alhanyakaြññyalaငyatokyapaneso ānāpānapaṭibhāganimitya āruṅkiုmaျှ puṃcaṃmaှnya thiု”thiု”thhaငya”thhaငya”
laငya”laငya”thaငyathaငya sisañña’ya paññā maraှိbhaဲ ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု kaြို”pamya”nepālaျှငya asaငyayogī sūtoya
koငya”athakya sāyāphhayya arasāmaှ kaငya”maဲ’nemaññyasā phaြcyapesaññya． alhanyakaြññyalaငyatokyapane
so ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityaāruṅkiုmaျှ thiု”thiု”thhaငya”thhaငya” laငya”laငya”thaငyathaငya masimaြငyabhaဲ siု’mahutya pakatiso
vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalehūso ānāpānanimitya， thiုpakatiso vaငyasakyale thhakyasakya
lekiု amaှီpaြု၍ bhā0nāsamādhi၏ chamya”aငyakaြောင’ya phaြcyapoyalāso ānāpāna uggahanimityanaှင’ya ānā
pāna paṭibhāganimityakiုmaျှ thiု”thiု”thhaငya”thhaငya” laငya”laငya”thaငyathaငya masimaြငyabhaဲ ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”kiု kaြို”pamya”
ā”thutyanelaျှငya ānāpānabhā0nālupyaငnya” kaျင’yacañyakā” lhaဲkhaျောyanepaြီ phaြcya၏． akaြောငya”kā” ī
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”thaငya pakatiso vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalehūso ānāpānanimitya，
uggahanimitya， paṭibhāganimityahūso īānāpānanimityasuṃ”maျို”kiု sinepāmaှ raှုnepāmaှ ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”
maññyasokaြောင’ya phaြcyasaññya． thiုsiု’ lamya”lhaဲnepāka asaငyayogī sūtoyakoငya”athakya kilesā
tiု’maှ achaင’yachaင’ya ငြိmya”aေ”maှု upasamasukhakiု raraှိniုငyato’maññyakā” mahutyato’pe． thiုakhāmaျို”၌ saddhā၏
achamya”phaြင’ya saṃvegañāṇya၏ achamya”phaြင’ya cityakiု rhaှငyalanya”ceramaññya phaြcyapesaññya．
saṃvegavatthu (8) pā”
1． jātidukkha = paṭisandhe taññyanerakhaြငya” dukkha，
2． jarādukkha = aိုrakhaြငya” dukkha，
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
415
3． baျာdhidukkha = phaျာ”nārakhaြငya” dukkha，
4． maraṇadukkha = sekaျpeျkyacī”rakhaြငya” dukkha，
««īle”pā”kā” sugatibha0 duggatibha0 naှcyamaျို”luṃ”၌ thiုkyasaliု raraှိniုငyasaññya．»»
5． apāyadukkha = apāyyavaṭyachaငya”raဲdukkha ----
ka． ငါ”pā”so naှောငyaphhaဲ’khaြငya”caso apāyyaငraဲ dukkha，
kha． ငtyamhatya khoငya”pā”khaြငya”caso apāyyapaြိttā dukkha，
ga． akhaျငya”khaျငya” satyaphaြtyakhaြငya” ññaှñya”panya”naှိpyacakyakhaြငya” caso apāyyatira cchānya dukkha，
««īငါ”pā”kā” thiုthiုsattavātiု’၏ paccuppanyabha0၌maှီso chaငya”raဲdukkhakiု simya”kaျုံ”rethakyathā”khaြငya”phaြcyasaññya，，»»
6． atīte vaṭṭamūlakadukkha = atitya၌phaြcyakhaဲ’so kilesāvaṭya kammavaṭyalaျှငya akaြောငya”raငya”khaṃ raှိso
khaṃcā”khaဲ’phū”so vipākavaṭyadukkha，
7． anāgate vaṭṭamūlakadukkha = anāgatya၌ phaြcyalattaṃ’so paccuppanya kilesavaṭya kammavaṭyalaျှငya akaြောငya”
raငya”khaṃraှိso anāgatya၌ khaṃcā”apyalattaṃ’so vipākavaṭyataññya”hūso dukkha，
8． paccuppanne āhārapariyeṭṭhimūlakadukkha = paccuppanya၌ āhārakiု raှာmaှီ”rakhaြငya”laျှငya akaြောငya”raငya”khaṃ
raှိso dukkha． (visuddhi-1-131． dī-ṭṭha-2-384．)
««āhārakiု maှီ၍ asakyaraှငyakaြrakunyaso asakyamhe”kaြrakunyaso sattavātiု’thaငya lūsā”tiု’
kaဲ’siု’ uṭṭhānaphalūpa jīvino = thakaြhaluṃ’la vīriya၏ akaျို”kiုmaှီ၍ asakyamhe”rasūtiု’kiု raññyarhayya၍ mina’yachiုkhaြငya”
phaြcyasaññya． thiုsattavātiု’၏ āhārakiု raှာmaှီ”ramaှု dukkhasaññya kammaphalūpajīvi = kaṃ၏ akaျို”kiု maှီ၍ asakyamhe”
kaြkunyaso ငraဲsā” sattavā， natyapaြññyakhaြောkyathapyaraှိ natyasattavātiု’naှင’ya chakyachaṃmaှုmaraှိso sī”sana’yadukkha
tacyarapyaphaြcya၏， siု’athakya raှcyakhumaြောkya saṃvegavatthuaphaြcya yūthā”saññyahu maှtyapā．»»
( saṃ-ṭī-2-440． mahāṭī-1-159．)
pāḷitoyanaှင’ya aṭṭhakathā
dhammasaṅgaṇīpāḷitoya၌ ---- saṃvejanīyaṃ ṭhānanti jāti jarā baျာdhi maraṇaṃ， (abhi-1-264．) jāti jarā
baျာdhi maraṇa hu saṃvegavatthu le”pā” lāraှိlesaññya．
cattārimāni bhikkhave bhayāni， katamāni cattāri， jātibhayaṃ jarābhayaṃ baျာdhibhayaṃ maraṇabhayaṃ，
imāni kho bhikkhave cattāri bhayāni． (aṃ-1-436．) jātibhe” jarābhe” baျာdhibhe” maraṇabhe”hu
aṅguttiုrya catukkanipātya၌ bhe”chiု”kaြီ” le”pā” lāraှိsaññya．
īsiု’laျှငya pāḷitoya၌ lāraငya”phaြcyaso jāti jarā baျာdhi maraṇahu saṃvegavatthu le”pā” aṭṭhakathā
charāmaြtyatiု’ ငါ”khumaြောkya pañcamapaြု၍ yūtoyamūapyaso apāyadukkha - īငါ”pā”kā” paccuppanyabha0၌ maှီso
kaြောင’ya paccuppanne vaṭṭamūlakadukkhapaငya phaြcyasaññya．
atīte vaṭṭamūlakadukkha hūsaññyalaññya” atityabha0၌ maှီso jāti jarā baျာdhi maraṇa apāyadukkha
paငyataññya”．
anāgate vaṭṭamūlakadukkha hūsaññyalaññya” anāgatyabha0၌ maှီso jāti jarā baျာdhi maraṇa apāya
dukkhapaငyataññya”．
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
416
atitya anāgatyaphaြcyaso jāti jarā baျာdhi maraṇa apāyadukkhatiု’kiု jātissarañāṇyaphaြင’ya si၍
maြငya၍laññya”koငya” kaြာ”nāra၍laññya”koငya” chaငyakhaြငyaso puggiုlya၏ santānya၌laññya” saṃvegañāṇyamaျာ” phaြcya
phā”niုငya၏． temimaငya”sā”saññya atīte vaṭṭamūlakadukkhahūso atityaka phaြcyakhaဲ’saññya apāyyadukkhakiု
laññya”koငya”， maငya”āṇākiု alhaဲsuṃ”cā” paြုkhaဲ’mi၍ atityaka raraှိkhaဲ’sañña’ya apāyadukkhakiု caṃthā”chaငyakhaြငya၍
alā”tūpaငya paccuppanya၌ tacyaphanya thapyamaṃ၍ maငya”āṇākiု alhaဲsuṃ”cā” paြုkhaဲ’soya tacyaphanya thapyamaṃ၍ noငyaanā
gatya၌ raraှိniုငyasañña’ya anāgate vaṭṭamūlakadukkhakiုlaññya”koငya” jātissarañāṇyaphaြင’ya simaြငya၍ saṃvegañāṇya
phaြcyaphā”khaဲ’၏． yaငya”saṃvegañāṇyaka temimaငya”sā”ā” tothhakya၍ rase’rahanya”tarā”maျာ”kiု phā”maျာ”
ā”thutyaranya akaြီ”mā”chuṃ”so thanya”ā”kiု pe”khaဲ’၏． tacyaphanya kassapabhurā”raှငya sāsanātoyathaငya”ka
dhammakiု adhamma， vinayakiု avinaya īsiု’casaññyaphaြင’ya ငြငya”khuṃlaျkya sāsanātoyakiု phaျkyachī”khaဲ’so kapilarahanya”
၏ akaြောငya”arākiု kaြာ”nāraso tarā”nāparisatyatiု’saññyalaññya” kapilarahanya”၏ atitya apāya
dukkha， paccuppanya apāyadukkha， anāgatya apāyadukkhatiု’kiု chaငyakhaြငya၍ saṃvegañāṇyamaျာ” phaြcyaphā”khaဲ’kaြ၏． mahā-
jano saṃviggo hoti lomahaṭṭhajāto． (dhammapadaaṭṭhakathā-2-330．)
īsiု’laျှငya yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ bhā0nācityasaññya mimiraှုphā”neso samathaāruṃ siု’mahutya vipassanāā
ruṃ၏ sabhomaှnyakiု thiု”thiု”thhaငya”thhaငya” laငya”laငya”thaငyathaငya simaြငyamaှု paññāluṃ’lapayoga၏ nuṃ’saññya၏
aphaြcya ā”naññya”saññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’yasoyalaññya”koငya”， kilesāapūtiု’maှ ငြိmya”aေ”khaြငya” upasamasukhakiု
mararaှိkhaြငya”kaြောင’yasoyalaññya”koငya” bhā0nālupyaငnya”rapya၌ sāyāphhayya arasāmaှ kaငya”nesoakhā ī
raှcyapā”kunyaso saṃvegavatthutiု’kiု chaငyakhaြငyakhaြငya”phaြင’ya cityakiု thityalana’yacera၏． thiုsiု’ thityalana’yacesoya citya
saññya bhā0nālupyaငnya”rapya၌ rhaှငyalanya” takyakaြhalāmaññya phaြcyapesaññya． tacyaphanya ratanāsuṃ”pā”tiု’၏ guṇyakiု
amaှtyarakhaြငya”phaြင’yalaññya” cityakiု kaြññyalaငyaceramaññya． īsiု’ kaျင’yakhaဲ’soya bhā0nācityakiု takyakaြha rhaှငyalanya”
cesaင’yarāakhā၌ apaြာ”ā”phaြင’ya rhaှငyalanya”cekhaြငya”raှိsū maññyapesaññya．
7． sammāpavattassa ajjhupekkhanatā = aññīaññhatya koငya”chā phaြcyaneso bhā0nācityakiု asaင’ya
ā”phaြင’ya laျcyalaျူ raှုkhaြငya”raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya” ----
akaြငyaakhā၌ bhā0nālupyaငnya”rapya၌ cityathana’yatiုchutyanacyamaှု cityapaျံ’lhaင’yamaှုmaျာ” kaငya”saphaြင’ya ānāpāna
paṭibhāganimityakiု āruṃyū၍ raှုphā”neso samathalamya”kaြောငya” paṭipatyasaññya sammāpaṭipatya amaññyarasañña’ya
maphokyamapaြnya maှnyakanyaso akaျင’yapaṭipatya phaြcyane၏． thiုsammāpaṭipatya kaျင’yacañyakiု achaဲpaြု၍ bhā0nācitya
saññya ----
ka． paျငya”rikhaြငya” kosajjatarā”၏ asaငya”apaငya” phaြcyakaြkunyaso passaddhi samādhi upekkhā sambojjhaငya
tarā”tiု’၏ lhanyakaဲmaှု maraှိkhaြငya”kaြောင’ya bhā0nāāruṃmaှ thana’yachutyamaှုlaññya” maraှိ．
kha． cityapaျံ’lhaင’yamaှု uddhacca၏ asaငya”apaငya” phaြcyakaြkunyaso dhammavicaya vīriya pīti sambojjhaငya tarā”tiု’၏
lhanyakaဲmaှု maraှိkhaြငya”kaြောင’ya paျံ’lhaင’yamaှုlaññya” maraှိ．
ga． ānāpānapaṭibhāganimitya āruṅkiု thiု”thiု”thhaငya”thhaငya” laငya”laငya”thaငyathaငya simaြငyaneso paññāluṃ’la
payoga၏ paြñña’yacuṅkhaြငya”kaြောင’ya kilesātiု’၏ ငြိmya”aေ”maှု upasamasukha khaျmya”sākiု raraှိkhaြငya”phaြင’yalaññya”
ānāpānabhā0nālupyaငnya”rapya၌ sāyāmaှု maraှိsaññyakā” mahutya， sāyāmaှုlaññya” raှိne၏， sāyā
maှုlaññya” makaငya”pe．
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
417
gha． ānāpāna bhā0nālupyaငnya”rapya၌ citya thana’yatiု chutyanacyamaှု maraှိkhaြငya”kaြောင’ya bhā0nācityakiု khaျီ”maြှောkya
pe”khaြငya” (= paggaha) lupyaငnya”kicca၌laññya” kaြောင’yakaြbaျာpāra paြုkhaြငya”siု’ marokyaraှိto’pe． ānāpāna
paṭibhāganimityahūso bhā0nāāruṃmaှ cityapaျံ’lhaင’yashā”maှု maraှိkhaြငya”kaြောင’ya bhā0nācityakiု naှိpyakhapya
khaြငya” (= niggaha) lupyaငnya”kicca၌laññya” kaြောင’yakaြbaျာpāra paြုkhaြငya”siု’ marokyaraှိto’pe． ānāpāna
bhā0nālupyaငnya”rapya၌ sāyāmaှု raှိnekhaြငya”kaြောင’ya bhā0nācityakiု rhaှငyalanya”takyakaြhacekhaြငya” (= sampahaṃ
sana) lupyaငnya”kicca၌ kaြောင’yakaြbaျာpāra paြုkhaြငya”siု’laññya” marokyaraှိto’pe． ānāpānabhā0nā
lupyaငnya”rapya၌ citya thana’yatiု chutyanacyamaှု maraှိkhaြငya”， ānāpānapaṭibhāganimitya āruṃmaှ cityapaျံ’lhaင’yashā”maှု
maraှိkhaြငya”kaြောင’ya ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityahūso bhā0nāāruṃpoya၌ aññīamaျှphaြcyaneso， ānā
pānabhā0nālupyaငnya”rapya၌ sāyāmaှု raှိnekhaြငya”kaြောင’ya kilesāapūkiု ငြိmya”aေ”cetatyaso ānā
pāna paṭibhāganimityaāruṃ၌ cityataññyaငြိmyamaှု samādhitaññya”hūso samathalamya”kaြောငya”poyasiု’ shā”ne
so bhā0nācitya phaြcyane၏．
tacyanaññya”ā”phaြင’ya chiုrasoya ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityahūso bhā0nāāruṃpoya၌ bhā0nācityasaññya
aññīamaျှ phaြcyanekhaြငya”kaြောင’ya bhā0nāāruṃmaှ thana’yachutyamaှုmaraှိso paျံ’lhaင’yamaှုlaññya” maraှိsocitya phaြcyane၏．
ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityaāruṃ၌ cityaငြိmyavapyachā kapya၍taññyanemaှု samathalamya”kaြောငya”poyasiု’ koငya”mhanya
maှnyakanyachā shā”nekhaြငya”taññya”hūso koငya”mhanya maှnyakanyasañña’ya sammāpaṭipatya kaျင’yavatyalupyaငnya”kaြောင’ya bhā-
0nālupyaငnya”rapya၌ sāyāphhayya arasānaှင’yatakha phaြcyaso citya phaြcyane၏． thiုakhāmaျို”၌ ājānaññya maြငya”
koငya”maျာ”kiု yaှñyakathā”so rathā”၌ aññīamaျှ kane shā”ne phaြcyaneso ājānaññyamaြငya”tiု’ apoya၌
rathā”thinya”saññya lhanyasomaြငya”၏ kaြို”kiု chhaဲthā”rakhaြငya”， nokyakaျso maြငya”kiု kaြိmyaphaြင’ya tiု’pe”rakhaြငya”
hūso kaြောင’yakaြbaျာpārasiု’ marokyato’sakaဲ’siု’ alā”tūpaငya yogā0carapuggiုlyasūmaြtyasaññya bhā0nā
cityakiု khaျီ”maြှောkyape”rakhaြငya” = cityadhātyakiု maြှင’yataငyape”rakhaြငya” = paggahalupyaငnya”， cityadhātyakiု naှိpyakhapyape”
rakhaြငya” = niggahalupyaငnya”， cityadhātyakiု koငya”chā apaြာ”ā”phaြင’ya rhaှငyalanya”takyakaြhacerakhaြငya” = sampahaṃsana
lupyaငnya”hūso īsuṃ”maျို”kunyaso lupyaငnya”rapyatiု’၌ kaြောင’yakaြbaျာpāra paြုkhaြငya”siု’ marokyarato’pe． ī
paggaha niggaha sampahaṃsana lupyaငnya”rapya suṃ”maျို”tiု’၌ kaြောင’yakaြbaျာpārasiု’ marokyakhaြငya” kaြောင’yakaြbaျာpāra hū
so chana’yakaျငyabhakyakiု lhaှmya”miု”၍ laျcyalaျူ raှုkhaြငya”， ānāpānapaṭibhāganimitya āruṃ၌ bhā0nācityakiု aññī
amaျှ koငya”chā thā”khaြငya”kiု laျcyalaျူ raှုsaင’yarāakhā၌ bhā0nācityakiု asaင’yaā”phaြင’ya laျcyalaျူraှုkhaြငya” raှိsū
phaြcyasaññyahu chiုapyapesaññya．
(visuddhi-1-131． dī-ṭṭha-2-384． saṃ-ṭṭha-3-200． mahāṭī-1-159． saṃ-ṭī-2-440．)
««maှtyakhaျkya ---- ānāpānassati samādhipiုငya”kiု re”sā”soapiုငya” phaြcyasaphaြင’ya ānāpānaakaြောငya”
kiု ū”taññya၍ paြောchiုnekhaြငya”sā phaြcyasaññya． kaျnyasamatha vipassanā lupyaငnya”rapyatiု’၌laññya” naññya”tūpaငya
maှtyapā．»»
8． asamāhitapuggala parivajjanatā = samādhimaraှိso puggiုlyakiု raှောငyakaြñyakhaြငya”raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya” ----
nekkhammapaṭipadā amaññyaraso jhānyarakaြောငya”phaြcyaso kaျင’yavatyapaṭipatyalamya”kaြောငya”poyasiု’ matakya
rokyaphū” mashā”phū”kaြkunyaso， upacārasamādhi appanāsamādhihūso tacyakhukhuso samādhimaျှ maraှိkaြkunya
so， upacārasamādhi appanāsamādhihūso tacyakhukhuso samādhisiု’ machiုkyarokyakaြkunyaso tacyapā”
maka maျာ”paြာ”laှkunyaso kiccatiု’၌ luṃ’lakaြို”kutya ā”thutyalaျkyaraှိkaြkunyaso， athū”athū” apaြာ”paြာ”
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
418
so āruṃ၌ pacyalhaှtyathā”apyasocitya paျံ’lhaင’yasocitya raှိkaြkunyaso puggiုlyatiု’kiု ve”chā raှောငyakaြñya
khaြငya”saññya taññyakaြññyasocityadhātya maraှိso (= samādhi maraှိso) puggiုlyakiု raှောငyakaြñyakhaြငya”raှိsū maññya၏．
(visuddhi-1-131． dī-ṭṭha-2-384． saṃ-ṭṭha-3-200． mahāṭī-1-159．)
9． samāhitapuggalase0natā = samādhiraှိso puggiုlyakiု maှီvaဲkhaြငya”raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya” ----
nekkhammapaṭipadā amaññyaraso jhānyarakaြောငya” kaျင’yavatyapaṭipatyalamya”kaြောငya”poyasiု’ takyarokyaphū” shā”
phū” kaျင’yaphū”kunyaso， upacārajhānyasamādhiphaြင’yasoyalaññya”koငya” appanājhānyasamādhiphaြင’yasoyalaññya”koငya”
ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityakaဲ’siု’so upacārabhā0nā appanābhā0nāāruṃ၌ koငya”chā thā”apyasocitya
= koငya”chātaññyakaြññyaso cityahūso samādhiraှိso puggiုlyatiု’kiု maှီvaဲchaññya”kapyakhaြငya” anī”siု’ khaျñya”kapyakhaြငya”
saññya samādhiraှိso puggiုlyakiု maှီvaဲkhaြငya”raှိsū maññyapesaññya． (visuddhi-1-131． dī-ṭṭha-2-384． saṃ-ṭṭha-3-200．)
10． jhānavimokkhapaccavekkhaṇatā = pathamajhānya acaraှိkunyaso vimokkhatiု’kiု asī”asī” sakyavaငya၍
chaငyakhaြငyakhaြငya”raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya” ----
pathamajhānyacaso jhānyatarā”tiု’saññya chana’yakaျငyabhakyatarā”tiု’maှ koငya”chā lhatyamaြောkyakhaြငya” raှိsaññya
၏ aphaြcyacaso akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’kaြောင’ya thiုpathamajhānya casaññyatiု’saññyapaငyalaျှငya vimokkhalaññya” amaññya
rakunya၏． thiုjhānyavimokkhatiု’kiု ----
1． īsiု’ phā”maျာ”ra၏，
2． īsiု’ vaငyacā”ra၏，
3． īsiု’ chokyataññya adhiṭṭhānyara၏，
4． īsiု’ jhānyamaှ thara၏，
5． īsiု’ ññacyanhamya”၏，
6． īsiု’ phaြူcaငya၏ ----
īsiု’ asī”asī” sakyavaငya၍ chaငyakhaြငyakhaြငya”saññya jhānyavimokkhatiု’kiု asī”asī” sakyavaငya၍ chaငyakhaြငya
khaြငya” raှိsaññya maññya၏． (mahāṭī-1-158．)
11． tadadhimuttatā = thiု samādhisambojjhaငya၌ chaဲchaဲmaြဲmaြဲ sakyavaငyasū ññhatyakiုငya”raှိုငya”so cityadhātyaraှိsū
phaြcyakhaြငya” ----
laျောငya” thiုငya rapya shā” le”pā”so iriyāputhyatiု’၌ samādhikiု phaြcyacekhaြငya”akaျို”ငှာsālaျှငya samādhi
kiု ale”garupaြုsaññya၏aphaြcya， samādhisiု’ ññhatyasaññya၏aphaြcya， samādhisiု’ kiုငya”saññya၏aphaြcya， samādhisiု’
raှိုငya”saññya၏ aphaြcya， ññhatyayimya”so cityadhātyaraှိsū၏ aphaြcyasaññya thiုsamādhisambojjhaငyatarā”kiု phaြcyacekhaြငya”၌
chaဲchaဲmaြဲmaြဲ sakyavaငyasūphaြcyasaññya maññya၏． jhānyasamādhikiု phaြcyacekhaြငya”၌ alaျñyamacaဲ ā”thutyasaññya maññya၏． ī
chiုapyakhaဲ’paြီ”so samādhisambojjhaငyatarā” phaြcyakaြောငya”aṅgārapya tacyachaya’yatacyapā”atiုငya” kaျင’yaso yogā
0carapuggiုlya၏ santānya၌ īsamādhisambojjhaငyatarā”saññya thaငyaraှာ” phaြcyapoyalāniုငya၏．
īsiု’ phaြcyapoyalāso samādhisambojjhaငyatarā”saññya arahattamagyakaြောင’ya (vā) arahattamagya raso
akhā mukhaျā”phaြင’ya samādhipaြna’yapaြောkhaြငya”siု’ apaြñña’yaacuṃ rokyaraှိrakā” yaငya” arahattamagyasaññya bhā0nā
lupyaငnya”rapya၏ paြñña’yacuṅkaြောငya”tarā” phaြcyashā”rapesaññya． (visuddhi-1-132． dī-ṭṭha-2-384． saṃ-ṭṭha-3-200．)
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
419
athū”satipaြုramañña’ya akhaျkyatacyarapya
pāḷitoya (saṃ-3-92．)၌ ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityakaဲ’siု’so samathanimitya abaျgganimitya၌ naññya”maှnya
lamya”maှnya naှluṃ”shaငya”maှု = yoniso manasikārakiု kaြိmyaphanyamaျာ”chā paြုlupyapāka samādhisambojjhaငyatarā”
thaငyaraှာ” phaြcyapoyalāniုငyakaြောငya” hokaြာ”thā”toyamūkhaျkyamaျာ” lāraှိ၏．
athakyathaငya raှငya”paြthā”sañña’yaatiုငya” aṭṭhakathāmaျာ”၌laññya” samādhisambojjhaငyaphaြcyakaြောငya” tarā”maျာ”
lāraှိ၏． yaငya”samādhisambojjhaငya phaြcyakaြောငya”tarā”maျာ”atiုငya” kaျင’yapāka samādhisambojjhaငyatarā” thaငyaraှာ”
phaြcyapoyalāniုငyakaြောငya”maျာ”kiုlaññya” phhaင’yachiုthā”laျkyaraှိ၏．
yaငya”pāḷitoya aṭṭhakathā achiုamina’yatiု’ara asaငyayogā0carapuggiုlyasūmaြtyasaññya nibbānyakiု aliု
raှိkhaဲ’pāmū samādhisambojjhaငyatarā” thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyapoyalāaောငya kaြို”pamya”rato’maññya phaြcyapesaññya， samādhisambo
jjhaငya avaငyaapā phaြcyasañña’ya bojjhaငyakhunacyapā” cuṃññīpāmaှ， sammāsamādhimaggaငya avaငyaapā phaြcyasañña’ya maggaငyaraှcyapā”
cuṃññīpāmaှ asaငyayogīsūtoyakoငya”saññya nibbānyakiု maျkyamaှောkyapaြု၍ raniုငyamaññya phaြcyapesaññya． akayya၍
asaငyayogīsūtoyakoငya”saññya samādhithūthoငyamaှုkiု cakyachupyarhaṃraှာlaျkya samādhithūthoငyaphiု’ maliုpāhu
achaဲsanyanepālaျှငya asaငyayogīsūtoyakoငya”၏ santānyavayya samādhikhaျို’taဲ’nesaphaြင’ya bojjhaငyakhaြောkyapā”
maggaငyakhunacyapā” raှိkoငya”raှိnemaññya phaြcyapesaññya． bojjhaငyakhunacyapā” maggaငyaraှcyapā”kā” mapaြñña’yacuṃniုငyato’pe．
samādhimapāso bojjhaငyakhaြောkyapā” maggaငyakhunacyapā”phaြင’ya nibbānyasiု’ shā”၍ rokyaniုငya marokyaniုငyakiုkā” asaငya
yogī sūtoyakoငya” ale”anakyathā”kā cañya”cā”rato’maññya phaြcyapesaññya． nibbānyakiု aliုraှိkhaဲ’laျှငyakā”
bhurā”raှငyanaှင’ya bhurā”raှငya၏ tarā”kiု mapayyamiphiု’ranya athū”garupaြုramaññya phaြcyapesaññya．
upekkhāsambojjhaငya phaြcyakaြောငya”tarā” ငါ”pā”
pañca dhammā upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti sattamajjhattatā， saṅkhāramajjhattatā， sattasaṅkhāra-
kelāyanapuggalaparivajjanatā， sattasaṅkhāramajjhattapuggalase0natā， tadadhimuttatāti．
(visuddhi-1-131． dī-ṭṭha-2-384． ma-ṭṭha-1-302． saṃ-ṭṭha-3-200．)
1． sattavātiု’ apoyavayya alayyaalatya၌ taññyasosabhoraှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya” = sattavātiု’၌ laျcyalaျူ
raှုtatyasū phaြcyakhaြငya”，
2． saṅkhāratarā”tiု’apoyavayya alayyaalatya၌ taññyasosabhoraှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya” = saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၌
laျcyalaျူ raှုtatyasūphaြcyakhaြငya”，
3． sattavā saṅkhāratiု’kiု makyamotatyaso puggiုlyakiု raှောငyakaြñyakhaြငya”raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya”，
4． sattavā saṅkhāratiု’၌ laျcyalaျူ raှုtatyaso puggiုlyakiု maှီvaဲchaññya”kapyakhaြငya”raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya”，
5． thiု upekkhāsambojjhaငya၌ chaဲchaဲmaြဲmaြဲ sakyavaငyasū phaြcyakhaြငya” ----
ītarā”ငါ”pā”tiု’saññya upekkhāsambojjhaငyatarā”၏ thaငyaraှာ” phaြcyapoyalāranya akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’
phaြcyakaြkunya၏．
1． sattamajjhattatā = sattavātiု’apoyavayya alayyaalatya၌ taññyaso sabhoraှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya” =
sattavātiု’၌ laျcyalaျူ raှုtatyasū phaြcyakhaြငya”，
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
420
(ka) kammassakatā paccavekkhaṇa = kaṃsālaျှငya mimi၏ kiုyyapiုငyauccāraှိsaññya၏aphaြcyakiု chaငyakhaြငyakhaြငya” ----
“saငyasaññya mimi၏ kaṅkaြောင’ya īlū’bha0siု’ rokyaraှိlā၍ mimi၏paငyalaျှငya kaṅkaြောင’ya nokyatamalhanya
bha0siု’ shā”ralattaṃ’． īpuggiုlyasaññyalaññya” mimi၏paငyalaျှငya kaṅkaြောင’ya (= sū’kaṅkaြောင’yapaငya) īlū’bha0siု’
rokyaraှိlā၍ mimi၏paငyalaျှငya kaṅkaြောင’ya (= sū’kaṅkaြောင’yapaငya) nokyatamalhanyabha0siု’ shā”ralattaṃ’． saငyasaññya
abhayyapuggiုlyakiု maြtyaniု”nesanaññya”” ----
īsiု’ kaṃsālaျှငya mimikiုyyapiုငya uccāraှိsaññya၏ aphaြcyakiု chaငyakhaြငyakhaြငya”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya”，
(kha) nissattapaccavekkhaṇa = sattamahutyasaññya၏ aphaြcyakiု chaငyakhaြငyakhaြငya” ----
“paramatthaanakyasabhoā”phaြင’ya sattavāsaññyapaငyalaျှငya maraှိpe． (rupya-nāmya-kaြောငya”-kaျို” = saṅkhāratarā”
acuapuṃ sakyasakyasālaျှငya raှိsaññyahu chiုliုpesaññya．) thiုsaငyasaññya abhayyasūkiု maြtyaniု”nesanaññya”” ----
īsiု’laျှငya sattamahutyasaññya၏ aphaြcyakiု = attamaှ chityasuñya”saññya၏ aphaြcyakiု chaငyakhaြငyakhaြငya”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya”
īnaှcyapā”kunyaso akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’kaြောင’ya sattavātiု’၌ laျcyalaျူraှုtatyasū၏ aphaြcyakiု phaြcyace
niုငya၏． ( dī-ṭṭha-2-384． ma-ṭṭha-1-302-303．)
2． saṅkhāramajjhattatā = saṅkhāratarā”tiု’apoyavayya alayyaalatya၌ taññyaso sabhoraှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya”
saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၌ laျcyalaျူ raှုsū phaြcyakhaြငya” ----
(ka) asāmikabhā0paccavekkhaṇa = piုငyaraှငyamahutyasaññya၏ aphaြcyakiု chaငyakhaြငyakhaြငya” ----
īsaṅkanya”saññya suṃ”chaဲraငya” taphaြññya”phaြññya” acañyaatiုငya” aroငyaachaငya” phokyapaြnya paြောငya”laဲsaññya၏
aphaြcyasiု’laññya”koငya”， hoငya”nhamya”saññya၏ aphaြcyasiု’laññya”koငya” kapyarokya၍ taphaြññya”phaြññya” khaြseutya
avatyaphaြcya၍ nokyachuṃ” toငyavaှေ”chanya”phaြင’ya kaloya၍ chana’yapacyathiုkyaso sabhoraှိsaññya phaြcyalattaṃ’． thiု
saṅkanya”၏kā” piုငyaraှငyasaññya akayya၍ phaြcyaငြာ” raှိငြာ”aṃ’， īsiု’ phaြcyakhaဲ’ raှိkhaဲ’soya thiုsaṅkanya”ā” īsiု’
paျkyacī”khaြငya”ငှာ siု’mahutya paျkyacī”khhaင’yakiု mape”lerā． īsiု’laျှငya piုငyaraှငyamahutyasaññya၏ aphaြcyakiု chaငyakhaြငya
khaြငya”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya”，
(kha) tā0kālikatāpaccavekkhaṇa = akhiုkyaatana’yamaျှsā taññyakhaြငya”sabhoraှိsaññya၏aphaြcyakiု chaငyakhaြငyakhaြငya”
īsaṅkanya”kā” araှññyamakhiုငyakhaṃ’， thiုsuṃ”choငyarākāla akhiုkyaatana’yamaျှsā taññyakhaြငya”sabhoraှိ၏hu
akhiုkyaatana’yamaျှsā taññyakhaြငya”sabhoraှိsañña’ya tā0kālika၏ aphaြcyakiု chaငyakhaြငyakhaြငya”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya” ---
īnaှcyamaျို”kunyaso akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’kaြောင’yapaငyalaျှငya saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၌ laျcyalaျူraှုtatyasū၏ aphaြcya
kiု phaြcyaceniုငya၏． ««sapityacaso asuṃ”achoငya parikkharātiု’၌laññya” naññya”tūmaှtyapā． ī၌ asuṃ”achoငya
parikkharāpaccaññya” arapyarapyakiု saṅkhārahu chiုliုsaññyahulaññya” maှtyapā．»»
(dī-ṭṭha-2-385． ma-ṭṭha-1-303． saṃ-ṭṭha-3-200-201．)
athū”saphaြင’ya rāgasaññya upekkhā၏ chana’yakaျငyabhakyataññya”． thiုkaြောင’ya rāgathūpaြောso puggiုlyaaphiု’
upekkhāsambojjhaငyakiု rāgamaှ caငyakaြyyakaြောငya”lamya” = visuddhimaggahū၍ chiုapyapesaññya． (saṃ-ṭī-2-440．)
3． satta saṅkhāra kelāyanapuggala parivajjanatā = sattavāsaṅkhāratiု’kiု makyamotatyaso puggiုlyakiု
raှောငyakaြñyakhaြငya”raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya” ----
(ka) sattakelāyana = sattavākiုmaြtyaniု”sū ----
yogā0carapuggiုlyatacyaū”saññya lūvatyakaြောငyaphaြcyalaျှငyalaññya” sā”smī”acaraှိsūtiု’kiု ငါ’sā” ငါ’smī”hu
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
421
ငါ’uccāpaြု၍ maြtyaniု”၏． rahanya”phaြcyalaျှငyalaññya” mimi၏ anī”netapañña’ya tūsoupajjhāyyaraှိso sītaငya”suṃ”phoya
acaraှိsūtiု’kiု ငါ’tapañña’ya ငါ’mityachhe casaññyapaြုlupya၍ maြtyaniု”၏． mimi၏ lakyaphaြင’yasā thiု anī”netapañña’ya，
tūso upajjhāyyaraှိso sītaငya”suṃ”phoya casūtiု’၏ chaṃpaငyakiု rityaphaြtyamaှု， saṅkanya”kiု phhapyalaျှောyamaှု， saṅkanya”
chiု”maှု， sapityaphutyamaှု acaraှိso amaှုkiccatiု’kiု paြုlupyape”၏， tacyamuhutyamaျှ tacyakhaṇamaျှlaññya” mamaြငyalatya
soya - “īmaññyaso sāmaṇesaññya abhayyamaှာnaññya”， īmaññyaso rahanya”saññya abhayyamaှာnaññya”” - hu
tunyalaှုpyaso sā”samaငyasaññyakaဲ’siု’ īmaှ īmaှlaññya” kaြñña’yaraှု raှာphhe၏． akhaြာ”sūtacyayokyaka -“thiုmaññya
so sāmaṇekiု siု’mahutya thiုmaññyaso rahanya”ငyyakiု celhaှtyapākunya” - hu toငya”panyaapyapāsoyalaññya”
“ငါtiု’saññyalaññya” mimi၏ alupyakiccakiုpaငya mapaြုrakyacepākunya makhiုငya”rakyapākunya， araှငyatiု’saññya thiုsāmaṇe
kiု siု’mahutya thiုrahanya”ငyyakiု khoya၍ paငyapanya”cekunyakaြmaှာlā”” - hu paြောchiု၍ mape”pe， macelhaှtyape．
īpuggiုlyamaျို”saññya sattavākiု khaျcyamaြtyaniု”sū maññya၏．
(kha) saṅkhārakelāyana = saṅkhārakiု khaျcyamaြtyaniု”sū ---
puggiုlyatacyaū”saññyakā” saṅkanya” sapitya khhakya toငyavaှေ” acaraှိso paccaññya”vatthutiု’kiု ငါ’uccāpaြု၍
maြtyaniု”၏， akhaြာ”sūā” lakyaphaြင’ya suṃ”sapyakhaြငya”ငှာlaññya” suṃ”sapyakhhaင’yakiုlaññya” mape”pe， tā0kālika
akhiုkyaatana’ya tacyakhaṇamaျှ toငya”ramya”apya ငှာ”ramya”apyasaññya phaြcyapālaျkya “ငါtiု’soyamaှlaññya” īpaccaññya”kiု
maြtyaniု”kunyasaññya phaြcya၍ masuṃ”chaဲrakyapākunya， saငyatiု’ā” abhayyamaှာlaျှငya pe”niုငyapākunyaṃ’naññya””hu paြောchiု၏．
īpuggiုlyamaျို”saññya saṅkhārakiု maြtyaniု”sū maññya၏． thiု sattavākiု maြtyaniု”sū saṅkhārakiု maြtyaniု”sū makyamo
tatyasūkiု ve”chā raှောငyakaြñyakhaြငya”raှိsū santānya၌ upekkhāsambojjhaငyatarā”saññya thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyapoyalāniုငya၏．
(dī-ṭṭha-2-385． saṃ-ṭṭha-3-201．)
4． sattasaṅkhāramajjhattapuggalase0natā = sattavā saṅkhāratiု’၌ laျcyalaျူ raှုtatyaso puggiုlyakiု maှီvaဲ chaññya”
kapyakhaြငya”raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya” ---
puggiုlyatacyaū”saññya naှcyamaျို”laññya”phaြcyakunyaso thiု sattavā saṅkhārahūso vatthutiု’၌ alayyaalatya၌
taññyaso sabhoraှိ၏， laျcyalaျူ raှုtatya = udāsinyamūtatya၏， īpuggiုlyamaျို”saññya sattavā saṅkhāratiု’ apoya
vayya alayyaalatya၌ taññyasosabhoraှိso puggiုlyasattavā saṅkhāratiု’၌ laျcyalaျူ raှုtatyaso puggiုlya
maññya၏， thiု sattavā saṅkhāratiု’၌ laျcyalaျူ raှုtatya = udāsinyamūtatyaso puggiုlyamaျို”kiု maှီvaဲchaññya”kapyaso
puggiုlya၏ santānya၌laññya” upekkhāsambojjhaငyatarā”saññya thaငyaraှာ” phaြcyapoyalāniုငya၏．
(dī-ṭṭha-2-385． saṃ-ṭṭha-3-201．)
5． tadadhimuttatā = thiုupekkhāsambojjhaငya၌ chaဲchaဲmaြဲmaြဲ sakyavaငyasū phaြcyakhaြငya” ---
laျောငya” thiုငya rapya shā” le”pā”so iriyāputhyatiု’၌ thiုupekkhāsambojjhaငyakiု phaြcyapoyacekhaြငya”
akaျို”ငှာ naှluṃ”shaငya” ññhatyayimya”kiုငya”raှိုငya”so cityaraှိso puggiုlya၏ santānya၌laññya” upekkhāsambojjhaငya
tarā”saññya thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyalāniုငya၏． īsiု’ phaြcyapoyalāso upekkhāsambojjhaငyatarā”saññya arahattamagya
kaြောင’ya tacyanaññya” arahattamagyachiုkyasoakhā bhā0nāpāripūri = bhā0nāpaြñña’yacuṅkaြောငya”tarā” thaငyaraှာ”
phaြcyashā”pesaññya． (dī-ṭṭha-2-385． saṃ-ṭṭha-3-201．)
īchiုapyakhaဲ’paြီ”so akaြောငya”tiု’phaြင’ya īpassaddhisambojjhaငya samādhisambojjhaငya upekkhāsambojjhaငya
tarā”tiု’kiု thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyaceso yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya passaddhisambojjhaငya samādhisambojjhaငya upekkhā
sambojjhaငya tarā”suṃ”pā”tiု’kiု phā”cesaññya maññya၏． īchiုapyakhaဲ’paြီ”sañña’yaatiုငya” ībojjhaငyatarā”suṃ”pā”tiု’kiု
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
422
phaြcyacekhaြငya” phā”cekhaြငya”phaြင’ya cityakiု naှိpyakhapyasaင’yarāakhā၌ cityakiု naှိpyakhapyape”ra၏． (visuddhi-1-131．)
īthaငyarhe’kā” appanākosallatarā” (10)pā”tiု’thaငya amaှtya (5) phaြcyasañña’ya “cityakiု naှိpyakhapyasaင’yarā
akhā၌ cityakiု naှိpyakhapyakhaြငya”” acīaraငyanaှင’ya patyasakya၍ phhaင’yachiုre”sā”khaျkyamaျာ”paငya phaြcyapesaññya． yakhutacyaphanya
kaြhaငya”kaျnyanese”so appanākosallatarā”maျာ”kiု chakyalakya၍ re”sā”phoyapaြapyapāsaññya．
6． yasmi H samaye cittaṃ sampahaṃsitabbaṃ， tasmi H samaye cittaṃ sampahaṃseti = cityakiု rhaှငyalanya”cesaင’yarā
akhā၌ cityakiု rhaှငyalanya”cekhaြငya” ---
ī amaှtya (6) appanākosallatarā”kiု samādhisambojjhaငya phaြcyakaြောငya” tarā” (11)pā”tiု’thaငya
amaှtya (6) phaြcyasañña’ya - samaye sampahaṃsanatā = rhaှငyalanya”cesaင’yarāakhā၌ bhā0nācityakiု koငya”chā
apaြာ”ā”phaြင’ya rhaှငyalanya”cekhaြငya”raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya” - hūso aṅgārapya၌ phhaင’yachiုre”sā”khaဲ’sañña’yaatiုငya” maှtyapāle．
7． yasmi H samaye cittaṃ ajjhupekkhitabbaṃ， tasmi H samaye cittaṃ ajjhupekkhati = cityakiု laျcyalaျူ raှုsaင’yarā
akhā၌ cityakiု laျcyalaျူ raှုkhaြငya” ---
ī amaှtya (7) appanākosallatarā”kiု samādhisambojjhaငya phaြcyakaြောငya” tarā” (11)pā”tiု’thaငya
amaှtya (7) phaြcyasañña’ya sammāpavattassa ajjhupekkhanatā = aññīaññhatya koငya”chā phaြcyaneso bhā0nācitya
kiု asaင’yaā”phaြင’ya laျcyalaျူ raှုkhaြငya”raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya”hūso aṅgārapya၌ phhaင’yachiုre”sā”khaဲ’sañña’yaatiုငya” maှtyasā”
pāle．
8． asamāhitapuggalaparivajjanatā = samādhi maraှိso samādhikaငya”so puggiုlyakiု raှောငyakaြñyakhaြငya”，
9． samāhitapuggalase0natā = samādhiraှိso puggiုlyakiု maှီvaဲkhaြငya”，
10． tadadhimuttatā = thiုappanājhānya samādhisiု’ naှluṃ”shaငya” ññhatyayimya” kiုငya”raှိုငya”so cityadhātyaraှိkhaြငya” ---
īappanākosallatarā”suṃ”pā”tiု’kiု samādhisambojjhaငyaphaြcyakaြောငya” tarā” (11)pā”tiု’thaငya amaှtya
(8-9-11) phaြcyakaြsañña’ya ---
asamāhitapuggalaparivajjanatā = samādhi maraှိso puggiုlyakiု raှောငyakaြñyakhaြငya”raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya”，
samāhitapuggalase0natā = samādhiraှိso puggiုlyakiု maှီvaဲkhaြငya”raှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya”，
tadadhimuttatā = thiု samādhisambojjhaငya၌ chaဲchaဲmaြဲmaြဲ sakyavaငyasū ññhatyakiုငya”raှိုငya”so cityadhātyaraှိsū phaြcyakhaြငya”
hūso akaြောငya”aṅgārapyatiု’၌ phhaင’yachiုre”sā”khaဲ’sañña’yaatiုငya” maှtyasā”pāle． ī phhaင’yachiုre”sā”
apyakhaဲ’paြီ”sañña’yaatiုငya” yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya chayyamaျို”so īappanākosallatarā”kiု paြီ”cī” paြñña’yacuṃ
cerā၏．
raraှိniုငyaso akaျို”tarā”
asaငyayogā0carapuggiုlyasūmaြtyasaññya mimiraraှိthā”apyapaြီ”so ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityaāruṃ၌ ī
phhaင’yachiုre”sā”apyakhaဲ’paြီ”so naññya”lamya”atiုငya” ī appanākosallatarā”kiု paြီ”cī” paြñña’yacuṃceniုငyakhaဲ’saññya
raှိsoya asaငya yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ santānyavayya appanājhānyasaññya makhaျhatyaekanya koငya”mhanyachā phaြcyapoya
lātatyape၏．
īsiု’kaျင’yaso yogā0carapuggiုlyaā” thiုappanājhānyasaññya akayya၍ maphaြcyaniုငyakhaဲ’ငြာ”aṃ’ - thiုsiု’
maphaြcyase”soyalaññya” paññāraှိsūtoyakoငya”saññya kaြို”cā”ā”thutyakhaြငya” luṃ’lapayogakiု mapayyachana’yalerā，
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
423
malaျှော’khaျlerā， kaြို”cā”ā”thutyamaြဲ ā”thutyarāsaññyasātaññya”．
koငya”mhanyamaှnyakanyachā kaြို”cā”ā”thutyakhaြငya” sammāvāyāma amaññyarasañña’ya luṃ’lavīriyakiု laျှော’khaျ၍
anaññya”ငyyalaññya”phaြcyaso tarā”thū” tarā”maြtya maññyasaññyakiု sattavātacyaū” tacyayokyasaññya raraှိniုငyale
rā၏hūso īakaြောငya”arā ṭhānamaျို”saññya maraှိsaññyasālaျှငyataññya”．
thiုkaြောင’ya bhā0nācitya၏ bhā0nāāruṃmaှ thana’yachutyakhaြငya” paျံ’lhaင’yakhaြငya” casaññyatiု’၏aphaြcyaphaြင’ya phaြcyaso
akhaြငya”arākiု koငya”chā ñāṇyapaññāphaြင’ya cū”camya”၍ paññāraှိsūtoyakoငya”saññya vīriya၏ samādhinaှင’ya maျှso
kicca raှိsaññya၏ aphaြcyakiုsālaျှငya aphanyatalaဲlaဲ yaှñyacerā၏．
anaññya”ငyyamaျှlaññya” bhā0nāāruṃmaှ thana’yachutyaso aphaြcyasiု’ rokyaraှိshā”so cityakiု indaြေ
bojjhaငyatiု’၏ maျှtasaññya၏aphaြcyasiု’ rokyaraှိranyaaliု’ငှာ khaျီ”paင’yape”rāsaññyasālaျှငyakataññya”， cityadhātyakiု
maြှင’yataငyape”rāsaññyasālaျှငyakataññya”． alhanyaā”thutyalhanya”so vīriya lhanyakaဲneso cityakiုlaññya”
tā”maြcya၍ vīriyanaှင’ya samādhi ññīmaျှmaှုkiုsālaျှငya phaြcyacerā၏．
vatyapanya” vatyamaှုnya၌laññya”koငya”， kaြာrhakyaapaြငya၌laññya”koငya”， paင’yakūmaျှငya၌laññya”koငya”， laှေ၌
laññya”koငya”， chīkaျññya၌laññya”koငya” paျာ”acaraှိso sattavātiု’၏ phaြcyaso akhaြငya”arākiု raှေ”raှေ”
aṭṭhakathāmaျာ”၌ upamāaphaြcya koငya”chā phhaင’yachiုthā”sañña’yaatiုငya” bhā0nācityakiု bhā0nāāruṃmaှ thana’ya
chutyasaññya၏aphaြcya paျံ’lhaင’yasaññya၏ aphaြcyatiု’maှ akhaျငya”khapyasimya” bhā0nācityakiု lhatyamaြောkyace၍ vīriyanaှင’ya
samādhikiု ññīmaျှmaှုraှိaောငya yaှñyacekhaြငya”phaြင’ya ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityasiု’ raှေ”raှူ bhā0nācityakiု ciုငya”naှငya”rā၏
paြီ”cī”cerā၏． (visuddhi-1-132．)
nimittābhimukhapaṭipādana
ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityasiု’ raှေ”raှူ bhā0nācityakiု ciုငya”naှငyapā．
athakyapā cakā”rapya၌ īchiုlattaṃ’saññyakā” upamā upameyaျ anakyasabhokiု thaငyaraှာ”chā paြkaြောငya”
phaြcyaso cakā”acañyataññya”． thaငyaraှာ”ceṃ’ --- ñāṇyaphaြင’ya machuṃ”phaြtyaniုငyaso makaျhamya”kaျငya malimmāso
paျာ”koငyasaññya īmaññyaso sacyapaငya၌ panya”saññya phaင’yalatyapaြီhu si၍ thakyamaြkyalaျငyamaြnyaso ahunyaphaြင’ya
tacyahunyathiု” paျံsanya”paြေ”shā”latyasoya thiုaphaင’yaraှိso sacyapaငyakiု kaျောyalhaှာ”lhanyamaြောkyashā”၍ nokya
kaြောငya”siု’ tacyaphanyapaြnyalārapaြnyasoya panya”rakyasaññya kunyapaြီ”maှ chiုkyarokyalā၏． (panya”rakya hūsaññya panya”
vatyaraññyataññya”．)
ñāṇyaphaြင’ya naှိုငya”khaျိnya machuṃ”phaြtyaniုငyaso makaျhamya”kaျငya malimmāso akhaြာ”paျာ”tacyakoငyasaññyalaññya”
īmaññyaso sacyapaငya၌ panya”saññya phaင’yalatyasaññyahu si၍ alhanyale”khe” nuṃ’naှေ”so ahunyaphaြင’ya paျံsanya”
shā”lesoya panya”rakyasaññya kunyapaြီ”maှsālaျှငya chiုkyarokyalārapaြnya၏．
ñāṇyaphaြင’ya naှိုငya”khaျိnyaso chuṃ”phaြtyakhaြငya”ငှာ chamya”niုငyaso kaျhamya”kaျငyalimmāso paျာ”koငyasaññyakā”
īmaññyaso sacyapaငya၌ panya”saññya phaင’yalatyapaြီhusi၍ mamaြnyalhanya” manaှေ”lhanya”so ahunyaphaြင’ya paျံsanya”shā”
latyasoya khaျmya”khaျmya”sāsāphaြင’ya panya”phaင’yarā panya”to acuapuṃsiု’ koငya”chā chiုkyarokya၍ aliုraှိtiုငya”
panya”rakya panya”vatyaraññyakiု yū၍ paျာ”raññyakiု paြီ”cī”paြñña’yacuṃaောငya paြုlupya၍ paျာ”raññya၏ arasākiု khaṃcā”rasakaဲ’siု’
laññya”koငya”，
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
424
tacyaphanya khhaဲcityakusatatyaso khhaဲcityacharāvanya၏ tapañña’yatiု’saññya rekhhakya၌ thañña’yathā”apyaso kaြာ
rhakya၌ dhā”ငyyaphaြင’ya laှီ”phokyakhaြငya”atatya khhaဲcityakhaြငya”atatyakiု saငyayūlatyakunyasoya tacyayokyaso
ñāṇyaphaြင’ya manaှိုငya”khaျိnya machuṃ”phaြtyaniုငyaso makaျhamya”kaျငya malimmāso tapañña’yasaññya khapyamaြnyamaြnya laျငyasoahunya
phaြင’ya dhā”ငyyakiု kaြာrhakyapoyasiု’ khaျlatyasoya kaျcelatyasoya kaြာrhakyakiု naှcyakhaြmya”mūlaññya” phaြtyamirakyasā”
phaြcyashā”tatya၏． dhā”ငyyakiု rethaဲ၌mūlaññya” nacyashā”cetatya၏．
ñāṇyaphaြင’ya manaှိုငya”khaျိnya machuṃ”phaြtyaniုငyaso makaျhamya”kaျငya malimmāso akhaြာ”tapañña’yatacyaū”saññyalaññya”
kaြာrhakyakiု naှcyakhaြmya” phaြtyamikhaြငya” dhā”ငyya၏ kaြာrhakyakiု phokya၍ rethaဲ၌ nacyashā”khaြငya”maှ kaြောkyakhaြငya”kaြောင’ya
dhā”ငyyaphaြင’ya kaြာrhakyakiု tiု’thikhaြငya”ငှာlaññya” mavaṃ’phaြcyane၏．
ñāṇyaphaြင’ya naှိုငya”khaျိnyachuṃ”phaြtyakhaြငya”ငှာ chamya”niုငyaso kaျhamya”kaျငyalimmāso tapañña’yasaññyakā” mapaြငya”lhanya”
manuṃ’lhanya”so ññīmaျှso luṃ’lapayoga ahunyaphaြင’ya thiုkaြာrhakya၌ dhā”ငyyarākiု dhā”ငyyaphaြင’ya phokyakhhaဲkhaြငya”kiု
thaငyaraှာ”paြ၍ kunyacaငyasoatatya chuṃ”khanya”tiုငya apaြီ”tiုငyaaောငyaso atatyapaññā raှိsaññyaphaြcya၍ thiုsiု’
sabhoraှိkunyaso khhaဲcityakusaramañña’ya arāṭhānatiု’၌ she”kaြောphokyakhaြငya”caso amaှုkiု paြုlupya၍ lābhya
lābhakiု raraှိsakaဲ’siု’laññya”koငya”，
tacyaphanya akaြငyasūsaññya le”laṃ pamāṇaraှိso paင’yakūkhaျññyakiု choငyaniုငyaṃ’， thiုsūsaññya asapaြာ
le”thoငyatiု’kiု racehu raှငyabhuraငyaka kaြññolatyasoya ñāṇyaphaြင’ya manaှိုငya”khaျိnya machuṃ”phaြtyaniုငyaso makaျhamya”kaျငya
malimmāso yokyaျာ”tacyaū”saññya laျငyamaြnyaso ahunyaphaြင’ya paင’yakūkhaျññyakiု ငငyalatyasoya thiုthiုarapya၌
paင’yakūkhaျññyasaññya paြtya၍sālaျှငya shā”၏．
ñāṇyaphaြင’ya manaှိုငya”khaျိnya machuṃ”phaြtyaniုငyaso makaျhamya”kaျငya malimmāso akhaြာ”yokyaျာ”tacyaū”saññyalaññya”

yogā0cara rahanya”toya၏ cityasaññya lhanyalhanyakaဲkaဲ apaြငya”athanya kaြို”cā”ā”thutyaapyaso luṃ’la
vīriyaraှိsaññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya cityapaျံ’lhaင’yamaှု uddhaccaaphiု’acu၌ kaျrokyashā”tatya၏． thiုrahanya”saññya appanā

luṃ’lavīriyaraှိsaññya၏ aphaြcya၌ apaြcyadosakiု simaြငya၍ ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityakiု phaြcyapaြီ”rā yakhuakhā၌
“ငါ’ā” appanājhānyaphaြင’ya abhayyamūaṃ’naññya” = abhayyaakaျို”raှိaṃ’naññya””- hu naှluṃ”piုkya၍ vīriyakiု yutya
laျော’ce၏． thiုyogā0cara rahanya”toya၏ cityasaññya alhanyathana’yachutyaso luṃ’lavīriyaraှိsaññya၏ aphaြcya
kaြောင’ya paျငya”rikhaြငya” kosajja aphiု’acu၌ kaျrokya၍ shā”tatya၏． thiုrahanya”saññyalaññya” appanājhānyasiု’
rokyaraှိkhaြငya”ငှာ machamya”niုငya．

bhā0nācityakiု thana’yachutyasaññya၏ aphaြcyamaှ lhatyamaြောkyacelaျkya， tunyalaှုpyatakyakaြhalaျkya maငြိmyamasakya paျံ’
lhaင’yaneso bhā0nācityakiု cityapaျံ’lhaင’yakhaြငya” (= uddhacca) aphiု’acumaှ lhatyamaြောkyacelaျkya vīriyanaှင’ya samādhi
ññīmaျှso luṃ’lapayogaphaြင’ya mathana’yamalaှုpyaso bhā0nācityakiု ānāpāna paṭibhāganimityasiု’ raှေ”raှုphaြcyace၏．

laှုpyashā”so bhavaငya，

paြtyashā”so bhavaငya，

kiု chaငyakhaြငyasocitya，

acachuṃ”raso jhānavīthi phaြcyapuṅkā” ---- ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityakiု cī”phaြnya”phanyamaျာ”saphaြင’ya jhānyara
lulatya၍ ānāpānapaṭibhāganimitya āruṃsaññya bhavaငya = manodhāra၌ thaငyalāsaññyaraှိsoya bhavaṅgacalana，
bhavaṅgupaccheda， manodhārāvajjanya”， mandapaññapuggiုlya၌ parikamya， upacā， anuluṃ， gotaြbhu-hu upacārasamādhijo
le”kaြိmya， tikkhapaññapuggiုlya၌ upacā， anuluṃ， gotaြbhuhu suṃ”kaြိmya - thiုnokya appanāsamādhijo tacyakaြိmya

maျာ”၌ bhavaငyahusā suṃ”၍ bhavaṅgacalana bhavaṅgupacchedahu masuṃ”pe．)
upacārasamādhijo
ījhānavīthiathaငya”၌ parikamya， upacā， anuluṃ， gotaြbhuhūso jomaျာ”kiု upacārasamādhijohu
khoya၏． jhānya magya phiုlyatiု’၏ anī” upacā၌ phaြcyaso jomaျာ”hu chiုliုsaññya． upacārajhānyajomaျာ”hulaññya”
khoya၏． le”kaြိmyamaြောkya siု’mahutya ငါ”kaြိmyamaြောkyajokā” appanājhānyajo phaြcya၏．
“ciုkyaciုkyacū”cū”， athū”maြဲmaြံ， raှုā”sanya， jhānyahu khoyasatatya”hūso layyatīcharātoyabhurā”kaြီ”၏
achuṃ”amaatiုငya” yaငya”upacāra appanājhānyatiု’saññya ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityakaဲ’siု’so paṭibhāganimitya
āruṅkiု ciုkyaciုkyacū”cū” athū”maြဲmaြံchā kapya၍raှုtatyasokaြောင’ya ārammaṇūpanijjhānajhānyahūso amaññyakiု
raraှိkaြpesaññya． yaငya” ādikammika pathamajjhānavīthi athaငya”raှိ cityatiု’thaငya manodhārāvajjanya”၌ cityacetasikya
(12)luṃ”raှိ၍ joasī”asī”၌ cityacetasikya (34)luṃ”cī asī”asī” raှိkaြpesaññya． yaငya”cityacetasikya
nāmyatarā”tiု’kiု simya”chaññya”puṃsaññya nāmyakammaṭṭhānya”piုငya”thaငya thaငyaraှာ”lattaṃ’． yaငya” jhānyajonāmyatarā” (34)luṃ”
tiု’thaငya vitakya+vicāra+pīti+sukha+ekaggatāhūso jhānyaaṅgāငါ”pā”tiု’laññya” pāvaငyalaျkyapaငyaraှိsaññyahu
maှtyasā”thā”pā． yaငya” vitakya vicāra casañña’ya tarā”tacyaluṃ”cī tacyaluṃ”cīkiု jhānyaaṅgāhū၍ khoyachiုpaြီ”laျှငya
yaငya” jhānyaaṅgā ငါ”pā”tiု’၏ apoငya”kiု jhānyahu khoyasaññyahulaññya” maှtyasā”thā”pāū”． asaငyayogī
sūtoyakoငya”saññya īakhaြkheṃ raှငya”laငya”khaျkyakiု sabhopokyapāka athakyathaငya phoyapaြkhaဲ’so visuddhimagga
aṭṭhakathācakā”naှင’ya aောkyathaငya chakyalakyaphoyapaြmañña’ya visuddhimaggaaṭṭhakathācakā”maျာ”kiု sabhopokya
lhayyalima’yamaññyahu maျှောyalaင’yapāsaññya．
««maှtyakhaျkya ---- visuddhimaggaaṭṭhakathāthaငyakā” pathavīkasiုṇya”laျှငya āruṃraှိso jhānyamaျာ”kiု caṃthā”၍
phoyapaြthā”pāsaññya， īkaျmya”thaငyakā” ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityalaျှငya āruṃraှိso jhānyamaျာ”kiု phoyapaြ
thā”saññyahu maှtyapā．»» aောkyapā visuddhimaggaaṭṭhakathā cakā”kiု chakyalakyaphatyaraှုpā．
jhānyajotiု’၏ amaññyamaျာ”
thiုle”kaြိmya ငါ”kaြိmyaso jotiု’thaငya nokyachuṃ”၌ phaြcyaso tacyakhuso josaññya rūpā0carajhānyajo
phaြcya၏． kaြhaငya”kunyaso suṃ”kaြိmya le”kaြိmyakunyaso jotiု’kā” kāmā0cara upacārajhānyajotiု’taññya”．
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
429
1． yaငya” kāmā0cara upacārajhānyajotiု’kiု appanājhānyajokiု paြုpaြငyape”tatyasaññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya
parikaṃtiု’hū၍laññya”koငya”，
2． rhācasaññyatiု’၏ anī”phaြcyaso arapyakiု rhāupacā maြို’upacāhū၍ khoyachiုapyasakaဲ’siု’ alā”tūpaငya
appanājhānyamaှ nī”saññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya appanājhānya၏ anī”apā”၌ kaျငyalaññyatatyasaññya၏ aphaြcya
kaြောင’ya upacātiု’hū၍laññya”koငya”，
3． ī ādikammika appanājhānavīthimaှ raှေ”phaြcyaso athū”thū”so (ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityaāruṅkiု
chaငyakhaြငyatatyaso) āvajjanya” raှိkaြkunyaso athū”thū”so vīthitiု’၌ ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityaāruṃ
kiု cī”phaြnya”neso parikaṃtiု’ā”laññya”koငya”， athakyaphaြcyaso appanājhānyajoā”laññya”koငya”
laျောyasokaြောင’ya anulomatiု’hū၍laññya”koငya” khoyachiုapyakunya၏．
ī parikamma upacāra anulomahu maှtyaapyakunyaso cityatiု’thaငya aluṃ”cuṃtiု’၏ nokya၌ phaြcyaso
akaြငya tatiyacitya siု’mahutya catutthacityasaññya raှိ၏， thiုcityakiုkā” kāmā0caraanhayyakiု lhaှmya”miု” kaျောyalhanya
saññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’yalaññya”koငya”， mahaggutyaanhayyakiု phaြcyacetatya phā”cetatyasaññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya
laññya”koငya” gotaြbhuhū၍laññya” khoyachiုapya၏．
thiုsiု’ sabhoraှိkunyaso achuṃ”jo tacyakhumaှ kaြhaငya”kunyaso suṃ”kaြိmya le”kaြိmyaso jotiု’saññya
paြkate’so kāmā0caracityatiု’thakya athū”ā”raှိkunyaso vitakya+vicāra+pīti+sukha+cittekaggatā
raှိkunyaso kāmā0caracityatiု’ phaြcyakaြkunya၏．
ī suṃ”pā”socitya le”pā”socityatiု’thaငya mayūapyase”saññyakiု yū၍ yūapyapaြီ”saññyakiု mayū
so naññya”phaြင’ya (mandapañña puggiုlyaathakya) ----
1． raှေ”ū”chāso pathamajocityasaññya parikamma maññya၏．
2． dutiyajocityasaññya upacāra maññya၏．
3． tatiyajocityasaññya anuloma maññya၏．
4． catutthajocityasaññya gotaြbhu maññya၏．
5． ငါ”kaြိmyamaြောkyaso jocityasaññyakā” appanājhānyajo၏ achamya”phaြင’ya phaြcya၏．
(tikkhapañña puggiုlyaathakya) tacyanaññya”chiုrasoya ----
1． raှေ”ū”chāso pathamajocityasaññya upacāra maññya၏．
2． naှcyakhumaြောkyaso dutiyajocityasaññya anuloma maññya၏．
3． suṃ”khumaြောkyaso tatiyajocityasaññya gotaြbhu maññya၏．
4． le”kaြိmyamaြောkyaso catutthajocityasaññyakā” appanājhānyajo၏ achamya”phaြင’ya phaြcya၏．
thiုle”kaြိmyamaြောkyamūlaññya” siု’mahutya ငါ”kaြိmyamaြောkyamūlaññya” mamaြဲso aniyamasabhoā”phaြင’ya
thiုappanājhānyajo၏ phaြcyakhaြငya”kiုlaññya” laျငyamaြnyaso asithū” ñāṇyathū”raှိso khippābhiññapuggiုlya， nuṃ’naှေ”so
asithū” ñāṇyathū”raှိso dandhābhiññapuggiုlya၏ achamya”phaြင’ya maှtyaapya၏．
thiုငါ”kaြိmyamaြောkyamaှ nokya၌ chaṭṭhajo sattamajosaññya achamya”ahunya kunyasaññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya
kaျsakaဲ’siု’ yiုsakaဲ’siု’ phaြcya၏． ငါ”kaြိmyamaြောkya siု’mahutya le”kaြိmyamaြောkyanokya၌ jomacoto’bhaဲ bhavaငya
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
430
၏ alaှñña’yavārasaññya chiုkyarokyalāpe၏． (visuddhi-1-134．)
cittakkhaṇatacyakhaျkyasā
thiု appanājhānyajosaññyalaññya” tacyakhuso cittakkhaṇaraှိsaññyasātaññya”． (ādikammika acachuṃ” jhāna
vīthi၌ jhānyajotacyakaြိmyasā kaျ၏hu chiုliုpesaññya．) maှnyapesaññya ----
1． lakyaū”racaphaြcyaso mahaggutya appanājhānyajo၌laññya”koငya”，
2． lokī abhiññāṇyajotiု’၌laññya”koငya”，
3． ariyamagga le”pā”tiု’၌laññya”koငya”，
4． ariyamagya၏ akhaြာ”maဲ’၌ phaြcyaso ariyaphiုlya၌laññya”koငya”，
5． rūpabhuṃ arūpabhuṃtiု’၌ bhavaငya arāṭhāna၌laññya”koငya”，
6． nirodhasamāpatyaā” kaျေ”jū”paြုtatyaso ne0saññānāsaññāyatanajhānyajo၌laññya”koငya”，
7． nirodhasamāpatyamaှ thaso anāgāmya rahantāpuggiုlya၏ phalasamāpatya၌laññya”koငya” ----
īkhunacyamaျို”kunyaso ṭhānatiု’၌ kālaapiုငya”akhaြာ”maññyasaññya maraှိpe．
īkhunacyaṭhānatiု’thaငya ariyamagya၏ akhaြာ”maဲ’၌phaြcyaso ariyaphiုlya၌ suṃ”kaြိmyathakya alhanya (naှcyakaြိmya
aောkya) phaြcyariု”dhammatā maraှိ．
nirodhasamāpatyaā” kaျေ”jū”paြုtatyaso ne0saññānāsaññāyatanajhānyajosaññya naှcyakaြိmyathakya
alhanya phaြcyariု”dhammatā maraှိ．
rūpabhuṃ arūpabhuṃtiု’၌ bhavaငya၌ atiုငya”atāpamāṇasaññya maraှိ．
chiုkhaဲ’paြီ”so īsuṃ”ṭhānatiု’maှ kaြhaငya”kunyaso pathama appanājo， lokīabhiññāṇya， ariyamagya
le”khu， nirodhasamāpatyamaှ thaso anāgāmya rahantāpuggiုlya၏ ariyaphiုlyahūso le”ṭhānatiု’၌ tacyakaြိmya
so jocityasaññyasā phaြcyapesaññya．
««1． ādikammika acaū” pathama appanājosaññya tacyakaြိmyasā phaြcya၏．
2． lokī abhiññāṇyajosaññya tacyakaြိmyasā phaြcya၏．
3． lokuttarā ariyamagyatarā”saññya tacyakaြိmyasā phaြcya၏．
4． nirodha samāpatyamaှ thaso anāgāmyapuggiုlya၏ anāgāmiphiုlya， rahantāpuggiုlya၏ arahattaphiုlyasaññya
tacyakaြိmyasā phaြcya၏hu chiုliုpesaññya．»»
thiုkaြောင’ya lakyamhanyapathama appanājhānyajosaññya tacyakhuso cittakkhaṇa raှိsaññyasā phaြcyasaññya． (tacya
kaြိmyasā co၏．) thiုappanājo tacyakaြိmya phaြcyasaññyamaှnokya၌ bhavaငyakaျ၏． thiု bhavaငyakaျpaြီ”nokya bhavaငya
ayañyakiု phaြtyatokya၍ jhānyakiု chaငyakhaြငyaranya aliု’ငှာ manodhārāvajjanya” tacyakaြိmya phaြcya၏， thiုnoငya jhānyakiု
chaငyakhaြငyaso paccavekkhaṇājo co၏． (visuddhi-1-135．)
pathamajhānyasamādhi
ettā0tā ca panesa vivicce0 kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ
pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati． (abhi-1-44． dī-1-69．)
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
431
e0manena pañcaṅgavippahīnaṃ pañcaṅgasamannāgataṃ tividhakalaျာṇaṃ dasalakkhaṇasampannaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ adhigataṃ
hoti (ānāpānapaṭibhāganimittārammaṇaṃ)． (visuddhi-1-135．)
ī phhaင’yachiုre”sā”apyakhaဲ’paြီ”so bhā0nāacañyaphaြင’ya ī yogā0cara puggiုlyasūmaြtyasaññya vatthukāma
kilesākāmatiု’maှ asī”akhaြာ”phaြcya၍sālaျှငya kaငya”chitya၍sālaျှငya akusiုlyatarā”tiု’maှ asī”akhaြာ”
phaြcya၍sālaျှငya kaငya”chitya၍sālaျှငya vitakyanaှင’ya takhaphaြcyaso vicāranaှင’ya takhaphaြcyaso nī0raṇa kaငya”chitya
khaြငya”kaြောင’ya phaြcyapoya၍lāso naှcyasakyakhaြငya” pīti khaျmya”sākhaြငya” sukharaှိso pathamajhānyasiု’ kapyarokya၍
pathamajhānyakiု paြñña’yacuṃce၍ nera၏． īsiု’ pathamajhānyakiု paြñña’yacuṃce၍neso īyogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya
payyaapyaso ငါ”pā”so aṅgāraှိso， ငါ”pā”so aṅgānaှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃso， suṃ”pā”so koငya”khaြငya” guṇya
raှိso， chayyapā”so lakkhaṇānaှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃso ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityalaျှငya āruṃraှိso pathamajhānyakiု
raraှိapyapaြီ” phaြcyapesaññya． (visuddhi-1-135．)
naှcyasakyamaြtyaniု”phhayyarāso achaငya” asaṃ anaṃ’ arasā athe’athihūso āruṃငါ”pā” kāmaguṇya
tarā”tiု’kā” kilesākāma၏ taññyarāvatthu phaြcyasokaြောင’ya vatthukāma maññya၏． thiုvatthukāmakiု liုlā”
tapyamakyaso kāmarāga taṇaှာkā” kilesākāma maññya၏． yaငya” vatthukāma kilesākāmanaှင’ya
akusiုlyatarā”ā”luṃ”tiု’saññya pathamajhānya samādhiakhiုkya၌ upādya-ṭhī-bhaငya ano”phaြင’ya yogā0cara
puggiုlya၏ nāmyasantatiacañyathaငya thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyapoyanesaññya mahutyasoyalaññya” thiုkāmatiု’၏ pathamajhānya၏
thipyatiုkyachana’yakaျငyabhakya phaြcyamaှုkiုlaññya”koငya”， kāmatiု’kiု chana’yakhhāraှောငyalhaှဲ phaဲkaြñyakhaြငya”phaြင’yasālaျှငya thiုpathama
jhānyakiု rakhaြငya”kiုlaññya”koငya” vivicce0 kāmehi = vatthukāma kilesākāmatiု’maှ kaငya”chityasaññya phaြcya၍
sālaျှငyahūso īcakā”rapyaphaြင’ya bhurā”raှငyasaññya thaငyaraှာ”paြtoyamūpe၏． amiုkyatiုkyasaññya thaငyaraှာ” taññyaraှိ
nelatyasoya chīmī”roငyasaññya maphaြcya၏siု’ yaငya”kāmatiု’saññya thaငyaraှာ”taññyaraှိkunyalatyasoya ījhānyatarā”
saññyakā” maphaြcyapoyalāniုငya， thiုkāmatiု’saññya ījhānya၏ caငyacacya thipyatiုkya chana’yakaျငyabhakyaphaြcya၍ phaြcyakaြkunya၏．
īmaှာbhakyakamya”kiု chana’yakhhākhaြငya”phaြင’ya thiုmaှာbhakyakamya”kiု raraှိkhaြငya”kaဲ’siု’ thiုkāmatiု’kiု chana’yakhhākhaြငya”phaြင’yasālaျှငya
(tadaṅga vikkhambhanaā”phaြင’ya payyachana’yakhaြငya”phaြင’yasālaျှငya) thiုjhānyakiု raraှိkhaြငya”saññya phaြcyapoyalāniုငya၏．
(visuddhi-1-135-136．)
yaငya” vivicce0 kāmehi - hūsopudyaphaြင’ya vatthukāma kilesākāma naှcyamaျို”luṃ”kiု arakokyayūpā．
vivicca akusalehi dhammehi - hūsopudyaphaြင’ya kilesākāma avaငyaapā phaြcyaso kāmacchandanī0raṇa
caso nī0raṇaငါ”pā”luṃ”kiု arakokyayūpā． (visuddhi-1-135-136-kiု kaြñña’ya．)
nī0raṇatarā” ငါ”pā”
nī0raṇa ---- jhānya magya acaraှိso kusiုlyatarā”tiု’kiု tā”maြcyapityapaငyatatyaso tarā”tiု’kiု nī0raṇa
hu khoyasaññya． yaငya” nī0raṇatarā”tiု’maှာ aောkyapāatiုငya” ငါ”maျို” raှိ၏．
1． kāmacchanda = ««kāma+chanda»» kāmaguṇyakiု liုkhaျငyanaှcyasakyamaှု， tarā”kiုyyamaှာ lobhakiု arakokyayūpā．
2． baျာpāda = ««vi+āpāda»» citya၏ phokyapaြnyapaျkyacī”khaြငya” cityachiု”khaြငya”siု’ rokyakaြောငya” dosataññya”．
akusalakammapatha၌kā” sūtacyapā”kiု seceliုso phaျkyachī”liုso dosakiုsā arakokya
yūrasaññya． ī၌kā” dosatarā”ā”luṃ”kiုpaငya arakokyayūpā．
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
432
3． thina+middha = citya+cetasikyatiု’၏ le”laṃthiုငya”maှိုငya”maှုsabho， thina cetasikyanaှင’ya middha cetasikya
naှcyapā”kiုpaငya asī”asī” tarā”kiုyya kokyayūpā．
4． uddhacca+kukkucca = cityapaျံ’lhaင’yamaှုsabho + noငyatatacyaphanya pūpanyamaှုsabho， uddhacca cetasikyanaှင’ya kukkucca
cetasikyanaှcyapā”kiုpaငya asī”asī” tarā”kiုyya kokyayūpā．
5． vicikicchā = ratanāsuṃ”tanya， kaṃ-kaṃ၏akaျို”tarā” sikkhāsuṃ”rapya akaျင’yamaြtya casaññyatiု’ apoya၌
siု’lo siု’lo the”toyuṃmaှာ”maှုsabho， vicikicchācetasikyakiုpaငya arakokyayūpā．
athū”maှtyasā”ranya
thina-middhanaှင’ya uddhacca-kukkucca nī0raṇa၌ tarā”kiုyya naှcyapā”cī raraှိpālaျkya nī0raṇatacyapā”sā chiုrakhaြငya”၏
akaြောငya”maှာ īsiု’ phaြcya၏．
thinanaှင’ya middha tarā” naှcyapā”saññya ----
1． āruṃmaှ thana’yachutyamaှု kiccaā”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya”，
2． paျငya”rikhaြငya”hūso akaြောငya”ā”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya”，
3． vīriya၏chana’yakaျငyabhakya phaြcyakhaြငya”ā”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya” ---- tū၏．
uddhaccanaှင’ya kukkuccatarā”naှcyapā”saññya ----
1． āruṃ၌ cityamaငြိmyasakyakhaြငya” kiccaā”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya”，
2． chhemaျို”tiု’၏ paျkyacī”khaြငya”casaññyakiု kaြံcaññyakhaြငya”hūso akaြောငya”ā”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya”，
3． samatha၏ chana’yakaျငyabhakyaā”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya” ---- tū၏．
īsiု’ kicca， akaြောငya”， chana’yakaျငyabhakya tūsokaြောင’ya tacyapoငya”taññya” hotoyamūsaññya．
(ṭīkākaျောya)
jhānyaaṅgā ငါ”pā”
1． vitakya = ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityaāruṃpoyasiု’ cityakiု raှေ”raှုtaငyape”khaြငya”sabho，

၏， nī0raṇatarā”tiု’kiု phaျkyachī”tatyakunya၏， satyaphaြtyaññaှñya”chaဲtatyakunya၏hu chiုliုpesaññya． thiုcakā”
maှnyapesaññya ----
1． rāgahūso toင’yatakhaြငya”၏ phaြောင’yaphaြောင’ya thipyatiုkya chana’yakaျငyabhakya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’yalaññya”koငya”，
athū”thū”so āruṃtiု’phaြင’ya phaြာ”yoငya”apyasaññyaphaြcya၍ āruṃamaျို”maျို”tiု’၌ thakyavanya”kaျငya khaျာkhaျာ
laññyaneso cityakiု koငya”chā aññīaññhatya thā”tatyasokaြောင’yalaññya”koငya” samādhisaññya
kāmacchanda၏ thipyatiုkya chana’yakaျငyabhakya phaြcya၏． samādhika kāmacchandakiု payyatatyasañña’yaathakya samādhinaှင’ya
kāmacchandasaññya thipyatiုkya chana’yakaျငyabhakya phaြcya၏hu chiုliုsaññya．
2． naှcyasakyavamya”maြောkyakhaြငya” pītipāmojjatarā”၏ upādya-ṭhī-bhaငya ano”phaြင’ya thaငyaraှာ” phaြcyapoyaneso
akhaျိnyaakhā၌ baျာpāda dosatarā”saññya upādya-ṭhī-bhaငya ano”phaြင’ya thaငyaraှာ” maraှိto’paြီ phaြcya၏．
alā”tūpaငya baျာpāda dosatarā” upādya-ṭhī-bhaငya ano”phaြင’ya thaငyaraှာ” phaြcyapoyaneso akhaျိnya
akhā၌laññya” naှcyasakyavamya”maြောkyakhaြငya” pītipāmojjatarā”laññya” upādya-ṭhī-bhaငya ano”phaြင’ya thaငyaraှာ”
maraှိto’paြီ phaြcya၏． siု’soya ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityakiု āruṃpaြု၍ pīti pāmojjatarā” thaငyaraှာ”
phaြcyapoyaneso akhaျိnya၌ baျာpāda dosatarā”saññya pītipāmojjatarā”naှင’ya cittakkhaṇatacyakhu athaငya”၌
atūyaှñyathaဲ၍ phaြcyamaှု chamya”aငyasaññya kunyakhanya”shā”paြီ phaြcya၏． pītika baျာpāda dosakiု payyatatyaso
thipyatiုkyachana’yakaျငyabhakyatarā” phaြcyasokaြောင’yapaငyataññya”． siု’athakya pītisaññya baျာpādanī0raṇa၏
payyatatyaso thipyatiုkya chana’yakaျငyabhakyatarā” phaြcyarapesaññya．
3． ānāpānapaṭibhāganimitya āruṃpoyasiု’ cityakiု (sampayutyatarā”cukiု) naññya”maှnyalamya”maှnya hutyamaှnyaso
atiုငya” raှေ”raှုtaငyape”khaြငya”၏ achamya”phaြင’ya paြna’yakā”so phaြcyakhaြငya”raှိsaññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya vitakyasaññya
thinamiddhanī0raṇa၏ payyatatyaso thipyatiုkya chana’yakaျငyabhakyatarā” phaြcya၏．
4． sukhasaññya ငြိmyasakyakhaြငya” aေ”khaျmya”khaြငya” sabhoraှိsaññya၏aphaြcyakaြောင’ya maငြိmyasakyakhaြငya” noငyatatacyaphanya

phaြcya၏．

vitakko = kaြံcaññyakhaြငya” sabhosaññya vitakyataññya”hu aṭṭhakathā mina’yachiုtoyamūkhaြငya” phaြcyasaññya． thiု kaြံcaññya

1． thiုvitakyasaññya āruṃ၌ cityakiု raှေ”raှုtaငyakhaြငya” sabholakkhaṇā raှိ၏． ««cityasaññya vitakya၏ akūaññī
chamya”ā”phaြင’ya āruṃpoyasiု’ raှေ”raှုtakyarokyashā”sakaဲ’siု’ phaြcyakhaြငya”kaြောင’ya thiုvitakyakiု āruṃpoyasiု’ cityakiု
raှေ”raှုtaငyakhaြငya” sabholakkhaṇāraှိ၏hu aṭṭhakathā phhaင’yachiုtoyamūkhaြငya” phaြcyasaññya， paramatthadhammasabhā0tiု’kā”
ā”thutyakhaြငya” baျာpāra kaငya”kaြ၏． upamāchoငya၍ thaငyaraှာ”aောငyachiုrasoya īsiု’taññya” ---- maငya”nanya”toya
thaငya”siု’ vaငyaliုso tacyacuṃtacyayokyaso yokyaျာ”saññya maငya”naှင’ya akaျhamya”vaငyaso maငya”naှင’ya chhemaျို”
toyacapyaso chhemaျို”kiုsoyalaññya”koငya”， mityachhekiုsoyalaññya”koငya” amaှီpaြု၍ maငya”nanya”toyasiု’
takyarokyarasakaဲ’siု’ nokyamaှliုkya၍ vaငyarokyarasakaဲ’siု’ īupamāatūpaငya vitakyakiု amaှီpaြု၍ cityasaññya
āruṃpoyasiု’ takyarokyara၏． yaငya”siု’ phaြcyasoya vitakya maraှိso vitakyamaှ kaငya”so cityasaññya āruṃ
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
440
poyasiု’ maññyasiု’laျှငya takyarokyapāsanaññya”hu me”ငြာ”aṃ’， vitakya၏ chamya”ā”phaြင’yapaငyalaျှငya takyarokya၏ -
hu phaြcheiုlerāsaññya． athakyaphoyapaြpā thiုyokyaျာ”saññya ale’akaျင’ya ralāsaphaြင’ya thiုmaငya”kaျhamya”vaငya
so chhemaျို”mityachhenaှင’ya kaငya”၍soyalaññya” rhaṃraှာkhaြငya”kaငya”saññya phaြcya၍ yuṃmaှာ” saṃsaya maraှိmū၍ maငya”nanya”
toyasiု’ vaငyarokyaniုငyasakaဲ’siု’ īupamāatūpaငyalaျှငya ale’akaျင’yaralāsaphaြင’ya vitakyanaှင’ya kaငya”၍laññya”
vitakyamaraှိso cityasaññya āruṃsiု’ takyarokyaniုငya၏． paricaya = ale’akaျင’yarakhaြငya”hūsaññya cityasantānya
acañya၌ mapaြtyaphaြcyaso vitakyakiု phā”cekhaြငya” = vitakkabhā0nāhu khoyachiုapyaso ale’akaျင’yaphaြင’yahu
chiုliုsaññya． maှnyapesaññya --- nāmyasantatiacañya = cityasantatiacañya၌ amaြဲmapaြtya phaြcyapoyaneso vitakya၏
achamya”phaြင’ya citya၏ āruṃsiု’ raှေ”raှုtakyarokyakhaြငya”sabhosaññyakā” raှññyamaြင’yachāso akhaျိnyakālaka le’
kaျင’yakhaဲ’paြီ” le’kaျkyakhaဲ’paြီ” phaြcya၏， thiုkaြောင’ya thiုcityasaññya tacyaraṃtacyakhā vitakyanaှင’ya kaငya”၍laññya” thiုāruṃ၌
phaြcyasaññyasālaျှငyataññya”． vipassanāñāṇyanaှင’ya cittakkhaṇatacyakhuathaငya”၌ atūyaှñyathaဲ၍ phaြcyasaññyaphaြcya၍ saṅkhāra
tarā”tiု’kiု lakkhaṇāre”suṃ”tanyasiု’taငyakā raှုphā”suṃ”sapyasaññya၏ achamya”phaြင’ya kaြာmaြင’yachāso akhaျိnyakālaka
le’kaျင’yakhaဲ’paြီ” le’kaျkyakhaဲ’paြီ”so thiုcityasaññya tacyakhātacyaraṃ ñāṇyanaှင’yakaငya”၍soyalaññya” saṅkhāratarā”tiု’kiု
lakkhaṇāre”suṃ”tanyataငyakā raှုphā”suṃ”sapyasaññya၏ achamya”phaြင’ya phaြcyaniုငyasakaဲ’siု’laññya”koငya”， upamātacyanaññya”
chiုrasoya - kilesānaှင’ya atūakhaphaြcyasaññyaphaြcya၍ phaြcyaso thiုcityasaññya akhaျငya”khapyasimya” kilesāmaှ
kaငya”lhatyanesoyalaññya” raှေ”၌ le’kaျkyakhaဲ’phū”so paricaya၏ achamya”ā”phaြင’ya kilesā၏ athuṃvāsanā၏
achamya”ā”phaြင’ya phaြcyapoyaniုငyasakaဲ’siု’laññya”koငya” - īupamāatū maှtyasā”pāle． (mahāṭī-1-166．)»»
2． thiုvitakyasaññya (āhananapariyāhananaraso) āruṅkiု aca၌ khokyakhaြငya”， raှေ”raှုkhokyakhaြငya”， thakyavanya”
kaျငya khokyakhaြငya”， laှñña’yalaññya၍ khokyakhaြငya”， paြnyalaှnya၍ khokyakhaြငya” kicca raှိ၏．
vaငyasakyale-thhakyasakyalehulaññya”koငya” rupya-rupyahulaññya”koငya” īsiု’ casaññyaphaြင’ya mimi raှုphā”
nesañña’ya āruṅkiု naှluṃ”shaငya”laျkya riုkyanaှkyatī”khokyabhisakaဲ’siု’ citya၏ phaြcyakhaြငya”kiု āhananapariyāhanana
hū၍ siapya၏． (mahāṭī-1-166．)
thiုsiု’so kiccaraှိsaññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’yasālaျှငya ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityakaဲ’siု’so āruṅkiု thiုsiု’
raှေ”raှုtī”khokyakhaြငya” thakyavanya”kaျငyamaှ tī”khokyakhaြငya”kiccaraှိso vitakyaphaြင’ya yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya ānā
pāna paṭibhāganimityaāruṅkaဲ’siု’so āruṅkiု vitakyaphaြင’ya raှေ”raှုtī”khokyasaññyakiု vitakyaphaြင’ya thakyavanya”kaျငya
tī”khokyasaññyakiု paြု၏hu chiုliုpesaññya．
3． thiုvitakyasaññya āruṃ၌ = āruṃpoyasiု’ cityakiု raှေ”raှုchoငyatatya chhaဲငငyatatyaso tarā”hu yogā-
0carapuggiုlya၏ ñāṇyaā” raှေ”raှုthaငyalā၏．
vicāra ---- ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityakaဲ’siု’so āruṃ၌ thiုmaှ īmaှ shā”lākhaြငya” thiုmaှ īmaှ laှñña’yalaññya
khaြငya” chaငyakhaြငyasuṃ”sapyakhaြငya”saññya vicārataññya”． āruṃ၌ acañyamapaြtya shā”lākhaြငya” thakyavanya”kaျငyamaှ laျှောkyakhaြငya”
laှñña’yakhaြငya” nokya၌ aphanyatalaဲlaဲ kaျkyacā”khaြငya”hu chiုliုsaññya．
1． thiုvicārasaññya ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityakaဲ’siု’so āruṅkiု aphanyatalaဲlaဲ suṃ”sapyachaငyakhaြငyakhaြငya”laျှငya
maှtyakaြောငya” sabholakkhaṇā raှိ၏．
2． cittakkhaṇatacyakhuathaငya”raှိ atūyaှñyathaဲ phaြcyakaြsañña’ya citya+cetasikya = sahajātyatarā”tiု’kiု thiုāruṃ
၌ yaှñyacekhaြငya” kicca raှိ၏． ««āruṃ၌ aphanyatalaဲlaဲ laှñña’yalaññyakhaြငya”hu chiုapyaso aphanyatalaဲlaဲ suṃ”sapyakhaြငya”၏
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
441
achamya”phaြင’yasālaျှငya āruṃ၌ cittakkhaṇatacyakhuathaငya” atūyaှñyathaဲ phaြcyakaြsañña’ya cityacetasikya = sahajātya
tarā”tiု’kiု mapaြtyayaှñyacekhaြငya”kiု siraှိpāle． (mahāṭī-1-167．)»»
3． cityakiု āruṃ၌ raှေ”naှင’ya nokya chakyacapyalaျkya acañyamapaြtya phhaဲ’capyatatyaso sabhotarā”hu yogā-
0cara puggiုlya၏ ñāṇyaā” raှေ”raှုthaငyalā၏．
vitakyanaှင’ya vicāra athū”
thiု vitakya vicāra tarā”naှcyapā”tiု’၏ akhaျို’kunyaso pathamajhānyanaှင’ya kāmacityatiု’၌ makhemakhā yaှñyathaဲ
၍ phaြcyakhaြငya”saññya thaငyaraှာ”raှိsoyalaññya” citya၏ ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityakaဲ’siု’so āruṃpoya၌ raှေ”ū”chā
kaျrokyakhaြငya”sabhophaြcyaso vitakyasaññya vicārathakya runa’yaraငya”kaြmya”tamya”saññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’yalaññya”
koငya”， vicāra၏ raှေ”shā”phaြcyakhaြငya”kaြောင’yalaññya”koငya” khoငya”loငya”kiု thiု”liုkyakhaြငya”kaြောင’ya phaြcyapoya
lāso raှေ”ū”chā maြññyaso asaṃnaှင’ya tū၏． cityakiု āruṃ၌ raှေ’naှင’ya nokya chakyacapyalaျkya acañyamapaြtya
phhaဲ’capyatatyaso āruṃ၌ citya၏ acañyamapaြtyasakaဲ’siု’ phaြcyakhaြငya”hu chiုapyaso vicārasaññya vitakyaaောkya
simyamhe’saññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’yalaññya”koငya”， āruṅkiု aphanyatalaဲlaဲ suṃ”sapyachaငyakhaြငyakhaြငya” sabhoraှိsaññya၏
aphaြcyakaြောင’yalaññya”koငya” khoငya”loငya”၏ nokyachaင’ya၍ maြññyaso asaṃnaှင’ya tū၏． (aphanyatalaဲlaဲ
maြññyasoasaṃ hinya”soasaṃ ññaññya”soasaṃnaှင’ya tū၏．)
thiု’paြငya ī vitakya vicāratiု’thaငya vitakyasaññya tunyalaှုpyakhaြငya” raှိrakā” lakyamhanyaacaphaြcyarā kāla၌
citya၏ tunyalaှုpyasaññya၏ achamya”phaြင’ya phaြcyapoyalāso sabhotarā”taññya”． koငya”kaငya၌ paျံtakyakhaြငya”ငှာ
aliုraှိso ငှkyakaြီ”၏ atoငyakiု khatyasaññyanaှင’yalaññya” tū၏． anaṃ’siု’ acañyaliုkyaso anaṃ’phaြင’ya naှောငyaphhaဲ’
apyaso cityaraှိso paျာ”pitunya”၏ padummākaြာtosiု’ raှေ”raှုkaျkhaြငya”naှင’yalaññya” tū၏．
vicārakā” ငြိmyasakyaso phaြcyakhaြငya” raှိ၏． citya၏ matunyalaှုpyalhanya”sakaဲ’siု’ phaြcyapoyalāso sabho
tarā”taññya”． koငyakaငya၌ paျံtakyapaြီ”so ငှkya၏ atoငyakiု chana’yatanya”khaြငya”naှင’yalaññya” tū၏． padummā
kaြာtosiု’ raှေ”raှုkaျrokyapaြီ”so paျာ”pitunya”၏ padummākaြာto၏ athakyaaphiု’၌ bhe”ranyamaraှိsaññya၏
aphaြcyakiု cuṃcamya”khaြငya”ငှာ racyavaဲsaññyanaှင’yalaññya” tū၏．
dukanipātya aṭṭhakathā၏ achiု
koငya”kaငya၌ paျံshā”so ငှkyakaြီ”၏ atoငyanaှcyaphakyatiု’phaြင’ya lekiု yūpaြီ”၍ atoငyatiု’kiု nacyace，
ငြိmyasakyachā nece၍ paျံsanya”khaြငya”kaဲ’siု’ āruṃ၌ cityakiု raှေ”raှုcetatyasaññya၏ aphaြcyaphaြင’ya raှေ”raှုtaငyape”saññya
၏ aphaြcyaphaြင’ya phaြcyaso vitakyakiု maှtyaapya၏． lekiု yūkhaြငya”ငှာ atoငyatiု’kiု tunyalaှုpyacelaျkya ññaငyaññaငya
sāsā khatyalaျkya shā”khaြငya”kaဲ’siု’ āruṅkiု chaငyakhaြငya suṃ”sapyakhaြငya”sabhophaြင’ya phaြcyapoyalāso vicārakiု
maှtyaapya၏hu dukanipātyaaṭṭhakathā၌ phhaင’yachiုthā”၏． thiုcakā”saññya upacārasamādhiakhiုkya appanāsamādhi
akhiုkya၌ raှေ’nokya acañyaā”phaြင’ya chakyacapyalaျkya mapaြtyaphaြcyarā၌ saင’yamaြtyape၏． thiုvitakya vicāratiု’၏
thiုthū”khaြာ”khaျkyasaññyakā” pathamajhānya dutiyajhānyatiု’၌ thaငyaraှာ”pesaññya． (visuddhi-1-138．)
vitakya၏ cityakiု āruṃpoyasiု’ raှေ”raှုtaငyaso akhaြငya”arāhu chiုapyaso thū”khaြာ”maှုsaññya runa’yaraငya”
kaြmya”tamya”so sabhoraှိsaññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya pathamajhānya၌ thaငyaraှာ”၏， thiုvitakya၏ maraှိkhaြငya”kaြောင’ya
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
