pañcakanaññya”vayya dutiyajhānya၌ vicāra၏ āruṅkiု aphanyatalaဲlaဲ suṃ”sapyakhaြငya”hu chiုapyaso thū”khaြာ”maှုsaññya
thaငyaraှာ”၏． (mahāṭī-1-167．)
tacyanaññya”chiုrasoya
aññacyaakaြေ”kaငya”so kaြေ”khhakyakiု lakyatacyaphakyaphaြင’ya maြဲchākiုငya၍ kaျnyalakyatacyaphakyaphaြင’ya chapyapaြာ
maှုna’ya， chīchhatyatacyaapyaso chityamhe” casaññyaphaြင’ya paြီ”so sā”maြီ”taṃphatyaphaြင’ya phatyasasūā” maြဲmaြံchā chaဲkiုငya
thā”so lakyakaဲ’siု’ vitakyakiု maှtyaapya၏， maြဲchākiုငyathā”so lakyanaှင’ya vitakyasaññya tū၏． vicārasaññya
phatyaso lakyanaှင’ya tū၏．
tutyaphaြင’ya riုtyakhatyasaphaြင’ya aို”thinya”cakyakiု laññyace၍ aို”kiု paြုlupyaso aို”thinya”saññya၏ aို”paြုlupya
mañña’ya maြceiုငyakhaဲkiု naှိpyaso lakyanaှင’ya vitakyakā” tū၏． thiုmaှ īmaှlaññya” maြceiုငyakhaဲkiု laှñña’yalaññyasuṃ”sapyaso
lakyanaှင’ya vicārakā” tū၏．
tacyacuṃtacyakhuso are”avanya”aviုငya”kiု paြုlupyasosū၏ avanya”aviုငya” paြုlupyamañña’ya arāvatthu၏
alayya၌ ciုkyanaှkya၍ taññyaso ငြှောင’yataṃsaငya” (= saṅkhaျောငya”)naှင’ya āruṃpoyasiု’ cityakiု raှေ”raှုtaငyape”tatya
so vitakyakā” tū၏． patyapatyalaññyaso ငြှောင’yataṃsaငya” (avanya”aviုငya” phaြcyaaောငya apaြငyaka laှñña’yapatya
shā”so saṅkhaျောငya”)naှင’ya āruṃpoyakiု suṃ”sapyatatya chupyanayyatatyaso vicārakā” tū၏．
sacyapaငyasaññya aphaင’yanaှင’yalaññya”koငya” asī”naှင’yalaññya”koငya” atūtakha phaြcya၏siု’ akaြငyajhānyasaññya
īchiုapyapaြီ”so vitakyanaှင’yalaññya”koငya”， īchiုapyapaြီ”so vicāranaှင’yalaññya”koငya” atūtakha phaြcyatatya
၏， thiုkaြောင’ya ījhānyakiု savitakka savicāra = vitakyanaှင’yalaññya” atūtakha phaြcya၏hū၍ vicāranaှင’yalaññya”
atūtakha phaြcya၏hū၍ bhurā”raှငyasaññya hokaြာ”toyamūkhaြငya” phaြcyapesaññya． (visuddhi-1-138-139．)
vitakya+vicāra+pīti+sukha+ekaggatā hūso paramatthadhātyasā” tacyaluṃ”cī tacyaluṃ”cīkiု jhānyaaṅgāhu
khoyachiု၍ yaငya”jhānyaaṅgātiု’၏ apoငya”acukiုkā” jhānyahu khoyachiုpesaññya．
aphaင’ya asī” akiုငya”akhakya casaññyatiု’maှ alhatyaphaြcyaso sacyapaငyahūsaññya thaငyaraှာ” maraှိငြာ”soya
laññya” aphaင’yaraှိso sacyapaငya asī”raှိso sacyapaငyahu lūamaျာ”ka khoyachiုapyasakaဲ’siု’ alā”tūpaငya vitakya
acaraှိso jhānyaaṅgātiု’maှ alhatyaphaြcyaso jhānyahūsaññya thaငyaraှာ”maraှိsoyaငြာ”laññya” vitakyanaှင’ya atūtakha
phaြcyaso jhānya， vicāranaှင’ya atūtakhaphaြcyaso jhānyahu khoyachiုapya၏hu thaငyaraှာ”paြkhaြငya”ငှာ athakyapā asī”

soyalaññya” khaဲpaြာ”sakaဲ’siု’ taငyacā”paြောchiုso abhedabhedūpacā cakā”hu chiုliုpesaññya．)

ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”

2． kiုyyacityakiု naှcyasakyapaြñña’yaphaြို” tiု”phā”cekhaြငya” kiccaraှိ၏． tacyanaññya” mhanyamaြtyaso cittajarupyatiု’phaြင’ya tacya
kiုyyaluṃ”siု’ paျံ’naှံ’cekhaြငya” kiccaraှိ၏， ««pītinaှင’ya yaှñyathaဲlaျkyaraှိso cityasaññyalaññya” cittajarupyakiု mimi၏phaြcyachaဲ
upādyakālatiုငya”၌ phaြcyacesaññyasā phaြcya၏． yaငya”cittajarupyatiု’kā” mhanyamaြtyaso jhānyacityakaြောင’yaphaြcyarakā”
mhanyamaြtyaso paṇīta cittajarupyatiု’taññya”． yaငya”mhanyamaြtyaso cittajarupyatiု’kā” tacyakiုyyaluṃ”siု’ paျံ’naှံ’laျkya
phaြcya၏． yaငya”siု’ phaြcyacekhaြငya”saññya pīti၏lupyaငnya”kiccataññya”hu chiုliုpesaññya．»»
3． kiုyyacityanaှcyapā”kiု takyakaြha rhaှငyalanya”cetatyaso sabhotarā”hu yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ ñāṇyathaငya
raှေ”raှုthaငyalā၏．
pīti - ငါ”maျို”
thiုpītisaññya khuddikāpīti khaṇikāpīti okkantikāpīti ubbegāpīti pharaṇāpītihu ငါ”maျို” raှိ၏．
1． khuddikāpīti ---- khandhākiုyya၌ kaြkyasī”mhe”ññaငya” tharuṃmaျှkiုsālaျှငya paြုlupyakhaြငya”ငှာ chamya”niုငyaso pīti
taññya”． phaြcyapaြီ” paျkyashā”paြီ”nokya tacyaphanya khaṇikapītikaဲ’siု’ akaြိmyakaြိmya maphaြcyaso pītitaññya”．
2． khaṇikāpīti ---- khaṇatiုငya” khaṇatiုငya”၌ laျှpyacacyapaြkyasaññyanaှင’ya tūsaññyaphaြcya၍ akaြိmyamaျာ”chā phaြcyaso
pītitaññya”．
3． okkantikāpīti ---- samuddarā laှိုငya”taṃpiု”saññya samuddarākamya”siု’ sakya၍ sakya၍ paျkya၏siု’ kiုyyasiု’
sakyavaငya၍ sakyavaငya၍ paျkyaso pītitaññya”． dīrelaှိုငya”kaဲ’siု’ raငyathaဲ၌ alipyaliုkya alipyaliုkya
takyasakaဲ’siု’so pītitaññya”．
4． ubbegāpīti ---- ā”koငya”moငya”sanyaso chamya”ā”raှိso pītitaññya”． yaငya” ubbegāpītisaññya
khandhākiုyyakiု athakyasiု’ paျံtakyasaññyakiု paြု၍ koငya”kaငya၌ letiုkyakhatyaapyaso ghamya”puṅkaဲ’siု’
khunyalhaှာ”paျံtakyacekhaြငya” atiုငya”araှññyasiု’ rokyacetatya၏．
5． pharaṇāpīti ---- pharaṇāpītisaññya phaြcyapoyalāsaññyaraှိsoya khandhākiုyyatacyakhuluṃ”saññya lephaြင’ya paြñña’yace
apyaso caññyaphoငya”kaဲ’siု’laññya”koငya”， saññya”thanyachāso toငyakaျkhaျောငya”re ayañyasaññya cī”vaငya
apyaso toငyavaှmya”kaဲ’siု’laññya”koငya” acañyamapaြtya thakyavanya”kaျငyamaှ the’naှံ’ne၏． (pharaṇāpīti
ū”choငyasañña’ya cityakaြောင’yaphaြcyaso mhanyamaြtyaso cittajarupyatiု’၏ tacyakiုyyaluṃ”၌ cima’yavaငyapaျံ’naှံ’၍ phaြcya
nekhaြငya”kiု chiုliုpesaññya．)
thiုငါ”maျို”so pītisaññya passaddhi (= citya+cetasikyatiု’၏ ငြိmya”aေ”maှု) ၏ taññyarā kiုyyavanyakiု
yūlaျkya raင’yakaျkyakhaြငya”siု’ rokyalatyasoya cetasikyatiု’၏ ငြိmya”aေ”khaြငya” = kāyapassaddhi， citya၏ ငြိmya”aေ”
khaြငya” = cittapassaddhihūso naှcyamaျို”so passaddhikiု paြီ”cī”paြñña’yacuṃce၏． (pītika passaddhihūso sā”kiု phhā”၏hu
chiုliုsaññya．)
passaddhisaññya kiုyyavanyakiု yūlaျkya raင’yakaျkyakhaြငya”siု’ rokyalatyasoya kāyikasukha = kiုyya၌ phaြcya
so khaျmya”sā， cetasikasukha = citya၌ phaြcyaso khaျmya”sāhūso naှcyamaျို”so khaျmya”sāsukhakiု paြီ”cī”
paြñña’yacuṃce၏． (passaddhihūso mikhaငyaka sukhahūso sā”kiု phhā”paြnyasaññyahūliု．)
sukhasaññya kiုyyavanyakiု yūlaျkya raင’yakaျkyakhaြငya”siု’ rokyalatyasoya khaṇikasamādhi upacārasamādhi
appanāsamādhihūso suṃ”maျို”so cityataññyakaြññyamaှုsamādhikiု paြီ”cī”paြñña’yacuṃce၏． (pīti၏sā”kā” passaddhi，
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
444
passaddhi၏ sā”kā” sukha， sukha၏sā”kā” samādhiphaြcya၍ maြcyarapaြီ hūliု．) thiုငါ”maျို”so pītitiု’thaငya akaြငya
pharaṇāpītisaññya appanājhānyasamādhi၏ araငya”amaြcya mūlatarā” phaြcya၍ appanājhānyasamādhi maphaြcyamī raှေ”၌
phaြcyaso upacārasamādhinaှင’ya atūyaှñyathaဲphaြcya၍ acañyasaphaြင’ya kaြီ”phā”tiု”takyakhaြငya”siု’ rokyaraှိlatyasoya
appanājhānyasamādhinaှင’ya atūyaှñyathaဲ၍ phaြcyakhaြငya”siု’ rokyaraှိlāso akaြငyapharaṇāpīti (= tacyakiုyyaluṃ”siု’
cima’yathuṃ၍ paျံ’naှံ’phaြcyaphā”neso pīti) saññya raှိ၏， īappanājhānyasamādhinaှင’ya yaှñyathaဲlaျkyaraှိso pharaṇāpītikiု
ījhānyaaṅgāငါ”pā”thaငya pāvaငyaso pītisukhaṃhūso īarā၌ pītihū၍ aliုraှိapyape၏．
(visuddhi-1-139-140．)
sukha
sukhanaṃ sukhaṃ， suṭṭhu vā khādati， khanati ca kāyacittābādhanti sukhaṃ， taṃ sātalakkhaṇaṃ， sampayuttānaṃ
upabaြူhanarasaṃ， anuggahapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ． (visuddhi-1-140．)
khaျmya”sākhaြငya”sabhosaññya sukha maññya၏． tacyanaññya”chiုrasoya akaြငyatarā”sabhosaññya kiုyya၏
kaျငyanākhaြငya” citya၏ kaျငyanākhaြငya” kiုyyanā cityanākiု koငya”chā khaဲcā”tatya၏． thiုkaြောင’ya thiုtarā”sabho
saññya sukha maññya၏． tacyanaññya”chiုrasoya akaြငyatarā”sabhosaññya kiုyya၏ kaျငyanākhaြငya” citya၏ kaျငyanākhaြငya”
kiုyyanā cityanākiု tū”phaြိုtatya၏， thiုkaြောင’ya thiုtarā”sabhosaññya sukha maññya၏．
1． thiုsukhasaññya thiုsukhanaှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃso puggiုlyakiုlaññya”koငya”， cittakkhaṇatacyakhuathaငya” mimisukhanaှင’ya atū
yaှñyathaဲ phaြcyakaြsañña’ya sampayutya = citya+cetasikya tarā”cukiုlaññya”koငya” sāyācetatyaso sabho
lakkhaṇāraှိ၏． (miminaှင’ya cittakkhaṇa tacyakhuathaငya” atūyaှñyathaဲ phaြcyakaြsañña’ya sampayutya = citya+cetasikya
tarā”cutiု’kiု raapyaso sāyāphhayya raှိsaññyatiု’kiု paြုlupyatatya၏hu chiုliုsaññya． sukhakā” koငya”so
iṭṭhasabho raှိsaññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya thiုsukhanaှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃso puggiုlyakiုlaññya”koငya”， miminaှင’ya cittakkhaṇa
tacyakhuathaငya”၌ atūyaှñyathaဲ phaြcyasañña’ya citya+cetasikya = sampayutyatarā”tiု’kiုlaññya”koငya” mimi၌ sāyā
cetatyaso sabholakkhaṇāraှိ၏ hūliုsaññya．)
2． atūyaှñyaphakya cityacetasikya sampayutyatarā”tiု’kiု tiု”phā”cekhaြငya” kiccaraှိ၏．
3． āruṅkiု aphanyaphanya yūtatyaso sabhotarā”hu yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ asiñāṇyavayya raှေ”raှု thaငya
lā၏． (dukkhavedanākā” dukkhavedanā၏ taññyarā āruṅkiု chana’yalhaှtyatatya၏． upekkhāvedanākā” upekkhā
vedanā၏ āruṅkiု laျcyalaျူ raှုtatya၏． ī sukhavedanākā” sukhavedanā၏ taññyarāāruṅkiု dukkhavedanā
kaဲ’siု’laññya” machana’yalhaှtya， upekkhāvedanākaဲ’siု’laññya” laျcyalaျူ maraှုmū၍ sukhavedanā၏ taññyarāāruṅkiု aphanya
talaဲlaဲ thapyakāthapyakā yūtatyaso sabhotarā”taññya” hu thiုsukhavedanākiု lakkhaṇa-rasa-paccupaṭṭhānyapadaṭṭha
mnyanaññya”ā”phaြင’ya kaြိtyakhaျreှုphā”neso yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ ñāṇya0thaငya thaငyalā၏hu chiုliုpesaññya，，)
tacyanaññya” sukhavedanāsaññya miminaှင’ya yaှñyaphakya cityacetasikya = sampayutyatarā”tiု’ā” kaျေ”jū”paြုtatya
khaျီ”maြှောkyatatyaso sabhotarā”hu yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ ñāṇyavayya raှေ”raှုthaငyalā၏．
thiုpītisukhatiု’၏ akhaျို’so pathamajhānyacaso tarā”၌ makhemakhā atūyaှñyathaဲ၍ phaြcyamaှုsaññya thaငya
raှာ” raှိpāsoyalaññya” aliုraှိapya naှcyasakyaapyaso iṭṭhāruṅkiု rakhaြငya”၏ achamya”phaြင’ya phaြcyaso naှcyasakyakhaြငya”
saññya pīti maññya၏． raraှိapyapaြီ”so āruṃ၏ arasākiု khaṃcā”khaြငya”saññya (khaျmya”khaျmya”sāsā khaṃcā”khaြငya”saññya)
sukha maññya၏．
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
445
akaြငya cittuppādya (= cittakkhaṇatacyakhuathaငya”raှိ yaှñyaphakya citya+cetasikyatarā”cu)၌ pītisaññya raှိ၏，
thiုpītiraှိso cittuppādya၌ sukhasaññya amaြဲraှိ၏． akaြငya cittuppādya၌ sukhasaññya raှိ၏． thiုsukharaှိso cittuppādya၌
maြဲsoā”phaြင’ya pītiraှိsaññyakā” mahutya． (raှိsaññyalaññya” raှိ၏， maraှိsaññyalaññya”raှိ၏ hūliုsaññya， catukkanaññya”ara
tatiyajhānya pañcakanaññya”ara catutthajhānya casaññyatiု’၌ sukhasāyaှñya၍ pītimayaှñyamaှုkiု athū”raññyaññhaှnya”saññya，，)
pītikiု khandhāငါ”pā”tiု’thaငya saṅkhārakkhandhā၏ aphaြcyaphaြင’ya simya”kaျုံ”rethakyaapya၏． sukhakiု vedanākkhandhā၏
aphaြcyaphaြင’ya simya”kaျုံ”rethakyaapya၏． nhekālavayya remaraှိso kantāra kharī”khaဲsiု’ shā”khaြငya”kaြောင’ya paငyapanya”
sasūā” cimya”ciု ññiု maှိုငya”so toaုpyakaြီ”kiု laှmya”maြငyaliုkyarasoakhā “īkharī”khaဲalhanya cimya”ciု ññiု maှိုငya”
so toaုpyakaြီ”athaငya”vayya jātassara reိုငya raှိpāsaññya”hu kharī”raငyachiုငyalāsū tacyaū”thaṃmaှ paြောcakā”kiု
kaြာ”rasoakhātiု’၌ naှcyasakyaā”ramya” rhaှငyalanya”khaြငya”kā” pītitaññya”． thiုpītikaဲ’siု’ ānāpānapaṭibhāga
nimityakaဲ’siု’so aliုraှိapya naှcyasakyaapyaso iṭṭhāruṅkiု raraှိsoakhā၌ lhanyachā naှcyasakyaā”ramya” rhaှငyalanya”
khaြငya”sabhokiု pītihu maှtyapā． toaုpyakaြီ”athaငya”siု’ vaငyasoakhā， toaုpyaathaငya”raှိ aripyaāvāsa
aောkyasiု’ vaငyasoakhā， rekiု suṃ”choငyasoakhātiု’၌ khaျmya”sāsañña’ya khaṃcā”maှုkā” sukhataññya”． thiုsukha
kaဲ’siု’ mimiraraှိapyaso ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityakaဲ’siု’so raraှိapyapaြီ”so āruṃ၏ arasākiု khaျmya”khaျmya”
sāsā khaṃcā”soakhā၌ khaျmya”sāmaှုkiု sukhahu maှtyasā”pāle． thiုthiု akhaျိnyaakhākāla samaya၌ thaငyaraှာ”
sokaြောင’ya īsiု’ akhiုkyaatana’ya akhaျိnyakālakiု khhaဲkhaြာ”၍ athakyapāatiုငya” phhaင’yachiုkhaြငya”phaြcyasaññyahu siraှိ
pāle． īsiု’laျှငya īpītisaññyalaññya”koငya” īsukhasaññyalaññya”koငya” thiုjhānyaā” (thiုjhānya၌ ) raှိso
kaြောင’ya ījhānyakiု pīti sukharaှိso jhānyahu khoyachiုapyapesaññya． (visuddhi-1-140-141．)
alhanya kaြññyalaငya tokyapaso ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityakiု āruṃpaြု၍ phaြcyapoyalāso ī
phoyapaြpā vitakya vicāra pīti sukha ekaggatā hūso jhānyaaṅgā ငါ”pā”raှိso jhānyakā” pathamajhānyataññya”．
siု’athakya īpathamajhānyakā” pañcaṅgasamannāgata = aṅgāငါ”pā”naှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃso jhānyataññya”．
aṅgā ငါ”pā”kiု payya၏
athakyathaငya raှငya”paြkhaဲ’so kāmacchanda， baျာpāda， thinamiddha， uddhaccakukkucca， vicikicchā - ījhānyakiု maraaောငya
tā”maြcyapityachiု’tatyaso nī0raṇatarā”ငါ”pā”tiု’kiု payyasaññya၏ achamya”phaြင’ya payyaapyapaြီ”so aṅgā ငါ”pā”
raှိsaññya၏ aphaြcyakiု siraှိpāle． thiုnī0raṇatarā”tiု’kiု mapayyaapyakunyasaññyaraှိsoya jhānyasaññya maphaြcyapoya
lāniုငya， thiုkaြောင’ya thiုnī0raṇatarā”tiု’kiု thiုjhānya၏ payyaapyaso aṅgātiု’hū၍ khoyachiုapyakunya၏． jhānya
akhiုkya၌ nī0raṇamaှ tacyapā”so akhaြာ”so akusiုlyatiု’kiုlaññya” payyaapyasaññyakā” maှnya၏， nī0raṇamaှ
tacyapā”so akusiုlyatarā” ā”luṃ”tiု’saññyalaññya” kaငya”paျောkyanesaññyakā” maှnya၏． siု’soyalaññya” thiု
nī0raṇatiု’kasālaျှငya athū”saphaြင’ya jhānya၏ antarāyyakiု paြုlupyatatyakunya၏． thiုkaြောင’ya pañcaṅgavippahīna =
nī0raṇatarā” ငါ”pā”kiု payyakhaြငya”kiုsālaျှငya phhaင’yachiုkhaြငya” phaြcyapesaññya．
sakyaraှိsakyamaဲ’ kāmavatthu acucuhu khoyachiုapyaso athū”thū”so āruṅkiု liုlā”tapyamakyakhaြငya”
sabhokā” kāmacchandataññya”． yaငya”kāmacchandasaññya cityakiု athū”thū”so āruṃphaြင’ya phaြာ”yoငya” she”choငya
tatya၏． kāmacchandaka athū”thū”so āruṃphaြင’ya banya”paြlaျkya aphaြာ”yoငya”khaṃraso cityasaññya ānāpāna
paṭibhāganimityakaဲ’siု’so tacyakhutaññya”so āruṃ၌ koငya”chā mataññyato’pe． kāmacchanda၏ lhaှmya”miု”phicī”
maှုkiု khaṃraso athū”thū”so āruṃphaြင’ya aphaြာ”yoငya”khaṃraso thiုcityasaññya kāmadhātyakiု kaျောyalhaှာ” lhanya
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
446
maြောkyakhaြငya”ငှာ kaျင’yarasañña’ya kaျင’yavatya paṭipatya phaြcyaso jhānyakiု raraှိaောငya makaျင’yaniုငyato’pe．
phaျkyachī”liုso paျkyacī”celiုso baျာpāda = dosatarā”kalaññya” makaျnepyaphhayya āruṃamaျို”maျို”၌
cityakiု ññaှñya”panya”naှိpyacakyatatyapaြnya၏ = makaျnepyaaောငya paြုlupyape”tatyapaြnya၏． baျာpāda dosaka āruṃamaျို”
maျို”၌ makaျnepyaaောငya naှိpyacakyaliုkyasaphaြင’ya anaှိpyacakyakhaṃraso cityasaññya makaျnepyaniုငyasañña’ya āruṃamaျို”maျို”siု’
taracapya akaြာ” malapyaaောငya paြေ”shā”nesaphaြင’ya ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityakaဲ’siု’so āruṃtacyakhutaññya”
poya၌ akaြာ” malapyaaောငya chakyatiုkya maphaြcyaniုငyato’pe．
citya-cetasikyatiု’၏ thiုငya”maှိုငya” le”laṃmaှု = thinamiddhasaññya naှိpyacakyathā”apyaso cityasaññyalaññya”
ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityaāruṅkaဲ’siု’so bhā0nāāruṅkiု āruṃpaြု၍ phā”maျာ”neraso bhā0nāmaှုā”
malaျောkyapatyasaññyasā phaြcyapesaññya．
bhā0nāāruṃmaှ cityapaျံ’lhaင’yanemaှု = uddhacca， noငyatatacyaphanya pūpanyamaှု = kukkuccatarā”saññya naှိpyacakya
thā”apyaso cityasaññyalaññya” maငြိmyamasakyasaññyasālaျှငya phaြcya၍ ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityakaဲ’siု’so bhā0nā
āruṃ၌ amaြဲmataññya khaျာkhaျာlaññyalaျkya thiုthiုāruṃ၌ laှñña’yalaññya lelhaင’yanetatya၏．
ratanāsuṃ”tanya kaṃ-kaṃ၏akaျို”tarā”tiု’apoya၌ yuṃmaှာ”saṃsaya raှိneso sabhotarā”， sīla
kaျင’yacañya samādhikaျင’yacañya paññākaျင’yacañyahūso sikkhāsuṃ”rapyaakaျင’yamaြtya၌ yuṃmaှာ”saṃsaya raှိneso
sabhotarā”kā” vicikicchātaññya”． athū”saphaြင’ya īapiုငya”vayya ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityakaဲ’siု’so samatha
nimityakiု āruṃyū၍ jhānyasamādhikiု raaောငya samādhithūthoငyanesañña’ya samādhikaျင’yacañya၌ yuṃmaှာ”saṃsaya
raှိmaှုkā” vicikicchāpaငyataññya”． yaငya”vicikicchātarā”ka naှိpyacakyathā”apyaso yaငya”vicikicchātarā”၏ naှိpyacakyamaှု
daṇyakhaျkyakiု laှlaှkaြီ” 00kaြီ” khaṃyūneraso cityasaññya ānāpānajhānyakaဲ’siု’so jhānyarakhaြငya”kiု paြီ”cī”ce
tatyasoakaျင’ya lamya”riု”kaြီ”poyasiု’ matakyarokyaliု phaြcyanetatya၏． (yakhukhetya၌ jhānyamaraniုငyahūso
ayūachamaျို”taññya”．)
īsiု’laျှငya tacyapā”so akusiုlyatarā”tiု’maှ thū”soā”phaြင’ya jhānyatarā”naှင’ya thipyatiုkyaphaြောင’yaphaြောင’ya
chana’yakaျငyabhakya phaြcyarakā” jhānyarakhaြငya”၏ antarāyyakiု paြုtatyasaññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya thiု kāmacchanda caso
ငါ”pā”so nī0raṇatarā”tiု’kiုsālaျှငya pahānaṅga = payyaapyaso aṅgārapyatiု’၌ phhaင’yachiုapyakunya၏．
(visuddhi-1-141-142．)
aṅgāငါ”pā”naှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃ၏
vitakyasaññya āruṃ၌ (āruṃpoyasiု’) cityakiု raှေ”raှုtaငyape”tatya၏， vicārasaññya āruṃ၌ cityakiု raှေ’naှင’ya
nokya acañyamapaြtyaaောငya phhaဲ’capyatatya၏． thapyamaṃ၍ raှငya”aောငyachiုrasoya īsiု’ phaြcya၏．
vitakyasaññya ānāpānapaṭibhāganimitya āruṃpoyasiု’ cityakiု raှေ”raှု taငyape”tatya၏． vicārasaññya
ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityaāruṃ၌ cityakiု raှေ”naှင’yanokya acañyamapaြtyaaောငya phhaဲ’capyatatya၏． ānāpānajhānyakiု
rakhaြငya”၏ akaြောငya”phaြcyakunyaso thiုvitakya vicāratiု’phaြင’ya ānāpānapaṭibhāga nimityaāruṃmaှ paြငyapaāruṃ amaျို”
maျို”siု’ cityamapaျံ’lhaင’yakhaြငya”ငှာ paြီ”cī”cepyaso bhā0nāpayogaraှိso citya၏ (īarā၌ vitakyaka ānā
pānapaṭibhāganimitya āruṃpoyasiု’ bhā0nācityakiု raှေ”raှု taငyape”khaြငya”， vicāraka ānāpānapaṭibhāganimitya
āruṅkiု thapyakāthapyakā chaငyakhaြငyasuṃ”sapyakhaြငya”saññyapaငya bhā0nāpayogahu maှtyapā．) bhā0nāpayoga၏
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
447
paြñña’yacuṅkhaြငya”kaြောင’ya phaြcyapoyalāso pītika ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityaāruṅkiု roင’yaraဲnaှcyasakyakhaြငya”kiု， sukha
kalaññya” yaှñyaphakya cityacetasikyatarā”tiု’kiု tiု”phā”khaြငya”kiု paြုlupyape”tatya၏． thiုsiု’ paြုlatyasoya vitakya
vicāra pīti sukhamaှ kaြhaငya”so phassa caso yaှñyaphakya sampayutyatarā”cunaှင’ya takhaso thiုcityakiု thiုvitakya
vicāra pīti sukhatiု’ka ānāpānapaṭibhāganimitya āruṃpoyasiု’ raှေ”raှုtaငyape”khaြငya” ānāpānapaṭibhāganimitya
āruṃ၌ raှေ”naှင’yanokyakiု acañyamapaြtyaaောငya phhaဲ’capyape”khaြငya”， ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityaāruṅkiု roင’yaraဲ naှcya
sakyakhaြငya”， sampayutyatarā”tiု’kiု tiု”phā”cekhaြငya”tiု’phaြင’ya khaျီ”paင’yathā”၏． thiုsiု’ khaျီ”paင’yakhaṃraso cityanaှင’ya atū
yaှñyathaဲphaြcyaso alā”tū akhaျီ”paင’yakhaṃraso ekaggatāsaññya ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityataññya”hūso tacyakhu
taññya”so sabhoraှိso āruṃ၌ saddhā vīriya sati samādhi paññāhūso indaြေငါ”pā” ññīmaျှsaññya၏
achamya”phaြင’ya bhā0nācityakiု aññīaññhatyathā”၏． chana’yakaျငyabhakya nī0raṇatarā”tiု’maှ ve”saññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya
ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityaāruṃmaှ cityathana’yachutyamaှု cityapaျံ’lhaင’yamaှုtiု’၏ kaငya”khaြငya”phaြင’ya ānāpānapaṭibhāganimitya
āruṃ၌ bhā0nācityakiု koငya”chālaññya” thā”၏． thiုkaြောင’ya vitakya vicāra pīti sukha cittekaggatā
hūso īငါ”pā”so tarā”tiု’၏ thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyapoyalāsaññya၏ achamya”ā”phaြင’ya īpathamajhānyakiု ငါ”pā”so
aṅgānaှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃsaññya၏ aphaြcyakiု siraှိpāle．
maှnyapesaññya - thiုငါ”pā”kunyasotarā”tiု’saññya thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyakunyalatyasoya jhānyasaññya phaြcyapoyalāsaññya
maññya၏． thiုkaြောင’ya thiုpathamajhānya၏ thiုvitakyacaso tarā”ငါ”pā”tiု’kiု paြñña’yacuṃso aṅgārapyatiု’hū၍ chiုapya
kunya၏． thiုkaြောင’ya thiုvitakyacaso jhānyaaṅgāငါ”pā”tiု’naှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃso jhānyamaှ akhaြာ”tacyapā”sālaျှငyaphaြcya
so jhānyamaññyasaññya raှိse”၏hū၍kā” mayūsaင’yato’paြီ． thaငyaraှာ”ceṃ’ -- acityaapiုငya” aṅgāmaျှ၏ achamya”
phaြင’yasālaျှငya aṅgāle”pā”raှိso cacyasaññyahū၍laññya”koငya”， aṅgāငါ”pā”raှိso tūriyāhū၍laññya”koငya”，
aṅgāraှcyapā”raှိso magyahū၍laññya”koငya” khoyachiု၏siု’ alā”tūpaငya ījhānyakiုlaññya” jhānya၏ acityaapiုငya”
aṅgāmaျှ၏ achamya”phaြင’yasālaျှငya jhānyaaṅgāငါ”pā”raှိso jhānyahū၍laññya”koငya”， jhānyaaṅgāငါ”pā”naှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃso
jhānyahū၍ laññya”koငya” khoyachiု၏hu siraှိpāle． (visuddhi-1-142．) (tacyakhucīkiု jhānyaaṅgāhukhoya၍ ငါ”pā”
apoငya”acukiု jhānyahu khoyachiုliုsaññyahu maှtyapā．)
thiုjhānyaaṅgā ငါ”pā”tiု’saññya upacārasamādhiakhiုkya၌laññya” thaငyaraှာ”raှိkaြkunyasaññyasā phaြcya၏． siု’soya
laññya” upacārasamādhiakhiုkya၌ paြkate’so kāmā0caracityathakyakā” ā”koငya”moငya”sanyachā phaြcyapoya
lākaြkunya၏． athū”maှာ īappanāsamādhi = appanājhānyacityaakhiုkya၌kā” upacārasamādhi akhiုkyaatana’ya
thakyalaññya” alhanyaaငyaā” kaြီ”mā”lākaြkunya၏． rūpā0carajhānya lakkhaṇāsiု’ rokyaraှိlākaြkunya၏．
maှnyapesaññya ----
ī appanājhānyasamādhiakhiုkya၌ vitakyasaññya alhanyasana’yaraှငya” thaငyaraှာ”so akhaြငya”arāā”phaြင’ya
ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityaāruṃ၌ bhā0nācityakiု raှေ”raှုtaငyalaျkya takyacelaျkya phaြcyapoyalā၏． vicāra
saññyakā” paññānaှင’ya alā”tū၍ alhanyaakaဲlaျှငya ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityaāruṅkiု suṃ”sapyachaငyakhaြငyalaျkya
phaြcyapoyalā၏． pītinaှင’ya sukhasaññyakā” aluṃ”cuṃso acityaapiုငya”raှိsaññyalaññya”phaြcyaso rūpakāyatacyakhu
luṃ”kiု paျံ’naှံ’laျkya paြñña’yacelaျkya phaြcyapoyalā၏． thiုkaြောင’ya ----
nāssa kiñci sabbā0to kāyassa vivekajena pītisukhena apphuṭaṃ hoti， (dī-1-70．)
= thiုjhānyakiု raraှိso jhānalābhīpuggiုlya၏ aluṃ”cuṃso acityaapiုငya”raှိso rūpakāya tacyakhuluṃ”၏
nī0raṇakaငya”chityakhaြငya”kaြောင’ya phaြcyapoya၍lāso naှcyasakyakhaြငya” pīti khaျmya”sākhaြငya” sukhaphaြင’ya mathe’thiapya
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
448
so tacyacuṃtacyakhuso arapya acityaapiုငya”saññyakā” maraှိto’pe ---- hū၍ bhurā”raှငya kiုyyatoyatiုငya
hokaြာ”thā”toyamūpaြီ．
aောkyaphaြcyaso aုpyama (= kaြုtyaacyakaြီ”) apaြငya၌ athakyaphaြcyaso aုpyaphuṃ” (= kaြုtyaphuṃ”) apaြငyasaññya
koငya”chā ace’acapya malapyamalacya thi၏siု’ cittekaggatāsaññyalaññya” ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityaāruṃ၌
koငya”chā thakyavanya”kaျငyamaှ koငya”chā thisaññyaphaြcya၍ phaြcyapoyalā၏． īsaññyapaငyalaျှငya thiုrūpa0carajhānya
lakkhaṇāsiု’ rokyaraှိnekaြkunyaso jhānyaaṅgā ငါ”pā”tiု’၏ upacārasamādhi akhiုkya၌ phaြcyaso jhānyaaṅgā
ငါ”pā”tiု’maှ thū”khaြာ”khaျkyataññya”．
thiုjhānyaaṅgātiု’thaငya cittekaggatākiု savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ caso athakyathaငya phoyapaြthā”so ī
pāḷitoya၌ sarupyathutya၍ tiုkyariုkyamahokaြာ”apya maññhaှnyapaြapyasaññyakā” maှnya၏． siု’soyalaññya” abhidhammā
vibhaငya”pāḷitoya၌ ----
jhānanti vitakko vicāro pīti sukhaṃ cittassekaggatā． (abhi-2-267．)
= jhānyahūsaññya vitakya vicāra pīti sukha ekaggatā (= cittassekaggatā) (ītarā”ငါ”pā”tiု’၏ apoငya”)
taññya”hu īsiု’ bhurā”raှငya hokaြာ”thā”toyamūsokaြောင’ya cittekaggatāsaññyalaññya” jhānyaaṅgā maññyasaññya
sā phaြcyapesaññya． maှnyapesaññya ---- akaြငya vitakya casaññyatiု’naှင’ya takhaphaြcyaso jhānadhammakiု paြliုso
chandatoyaphaြင’ya savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ casaññyaphaြင’ya akaျñya” uddesakiု bhurā”raှငyasaññya paြုtoyamūapya၏． thiုvitakya
casaññyatiု’naှင’ya atūtakhaphaြcyaso jhānadhammakiု paြliုso chandatoyakiုpaငyalaျှငya thiုmaြtyachābhurā”saññya vibhaငya”
pāḷitoya၌ paြtoyamūapya၏ maှtyapā． (visuddhi-1-142．)
koငya”khaြငya”suṃ”phaြာ lakkhaṇāchayyapā”
1． paṭipadāvisuddhi = pathamajhānyasiု’ rokyakaြောငya”phaြcyaso akaျင’ya၏ caငyakaြyyakhaြငya”saññya pathamajhānya၏
aca maññya၏． yaငya”aca၌ lakkhaṇāsuṃ”pā” raှိ၏．
2． upekkhābaြူhanā = tataြmajjhattupekkhā၏ phā”khaြငya”saññya pathamajhānya၏ alayya maññya၏． yaငya”alayya
၌ lakkhaṇāsuṃ”pā” raှိ၏．
3． sampahaṃsanā = rhaှငyakhaြငya” kaြññyalaငyakhaြငya”saññya pathamajhānya၏ achuṃ” maññya၏． yaငya”achuṃ”၌ lakkhaṇā
le”pā” raှိ၏．
īsiု’laျှငya pathamajhānya၌ koငya”khaြငya”suṃ”phaြာ lakkhaṇāchayyapā” raှိpesaññya． raှိpuṃmaှာ īsiု’ phaြcya၏．
paṭipadāvisuddhi ---- alhanyakaြññyalaငyatokyapaneso ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityakiု āruṃyū၍ yaငya”
ānāpānapaṭibhāganimitya āruṃ၌ bhā0nācityakiု ငြိmyavapyachā kapyathā”laျkya ānāpānassatisamādhikiု
chakyalakya thūthoငyalārā akaြငyajovāra၌ appanājhānyajosaññya phaြcyapoyalā၏． thiု appanājovāra၌
akaြငya nī0raṇahu khoyachiုapyaso kilesātarā”apoငya”saññya thiုpathamajhānya၏ bhe”ranyataññya”， thiု
nī0raṇahu khoyachiုapyaso jhānya၏ bhe”ranyamaှ pathamajhānyacityasaññya caငyakaြyyashā”၏． (1)
nī0raṇahūso jhānya၏ bhe”ranyamaှ caငyakaြyyasokaြောင’ya jhānyakiု maraaောငya pityakhayya phuṃ”lhaှmya”
thā”tatyaso nī0raṇamaှ kaငya”saññyaphaြcya၍ (nī0raṇakiု payyakhhā၍) alayyaalatya phaြcyaso samathanimityakiု
kaျင’ya၏．
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
449
majjhimaṃ samathanimittaṃ nāma samappa0tto appanāsamādhiye0． (visuddhi-1-144．)
ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityaāruṃmaှ bhā0nācitya၏ thana’yachutyashā”khaြငya”， paျံ’lhaင’yashā”khaြငya”siု’ makapyarokya
saphaြင’ya aññīaññhatya phaြcyaneso appanājhānyasamādhisaññyapaငyalaျှငya bhā0nāāruṃmaှ citya၏ thana’yachutyakhaြငya”，
paျံ’lhaင’yakhaြငya”hu chiုapyaso achanya”naှcyaphakyatiု’kiု makapyarokyasaphaြင’ya alayyaalatya lamya”maှnyaphaြcyaso majjhima
samathanimitya maññya၏． yaငya”pathamajhānya appanājhānyasamādhisaññya athakyaathakyaso jhānyacaso tarā”
thū” tarā”maြtyatiု’၏ akaြောငya”raငya”laññya” phaြcyasokaြောင’ya samathanimityahūso amaññyakiု raraှိkhaြငya” phaြcyape
saññya．
thiုappanājhānyaā” akhaြာ”maraှိsoā”phaြင’ya kaျေ”jū”paြုkhaြငya”hu chiုapyaso anantarapaccayasattiphaြင’ya
kaျေ”jū”paြုtatyaso raှေ”phaြcyaso gotaြbhucityasaññya tacyakhutaññya”so nāmyasantatiacañya၌ ññhatyaceso
paြောငya”laဲlāso ekattanaññya”ā”phaြင’ya maှnyasoaphaြcya appanājhānyasamādhi၏ achamya”sattiphaြင’ya koငya”chā
taññyakaြññyasaññya၏ aphaြcyasiု’ (= thiုappanājhānyasamādhi၏ akhaြငya”arāā”phaြင’ya phaြcyakhaြငya”siု’) kapyarokya
saññyaphaြcya၍ alayyaalatyaphaြcyaso majjhima samathanimityakiု kaျင’yasaññya maññya၏， alayyaalatya phaြcyaso
majjhimasamathanimityasiု’ rokyaraှိsaññya maññya၏． (2)
īsiု’ kaျင’yasokaြောင’ya īsiု’ majjhimasamathanimityasiု’ chiုkyarokyasaññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya thiုappanā
jhānyasamādhi၏ akhaြငya”arāā”phaြင’ya phaြcyakhaြငya”siု’ kapyarokyalāsaphaြင’ya thiု samathanimitya၌ paြေ”vaငyasaññya maññya
၏． ««majjhimasamathanimityasiု’ chiုkyarokyaso thiုkhaṇa၌paငyalaျှငya thiုsiု’ taññyakaြññyaso akhaြငya”arāraှိso
appanājhānyasamādhi၏ aphaြcyasiု’ kapyarokyakhaြငya”phaြင’ya appanājhānyasamādhiphaြင’ya cityataññyakaြññyasaññya၏ aphaြcyasiု’
rokyaraှိrakā” thiုmajjhimasamathanimitya၌ paြေ”vaငyasaññya maññya၏．»» (3)
īsiု’ chiုapyapaြီ”so naññya”phaြင’ya raှေ”ū”chā raှေ”phaြcyaso gotaြbhucitya၌ thaငyaraှာ”raှိso ----
1． nī0raṇabhe”ranyatiု’maှ caငyakaြyyakhaြငya”，
2． alayyaalatyaphaြcyaso majjhimasamathanimityasiု’ chiုkyarokyakhaြငya”，
3． thiုmajjhimasamathanimitya၌ paြေ”vaငyakhaြငya”tiု’kiု paြီ”cī”cetatyaso pathamajhānya၏ phaြcyachaဲ uppādyakhaṇa၌sālaျှငya
lākhaဲ’rālamya”kaြောငya” kaျင’yavatyapaṭipatya၏ achamya”phaြင’ya paṭipadā visuddhikiု siraှိpāle．
(visuddhi-1-144． mahāṭī-1-173．)

sakhaငya maြိnyaniု”thaငyaso bhojañyakiုsālaျှငya phaဲtoyataññyasaññyaphaြcyasoya chulābhya၏ rakhaြငya”aphiု’raှိsaññya phaြcya၏
siု’ - īupamāatūpaငya īyogā0carapuggiုlyasaññyalaññya” raှေ”jhānyakiု rasoakhiုkya၌ bhojañyacasaññya၌
taññyakunyaso jhānyakiု rakhaြငya” lupyaငnya”kiccakiု paြီ”cī”cetatyakunyaso akhaြငya”arā ākāratiု’kiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya

tiုငya” aphanyaphanya athapyathapya yaငya” appanājhānyasamādhikiု rale’raှိniုငya၏． thiုkaြောင’ya thiုyogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya
sā”maြီ”phaျာ”kiု maှnyaaောငya pacyaniုငyaso le”samā”kaဲ’siု’laññya”koငya”， cā”toyakaဲkaဲ’siု’laññya”koငya” pathama
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”

jhānyakiု rakaြောငya”phaြcyasañña’ya akhaြငya”arā ākāratiု’kiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”yūapya simya”chaññya”apyapesaññya．
(visuddhi-1-145-146．)
pathamajhānyarakaြောငya” akhaြငya”arānimityakiု maှtyasā”khaြငya”kaြောင’ya tacyaphanya thiုpathamajhānya rakaြောငya”
akhaြငya”arā ākāratiု’kiု paြီ”cī”paြñña’yacuṃceso thiုyogā0carapuggiုlyaā” appanājhānyamaျှsaññyasālaျှငya
paြီ”cī”paြñña’yacuṃniုငya၏， maြင’yaraှññyachā taññyataṃ’khiုငyamaြဲkhaြငya”mūkā” mapaြñña’yacuṃniုငyase”． alaျောyaā”phaြင’ya chiုramū - samādhi၏
bhe”ranya phaြcyakaြkunyaso kāmacchandaacaraှိkunyaso nī0raṇatarā”tiု’၏ caငyakaြyyaaောငya koငya”chā sutyasaငya
apyapaြီ”saññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya maြင’yaraှññyachā taññyataṃ’khiုငyamaြဲkhaြငya”saññya phaြcyapoyalā၏．
maှnyapesaññya ---- (1) akaြငya yogā0cararahanya”saññya kāma၌ apaြcyakiု chaငyakhaြငyakhaြငya”， asubha akhaြငya”
arākiု naှluṃ”shaငya”khaြငya”， kāmatiု’maှ thhakyamaြောkyakhaြငya” nekkhammadhātya၏ akaျို”ānisaṃsakiု chaငyakhaြငyakhaြငya”
acaraှိsaññyatiု’phaြင’ya kāmacchandakiု koငya”chā makhhāmū၍，
(2) kiုyya၏ (citya+cetasikyatiု’၏) ငြိmya”aေ”khaြငya” kāyapassaddhi၏ achamya”phaြင’ya kiုyya၏ pūpanyakhaြငya”kiု
koငya”chā ငြိmya”saññyakiု mapaြုmū၍ (kiုyyacityatiု’၏ pūpanyakhaြငya”၏ akaြောငya” phaြcyaso baျာpāda nī0raṇakiု
makhhāmū၍)，
(3) apaြငya”athanya raှေ”ū”aca kaြို”cā”ā”thutyakhaြငya” ārambhadhātya acaraှိso vīriyasambojjhaငya phaြcyakaြောငya”
tarā”tiု’kiုlaññya”koငya”， alaငya”roငyakiု maှtyasā” raှုphā”khaြငya” ālokasaññā casaññyatiု’kiုlaññya”koငya”
naှluṃ”shaငya”khaြငya”၏ achamya”phaြင’ya cityacetasikyatiု’၏ thiုငya”maှိုငya”maှု thinamiddha nī0raṇakiု koငya”chā mapayyaphaျောkyamū၍，
(4) ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityakaဲ’siု’so samathanimityakiု naှluṃ”shaငya”khaြငya”caso samādhisambojjhaငya phaြcya
kaြောငya”tarā”tiု’kiု naှluṃ”shaငya”khaြငya” casaññyatiု’၏ achamya”phaြင’ya uddhacca = cityapaျံ’lhaင’yamaှု， kukkucca = noငyatatacyaphanya
pūpanyamūhūso nī0raṇa aññacyaakaြေ”kiု koငya”chā naှုtyapayyaapyasaññyakiု mapaြုmū၍，
(5) kāmacchandacasaññyamaှ tacyapā”laññya” phaြcyakunyaso samādhi၏ bhe”ranyaantarāyya phaြcyakaြkunyaso vicikicchā
phaြcyakaြောငya”tarā”， mānyayacyakhaြငya” mada = thoငyalhaှာ”khaြငya” māna caso tarā”tiု’kiု koငya”chā masutyasaငyamū၍
jhānyakiု vaငyacā”aṃ’， thiုrahanya”saññya masutyasaငyaapyaso mimitiု’ kinya”aောငya”rā vā”khoငya”siု’ vaငyaso
paျာ”pitunya”kaဲ’siု’laññya”koငya”， bhe”ranyakiု masutyasaငyaapyaso uyaျာñyatoyasiု’ vaငyarokyashā”so maငya”
kaဲ’siု’laññya”koငya” raှောငyatakhaငyasālaျှငya jhānyamaှ thhakyara၏．
alaျောyakiု chiုaṃ’ ---- akaြငyarahanya”saññya samādhi၏ bhe”ranyaphaြcyakaြkunyaso nī0raṇatarā”tiု’kiု
koငya”chā caငyakaြyyaaောငya sutyasaငyapaြီ”၍ jhānyakiု vaငyacā”aṃ’， thiုrahanya”saññya koငya”chā sutyasaငyaapyaso
mimitiု’kinya”aောငya”rā vā”khoငya”siု’ vaငyarokyashā”so paျာ”pitunya”kaဲ’siု’laññya”koငya”， rhaṃraှာapyaso bhe”
ranya maraှိsaphaြင’ya koငya”chā caငyakaြyyaso uyaျာñyatoyasiု’ vaငyarokyashā”so maငya”kaဲ’siု’laññya”koငya”
aluṃ”cuṃso ne’aphiု’patyaluṃ”soyalaññya” samāpatya၏ athaငya”၌sālaျှငya taññyanemaှုsaññya phaြcyaniုငya၏． thiုsiု’
samādhi၏ bhe”antarāyya phaြcyaso nī0raṇatarā”tiု’kiု koငya”chā sutyasaငyapaြီ”maှsālaျှငya jhānyasamādhi၏
raှññyamaြင’yachā taññyaniုငyasaññyaphaြcyasokaြောင’ya jhānyasamādhi၏ raှññyamaြင’yachā taññyakhaြငya”kiု aliုraှိso yogā0cara
puggiုlyasaññya jhānya၏ bhe”ranyaphaြcyaso nī0raṇatarā”tiု’kiု sutyasaငya၍ jhānyakiု vaငyacā”apyapesaññya．
(visuddhi-1-147．)

īsiု’taññya” ----

thiုupacārasamādhikhaṇa၌ nī0raṇatiု’kiု payyakhhākhaြငya”saññya payyakhhāruṃmaျှsātaññya”． thiုkaြောင’ya appanājhānya၏

jhānyakiု vaငyacā”khiုkya၌ nī0raṇatiု’kā” khānesaññyasā phaြcya၏． siု’soya jhānyamaှ thakhiုkya၌kā” ayoniso
manasikārakiု akaြောငya”khaṃ၍ nī0raṇatiု’kā” tacyaphanyapaြnya၍ vaငyalātatyapaြnya၏， siု’athakya jhānyakiု
akhaျိnyaraှññyamaြင’yachā vaငyacā”liုso jhānyasamāpatya၏ raှññyamaြင’yachā taññyataṃ’khiုငyamaြဲmaှုkiု aliုraှိso yogā0cara
puggiုlyasaññya kāmatiု’၏ apaြcyakiု chaငyakhaြငyakhaြငya” casaññyaphaြင’ya phaြcyapoyalātiုငya”so nī0raṇatiု’kiု sana’yaraှငya”
aောငya payyakhhāpaြီ”maှ jhānyakiု tacyaphanyapaြnya၍ vaငyacā”pāhu chiုliုpesaññya．
ādikammikapuggiုlya liုkyanāramañña’yacaññya”kamya”
vaငyacā”maှု maျာ”pāce， chaငyakhaြငyamaှု naññya”pāce，
tasmi Hpana nimitte pattapaṭhamajjhānena ādikammikena samāpajjanabahulena bhavitabbaṃ， na paccavekkhaṇabaha
klena． paccavekkhaṇabahulassa hi jhānaṅgāni thūlāni dubbalāni huthā upaṭṭhahanti． athassa tāni evaṃ

ca parihāyati， na ca sakkoti dutiyaṃ pāpuṇituṃ． (visuddhi-1-148．)

niုငyakaြkunya． thiုyogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya raraှိpaြီ”so jhānyakiု (0sībhoya ငါ”tanya niုငyanaငya”aောငya) maphā”maျာ”apya
male’lāapyasaññyaraှိsoya dutiyajhānyacaso athakyajhānyakiု racima’yasoငှာ ā”thutyapāsoyalaññya” raraှိpaြီ”
so pathamajhānyamaှlaññya” chutyayutyashā”tatya၏． dutiyajhānyasiု’ rokyaraှိkhaြငya”ငှာlaññya” machamya”niုငya phaြcyatatya
၏． thiုkaြောင’ya bhurā”raှငyasaññya aောkyapā gāvīupamāsuttanya (aṃ-3-216)kiု hokaြာ”thā”toyamūkhaဲ’pesaññya．
gāvīupamāsuttanya kokyanutyakhaျkya
rahanya”tiု’ ...upamāsoyakā” miုkyamaဲso， makaျhamya”kaျငyaso， kaျkyacā”rā cā”kaျkya akaြောငya”kiု
siraှိnā”laññyamaှု maraှိso， maññīññhatyaso toငya၌ laှñña’yalaññyakaျkyacā”khaြငya”ငှာ malimmāso， toငya၌ kaျkya
cā”so nhā”masaññya raှိ၏． (thiုnhā”masaññya tacyane’thaငya toငyathipyatacyanerāmaှ laှmya”maြောya kaြñña’yaliုkyaso
akhā cimya”lanya”ciုpaြññyasañña’ya maြkyasacyarhakyatiု’phaြင’ya viုငya”raṃlaျkyaraှိso kaြññyalaငyaso reraှိso reိုငyakaြီ”
tacyakhukiု the’maြငyarasaphaြင’ya) thiုnhā”ma၏ cityavayya - “ငါsaññya marokyaphū”se”so arapyasiု’laññya” rokyaramū，
macā”phū”se”so maြkyatiု’kiုlaññya” cā”ramū， masokyaphū”so retiု’kiုlaññya” sokyaramū koငya”lecha”hu
īsiု’ akaြံ phaြcyarā၏． thiုnhā”masaññya (toငyathipyamaှ chaငya”sakyasoakhā) raှေ’khaြkeiု naငya”khaငya” koငya”koငya”
၌ koငya”chā thokyataññyaniုငyaaောငya mathā”bhaဲ nokyakhaြkeiု kaြhamilerā၏， thiုnhā”miုkyamasaññya (toငya
poyamaှ kāpaြnyakaျsaphaြင’ya) marokyaphū”se”so arapyasiု’laññya” marokyaniုငyalerā， macā”phū”se”so maြkya
tiု’kiုlaññya” macā”ralerā， masokyaphū”se”so retiု’kiုlaññya” masokyaralerā， “ငါsaññya marokyaphū”
se”so arapyasiု’laññya” rokyaramū， macā”phū”se”so maြkyatiု’kiု cā”ramū， masokyaphū”se”so retiု’kiု
laññya” sokyaramū koငya”lecha”hu kaြံcaññyakhaဲ’rāphaြcyaso neraငya” toငyathipyaarapyasiု’laññya” khaျmya”sāchā
paြnyamarokyalerā．
thiုsiု’ phaြcyakhaြငya”saññya abhayyakaြောင’yanaññya” - rahanya”tiု’ ...thiုnhā”masaññya miုkyamaဲ၍ makaျhamya”kaျငyabhaဲ，
kaျkyacā”rā cā”kaျkyaakaြောငya”kiု siraှိnā”laññyamaှု maraှိbhaဲ， maññīññhatyaso maြေaphiု’raှိso toငyaarapya၌
laှñña’yalaññyakhaြငya”ငှာ malimmāpābhaဲlaျkya toငya၌ kaျkyacā”sokaြောင’yataññya”．
rahanya”tiု’ ...īupamāatūpaငyalaျှငya īsāsanātoya၌ (samādhi၏bhe”ranyatiု’kiု caငyakaြyyaaောငya

niုငyanaငya”khaြငya”saññya athakyaathakya jhānya၏ anī”kapyachuṃ” akaြောငya”tarā” = padaṭṭhānyaphaြcyamaှုkiု masikhaြငya”kaြောင’ya)
mimikaျkyacā”rā cā”kaျkyaakaြောငya”kiု masiso， (akhaျငya”khapyasimya”ā”phaြင’yalaññya” jhānyasamāpatyakiု vaငyacā”
khaြငya”၌ kaျhamya”kaျငyalimmāmaှု chamya”aငya၏ maraှိkhaြငya”kaြောင’ya) malimmāso rahanya”saññya - vatthukāma kilesākāma
tiု’maှ kaငya”chityasaññya phaြcya၍sālaျှငya akusiုlyatarā”tiု’maှ kaငya”chityasaññyaphaြcya၍sālaျှငya kaြံcaññyamaှု = vitakya，
suṃ”sapyachaငyakhaြငyamaှု = vicāranaှင’ya takhaphaြcyaso， nī0raṇakaငya”chityakhaြငya”kaြောင’ya phaြcyapoya၍lāso naှcyasima’yamaှု
= pīti， khaျmya”sāmaှု = sukharaှိso pathamajhānyasiု’ rokyalaျkya ne၏．

taññya．

chamya”niုငyaso sattisaññya adhiṭṭhāna0sī maññya၏． (visuddhi-1-150． mahāṭī-1-180．)
4． vuṭṭhāna0sī
alā”tūpaငya lakyaphaျcyatacyathakya atiုငya”araှññyaraှိso kālapatyaluṃ”laññya”koငya”， lakyaphaျcya
chayyathakya atiုငya”raှññyaraှိso kālapatyaluṃ”laññya”koငya” tacyanārī， tacyanaṃnakya， tacyarakya casaññyaphaြင’ya mimitiု’
aliုraှိsamaျှ kālapatyaluṃ”laññya”koငya” tacyakhaṇamaျှ khapyatiုtiု vaငyacā”liုlaျှငya khapyatiုtiု vaငyacā”၍ kaြာraှññya
chā vaငyacā”liုlaျှငya kaြာraှññyachā vaငyacā”၍ raññyamaှnya”thā”so akhaျိnyakālakiု piုlaññya” mapiုra liုlaññya” maliု
raaောငya jhānyajocityaacañyamaှ laျငyamaြnyachā thakhaြငya”ငှာ chamya”niုငyaso sattisaññya vuṭṭhāna0sī maññya၏．
jhānyacityakhaျññya” chakya၍ phaြcyanekhaြငya”kiု jhānyavaငyacā”saññyahu khoya၍ jhānyajo cityaacañya paြtya၍ bhavaငya
citya phaြcyapoyalāmaှုkiု jhānyamaှ thasaññyahu khoya၏． īnaှcyapā”so 0sībhoyatiု’thaငya īmaျှlokyaso
khaṇapatyaluṃ”sālaျှငya jhānyakiု (= jhānyajocityaacañyakiု ) thā”aṃ’ taññyaceṃ’hu jhānyamavaငyacā”mī raှေ”၌
phaြcyaso parikaṃ၏ achamya”phaြင’ya adhiṭṭhānya = parikaṃpaြုsañña’yaatiုငya” taññyacekhaြငya”၌ chamya”niုငyasaññya၏ aphaြcyasaññya
adhiṭṭhāna0sī maññyasakaဲ’siု’ alā”tūpaငya īmaျှlokyaso khaṇapatyaluṃ”sālaျှငya jhānyanaှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃsaññyaphaြcya၍
jhānyamaှ thaṃ’hu jhānyamavaငyacā”mī raှေ”၌ phaြcyaso parikaṃ၏ achamya”phaြင’ya jhānyamaှ thakhaြငya”၌ chamya”niုငyasaññya၏ aphaြcya
saññya vuṭṭhāna0sī maññya၏hu siraှိpāle． thiုadhiṭṭhāna0sī vuṭṭhāna0sī naှcyapā”kiု thaငyaraှာ”paြkhaြငya”ငှာ araှငyabuddharakkhita
matherya၏ vatthukiု chiုkhaြငya”ငှာ saင’yalaှpe၏．
thiု araှငyabuddharakkhitasaññya pañcaငya”phaြcyasaññyamaှ raှcyavāarathaငya araှငyamahāmahindamatherya koငya”kaငyamaှ
sakyakaျrā sarakyapaငyarokyaso kunya”၌ mahārohaṇaguttamatheryamaြtyakaြီ”ā” sūnāpaြုcuranya aliု’ငှာ
kaြharokyatoyamūlākaြkunyaso suṃ”soငya”kunyaso tanyakhiု”raှိso araှငyatiု’၏ alayya၌ nelaျkya
rohaṇaguttamatheryamaြtyakaြီ”ā” yāgu chakyakapyalāso alupyaakaျhe” nagā”maငya”kiု sutyayūaṃ’hūso
raññyarhayyakhaျkyaphaြင’ya koငya”kaငyamaှ chaငya”sakyapaျံsanya” paြေ”lāso gaḷunyamaငya”kiု maြငya၍ thiုkhaṇa၌paငyalaျှငya toငya
kiု phanyachaငya”၍ nagā”maငya”kiု moငya”၌kiုငya၍ thiု mimi phanyachaငya”thā”so toငyakhoငya”athaငya”siု’ vaငyashā”toya
mū၏． koငya”kaငyamaှ paြေ”chaငya”lāso gaḷunyamaငya”saññya thiု phanyachaငya”thā”so toငya၌ raငyabhatyaphaြင’ya
putyakhatyakhaြငya”kiု pe”paြီ”၍ (raငyabhatyanaှင’ya toငyakaြီ”kiု choင’yamilaျkya) thhakyapaြေ”rale၏． thiုakhā mahā
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
460
rohaṇagutta matheryakaြီ”ka “ငါ’raှငyatiု’ ...buddharakkhitasaññya akayya၍ maraှိaṃ’， ငါtiု’ā”luṃ”saññya kaဲ’raဲ’
thiုkyasūtiု’ phaြcyakaြrakunyaṃ’”- hu chiုtoyamū၏． (visuddhi-1-150．)
akaြငya abhiññāṇyacityaphaြင’ya toငyakiု phanyachaငya”lerā၏， thiု abhiññāṇyacityasaññyakā” tacyakaြိmya
saññyasālaျှငya phaြcyasaññyakā” maှnya၏， siု’soyalaññya” abhiññāṇya၏ akhaြpodaka phaြcyaso jhānyakiုsā၍
laျငyamaြnyachā thā”khaြငya”kiုlaññya”koငya”， thiုjhānyamaှ thakhaြငya”kiုlaññya”koငya” īarā၌ sakyasephaြcya ī
vatthukiု thutyachoငyapaြkhaြငya” phaြcya၏hu maှtyapā． thiုkaဲ’siု’ jhānyacityakiု laျငyamaြnyachā thā”niုငyaso adhiṭṭhāna0sī，
jhānyamaှ laျငyamaြnyachā thaniုငyaso vuṭṭhāna0sīhūso 0sībhoya naှcyapā”kiု athū”niုငyanaငya”toyamūso araှငya
buddharakkhitasā maraှိkhaဲ’pāmū suṃ”soငya” atiုငya”araှññya raှိkunyaso īmaျှlokyakunyaso tanyakhiု”raှငyatiု’saññya
alupyaakaျhe”tacyaū” phaြcyaso nagā”kiု gaḷunyabhe”ranyamaှ coင’yaraှောkyakhaြငya”ငှာ machamya”niုငyakunyahu kaဲ’raဲ’thiုkyasaññya
phaြcyakunyarā၏． (mahāṭī-1-180．)
5． paccavekkhaṇa0sī
paccavekkhaṇa0sī pana āvajjana0siyā e0 vuttā． paccavekkhaṇaja0nāne0 hi tattha āvajjanānantara
mnīti． (visuddhi-1-150．)
āvajjanānantarānīti āvajjana0sībhāvāya yathākkamaṃ vitakkādīnaṃ jhānaṅgānaṃ āvajjanāya parato
yāni ja0nāni pavattāni， tāni tesaṃ paccavekkhaṇāni． yadaggena āvajjana0sī siddhi， tadaggena paccavekkha-
ṇā0sī siddhi veditabbā． (mahāṭī-1-180．)
jhānyaaṅgātiု’kiု chaငyakhaြငyatatyaso manodhārāvajjanya”၏ nokya၌ paccavekkhaṇājomaျာ” chakya၍ co၏．
yaငya” paccavekkhaṇājotiု’saññyalaññya” jhānyaaṅgātiု’kiုpaငya chakyalakya၍ chaငyakhaြငyakaြ၏． jhānyaaṅgātiု’kiု
chaငyakhaြငyatatyaso yaငya” paccavekkhaṇājotiု’၏ chamya”aငyasattikiု paccavekkhaṇā0sīhu khoyachiုpesaññya．
jhānyaaṅgātiု’kiု chaငyakhaြငyaso paccavekkhaṇāvīthitiု’၏ tacyavīthinaှင’ya tacyavīthi akaြာ”vayya bhavaငyamaျာ”chā makhaြာ”bhaဲ
chakyakā chakyakā chaငyakhaြငyaniုငyaso sattitaññya”． thiုkaြောင’ya āvajjana0sībhoya paြီ”cī” aောငyamaြငyalaျှငya
paccavekkhaṇā0sībhoyalaññya” paြီ”cī”aောငyamaြငyato’saññyasāhu siraှိpāle． jhānyaaṅgātiု’kiု amaြnyachuṃ” chaငya
khaြငyatatyaso manodhārāvajjanya”၏ chamya”aငyasattikiု āvajjana0sīhulaññya”koငya”， jhānyaaṅgātiု’kiု amaြnyachuṃ”
chaငyakhaြငyatatyaso paccavekkhaṇājo၏ chamya”aငyasattikiု paccavekkhaṇā0sīhulaññya”koငya” naှcyamaျို” khhaဲkhaြာ”
thā”saññyahu maှtyapā． (visuddhi-1-150． mahāṭī-1-180．)
kaျေ”jū”toyaraှငya layyatīcharātoyabhurā”kaြီ”kā” kammaṭṭhānya”kaျmya”kaြီ”thaငya ----
“jhānyaaṅgātiု’kiု chaငyakhaြငyapaြီ”laျှငya tacyaphanya jhānyakiု alaျငyaamaြnya vaငyacā”phiု’ranya jhānyaaṅgātiု’kiု chaငyakhaြငya
so paccavekkhaṇājothekiု khunacyakaြိmyalokya maျာ”chā maphaြcyacebhaဲ le”kaြိmya ငါ”kaြိmyamaျှlokyasā
kaျceniုငyamaှုkiု paccavekkhaṇā0sīhu khoyasaññya” - hu īsiု’ mina’yachiုthā”toyamūpesaññya．
(kammaṭṭhānya”kaျmya”kaြီ” - 45．)

ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”

dutiyajjhānakathā
ī0sīငါ”tanyatiု’၌ le’kaျkyaapyapaြီ” le’lāapyapaြီ” niုငyanaငya”paြီ”so 0sīraှိso yogā0carapuggiုlya
saññya niုငyaniုငyanaငya”naငya” le’lāthā”apyapaြီ”so pathamajhānyamaှ tha၍ ----
“ayaṃ samāpatti āsannanī0raṇapaccatthikā， vitakkavicārānaṃ oḷārikattā aṅgadubbalā”
(visuddhi-1-150．)
1． īpathamajhānya samāpatyasaññya nī”kapyaso nī0raṇa ranyasū raှိ၏．
2． vitakya vicāratiု’၏ runa’yaraငya”saññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya ā”naññya”so jhānyaaṅgāraှိ၏hu thiုpathamajhānya၌
apaြcyakiု maြငyaaောငyakaြñña’ya၍，
3． dutiyajhānyakiု (pathamajhānyathakya piု၍) ငြိmyasakyaso tarā”hu naှluṃ”shaငya”၍，
4． pathamajhānya၌ liုkhaျငyaငဲ’khakya tasakyasakya raှိkhaြငya”kiု kunyakhanya”ce၍ ----
dutiyajhānyakiု raraှိkhaြငya”ငှာ kaြို”cā”ā”thutyakhaြငya” ānāpānassatisamādhibhā0nāmaှုkiု paြုlupyaapya၏．
(visuddhi-1-150．)
nī0raṇaranyasū ---- nī0raṇaranyasūtiု’kā” pathamajhānya၏ upacārasamādhiakhiုkya၌ vikkhambhana = khhāthā”sañña’ya
anephaြင’ya khākaျshā”kaြ၏． ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityakiု āruṃpaြု၍ ānāpānassatisamādhikiု thūthoငya
lārā pathamajhānyasiု’ chiုkyalunī”phaြcyasañña’ya upacārasamādhinayyamaြseiု’ rokyaraှိpāmaှ nī0raṇatarā”tiု’ ငြိmya”
aေ” shā”kaြkhaြငya” phaြcya၏． pathamajhānyanaှင’ya pathamajhānya၏ upacārasamādhikā” alhanyanī”kapyalaျkya raှိsaphaြင’ya
upacārasamādhisiု’ chiုkyapāmaှ khākaျshā”so nī0raṇaranyasūnaှင’ya nī”kapyalaျkyapaငya raှိpesaññya．
vitakya-vicāra ---- vitakyakā” ānāpānapaṭibhāganimitya āruṃpoyasiု’ bhā0nācityakiု raှေ”raှု taငyape”
khaြငya”sabho， vicārakā” ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityaāruṅkiု thapyakā thapyakā suṃ”sapya chaငyakhaြငyakhaြငya”sabho
phaြcyasaphaြင’ya ငြိmyasakyamaှု samādhichamya”aငyakiု aliုraှိso yogā0carapuggiုlyaaphiု’ thiုānāpānapaṭibhāganimitya
āruṃpoyasiု’ bhā0nācityakiု raှေ”raှုtaငyape”rakhaြငya” thiုāruṅkiု suṃ”sapyanerakhaြငya”tiု’maှာ runa’yaraငya” kaြmya”tamya”
so cityaamūarā tacyamaျို” phaြcyane၏． akayya၍ bhā0nācityakiု thiုkaဲ’siု’ taငyamape”rabhaဲ bhā0nāāruṅkiု
thiုkaဲ’siု’ masuṃ”sapyarabhaဲ bhā0nāāruṃ၌ bhā0nācityasaññya ငြိmyavapyachā kapya၍ taññyanepāka piု၍ koငya”maññyahu
naှluṃ”piုkya၍ vitakya vicāratiု’၏ runa’yaraငya”saññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya ā”naññya”so jhānyaaṅgāraှိso pathamajhānyakiု
aliုmaraှိso cityathā”， piု၍ငြိmyasakyaso dutiyajhānyakiု aliုraှိso cityathā”phaြင’ya ānāpānapaṭibhāga
nimitya āruṅkiုpaငya āruṃyū၍ ānāpānassatisamādhibhā0nākiု chakyalakyaphā”maျာ”ramaññyahu chiုliုpesaññya．
dutiyajhānyasiု’ ---- thiုsiု’ ā”thutyalatyasoya thiုyogā0carapuggiုlyaā” akaြငyaakhā၌ pathamajhānyamaှ
tha၍ satinaှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃsaññyaphaြcya၍ sampajañyañāṇyanaှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃsaññyaphaြcya၍ jhānyaaṅgātiု’kiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya raှေ”raှုsakya၍
chaငyakhaြငyacañya vitakya vicāratiု’saññya runa’yaraငya”kaြmya”tamya”soā”phaြင’ya thaငyalākunya၏． pīti sukha cittekaggatā
tiု’saññya ငြိmyasakyaso sabhoā”phaြင’ya thaငyalā၏． thiုakhā၌ runa’yaraငya”kaြmya”tamya”so jhānyaaṅgākiု payyakhaြငya”
ငှာlaññya”koငya”， ငြိmyasakyaso jhānyaaṅgākiု raraှိkhaြငya”ငှာlaññya”koငya” thiုānāpānapaṭibhāganimitya āruṅkiု
paငyalaျှငya aphanyaphanya athapyathapya naှluṃ”shaငya”neso thiုyogā0carapuggiုlya၏ santānyavayya - “yakhuakhā၌ dutiya
jhānyasaññya phaြcyapeto’lattaṃ’”hu paြောchiုsaင’yaso jovāra၌ bhavaငyaayañyakiု phaြtya၍ thiုānāpānapaṭibhāga

nimitya āruṅkiုpaငya āruṃpaြု၍ ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityakiု chaငyakhaြငyatatyaso manodhārāvajjanya”saññya phaြcyapoya
lā၏． thiုnoငya thiု ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityaāruṃ၌paငyalaျှငya indaြေ thakyamaြkyasūā” le”kaြိmyamūlaññya”

le”kaြိmya ငါ”kaြိmyaso jotiု’thaငya nokyachuṃ”၌phaြcyaso tacyakhuso le”kaြိmyamaြောkyajosaññya siု’mahutya

le”kaြိmyaso jotiု’saññyakā” pathamajhānya၌ chiုapyakhaဲ’paြီ”sañña’yaatiုငya” parikaṃ upacā anuluṃ gotaြbhu

jotiု’ phaြcyakaြkunya၏．
īmaျှlokyaso bhā0nāacañyaphaြင’ya īyogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya vitakya vicāratiု’၏ khaျုpyaငြိmya”khaြငya”
kaြောင’ya mimitiု’၏ kiုyyathaငya”ajjhattasantānya၌ phaြcyaso cityakiု kaြññyalaငyacetatyaso citya၏ maြtyaso
taññyakaြññyamaှု samādhikiု phā”cetatyaso vitakya maraှိso vicāra maraှိso pathamajhānyasamādhikaြောင’ya phaြcya

ce’၍ khaျုpyapaျkyashā”kaြpaြီ” phaြcyasaphaြင’ya thiုsiု’paငya thaငyaraှာ”maraှိsoyalaññya” runa’yaraငya” runa’yaraငya”so jhānyaaṅgākiု
kaျောyalhaှာ” lhanyamaြောkyashā”khaြငya”kaြောင’ya pathamajhānyamaှ tacyapā”kunyaso dutiyajhānya casaññyatiု’kiု raraှိkhaြငya”

vūpasamā = vitakya vicāratiု’၏ khaျုpyaငြိmya”khaြငya”kaြောင’ya - hū၍ īsiု’ bhurā”raှငya hokaြာ”toyamūapyapesaññya．

siraှိpāle． (visuddhi-1-151．)

saddhā naှင’ya samādhi
īdutiyajhānya၌ -- ajjhattaṃ sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhāvaṃ (ma-1-89．) - casaññyaphaြင’ya mimi၏
kiုyyathaငya”ajjhattasantānya၌ cityakiု kaြññyalaငyacetatyaso saddhātarā”naှင’ya mhanyamaြtyaso cityataññyakaြññyamaှု
samādhi raှိmaှုkiု athū”paြု၍ bhurā”raှငya hokaြာ”thā”toyamūkhaဲ’၏．

tarā”naှင’ya ekodi amaññyaraso mhanyamaြtyaso cityataññyakaြññyamaှု samādhitarā”saññya pathamajhānya၌laññya”
raှိsaññyapaငya mahutyapālā”， abhayyakaြောင’ya īdutiyajhānyakiုsālaျှငya sampasādana = cityakiု kaြññyalaငyace

toya mamūapyape． chiုapyapaြီ”so citya၏ koငya”chā makaြññyasaññya၏ aphaြcyahūso akaြောငya”kaြောင’ya

avitakka avicāra ---- vitakya vicāratiု’apoya၌ thayyatātapyamakyasañña’ya taṇaှာkiု chana’yapayyakhaြငya”phaြင’ya
vitakya vicāratiု’kiု ငြိmya”cekhaြငya”kaြောင’ya īdutiyajhānyasaññya cityakiု kaြññyalaငyacetatya၏， upacārasamādhi
akhiုkya၌kaဲ’siု’ nī0raṇakilesāhūso nokyakaျိkhaြငya”kiု ငြိmya”cekhaြငya”kaြောင’ya cityakiု kaြññyalaငyacetatya
saññyakā” mahutya， thiု’paြငya vitakya vicāratiု’၏ khaျုpyaငြိmya”khaြငya”kaြောင’yapaငyalaျှငya īdutiyajhānyasaññya mhanyamaြtya

aññacyaakaြေ”kiု payyakhhākhaြငya”kaြောင’yalaññya”koငya”， pathamajhānya၌kaဲ’siု’ jhānyaaṅgā thaငyaraှာ” phaြcyakhaြငya”kaြောင’ya

phoyapaြso cakā”sā phaြcya၏．
thiုmaှtacyapā” vitakya vicāratiု’၏ ငြိmya”khaြငya”kaြောင’ya īdutiyajhānyasaññya vitakya maraှိsaññya vicāra maraှိsaññya
phaြcya၏， tatiyajhānya catutthajhānyatiု’kaဲ’siု’laññya”koငya”， cakkhuviññāṇya casaññyatiု’kaဲ’siု’laññya”koငya” paငyakiုyya
sabhoā”phaြင’ya maraှိkhaြငya”kaြောင’ya vitakya maraှိsaññya vicāralaññya” maraှိsaññya mahutya， īsiု’laျှငya vitakya maraှိmaှု
vicāra maraှိmaှု၏ akaြောငya”kiု paြtatyasaññyalaññya” phaြcya၏， vitakya vicāratiု’၏ maraှိkhaြငya”maျှkiု paြtatyasaññya
mahutya．
siု’soya - avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ = vitakya maraှိso vicāra maraှိso - hūso ī cakā”saññyakā”
īdutiyajhānya၌ vitakya vicāratiု’၏ maraှိkhaြငya”maျှkiုsālaျှငya paြtatyaraှာ၏， thiုkaြောင’ya raှေ”phaြcyaso vitakya
vicārānaṃ vūpasamā = vitakya vicāratiု’kiု ငြိmya”cekhaြငya”kaြောင’yahūso cakā”kiု paြောchiုpaြီ”၍laññya” avitakkaṃ
avicāraṃ = vitakya maraှိso vicāra maraှိsohūso nokyacakā”kiု paြောchiုsaင’yasaññyasā phaြcyapesaññya．
thiုkaြောင’ya vitakya vicāratiု’kiု ငြိmya”cekhaြငya”kaြောင’yahu chiုpaြီ”soyalaññya” vitakya maraှိso vicāra maraှိso
hūso cakā”kiုlaññya” īdutiyajhānya၏ guṇyakiု phoyapaြrāvayya thapyamaṃ၍ chiုrapaြnyapesaññya．
(visuddhi-1-152-153．)
samādhijaṃ = samādhikaြောင’ya phaြcyaso ----
īdutiyajhānyakā” pathamajhānyasamādhika upanissayacaso sattitiု’phaြင’ya kaျေ”jū”paြုpe”khaြငya”kaြောင’ya
laññya”koငya”， dutiyajhānyasamādhihūso mimi dutiyajhānyanaှင’ya cittakkhaṇatacyakhuathaငya” atūyaှñyathaဲ phaြcya
sañña’ya sampayutyasamādhikalaññya” sahajāta aññamañña nissayacaso sattitiု’phaြင’ya kaျေ”jū”paြုpe”khaြငya”kaြောင’ya
laññya”koငya” phaြcyapoyalārasaphaြင’ya samādhijaṃ = samādhikaြောင’yaphaြcyasohu hokaြာ”toyamūkhaြငya” phaြcyape
saññya． thiုpathamajhānya dutiyajhānya naှcyapā”tiု’thaငya pathamajhānyasaññyalaññya” mimi pathamajhānyanaှင’ya cittakkhaṇatacyakhu
athaငya”၌ atūyaှñyathaဲ phaြcyasañña’ya sampayutya samādhikaြောင’yapaငya akayya၍kā” phaြcyapoyalāpe၏， thiုsiု’
phaြcyasoyalaññya” īdutiyajhānyasamādhisaññyasālaျှငya samādhihū၍ chiုapyasaññya၏ aphaြcyakiု thiုkyatanya၏．
abhayyakaြောင’yanaññya”hūmū ---- cityaacañyakiု thiုthiု āruṃsiု’ rokyaaောငya raှေ”raှုtaငyape”khaြငya” chupyanayyape”
khaြငya”phaြင’ya vitakya vicāratiု’saññya cityakiု laှုpyakhaျောkyakhaျာ”cetatya၏， dutiyajhānya၌kā” thiုkaဲ’siု’ cityakiု laှုpya
khaျောkyakhaျာ”cetatyaso vitakya vicāra kaငya”saphaြင’ya alhanyalaျှငya tunyalaှုpyakhaြငya” kaငya”saññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya
laññya”koငya”， koငya”chā kaြññyalaငyasaññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’yalaññya”koငya” īdutiyajhānyasamādhisaññyasālaျှငya
samādhihū၍ chiုapyasaññya၏ aphaြcyakiု thiုkyatanyapesaññya． thiုsiု’ dutiyajhānyasamādhi၏sālaျှငya samādhihū၍
chiုkhaြငya”ငှာ thiုkyasaññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya īdutiyajhānya၏ guṇyakaျေ”jū”kiု khaျီ”mhamya”khaြငya”ငှာ īdutiyajhānyakiု
sālaျှငya samādhijaṃ = samādhikaြောင’ya phaြcya၏hū၍ bhurā”raှငyasaññya hokaြာ”toyamūapyapesaññya．
(visuddhi-1-153．)
asaငya yogīsūtoyakoငya”saññya īathakyapā raှငya”laငya”khaျkyamaျာ”kiု phatyaraှုpaြီ”pāka aောkyapā
bhurā”hodesanātoyakiု phatyaraှုpālaျှငya lhayyakūchāpaငya nā”laññya၍ arasā poyalhaငyanemaññya phaြcyapesaññya．
vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā ajjhattaṃ sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhāvaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ samādhijaṃ
pītisukhaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati． (ma-1-89．)

jhānya၏ upacārasamādhiakhiုkya khaṇa၌ vitakya vicāratiု’kiု payyaapyasaññyakā” mahutyakunya， abhayyakaြောင’ya

appanājhānya cokhiုkya၌sālaျှငya īdutiyajhānyasaññya thiုvitakya vicāratiု’naှင’ya kaငya”၍ phaြcyapoyalāpesaññya．
thiုkaြောင’ya thiု vitakya vicāratiု’kiု thiု dutiyajhānya၏ payyaapyaso aṅgārapyatiု’hū၍ chiုapyakunyasaññya．

sālaျှငya īdutiyajhānyakiု runa’yaraငya”kaြmya”tamya”၏hū၍ hokaြာ”apya၏ ---- (dī-1-34．) ---- īsiု’
hokaြာ” thā”toyamūapyaso pīti၏ runa’yaraငya”kaြmya”tamya”saññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya ā”naññya”so
aṅgā raှိ၏hu īsiု’laျှငya dutiyajhānyasamāpatya၌ apaြcyadosakiု ñāṇyaphaြင’yamaြငyaaောငya kaြñña’ya၍，
3． tatiyajhānyakiု (dutiyajhānyathakya piု၍) ငြိmyasakyasoā”phaြင’ya naှluṃ”shaငya”၍，
4． dutiyajhānya၌ thayyatāငဲ’khakya tasakyasakya raှိkhaြငya”kiု kunyakhanya”ce၍ ----
tatiyajhānyakiု raraှိkhaြငya”ငှာ kaြို”cā”ā”thutyakhaြငya”kiု paြုlupyaapyapesaññya． (visuddhi-1-153-154．)
thiုsiု’ kaြို”cā”ā”thutyarāvayya yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ ñāṇya0၌ akaြငyaakhā၌ dutiyajhānyamaှ tha၍
sati sampajañya ñāṇyayaှñyalaျkya jhānyaaṅgātiု’kiု chaငyakhaြငyalatyasaññyaraှိsoya pītisaññya runa’yaraငya”kaြmya”tamya”so
sabhoā”phaြင’ya thaငyalā၏， sukhanaှင’ya ekaggatāsaññya ငြိmyasakyaso sabhoā”phaြင’ya thaငyalā၏， thiုakhā၌
runa’yaraငya”kaြmya”tamya”so pīti jhānyaaṅgākiု payyakhaြငya”ငှာ ငြိmyasakyaso sukha ekaggatā hūso jhānyaaṅgā
naှcyapā”raှိso tatiyajhānyakiု raraှိkhaြငya”ငှာ thiုānāpānapaṭibhāganimitya āruṅkiုpaငyalaျှငya naှluṃ”shaငya” raှုphā”laျkya
raှိso thiုyogā0carapuggiုlya၏ santānyavayya “ī yakhuakhā၌ tatiyajhānyasaññya phaြcyapoyato’lattaṃ’”hu
paြောchiုsaင’yaso jovāra၌ bhavaငyaayañyakiု phaြtyatokya၍ (bhavaငyaayañyakiု phaြtyaso bhavaṅgupacchedacitya
phaြcyapaြီ”၍) thiုānāpānapaṭibhāganimitya āruṅkiုpaငyalaျှငya āruṃpaြု၍ manodhārāvajjanya”cityasaññya (= ānāpāna
paṭibhāganimitya āruṅkiု chaငyakhaြငyasocityasaññya) phaြcyapoyalā၏． thiုnoငya thiု ānāpānapaṭibhāganimitya
āruṃ၌paငyalaျှငya indaြေ thakyamaြkyasū yogīsūtoyakoငya”ā” le”kaြိmyamūlaññya” phaြcyakunyaso， indaြေ
mathakyamaြkyalhanya”sū yogīsūtoyakoငya”ā” ငါ”kaြိmyamūlaññya” phaြcyakunyaso jotiု’saññya cokunya၏．
yaငya” le”kaြိmyaso jo， ငါ”kaြိmyaso jotiု’၏ achuṃ”၌ tacyakhuso le”kaြိmyamaြောkyajo， siု’mahutya
ငါ”kaြိmyamaြောkyajosaññyakā” tatiyajhānyaraှိso rūpā0carajo phaြcya၏． achuṃ”jomaှ kaြhaငya”kunyaso suṃ”kaြိmya
le”kaြိmyaso jotiု’saññya pathamajhānya၌ chiုapyakhaဲ’paြီ”so naññya”atiုငya”paငyalaျှငya kāmā0carajotiု’sā
phaြcyakaြkunya၏． (visuddhi-1-154．)
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
467
tatiyajhānyarasū
(ettā0tā ca panesa) pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajāno， sukhañca
kāyena paṭisaṃvedeti， yaṃ taṃ ariyā ācikkhanti upekkhako satimā sukhavihārīti， tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ
upasampajja viharatīti． (dī-1-71． abhi-1-45． visuddhi-1-154．)
īmaျှso bhā0nāacañyaphaြင’ya īyogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya pītikiု cakyachupyakhaြငya” lhanyakhaြငya”kaြောင’ya
laññya”koငya”， vitakya vicāratiု’kiု ငြိmya”cekhaြငya”kaြောင’yalaññya”koငya” tatiyajhānya khaျmya”sākiုpaငya laျcyalaျူ
raှုsaññyaphaြcya၍laññya” ne၏， ānāpānapaṭibhāganimitya āruṅkiု amaှtyaratatya simya”chaññya”tatyaso satinaှင’ya
paြñña’yacuṃsaññya phaြcya၍laññya”koငya”， ānāpānapaṭibhāganimitya āruṅkiုpaငya thiု”thhaငya”sitatyaso sampajañya ñāṇya
paññānaှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃsaññya phaြcya၍laññya”koငya” kāyikasukha cetasikasukhakiုlaññya” nāmakāyaphaြင’ya khaṃcā”၏．
akaြငyatatiyajhānyahūso akaြောငya”kaြောင’ya yaငya”tatiyajhānyanaှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃso jhānalābhī puggiုlyakiု
bhurā”acaraှိso ariyā araှငyakoငya” araှငyamaြtyatiု’saññya tatiyajhānyakhaျmya”sākiုpaငya laျcyalaျူ raှုpesasū
satikoငya”pesasū khaျmya”sāchā nepesasūhū၍ khaျီ”mhamya”cakā” paြောkaြာ”toyamūkaြkunya၏， thiုtatiya
jhānyakiု paြñña’yacuṃce၍ thiုtatiyajhānyasiု’ kapyarokya၍ nethiုငyape၏．
(dī-1-71． abhi-1-45． visuddhi-1-154．)
upekkhako ca viharati
ī၌ upekkhāara alhanyamhanyamaြtyaso tatiyajhānyakhaျmya”sākiုpaငya laျcyalaျူ raှုkhaြငya”sabho， alayya
alatya၌ phaြcyasosabho raှိso tataြmajjhattatā cetasikyakiု arakokyayūso jhānupekkhākiု
aliုraှိapyapesaññya． thiု upekkhāsaññya ----
1． tatiyajhānyakhaျmya”sākiု laျcyalaျူ raှုkhaြငya”sabho alayyaalatya၌ phaြcyasosabho lakkhaṇā raှိ၏．
2． alhanyamhanyamaြtyaso tatiyajhānyasukha၌soyalaññya” naှluṃ”mashaငya”khaြငya”kicca raှိ၏． (alhanyamhanyamaြtyaso
sukha phaြcyasoyalaññya” thiုtatiyajhānyasukha၌ naှcyasakyasoā”phaြင’ya ññhatyakiုငya”raှိုငya”khaြငya”၏ chana’yakaျငya
bhakya kiccaraှိ၏hu chiုliုpesaññya．)
3． jhānyakhaျmya”sāsukha hūsamaျှtiု’thaငya athhatyaathipyasiု’ rokyaso tatiyajhānya khaျmya”sāsukha၌soya
laññya” khaṃcā”ranya ā”thutyakhaြငya”kaငya”so sabhotarā”hu yogīñāṇyaā” raှေ”raှု thaငyalā၏．
tacyanaññya” ---- miminaှင’ya atūyaှñyaphakya sampayutyatarā”tiု’၏ thiုtatiyajhānya khaျmya”sāsukha၌ kaြောင’yakaြ
baျာpāra kaငya”khaြငya”kiု phaြcyacetatya၏．
4． pītikiု cakyachupyakhaြငya”laျှငya anī”kapyachuṃ”so akaြောငya”tarā” raှိ၏．
ī၌ me”maြnya”phhayyakā” īsiု’taññya” ---- ī jhānupekkhāhūsaññya paramatthatarā”kiုyya anakyasabho
ā”phaြင’ya tataြmajjhattupekkhāsaññyasālaျှငyaphaြcyasaññya mahutyalo， thiု tataြmajjhattupekkhāsaññyalaññya” pathama
jhānya dutiyajhānyatiု’၌laññya” raှိsaññyapaငya mahutyalo， thiုsiု’ raှိsaññya phaြcyasokaြောင’ya thiုpathamajhānya dutiya
jhānyatiု’၌laññya” -- upekkho ca viharati = jhānyakhaျmya”sā sukhakiုpaငya laျcyalaျူ raှုsaññya phaြcya၍laññya”ne၏ ---
hū၍ īsiု’laျှငya ī tataြmajjhattupekkhākiု hosaင’yasaññya phaြcyakoငya”rā၏， thiု tataြmajjhattupekkhākiု
abhayyakaြောင’ya mahoapyapāsanaññya” ---- īkā” me”maြnya”phhayyataññya”． ««ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityaāruṅkiု
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
468
āruṃyū၍ phaြcyapoyalāso pathamajhānya nāmyatarā” (34)luṃ”， dutiyajhānya nāmyatarā” (32)luṃ”tiု’၌ tataြ
majjhattatā cetasikya pāvaငyalaျkya raှိsokaြောင’ya īme”khhanya”kiု me”nekhaြငya”phaြcya၏． (nāmyakammaṭṭhānya”piုငya”thaငya
kaြñña’yapā．)»»
mathaငyaraှာ”sokicca raှိsokaြောင’ya mahoapyape． vitakya vicāra pītitiု’saññya lhaှmya”miု” phicī”thā”apya
saññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya thiုpathamajhānya dutiyajhānyatiု’၌ thiု tataြmajjhattatā cetasikya၏ lupyaငnya”kiccasaññya
mathaငyaraှာ” phaြcyane၏， ītatiyajhānya၌kā” vitakya vicāra pītitiု’saññya malhaှmya”miု” maphicī”apyasaññya၏
aphaြcyakaြောင’ya thoငyaso ū”khoငya” raှိsakaဲ’siု’ phaြcya၍ thaငyaraှာ”so kiccaraှိlaျkya phaြcyapoyalā၏， thiုkaြောင’ya
ītatiyajhānya၌sā upekkhako ca viharati = tatiyajhānya khaျmya”sāsukhakiုpaငya laျcyalaျူ raှုsaññya phaြcya၍
laññya”ne၏ - hu bhurā”raှငya hokaြာ”toyamūapyapesaññya． īkā” aphaြteññya”．
(visuddhi-1-157． mahāṭī-1-187．)
sato ca sampajāno
ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityaāruṅkiု aောkyame’tatya kaြံtatyaso ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityaāruṃ၌
kapya၍taññyatatyaso sabhosaññya sati maññya၏． ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityaāruṅkiု koငya”chā sitatya
so sabhosaññya sampajañyañāṇya maññya၏． puggalādhiṭṭhānanaññya”ā”phaြင’ya puggiုlya ū”taññya၍ satinaှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃsū
sampajañyañāṇyanaှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃsūhū၍ hokaြာ”toyamūkhaြငya” phaြcyapesaññya．
thiုnaှcyapā”tiု’thaငya satisaññya ----
1． ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityaāruṅkiု aောkyame’khaြငya” amaှtyarakhaြငya” sabholakkhaṇā raှိ၏．
2． ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityaāruṅkiု me’laျော’khaြငya”၏ chana’yakaျငyabhakyaphaြcyaso kicca raှိ၏．
tacyanaññya” ---- ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityaāruṅkiု mame’paျောkyakhaြငya” kicca raှိ၏．
3． kilesātiု’maှ coင’yatatyaso tarā”hu ñāṇyaā” raှေ”raှုthaငyalā၏． tacyanaññya” -- kilesātiု’maှ
coင’yakhaြငya”kiု phaြcyacetatya၏． (tacyanaññya” ---- ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityaāruṃnaှင’ya asicityanaှcyamaျို”luṃ”kiု
mapaျောkyapaျkyaaောငya thinya”simya”coင’yaraှောkyatatya၏．)
sampajañyañāṇyasaññya ----
1． ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityaāruṅkiု mathemave koငya”chāsikhaြငya” sabholakkhaṇā raှိ၏．
tacyanaññya” ---- thevekhaြငya”၏ chana’yakaျငyabhakyaphaြcyaso sabholakkhaṇā raှိ၏．
2． (ānāpānakaျင’yacañya၏ lamya”chuṃ”hūso) thiုmaှာbhakyakamya”siု’ rokyaaောငya kū”khapyakhaြငya” kiccaraှိ၏．
tacyanaññya” ---- maျkyanaှာmūapyaso ū”taññyathā”apyaso kicca၏ achuṃ”kamya”siု’ rokyaaောငya kū”khapya
niုငyaso kiccaraှိ၏．
3． ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityaāruṅkiု cicacyacū”camya”tatyaso sabhotarā”hu yogīñāṇyaā” raှေ”raှု
thaငyalā၏． (visuddhi-1-157．)
thiုjhānyatiု’thaငya īsati sampajañyasaññya raှေ”phaြcyaso pathamajhānya dutiyajhānyatiု’၌laññya” akayya၍kā”
raှိ၏． (pathamajhānya nāmyatarā” (34)， dutiyajhānya nāmyatarā” (32)tiု’၌ satinaှင’ya sampajañya amaññyaraso
paññācetasikyatiု’laññya” pāvaငyalaျkyapaငya raှိ၏hu chiုliုpesaññya．) maှnyapesaññya -- lhatyaso satiraှိso
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
469
sampajañyakaငya”sasūā” upacārajhānyamaျှsaññyasoyalaññya” mapaြñña’yacuṃse”khaျေ， appanājhānyasaññyakā” paြောphhayya
rāpaငya maraှိ， mapaြñña’yacuṃniုငyasaññyasā phaြcya၏． siု’soyalaññya” thiုpathamajhānya dutiyajhānyatiု’၏ (athakyaathakya
jhānyakiု thokyaraှုsoya) runa’yaraငya”saññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya maြpeoya၌ yokyaျာ”၏ shā”khaြငya”saññya lhayyakū
sakaဲ’siု’ thiုpathamajhānya dutiyajhānyatiု’၌ citya၏alā”saññya khaျmya”sālhayyakūlaျkya raှိ၏， thiု pathamajhānya
dutiyajhānyatiု’၌ satinaှင’ya sampajañya၏ kiccasaññya mathaငyaraှာ” phaြcyakhaဲ’၏， caငyacacyamaှာmū runa’yaraငya”kaြmya”tamya”so
jhānyaaṅgākiု payyakhaြငya”kaြောင’ya ītatiyajhānya၏ simyamhe’saññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya - yokyaျာ”၏ saငyadhunya”shā”
poya၌ sati sampajañya kiccaphaြင’ya simya”chaññya”apyaso shā”khaြငya”alā”kiု aliုraှိapyasakaဲ’siု’ - ītatiya
jhānya၌laññya” sati sampajañña kiccaphaြင’ya simya”chaññya”apyasaññyasālaျှငya phaြcyaso citya၏alā”kiု aliုraှိapya
pe၏． thiုkaြောင’ya ītatiyajhānya၌sālaျှငya ī - sato sampajāno (= ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityaāruṅkiု
simya”chaññya”tatyaso satinaှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃsaññya phaြcya၍laññya”koငya”， ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityaāruṅkiု koငya”
chā thiု”thhaငya”sitatyaso paññānaှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃsaññya phaြcya၍laññya”koငya”) hūso pudyanaှcyakhuapoငya”kiု bhurā”raှငya
hokaြာ”thā”toyamūkhaြငya” phaြcyasaññya． thiုthakyaalhanya chiုphhayyaathū” raှိpaြnyase”saññyamaှာ īsiု’ phaြcya၏．
niု’makhāse”so nhā”sā”ငyyasaññya aminhā”mamaှ phaဲkhhāthā”apyasaññyaraှိsoya (thiုnhā”sā”ငyyakiု)
macoင’yaraှောkyaapyapāmū tacyaphanyapaငyalaျှငya aminhā”masiု’ kapyarokyapaြnya၏siု’ īupamāatū ītatiyajhānya
khaျmya”sāsukhasaññya pītimaှ phaဲkhhācepyasaññya phaြcya၏． thiုtatiyajhānya khaျmya”sāsukhasaññya sati sampajañyahūso
acoင’yaaraှောkyaphaြင’ya macoင’yaraှောkyaapyapāmū tacyaphanyapaငyalaျှငya pītisiု’ kapyarokyapaြnyalerā၏， pītinaှင’ya yaှñya
saññyasālaျှငya phaြcyarā၏． (dutiyajhānyasiု’ laျှောkaျlerā၏ hūliုsaññya．) nokyatacyamaျို”kā” khaျmya”sāsukha
၌laññya” sattavātiု’saññya lhanyachāthayyatā tapyamakyatatyakaြkunya၏， ītatiyajhānya khaျmya”sāsukhasaññyalaññya”
alhanyakhaျိုmaြိnya koငya”maြtyaso khaျmya”sāsukha phaြcya၏， akaြောငya”mū lokīkhaျmya”sāsukhatiု’thaငya thiုtatiya
jhānya khaျmya”sāsukhathakya alhanya khaျmya”sāsukha၏ maraှိkhaြငya”kaြောင’yapaငyataññya”． (catutthajhānya casañña’ya athakyapiုငya”
jhānyatiု’၌ sukhavedanā mayaှñyasokaြောင’ya upekkhāvedanāsā yaှñyasokaြောင’ya īsiု’ chiုkhaြငya” phaြcyasaññya．)
amaှnyacaငyacacyamaှာmū sati sampajañya၏ chamya”aငyaānubhoyakaြောင’ya ītatiyajhānya khaျmya”sāsukha၌ yogā
0cara puggiုlyasaññya matapyamakyakhaြငya” phaြcyapesaññya， tacyapā”so apaြာ”ā”phaြင’ya tacyapā”so akaြောငya”kaြောင’ya
matapyamakyakhaြငya” phaြcyasaññyakā” mahutyape． īsiု’so anakyaathū”kiုlaññya” thaငyaraှာ” paြtoyamūkhaြငya”ငှာ ī
sato sampajāno - hūso pudyanaှcyakhuapoငya”kiု ī tatiyajhānya၌sālaျှငya bhurā”raှငya hokaြာ”toya
mūapyapesaññyahu siraှိpāle． (visuddhi-1-158．)
sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedeti
tatiyajhānyanaှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃso yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya tatiyajhānyakhaṇa၌ tatiyajhānya khaျmya”sāsukha
kiု khaṃcā”aṃ’hu naှluṃ”shaငya”khaြငya” ābhogasaññya akayya၍kā” maraှိpe． īsiု’ maraှိsaññya phaြcyasoyalaññya” thiု
tatiyajhānyanaှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃso yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ nāmakāya (= nāmyatarā” apoငya”acu) naှင’ya tatiyajhānya
cittakkhaṇatacyakhuathaငya”၌ atūyaှñyathaဲphaြcyaso akaြငya sukhavedanāsaññya raှိ၏， thiုsukhavedanākiု thiုtatiya
jhānyanaှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃso yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya khaṃcā”lerā၏． nokyatacyamaျို”kā” akaြငya tatiyajhānya
nāmakāyanaှင’ya atūyaှñyathaဲphaြcyaso sukhavedanāsaññya raှိ၏． thiုsukhavedanākaြောင’ya (= thiုsukhavedanānaှင’ya
takha tatiyajhānyacityakaြောင’ya) phaြcyaso alhanyamhanyamaြtyaso cittajarupyaphaြင’ya thiုtatiyajhānyanaှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃso
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
470
yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ rūpakāya (= rupyatarā”apoငya”)saññya paျံ’naှံ’ne၏， (cittajarupyamaျာ” tacyakiုyyaluṃ”၌ paျံ’naှံ’
ne၏ hūliုsaññya．)
akaြငya rūpakāya၏ mhanyamaြtyaso cittajarupyatiု’phaြင’ya paျံ’naှံ’apyasaññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya tatiyajhānyamaှ
thalāsoyalaññya” tatiyajhānyanaှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃso yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya thiုalhanyamhanyamaြtyaso cittajarupya
tiု’၏ tacyakiုyyaluṃ”၌ paျံ’naှံ’ the’thikhaြငya”kaြောင’ya phaြcyapoyalāso kāyikasukhakiုlaññya” khaṃcā”lerā၏，
thiုkaြောင’ya thiုcetasikasukha = citya၌ phaြcyaso jhānyakhaျmya”sā， kāyikasukha = kiုyya၌ phaြcyaso khaျmya”sāhu
chiုapyaso sabhoanakyaadhippāyyakiု thaငyaraှာ” paြtoyamūliုsaññya phaြcya၍ - sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedeti
= tatiyajhānyakhaျmya”sāhūso cetasikasukha + kāyikasukhakiု nāmakāyaphaြင’ya khaṃcā”၏hu bhurā”raှငya
hokaြာ”toyamūpesaññya． (visuddhi-1-158．)
upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī
abhayyakaြောင’ya bhurā” acaraှိkunyaso ariyāsūtoyakoငya”tiု’ka yaငya” tatiyajhānya hūso
akaြောငya”kaြောင’ya yaငya”tatiyajhānyanaှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃsopuggiုlyakiု tatiyajhānya khaျmya”sākiုpaငya laျcyalaျူ raှုpe
sasū satikoငya”pesasū khaျmya”sāchā nepesasūhū၍ khaျီ”mhamya”toyamūkaြkunyasanaññya”． khaျီ”mhamya”khaြငya”ငှာ
thiုkyapesaññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya khaျီ”mhamya”toyamūkaြkunya၏．
ītatiyajhānyanaှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃsopuggiုlyasaññya alhanyakhaျိုmaြိnya koငya”maြtyaso khaျmya”sāsukha raှိso
khaျmya”sāsukha၏ athhatyaathipyasiု’ rokyaraှိneso tatiyajhānyakhaျmya”sā၌soyalaññya” laျcyalaျူ raှုniုငyape၏，
thiုtatiyajhānya၌ khaျmya”sāsukhanaှင’ya kapyaငြိso taṇaှာsaññya machhaဲငငyaapya machhaဲငငyaniုငyape， thiု’paြငya akaြငya
akhaြငya”arāā”phaြင’ya naှcyasakyamaှု pītisaññya maphaြcyaniုငya， īpīti maphaြcyaniုငyalokyaso akhaြငya”arāā”phaြင’ya
ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityaāruṃ၌ thaငyaso sati raှိsaññya၏aphaြcyakaြောင’ya satinaှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃpe၏． thiု’paြငya
bhurā” acaraှိkunyaso ariyāsūtoyakoငya”kaြီ”tiု’saññya naှcyasakyamaြtyaniု”toyamūapyaso ariyāsūtoya
koငya”kaြီ”tiု’sālaျှငya maှီvaဲthiုkyasaññyalaññya” phaြcyaso maññacyanhamya”so cityakhaျmya”sāmaှု = cetasikasukhakiု
nāmakāya = nāmyatarā”apoငya”phaြင’ya khaṃcā”၏， thiုkaြောင’ya khaျီ”mhamya”khaြငya”ငှာ thiုkyasaññya phaြcyape၏． īsiု’
khaျီ”mhamya”khaြငya”ငှာ athiုkyakaြီ” thiုkyasokaြောင’ya thiုtatiyajhānyanaှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃsopuggiုlyakiု bhurā” acaraှိkunyaso
ariyāsūtoyakoငya”kaြီ”tiု’saññya īsiု’ khaျီ”mhamya”khaြငya”၏ akaြောငya”phaြcya၍ phaြcyakunyaso thiုguṇyakaျေ”jū”
tiု’kiု thaငyaraှာ” paြcā”liုkunyasaññyaphaြcya၍ upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī = tatiyajhānyakhaျmya”sākiုpaငya
laျcyalaျူ raှုpesasū satikoငya”pesasū khaျmya”sāchānepesasū hū၍ khaျီ”mhamya”toyamūkaြkunya၏hu siraှိpāle．
(visuddhi-1-158-159．)
ītatiyajhānyakā” pītikiု payyakhaြငya”hūso payyaapyaso aṅgātacyapā”， sukha ekaggatāhūso
jhānyaaṅgānaှcyapā”naှင’ya paြñña’yacuṅkhaြငya”hūso paြñña’yacuṃso aṅgānaှcyapā” raှိ၏． yaငya”pītikiုkā” appanājhānyaakhiုkya၌
sālaျှငya payyaapya၏hu sipā． parikaṃ upacā anuluṅgotaြbhuhūso upacārajhānya akhiုkya၌kā” mapayyaapya
se”pe． siု’athakya yaငya” upacārajomaျာ”၌ pītiyaှñyalaျkyapaငya raှိnese”saññyahu maှtyapā． alā”tūpaငya
vitakya vicāratiု’laññya” yaှñyalaျkyapaငya raှိnese”saññyahu maှtyasā”pāle． (visuddhi-1-159．)
ī maှtyakhaျkya mina’yachiုkhaျkyamaျာ”kā” nāmyakammaṭṭhānya”kiု simya”chaññya”rā၌ maññyasañña’ya cittakkhaṇa၌ mañña’yasañña’ya
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
471
cetasikyamaျာ” yaှñyakaြsaññya nāmyatarā” mañña’yarhe’maññyamaျှ raှိsaññyakiု atiakaျ siraှိre”athakya alhanya
are”pāso maှtyakhaျkyamaျာ” mina’yachiုkhaျkyamaျာ”paငya phaြcyakaြsaññya． ītatiyajhānyakiုlaññya” 0sībhoyaငါ”tanya niုငya
naငya”aောငya chakyalakya၍ le’kaျင’yapā． siု’soya akhaျို’so yogā0carapuggiုlyamaျာ”၌ pītiapoya၌ liုlā”
ငဲ’khakya tasakyasakyaphaြင’ya thayyatāmakyamomaှု raှိnesaphaြင’ya dutiyajhānyasiု’ tacyaphanyapaြnya၍ khaṇa khaṇa laျှောkaျ
netatyasaññyalaññya” raှိpe၏． siု’athakya pīti၏ apaြcyakiု khapyamaျာ”maျာ” chaငyakhaြငya၍ pīti၌ ငဲ’khakyamaှုkiု paြtya
aောငya phaြtyalaျkya tatiyajhānyasiု’ rokyaaောငya kaြို”pamya”rāsaññya． rokyaraှိpaြီ”so tatiyajhānyamaှlaññya”
malaျှောkaျaောငya 0sībhoya niုငyanaငya”aောငya chakyalakya၍ le’kaျင’yarāsaññya．
222
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
472
catutthajjhānakathā
e0madhigate pana tasma ðpi vuttanayene0 pañcahākārehi ciṇṇa0sinā huthā paguṇatatiyajjhānato
vuṭṭhāya “ayaṃ samāpatti āsannapītipaccatthikā， ]yade0 tattha sukhamiti cetaso ābhogo， etenetaṃ
oḷārikaṃ akkhāyatī}ti evaṃ vuttassa sukhassa oḷārikattā aṅgadubbalā”ti ca tattha dosaṃ dishā
catutthaṃ jhānaṃ santato manasikathā tatiyajjhāne nikanti H pariyādāya catutthādhigamāya yogo
kātabbo． (visuddhi-1-159．)
īsiု’so bhā0nāacañyaphaြင’ya thiုtatiyajhānyakiုlaññya” raapyapaြီ”saññyaraှိsoya chiုapyakhaဲ’paြီ”so naññya”
phaြင’yasālaျှငya ငါ”pā”kunyaso akhaြငya”arātiု’phaြင’ya niုငyaniုငyanaငya”naငya” le’kaျkyaapyapaြီ”so 0sīraှိsaññya phaြcya၍
avā”0chā niုငyaniုငyanaငya”naငya” le’kaျင’yathā”apyapaြီ”so tatiyajhānyamaှ tha၍ ----
1． ī tatiyajhānya samāpatyasaññya pītihūso nī”kapyaso ranyasū raှိ၏．
2． “thiု tatiyajhānya၌ akaြငyajhānyaaṅgākiု sukhahū၍ citya၏ naှluṃ”shaငya”khaြငya”saññya raှိ၏， īsukhakaြောင’ya
paငyalaျှငya thiုtatiyajhānyakiု runa’yaraငya”kaြmya”tamya”၏hū၍ chiုapya၏．” - (dī-1-34．) -- īsiု’ hokaြာ”
thā”toyamūapyaso sukha၏ runa’yaraငya”kaြmya”tamya”saññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya ā”naññya”so jhānyaaṅgā raှိ၏．
īsiု’laျှငya thiုtatiyajhānya၌ phoyapaြpā naှcyamaျို”so apaြcyakiု maြငyaaောငya raှု၍，
3． catutthajhānyakiု (tatiyajhānyathakyapiု၍ ) ငြိmyasakyasoā”phaြင’yanaှluṃ”shaငya”၍，
4． tatiyajhānya၌ thayyatāငဲ’khakya tasakyasakya raှိkhaြငya” nikantikiု kunyakhanya”ce၍ ----
catutthajhānyakiု raraှိkhaြငya”ငှာ kaြို”cā”ā”thutyakhaြငya”kiု paြုapyape၏． (visuddhi-1-159．)
thiုsiု’ apatyatakutya kaြို”cā”ā”thutyalatyasoya akaြငyaakhā၌ tatiyajhānyamaှ tha၍ satinaှင’ya
paြñña’yacuṃsaññyaphaြcya၍ sampajañyañāṇyanaှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃsaññyaphaြcya၍ jhānyaaṅgātiု’kiု chaငyakhaြငyaso thiုjhānyarapuggiုlyaā”
citya၌phaြcyaso vamya”maြောkyakhaြငya” = cetasika somanassahu khoyachiုapyaso sukhasaññya runa’yaraငya”kaြmya”
tamya”soā”phaြင’ya thaငyalā၏， upekkhāvedanāsaññyasālaျှငyalaññya”koငya” cittekaggatāsaññyalaññya”koငya”
ငြိmyasakyaso sabhotarā”anephaြင’ya thaငyalā၏， thiုakhā၌ runa’yaraငya”kaြmya”tamya”so sukhajhānyaaṅgākiု
payyakhaြငya”ငှာlaññya”koငya” ငြိmyasakyaso upekkhāekaggatā hūso jhānyaaṅgākiု raraှိkhaြငya”ငှာlaññya”koငya”
ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityaāruṅkiုpaငyalaျှငya aphanyatalaဲlaဲ naှluṃ”shaငya”so thiုyogā0carapuggiုlyaā” yakhuakhā
၌ catutthajhānyasaññya phaြcyato’lattaṃ’hu paြောchiုsaင’yaso jovāra၌ bhavaငyaayañyakiု phaြtya၍ thiုānāpāna
paṭibhāganimityaāruṅkiုpaငya āruṃpaြု၍ ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityaāruṅkiု chaငyakhaြငyatatyaso manodhārāvajjanya”
cityasaññya phaြcyapoyalā၏， thiုmanodhārāvajjanya”citya phaြcyapaြီ”saññyamaှ nokya၌ thiုānāpānapaṭibhāganimitya āruṃ
၌paငyalaျှငya indaြေ thakyamaြkyasūā” le”kaြိmyamūlaññya” phaြcyakunyaso， indaြmethakyalhanya”sūā” ငါ”kaြိmyamū
laññya” phaြcyakunyaso jotiု’saññya phaြcyapoyalākaြkunya၏． yaငya”jotiု’thaငya achuṃ”၌ indaြthekyamaြkyasūā”
tacyakhuso catutthajosaññya， indaြေ mathakyalhanya”sūā” tacyakhuso pañcamajosaññya catutthajhānyaraှိso
catutthajhānyanaှင’ya yaှñyaso rūpā0carajhānyajo phaြcya၏． achuṃ”jomaှ kaြhaငya”kunyaso suṃ”kaြိmyaso jo
le”kaြိmyaso jotiု’saññya pathamajhānya၌ chiုkhaဲ’sañña’yaatiုငya”paငya kāmā0carajotiု’ phaြcyakaြkunya၏．
(visuddhi-1-159-160．)
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
473
īchiုlattaṃ’saññyakā” athū”taññya” ---- sukhavedanāsaññya adukkhamasukha amaññyaraso chaငya”raဲsaññya
laññya” mahutya khaျmya”sāsaññyalaññya” mahutyaso alayyaalatyakhaṃcā”maှု upekkhāvedanāā” āse0na
paccayasattiphaြင’ya kaျေ”jū” mapaြုpe． catutthajhānya၌laññya” adukkhamasukha amaññyaraso upekkhāvedanāsā
phaြcyasaင’ya၏， thiုsiု’ upekkhāvedanāsaññyasā phaြcyasaင’yasokaြောင’ya thiုappanājhānavīthi athaငya”၌phaြcyaso thiု
le”kaြိmyaso jotiု’saññya upekkhāvedanānaှင’ya yaှñyaso jotiု’saññyasā phaြcyakunya၏． īle”kaြိmya ငါ”
kaြိmyaso jotiု’၌ upekkhāvedanānaှင’ya yaှñyasaññya၏ aphaြcyahūso akaြောငya”kaြောင’yalaññya”koငya”， raှေ”
machha tatiyajhānyakhaṇa၌paငyalaျှငya payyathā”apyapaြီ”saññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’yalaññya”koငya” pītisaññyalaññya”
yutyalaျော’shā”၏． īkā” athū”taññya”． (visuddhi-1-160．)
kusiုlyatarā”ka kusiုlyatarā”ā” āse0na (= aphanyaphanya athapyathapya maှီvaဲkhaြငya”) paccayasattiphaြင’ya
kaျေ”jū”paြုrāvayya vedanākhaြငya” tūññīmaှ kaျေ”jū”paြုpe”niုငya၏． raှေ”joka upekkhāvedanā phaြcyalaျှငya nokya
jolaññya” upekkhāvedanā phaြcyara၏． raှေ”joka sukha = somanassavedanā phaြcyalaျှငya nokyajolaññya”
sukha = somanassavedanāsā phaြcyara၏． akayya၍ raှေ”josaññya sukhavedanāphaြcya၍ nokyajoka upekkhā
vedanā phaြcyakhaဲ’soya thiုraှေ”joka upekkhāvedanānaှင’ya yaှñyaso nokyajoā” āse0napaccayasatti =
aphanyaphanya athapyathapya maှီvaဲkhaြငya” akaြောငya”athokyaapaṃ’ chamya”ā”phaြင’ya kaျေ”jū” mapaြုpe”niုငya． īkaဲ’siု’
aliုmaraှိapyaso arāṭhāna၌ sukhavedanāhūso pudyatacyapā”phaြင’ya simya”kaျုံ”rethakyathā”apyaso raှေ”
johūso tarā”၏ upekkhā vedanānaှင’ya yaှñyaso nokyajoā” āse0napaccayasattiphaြင’ya kaျေ”jū”paြု
niုငyaso chamya”ā” maraှိsokaြောင’yapaငya phaြcyasaññya． siု’athakya appanājhānavīthimaျာ”athaငya”၌ catutthajhānyajo
hūso appanājosā upekkhāvedanānaှင’ya yaှñyasaññya mahutya， yaငya”appanājhānyajo၏ raှေ”၌ kapyalaျkya
raှိso tacyavīthiathaငya”raှိ parikaṃ upacā anuluṃ gotaြbhuhūso kāmā0cara upacārajhānyajotiု’saññyalaññya”
upekkhāvedanānaှင’ya yaှñyasaññyakhaျññya”sā phaြcyaramaññyahu chiုliုpesaññya． (mahāṭī-1-189 - casaññyakaြñña’ya．)
catutthajhānya
(ettā0tā cesa) sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbe0 somanassadomanassānaṃ
atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṃ upekkhāsatipārisuddhi H catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati．
(dī-1-71． abhi-1-45． visuddhi-1-160．)
īmaျှatiုငya”araှññyaraှိso bhā0nāacañyaphaြင’ya īyogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya sukhindaြkeiုlaññya” payyakhaြငya”
kaြောင’ya dukkhindaြkeiုlaññya” payyakhaြငya”kaြောင’ya raှေ”machha upacārajhānyakhaṇa၌paငyalaျှငya somanassindaြေ domanassia`
ndatiု’၏ khaျုpyakhaြငya”kaြောင’ya adukkhamasukhahu chiုapyaso upekkhāsaññya phaြcyacepyaso sati၏
caငyakaြyyakhaြငya”raှိso catutthajhānyakiု paြñña’yacuṃce၍ catutthajhānyasiု’ kapyarokya၍ ne၏． īsiု’laျှငya ī
yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya sukhahūso payyaapyapaြီ”so jhānyaaṅgātacyapā”raှိso， upekkhā ekaggatāhūso
jhānyaaṅgānaှcyapā”naှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃso， suṃ”pā”so koငya”khaြငya”raှိso， lakkhaṇāchayyapā”naှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃso ānā
pānapaṭibhāganimityalaျှငya āruṃraှိso catutthajhānyasaññya raraှိapyapaြီ” phaြcyapesaññya． (visuddhi-1-160．)
1． dukkhindaြko” (dukkhavedanākā”) pathamajhānya၏ upacārasamādhi akhiုkya၌，
2． domanassindaြko” (domanassavedanākā”) dutiyajhānya၏ upacārasamādhi akhiုkya၌，
3． sukhindaြko” (kāyikasukhavedanākā”) tatiyajhānya၏ upacārasamādhi akhiုkya၌，
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ

4． somanassindaြko” (somanassavedanā = cetasikasukhakā”) catutthajhānya၏ upacārasamādhi
akhiုkya၌ ----
asī”asī” khaျုpyaငြိmya”shā”၏． (visuddhi-1-160．)
jhānyale”pā”tiု’၌ athakyapā vedanāle”maျို” acañyaatiုငya” khaျုpyapuṅkiု (saṃ-3-188-190．) uppaṭipāṭika
suttanya၌ hokaြာ”toyamūkhaြငya”၏ akaြောငya”maှာ īsiု’ phaြcya၏．
atisayanirodhattā． atisayanirodho hi nesaṃ paṭhamajjhānādīsu ， na nirodhoye0．
nirodhoye0 pana upacārakkhaṇe， nātisayanirodho． (visuddhi-1-160．)
alhanyaakaဲā”phaြင’ya khaျုpyasaññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya jhānyale”pā”tiု’၌sālaျှငya vedanāle”maျို”tiု’၏
acañyaatiုငya” khaျုpyakhaြငya”kiု bhurā”raှငya hokaြာ”toyamūkhaြငya” phaြcyapesaññya． thiု dukkha domanassa sukha somanassa
hūso kāyikadukkha， cetasikadukkha kāyikasukha， cetasikasukha vedanātiု’၏ pathamajhānya，
dutiyajhānya， tatiyajhānya， catutthajhānyatiု’၌ alhanyaakaဲā”phaြင’ya khaျုpyakhaြငya”saññya phaြcya၏， khaျုpyatatyachanya”kāmaျှ
sākā” mahutya． siု’soya thiုthiုjhānyatiု’၏ upacāraakhiုkya၌kā” khaျုpyatatyachanya”kāmaျှsā phaြcya၏， lhanyalhanya
kaဲkaဲ khaျုpyaငြိmya”shā”saññyakā” mahutyape．
1． maှnyapesaññya ---- athū”thū”so āvajjanya”raှိso pathamajhānya၏ upacārasamādhi akhiုkya၌ (ānāpāna
paṭibhāganimityakiု āruṃyū၍ phaြcyapoyalāso) upacārasamādhi amaññyaraso samādhi pāvaငyaso mano
dhārika jovīthipoငya”maျာ”chā phaြcyakhiုkya၌ dukkhindaြေ amaññyaraso kāyikadukkhavedanāsaññya khaျုpyaငြိmya”shā”paြီ
phaြcyasoyalaññya” maှkyakhaြငyacasaññyatiု’၏ kiုkyakhaဲthipā”khaြငya” athe’athikaြောင’yalaññya”koငya”， maññīññhatyaso
nerā၌ nekhaြငya” maññīmaññhatya mamaျှmata thiုငyamikhaြငya”kaြောင’ya phaြcyapoyalāso paငyapanya”khaြငya”၏ paြငya”thanyachā pūloငya
lākhaြငya”kaြောင’yalaññya”koငya” kāyikadukkhavedanā၏ thapyamaṃ phaြcyapoyalākhaြငya”saññya phaြcyaniုငyarāse”၏， siု’soya
appanājhānyajophaြcyakhiုkya appanājhānya၏ athaငya”၌kā” dukkhavedanā၏ phaြcyapoyalākhaြငya”saññya maphaြcyatanyakoငya”
saññyasā phaြcya၏． upacārasamādhi akhiုkya၌ kāyikadukkhavedanā = dukkhindaြseññya khaျုpyaငြိmya”shā”soyalaññya”
sukhavedanāhūso chana’yakaျငyabhakyatarā”ka mapayyaraှာ”apyase”saññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya thiု dukkhindaြseññya
koငya”chā khaျုpyasaññyakā” maphaြcyase”．
appanājhānyajomaျာ” cokhiုkya appanāsamādhi athaငya”၌kā” pītikaြောင’yaphaြcyaso (= pītinaှင’ya yaှñya
so cityakaြောင’ya phaြcyaso) mhanyamaြtyaso cittajarupyatiု’၏ tacyakiုyyaluṃ”siု’ paျံ’naှံ’၍ phaြcyanekhaြငya”kaြောင’ya aluṃ”
cuṃso rūpakāyatacyakhuluṃ”saññya khaျmya”sāsukhataññya”hūso thaငya”kaြီ”thaဲsiု’ sakyavaငyakaျrokyalaျkya raှိne၏，
khaျmya”sāsukhataññya”hūso thaငya”kaြီ”thaဲsiု’ sakyavaငyakaျrokyalaျkyaraှိsokiုyya raှိsasūā” kāyikadukkha
vedanāhūso dukkhindaြseññya chana’yakaျငyabhakya sukhavedanāka payyasatyathā”apyasañña’ya athakyakaြောင’ya koငya”
chā khaျုpyaငြိmya”paြီ” phaြcyane၏．
2． tacyaphanya ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityaāruṅkiုpaငya āruṃyū၍ phaြcyapoyalāso dutiya appanājhānavīthi
maphaြcyamī raှေ”aphiု’၌ ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityakiုpaငya āruṃyū၍ phaြcyapoyalākaြkunyaso manodhārāvajjanya” amaျို”
maျို”raှိso upacārasamādhi amaññyaraso manodhārikajovīthipoငya”maျာ”chā athaငya”၌ cityachaငya”raဲmaှု khaṃcā”
khaျkya domanassavedanāhūso domanassindaြseññya payyaraှာ”apyapaြီ”soyaငြာ”laññya” yaငya” domanassindaြေ
saññya vitakya vicāralaျှငya athokyaapaṃ’ akaြောငya”raှိso kiုyya၏paငyapanya”khaြငya”saññyalaññya”koငya”， citya၏
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”

paငyapanya”khaြငya”saññyalaññya”koငya” raှိkhaဲ’pāmū thapyamaṃ၍ phaြcyapoyalāniုငyapaြnya၏． vitakya vicāra maraှိsoyakā” maphaြcya
to’pe．
akaြငyacitya၌kā” domanassindaြseññya yaှñya၍ phaြcya၏． thiုcitya၌kā” vitakya vicāralaññya” yaှñyalaျkyapaငya．
yaငya” vitakya vicāra raှိkhaြငya”kaြောင’ya domanassindaြseññya phaြcyapoyalāra၏， dutiyajhānya၏ upacārasamādhi
nayyamaြေ၌kā” vitakya vicāratiု’kiု mapayyaraှာ”apyakunyase”saññyasā phaြcya၏， thiုkaြောင’ya thiုdutiyajhānya၏
upacārasamādhinayyamaြေ၌ thiုdomanassindaြေ၏ phaြcyakhaြငya”saññya phaြcyaniုငyarā၏． dutiyajhānyasamādhi akhiုkya၌kā”
domanassindaြေ၏ athokyaapaṃ’ akaြောငya”phaြcyaso vitakya vicārakiု payyaraှာ”thā”paြီ” payyaraှာ”apyapaြီ”
phaြcyasokaြောင’ya domanassindaြေ၏ phaြcyapoyalākhaြငya”saññya maphaြcyatanyakoငya”saññyasātaññya”．
3． tacyaphanya tatiyajhānya၏ upacārasamādhinayyamaြေ၌ kāyikasukhavedanā = kiုyya၌ phaြcyaso khaျmya”sā
sukhahūso sukhindaြkeiု payyaraှာ”apyapaြီ”soyalaññya” pītikaြောင’ya phaြcyaso (= pītinaှင’ya yaှñyaso upacāra
jhānyacityakaြောင’ya phaြcyaso) mhanyamaြtyaso cittajarupyaphaြင’ya paျံ’naှံ’the’thiapyaso kiုyyakāyaraှိsasūā” yaငya”
sukhindaြေ၏ tacyaphanyaphaြcyapoyalāpaြnyakhaြငya”saññya phaြcyatanyakoငya”rā၏． tatiyajhānyaakhiုkya၌kā” yaငya”sukhindaြေ
၏ phaြcyapoyalākhaြငya”saññya maññyasañña’yanaññya”naှင’yamaျှ maphaြcyarāsaññyasātaññya”． maှnyapesaññya tatiyajhānya၌ sukha၏
athokyaapaṃ’ akaြောငya”phaြcyaso pītisaññya akhaျငya”khapyasimya” khaျုpyaငြိmya”shā”paြီ” phaြcya၏． thiုkaြောင’ya sukhindaြေ
၏ phaြcyapoyalāpaြnyakhaြငya”saññya maññyasañña’yanaññya”naှင’yamaျှ maphaြcyarāsaññyasātaññya”． ««sukhindaြheūsaññya ahitya kusala
vipākya sukhasahagutya kāyaviññāṇyacityanaှင’ya yaှñyathaဲphaြcyaso sukhavedanākiု chiုliုsaññya． kāyikasukha
hulaññya” khoya၏．»»

payyaraှာ”apyapaြီ”soyalaññya” somanassindaြေ၏ pītikaဲ’siု’ mave”bhaဲ nī”se”saññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’yalaññya”koငya”，
(upacārasamādhinayyamaြmeှာsā raှိnese”saphaြင’ya catutthaappanājhānyasiု’laññya” marokyase”rakā”) appanā
jhānyasiု’ rokyaso upekkhāvedanā၏ maraှိkhaြငya”kaြောင’ya somanassindaြkeiု koငya”koငya”kaြီ” makaျောya
