adukkhamasukha hūso pāḷitoya၌ hokaြာ”thā”toyamūapyaso khaျmya”sālaññya” mahutya chaငya”raဲ
laññya” mahutyaso adukkhamasukhahūso alayyaalatyakhaṃcā”maှု upekkhāvedanākā” simyamhe’chā၏，
siniုငyakhaဲ၏， khaျmya”khaျmya”sāsā lhayyalhayyakūkūphaြင’ya ñāṇyaphaြင’ya phamya”yūkhaြငya”ငှာ machamya”niုငyape． thiုkaြောင’ya loka
upamā maññyasaññyakā” paျkyacī”neso kaြို”cā”ā”thutyamaှု payogaraှိ၍ chiုchuṃ”makhakyaso hutyahutya ññā”
ññā” khaျñya”kapya၍ phamya”yūkhaြငya”ငှာ matatyaniုငyaso nhā”kiု lhayyalhayyakūkū phamya”yūniုငyaranyaaliု’ငှာ nhā”thinya”
saññya tacyakhuso nhā”khaြံ၌ nhā”ā”luṃ”kiု cushaငya”liုkya၏， thiုnoငyamaှ nhā”tacyakoငyacī tacyakoငyacīkiု nhā”khaြံ
maှ thutyachoငyalatyasoya acañyasaphaြင’ya nhā”khaြံ0siု’ chiုkyarokyalāso thiုnhā”paျkyakiုlaññya” - “īsañña’ya
mā”mā” lāso nhā”kā” thiုphamya”liုsañña’ya nhā”paျkyataññya”， thiုnhā”paျkyakiု phamya”kaြkunya”hu phamya”ce၏siု’ ----
īupamāatūpaငyalaျှငya bhurā”raှငyasaññya ñāṇyaphaြင’ya lhayyalhayyakūkū simya”chaññya”niုငyaranya piုငya”khaြာ”yūniုငyaranya aliု’ငှာ
thiု vedanāā”luṃ”tiု’kiု tacyapoငya”taññya” cu၍ choငyatoyamū၏， īcatutthajhānya၌ poငya”cu၍ hokaြာ”
toya mū၏．
akaျို”kā” īsiု’taññya” ---- īsiု’ poငya”cu၍ choငyaapyakunyaso thiုvedanātiု’kiု thaငyaraှာ”paြpaြီ”၍
akaြငyasabhotarā”saññya = akaြငyakhaṃcā”maှုsaññya sukhalaññya” mahutya， dukkhalaññya” mahutya， somanassalaññya”
mahutya， domanassalaññya” mahutya， īkhaṃcā”maှု sabhotarā”saññya adukkhamasukha hūso upekkhāvedanā
paငyataññya”hu ī adukkhamasukha = upekkhāvedanākiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”yūkhaြငya” phamya”yūkhaြငya”ငှာ tatyakoငya”၏．
tacyanaññya”laññya” adukkhamasukha cetovimutti amaññyaraso citya၏ chana’yakaျငyabhakyasabhotarā”maှ
lhatyamaြောkyakaြောငya”phaြcyaso catutthajhānyasamāpatya၏ rakhaြငya”၏ akaြောငya”upāyyakiု paြkhaြငya”akaျို”ငှာlaññya”
thiုvedanātiု’kiု īcatutthajhānya၌ poငya”cu၍ bhurā”raှငya hokaြာ”toyamūapyakunya၏hu siraှိpāle． dukkhindaြေ
kiု payyatatyaso pathamajhānya casaññyatiု’saññya thiု adukkhamasukha cetovimutti၏ akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’
phaြcyakaြkunya၏．
“ငါ’raှငya koṭṭhika ...adukkhamasukha cetovimutti samāpatya၏ akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’saññya caငyacacya
le”maျို”tiု’taññya”． ငါ’raှငya koṭṭhika ...īsāsanātoya၌ yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya sukhindaြkeiုlaññya”
payyakhaြငya”kaြောင’ya dukkhindaြkeiုlaññya” payyakhaြငya”kaြောင’ya raှေ”machha upacārajhānyakhaṇa၌paငyalaျှငya somanassindaြေ
domanassindaြteiု’၏ khaျုpyakhaြငya”kaြောင’ya adukkhamasukhahu chiုapyaso upekkhāsaññya phaြcyacepyaso sati
၏ caငyakaြyyakhaြငya”raှိso catutthajhānyakiု paြñña’yacuṃce၍ catutthajhānyasiု’ kapyarokya၍ ne၏． ငါ’raှငya koṭṭhika
adukkhamasukha cetovimutti samāpatya၏ akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’saññya caငyacacya ī le”pā”tiု’taññya”．
(ma-1-370． mahāvedallasuttanya．)
īsiု’ hokaြာ”thā”toyamūsokaြောင’ya dukkhindaြေ domanassindaြေ sukhindaြေ somanassindaြေ hūso
indaြေasī”sī”kiု payyatatyaso pathamajhānya dutiyajhānya tatiyajhānya catutthajhānya၏ upacārajhānyatiု’saññya
adukkhamasukha cetovimutti catutthajhānya samāpatya၏ rakhaြငya”၏ akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’ phaြcyakaြkunya၏． thiု
akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’kiု paြkhaြငya”ငှာlaññya” īcatutthajhānya၌ yaငya” vedanāle”maျို”tiု’kiု poငya”cu၍ hokaြာ”
toyamūsaññyahu siraှိpāle． (visuddhi-1-161-162．)
tacyanaññya” ---- sotāpattimagyacaso tacyapā”so aောkyaariyamagyatiု’၌ payyaraှာ”apyakunyapaြီ”soya
laññya” sakkāyadiṭṭhicaso tarā”tiု’kiု tatiya (= anāgāmi)magya၏ guṇyakaျေ”jū”kiု khaျီ”mhamya”khaြငya” akaျို”ငှာ
thiု tatiyamagya၌ ---- pañcannaṃ ora mbhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā = aောkyapiုငya” saṃyojañya ငါ”pā”tiု’၏
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
477
kunyakhaြငya”kaြောင’ya ---- īsiု’ casaññyaphaြင’ya anāgāmimagyaka payyaraှာ”apyakunya၏hu hokaြာ”toyamūsakaဲ’siု’
alā”tūpaငya īcatutthajhānya၌ thiုvedanātiု’kiု poငya”cu၍ hokaြာ”toyamūapyakunya၏hulaññya” siraှိpāle．
(visuddhi-1-162．)
tacyanaññya” ---- akaြောငya”kiု payyasatyakhaြငya”phaြင’ya īcatutthajhānya၌ rāga dosa mohatiု’၏ alhanya
ve”saññya၏ aphaြcyakiု paြkhaြငya”ငှာlaññya” thiုsukhacaso vedanātiု’kiု hokaြာ”toyamūapyakunya၏hu siraှိ
pāle． maှnyapesaññya thiုvedanātiု’thaငya kāyika sukhavedanā = kiုyya၌ phaြcyaso khaျmya”sāmaှု sukhavedanāsaññya
cetasikasukha = cityakhaျmya”sāmaှု somanassavedanā၏ akaြောငya”tarā” phaြcya၏． somanassavedanākā”
rāga၏ akaြောငya”tacyakhu phaြcya၏．
kāyika dukkhavedanā = kiုyya၌ phaြcyaso chaငya”raဲmaှု dukkhavedanākā” cityamakhaျmya”sāmaှု domanassa
vedanā၏ akaြောငya”tarā”phaြcya၏． domanassavedanākā” dosa၏ akaြောငya”tarā” phaြcya၏． catutthajhānya
saññya thiုsukha casaññyakiု payyasatyakhaြငya”phaြင’ya akaြောငya”tarā”naှင’yatakha phaြcyakunyaso rāga dosatiု’kiု payya
satyaapyakunya၏， thiုkaြောင’ya catutthajhānyasaññya rāga dosatiု’naှင’ya alhanyave”၏． īkā” aphaြteññya”．
sukhāya kho āvuso visākha vedanāya rāgānusayo anuseti， dukkhāya kho āvuso

= dāyakā visākha ... sukhavedanā၏ nokyachhayya၌ rāgānusaya kinya”vapyane၏， dāyakā visākha
dukkhavedanā၏ nokyachhayya၌ paṭighānusaya kinya”vapyane၏．

paြုlhayyasaññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’yapaငyataññya”． (mahāṭī-1-338．)

kaြhaငya”so sukhapaṭisaṃvedī， cittasaṅkhārapaṭisaṃvedī hūso pudyatiု’kiုlaññya” pītipaṭisaṃvedī hūso
pudya၌lāso īnaññya”phaြင’yasālaျှငya anakyasabhoā”phaြင’ya sipākunya． (ārammaṇasabho， asammoha
sabhoā”phaြင’ya naှcyamaျို”khhaဲkhaြာ” sipuṅkiု raññyaññhaှnya”thā”saññya．) thū”khaြာ”khaျkyamaှာ īmaျှsātaññya” --- catukkanaññya”၌
pathamajhānya dutiyajhānya tatiyajhānyatiု’၏ achamya”phaြင’ya sukhapaṭisaṃvedī = sukhakiု asī”asī” koငya”chā

= vedanā saññāhūso cittasaṅkhāratarā” naှcyapā”kiု asī”asī” koငya”chā thaငyathaငyaraှာ”raှာ” siapyasaññya၏
aphaြcyakiုlaññya”koငya” siraှိpāle． vedanā saññā tarā”naှcyapā”kā” cittasaṅkhāra maññya၏．
sukhapaṭisaṃvedīhūsopudya၌ pakiṇṇakasaṅkhāra amaññyaraso atitya anāgatya paccuppanya hūso
kālasuṃ”pā” ajjhatta bahiddhahūso santānyanaှcyapā”၏ achamya”phaြင’ya phaြcyapoyanekaြkunyaso (31)bhuṃ athaငya”၌
taññyaraှိso khandhāငါ”pā” rupyanāmya saṅkhāratarā”tiု’kiု lakkhaṇāre”suṃ”tanyasiု’ taငya၍ raှုphā”suṃ”sapyakhaြငya”၏
achamya”phaြင’ya phaြcyapoyalāso vipassanāñāṇya၏ taññyarābhuṅkiု paြkhaြငya”ငှာ - paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷitoya၌ - sukhanti
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ

toyamūapya၏”hu maှtyasā”pāle． akaြောငya”mū jhānyasamathapiုငya”၌ kāyikasukhavedanā maphaြcyaniုငyaso
kaြောင’yataññya”． (jhānyasamāpatyaathaငya”၌ jhānyajomaျာ”naှင’ya yaှñyathaဲphaြcyaneso vedanāmaှာ cetasikasukha
amaññyaraso somanassavedanāmaျို”sā phaြcyaniုငyasokaြောင’ya kāyikasukhavedanāmaှာ ahityakusalavipākya
sukhasahagutya kāyaviññāṇyacityanaှင’yasā yaှñyathaဲphaြcyaniုငya၍ jhānyacityamaျာ”naှင’ya cittakkhaṇatacyakhuathaငya” atū
yaှñyathaဲ၍ maphaြcyaniုငyasokaြောင’yahu chiုliုpesaññya．) (visuddhi-1-280． mahāṭī-1-340．)
4． passambhayaṃ cittasaṅkhāraṃ
passambhayaṃ cittasaṅkhāraṃ - hūsaññya runa’yaraငya” runa’yaraငya”so cittasaṅkhāra amaññyaraso vedanā saññā
naှcyapā”kiု ငြိmya”celaျkya khaျုpyacelaျkya vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalekiု phaြcyaaောငya kaျင’yapāhu chiုliုpe၏．
ငြိmya”celaျkyahūso pariyāyyacakā”phaြင’ya chiုapyaso khaျုpyaငြိmya”maှုkiု kāyasaṅkhāra၌ akaျyyaphhaင’yachiုapya
khaဲ’paြီ”sañña’ya naññya”atiုငya” siraှိpāle．
vedanānupassanā
chiုphhayya raှိpaြnyase”၏． īdutiyacatukka၌ - pītipaṭisaṃvedī = pītikiု asī”asī” thaငyathaငyaraှာ”raှာ”
koငya”chāsilaျkya casaññyaphaြင’ya hokaြာ”toyamūapyaso koṭṭhāsa၌ pītikiု padhāna ū” choငyapaြု raññya
ññhaှnya”saphaြင’ya pītinaှင’ya yaှñyaso sampayutyavedanākiု hokaြာ”toyamūapyapesaññya．
sukhapaṭisaṃvedī = sukhakiု asī”asī” koငya”chā thaငyathaငyaraှာ”raှာ” silaျkya casaññyaphaြင’ya hokaြာ”
toyamūapyaso koṭṭhāsa၌ sukhavedanākiု sarupyasabhoā”phaြင’yasālaျှငya sarupyathutya၍ hokaြာ”toya
mūapyapesaññya．
cittasaṅkhārapaṭisaṃvedī， passambhayaṃ cittasaṅkhāraṃ casaññyaphaြင’ya hokaြာ”toyamūapyakunyaso cittasaṅkhāra
naှင’ya capyayaှñyakunyaso naှcyakoṭṭhāsatiု’၌ “saññā ca vedanā ca cetasikā ete dhammā cittapaṭibaddhā
cittasaṅkhārā”= saññāsaññyalaññya”koငya” vedanāsaññyalaññya”koငya” ītarā”naှcyapā”tiု’saññya citya၌ maှီkunya
saññyaphaြcya၍ cityanaှင’ya capya၍ phaြcyakaြkunya၏， cityasaññya paြုpaြငyaapyakunya၏．” (paṭisaṃ-187． ma-1-376．) ----
īsiု’ hokaြာ”toyamūkhaြငya”kaြောင’ya saññānaှင’ya yaှñyaso vedanākiုpaငya hokaြာ”toyamūapyapesaññya．
««viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ = viññāṇyakaြောင’ya nāmyarupyaphaြcya၏ - hu paṭiccasamuppādyadesanātoyamaျာ”၌
bhurā”raှငya hokaြာ”thā”toyamūsokaြောင’ya viññāṇyakaြောင’ya cetasikyatarā”tiု’laññya” phaြcyalārakā”
vedanā saññā tarā”naှcyapā”tiု’saññya citya၌ maှီkunyasaññyaphaြcya၍ cityanaှင’ya capya၍ phaြcyakaြkunya၏， cityasaññya
paြုpaြငyaapyakunya၏hu chiုliုpesaññya．»»
īsiု’laျှငya vedanānupassanānaññya”phaြင’ya īdutiyacatukkakiု bhurā”raှငya hokaြာ”thā”toyamūapya၏hu
siraှိpāle． (visuddhi-1-280． mahāṭī-1-341．)

1． cittapaṭisaṃvedī
1． cityakiု asī”asī” koငya”chā thaငyathaငyaraှာ”raှာ” sisaññyaphaြcya၍ vaငyasakyalekiု phaြcyaceṃ’hu kaျင’ya၏．
pa ． thhakyasakyalekiု phaြcyaceṃ’hu kaျင’ya၏．
ī tatiyacatukka၌laññya” jhānyale”pā”tiု’၏ achamya”phaြင’ya cityakiု asī”asī” koငya”chā thaငyathaငya
raှာ”raှာ” siapyasaññyahu siraှိpāle． chiုliုsaññyamaှာ īsiု’ phaြcya၏． ārammaṇasabho asammohasabho
naှcyamaျို”so akhaြငya”arātiု’phaြင’ya simaှုkiု raññyaññhaှnya”thā”saññya． jhānyale”pā”tiု’kiု ānāpānapaṭibhāganimitya
āruṅkiု āruṃpaြု၍ acañyaatiုငya” vaငyacā”၏． thiုyogā0carapuggiုlya၏ santānyavayya jhānyasamāpatyakiု vaငyacā”
chaဲ khaṇa၌ jhānyakiု raraှိnekhaြငya” jhānyanaှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃnekhaြငya”phaြင’ya ānāpāna paṭibhāganimityakiု āruṃyūkhaြငya”kiု
akaြောငya”paြုsaphaြင’ya thiုpaṭibhāganimityalaျှငya āruṃraှိso jhānyanaှင’ya sampayutyaphaြcyaso cityakiု asī”asī”
koငya”chā thaငyathaငyaraှာ”raှာ” siapyasaññya phaြcyapesaññya． ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityaāruṅkiု koငya”chā thaငyathaငya
raှာ”raှာ” siapyasokaြောင’ya phaြcyapesaññya． īkā” āruṃsabhoā”phaြင’ya thaငyathaငyaraှာ”raှာ” jhānyacityakiု sipuṃ
taññya”．
jhānyale”pā”tiု’kiု acañyaatiုငya” vaငyacā”၏， vaငyacā”paြီ”laျှငya jhānyamaှ tha၍ jhānyanaှင’ya yaှñyaso jhānyacityakiု
(jhānyacityanaှင’ya takhaso sampayutyatarā”cukiု) kunyatatyasosabho paျkyatatyasosabho ā”phaြင’ya
lakkhaṇāre” suṃ”tanyasiု’ taငyalaျkya raှုphā”suṃ”sapya၏． thiုyogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya jhānyacityakiု vipassanā
raှုneso akhiုkya၌ jhānyacitya၏ sabhā0lakkhaṇānaှင’ya sāmaññalakkhaṇākiု (= anicca dukkha anatta akhaြငya”
arākiု) thiု”thhaငya”simaြငyalaျkya raှိ၏． yaငya”siု’ sikhaြငya”kā” asammohasabhoā”phaြင’ya jhānyacityakiု thaငyathaငya
raှာ”raှာ” sikhaြငya”paငya phaြcyapesaññya． (visuddhi-1-280． mahāṭī-1-341．)
ītatiyacatukka၌ pathama ññhaှnyakaြာ”khaျkyakā” jhānyacityakiု ārammaṇasabho asammohasabho
ā”phaြင’ya thaငyathaငyaraှာ”raှာ” silaျkya asakyaraှူneranya bhurā”raှငya၏ ññhaှnyakaြာ”toyamūkhaျkyapaငya phaြcyasaññya．
2． abhippamodayaṃ cittaṃ
abhippamodayaṃ cittaṃ - hūsaññyakā” (ka) jhānyanaှင’yayaှñyaso jhānyacityakiု jhānyanaှင’yayaှñyaso pītiphaြင’ya
vamya”maြောkyacelaျkya， (kha) jhānapītikiု (= ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityakiု āruṃpaြု၍ phaြcyapoyalāso jhānya
aṅgātiု’thaငya pāvaငyaso pītikiု) yaငya”pīti၏ khaya 0ya = kunyatatya paျkyatatyaso sabhokiု āruṃpaြု၍
phaြcyapoyalāso vipassanācityakiု thiုvipassanāñāṇya၏ araှုkhaṃāruṃphaြcyaso jhānyapītiphaြင’ya vamya”maြောkya
celaျkya rhaှငyalanya”takyakaြhacelaျkya vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalekiု phaြcyaaောငya kaျင’yapāhu chiုliု၏．
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ

īsiု’ naှcyamaျို”kunyaso akhaြငya”arātiု’phaြင’ya lhanyachā rhaှငyalanya”takyakaြha vamya”maြောkyakhaြငya”saññya phaြcyapoya
lā၏．
1． samādhi၏ achamya”phaြင’ya lhanyachā rhaှငyalanya”takyakaြha vamya”maြောkyapuṅkā” -- pītinaှင’yayaှñyaso pathamajhānya
dutiyajhānyatiု’kiု vaငyacā”၏， thiုyogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya jhānyasamāpatyakiု vaငyacā”chaဲkhaṇa၌ jhānyacityanaှင’ya
yaှñyaso jhānyapītiphaြင’ya thiုjhānyacityakiုpaငyalaျှငya lhanyachārhaှငyalanya”takyakaြha vamya”maြောkyace၏．
2． vipassanā၏ achamya”phaြင’ya lhanyachā rhaှငyalanya”takyakaြhavamya”maြောkyapuṃmaှာ īsiု’ phaြcya၏． pītinaှင’ya yaှñyakunyaso
pathamajhānya dutiyajhānyatiု’kiု vaငyacā”၍ jhānyamaှtha၍ jhānyanaှင’ya yaှñyaso pītikiု kunyatatya paျkyatatyaso
sabhokiု āruṃyū၍ lakkhaṇāyāñyataငyalaျkya vipassanāñāṇyaphaြင’ya raှုphā”suṃ”sapya၏． īsiု’ raှုphā”suṃ”sapya
khaဲ’soya vipassanāñāṇyaakhiုkya၌ jhānyanaှင’ya yaှñyaso pītikiု āruṃpaြု၍ phaြcyapoyalāso vipassanācityakiု
yaငya” pītika lhanyachā rhaှငyalanya”takyakaြha vamya”maြောkyace၏． īsiု’kaျင’yaso yogā0carapuggiုlyakiု cityakiု
lhanyachā rhaှငyalanya”takyakaြha vamya”maြောkyacelaျkya vaငyasakyalekiု phaြcyaaောငya thhakyasakyalekiု phaြcyaaောငya
kaျင’ya၏ hū၍ khoyachiုapyapesaññya． (visuddhi-1-280-281．) ---- īkā” cityakiု lhanyachā rhaှငyalanya”takyakaြha
vamya”maြောkyacelaျkya asakyaraှူranya bhurā”raှငya၏ ññhaှnyakaြာ”toyamūkhaျkyataññya”． alhanyakhaျcyakhaငyaso vamya”maြောkya
nesū mityachhetacyaū”kiု the’maြငyarasoakhā the’maြငyarasū၌laññya” vamya”maြောkyamaှု phaြcyanesakaဲ’siု’ maှtyapā．
3． samādahaṃ cittaṃ
cityakiု koငya”chā thā”laျkya vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalekiု phaြcyaaောငya kaျင’yaramaññyahūsaññya pathama
jhānya casañña’ya jhānyale”pā”tiု’kiု phaြcyacekhaြငya” vaငyacā”khaြငya”၏ achamya”phaြင’ya ānāpānapaṭibhāganimitya āruṃ၌
cityakiု aññīaññhatya raှေ”raှုthā”saññya phaြcya၍ aññīaññhatya koငya”chā thā”saññyaphaြcya၍ vaငyasakyalekiု phaြcya
ceṃ’， thhakyasakyalekiု phaြcyaceṃ’hu kaျင’yaramaññyahu chiုliုpesaññya． (visuddhi-1-281．)
ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityakiု āruṃpaြု၍ phā”maျာ”neso ānāpānassatisamādhi bhā0nācityakiု
ānāpānapaṭibhāganimitya bhā0nāāruṃmaှ anaññya”ငyyamaျှsoyalaññya” thana’yachutyakhaြငya” = līnapakkha， cityapaျံ’lhaင’ya
shā”khaြငya” = uddhaccapakkha hūso naှcyaphakyachanya”siု’ makapyarokyacebhaဲ bhā0nāāruṃ၌ cityadhātya maññhatyakiုငya”
khaြငya”laññya” maphaြcyaaောငya， cityadhātya takyakaြhamaြင’yamokyamaှုlaññya” maphaြcyaaောငya， indaြေငါ”pā”tiု’kiု ññīmaျှaောငya
kaျငyakhaြငya”phaြင’ya indaြေ maññīññhatyamaှု maraှိaောငya， samādhi၏ athhatyaathipyasiု’ rokyaraှိkhaြငya”phaြင’ya matunyalaှုpyakhaြငya”siု’
rokyalaျkya ānāpānapaṭibhāganimityaāruṃ၌ koငya”chā taññyataṃ’aောငya appanājhānya၏ achamya”phaြင’ya bhā0nā
cityakiု thā”laျkya vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyalekiု phaြcyaceṃ’hu kaျင’yaramaññyahu chiုliုpesaññya．
(mahāṭī-1-342．)
jhānyakiု phaြcyacelaျkya jhānyakiု vaငyacā”laျkya asakyaraှူnesoya samathapiုငya”၌ cityakiု koငya”koငya”
thā”laျkya asakyaraှူnesaññya maññyapesaññya． vipassanāpiုငya”၌kā” īsiု’ phaြcyape၏．
jhānyale”pā”tiု’kiု acañyaatiုငya” vaငyacā”၍ jhānyamaှthapaြီ”laျှငya jhānyanaှင’yayaှñyaso cityakiု (cityaū”choငya
sañña’ya nāmyatarā”cukiု) kunyatatya paျkyatatyaso khaya-0ya sabhoā”phaြင’ya vipassanāñāṇyaphaြင’ya koငya”chā
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
489
raှုmaြငyaneso yogā0carapuggiုlyaā” vipassanāñāṇyaakhiုkya၌ yaငya”jhānyacitya၏ anicca dukkha anatta akhaြငya”
arāhūso lakkhaṇākiု aphanyaphanya athapyathapya cittakkhaṇatiုငya” cittakkhaṇatiုငya”၌ thiု”thhaငya” simaြငyakhaြငya”phaြင’ya
khaṇikacittekaggatā amaññyaraso samādhisaññya phaြcyapoyalā၏． īsiု’ phaြcyapoyalāso khaṇikacitte
kaggatā amaññyaraso samādhi၏ achamya”phaြင’yalaññya” yaငya” jhānyanāmyatarā”tiု’၏ aniccaakhaြငya”arā dukkha
akhaြငya”arā anattaakhaြငya”arāhūso āruṃ၌ vipassanācityakiု aññīaññhaှtya koငya”chā raှေ”raှုthā”so
rahanya”kiု “cityakiု aññīaññhatya koငya”chā raှေ”raှုthā”laျkya vaငyasakyalekiု phaြcyaceṃ’， thhakyasakyalekiု
phaြcyaceṃ’”hu kaျင’yane၏hū၍ khoyachiုapyapesaññya． (visuddhi-1-281．)
khaṇikacittekaggatā ---- amaññyaraso samādhihūsaññya khaṇatāmaျှ taññyakhaြငya”raှိso samādhitaññya”．
thiုkhaṇikacittekaggatā amaññyaraso khaṇikasamādhisaññyalaññya” jhānyacitya ū”choငyasañña’ya jhānyasaṅkhāra
tarā”cutiု’၏ ----
1． phaြcyapaြီ”laျှငya paျkyaneso aniccaakhaြငya”arā，
2． phaြcyakhaြငya” paျkyakhaြငya” daṇyakhaျkyaphaြင’ya amaြဲmapaြtya aññaှñya”panya” anaှိpyacakyakhaṃneraso dukkhaakhaြငya”arā，
3． mapaျkyacī”bhaဲ akaျိtyaakhaဲ akhiုငyaamā anaှcyasāraā”phaြင’ya taññyanesañña’ya attamahutyasañña’ya anatta
akhaြငya”arā ----
raှိso saṅkhāraāruṃ၌ amaြဲmapaြtya raှေ”naှင’yanokya chakyacapyalaျkya aniccaakhaြငya”arāā”phaြင’yaphaြcyace，
dukkhaakhaြငya”arāā”phaြင’yaphaြcyace， anattaakhaြငya”arāā”phaြင’yaphaြcyace tacyamaျို”maျို”so akhaြငya”arāā”phaြင’ya
phaြcyapoyanelatyasoya chana’yakaျငyabhakya mohacaso tarā”chiု”saññya malhaှmya”miု”niုငya maphicī”niုငyasaññyaphaြcya၍ yaငya”
saṅkhāraāruṃ၌ ciုkyathā”apyasakaဲ’siု’ vipassanācityasaññya tunyalaှုpyamaှု maraှိbhaဲ ငြိmyavapyachā kapya၍ taññyane၏．
thiုkaြောင’ya athakyapācakā”rapyakiု aṭṭhakathācharātoya mina’yachiုtoyamūkhaြငya” phaြcyapesaññya． (mahāṭī-1-342．)
īkhaṇikasamādhimaျို”kā” jhānyasaṅkhāratarā”tiု’kiု vipassanāraှုniုငyasañña’ya jhānyarasū sūtoyakoငya”tiု’
santānya၌sā phaြcyapoyaniုငyasaññyakiု satipaြုsaင’yapesaññya． (kaျnya khaṇikasamādhimaျာ” akaြောငya”kiု raှေ”thaငya
raှငya”khaဲ’paြီ” phaြcyapesaññya．) ---- īkā” āruṃ၌ cityakiု koငya”chā thā”laျkya asakyaraှူneranya bhurā”raှငya၏
ññhaှnyakaြာ”toyamūkhaျkya phaြcyapesaññya．
4． vimocayaṃ cittaṃ
1． pathamajhānyaphaြင’ya nī0raṇatarā”tiု’maှ，
2． dutiyajhānyaphaြင’ya vitakya vicāratiု’maှ，
3． tatiyajhānyaphaြင’ya pītimaှ，
4． catutthajhānyaphaြင’ya sukha dukkhatiု’maှ ----
vikkhambhanavimutti = khapyakaြာkaြာ khhāthā”soā”phaြင’ya lhatyamaြောkyakhaြငya”phaြင’ya cityakiု lhatyamaြောkyacelaျkya
athū”saphaြင’ya lhatyamaြောkyacelaျkya vaငyasakyalekiု phaြcyaceṃ’hu kaျင’ya၏， thhakyasakyalekiု phaြcyaceṃ’hu
kaျင’ya၏． (visuddhi-1-281．)
īkā” samādhi၏ achamya”phaြင’ya cityakiု chana’yakaျငyabhakyatarā”tiု’maှ lhatyamaြောkyacelaျkya asakyaraှူpuṃ
kaျင’yacañyataññya”． vipassanā၏ achamya”phaြင’ya kaျင’yapuṃmaှာ īsiု’ phaြcya၏．
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
490
thiုjhānyale”pā”tiု’kiုmūlaññya” acañyaatiုငya” vaငyacā”၍ jhānyamaှtha၍ jhānyanaှင’yayaှñyaso cityakiု (jhānya
citya ū”choငyasañña’ya saṅkhāratarā”cukiု) kunyatatya paျkyatatyaso khaya-0ya sabhoā”phaြင’ya lakkhaṇāre”
suṃ”tanyataငyakā raှုphā”suṃ”sapya၏． thiုkaဲ’siု’ jhānyacitya ū”choငyasañña’ya jhānyasaṅkhāratarā”tiု’kiု paျkyakhaြငya”bhaငyakiု
āruṃyū၍ vipassanāraှုneso thiုyogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya vipassanāñāṇyaakhiုkya၌ ----
1． aniccahu aphanyatalaဲlaဲ raှုso aniccānupassanāphaြင’ya niccasaññāmaှ，
2． dukkhānupassanāphaြင’ya sukhasaññāmaှ，
3． anattānupassanāphaြင’ya attasaññāmaှ，
4． saṅkhāratiု’၌ ငြီ”ငhe’so akhaြငya”arāā”phaြင’ya phaြcyaso nibbidānupassanāphaြင’ya saṅkhāratiု’၌ naှcyasakya
maြtyaniု”khaြငya” pītinaှင’ya takhaso tapyamakyamaှု sappītika taṇaှာ hūso nandīmaှ，
5． saṅkhāratiု’၌ tapyamakyakhaြငya” kaငya”so akhaြငya”arāā”phaြင’ya phaြcyaso saṅkhāratiု’၏ paျkyakhaြငya” bhaငyakiု
raှုso virāgānupassanāphaြင’ya rāgamaှ，
6． saṅkhāratiု’၏ khaျုpyakhaြငya” bhaငyakiု raှုso nirodhānupassanāphaြင’ya samudaya = rāgamaှ，
7． kilesātiု’kiု tadaṅgaā”phaြင’ya chana’yapayyaso akhaြငya”arāā”phaြင’ya phaြcyaso nibbānyasiု’ ññhatyakiုငya”raှိုငya”
soā”phaြင’ya nibbānyabhakyasiု’ paြေ”shā”laျkyaraှိso saṅkhāratiု’၏ paျkyakhaြငya” bhaငyakiု raှုso paṭinissaggā
nupassanāphaြင’ya saṅkhāratiု’၌ niccacasaññyaphaြင’ya chaဲyūkhaြငya”maှ ----
cityakiု lhatyamaြောkyacesaññyaphaြcya၍ vaငyasakyalekiုlaññya” phaြcyace၏， thhakyasakyalekiုlaññya” phaြcyace၏．
thiုkaြောင’ya “cityakiု chana’yakaျငyabhakya tarā”tiု’maှ lhatyamaြောkyacelaျkya vaငyasakyalekiု phaြcyaceṃ’，
thhakyasakyalekiု phaြcyaceṃ’hu kaျင’ya၏”hū၍ hotoyamūapya၏． -- īsiု’laျှငya pathamacatukka၏ achamya”phaြင’ya
raapyaso jhānyacityakiု aphanyatalaဲlaဲ raှုkhaြငya” = cittānupassanā၏ achamya”phaြင’ya ī tatiya catukkakiု
hokaြာ”toyamūapya၏hu siraှိpāle． (visuddhi-1-281．)
satipaြုranyaakhaျkya
dutiyacatukkakiု vedanānupassanā၏ achamya”phaြင’ya， ītatiyacatukkakiု cittānupassanā၏ achamya”phaြင’ya
hokaြာ”toyamūapyasaññyahu chiုsoyalaññya” vedanā tacyakhutaññya” asicitya tacyakhutaññya”kiုsā raှုrasaññya
mahutya， yaှñyaphakya sampayutyatarā”tiု’kiုlaññya”koငya”， maှီrāvatthurupyatiု’kiုlaññya”koငya”， yaငya” rupyatarā”tiု’kiု
āruṃpaြု၍ phaြcyapoyakaြkunyaso nāmyatarā”tiု’kiုlaññya”koငya” chakyalakya၍ raှုphā”rasaññyasā phaြcyapesaññya．
akaျyyakiု nāmyakammaṭṭhānya”piုငya”thaငya raှုpā．
catuttha catukka
1． aniccānupassī assasissāmīti sikkhati．
aniccānupassī passasissāmīti sikkhati．
2． virāgānupassī． pa ．
3． nirodhānupassī． pa ．
4． paṭinissaggānupassī． pa ．
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
491
1． aniccānupassī
aniccahu aphanyaphanya athapyathapya raှုle’raှိsaññyaphaြcya၍ vaငyasakyalekiု phaြcyaceṃ’， thhakyasakyalekiု
phaြcyaceṃ’hu kaျင’yapā．
īthaငya aṭṭhakathāka ----
1． anicca，
2． aniccatā，
3． aniccānupassanā，
4． aniccānupassī ---- īle”khaျkyakiု khaဲkhaဲpaြာ”paြာ” siranya ññhaှnyakaြာ”thā”၏．
tattha anicca nti pañcakkhandhā． kasmā¿ uppāda0yaññathattabhāvā． aniccatāti tesaṃye0 uppāda0ya-
ññathattaṃ， huthā abhāvo vā． nibbattānaṃ tenevākārena aṭṭhathā khaṇabhaṅgene bhedoti attho．
aniccānupassanāti tassā aniccatāya 0sena rūpādīsu aniccanti anupassanā． aniccānupassīti tāya
anupassanāya samannāgato． tasmā evaṃ bhūto assasanto passasanto ca idha “aniccānupassī
assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhatī”ti veditabbo． (visuddhi-1-281-282．)
tattha saṅkhatadhammānaṃ hetupaccayehi uppajjanaṃ ahuthā sambhavo attalābho uppādo． uppannānaṃ
tesaṃ khaṇanirodho vināso 0yo． jarāya aññathābhāvo aññathattaṃ． yathā hi uppādāvatthāya
bhinnāya bhaṅgāvatthāyaṃ vatthubhedo natthi， evaṃ ṭhitisaṅkhātāya bhaṅgābhimukhāvatthāyampi vatthubhedo natthi，
yattha jarāvohāro． tasmā ekassāpi dhammassa jarā yujjati， yā khaṇikajarāti vuccati． ekaṃsena ca
uppādabhaṅgāvatthāsu vatthuno abhedo icchitabbo， aññathā “añño uppajjati， añño bhijjatī”ti
āpajjeyaျ． tayimaṃ khaṇikajaraṃ sandhāyāha “aññathatta”nti ． (mahāṭī-1-343-344．)
1． anicca
1． aniccahūsaññyakā” khandhāငါ”pā”tiု’taññya”． abhayyakaြောင’ya anicca maññyasanaññya”¿ (ka) phaြcyakhaြငya”sabho
(kha)paျkyakhaြငya”sabho (ga) phaြcyacamaှthū”so paျkyakhaြငya” bhaငyakālabhakyasiု’ yiုငyalaဲneso akhaြငya”arā
ākārathū”hūso taññyamaှု = ṭhīkālaphaြင’ya phaြcyakhaြငya”sabho raှိsaññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya anicca maññya၏． (uppāda
= phaြcyamaှု， 0ya = paျkyamaှု， aññathatta = taññyamaှု hūso saṅkhatalakkhaṇā suṃ”pā” thaငyaraှာ”raှိsokaြောင’ya
aniccamaññya၏hu chiုliုsaññya．)
2． aniccatā - hūsaññyakā” thiုkhandhāငါ”pā”tiု’၏sālaျှငya phaြcyakhaြငya” paျkyakhaြငya”， phaြcyacamaှ tacyapā”so paျkyakhaြငya”
bhaငyakālabhakyasiု’ yimya”yiုငyalaျkyaraှိso taññyamaှု ṭhīkālahūso khandhātiု’၏ aphaြcyataññya”hūso akhaြငya”
arāthū”saññya aniccatā maññya၏． tacyanaññya” raှေ”kamaraှိ yakhumaှ phaြcyataññya၍ khaျkyatacyaphaြုtyaā”phaြင’ya phaြုtyakhaျññya”
paျkyakhaြငya”saññya = phaြcyapoyapaြီ”kunyaso thiုparamatthakhandhātiု’၏ thiုphaြcyatiုငya”so akhaြငya”arāā”phaြင’yasālaျှငya
mataññyamū၍ khaṇabhaငyasabhophaြင’ya paျkyakhaြငya”saññya aniccatā maññya၏hu chiုliုpesaññya．
3． aniccānupassanā ---- aniccānupassanāhūsaññyakā” phaြcyapaြီ”nokya rutyakhaျññya” paျkyakhaြငya” khaṇikabhaငyahu
chiုapyaso mamaြဲso akhaြငya”arā aniccatā၏ achamya”phaြင’ya rupya acaraှိkunyaso khandhāငါ”pā”tiု’၌ aniccahu
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
492
aphanyatalaဲlaဲ raှုkhaြငya”saññya aniccānupassanā maññya၏． tacyanaññya” yaငya”siု’ aniccahu aphanyaphanya athapyathapya raှုne
so vipassanāñāṇyasaññya aniccānupassanā maññya၏．
4． aniccānupassī ---- aniccānupassīhūsaññyakā” yaငya”aniccānupassanāñāṇyanaှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃneso yo-
gā0cara puggiုlyasaññya aniccānupassī maññya၏． thiုkaြောင’ya īsiု’ phaြcyapoyalāso aniccānupassanāñāṇyanaှင’ya
paြñña’yacuṃsaññyaphaြcya၍ yaငya”khandhāငါ”pā”tiု’၌ aniccahu taluṃlaဲlaဲ raှုsaññyaphaြcya၍ vaငyasakyalekiု phaြcyaceso puggiုlya
kiုlaññya”koငya”， thhakyasakyalekiု phaြcyaceso puggiုlyakiုlaññya”koငya” īcatutthacatukka၌ aniccahu taluṃ
laဲlaဲ raှုsaññyaphaြcya၍ vaငyasakyalekiု phaြcyaceṃ’， thhakyasakya lekiု phaြcyaceṃ’hu kaျင’yane၏hu siraှိpāle．
(visuddhi-1-281-282．)
uppāda-0ya-aññathattā
uppāda ---- chiုငyarāchiုငyarā akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’saññya aññīaññhatya poငya”cu paြုpaြငyape”pāmaှ aniုငyaniုငya
phaြcyapoya၍ lākaြraso rupya-nāmya dhamma saṅkhāratarā”tiု’saññya saṅkhatadhamma maññyakunya၏． yaငya”saṅkhatatarā”tiု’၏
(ka) yaငya”rupyanāmyatiု’kiု tiုkyariုkya phaြcyapoyacetatyaso hetuakaြောငya” janakaakaြောငya”， (kha) yaငya”
rupyanāmyatiု’kiု ā”pe”thokyapaṃ’tatyaso upatthambhakaakaြောငya” paccayaakaြောငya”tarā”tiု’kaြောင’ya thaငyaraှာ”
phaြcyapoyalārakhaြငya”saññya， maphaြcyakhaငya raှေ”၌ maraှိse”mū၍ raှေ”ka maraှိse”mū၍ yakhumaှ rutyakhaျññya”asacya phaြcyapoya
lākhaြငya”saññya paramatthaathaññyakiုyyasabhokiု raraှိlākhaြငya”saññya uppāda = phaြcyakhaြငya” maññya၏．
0ya ---- phaြcyakunyapaြီ”so thiုsaṅkhatatarā”tiု’၏ khaṇikabhaငyasabhoā”phaြင’ya paျkyakhaြငya” bhaငyakālasiု’
rokyakhiုkya khaျုpyapaျkyashā”khaြငya”saññya 0ya = paျkyakhaြငya” maññya၏．
aññathatta ---- jarāhu khoyachiုapyaso phaြcyacamaှ tacyapā”so paျkyakhaြငya” bhaငyakālabhakyasiု’ yiုငyalaဲne
so taññyakhaြငya” ṭhīkālahūso akhaြငya”arāathū”phaြင’ya paramatthadhammatiု’၏ phaြcyakhaြငya”saññya aññathatta maññya၏．
saṅkhata ---- paramatthadhātyasā” tarā”tiုငya”၌ phaြcyamaှု-taññyamaှု-paျkyamaှုhu saṅkhatalakkhaṇātarā” suṃ”pā”cī
raှိkaြောငya”kiု aṅguttiုrya tikanipātya (aṃ-1-150．) saṅkhatalakkhaṇāsutya၌ bhurā”raှငya hokaြာ”thā”toya
mū၏． phaြcyasotarā”saññyapaငya taññya၏， phaြcyasotarā”saññyapaငya paျkya၏， phaြcyasotarā”ka takhaြာ”tacyapā”，
paျkyasotarā” taññyasotarā”ka takhaြာ”tacyapā” mahutyape． thaငyaraှာ”ceṃ’ ----
phaြcyakhaြငya” upādyaakhiုkyamaှ khaဲpaြာ”so paျkyakhaြငya” bhaငyaakhiုkya၌ paramatthaathaññyakiုyya vatthu၏ thū”thhe
khaဲpaြာ”maှုsaññya maraှိniုငyasakaဲ’siု’ (pathavīdhātyaphaြcya၍ āpodhātyaka paျkyakhaြငya”maျို”， phassaphaြcya၍ vedanāka paျkya
khaြငya”maျို” maraှိniုငyasakaဲ’siု’hu chiုliုsaññya ) alā”tūpaငya taññyakhaြငya” ṭhīkālahu chiုapyaso paျkyakhaြငya” bhaငyakāla
siု’ raှေ”raှုyiုငyalaဲneso akhiုkya၌laññya” paramatthaathaññyakiုyya vatthu၏ thū”thhe khaဲpaြာ”maှုsaññya maraှိpe． yaငya”
paျkyakhaြငya” bhaငyakālabhakyasiု’ raှေ”raှုyiုငyalaဲneso akhiုkya၌ jarāhu khoyavoyakhaြငya”saññya phaြcyapoyalāpe
saññya． thiုkaြောင’ya tacyakhutaññya”so paramatthatarā”၏laññya” jarāsaññya saင’yasaññyasā phaြcyapesaññya． yaငya”jarākiု
khaṇikajarāhū၍ khoyachiုapyapesaññya． maှnyapesaññya -- phaြcyamaှု paျkyamaှု = upādya bhaငya akhiုkyaatana’yatiု’၌ paramattha
athaññyakiုyyavatthu၏ makhaဲpaြာ”khaြငya”kiုsā aliုraှိapyapesaññya． makhaဲpaြာ”saññyamaှ tacyapā” khaဲpaြာ”maှုkiု liုapya
latyasoya “akhaြာ”so paramatthatarā”tacyapā”saññya phaြcyapoyalā၏， akhaြာ”so paramatthatarā”tacyapā”saññya
paျkyashā”၏”hūso īkaဲ’siု’so apaြcyadosasaññya khaဲpaြာ”maှုkiု aliုraှိsasūmaှာ rokyaraှိlālerā၏．
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
493
siု’athakya thiုjarāara pabandhaṭhiti paññattijarā-hūso samutisaccānayyasuṃ” aိုmaှု jarākiု mayūbhaဲ paramattha
dhammatiု’၏ taññyamaှု ṭhīkālahūso khaṇikajarākiုsā raññyarhayya၍ aññathattaṃhu mina’yachiုthā”toyamūsaññyahu
maှtyasā”pāle． (mahāṭī-1-343-344．)
akaြငya upādya-ṭhī-bhaငya = jāti-jarā-maraṇa = phaြcya-taññya-paျkyahūso lakkhaṇāsuṃ”pā” apoငya”၏
thaငyaraှာ”raှိkhaြငya”kaြောင’ya khandhāငါ”pā”tiု’၌ aniccahu khoyavoyapaññatyakhaြငya”saññya phaြcyapoyalā၏． thiုlakkhaṇā suṃ”pā”
apoငya”၌ aniccahūso amaññyasaññā phaြcyasokaြောင’ya - “aniccatāti tesaṃye0 uppāda0yaññathattaṃ
= aniccatāhūsaññya thiုkhandhāငါ”pā”tiု’၏sālaျှငya uppāda-0ya-aññathatta = phaြcyamaှု paျkyamaှု taññyamaှု jarākiုpaငya
chiုliုsaññya”hu paြောchiုpaြီ”၍ athū”ā”phaြင’ya paramatthadhammatiု’၏ khaṇikanirodha = khaṇaā”phaြင’ya paျkyakhaြငya” =
khaျုpyakhaြငya” = bhaငya၌ aniccatāhūso vohārasaññya phaြcya၏hu thaငyaraှာ”paြliုsaññya phaြcya၍ “huthā abhāvo
vā = phaြcyapaြီ”nokya maraှိkhaြငya”sabhosaññyalaññya” aniccatā maññya၏” - īsiု’ caso cakā”kiု aṭṭhakathā
charātoya mina’yachiုtoyamūkhaြငya” phaြcyapesaññya． thiုcakā”rapya၌ maraှိkhaြငya” abhā0 sabho၏ phaြcyakhaြငya” uppāda
sabholaျှငya raှေ”shā”raှိsokaြောင’ya huthā phaြcyapaြီ”nokyahūso cakā”kiု kūma၍ chiုrapaြnyasaññya． huthā
= phaြcyapaြီ”nokya hūso thiုcakā”rapyaphaြင’ya paျkyacī”khaြငya”hūso maraှိkhaြငya” abhā0၏ maphaြcyase”mī raှေ”aphiု’ka
maraှိse”khaြငya” raှေ”raှိsaññya၏ aphaြcyakiု ññhaှnyapaြlaျkyaraှိ၏． (mahāṭī-1-344．)
chiုliုsaññyamaှာ abhā0 maraှိkhaြငya”hūsaññya phaြcyakhaြငya” upādyasiု’ marokyase”mī maphaြcyase”mīka rupyanāmya
paramatyatiု’၏ maraှိse”khaြငya”hūso pāgabhā0ka tacyamaျို”， paျkyakhaြငya” bhaငyasiု’rokya၍ paျkyacī”khayyapaျောkya
shā”saphaြင’ya phaြcyapaြီ”so rupyanāmya paramatyatiု’၏ viddhaṃsābhā0katacyamaျို”hū၍ naှcyamaျို”raှိrāthaငya huthā abhāvo
vā hūso pāṭhya၌ abhāvo-pudyaphaြင’ya viddhaṃsābhā0hu khoyaso phaြcyapaြီ”so rupyanāmyaparamatyatiု’၏ paျkyakhaြငya”
bhaငyasiု’ rokyaraှိshā”saphaြင’ya maraှိkhaြငya”sabhohūso = vināsaabhā0kiု paြ၏． huthā = phaြcyapaြီ”၍hu chiု
saphaြင’ya maphaြcyamīka rupyanāmya athaññyakiုyya maraှိse”khaြငya” abhā0aphiု’maှ phaြcyapoyalāsaññyahu sirasokaြောင’ya
yaငya”pudyaphaြင’ya rupyanāmya paramatyatiု’၏ phaြcyapoyapaြီ”nokya paျkyakhaြငya”hūso vināsaabhā0saññya maphaြcyamī raှေ”
aphiု’ka maraှိse”khaြငya”hūso abhā0laျှငya raှေ”raှိsaññya၏ aphaြcyakiု paြsaññyahu chiုliုpesaññya．
rupyanāmyatiု’kā” maphaြcyamī raှေ”aphiု’kalaññya” maraှိkaြ， phaြcyapaြီ”nokyalaññya” maraှိkaြ． yaငya”maraှိkhaြငya” naှcyamaျို”tiု’၏
alayya၌sālaျှငya yāyī akhiုkyaatana’yaā”phaြင’ya upādya-ṭhī-bhaငya = phaြcya-taññya-paျkya ano”phaြင’ya phaြcyapoya
lākaြso dhammasabhā0tiု’sā phaြcyakaြsaññya． yaငya”akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’kiု rupyapiုငya” nāmyapiုငya” vipassanāpiုငya”
tiု’thaငya alaျñya”saင’yasaliု thapyamaṃ၍ taငyapaြū”maññyasā phaြcyapesaññya． īthaငya khandhāငါ”pā”tiု’kā” aniccatarā”tiု’
phaြcyakaြsaphaြင’ya aniccahu aphanyaphanya athapyathapya taluṃlaဲlaဲ raှု၍ asakyaraှူneliုso asaငyayogī sūtoya
koငya”saññya ----
1． paramatyaacacya dhātyaanaှcyaphaြcyaso kālasuṃ”pā” santānyanaှcyapā” athaငya”raှိ khandhāငါ”pā”kiု siramaññya．
2． yaငya”khandhāငါ”pā”tiု’၏ akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’kiု kālasuṃ”pā”luṃ”၌ hutyatiုငya”maှnyachā siramaññya．
3． yaငya”akaြောငya”tarā”naှင’ya takhaso khandhāငါ”pā”tiု’၏ (ka) phaြcyapaြီ”laျှငya paျkyaneso akhaြငya”arā，
(kha) paြိုpaြို paျkyapaျkyaneso akhaြငya”arāhūso aniccaakhaြငya”arākiု hutyatiုငya”maှnyachā siramaññya．
4． yaငya” aniccaakhaြငya”arākiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyaaောငyakaြñña’ya၍ aniccahu aphanyaphanya athapyathapya raှုphā”
suṃ”sapyalaျkya vaငyasakyalekiု phaြcyaaောငya thhakyasakyalekiု phaြcyaaောငya kaျင’yaramaññya． yaငya”siု’ kaျင’yakhaဲ’
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
494
soya aniccānupassanāñāṇyaamaြငyanaှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃsaññya maññyapesaññya． yaငya” aniccānupassanāñāṇyanaှင’ya
paြñña’yacuṃso asaငyayogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya aniccānupassīpuggiုlya phaြcyalepaြီ hū၏．
2． virāgānupassī
virāgānupassīti ettha pana dhe virāgā khayavirāgo ca accantavirāgo ca． tattha khayavirāgoti
saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇabhaṅgo． accantavirāgoti nibbānaṃ． virāgānupassanāti tadubhayadassana0sena pavattā vipassanā
ca maggo ca． tāya duvidhāyapi anupassanāya samannāgato huthā assasanto passasanto ca
“virāgānupassī assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhatī”ti veditabbo． nirodhānupassīpadepi ese0
nayo． (visuddhi-1-282．)
virāgānupassīhūso īpāḷitoyavayya ----
1． saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏ kunyakhaြငya” paျkyakhaြငya”hūso khayavirāga，
2． saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏ siု’mahutya rāga၏ caငyacacyakhaျုpyarā nibbānyahūso accantavirāga ----
hu virāga naှcyamaျို” raှိ၏．
thiုnaှcyamaျို”tiု’thaငya saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏ khaṇikanirodhahu khoyachiုapyaso khaṇamacaဲ tasaဲsaဲ khaျုpyapaျkyamaှု
khaṇabhaငyasaññya khayavirāga maññya၏． aluṃ”cuṃso saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏ caငyacacyaငြိmya”rā khaျုpyarāphaြcyaso asaṅkhata
dhātya nibbānyatarā”toyamaြtyasaññya accantavirāga maññya၏．
saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏ paျkyakhaြငya” bhaငyasakyasakyakiုsā raှုmaြငyasaññya၏ achamya”phaြင’ya phaြcyapoyalāso vipassanāñāṇyasaññyalaññya”
virāgānupassanā maññya၏． accantavirāga amaññyaraso asaṅkhatadhātya aငြိmya”dhātya
nibbānyakiု raှုmaြငyasaññya၏ achamya”phaြင’ya phaြcyapoyalāso ariyamagyañāṇyasaññyalaññya” virāgānupassanā maññya၏．
thiုnaှcyamaျို”so virāgānupassanāñāṇyaamaြငyanaှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃsaññyaphaြcya၍ vaငyasakyalekiု phaြcyacesaññyalaññya” phaြcya
so thhakyasakyalekiု phaြcyacesaññyalaññya”phaြcyaso puggiုlyakiု “naှcyamaျို”so virāgakiု taluṃlaဲlaဲ raှုsaññya
phaြcya၍ vaငyasakyalekiု phaြcyaceṃ’， thhakyasakyalekiု phaြcyaceṃ’”hu kaျင’ya၏hū၍ siraှိpāle．
tacyanaññya” ---- vipassanāñāṇyasaññya saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏ paျkyakhaြငya” bhaငyakiု āruṃpaြုsoā”phaြင’ya lakkhaṇā
yāñyataငyakā raှုphā”suṃ”sapyanesokaြောင’ya khayavirāgānupassanā၏ achamya”phaြင’ya phaြcyane၏． asaṅkhatadhātya
aငြိmya”dhātya nibbānyasiု’ ññhatyakiုငya”raှိုငya”nesokaြောင’ya accantavirāgānupassanā၏ achamya”phaြင’yalaññya” phaြcyane၏．
ariyamagyañāṇyasaññya rāga၏ caငyacacyaငြိmya”rā khaျုpyarāphaြcyaso， saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏ caငyacacyaငြိmya”rā khaျုpyarā
phaြcyaso asaṅkhatadhātya aငြိmya”dhātyanibbānyakiု mathemavesoā”phaြင’ya āruṃpaြုlaျkya thiု”thhaငya”simaြငyane၏．
asaṅkhatadhātya aငြိmya”dhātya nibbānyakiု āruṃpaြုneso yaငya”ariyamagyañāṇyasaññya saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏ paျkya
khaြငya” bhaငyakiု masiaောငya mamaြငyaaောငya phuṃ”lhaှmya”thā”sañña’ya mohatarā”kiုlaññya” akaြhaငya”maဲ’ payyasatyaliုkya၏．
saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏ paျkyakhaြငya” bhaငyakiု masimaှုkiု payyasatyaliုkyasaphaြင’ya simaှု vijjāñāṇyasaññya kiccasiddhiā”phaြင’ya
paြီ”cī”paြီ” phaြcyashā”၏． yaငya” saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏ paျkyakhaြငya” bhaငyakiု kiccasiddhiā”phaြင’ya simaှုkiု asammohasabho
ā”phaြင’ya si၏hu chiုra၏． masimaှု mohakiု payyasatyaliုkyasaphaြင’ya saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏ apaျkyakiု tacyaphanyapaြnya၍
raှုkaြñña’yapāka akhaျိnyamarhe” sinemaññyasā phaြcyapesaññya． thiုsiု’ sikhaြငya”maျို”kiု asammoha sabhoā”phaြင’ya
saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏ apaျkyakiု raှုneso khayavirāgānupassanāhu chiုra၏．
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
495
siု’athakya ariyamagyatarā”saññya asammoha sabhoā”phaြင’ya saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏ paျkyakhaြငya” bhaငyakiု
raှုso khayavirāgānupassanā၏ achamya”phaြင’ya phaြcyapoyalā၏． āruṃtiုkyariုkya maျkyamaှောkyapaြုsoā”phaြင’ya rāga
၏ caငyacacyakhaျုpyarā saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏ caငyacacyakhaျုpyarā ငြိmya”rāphaြcyaso asaṅkhatadhātya aငြိmya”dhātya nibbānyakiု
raှုmaြငyanesokaြောင’ya accantavirāgānupassanā၏ achamya”phaြင’yalaññya” phaြcyapoyalā၏hu siraှိpāle．
(mahāṭī-1-344．)
3． nirodhānupassī
alā”tūpaငya nirodhānupassīhūso pāḷitoya၌laññya” khayanirodha accantanirodhahu nirodha naှcyamaျို”
raှိpuṅkiု sabhopokyapāle． saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏ paျkyakhaြငya” bhaငyakā” khayanirodha， asaṅkhatadhātya aငြိmya”dhātya
nibbānyakā” accantanirodha - īsiု’casaññyaphaြင’ya sipāle． saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏ paျkyakhaြငya” bhaငyakiု aphanyaphanya
athapyathapya vipassanāraှု၍laññya” asakyaraှူnepā． saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏ khaျုpyarā rāga၏ khaျုpyarā nibbānyakiု āruṃ
paြု၍laññya” asakyaraှူnepāhu chiုliုpesaññya．
4． paṭinissaggānupassī
paṭinissaggānupassī - hūso īpāḷitoyarapya၌laññya” - celhaှtyakhaြငya” = chana’yalhaှtyakhaြငya”tiု’saññya ----
(ka) pariccāgapaṭinissagga，
( kha ) pakkhandanapaṭinissagga ---- hu naှcyamaျို” raှိ၏．
kilesātiု’kiု chana’yalhaှtyatatyaso vipassanāñāṇyanaှင’ya ariyamagyañāṇyasaññyapaငya paṭinissaggānupassanā
maññyapesaññya．
vipassanā ---- saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏ paျkyakhaြငya” bhaငyakiု āruṃpaြု၍ yaငya”saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏ kunyakunya paြိုpaြို
paျkyapaျkyanesañña’ya sabhokiု āruṃpaြု၍ aniccahu aphanyaphanya athapyathapya raှုneso aniccānupassanāñāṇya
saññya khaṇakhetta tadaṅgaā”phaြင’ya payyasatyakhaြငya” tadaṅgapahānya၏ achamya”phaြင’ya yaငya”saṅkhāratarā”tiု’ apoya၌
niccahu amaှtyamaှာ”maှု niccasaññākiု payyachana’ya၏． chana’yasoakhā၌laññya” yaငya”saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏ paျkyakhaြငya”bhaငyakiု
āruṃyū၍ aniccahu raှုneso akhaြငya”arāā”phaြင’ya mapaြtyaphaြcyalatyasoya nicca = maြဲ၏hu chaဲyūsaññya၏ achamya”phaြင’ya
phaြcyapoyalākunyaso avijjā taṇaှာ upādānya ū”cī”sañña’ya kilesātiု’saññyalaññya”koငya”， thiုkilesavaṭyalaျှငya
akaြောငya”raငya”raှိkaြkunyaso bha0sacyakiု phaြcyapoyalāaောငya paြုpaြငyape”tatyakunyaso saṅkhāraamaññyaraso
kusiုlyakaṃ akusiုlyakaṃtiု’saññyalaññya”koငya”， thiုkilesavaṭyanaှင’ya abhisaṅkhāra amaññyaraso kammavaṭyalaျှငya
akaြောငya”raငya”khaṃ raှိkaြkunyaso akaြငyaakaျို” vipākyakhandhātiု’saññyalaññya”koငya” noငyaanāgatya kāla၌
phaြcyapoyalāniုငyakunyarā၏． khapyasimya”kunyaso thiုkilesavaṭya kammavaṭya vipākavaṭya khandhātiု’kiု noငyatacyaphanya
maphaြcyakhaြငya”kiု paြုsaññya၏ achamya”phaြင’ya payyachana’ya၏．
yaငya”saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏ kunyakunya shā”tatyasañña’yasabho， paြိုpaြိုpaျkyapaျkyanesañña’ya sabhokiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya

1． diṭṭhadhamma sukhavihārānisaṃsā
āsavokaငya”khā rahantāsakhaငya araှငyamaြtyakaြီ”tiု’saññya jhānyavaငyacā”paြီ” taññyakaြññyaso cityathā”

cekhaြငya”phaြင’ya koငya”chā phā”maျာ”thā”paြီ” phaြcyarakā” - aliုakaြိုkyasiု’ liုkyapāniုငyalokyaaောငyapaငya koငya”chā
kaြိtyanayyathā”paြီ”so sā”rekaဲ’siု’laññya”koငya”， koငya”chā apaြေapaြcya paြုapyapaြီ”so khaျိpyatuṃ”kaဲ’siု’
laññya”koငya” cityaacañyasaññya nū”ññaṃ’laျkya raှိ၏． ī၌ koငya”chā phā”cepya၏hūsaññya catutthajhānyasamādhi
kiု athapyathapya vaငyacā”khaြငya”paငyataññya”． athapyathapya nayyathā”apyaso sā”resaññya nulāsakaဲ’siု’ nū”ññaṃ’
paျော’paျောငya”lāsakaဲ’siု’ īcatutthajhānyacityasaññyalaññya” athapyathapya jhānyavaငyacā”maှုhūso subhāvitakaြောင’ya
nū”ññaṃ’lā၏， thiုsiု’nū”ññaṃ’lāsaññyakiုpaငya 0sībhā0patta = 0sībhoyasiု’ rokyapaြီhu chiုliုsaññya． maှnyapesaññya
mimi၏ aliုakaြိုkya၌ aliုkyasaင’ya chhaဲchoငya၍raso aliုatiုငya” phaြcyaneso cityakiု nū”ññaṃ’၏hu chiုapya
pesaññya． (visuddhi-2-5． mahāṭī-2-7 - kaြñña’ya．)
6． kammaniya = bhā0nāmaှု၌ khaṃ’ññā”maှု raှိkhaြငya”
laှောyapaြီ” ū”paြီ”phaြcya၍ nū”ññaṃ’so rhaှceငya rhaှkeoငya”saññya putī” nā”ḍoငya” lakyakokya caso aliု
raှိrā achaငya”tanyachākiု paြုlupyaphiု’ranya chhaဲtiုငya”thaငya ငငyatiုငya”ra lhayyakūkoငya”mhanyalaှsakaဲ’siု’ kilesā aññacya
akaြေ” kaငya”၍ sana’yaraှငya”so cityasaññyalaññya” nū”ññaṃ’nesokaြောင’yapaငya abhiññāṇyaamaှု vipassanābhā0nā
amaှု caso thiုthiုbhā0nā amaှုkicca ava0tiု’kiု laှlaှkaြီ” paြီ”cī”ceniုငyaphiု’ranya koငya”mhanya lhayyakūlaျkya raှိ၏．
tañca ubhayampi subhāvitattāyevāti． (visuddhi-2-5． vi-ṭṭha-1-127．)
thiု mudubhūta = nū”ññaṃ’maှု， kammaniya = thiုthiု bhā0nāamaှု၌ khaṃ’ññā”maှု - īnaှcyamaျို”luṃ”saññyakā” yaငya”catuttha
jhānyasamādhicityakiု 0sībhoyaငါ”tanyatiု’phaြင’ya avā”0chā le’lāniုငyanaငya”saññya၏ aphaြcyasiု’ rokyacekhaြငya”phaြင’ya
koငya”chā phā”maျာ”thā”paြီ”sokaြောင’yasālaျှငya phaြcyapoyalārasaññyahu maှtyapā．

7． ṭhita = taññyataṃ’maှု raှိkhaြငya”
chiုapyakhaဲ’paြီ”so thakyavanya”kaျငya phaြူcaငyakhaြငya” (= parisuddha)caso guṇyasattimaျာ” kaငya”khā၍ mashā”aောငya
paျkyamashā”aောငya koငya”chā phā”maျာ”le’lāapyapaြီ” phaြcyasokaြောင’ya cityaacañyasaññya thakyavanya”kaျငya caငya
kaြyyamaှု raှိkhaြငya” (= parisuddha) caso guṇyatiု’၌ laျော’raဲraဲ mahutya， kaြံ’kaြံ’khiုငyakaျññya taññyataṃ’laျkya raှိpe၏．
thiုtaññyataṃ’so catutthajhānyasamādhicityakiုpaငya ṭhitahu chiုliုsaññya．
8． āneñjappatta = matunyalaှုpyakhaြငya”siု’ rokyaraှိkhaြငya”
thiုsiု’ kaြံ’kaြံ’khiုငyakaျññya taññyataṃ’sokaြောင’yapaငyalaျှငya tunyalaှုpyakhaြငya” alaျှငya” maraှိpe． thiုsiု’ taññyataṃ’
nesañña’yaathakya paျkyaphiု’ machiုthā”bhi laှုpyalaှုpyaraှာ”raှာ”paငya maraှိaောငya ငြိmyasakyaneso cityahu chiုliုsaññya．
maြဲmaြံchātaññyaso catutthajhānyacityakiုpaငya ṭhitahū၍laññya”koငya” āneñjappatta hū၍laññya”koငya” īdesa
nātoya၌ hokaြာ”toyamūapya၏ hūliု．
tacyanaññya”ā”phaြင’ya ---- ṭhita， āneñjappatta - pudyatiု’၏ adhippāyyakiု aṭṭhakathā (visuddhi-2-5-6．) ၌
aောkyapāatiုငya” thapyamaṃ phhaင’yachiုthā”paြnya၏．
7． ṭhita = taññyataṃ’maှု raှိ khaြငya”
mudu = nū”ññaṃ’khaြငya”， kammaniya = aliုraှိrā abhiññāṇya vipassanācaso thiုthiု bhā0nāamaှု kiccaava0
tiု’kiု laှlaှkaြီ” paြီ”ceniုငyaphiု’ranya koငya”chā lhayyakūlaျkya raှိkhaြငya”kaြောင’ya cityaacañyasaññya mimi၏ aliုatiုငya”

tunyalaှုpyakhaြငya” kaငya”saññya၏ aphaြcyaphaြင’ya maြဲmaြံchā taññyataṃ’khaြငya”saññya āneñjappatta maññya၏． (mahāṭī-2-7．)

8． āneñjappatta = tunyalaှုpyamaှု maraှိkhaြငya”
yaငya”siု’ kaြံ’kaြံ’khiုငyakaျññya taññyataṃ’neso āneñjappatta amaññyaraso thiု catutthajhānya samādhinaှင’ya
yaှñyaso cityaacañyasaññyalaññya” sampayutyatarā”tiု’၌ khiုငyamaြဲmaှုraှိsaññya၏ aphaြcyaphaြင’yalaññya”koငya”， chana’yakaျငya
bhakyaphaြcyaso tarā”tiု’saññya matunyalaှုpyacepya matunyalaှုpyaceniုငyasaññya၏ aphaြcyaphaြင’yalaññya”koငya” phaြcyalaျkya
saddhā vīriya sati samādhi paññā obhāsagata (= alaငya”dhātya) hūso khhanyaā”kaြီ” khaြောkyarapya， bala
khaြောkyatanyatiု’၏ chamya”ā”raှိnyacoya ānubhoyakaြောင’ya phaြcyapoyalāra၏． yaငya”khhanyaā”kaြီ” khaြောkyarapya bala
khaြောkyatanyatiု’၏ chamya”ā”raှိnyacoya ānubhoyaka kaြီ”mā”laှsaphaြင’ya masaddhākhaြငya”， paျငya”rikhaြငya”， me’laျော’khaြငya”，
paျံ’lhaင’yakhaြငya”， amaှnyakiု masikhaြငya” = amaှာ”kiု sikhaြငya” = asimaှာ”khaြငya”， kilesā amaှောငyakaျkhaြငya” - casañña’ya
chana’yakaျငyabhakyatarā”tiု’kaြောင’ya tunyalaှုpyakhaြငya”saññya alaျှငya”paငya maraှိpe， masaddhākhaြငya” casaññyatiု’saññya cityaacañya၌
aငhe’asakyamaျှpaငya mavaငyarokyaniုငyakaြkunya． thaငyaraှာ”ceṃ’ ----
(ka) īsiု’ 0sībhoyasiု’ rokyaaောငya koငya”chāphā”maျာ”thā”apyaso thiုcatutthajhānyacityasaññya caငyacacya
ā”phaြင’ya thū”so ñāṇyaphaြင’ya maျkyamaှောkyapaြုapyakunyaso abhiññāṇyatarā”， saccāle”pā”tarā” casaññya
tiု’kiု thū”soñāṇyaphaြင’ya maျkyamaှောkyapaြုkhaြငya”ငှာ phaြcyapāpe၏hu īsiု’ phaြcyapoyalāso yuṅkaြññyakhaျkya saddhā
tarā”phaြင’ya simya”chaññya”thā”apyaso chiုapyakhaဲ’paြီ”so saddhākhhanyaā” saddhābiုlyaphaြင’ya thokyapaṃ’thā”apyaso
cityasaññya thiုsaddhātarā”၏ chana’yakaျငyabhakyaphaြcyaso mayuṅkaြññyakhaြငya” assaddhiya hūso akaြောငya”kaြောင’ya
matunyalaှုpyape． amaှnyacaငyacacyaā”phaြင’yamū athakyaathakyaphaြcyaso tarā”thū” tarā”maြtyakiု phaြcyapoyalāaောငya
rhakyachoငyape”saññya၏ aphaြcyaphaြင’yasālaျှငya taññyanepe၏．
(kha) vīriyasaññya simya”chaññya”thā”apyaso = 0sībhoyasiု’ rokyacekhaြငya”， cityakiု chuṃ”makhaြငya”tiု’kiု paြီ”cī”
cetatyaso vīriyakhhanyaā”kaြီ”saññya thokyapaṃ’thā”apyaso cityasaññya paျငya”risū phaြcyakaြောငya” phaြcyarā
akusiုlya cittuppādyahūso kosajjakaြောင’ya matunyalaှုpyape．
(ga) satisaññya simya”chaññya”thā”apyaso = chiုapyakhaဲ’paြီ”so catutthajhānyasamādhibhā0nākiု akaြိmyamaျာ”chā
paြုkhaြငya”၌ mame’paျောkyakhaြငya”kiု paြီ”cī”cetatyasaññyalaññya”phaြcyaso， kusiုlyatarā”tiု’၏ phaြcyakhaြငya” alā”tiု’kiု
koငya”chā aphanyatalaဲlaဲ raှာmaှီ”tatyasaññyalaññya” phaြcyaso， raှုchaငyakhaြငyatatyasaññyalaññya”phaြcyaso satikhhanyaā”
kaြီ”saññya thokyapaṃ’thā”apyaso cityasaññya bhā0nāmaှုcasañña’ya kusiုlyatarā”tiု’၌ me’laျော’khaြငya” (= pamāda)
kaြောင’ya matunyalaှုpyape．
(gha) samādhisaññya simya”chaññya”apyaso = thiု ānāpānassatisamādhibhā0nākiု kaြိmyaphanyamaျာ”chā phā”maျာ”
ā”thutyakhaြငya”၌sālaျှငya cityamapaျံ’lhaင’yakhaြငya”kiု paြီ”cī”cetatyaso bhā0nāāruṃ၌ cityakiု koငya”chā thā”
tatyaso taññyakaြññyaso samādhisaññya thokyapaṃ’thā”apyaso cityasaññya cityapaျံ’lhaင’yamaှု uddhaccakaြောင’ya
matunyalaှုpyape．
(င) paññāsaññya simya”chaññya”apyaso = thiု ānāpānassatisamādhibhā0nāā”sālaျှငya kaျေ”jū”paြု
tatyaso tarā” kaျေ”jū”mapaြုtatyaso tarā”tiု’kiု khaဲkhaဲpaြာ”paြာ” sikhaြငya” lakkhaṇāraှိso paññāsaññya
thokyapaṃ’thā”apyaso cityasaññya ñāṇya၏ chana’yakaျငyabhakya avijjā (= moha) kaြောင’ya matunyalaှုpyape．

tacyanaññya” guṇyaaṅgā raှcyapā”
1． samāhita ---- cityaacañyasaññya catutthajhānyasamādhiphaြင’ya koငya”chā taññyakaြññyalaျkya raှိ၏．
2． parisuddha ---- nī0raṇa aññacyaakaြေ”tiု’maှ ave”kaြီ” ve”khāsaphaြင’ya cityaacañyasaññya raှေ’nokyavanya”kaျငya
caငyakaြyyalaျkya raှိ၏．
3． pariyodāta ---- cityakiု tunyalaှုpyakhaျောkyakhaျာ”cetatyaso vitakya vicāra pīti sukhahūso runa’yaraငya”
so jhānyaaṅgātarā”tiု’kiု koငya”chā kaျောyalhaှာ” lhanyamaြောkyalāpaြီ” phaြcyasaphaြင’ya cityaacañyasaññya paြို”paြို”
paြkyapaြkya aroငyatalakyalakya thhakyalaျkya sana’yaraှငya”kaြññyalaငyane၏．

4． anaṅgaṇa ---- jhānyakiု rakhaြငya”kiု akaြောငya”paြု၍ phaြcyapoyalātatyaso yutyamāso aliုā”phaြင’ya
sakyavaငyakunyaso māna māyā sāṭheyaျ casañña’ya akusiုlya aññacyaakaြေ”tiု’၏ maraှိkhaြငya”kaြောင’ya akusiုlya
aññacyaakaြေ”tiု’maှ kaငya”ve”laျkya raှိ၏． (visuddhi-2-6．)
jhānyaramaှုkiု akaြောငya”paြု၍ mimikiုyyakiု mimi athaငyakaြီ”tatyaso mānatacyamaျို” phaြcyatatyase”၏．
“maြtyachābhurā”saññya parisatyaalayya၌ tarā”toyakiု hokaြာ”toyamūrāvayya -- rahanya” ...ītarā”kiု
saငyakhaျcyasā”saññya maññyasiု’ thaငyamaြငyayūchapāsalaဲ -- casaññyaphaြင’ya ငါ’kiုsā me”၍ me”၍ tarā”toyakiု ho
kaြာ”toyamūlaျှငya koငya”lecha” - hu mānapāso aliုchandatacyamaျို” phaြcyatatyase”၏． thaငyaraှာ”raှိneso
apaြcyakiု phuṃ”thā”liုso māyālaññya” phaြcyatatya၏， maraှိsoguṇyakiု raှိhanyachoငyatatyaso sāṭheyaျ
laññya” phaြcyatatya၏． thiု māna māyā sāṭheyaျtarā”apoငya”saññya pāpaka icchā0cara maññya၏， yutyamāso
aliုchiု”maျာ”taññya”． ītarā”tiု’kā” nī0raṇatiု’lokya makaြmya”tamya”soyalaññya” cityaacañyakiု ññacyanhamya”
ceောငya paြုlupyatatya၍ aṅgaṇa-hu khoyachiုapyaso anucā” akusiုlyamaျာ”taññya”．
(mahāṭī-2-8-9 - kaြñña’ya．)
5． vigatūpakkilesa = abhijjhācaso cityaññacyaññū”kaြောငya” upakkilesa tarā”tiု’maှlaññya” kaငya”laျkya
raှိ၏． (abhijjhāhūsaññya lobhataññya”， liုlā”tapyamakyamaှု tacyamaျို”taññya”． thiုlobhasaññya kāmacchandanī0raṇa
aphaြcyasiု’ marokyaso mimijhānyakiု miminaှcyasakyamaှု lobhaanucā”taññya”． pathamajhānyaphaြင’ya mapayyakhhāniုငyaso
lobha anucā”maျို”taññya”． abhijjhācaso hūso cakā”vayya “caso”hūso cakā”phaြင’ya anucā” māna
māyā sāṭheyaျ casaññyatiု’kiုpaငya yūpā． mahāṭī-2-8-9．)

maraှိrakā” kaြံ’kaြံ’khiုငyakaျññya taññyataṃ’ne၏． (iddhividhacaso thiုthiုabhiññāṇyabhakyasiု’ cityakiု celhaှtyakhaြငya”

ālokasaññā
ālākasaññā casaññyatiု’kiု aṭṭhakathā ṭīkātiု’ka īsiု’ phhaင’yachiုthā”၏．
ālokasaññanti middhavinodanaālokasaññaṃ． divāsaññanti divātisaññaṃ． yathā divā tathā
rattinti yathā divā ālokasaññā adhiṭṭhitā， tathā naṃ rattimpi adhiṭṭhaheyaျာsi． yathā ratti H tathā
divāti yathā ca te ratti H ālokasaññā adhiṭṭhitā， tathā naṃ divāpi adhiṭṭhaheyaျာsi． sappabhāsanti
dibbacakkhuñāṇatthāya sahobhāsaṃ． (aṃ-ṭṭha-3-174．)
ālokasaññaṃ manasikareyaျာsīti divā vā ratti H vā sūriya-pajjota-canda-maṇiādīnaṃ ālokaṃ
“āloko”ti manasikareyaျာsi， citte ṭhapeyaျာsi． yathā te subhāvitālokakasiṇassa
viya kasiṇāloko yadicchakaṃ yā0dicchakañca so āloko rattiyaṃ upatiṭṭhati， yena tattha
divāsaññaṃ ṭhapeyaျာsi， divā viya vigatathinamiddho bhaveyaျာsīti． pa ． sahobhāsanti sañāṇobhāsaṃ．
thinamiddhavinodanaālokopi vā hotu kasiṇālokopi vā parikammālokopi vā， upakkilesāloko
viya sabboyaṃ āloko ñāṇasamuṭṭhānovāti． (aṃ-ṭī-3-177-178．)
yaငya”aṭṭhakathā ṭīkātiု’၏ chiုliုraငya”maှာ īsiု’ phaြcya၏． dibbacakkhuabhiññāṇya caso abhiññāṇyatiု’kiု
aliုraှိso yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya pathavīkasiုṇya”maှ odātakasiုṇya” tiုငyaaောငyaso kasiုṇya”raှcyapā”tiု’၌
kasiုṇya” tacyapā”tacyapā”laျှငya samāpatyaraှcyapā”cī raaောငya raှေ”ū”chā kaြို”cā”ā”thutyarā၏． yaငya” kasiုṇya”

nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
514
upakkilesāloko viya sabboyaṃ āloko ñāṇasamuṭṭhāno0 = udayabbayañāṇyapiုငya”thaငya
lāraှိso vipassanāñāṇya၏ ññacyaññū”kaြောငya” upakkilesa amaññyaraso obhāsa (= aroငyaalaငya”)
saññya vipassanāñāṇyakaြောင’ya phaြcyapoyalārasakaဲ’siု’ īathakyapā aroငyaalaငya” ā”luṃ”saññyalaññya” ñāṇya
kaြောင’yasālaျှငya phaြcyapoyalāraso aroငyaalaငya”maျာ” phaြcyapesaññyahu phhaင’yachiုthā”pesaññya．
(aṃ-ṭī-3-178．)
1． thinamiddhavinodana āloka
iti vi0ṭena cetasā apariyonaddhena sappabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāveyaျာsi = īsiု’ middha kaငya”caငya၍
thakyavanya”kaျငya maြှေ”yaှkyakhaြငya” maraှိso cityaphaြင’ya aroငyaalaငya”naှင’yatakha phaြcyaso cityakiု phā”maျာ”lelo’．
(aṃ-2-463．)
īsiု’laျှငya bhurā”raှငyaka asaျှငyamahāmoggallānya kiုyyatoyamaြtyaā” ññhaှnyakaြာ”toyamūrāvayya ---
sappabhāsaṃ cittaṃ = aroငyaalaငya”naှင’ya takhaphaြcyaso cityakiု phā”maျာ”ranya ññhaှnyakaြာ”thā”toyamū၏． yaငya”
sappabhāsaṃ cittaṅkiု aṭṭhakathāka aောkyapāatiုငya” phhaင’yachiုthā”၏．
sappabhāsanti dibbacakkhuñāṇatthāya sahobhāsaṃ． (aṃ-ṭṭha-3-174．)
= dibbacakkhuabhiññāṇya aliု’ငှာ aroငyaalaငya”naှင’ya takhaso cityakiု phā”maျာ”pāhu chiုliုkaြောငya”
raှငya”paြthā”၏． siု’athakya thinamiddhavinodanaāloka = thinamiddhakiု payyaphaျောkyakaြောငya” alaငya”roငya
hūsaññya īpacalāyamānasuttanya arāvayya dibbacakkhuabhiññāṇyaaliု’ငှာ phā”maျာ”thā”apyaso aroငya
alaငya” siု’mahutya dibbacakkhuabhiññāṇyaka thhakyapoyalāso dibbacakkhuabhiññāṇyacityakaြောင’ya phaြcyapoyalā
so alaငya”roငyahu maှtyapā． siု’soya vibhaငya”pāḷitoyanaှင’ya aṭṭhakathātiု’၌kā” īsiု’laññya” lāraှိpesaññya．
thinamiddhaṃ pahāya vigatathinamiddho viharati ālokasaññī sato sampajāno． (abhi-2-253．)
“ālokasaññī”ti tattha katamā saññā， yā saññā sañjānanā sañjānitattaṃ， ayaṃ vuccati
saññā． ayaṃ saññā ālokā hoti vi0ṭā parisuddhā pariyodātā， tena vuccati “ālokasaññī”
ti． (abhi-2-263-264．)
ālokasaññīti rattimpi divāpi diṭṭhālokasañjānanasamatthāya vigatanī0raṇāya parisuddhāya
saññāya samannāgato． (abhi-ṭṭha-2-353．)
ālokā hotīti sappabhā hoti． nirā0raṇaṭṭhena vi0ṭā． nirupakkilesaṭṭhena parisuddhā．
pabhassaraṭṭhena pariyodātā． (abhi-ṭṭha-2-354．)
īathakyapā cakā”rapyatiု’kā” ñāṇyaroငya le”maျို”tiု’thaငya thinamiddhavinodanaāloka alaငya”roငya
naှင’ya patyasakya၍ lāraှိso pāḷitoya aṭṭhakathā cakā”rapyatiု’ phaြcyakaြsaññya．
ne’akhā၌ raniုငyaso neroငya， ññaakhā၌ raniုငyaso laroငya， pattamaြာ”roငya， mī”roငya casaññyakiု
kaြñña’ya၍ “āloka āloka = alaငya”roငya， alaငya”roငya”hu naှluṃ”shaငya”ra၏． rarāaroငyaalaငya”
kiု rasañña’yaatiုငya” naှluṃ”shaငya”ra၏． koငya”chā phā”maျာ”thā”apyapaြီ”so ālokakasiုṇya” aroငyakaဲ’siု’
mimiyakhuphā”nechaဲ ālokakasiုṇya”roငyasaññya aliုraှိsamaျှ akhaျိnyapatyaluṃ” aliုraှိsalokya arapyasiု’
tiုငyaaောငya ññaakhā၌ taññyane၏， thiုakhā၌ thiု yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya thiုaroငyaalaငya”kiု ne’akhā၌
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
515
kaဲ’siု’so amaှtyasaññākiု thā”pā， ne’akhā၌kaဲ’siု’ ññaña’ya၌laññya” thinamiddhakaငya”caငyaaောငya ālokasaññā
kiု phā”maျာ”nepā． ālokasaññī = alaငya”roငya amaှtyasaññāraှိ၏hūsaññya ññaña’yaakhā၌soyamaှlaññya”
ne’akhātunya”ka maြငyaapyapaြီ”so neroငyacasañña’ya aroငyaalaငya”kiု maှtyakhaြငya”၌ chamya”niုငyaso thinamiddha nī0raṇa
maှ kaငya”so thakyavanya”kaျငya caငyakaြyyaso saññānaှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃ၏hu chiုliုsaññya．
ī saññākā” aroငya raှိ၏， nī0raṇataññya”hūso apityaapaငya achī”atā” maraှိsaññyaphaြcya၍
“āloka = aroငyaalaငya””hūso āruṅkiု naှluṃ”shaငya”tatyasaññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya phaင’yalaငya”ne၏．
īakhaျိnyathaငya samādhimaှာ upacārasamādhinayyamaြseiု’ chiုkyarokyalāpaြီphaြcya၍ nī0raṇa aññacyaakaြေ”tiု’ kaငya”caငya
shā”paြီphaြcyasaphaြင’ya nī0raṇanaှင’yatūso taññyarā raှိkaြkunyaso kilesā aññacyaakaြေ”tiု’laññya” kaငya”ve”
shā”kaြ၏． yaငya”kilesā aññacyaakaြေ”tiု’kā” yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ cityadhātyakiု ññacyanhamya”aောငya
naှိpyacakyatatyaso tarā”chiု”tiု’ phaြcyakaြ၏． yaငya”siု’ kapya၍ naှိpyacakyatatyaso kilesāaññacyaakaြေ”
maraှိsaññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya bhā0nācityasaññya thakyavanya”kaျငya caငyakaြyyalaျkyaraှိ၏， paြို”paြို”paြkyapaြkya talakyalakya
tapaြောငyapaြောငya thhakyaso aroငya raှိsaññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya thakyavanya”kaျငya phaြူcaငyanepe၏．
(abhi-2-253-263-264． abhi-ṭṭha-2-354．)
ī thinamiddhavinodana ālokahūso thinamiddhapayyaphaျောkyakaြောငya” alaငya”roငyamaှာ āloka
kasiုṇya”kiု phā”maျာ”ā”thutyaneso yogā0cara rahanya”toya၏ santānyavayya pathamajhānyasamādhisiု’ machiုkya
mī upacārasamādhinayyamaြေakhiုkya၌ nī0raṇaaññacyaakaြေ”tiု’ khākaျshā”saphaြင’ya bhā0nācityamaှ laငya”roငya
khaြññyamaျာ” thhakyapoyalāpuṅkiု hokaြာ”thā”toyamūso desanātoyapaငya phaြcyasaññya． siု’athakya yaငya”
ālokakasiုṇya”laျှငya āruṃraှိso pathamajhānya၏ upacārasamādhi akhiုkya၌ thhakyapoyalāso aroငya
alaငya”kiုlaññya” thinamiddhavinodanaāloka = thinamiddhakiု payyaphaျောkyakaြောငya” alaငya”roငyahupaငya khoyachiု
pesaññya． īsiု’laññya” maှtyasā”pāle．
2． kasiṇāloka
dibbacakkhuabhiññāṇya၏ anī”kapyachuṃ” akaြောငya”raငya”tacyakhu phaြcyasañña’ya ālokakasiုṇya”၌laññya”
alaငya”roငya raှိ၏， alaငya”roငyakiု nimityayū၍ phā”maျာ”raso kasiုṇya”paငya phaြcyapesaññya． tacyaphanya dibbacakkhu
abhiññāṇyanaှင’ya takha abhiññāṇyaā”luṃ”tiု’၏laññya”koငya”， vipassanāñāṇya၏laññya”koငya” akhaြkheṃ
akaြောငya”raငya” phaြcyakaြkunyaso ālokakasiုṇya”maှ kaြhaငya”so kasiုṇya”ā”luṃ”tiု’၌laññya” alaငya”
roငya raှိsaññyasā phaြcyapesaññya． kasiုṇya”vanya”ā”luṃ”tiု’saññya paṭibhāganimityasiု’ chiုkyarokyasoakhā၌
kaြññyalaငyatokyapalāmaြဲ dhammatāpaငya phaြcyasaññya． athū”saphaြင’ya tejokasiုṇya” odātakasiုṇya” āloka
kasiုṇya”tiု’kā” laငya”roငyakhaြññyachamya”aငya piုso kasiုṇya”tiု’ phaြcyakaြ၏． siု’soya ī၌kā” - sabboyaṃ
āloko ñāṇasamuṭṭhāno0 = alaငya”roငyaā”luṃ”saññya ñāṇyakaြောင’yasālaျှငya phaြcyasaññyahu chiုthā”
saphaြင’ya kasiုṇya”jhānyamaျာ”naှင’ya yaှñyathaဲlaျkyaraှိso ñāṇyakaြောင’ya phaြcyapoyalāso aroငyahu maှtyasā”pā．
yaငya”siု’phaြcyalaျှငya kasiုṇya”၏ aroငyaalaငya”maှာ ñāṇyakaြောင’ya maphaြcyato’paြီlohu me”ranyaraှိ၏．
ke0lauှိ samādhilābhino upaṭṭhānākāramattaṃ saññajametaṃ． (visuddhi-1-122．)
= īkasiုṇya”paṭibhāganimityasaññya upacārasamādhikiု raraှိso yogā0carapuggiုlyaā” ñāṇya၌ thaငyalā
so akhaြငya”arāmaျှphaြcya၍ sakyasakyaso bhā0nāsaññākaြောင’ya phaြcyapoyalāso nimityasā phaြcyasaññya．
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
516
īathakyapā aphhaင’yaara kasiုṇya”paṭibhāganimityahūsaññyamaှာlaññya” bhā0nāsaññākaြောင’yasā phaြcyapoya
lārakā” bhā0nāsaññāhūsaññyalaññya” saññātacyakhutaññya”sā phaြcyasaññyamahutya， yaငya” saññānaှင’ya yaှñyathaဲlaျkya
ñāṇyalaññya” pāvaငyalaျkyasā raှိpesaññya． upacārasamādhi appanāsamādhikiု raraှိso yogīsūtoyakoငya”၏
santānyamaှာsā phaြcyaniုငyasaphaြင’ya yaငya”upacārasamādhi appanāsamādhinaှင’ya ñāṇyasaññya cittakkhaṇatacyakhu athaငya”၌
yaှñyathaဲlaျkyasā phaြcyanepesaññya． saññākiု ū”taññya၍ aū”mū၍ phhaင’yachiုthā”saññyahu maှtyapā． siု’athakya
kasiုṇya”paṭibhāganimityatiု’kiု āruṃyū၍ phaြcyapoyalāso kasiုṇya” upacārajhānya appanājhānyatiု’naှင’ya yaှñyathaဲ
laျkyaraှိso ñāṇyakaြောင’yaphaြcyaso aroငyaalaငya”kiု kasiṇālokahu khoyachiုsaññya maှtyapā．
3． parikammāloka
parikammālokamaှာ naှcyamaျို” raှိ၏． abhiññāṇya၏ akhaြkheṃphaြcyaso parikamma， jhānya၏ akhaြkheṃphaြcyaso
parikammahu parikamma naှcyamaျို” raှိ၏．
tattha ukkāloko viya parikammakāle kasiṇāloko． (visuddhi-2-58．)
= thiု upamā၌ maြkyamī”raှူ”roငyakaဲ’siု’ abhiññāṇya၏ akhaြkheṃphaြcyaso parikaṅkiု paြုsokāla၌
kasiုṇya”roငyakiု maှtyaapya၏．
īathakyapā cakā”rapyamaှာ dibbacakkhuabhiññāṇyakhanya”၌ lāraှိso phhaင’yachiုkhaျkya phaြcyapāsaññya． ī၌ dibba
cakkhuabhiññāṇya၏ akhaြkheṃphaြcyaso kasiုṇya”tiု’kiု (14)maျို”so akhaြငya”arāā”phaြင’ya apaြnyapaြnya alaှnya
laှnya kaြိtyakhaျneekhaြငya”saññyalaññya” parikaṃtacyamaျို”paငya phaြcyasaññya． tacyaphanya āloka kasiုṇya” siု’mahutya
kasiုṇya”tacyakhukhukiု dibbacakkhuabhiññāṇya၏ akhaြkheṃaphaြcya upacārasamādhinayyamaြေ chiုkyaaောငya kasiုṇya”vanya”
kiု phaြna’yakaြkyalaျkya phā”thā”၏． abhiññāṇyajo macomī akhiုkyakiုlaññya” parikammahupaငya khoya၏． thiုparikamma
= parikaṃakhiုkya၌laññya” alaငya”roငyaraှိsaññyasā phaြcyapesaññya．
nokyatacyamaျို”kā” jhānya၏akhaြkheṃphaြcyaso parikamma = parikaṃpaငya phaြcyasaññya． pathavīkasiုṇya” āloka
kasiုṇya”casañña’ya kasiုṇya”vanya” tacyakhukhukiု āruṃyū၍ bhā0nāmaှုkiု paြု၏． pakatiso maြvenya”， pakatiso
alaငya”roငyavanya”tiု’kiု āruṃyū၍ phā”maျာ”neso bhā0nākiု parikammabhā0nāhu khoya၏． thiုpakatiso
maြvenya”， pakatiso alaငya”roငyavanya”casañña’ya kasiုṇya”vanya”nimityatiု’kā” parikammanimityapaငya phaြcyasaññya．
thiုkasiုṇya”vanya” tacyakhukhukiု maျkyaciphaြင’ya maှိtyatuṃ phhaင’yatuṃ aphuṃphuṃ āruṃpaြု၍ nimityakiု āruṃyūrā akaြငya
akhā၌ thiုnimityasaññya cityaphaြင’ya koငya”chā yūmi၏， pakatiso maျkyaciphaြင’ya maြငyaracañyakaဲ’siု’ manodhāra၌ thaငyalā
၏， maျkyacimaှိtya၍ thiုnimityakiု āruṃyūsoakhā maျkyaciphaြင’ya tiုkyariုkya maြငyanerasakaဲ’siု’ cityathaဲ၌ thaငyathaငya
raှာ”raှာ” poyalā၏． thiုsiု’ cityamaှာ thaငyathaငyaraှာ”raှာ” poyalāsoakhā thiုāruṅkiု uggahanimityahu khoyavoya
ralesaññya． yakhaငya parikammanimityakiုpaငya cityaphaြင’ya koငya”chā yūsokaြောင’ya koငya”chā yūapyaso nimitya
phaြcyakhaြငya”kaြောင’ya uggahanimityahu khoyakhaြငya” phaြcyasaññya． yaငya” uggahanimityakiု āruṃyū၍ phā”neso bhā0nāmaှာ
parikammabhā0nāpaငya phaြcyasaññya． yaငya”samādhimaှာlaññya” parikammasamādhimaျှsā raှိse”saññya． siု’soya īuggaha
nimityakiု āruṃpaြုneso parikammasamādhimaှာ yakhaငya parikammanimityakiု āruṃpaြုneso parikammasamādhithakya
piု၍ piု၍ ငြိmyasakyalā၏， taññyakaြññyamaှု chamya”aငya piု၍ piု၍ maြင’yamā”lā၏．
thiု parikammabhā0nāsamādhiphaြင’ya uggahanimityakiု āruṃpaြု၍ cityataññyakaြññyaneso yogā0carapuggiုlya
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
517
saññya thiုuggahanimityakiုpaငya āruṃyū၍ yaငya” parikammabhā0nāsamādhiphaြင’ya chakyalakya၍ ā”thutyapaြnyasaññya
raှိsoya tacyakhaျိnya thiုuggahanimityanaှင’ya puṃsaṇṭhānya pamāṇatūso āruṃnimitya tacyamaျို”saññya citya၌ ငြိmyasakyachā
taññyane၏． cityathaဲ၌ koငya”chā shaငya”thā”apyasakaဲ’siု’ phaြcyane၏． mapaျောkyamapaျkya khakyakhakyakhaငya”khaငya”
thaငyathaငyaraှာ”raှာ” thaငyalā၏． parikammanimitya uggahanimityatiု’naှင’ya alā”tūso yaငya”kasiုṇya”nimitya āruṅkiု
paṭibhāganimityahu khoya၏． thiု paṭibhāganimityakā” uggahanimityathakya acha arā athoငyamaka sālhanya၍
kaြññyalaငya၏． thiုpaṭibhāganimityakiု āruṃpaြု၍ phā”maျာ”neso bhā0nākiု upacārabhā0nāhu khoyachiု၍
yaငya”samādhikiုlaññya” upacārasamādhihu khoyachiုpesaññya．
yaငya” upacārasamādhinayyamaြseiု’ machiုkyamī upacārasamādhinaှင’ya alhanyanī”kapyalaျkyaraှိso alhanya achaင’ya
maြင’yaneso parikammasamādhinaှင’ya yaှñyathaဲlaျkyaraှိso ñāṇyakaြောင’yalaññya” alaငya”roငyamaျာ” thhakyapoyalā
pesaññya． yaငya”alaငya”roငyamaျာ”saññyalaññya” parikammālokahūso amaññyakiု raraှိsaññyasā phaြcyapesaññya．
īkasiုṇya”၏ parikammasamādhimaှ laငya”roငyakhaြññyamaျာ” thhakyapoyalāsakaဲ’siု’ kaျnyasamathakammaṭṭhānya”tiု’၏ pari
kamma samādhimaှlaññya” alaငya”roငyamaျာ” thhakyapoyalāsaññyasāhu maှtyapā． parikammasamādhithakya achaင’yamaြင’ya
neso upacārasamādhi， appanāsamādhitiု’၌kā” chiုphhayyapaငya maraှိto’paြီ phaြcya၏． nokyathaငya chakyalakya
phoyapaြmañña’ya adhicittasuttanyahu aṭṭhakathā ṭīkātiု’ka khoyavoyasuṃ”chaဲthā”so nimittasuttanyakiု thokyapā．
ānāpānakammaṭṭhānya”thaငyalaññya” parikammanimitya， uggahanimitya， paṭibhāganimityahu nimityasuṃ”maျို” raှိsaññyasā
phaြcyasaññya． uggahanimityakiု āruṃyūneso parikammasamādhinaှင’ya paṭibhāganimityakiု āruṃyūneso samādhi
tiု’maှlaññya” tacyanaññya” yaငya”samādhitiု’naှင’ya yaှñyaneso ñāṇyakaြောင’yalaññya” aroငyaalaငya”maျာ” thhakyapoya
lāniုငyasaññyasā phaြcyasaññya．

adhicittasuttanya khoya nimittasuttanya
adhicittamanuyuttena bhikkhave bhikkhunā tīṇi nimittāni kālena kālaṃ manasi kātabbāni． kālena
kālaṃ samādhinimittaṃ manasi kātabbaṃ， kālena kālaṃ paggahanimittaṃ manasi kātabbaṃ， kālena kālaṃ
upekkhānimittaṃ manasi kātabbaṃ． sace bhikkhave adhicittamanuyutto bhikkhu ekantaṃ samādhinimittaṃye0 manasi
kareyaျ， ṭhānaṃ taṃ cittaṃ kosajjāya saṃ0tteyaျ． sace bhikkhave adhicittamanuyutto bhikkhu ekantaṃ
paggahanimittaṃye0 manasi kareyaျ， ṭhānaṃ taṃ cittaṃ uddhaccāya saṃ0tteyaျ． sace bhikkhave adhicittamanuyutto
bhikkhu ekantaṃ upekkhānimittaṃye0 manasi kareyaျ， ṭhānaṃ taṃ cittaṃ na sammā samādhiyeyaျ āsavānaṃ
khayāya． yato ca kho bhikkhave adhicittamanuyutto bhikkhu kālena kālaṃ samādhinimittaṃ manasi
karoti， kālena kālaṃ paggahanimittaṃ manasi karoti， kālena kālaṃ upekkhānimittaṃ manasi karoti．
taṃ hoti cittaṃ muduñca kammaniyañca pabhassarañca， na ca pabhaṅgu， sammā samādhiyati āsavānaṃ khayāya．

maြtyaniု” tamya”ta၍ tasasa phaြcyanesaññyakā” mahutyasaññyakiု sabhopokyalerāsaññya．
athakyathaငya phoyapaြkhaဲ’so mahāassapura caso thiုthiု suttanyatiု’၌ saccāle”pā”kiု hutyatiုငya”
maှnyachā siaောငya kaြို”pamya”liုso rahanya”toyaā” mimiraraှိthā”so catutthajhānyakiု guṇyaaṅgāraှcyatanyanaှင’ya
paြñña’yacuṃaောငya kaြို”pamya”ranya bhurā”raှငya၏ tiုkyathanya”toyamūkhaျkyakiု ū”thipyarhakyapanyachaငya၍ īalaငya”roငya
akaြောငya”kiု phoyapaြnekhaြငya” phaြcyapāsaññya． thiုaṅgāraှcyarapyatiု’thaငya pariyodāte = paြို”paြို”paြkyapaြkya aroငya
talakyalakya tokyapalatyasoyahūso cakā”toyasaññyalaññya” aṅgārapya tacyakhuaphaြcya pāvaငyalaျkyapaငya
raှိpesaññya． akayya၍ asaငyayogīsūtoyakoငya”saññyalaññya” khapyasimya”ussuṃ aluṃ”cuṃso tarā”maှnyasamaျှ
kiု charāmakū sayambhūñāṇyaphaြင’ya kiုyyatiုငyamaျkyamaှောkya thhaငya”phokya simaြငyatoyamūso sabbaññusammāsambuddha
bhurā”raှငya kiုyyatoyatiုငyaka sitoyamū maြငyatoyamū၍sālaျှငya īsiု’ pariyodāte - hūso aṅgārapya
tacyarapyakiု thañña’yashaငya”၍ ññhaှnyakaြာ”thā”toyamūpāpesaññyahu lakyakhaṃniုငyapālaျှငya ū”thipyarhakya panyachaငyaniုငyapālaျှငya
asaငya yogī sūtoyakoငya”athakya nibbānyasiု’ shā”rā maggaငyaraှcyapā” akaျင’yamaြtyatarā”taññya” hūso
lamya”matoyakaြီ”saññya phaြောင’yaphaြူ” sāyālaျkyapaငya raှိnemaññyasā phaြcyapesaññya．
akayya၍ asaငyayogīsūtoyakoငya”saññya sadisūpacāraā”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya”， mukhaျā”phaြင’ya
laññya”koငya” upacārasamādhi amaññyaraso samādhitacyakhukhumaှ vipassanāsiု’ kū”liုkhaဲ’soyalaññya”koငya”，
catutthajhānyasamādhimaှ akhaြာ”tacyapā”so appanājhānyasamādhi tacyakhukhukiု vipassanā၏ akhaြpodakapaြု၍
vipassanāsiု’ kū”liုkhaဲ’soyalaññya”koငya” thiုupacārasamādhi siု’mahutya appanāsamādhikiုlaññya” guṇyaaṅgā
raှcyatanyatiု’naှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃtanyasalokya paြñña’yacuṃaောငya kaြို”pamya”ramaññyasālaျှငya phaြcyapesaññya． akaြောငya”mū yaငya”
samathabhā0nācityatiု’kaြောင’yalaññya” paြို”paြို”paြkyapaြkya talakyalakyatokyapaso aroငyaalaငya”maျာ”
thhakyapoyalāsaññyasā phaြcyasokaြောင’yapaငyataññya”．
aroငyaalaငya”khaျငya” rothhe”tatyapuṃ
samathabhā0nācitya vipassanābhā0nācityatiု’kaြောင’ya laငya”roငyakhaြññyamaျာ” thhakyapoyalāniုငyakaြောငya”
achiုamina’ya desanātoyakiု asaငyayogīsūtoyakoငya”saññya lakyakhaṃniုငyalokyapepaြီhu yūchapāsaññya．
īarāthaငya aroငyaalaငya”khaျငya” rothhe”tatyapuṅkiု chakyalakya၍ taငyapaြapyapāsaññya．
akhaျို’so yogā0carapuggiုlyatiု’saññya tarā”tacyakhukhukiု naှluṃ”shaငya” ā”thutyasañña’yaakhā၌ mimitiု’
ā”thutyaneso kammaṭṭhānya”saññya samathakammaṭṭhānya” vipassanākammaṭṭhānya”tiု’thaငya maññyasañña’yakammaṭṭhānya” phaြcyasaññya
kiု macañya”cā”to’bhaဲ vipassanākammaṭṭhānya” phaြcyasaññyahū၍sā yuṅkaြññyalakyakhaṃlaျkya kaြိုkyanaှcyasakyarā naññya”
lamya”phaြင’ya tarā”naှluṃ”shaငya” raှုphā”kaြ၏． samādhi atoyaasaင’ya ā”koငya”lāsoakhā၌ laငya”roငya
khaြññyamaျာ” thhakyapoyalātatya၏． thiုakhā၌ udayabbayañāṇyasiု’ ငါchiုkyarokyapaြီhu athaငyakaြီ”tatyakaြ၏．
udayabbayañāṇyahūsaññya athakyathaငya akaြိmyakaြိmya raှငya”paြkhaဲ’sañña’yaatiုငya” rupyatuṃ”rupyakhaဲ hūso rupyaghana
suṃ”maျို” nāmyatuṃ”nāmyakhaဲhūso nāmyaghana (4)maျို”tiု’kiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya phaြိုkhhaဲphaျkyachī”laျkya paramatyasiု’ ñāṇyaamaြငya
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
532
chiုkyaaောငya raှုniုငyasaphaြင’ya nāmarūpaparicchedañāṇyakiု raraှိpaြီ”၍ atitya anāgatya paccuppanya kālasuṃ”pā”athaငya”၌
akaြောငya”tarā” achakyachakya akaျို”tarā” achakyachakyatiု’kiု simya”chaññya”niုငyasaphaြင’ya paccayapariggahañāṇya
kiုlaññya” raraှိpaြီ”soakhā， akaြောငya”tarā”naှင’ya takhaso yaငya”rupyanāmyadhammasaṅkhāratarā”tiု’kiု lakkhaṇā
re” suṃ”tanyasiု’ taငya၍ thaငyathaငyakaြီ” vipassanāraှုliုkyasoya atitya anāgatya paccuppanyahūso kālasuṃ”pā”，
ajjhatta bahiddhahūso santānyanaှcyapā” athaငya”၌ taññyaraှိso rupyatarā” nāmyatarā”tiု’kiု khaṇapaccuppanyasiု’
ñāṇyaamaြငya chiုkyaaောငya raှုphā”niုငyaso yogā0carapuggiုlyatiု’၏ santānya၌sālaျှငya phaြcyapoyalāniုငyaso
ñāṇyaphaြcya၏．
rupyakalāpyakiုmaျှ mamaြငyaphū”se”saphaြင’ya maြငyaphū”soyalaññya” ghanapaြိုaောငya dhātyamakhhaဲtatyase”saphaြင’ya para
matyasiု’ ñāṇyaamaြငya machiုkyase”so， akaြññyadhātya (6)pā”kiုmaျှ mamaြငyaphū”se” maraှုtatyase”saphaြင’ya yaငya”
akaြññyadhātya (6)pā”kiု achaဲpaြု၍ phaြcyapoyashā”so nāmyatarā”tiု’kiုlaññya” nāmyaghanapaြိုaောငya ñāṇyaphaြင’ya
maphaြိုkhhaဲniုငyase”saphaြင’ya nāmyaparamatyasiု’laññya” ñāṇyaamaြငya machiုkyase”so， vipassanāhūsaññya atitya anā
gatyakiု maraှုkoငya”pāhu puṃse lakyakhaṃthā”saphaြင’ya atitya anāgatya paccuppanya kālasuṃ”pā”၌ akaြောငya”tarā”
akaျို”tarā”tiု’၏ kaြောငya”-kaျို” chakyanhayyamaှုsabhotarā”kiု maraှုtatyase”saphaြင’ya paccayapariggahañāṇyakiု
laññya” mararaှိse”so， thiုsiု’ rupya-nāmya-kaြောငya”-kaျို” saṅkhāratarā”tiု’kiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ” mayūtatya masimya”
chaññya”tatyase”saphaြင’ya ñātapari ññācakhanya”kiုmaျှ machiုkyarokyase”so yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ santānyavayya
sammasanañāṇya udayabbayañāṇyahūso tīraṇapari ññā paññākiု raraှိre”maှာ mamaျှောyamaှnya”niုငyase”so mamaျှောya
maှnya”saင’yaso arāsā phaြcyapesaññya．
ñātapariññā paññākiု mararaှိse”so sūtoyakoငya”tacyaū”၏ santānyavayya tarā”tacyakhukhukiု naှluṃ”
shaငya”liုkyakhaြငya”kaြောင’ya alaငya”roငya thhakyapoyalākhaဲ’soya udayabbayañāṇyakiု raraှိpaြီ rokyaraှိpaြီhu ayū
acha maှာ”khaဲ’pāka sabbaññubhurā”raှငya၏ sāsanātoyanaှင’ya alhaဲkaြီ” lhaဲshā”paြီ phaြcya၏． akaြောငya”mū aluṃ”
cuṃso upādānakkhandhāငါ”pā” rupyatarā” nāmyatarā”tiု’kiု pariññāpaññā suṃ”maျို”phaြင’ya piုငya”piုငya”khaြာ”khaြာ” sipāmaှ dukkha
kunyaniုငyamaññya phaြcyakaြောငya” aparijānanasuttanya (saṃ-2-249-250．) ၌ bhurā”raှငya hokaြာ”thā”toyamūso
kaြောင’ya phaြcya၏．
siု’athakya tarā”tacyakhukhukiု naှluṃ”shaငya”liုkya၍ laငya”roငyakhaြññya thhakyapoyalātiုငya” udayabbayañāṇyamaှ
thhakyapoyalāso aroငyahū၍kā” mayūchalerā． samathabhā0nācityatiု’၌laññya” laငya”roငyakhaြññyaraှိsaññya
kiု satipaြုramaññyasā phaြcyapesaññya．
me”maြnya”saင’yaso akhaျkyatacyarapya
samathabhā0nācitya vipassanābhā0nācitya ā”luṃ”tiု’၌ laငya”roငyakhaြññyachamya”aငya raှိsaññya maှnyapāka
abhayyakaြောင’ya udayabbayañāṇyapiုငya”၌ - obhāsa - aroငyaalaငya”kiု takhamya”tanā” phoyapaြnerapāsanaññya”
hu me”maြnya”phhayyarā raှိlāpaြnya၏． aphaြko” samathabhā0nācityanaှင’ya udayabbayañāṇyamaှ tacyapā”so akhaြာ”
akhaြာ”so vipassanābhā0nācityatiု’kaြောင’ya phaြcyapoyalāso laငya”roငyakhaြññyanaှင’ya udayabbayañāṇyapiုငya”siု’
rokyaraှိsoakhā udayabbayañāṇya araင’yapiုငya”siု’ rokyaraှိsoakhā udayabbayānupassanācityakaြောင’ya phaြcya
poyalāso aroငyaalaငya”saññya tūññīmaှု maraှိbhaဲ tacyamūthū”khaြာ”၍ nesokaြောင’ya sī”sana’ya phoyapaြne
rakhaြငya” phaြcyapesaññya． aောkyapā aṭṭhakathā cakā”rapyamaျာ”kiု chakyalakya၍ phatyaraှုkaြñña’yapā．
ānāpānassatisamādhipiုငya”
533
tattha obhāsoti vipassanobhāso． tasmi Huppanne yogā0caro “na 0ta me ito pubbe
e0rūpo obhāso uppannapubbo， addhā maggappattosmi phalapattosmī”ti amaggame0 “maggo”ti， aphalame0
ca “phala”nti gaṇaှာti． tassa amaggaṃ “maggo”ti， aphalaṃ “phala”nti gaṇaှto vipassanāvīthi ukkantā nāma
hoti． so attano mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ vissajjethā obhāsame0 assādento nisīdati．
(visuddhi-2-270．)
thiုvipassanā၏ ññacyaññū”kaြောငya” upakkilesatarā” chayyapā”tiု’thaငya obhāsa - hūsaññyakā”
vipassanācityakaြောင’ya phaြcyaso mimi၏ rupyanāmyasantānyaacañya၌ kaျrokyalāso cittajarupyatiု’၏ vaṇṇadhātya
၏ paြို”paြို”paြkyapaြkya talakyalakyathhakyaso aroငyanaှင’ya yaငya”cittajarupyatiု’thaငya pāvaငyaso tejodhātya =
utukaြောင’ya thapyachaင’yaphaြcyaphā”lāso utusamuṭṭhānyaphaြcyaso utujarupyatiု’၏ vaṇṇadhātya၏ paြို”paြို”paြkyapaြkya
talakyalakya thhakyaso aroငyataññya”．
thiု vipassanā obhāsa aroငyaalaငya”saññya phaြcyapoyalālatyasaññyaraှိsoya yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya
“ငါ’ā” īakhāmaှ raှေ”၌ īsiု’ sabhoraှိso aroငyaalaငya”maျို”saññya maphaြcyaphū”lechatakā”， makhaျhatyaekanya
ariyamagyasiု’ chiုkyarokyasaññya ငါphaြcyalatyapaြီ， ariyaphiုlyasiု’ chiုkyarokyasaññya ငါphaြcyalatyapaြီ”- īsiု’laျှငya
magyamahutyaso obhāsakiုpaငyalaျှငya magyahū၍ phiုlyamahutyaso obhāsakiုpaငyalaျှငya phiုlyahū၍ chaဲyū၏．
magyamahutyasaññyakiု magyahū၍ phiုlyamahutyasaññyakiု phiုlyahū၍ chaဲyūso yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ vipassanāvīthi
hūso vipassanālamya”kaြောငya”kaြီ”kā” timya”coငya” lhaဲkhaျောya၍ shā”lepaြီ． yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya mimi၏
vipassanāhūso mūlakammaṭṭhānya”kiု chana’yalhaှtya၍ obhāsa = aroငyaalaငya”kiုpaငya sāyālaျkya thiုငyane၏．
(visuddhi-2-270．)
īathakyapā aṭṭhakathācakā”rapyathaငya - ငါ’ā” īakhāmaှ raှေ”၌ īsiု’ sabhoraှိso aroငya
alaငya”maျို”saññya maphaြcyaphū”lechatakā” - hūso cakā”rapyamaှာ ī၌ paြောliုraငya” phaြcyapāsaññya． ငါ’ā”
īsiု’sabhoraှိso aroငyaalaငya”maျို”saññya maphaြcyaphū”lechatakā”husā chiုsaññya． raှေ”yakhaငyaka aroငya
alaငya” luṃ”0 maphaြcyacaphū”se”hu chiုliုsaññyakā” mahutyapā． īkaဲ’siု’so aroငyaalaငya”maျို”sā maphaြcyaphū”
se”kaြောငya” paြောliုraငya” phaြcyasaññya． thokyathā”carā sādhakamaှာ kaျnya upakkilesatiု’naှင’ya chakyacapya၍
phhaင’yachiုkhaျkyamaျာ”paငya phaြcyasaññya．
“na 0ta me ito pubbe e0rūpaṃ ñāṇaṃ uppannapubbaṃ， e0rūpā pīti， passaddhi， sukhaṃ， adhimokkho， paggaho，
upaṭṭhānaṃ， upekkhā， nikanti uppannapubbā． (visuddhi-2-273．)
= ငါ’ā” īakhāmaှ raှေ”၌ īsiု’ sabhoraှိso vipassanāñāṇyasaññya maphaြcyaphū”chatakā”， īsiု’ sabho
raှိso vipassanāpītisaññya， passaddhisaññya， vipassanāsukhasaññya， adhimokkha = saddhāsaññya， paggaha = vīriya
saññya， upaṭṭhāna = satisaññya， upekkhā = vipassanupekkhā + āvajjanupekkhāsaññya， īsiု’ sabhoraှိso
nikantisaññya maphaြcyaphū”chatakā”． (visuddhi-2-273．)
īathakyapā cakā”rapyamaျာ”၌ īkaဲ’siု’so vipassanāñāṇyamaျို”saññya raှေ”ka maphaြcyacaphū”husā paြော
chiု၍ vipassanāñāṇya raှေ”ka luṃ”0 maphaြcyakhaဲ’caphū”hu mapaြောchiုsaññyakiုkā” satipaြုramaññyasā phaြcyapesaññya．
akayya၍ raှေ”akhāka vipassanāñāṇya luṃ”0 maphaြcyacaphū”se”hu yūkhaဲ’laျှငya sammasanañāṇyanaှင’ya udayabbaya
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
534
ñāṇya anupiုငya”soyamaှlaññya” maphaြcyaphū”se”hu adhippāyya sakyarokyasaliု phaြcyanepesaññya．
alā”tūpaငya raှေ”yakhaငyaka īkaဲ’siု’so pīti， passaddhi， sukha， saddhā， vīriya， sati， upekkhāmaျို”sā
maphaြcyaphū”khaြငya” phaြcyasaññya， bha0tacyalaျှောkyaluṃ”luṃ” tacyakaြိmyatacyakhāsoyamaျှ pīti， passaddhi， saddhā， vīriya caso
tarā”maျာ” maphaြcyacaphū”hu chiုliုsaññyakā” mahutyape．
alā”tūpaငya obhāsapiုငya”၌laññya” īkaဲ’siု’so aroငyaalaငya” obhāsasaññyasā raှေ”yakhaငyaka
maphaြcyakhaဲ’phū”se”khaြငya” phaြcyasaññya． aroငyaalaငya” obhāsa luṃ”0 maphaြcyaphū”se”hu chiုliုraငya” mahutyasaññyakiုkā”
satipaြုlerāsaññya．
yaငya”siု’ phaြcyalaျှငya abhayyakaြောင’ya īapiုငya”vayya obhāsa = alaငya”roငyaakaြောငya”kiု sī”sana’ya
phhaင’yachiုpāsanaññya”hūmū raှေ”yakhaငyaka phaြcyaphū”so aroငyaalaငya”naှင’ya luṃ”0 matūññībhaဲ tacyamūkhaဲlaျkya thū”thū”
khaြာ”khaြာ” phaြcyapoyalāso aroငyaalaငya”maျို” phaြcya၍ sī”sana’yaguṇyataငyakā khaျီ”mhamya” phhaင’yachiုrakhaြငya” phaြcyasaññya．
thiုobhāsa aroငyaalaငya”kiု ariyamagyaphiုlyahu siု’mahutya ariyamagyañāṇya phiုlyañāṇyatiု’kaြောင’ya phaြcyapoya
lāso aroငyaalaငya”hu ayūachaဲ maှာ”tatyakhaြငya”kaြောင’ya sī”sana’ya phhaင’yachiုnekhaြငya” phaြcyapesaññya．
ettha ca obhāsādayo upakkilesavatthutāya upakkilesāti vuttā， na akusalattā．
(visuddhi-2-273．)
= ī obhāsa ñāṇya pīti passaddhi sukha saddhā vīriya sati upekkhātiု’kā” taṇaှာ māna diṭṭhi ----
hūso upakkilesatarā”tiု’၏ taññyarāvatthu phaြcyakhaြငya”kaြောင’ya yaငya”tiု’kiု upakkilesatarā”tiု’ hū၍
mina’yachiုtoyamūkhaြငya” phaြcyasaññya． akusiုlyatarā”maျာ” phaြcyakhaြငya”kaြောင’ya upakkilesatarā”tiု’hū၍ mina’yachiုsaññya
kā” mahutyahu maှtyasā”pāle．
yaငya” obhāsa casaññyakiု - ငါpaဲ， ငါ’aroငyapaဲ， ငါ၏attapaဲ， magyapaဲ， phiုlyapaဲ -- īsiု’ casaññyaphaြင’ya chaဲyūmaှု
phaြcyakhaဲ’soya yaငya” obhāsa casaññyatiု’saññya taṇaှာ māna diṭṭhi hūso upakkilesatarā”tiု’၏ taññyarā
akaြောငya”tarā”maျာ” phaြcyasaññyahulaññya”koငya”， yaငya”obhāsacasaññyakiု sāyālaျkya mūla vipassanā
kammaṭṭhānya”kiု chana’yalhaှtyakā thiုငyanesoya vipassanālamya”kaြောငya” timya”coငya”shā”paြီhulaññya”koငya” sice
liု၍ ī obhāsa casaññyakiု guṇyataငyakā sī”sana’ya thutyaphoya hokaြာ”nekhaြငya” phaြcyasaññyahu maှtyasā”
pāle．
akayya၍ asaငyayogīsūtoyakoငya”saññya catutthajhānyasamādhisiု’ chiုkyarokyasaññyatiုငyaaောငya
samādhithūthoငyathā”paြီ”so yogā0carapuggiုlyaphaြcyapāka yaငya” catutthajhānyasamādhikiု vipassanā၏ akhaြေ

paññābhūmi-mūla-sarīra0vatthāna
kathaṃ bhāvetabbāti ettha pana yasmā imāya paññāya khandhāyatanadhātuindaြိyasaccapaṭiccasamuppādā-
dibhedā dhammā bhūmi． sīlavisuddhi ce0 cittavisuddhi cāti imā dhe visuddhiyo mūlaṃ． diṭṭhivisuddhi， kaṅkhāvitaraṇa-
visuddhi， maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhi， paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhi， ñāṇadassanavisuddhīti imā pañca visuddhiyo
sarīraṃ． tasmā tesu bhūmibhūtesu dhammesu uggahaparipucchā0sena ñāṇaparicayaṃ kathā mūlabhūtā dhe
visuddhiyo sampādethā sarīrabhūtā pañca visuddhiyo sampādentena bhāvetabbā． ayamettha saṅkhepo．
(visuddhi-2-73．)
īathakyapā visuddhimaggaaṭṭhakathācakā”maှာ vipassanāpaññākiု maññyasiု’ maññyapuṃ phā”maျာ” ā”thutyara
maññyanaññya”hūso ame”kiု akaျñya”khaျုpya phaြcheiုthā”so aphaြေ phaြcyapesaññya． yaငya” aṭṭhakathācakā”rapya၏
chiုliုraငya”maှာ īsiု’ phaြcya၏．
1． bhūmi ---- khandhā， āyatana， dhātya， indaြေ， saccā， kaြောငya”-kaျို”-chakya paṭiccasamuppādyasabhotarā”
casaññyaā”phaြင’ya paြာ”kunyaso dhammasabhotarā”tiု’saññyakā” vipassanāñāṇya၏ phaြcyarātaññyarābhuṃ =
vipassanābhūmi maññya၏．
2． mūla ---- sīlacaငyakaြyyakhaြငya” = sīlavisuddhi， citya၏ nī0raṇaaññacyaakaြေ”tiု’maှ caငyakaြyyakhaြငya” = citta
visuddhi - īvisuddhinaှcyapā”tiု’kā” vipassanāñāṇya၏ amaြcyaakhaြေ = mūla maññya၏． akaြောငya”raငya”cacya
maññya၏．
3． sarīra ----
ka． diṭṭhivisuddhi (= nāmarūpaparicchedañāṇya)，
kha． kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhi (= paccayapariggahañāṇya)，
ga． maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhi (= sammasanañāṇyanaှင’ya udayabbayañāṇyaanupiုငya”)，
gha． paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhi (= vipassanāñāṇya၏ ññacyaññū”kaြောငya” upakkilesatiု’maှ lhatyamaြောkya
shā”so udayabbayañāṇya araင’yapiုငya”maှ ca၍ athakyapiုငya” vipassanāñāṇyaā”luṃ”)，
င． ñāṇadassanavisuddhi (= ariyamagyañāṇya) ----
īvisuddhi (5)tanyatiု’kā” vipassanāñāṇya၏ athaññyakiုyya sarīra maññya၏．
thiုkaြောင’ya vipassanāñāṇya၏ phaြcyarātaññyarā bhūmiphaြcya၍ phaြcyakunyaso thiု khandhācaso tarā”tiု’၌
naှုtyatakyaraaောငya saငyayūkhaြငya”， anakyasabhotarā”tiု’kiု me”maြnya”khaြငya”၏ achamya”phaြင’ya ñāṇyaphaြင’ya le’kaျkyakhaြငya”
kiု paြု၍ vipassanāñāṇya၏ amaြcyaakhaြေ mūlatarā” phaြcyakaြkunyaso sīlavisuddhi cittavisuddhihūso visuddhi
tarā”naှcyapā”tiု’kiု paြီ”cī”paြñña’yacuṃcesaññya phaြcya၍， vipassanāñāṇya၏ athaññyakiုyya sarīra phaြcyakunyaso diṭṭhi
visuddhi caso visuddhikaျင’yacañya (5)rapyatiု’kiု paြñña’yacuṃcesaññya phaြcya၍ phā”maျာ”apyakunya၏． īkā” īarāvayya
akaျñya”cakā”rapyataññya”． (visuddhi-2-73．)
īathakyapā aṭṭhakathā၏ satyamaှtyakhaျkya phhaင’yachiုkhaျkyaara nibbānyakiု liုlā”toင’yatalaျkya raှိso
asaငyayogā0carapuggiုlyasūmaြtyasaññya visuddhi (7)pā” kaျင’yacañyakiုkā” yuṅkaြññyakhaျkya saddhātarā” apaြñña’yaavaphaြင’ya

malhaဲmashe lakyakhaṃniုငyaramaññyasā phaြcyapesaññya．
vipassanāñāṇya၏ phaြcyarātaññyarā bhūmi phaြcyakaြkunyaso khandhā-āyatana-dhātya-indaြေ-saccā-paṭicca
samuppādya sabhotarā”tiု’kiု sabhoanakyaadhippāyya raှုkhakyanaှင’yatakha charāsamā”tiု’thaṃ၌ canacyatakaျ naှုtya
takyaraaောငya raှေ”ū”chā saငyayūramaññya phaြcyapesaññya， ñāṇyaphaြင’ya le’kaျkyakhaြငya”kiု paြုramaññya．
raှေ”ū”chā vipassanā၏ amaြcyaakhaြေ mūlabhūtatarā”maျာ” phaြcyakaြkunyaso sīlavisuddhi cittavisuddhi
hūso visuddhinaှcyapā”kiု paြီ”cī”paြñña’yacuṃaောငya kaြို”pamya”ramaññya phaြcyapesaññya．
sīlavisuddhi
1． pātimokkhasaṃ0rasīla，
2． indaြိyasaṃ0rasīla，
3． ājī0pārisuddhisīla，
4． paccayasannissitasīla ----
hu akhaြkheṃ sīlakaြီ” (4) maျို”raှိ၏． yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya yaငya” akhaြkheṃ sīlakaြီ” (4)maျို”naှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃ
aောငya raှေ”ū”chā phaြñña’yakaျင’yaramaññya phaြcyasaññya．
1． pātimokkhasaṃ0rasīla ---- vinaññya”desanātoya၌ bhurā”raှငya paññatyathā”toyamūapyaso sikkhāpudya
akaြီ”aငyya ashayyashayyatiု’ raှိkaြ၏． “īamaှုkiု paြုlupyaramaññya phaြñña’yakaျင’yaramaññya”hu paññatyatoya
mūapyaso sikkhāpudyatiု’kiု phaြñña’yakaျင’yakhaြငya”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya”， “īamaှုkiု mapaြုlupyaapya”hu payyamaြcya
thā”so arāmaျာ”kiု mapaြုmakaျင’ya raှောငyakhaြငya”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya” sikkhāpudyatoyamaျာ”kiု thinya”simya”
coင’yaraှောkyakhaြငya”saññya pātimokkhasaṃ0rasīla maññya၏． lūdāyakā dāyikāmatiု’athakya aောkyathacya
chuṃ”ā”phaြင’ya ငါ”pā”sīlasaññya pātimokkhasaṃ0rasīla maññya၏． chamya”niုငyapāka raှcyapā”， kiု”pā”， chayyapā”
sīlatiု’kiုlaññya” thinya”simya”coင’yaraှောkyaramaññyasā phaြcyapesaññya．
2． indaြိyasaṃ0rasīla ---- maျkyaci-nā”-naှာ-laျှာ-kiုyya-citya hūso dhāra khaြောkyapā” taṅkhā”kaြီ” khaြောkya
pokyamaှ abhijjhā-domanassa = naှcyasakyamaှု-manaှcyasakyamaှုcaso akusiုlyaayutyatarā”tiု’ mavaငya
rokyaniုငyaaောငya samatha vipassanā bhā0nāhūso kammaṭṭhānya”āruṃtacyakhukhu athaငya”siု’ mimitiု’၏
cityakiု amaြဲshatyashaငya”thā”khaြငya”phaြင’ya thinya”simya”coင’yaraှောkyakhaြငya”saññya indaြိyasaṃ0rasīla maññya၏．
īindaြိyasaṃ0rasīla luṅkhaြုံre”kā” bhā0nāāruṃ tacyakhukhunaှင’ya kaငya”၍ phaြñña’yakaျင’ya၍ maracakoငya”pe．
siု’athakya asaငyayogā0cara puggiုlyasūmaြtyasaññya samādhithūthoငyakhiုkya samathanayyapayya၌sā raှိne
se”saññyaphaြcyaṃ’， mimiraှုphā”nesañña’ya samathaāruṃ athaငya”၌ mimi၏ bhā0nācityakiု shatyashaငya”laျkya
īsīlakiု luṅkhaြုံaောငya phaြñña’yakaျင’yaramaññya phaြcyasaññya． akayya၍ asaငyayogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya ānā
pānassatisamādhi bhā0nākiု phā”nesū phaြcyaṃ’， parikammanimitya uggahanimitya paṭibhāganimityahūso
ānāpāna samathanimityaāruṃtiု’thaငya mimirokyaraှိneso samathaāruṃnimitya၌ bhā0nācityakiု amaြဲ
shatyashaငya”laျkya ānāpānassati samādhibhā0nākiုsā phā”maျာ”neramaññya phaြcyapesaññya． akayya၍
asaငyayogīsūtoyakoငya”saññya vipassanāpiုငya”siု’ rokyaraှိnepāka saṅkhāratarā”tiု’၏ aniccaakhaြငya”
arā dukkhaakhaြငya”arā anattaakhaြငya”arākiု āruṃyū၍ anicca-dukkha-anatta lakkhaṇāre” suṃ”tanyakiု

537
tacyalaှñña’yacītaငya၍ thaငyathaငyakaြီ” vipassanāraှုneramaññya phaြcyasaññya． ī indaြိyasaṃ0rasīlakā” rahantā
aphaြcyasiု’ rokyaraှိpāmaှ apaြñña’yaacuṃ caငyakaြyyamaññya phaြcyapesaññya．
3． ājī0pārisuddhisīla ---- rahanya”toyamaျာ”athakya asakyamhe”vamya”kaြောငya”naှင’ya chakyacapya၍ bhurā”raှငya
paññatyatoyamūapyaso sikkhāpudyatiု’ raှိkaြ၏． yaငya”sikkhāpudyatiု’kiု malhanyakaျူ”bhaဲ， lūdāyakā dāyi
kāmatiု’ aṃ’oshā”aောငya aṃ’phhayyaamaျို”maျို”kiု paြုlupyakhaြငya”， aṃ’phhayyasaraဲ amaျို”maျို”kiု paြောkhaြငya”， paccaññya”
laှူaောငya aripyanimityakiု paြkhaြငya”， lābhyatacyakhuphaြင’ya lābhyatacyakhukiု raှာphhekhaြငya” - īsiု’ acaraှိkunya
so yutyamāso matarā”naññya”lamya”tiု’၏ achamya”phaြင’ya phaြcyapoyalākunyaso paccaññya” (4)pā”tiု’kiု
masuṃ”chaဲbhaဲ raှောငyakaြñyakhaြငya”saññya ājī0pārisuddhisīla maññya၏．
lūpuggiုlyamaျာ”aphiု’ - sū’asakyasatyakhaြငya”， sū’paccaññya” matarā”yūkhaြငya”， sū’sā”mayā”kiု phaျkyachī”khaြငya”
hūso kāyaducariုkyasuṃ”pā”， musā”paြောkhaြငya”， kunya”tiုkyakhaြငya”， kaြmya”tamya”so cakā”kiု paြောchiုkhaြငya”， paြိnya
phaျငya”so cakā”kiု paြောchiုkhaြငya”taññya” hūso 0cīducariုkya (4)pā” - īducariုkya (7)pā”tiု’kiု lhanyakaျူ”khaြငya”
kaြောင’ya raraှိso paccaññya”tiု’kiု masuṃ”chaဲbhaဲ raှောငyakaြñyakhaြငya”， lakyanakyakiု kunyashayyakhaြငya”， lūkiု kunyashayyakhaြငya”，
mhe”maြူre”lupyaငnya” paြုlupyalaျkya kunyashayyakhaြငya”， achipyakiု kunyashayyakhaြငya”， mū”yacyache”vā”kiု kunyashayyakhaြငya”
taññya”hūso kunyashayyakhaြငya” (5)maျို”tiု’phaြင’ya raraှိso paccaññya”tiု’kiု masuṃ”chaဲbhaဲ raှောငyakaြñyakhaြငya” -- īsiု’ kāya
ducariုkya， 0cīducariုkya， kunyashayyakhaြငya” (5)maျို”tiု’kaြောင’ya raraှိso paccaññya”tiု’kiု masuṃ”chaဲbhaဲ raှောငyakaြñyalaျkya
kunyashayyakhaြငya” layyalupyakhaြငya” casañña’ya caငyakaြyyaso asakyamhe”vamya”kaြောငya” lupyaငnya”rapyatiု’phaြင’ya asakya
mhe”khaြငya”saññya ājī0pārisuddhisīla maññya၏．
4． paccayasannissitasīla ---- paccaññya” (4)pā”kiု suṃ”chaဲrā၌ paccavekkhaṇāñāṇyaphaြင’ya chaငyakhaြငya၍ suṃ”chaဲkhaြငya”
hūso paṭisaṅkhānaparisuddha = paccavekkhaṇā chaငyakhaြငyakhaြငya”phaြင’ya caငyakaြyyaso paccaññya” (4)pā”kiု suṃ”
choငyakaြောငya”phaြcyaso apaြcyamaraှိso kusiုlyacetanā (rahantāaraှငyamaြtyatiု’athakya kaြိyā
cetanā) saññya paccayasannissitasīla maññya၏．
yogā0carapuggiုlyasūmaြtyasaññya īsīlakaြီ” (4)pā”kiု caငyakaြyyaaောငya phaြñña’yakaျင’yaniုငyapāka sīlavisuddhi
cakhanya”siု’ chiုkyapaြီ phaြcyapesaññya．
tattha sīlavisuddhi nāma suparisuddhaṃ pātimokkhasaṃ0rādicatubbidhaṃ sīlaṃ． (visuddhi-2-222．)
cittavisuddhi
cittavisuddhi nāma saupacārā aṭṭha samāpattiyo． (visuddhi-2-222．)
= upacārajhānya (= upacārasamādhi) naှင’yatakha phaြcyakunyaso samāpatya (8)pā”tiု’saññya cittavisuddhi maññya၏．
(visuddhi-2-222．)
upacārasamādhipi appanāsamādhi viya vipassanāya adhiṭṭhānabhā0to cittavisuddhiyevāti āha
“saupacārā”ti． veditabbāti attano santāne nibbattana0sene0 veditabbā． e0uှိ tā paccakkhato
viditā nāma honti， tasmā veditabbā sampādetabbāti vuttaṃ hoti． veditabbāti vā samāpattisukhādha
dgama0sena anubhavitabbāti attho． na hi ke0lena jānanamattena cittavisuddhiyaṃ patiṭṭhito
nāma hoti， na ca tattha apatiṭṭhāya uparivisuddhi H sampādetuṃ sakkāti． (mahāṭī-2-350．)
