upacārasamādhisaññyalaññya” appanājhānyasamādhikaဲ’siု’ vipassanāñāṇya၏ taññyarā phaြcyasokaြောင’ya
cittavisuddhi maññyasaññyasālaျှငya phaြcyapesaññya， thiုkaြောင’ya upacārasamādhinaှင’ya takha phaြcyakunyaso samāpatya
(8)pā”tiု’saññya cittavisuddhi maññya၏ - hu aṭṭhakathācharātoya mina’yachiုtoyamūkhaြငya” phaြcyapesaññya．
(mahāṭī-2-350．)
thiုupacārasamādhinaှင’yatakha phaြcyakunyaso samāpatya (8)pā”tiု’kiုlaññya” cityakiု aū”mūsaphaြင’ya phhaင’yachiု
re”sā”khaဲ’paြီ”kunyaso samādhiniddesapiုငya”၌ khapyasimya”so akhaြငya”arāā”phaြင’ya akaျyya phhaင’yachiုre”sā”
khaဲ’paြီ”sā phaြcyapesaññya． thiုkaြောင’ya thiုupacārasamādhinaှင’ya takha phaြcyakunyaso samāpatya (8)pā”tiု’kiု thiုsamādhi
kiု akaျyyapaြchiုrā samādhiniddesapiုငya”၌ akaျyya phhaင’yachiုapyakhaဲ’paြီ”sañña’ya naññya”atiုငya”sālaျှငya siraှိpāle =
paြñña’yacuṃaောငya kaြို”cā”ā”thutyapāle． (visuddhi-2-222．)
ī၌ veditabbā = siraှိpālehūsaññyamaှာ mimi၏ santānya၌ upacārasamādhinaှင’ya takha phaြcyakunyaso
samāpatya (8)pā”tiု’kiု phaြcyacesaññya၏ achamya”ā”phaြင’yasālaျှငya siraှိpālehu chiုliုpesaññya．
īsiု’ mimisantānya၌ phaြcyacesaññya၏ achamya”ā”phaြင’ya sikhaဲ’soya thiုupacārasamādhinaှင’ya takha phaြcyakunyaso
samāpatya (8)pā”tiု’kiု kiုyyatiုငyamaျkyamaှောkya paccakkhaā”phaြင’ya siapyasaññya maññyakunya၏． thiုkaြောင’ya upacāra
samādhinaှင’yatakha phaြcyakunyaso samāpatya (8)pā”tiု’kiု siapyakunya၏ paြñña’yacuṃcepyakunya၏hu chiုliုpesaññya．
(mahāṭī-2-350．)

shaငya”khaြငya” maññya၏． (mahāṭī-2-470．)
īkā” yebhuyaျ caññya”kamya”satyamaှtyakhaျkya phaြcyapesaññya．

2． rupyatarā”ka ca၍ simya”chaññya”liုpākalaññya” raraှိniုငya၏．
akayya၍ samathayānikapuggiုlyasaññya nāmyatarā”kaca၍ simya”chaññya”liုkhaဲ’soya simya”chaññya”puṃ canacyakiု

pariyesamāno tassa nissayaṃ hadayarūpaṃ passati． tato hadayarūpassa nissayabhūtāni， bhūtanissatāni

= thiု diṭṭhivisuddhikiု paြñña’yacuṃceliုso samathahūso jhānyayāñyaraှိso samathayānika yogā0cara

tiု’kā” vipassanāñāṇya၏ phaြcyarā taññyarā vipassanābhūmi tarā”maျာ”paငya phaြcyasokaြောင’yataññya”． yaငya”tarā”
tiု’kiု yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya pariññāpaññā suṃ”maျို”phaြင’ya piုငya”piုငya”khaြာ”khaြာ” siaောငya kaြို”pamya”niုငyapāmaှsālaျှငya
saṃsarāvaṭyachaငya”raဲdukkhakaြီ” kunyachuṃ”niုငyamaññya phaြcyakaြောငya”kiု bhurā”raှငyakiုyyatoyatiုငya aparijānanasuttanya (saṃ-2-249-250．)thaငya hokaြာ”thā”toyamūlaျkya raှိpesaññya．
veneyaျjjhāsaya
īarāvayya me”maြnya”phhayya raှိlāpaြnya၏． īsiု’laျှငya khandhā-āyatana-dhātya-saccā-paṭiccasamuppādyaāha
mra-acaraှိkunyaso maျာ”chākunyaso ītarā”tiု’kiု abhayyakaြောင’ya vipassanāñāṇya၏ phaြcyarātaññyarā
bhuṃ aphaြcyaphaြင’ya yūapyapākunyasanaññya”， īkhandhācasaññyatiု’thaငya tacyamaျို”taññya”phaြင’yasoyalaññya” magya-phiုlya-nibbānya
hūso liုapyaso akaျို”၏ paြီ”cī”paြñña’yacuṅkhaြငya”saññya phaြcyaniုငyasaññya mahutyapālohu me”ranya raှိ၏， maphaြcyaniုငya
hū၍paငya phaြcheiုlerāsaññya． akaြောငya”kā” suṃ”maျို” suṃ”cā” paြာ”so sattavātiု’kiု khaျီ”maြှောkyatoyamūranya
athakya khandhā (5)pā” raှုnaññya”， āyatana (12)pā”raှုnaññya”， dhātya (18)pā” raှုnaññya”maျာ”kiု bhurā”raှငya hokaြာ”
thā”toyamūsokaြောင’ya phaြcya၏．
kaျhatyathiုkyaso veneyaျ sattavātiု’kā” ----
1． rūpasammūḷaှာ = rupyatarā”၌ theveso sattavā ，
2． arūpasammūḷaှာ = nāmyatarā”၌ theveso sattavā ，
3． ubhayasammūḷaှာ = rupya-nāmyanaှcyapā”cuṃ၌ theveso sattavā ----
hu suṃ”maျို”suṃ”cā” raှိnepe၏． thiုsiု’ sattavātiု’maှာ suṃ”maျို”suṃ”cā” raှိnesaphaြင’ya khandhā (5)pā”naññya”ā”phaြင’ya
vipassanāraှုpuṃ casañña’ya tacyamaျို”maျို”lokyakiုsā yū၍ vipassanāraှုpuṃnaññya”canacyakiု hokaြာ”paြsatoyamūsaññya
raှိsoya aluṃ”cuṃso sattavātiု’ā” chakyachaṃso khaျီ”maြှောkyamaှုkiု paြုapyasaññya maphaြcyalerā．
1． arūpasammūḷaှာ ---- thiုsuṃ”maျို”so sattavātiု’thaငya akhaျို’so kaျhatyathiုkyasasū natyalū baြhmā veneyaျ
kaြာ sattavātiု’saññyakā” rupyatarā”naှင’ya patyasakya၍ asiñāṇya sana’yaraှငya”laျkya raှိkaြ၏， thevemaှု
maraှိkunya， nāmyatarā”naှင’ya patyasakya၍kā” asiñāṇya masana’yamaraှငya” thevenekaြ၏． thiုsattavātiု’athakya
khandhā (5)pā”naññya”phaြင’ya citya-cetasikya rupyatarā”tiု’kiု (5)puṃ puṃ၍ vipassanāraှုranya ññhaှnyakaြာ” paြsa
chiုchuṃ”matoyamūapyapesaññya． khandhā (5)pā”naññya”၌ ---- asiñāṇyasana’yaraှငya”paြီ” phaြcyaso rupyatarā”kiု
rupyakammaṭṭhānya”piုငya”
543
tacyacutacyapuṃ puṃ၍laññya”koငya”， asiñāṇya masana’yaraှငya”bhaဲ thevenesañña’ya nāmyatarā”tiု’kiု vedanā，
saññā， saṅkhāra， viññāṇyahu (4)puṃ puṃ၍laññya”koငya” vipassanāraှုranya ññhaှnyakaြာ”thā”toyamūpesaññya．
2． rūpasammūḷaှာ ---- akhaျို’so veneyaျsattavātiု’saññyakā” rupyatarā”၌ asiñāṇya masana’yaraှငya”bhaဲ theve
nekaြ၏， rupyatarā”maျာ”kiု khaြုံငုံ၍ simya”chaññya”raှုphā”maှု၌ akhakyaakhaဲmaျာ”chā raှိnekaြ၏． siု’soya nāmya
tarā”naှင’ya patyasakya၍kā” asiñāṇya sana’yaraှငya”laျkya raှိkaြ၏， thevemaှု maraှိkaြkunya． lhayyalhayyakūkū
mapaငyamapanya” maငြိုmaငြငya simya”chaññya”raှုphā”၍ ranekaြ၏． thiုsiု’ nāmyatarā”၌ asiñāṇya sana’yaraှငya”kaြ၍
rupyatarā”၌ asiñāṇya masana’yaraှငya”bhaဲ thevenesañña’ya sattavātiု’athakya āyatana desanātoya
naññya”phaြင’ya citya-cetasikya rupyatarā”tiု’kiု (12)puṃ puṃ၍ vipassanāraှုranya ññhaှnyakaြာ”paြsatoyamūpesaññya．
īāyatanadesanānaññya”၌ rupyatarā”maျာ”kiု (10)puṅkhhaဲ puṃ၍laññya”koငya”， nāmyatarā”maျာ”kiု (1)puṅkhhaဲ
puṃ၍laññya”koငya” vipassanāraှုranya ññhaှnyakaြာ”thā”toyamūsaññya．
3． ubhayasammūḷaှာ ---- akhaျို’so kaျhatyathiုkyasasū veneyaျ sattavātiု’saññyakā” rupya-nāmya naှcyamaျို”luṃ”၌
asiñāṇya masana’yaraှငya”bhaဲ thevenekaြ၏． thiုsiု’ rupya-nāmya naှcyamaျို”luṃ”၌ asiñāṇya masana’yaraှငya”bhaဲ
thevenekaြsañña’ya veneyaျtiု’athakya citya-cetasikya rupyatarā”tiု’kiု (18)puṃ puṃ၍ dhātya (18)pā”
naññya”phaြင’ya vipassanāraှုranya ññhaှnyakaြာ”paြsatoyamūpesaññya． ī dhātya (18)pā”naññya”၌ rupyatarā”maျာ”kiု
(10)puṅkhhaဲ puṃ၍laññya”koငya”， nāmyatarā”maျာ”kiု (7)puṅkhhaဲ puṃ၍laññya”koငya” vipassanāraှုranya bhurā”raှငya
ññhaှnyakaြာ”thā”toyamūsaññya． (mahāṭī-2-85 - kaြñña’ya．)
indaြိyabheda = indaြေ khaဲpaြာ”maှု
1． tikkhindaြိyā = thakyamaြkyaso indaြေ raှိso sattavā ，
2． majjhimindaြိyā = manuṃ’ mathakya alayyaalatya indaြေ raှိso sattavā ，
3． mudindaြိyā = nuṃ’so indaြreှိso sattavā ----
hu indaြိyabheda sabhoā”phaြင’ya sattavā suṃ”maျို” suṃ”cā” raှိ၏． thiုthaငya saddhā-vīriya-sati-samādhipaññā
hūso indaြေ (5)pā”tiု’ raင’yakaျkya၍ thakyamaြkyaneso veneyaျtiု’ā” khandhā (5)pā”naññya”phaြင’ya， manuṃ’
mathakya alayyaalatya indaြreှိso veneyaျtiု’ā” āyatana (12)pā”naññya”phaြင’ya， indaြneuṃ’so vene
yaျtiု’ā” dhātya (18)pā”naññya”phaြင’ya vipassanāraှုphā”ranya bhurā”raှငyasaññya ññhaှnyakaြာ”paြsatoyamūpesaññya．
(mahāṭī-2-85 - kaြñña’ya．)
ajjhāsayadhātya - akaြိုkyakhaျငya” matūññīsūmaျာ”
1． saṅkhittaruci ---- akaျñya”kiု naှcyasakyaso puggiုlya，
2． majjhimaruci ---- makaျñya”makaျyya alayyaalatyakiု naှcyasakyaso puggiုlya，
3． vitthāraruci ---- akaျyyakiု naှcyasakyaso puggiုlya ----
hu suṃ”maျို”suṃ”cā” raှိpaြnya၏．
thiုthaငya akaျñya”kiု kaြိုkyanaှcyasakyaso veneyaျtiု’ā” khandhā (5)pā”naññya”phaြင’ya， makaျñya” makaျyya
alayyaalatyakiု kaြိုkyanaှcyasakyaso veneyaျtiု’ā” āyatana (12)pā”naññya”phaြင’ya， akaျyyakiု kaြိုkya
naှcyasakyaso veneyaျtiု’ā” dhātya (18)pā”naññya”phaြင’ya vipassanā raှုphā”suṃ”sapyaranyaathakya bhurā”raှငyasaññya
ññhaှnyakaြာ”paြsape”toyamūpesaññya． (mahāṭī-2-85．)
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
544
satipaြုramañña’ya akhaျkya
khandhā (5)pā”naññya”， āyatana (12)pā”naññya”， dhātya (18)pā”naññya” - īsiု’casaññyaphaြင’ya veneyaျtiု’၏
aliုajjhāsayadhātyakhaṅkiု liုkya၍ vipassanāraှုkhakyakiု ññhaှnyakaြာ”paြsathā”soyalaññya” khandhā (5)pā”， āya
tana (12)pā”， dhātya (18)pā” hūsaññyamaှာ vipassanāñāṇya၏ araှုkhaṃāruṃphaြcyasañña’ya lokī citya-cetasikya
rupyatarā”maျာ”sā phaြcyakaြsaññyakiုkā” mame’pānaှင’ya， athū”satipaြုpāle． (5)puṃ， (12)puṃ， (18)puṃ hū၍ khaဲpaြာ”
maှု raှိsoyalaññya” mūraငya” paramatyaphaြcyaso citya-cetasikya rupyatarā”tiု’kā” tūññīlaျkyasā raှိpāsaññya．
khaဲpaြာ”maှုkā” maraှိpe．
indaြေ (22) pā”
citya-cetasikya rupyatarā”tiု’kiုpaငya (22)puṃ puṅkhaဲ’soya indaြေ (22)pā” phaြcyasaññya． lokuttarā indaြေ
thiုkyaso tarā”tiု’kiု payyanaှုtya၍ lokīindaြteiု’kiုlaññya” indaြိyadesanānaññya”ā”phaြင’ya vipassanāraှုranya
ññhaှnyakaြာ”thā”toyamū၏．
īindaြtheiုkyaso tarā”tiု’saññyakā” aciု”raso maငya”tiု’kaဲ’siု’ atūphaြcyakaြkunyaso sahajāta
tarā”tiု’၌ aciု”rasaññya၏ aphaြcyakiု akaြီ”amaှူ”၏ aphaြcyakiု akayya၍kā” phaြcyaceniုငyakaြkunya၏． siု’
soyalaññya” thiုaciု”rasaññya၏aphaြcya akaြီ”amaှူ”၏aphaြcyasaññya thiုindaြteiု’၏ dhammasabhā0 = tarā”dhammatiု’၏
paငyakiုraငya” dhammatāsabhoā”phaြင’ya paြီ”၏． īindaြtheiုkyaso tarā”tiု’၌ tacyacuṃtacyayokyaso puggiုlya
sattavā၏ aliုatiုငya” phaြcyamaှုsaññya maraှိsaññyasātaññya”， ītarā”tiု’saññya aciု”rasañña’ya attamaှ chityasuñya”
kaြkunya၏． attahūso mimi၏ aliုsiု’ maliုkyapātatyakaြkunya． īsiု’ anattalakkhaṇā anattañāṇyaamaြငya
kiု ralhayyacekhaြငya” akaျို”ငှာ indaြneññya”phaြင’ya vipassanāraှုranya bhurā”raှငyasaññya ññhaှnyakaြာ”maှုkiု paြုtoyamūpe
saññya． (mahāṭī-2-85 - kaြñña’ya．)
saccā naှင’ya paṭi ccasamuppādya
1． pavatti = phaြcyakhaြငya”sabho (= dukkhasaccātarā”)，
2． pavattihetu = phaြcyakaြောငya”sabho (= samudayasaccātarā”)，
3． nivatti = chutyanacyakhaြငya” = khaျုpyakhaြငya”sabho (= nirodhasaccātarā”)，
4． nivattihetu = chutyanacyakaြောငya” = khaျုpyakaြောငya”sabho (= maggasaccātarā”) ----
thiု khandhā-āyatana-dhātya-indaြေ hūso (4)maျို”so tarā”saññyalaññya” yaငya”tiု’၏ phaြcyakhaြငya”sabho
phaြcyakaြောငya”sabho khaျုpyakhaြငya”sabho khaျုpyakaြောငya”sabhohūso (4)maျို”so akhaြငya”arākiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya
kiုyyatiုငyamaျkyamaှောkya thhaငya”phokya simaြငyapāmaှsālaျှငya kaျေ”jū”kiု rhakyachoငyape”tatya၏． yaငya” (4)maျို”so
akhaြငya”arākiု mamaြငyasoyakā” akaျို”kaျေ”jū”kiု rhakyachoငya၍ mape”niုငya． thiုkaြောင’ya saccānaှင’ya paṭiccasamuppādya
naññya”ā”phaြင’ya vipassanā raှုphā”suṃ”sapyamaှုkiုlaññya” bhurā”raှငyasaññya thañña’yashaငya”၍ hokaြာ”thā”toyamūrape
saññya． (mahāṭī-2-85．)
siု’athakya khandhā (5)pā”naññya” casañña’ya tacyanaññya”naññya”phaြင’ya vipassanāraှုsoya liုapyaso akaျို”tarā”၏
paြီ”cī”paြñña’yacuṃmaှု phaြcyaniုငyasoyalaññya” suṃ”maျို”suṃ”cā”ā”phaြင’ya khaဲpaြာ”neso kaျhatyathiုkyasasū natya lū baြhmā

dhātya-caso vipassanāraှုnaññya” amaျို”maျို”kiု bhurā”raှငyasaññya hokaြာ”paြsa pe”toyamūkhaြငya” phaြcyapesaññya．
maññyasiု’paငya raှုpuṃcanacya khaဲpaြာ”cekāmū mūlaakhaြkheṃ vipassanāraှုphā” suṃ”sapyaramañña’ya paramatthadhātyasā”maျာ”maှာ

rupya (28) pā”
cittavisuddhicakhanya”maှ diṭṭhivisuddhicakhanya”siု’ kū”rā၌ samathayānikapuggiုlyaaphiု’ nāmyakammaṭṭhānya”kaca၍ ā”
sacyanaññya”， rupyakammaṭṭhānya”kaca၍ ā”sacyanaññya”hu naှcyanaññya” raှိrāthaငya rupyakammaṭṭhānya”ka ca၍ ā”sacyanaññya”
ā”thutyapuṅkiု yakhuchakyalakya၍ phoyapaြmaññya phaြcyapāsaññya． maphoyapaြmī yogā0carapuggiုlyatiု’ raှုphā”simya”chaññya”
ramañña’ya rupya (28)pā”kiု raှေ”ū”chā phoyapaြapyapāsaññya．
mahābhutya (= dhātyakaြီ”) le”pā”
1． pathavīdhātya
garupathavīaုpyacu lahupathavīaုpyacu
1． māmaှု ...sabho， 2． paျော’maှု ...sabho，
3． kaြmya”maှု ...sabho， 4． khaျောmaှု ...sabho，
5． le”maှု ...sabho， 6． po’maှု ...sabho，
katamaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ． pathavīdhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātu kakkhaḷaṃ mudukaṃ saṇaှံ pharusaṃ
garukaṃ lahukaṃ ...(abhi-1-170． dhammasaṅgaṇīpāḷitoya)
ettha ca “kakkhaḷaṃ mudukaṃ saṇaှံ pharusaṃ garukaṃ lahuka”nti padehi pathavīdhātu e0 bhājitā．
(abhi-ṭṭha-1-368， cāpiုdya-647．)
1． kakkhaḷanti thaddhaṃ = mā - maှုsabho，
2． mudukanti athaddhaṃ = paျော’ - maှုsabho，
3． pharusanti kharaṃ = kaြmya” - maှုsabho，
4． saṇaှnti maṭṭhaṃ = khaျော - maှုsabho，
5． garukanti bhāriyaṃ = le” - maှုsabho，
6． lahukanti abhāriyaṃ， sallahukanti attho = po’ - maှုsabho， (abhi-ṭṭha-1-368．)
2． āpodhātya
1． daြ0bhā0 = paggharaṇalakkhaṇā = yiုcī”maှုsabho，
2． ābandhanabhā0 = ābandhanalakkhaṇā = phhaဲ’caññya”maှုsabho，
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
546
3． tejodhātya
1． (ka) uṇaှbhā0 = uṇaှtejo = pūmaှုsabho，
( kha ) sītabhā0 = sītatejo = aေ”maှုsabho，
2． paripācanabhā0 = raင’yakaျkyacemaှုsabho，
4． vāyodhātya
1． vitthambhanabhā0 = thokyakanyamaှုsabho，
2． samudīraṇabhā0 = thanya”kanyamaှုsabho，
pasādarupya = akaြññyarupya = akaြññyadhātya ငါ”pā”
1． cakkhupasāda = maျkyaci akaြññya，
2． sotapasāda = nā” akaြññya，
3． ghānapasāda = naှာ akaြññya (= naှာkhoငya”akaြññya)，
4． jivaှါpasāda = laျှာ akaြññya，
5． kāyapasāda = kiုyya akaြññya (= tacyakiုyyaluṃ”၌ paျံ’naှံ’၍ taññya၏．)，
gocararupya = āruṃrupya (7) maျို”
1． rūpāruṃ = aroငya = achaငya” = vaṇṇa，
2． saddāruṃ = asaṃ，
3． gandhāruṃ = anaṃ’，
4． rasāruṃ = arasā，
5． phoṭṭhabbāruṃ = athe’athi (= pathavī， tejo， vāyo．)，
««maှtyakhaျkya ---- pathavī， tejo， vāyo - īdhātyakaြီ”suṃ”pā”kiုpaငya the’thi၍ racakoငya”sokaြောင’ya
phoṭṭhabbadhātyahu khoyachiုsaphaြင’ya gocararupya (7)maျို”phaြcyasaññya． rupya (28)pā” rethakyarā၌kā” pathavī， tejo，
vāyotiု’saññya dhātyakaြီ” (4)pā”၌ thañña’yashaငya” rethakyathā”paြီ” phaြcya၍ rethakyapaြီ”saññyakiု thapyamaṃ၍

1． kabaḷīkāraāhāra = cā”maျိုapyaso acāāhāra၌ pāvaငyataññyaraှိso achīace” anaှcyaojā，
««kammajarupyakalāpya cittajarupyakalāpya utujarupyakalāpyatiု’၌laññya” rupyakalāpyatiုငya” rupyakalāpyatiုငya”
vayya ojārupyamaျာ” pāvaငyalaျkyapaငya raှိ၏． (rupyakammaṭṭhānya”jayā”maျာ”thaငya kaြñña’yapā．) kammajaojā cittajaojā

ceranyaathakya anaññya”ငyya raှငya”laငya”taငyapaြapyapāsaññya． cā”maျိုapyaso acāāhāramaှnyasamaျှsaññya macā”mī

raှိ utu khoyasañña’ya tejodhātyakaြောင’ya chaင’yakaဲ thapyachaင’ya phaြcyaphā”nekaြso utujaojaṭṭhamakarupyatiု’sā
phaြcyakaြ၏．

yaငya”utujaojaṭṭhamakarupyatiု’thaငya pāvaငyaso ojākiု kabaḷīkāra āhārahu (abhi-ṭṭha-1-366．)၌
khoyavoyasuṃ”chaဲthā”pesaññya． yaငya”kabaḷīkāra āhāra amaññyaraso cā”maျိုliုkyaso acāāhārathaငya

548
kāra āhāra amaññyaraso ojākaြောင’ya phaြcyasokaြောင’ya yaငya”rupyatarā”apoငya”kiု āhārajarupyahu
khoyathaငyasaññya， āhārasamuṭṭhānyahulaññya” khoyasaññya． (visuddhi-2-251．) yaငya”āhārasamuṭṭhānyarupyamaျာ”thaငya
pāvaငyataññyaraှိso ojākā” āhāraojātaññya”． yaငya”āhārajaojā၏ ā”pe”thokyapaṃ’maှုkiု rakhaဲ’soya
kammajaojā-cittajaojā-utujaojātiု’kalaññya” ojaṭṭhamakarupyakalāpya asacyaasacyakiု chaင’yakaဲchaင’yakaဲ
phaြcyaceniုငyapaြnya၏．
tacyaphanya ---- ekadi0saṃ paribhuttāhāro sattāhampi upatthambheti． (visuddhi-2-251．)
= tacyane’ cā”maျိုthā”apyaso āhārasaññya khunacyarakyapatyaluṃ”soyalaññya” ā”pe” thokyapaṃ’thā”niုငya၏
hu chiုsaphaြင’ya tacyakaြိmya cā”suṃ”liုkyaso kabaḷīkāraāhāra ojāsaññya kammajavamya”mī”၏ athokyaapaṃ’
kiု rakhaဲ’soya khunacyarakyatiု’ patyaluṃ”soyalaññya” āhārasamuṭṭhānyarupyamaျာ”kiု achakyamapaြtya phaြcyaceniုငya၏．
siု’athakya raှေ”raှေ” āhārajaojaṭṭhamakarupyakalāpyatiု’thaငya pāvaငyaso ojākalaññya” nokyanokyaso
āhārajaojaṭṭhamaka rupyakalāpyatiု’thaငya pāvaငyaso ojā၏ ā”pe”thokyapaṃ’maှုkiု rakhaဲ’soya (10)chaင’ya
(12)chaင’yasiု’ tiုငyaaောငyaso rupyakalāpya asacyaasacyakiု chaင’yakaဲchaင’yakaဲ phaြcyaceniုငyapaြnya၏．
īathakyapā raှငya”laငya”khaျkyamaျာ”ara catusamuṭṭhānikaojā၏ āhārakiccakiု paြုlupyachoငyarhakyarā၌
tacyanaññya”chiုrasoya catusamuṭṭhānikaojā၏ āhārajarupyakalāpya asacyaasacyakiု phaြcyacerā၌ kabaḷīkāra
āhārajaojā = āhārasamuṭṭhānyaojā၏ athokyaapaṃ’kiု maှီrapesaññya． thiု’kaြောင’ya aṭṭhakathā
charātoyaka ----
kabaḷaṃ karithā ajjhoharitabbavatthukattā vā kabaḷīkāroti nāmametaṃ tassa．
(abhi-ṭṭha-3-377．)
= thamaငya”lutyacasañña’ya alutyaalhe”kiု paြုlupya၍ cā”maျိုthiုkyaso acāhūso taññyarāraှိsaññya၏
aphaြcyakaြောင’ya kabaḷīkārahūso īamaññyasaññya thiုcatusamuṭṭhānikaojā hūso āhāra၏ amaññya
taññya”hu dutiyatacyanaññya” phhaင’yachiုthā”pesaññya． athakyapā raှငya”laငya”khaျkyakā” īaṭṭhakathā၏ dutiyaaphhaင’ya
naှင’ya aññī phaြcyapāsaññya．
kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo． (paṭṭhāna-1-7．)
kabaḷīkāro āhāroti catusantatisamuṭṭhāne rūpe ojā āhāro nāma．
(abhi-ṭṭha-3-377．)
īpāḷitoya aṭṭhakathātiု’၏ mina’yachiုtoyamūkhaျkyaara kammajaojā cittajaojā utujaojā āhāraja
ojāhūso le”maျို”luṃ”so ojāsaññyapaငya kabaḷīkāra āhāra maññyasaññyahu maှtyapā．
cā”maျိုthiုkyaso acāsacyahūsañña’ya utujaojaṭṭhamakarupyatiု’၏ apoငya”acukā” mukhaျā”phaြင’ya kabaḷī

so ojākaြောင’ya ojaṭṭhamakarupyatiု’ phaြcyakaြ၏， āhāraja ojaṭṭhamakarupyatiု’taññya”． yaငya”tiု’thaငya pāvaငyaso
ojākā” āhārajaojātaññya”． yaငya”āhārajaojā၏ ā”pe”thokyapaṃ’maှုphaြင’ya kammajaojā cittajaojā
utujaojā raှေ”raှေ”so āhārajakalāpyatiု’thaငya pāvaငyaso āhārajaojāsaññya āhārakiccakiု
choငyarhakyaniုငyasaphaြင’ya yaငya” catusamuṭṭhānikaojāsaññya cā”maျိုapyaso kabaḷīkāra āhāralaျှငya taññyarā
raှိsokaြောင’ya ṭhānūpacāraā”phaြင’ya kabaḷīkāra āhāra amaññyarasaññya． akaျyyakiု āhārajarupya phaြcyapuṃ
piုငya”thaငya raှုpā．»»

rupyaacacya (18) pā”
īathakyaphoyapaြpā (18)maျို”so rupyatarā”tiု’kiု kakkhaḷatta = khakyamāmaှု caso mimi mimi၏ uccā
phaြcyaso kiုyyapiုငyasabhā0lakkhaṇā = paramatthadhammasabhā0satti kiုyyacīpāsokaြောင’ya sabhā0rupyahulaññya”
khoyasaññya． (1)
1． phaြcyapaြီ”laျှငya paျkyaso akhaြငya”arāhūso aniccatā，
2． phaြcyakhaြငya” paျkyakhaြငya”phaြင’ya anaှိpyacakyakhaṃraso akhaြငya”arāhūso dukkhatā，
3． mapaျkyacī”bhaဲ akaျိtyaakhaဲ akhiုငyaamā anaှcyasāraā”phaြင’ya taññyanesañña’ya atta maraှိ maှု akhaြငya”arā
hūso anattatā ---
īsiု’ caso rupya-nāmya paramatthadhātyasā” ā”luṃ”naှင’ya sakyachiုငyaso amaျာ”chiုငya sāmaññalakkhaṇā
raှိsokaြောင’ya salakkhaṇarupyahulaññya” khoyasaññya． (2)
kaṃ-citya-utu-āhāra hūso akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’saññya phaြcyacepyasokaြောင’ya nipphannarupyahulaññya”
khoyasaññya． (3)
rupyachiုsañña’yaatiုငya” raှေ”kaphaြcyashā”so rupyaacīacañyanaှင’ya matūbhaဲ tacyamaျို”tacyaphuṃ paြောငya”laဲ၍ asacya
asacya phaြcyatatyasokaြောင’ya = phokyapaြnyatatyasokaြောင’ya rūparūpa = rūparupyahulaññya” khoyasaññya． rupyachiုmaှ
takaya’ya rupyaacacyahu chiုliုsaññya． (4)
anicca dukkha anattahu lakkhaṇāyāñyasuṃ”khaျkya taငya၍ suṃ”sapyakoငya”sokaြောင’ya = vipassanā bhā0-
nākammaṭṭhānya” cī”phaြnya”၍ raှုphā”၍ rakoငya”sokaြောင’ya sammasana = saṃmasanarupyahulaññya” khoyasaññya． (5)
aောkyathaငya chakyalakyaphoyapaြmañña’ya kaျnyarupyaatu (10)maျို”tiု’kā” thiုkaဲ’siု’ mahutya၍ (1) asabhā0
rupya， (2) alakkhaṇarupya， (3) anipphannarupya， (4) arūparupya， (5) asammasanarupya = asaṃmasanarupyamaျာ”taññya”．
anipphannarupya = rupyaatu (10) maျို”
paricchedarupya (1) pā”
1． ākāsadhātya ---- rupyakalāpyatiု’kiု tacyakhunaှင’ya tacyakhu maroyaှkyaraaောငya piုငya”khaြာ”tatyaso rupya
kalāpyatiု’kiု piုငya”khaြာ”kaြောငya”phaြcyaso rupyakalāpyatiု’၏ akaြာ”apokya phaြcyasaññya． yaငya” ākāsa
dhātyakiု rupyakalāpyatiု’kiု piုငya”khaြာ”kaြောငya” phaြcyasokaြောင’ya paricchedarupyahulaññya” khoyasaññya．
viññatyarupya (2) pā”
1． kāyaviññatya = kiုyyaphaြင’ya sicetatyaso kiုyyaamūarā，
2． 0cīviññatya = naှုtyaphaြင’ya (= cakā”saṃphaြင’ya) sicetatyaso naှုtyaamūarā，
viññatya --- mimi၏ athaငya”sabho aliုchandakiု sūtacyapā”ā” sicetatya siceniုငyaso amūarā
athū”kiု viññatyarupyahu khoya၏． kāyaviññatyahūsaññya mimi၏ athaငya”sabho aliုchandakiု sūtacyapā”ā”
kiုyyaphaြင’ya sicetatyaso amūarātaññya”， upamā lakyayamya”paြ၍ khoyakhaြငya” casaññyataññya”． ． 0cīviññatya
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
550
hūsaññya naှုtyaphaြင’ya (= cakā”saṃphaြင’ya) mimi၏ athaငya”sabho aliုchandakiု sūtacyapā”ā” sicetatyaso
amūarātaññya”． upamā - lāpāhu naှုtyaphaြင’ya (= cakā”saṃphaြင’ya) khoyavoyakhaြငya”maျို”taññya”．
lakyayamya”၍ paြrā၌ lāceliုso mimi၏ athaငya”sabho aliုchandakiု sūtacyapā”ka siniုငyakhaြငya”saññya
lakyayapyakhoyaliုkyasaññyathaငya pāvaငyaneso kāyaviññatyarupya၏ achamya”taññya”． lāpāhu asaṅkiု paြုrā၌
lāceliုso mimi၏ athaငya”sabho aliုchandakiု sūtacyapā”ka siniုငyakhaြငya”saññya thiုasaṃthaငya pāvaငyaso
0cīviññatyarupya၏ achamya”taññya”hu maှtyapā． ． sakyamaဲ’ arāvatthutiု’၏ laှုpyaraှာ”maှု၌ thiုsiု’ masiniုငyakhaြငya”maှာ thiု
viññatyarupyamaျာ”၏ sakyamaဲ’arāvatthutiု’၏ laှုpyaraှာ”maှု၌ maraှိsokaြောင’yahu achiုraှိ၏． kāyaviññatya 0cīviññatya
rupyatiု’kā” cityakaြောင’ya phaြcyarakā” sakyamaဲ’arāvatthutiု’၌ cityamaraှိsokaြောင’ya thiုviññatyarupyamaျာ”saññya sakyamaဲ’
rupyatiု’၌ mataññyaniုငyakhaြငya” phaြcyasaññya．
vikārarupya (5) pā”
1． lahutā = (ka) cityakaြောင’yaphaြcyaso rupyatiု’၏ po’maှုsabho，
( kha ) utukaြောင’yaphaြcyaso rupyatiု’၏ po’maှုsabho，
( ga ) āhārakaြောင’yaphaြcyaso rupyatiု’၏ po’maှုsabho，
2． mudutā = (ka) cityakaြောင’yaphaြcyaso rupyatiု’၏ nū”ññaṃ’maှုsabho，
( kha ) utukaြောင’yaphaြcyaso rupyatiု’၏ nū”ññaṃ’maှုsabho，
( ga ) āhārakaြောင’yaphaြcyaso rupyatiု’၏ nū”ññaṃ’maှုsabho，
3． kammaññatā = (ka) cityakaြောင’yaphaြcyaso rupyatiု’၏ amaှု၌ koငya”mhanyakhaṃ’ññā”maှုsabho，
( kha ) utukaြောင’yaphaြcyaso rupyatiု’၏ amaှု၌ koငya”mhanyakhaṃ’ññā”maှုsabho，
( ga ) āhārakaြောင’yaphaြcyaso rupyatiု’၏ amaှု၌ koငya”mhanyakhaṃ’ññā”maှုsabho，
īlahutā， mudutā， kammaññatā - rupyasuṃ”maျို”naှင’ya viññatyarupya naှcyamaျို”poငya” ငါ”maျို”so rupyakiု vikāra
rupyahu khoyasaññya． thū”thhekhaြာ”nā”so amūarārupyamaျာ”hu chiုliုsaññya．
lakkhaṇarupya (4) pā”
1． upacaya = (ka) bha0tacyakhu၌ rupyaacacyatiု’၏ raှေ”ū”aca phaြcyakhaြငya”sabho，
( kha ) indaြေ paြñña’yacuṃsaññyatiုငyaaောငya = bha0tacyakhu၌ rathiုkyasamaျှso rupyamaျာ” apaြñña’yaacuṃ
phaြcyasaññyatiုငyaaောငya rupyaacacyatiု’၏ athakyaathakya၌ tiု”takya၍ phaြcyakhaြငya”sabho，
2． santati = bha0tacyakhu၌ indaြpeြñña’yacuṃpaြီ”nokya rupyaacacyatiု’၏ raှေ”naှင’yanokya acañyamapaြtya chakyacapya
laျkya athapyathapya phaြcyakhaြငya”sabho，

lhayyakūchāpaငya laျှောkaျshā”tatyasaññyakiု the’ra၏． thiုakhāmaျို”၌ khaျောmaှုsabhokiု dhātyakhaျငya” ññīmaျှmaှုraှိ
saññyatiုငyaaောငya paြောငya”၍ ciုkyaraှုra၏．
tacyakhātacyaraṃ le”maှုsabhoka lhanyakaဲlātatyapaြnya၏． samādhiā”makoငya”mī ငြိmyasakyachā iriyā
puthyakiု thā”၍ kaြာraှññyachā thiုငyanepāka le”maှုsabhotarā”maှာ lhanyakaဲlātatyapesaññya． thiုakhāmaျို”၌
po’maှုsabhokiု dhātyakhaျငya” ññīmaျှshā”aောငya paြောငya”၍ ciုkyaraှုra၏．
tacyakhātacyaraṃ samādhi alhanyaā”koငya”lāsoakhāvayya po’maှု sabhotarā”saññya alhanya thaငyaraှာ”
lātatyapaြnya၏， lethaဲ၌ lhaင’yanesakaဲ’siု’ phaြcyanetatya၏． thiုakhāmaျို”၌laññya” liုapyaso samādhiachaင’yasiု’
lhayyakūchā marokyaniုငya phaြcyanetatya၏． po’maှုsabho ā”koငya”၍ lhaင’yatakyanesoakhāmaျို”၌kā”
le”maှုsabhokiု paြောငya”၍ ciုkyaraှုliုkyapāka ငြိmyasakyashā”tatya၏， dhātyaññīmaျှshā”tatya၏， samādhiaphaြcya
maြnyalātatya၏．
alā”tūpaငya tacyakhātacyaraṃ paျော’maှုsabhotarā”ka alhanyathaငyaraှာ”lātatyapaြnya၏． ghamya”puṅkaဲ’siု’ rhaှံ’paျော’
kaဲ’siု’ muna’yakaျhaဲsaññya”kaဲ’siု’ tacyakiုyyaluṃ” alhanyapaျော’khhenetatya၏． thiုငyathā”sañña’ya kaြmya”athaငya”siု’ vaငyalu
matatya paျော’aိnetatya၏． thiုakhāmaျို”၌ māmaှုsabhokiု paြောငya”၍ raှုkhaြငya”phaြင’ya dhātyakhaျငya” ññīmaျှaောငya
thinya”pe”ra၏．
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
566
tacyakhātacyaraṃ paျော’maှုsabhotarā”naှင’ya thaဲ၍ khaျောmhe’maှုsabhotarā”ka alhanyathaငyaraှာ”lātatyapaြnya၏．
khaျောmhatyasañña’ya athe’athikaြောငya bhā0nā၌ sāyāmaှု nikantimaျာ” vaငyalātatya၏， samādhi၏ antarāyyapaငya
phaြcyasaññya． thiုakhāmaျို”၌ māmaှု-kaြmya”maှုtiု’kiု tacyaphanyapaြnya၍ raှုkhaြငya”phaြင’ya dhātyakhaျငya” ññīmaျှshā”aောငya paြုkaျင’yape”
ra၏．
siု’athakya aṭṭhakathā ṭīkātiု’၌ pathavīdhātyavayya māmaှု-kaြmya”maှု sabhotarā”naှcyamaျို”kiုsā raှုkhakya
aphaြcya phoyapaြthā”soyalaññya” īkaျmya”၌kā” dhammasaṅgaṇīpāḷitoyagatisiု’ liုkya၍ pathavīdhātya၌ (6)maျို”luṃ”
raှုranya ññhaှnyakaြာ”thā”khaြငya” phaြcyapesaññya．
me”maြnya”phhayya akhaျkyatacyarapya
mahārāhulovādasuttanya caso desanātoyamaျာ”၌ pathavīdhātyavayya kakkhaḷa-kharigata = māmaှုkaြmya”
maှု hūso dhātyasabhotarā” naှcyamaျို”kiုsā maျာ”soā”phaြင’ya bhurā”raှငyahokaြာ”thā”toyamū၏．
siု’athakya aṭṭhakathā-ṭīkātiု’kalaññya” pathavīdhātya၌ māmaှု-kaြmya”maှု naှcyamaျို”kiုsā raှုkhakyaaphaြcya maျာ”so
ā”phaြင’ya phoyapaြle’ raှိkaြ၏． siု’soya dhammasaṅgaṇīpāḷitoya၌kā” athakyathaငya phoyapaြkhaဲ’sañña’yaatiုငya” pathavī
dhātyavayya mā-kaြmya”-le”， paျော’-khaျော-po’ hu sabhotarā” (6)maျို” hokaြာ”thā”toyamū၏． thiုsiု’
hokaြာ”pāmaှ naှcyakhaြိုkyasabhokaျkaြmañña’ya natyabaြhmātiု’၏ ajjhāsayadhātyasiု’ liုkya၍ (6)maျို” khhaဲkhaြာ”laျkya
hokaြာ”toyamūkhaြငya” phaြcyapesaññya．
yaငya”siု’ phaြcyalaျှငya desanātoyanaှcyamaျို”saññya tacyamaျို”naှင’ya tacyamaျို” matūkhaဲpaြာ” khaြာ”nā”lesalohu
me”ranya raှိlāpaြnya၏． aphaြko” desanātoyanaှcyamaျို”saññya tacyamaျို”naှင’ya tacyamaျို” matūkhaဲpaြာ” khaြာ”nā”maှု maraှိbhaဲ
tūññīlaျkyapaငya raှိsaññyahū၏． lokaupamāā”phaြင’ya chiုpeṃ’． ----
1． alhanya nū”ññaṃ’ paျော’paျောငya”neso rhaှံ’tuṃ”tacyakhu，
2． mī”phutyapaြီ” kaျkyaneso aုtyakhaဲtacyakhu，
3． alhanyamāneso lipyasaဲkaျောkyatuṃ” kaျောkyakhaဲkaြီ”tacyakhu ----
hu atuṃ”akhaဲkaြီ” (3)khu raှိsaññya chiုkaြciု’．
thiု (3)maျို”tiု’thaငya rhaှံ’tuṃ”rhaှံ’khaဲthakya aုtyakhaဲka piု၍ mā၏， aုtyakhaဲthakya lipyasaဲkaျောkyakhaဲkaြီ”ka piု၍
mā၏． aုtyakhaဲsaññya rhaှံ’tuṃ”rhaှံ’khaဲnaှင’ya tiုငya”tānaှိုငya”cāliုkyasoya rhaှံ’tuṃ”rhaှံ’khaဲka paျော’၏， aုtyakhaဲka mā၏． tacyaphanya
aုtyakhaဲsaññya lipyasaဲkaျောkyakhaဲnaှင’ya tiုငya”tānaှိုငya”cāliုkyasoya aုtyakhaဲka paျော’၏， lipyasaဲkaျောkyakhaဲka mā၏-
hu chiုra၏．
aုtyakhaဲsaññya rhaṃ’khaဲnaှင’ya naှိုငya”cāliုkyasoakhā mā၏-hu chiုrasoyalaññya” lipyasaဲkaျောkyakhaဲnaှင’ya naှိုငya”cā
liုkyasoakhā paျော’၏-hu tacyaphanya chiုrapaြnya၏． siု’athakya māmaှု-paျော’maှု hūsaññya arāvatthu naှcyakhutiု’kiု
naှိုငya”yaှñyakaြñña’yaliုkyasoakhāmaှ phaြcyapoyalāso caṃtacyamaျို” phaြcyasaññya． arāvatthutacyakhukiု thokyacha၍
māsaññyahu chiုrasoyalaññya” arāvatthutacyakhukiု thokyachaliုkyapāka paျော’saññyahu chiုrapaြnya၏． maññyamaျှ paျော’
saññyahu chiုraso arāvatthukiုpaငyaphaြcyace sesekhaျာkhaျာ the’thikaြñña’yapāka thiုarāvatthunaှင’ya thiုkyatanya
salokya māmaှုsabhokā” raှိlaျkyapaငya phaြcyasaññya． alhanya paျော’paျောငya” nū”ññaṃ’saññyahu satyamaှtyathā”so
rhaှံ’tuṃ”kiုpaငya the’thikaြñña’yapā． sūnaှင’ya thiုkyatanyasalokya māmaှု sabhokiုkā” the’raှိmaññyasā phaြcyapesaññya．
naññya”naññya” māmaှုsabhokiု paျော’saññyahu suṃ”chaဲ၍ maျာ”maျာ”māmaှု sabhokiု māsaññyahu suṃ”chaဲnekhaြငya” phaြcya၏．
rupyakammaṭṭhānya”piုငya”
567
tacyaphanya kaြmya”maှု-khaျောmaှု sabhokiုlaññya” chanya”cacyakaြñña’yapā．
1． alhanya khaျောmhe’so aṅkaျီpityaca tacyakhu，
2． puchiု” luṅkhaျññyakhaျော tacyakhu，
3． gunyanīaိtya tacyakhu ---
raှိkaြsaññya chiုkaြciု’．
puchiု”naှင’ya aṅkaျီkiု naှိုငya”cā tiုငya”tākaြñña’yaliုkyapāka aṅkaျီka khaျောsaññya， puchiု”ka kaြmya”saññyahu chiု
ra၏． tacyaphanya puchiု”naှင’ya gunyanīaိtyakiု naှိုငya”cātiုငya”tākaြñña’yaliုkyapāka puchiု”ka khaျောsaññya， gunyanīaိtyaka
kaြmya”saññyahu chiုrapaြnya၏． siု’athakya puchiု”saññya gunyanīaိtyanaှင’ya naှိုငya”yaှñyakaြñña’yaliုkyasoakhā khaျောsaññyahu
chiုrasoyalaññya” aṅkaျီnaှင’ya naှိုငya”yaှñyakaြñña’yaliုkyaso akhā၌mūkā” kaြmya”saññyahupaငya chiုrapaြnya၏． arāvatthu
tacyakhutaññya”kiုpaငya akhaြာ”vatthunaှင’ya naှိုငya”yaှñya kaြñña’yaliုkyasoakhā kaြmya”saññya khaျောsaññyahūso amaññya
naှcyamaျို”kiု raraှိniုငyalā၏． akaြောငya”mū -- maññyamaျှkhaျောsaññyahu chiုrasoyalaññya” thiုarāvatthunaှင’ya thiုkyatanya
salokya kaြmya”tamya”maှုkā” raှိsaññyasā phaြcyasaññya． alhanyakhaျောsaññyahu chiုraso aṅkaျီkiုpaငya camya”sapya
kaြñña’yapāka aṅkaျီnaှင’ya tanyasalokya kaြmya”tamya”maှုkā” raှိlaျkyapaငya phaြcyasaññya． siု’athakya naññya”naññya” kaြmya”
saññyakiု khaျောsaññyahu khoyavoyasuṃ”chaဲ၍ maျာ”maျာ”kaြmya”saññyakiု kaြmya”saññyahu khoyavoyasuṃ”chaဲkhaြငya” phaြcyasaññya．
alā”tūpaငya le”maှုnaှင’ya po’maှုtiု’၌laññya” sabhopokyapāle． maျာ”maျာ”le”saññyakiု le”saññyahu
khoyavoyasuṃ”chaဲ၍ naññya”naññya”le”saññyakiု po’saññyahu khoyavoyasuṃ”chaဲkhaြငya” phaြcya၏． arāvatthutiုငya”၌ arā
vatthunaှင’ya thiုkyatanyasalokya ale”khaျိnyakā” raှိlaျkyapaငya phaြcyasaññya． māmaှု-kaြmya”maှု tiု’၌ ale”khaျိnyakā”
kapya၍ pāmaြဲsā phaြcyasaññya．
thiုkaြောင’ya suttanyadesanātoyaamaျာ”cu၌ya pathavīdhātyavayya māmaှုnaှင’ya kaြmya”maှု naှcyamaျို”kiုsā bhurā”raှငya
hotoyamūkhaြငya” phaြcyasaññya． aṭṭhakathā-ṭīkātiု’kalaññya” thiုsiု’ phhaင’yachiုkhaြငya”paငya phaြcyasaññya．
āpodhātya ---- tacyakhātacyaraṃ yiုcī”maှု sabhotarā” lhanyakaဲlātatyapaြnya၏． khandhāaိmya athaငya”vayya
remaျာ” dalaho cī”chaငya”nesañña’yaalā” yiုcī”maှု alhanya paြငya”paြငya”thanyathanya phaြcyanetatya၏． thiုakhāmaျို”၌
yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ santānyavayya cityalaှုpyaraှာ”maှုmaျာ” phaြcyapoyalātatya၏， raငyathaဲ၌ maငြိmyasakyaso khaṃcā”
maှုmaျာ” poyalātatya၏． raraှိpaြီ” samādhisaññya paျkyapaြာ”shā”tatya၏． thiုakhāvayya phhaဲ’caññya”maှုsabhokiု ū”cā”
pe”၍ naှluṃ”shaငya”liုkyapāka yiုcī”maှုsabhomaှာ laျော’shā”tatya၏．
alā”tūpaငya tacyakhātacyaraṃ phhaဲ’caññya”maှု sabhotarā”ka alhanya ā”koငya”lātatyapaြnya၏． asakyaraှူ
kaြpyalātatya၏， asakyaraှူliု’ ma0niုငya phaြcyanetatya၏， samādhi paျkyashā”tatya၏． thiုakhāmaျို”၌ yiုcī”maှု sa
bhokiု paြောငya”၍ ū”cā”pe”laျkya naှluṃ”shaငya”pe”pāka phhaဲ’caññya”maှုsabhotarā”saññya laျော’shā”tatyapesaññya．
yiုcī”maှု phhaဲ’caññya”maှု naှcyamaျို”tiု’saññya ññīmaျှmaှုraှိsoya samādhilaññya” aphaြcyamaြnyalātatyapesaññya．
tejodhātya ---- tacyakhātacyaraṃ pūmaှုsabhotarā”maျာ”ka alhanyaā”koငya”lātatya၏， makhaṃmarapyaniုငya
phaြcyalātatya၏， khaျhe”sī” khaျhe”pokyamaျာ” kaျlātatya၏． thiုakhāmaျို”vayya samādhilaññya” laျှောkaျshā”tatya
paြnya၏． siု’athakya apūdhātya lhanyakaဲlāsoya aေ”maှုsabhotarā”kiု ū”cā”pe”၍ naှluṃ”shaငya”pe”ra၏．
dhātyaññīmaျှaောငya paြုpaြငyape”ra၏．
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
568
tacyakhātacyaraṃ aေ”maှုka lhanyakaဲlātatyapaြnya၏， khandhākiုyyatacyakhuluṃ” aေ”cakya၍ toင’yataငya” khiုငyamā
netatya၏． thiုakhāmaျို”၌ pūmaှုnaှင’ya paျော’maှုkiု ū”cā”pe”၍ tacyalaှñña’yacī raှုnepāka dhātyaññīmaျှshā”tatyapesaññya．
dhātyaññīmaျှmaှု raှိpāka sukhavedanā aphaြcyamaျာ”၍ pīti passaddhimaျာ”laññya” vaငyalātatya၏， samādhilaññya” takyalā
tatyapesaññya．
vāyodhātya ---- tacyakhātacyaraṃ thanya”kanyamaှု sabhotarā”ka lhanyakaဲlā၍ tacyakiုyyaluṃ” yimya”yiုငya
laှုpyaraှာ”maှု sipyaā”koငya”lāsoya thokyakanyamaှုsabhokiု paြောငya”၍ ū”cā”pe”kā ciုkyaraှုra၏． tacyakhā
tacyaraṃ thokyakanyamaှု sabhotarā”ka lhanyakaဲlāpaြnya၍ tacyakiုyyaluṃ” laှုpyamara phaြcyanekhaဲ’soya thanya”kanyamaှု
sabhotarā”kiု ū”cā”pe”၍ paြောငya”paြီ” naှluṃ”shaငya” raှုphā”liုkyapāka thokyamaှုnaှင’ya thanya”maှုtiု’maှာ ññīmaျှlā
tatya၏．
tacyakhātacyaraṃ thanya”kanyamaှုsabhotarā”ka alhanyaā”koငya”ne၍ thokyakanyamaှု sabhotarā”phaြင’ya
thinya”pe”soyalaññya” thinya”mara phaြcyanekhaဲ’pāmū thiုakhāvayya le”maှုsabho garupathavīdhātyakiု ū”cā”pe”၍
paြောငya”raှုliုkyapāka thanya”kanya laှုpyaraှာ”maှုmaျာ” ငြိmyavapyashā”tatyapesaññya． cā”phaဲpoyathaငya letiုkyakhatyasaphaြင’ya
taphaျpyaphaျpya laှုpyaraှာ”neso cārhakyakiု le”laṃso arāvatthutacyakhuphaြင’ya phithā”liုkyapāka ငြိmyashā”sakaဲ’siု’
maှtyapā．
nā-kaျငya-kiုkyakhaဲmaှု --- tacyakhātacyaraṃ taငyapā”casañña’ya khandhākiုyya၏ acityaapiုငya” tacyanerā၌ nākaျငya
kiုkyakhaဲmaှုmaျာ” ā”koငya”netatya၏． thiုငyaliုkya၍ makaြာmīakhaျိnyaathaငya”maှာ amaြဲliုliု nākaျငyakiုkyakhaဲmaှုmaျာ”
phaြcyanetatya၏． thiုakhāvayya thiုnākaျငyakiုkyakhaဲnesañña’ya nerāsiု’ ciုkya၍ maññyasañña’yadhātyamaျာ” lhanyakaဲne၍
thiုsiု’ nākaျငyakiုkyakhaဲnepāsanaññya”hu cū”camya”kaြñña’yapā． pūmaှု māmaှုtiု’ lhanyakaဲne၍ nākaျငyakiုkyakhaဲnesaññyahu
the’raှိpāka aေ”maှုnaှင’ya paျော’maှုkiု niုငyaaောငya ū”cā”pe”၍ naှluṃ”shaငya” raှုphā”pā． nākaျငyakiုkyakhaဲmaှု sakyasā
shā”tatyapāsaññya． akayya၍ pūmaှု-māmaှု-thanya”kanyamaှုmaျာ” ā”koငya”၍ nā-kaျငya-kiုkyakhaဲnesaññyakiု the’raှိ
pāka aေ”maှု-paျော’maှု-thokyakanyamaှုtiု’kiု ū”cā”pe”၍ niုငyaaောငya naှluṃ”shaငya” raှုphā”pe”pāka nākaျငyakiုkyakhaဲ
maှုmaျာ”maှာ laျော’shā”tatyapāsaññya．
tacyakhātacyaraṃ khandhākiုyyamaှာ alhanya khiုငyamātoင’yataငya” le”laṃnepāka paျော’maှု-khaျောmaှု-po’maှုtiု’kiုsā
niုငyaaောငya ū”cā”pe”၍ raှုphā”pe”pā． dhātyaññīmaျှshā”soakhāmaှ sabhotarā” (12)maျို”luṃ”kiု tacyaphanyapaြnya၍
raှုpāka samādhiaphaြcya maြnyalātatyapāsaññya．

so cityasaññya phaြcyapoyalā၏．

kiု raှုranyasā phaြcyapāsaññya．

maြnyamaြnya dhātyakiု naှluṃ”shaငya”so yogā0carapuggiုlyaā” achaင’yachaင’ya， chaင’yakā chaင’yakā dhātyatacyapā”paြီ”

mathaငyaraှာ” phaြcyalātatya၏． rupyakiု paramatyasiု’ chiုkyaaောငya piုငya”piုငya”khaြာ”khaြာ” sitatyaso rūpaparicchedañāṇya
caso athakyaathakyaso vipassanāñāṇya magyañāṇya phiုlyañāṇyahūso tarā”thū” tarā”maြtyakiု rhakya
choငya mape”niုငyato’pe． thiုkaြောင’ya dhātyatacyapā”paြီ” nokyadhātyatacyapā”၏ sabhā0sattikiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya
āruṃyū၍ naှluṃ”shaငya”rā၌ alhanya laျငyalaျငyamaြnyamaြnya naှluṃ”mashaငya”pānaှင’ya． (mahāṭī-1-434．)
3． nātisaṇikato = manaှေ”lhanya”cera

591
sace pana bahiddhāpi manasikāraṃ upasaṃharati， athassa āhiṇḍantā manussatiracchānādayo

dhātyakammaṭṭhānya”kiု naှluṃ”shaငya” raှုphā”neso yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya pathavīdhātya āpodhātya te
jodhātya vāyodhātya hūso amaññyanāma paññatyatiု’kiု kaျောyalhanya၍ paramatthadhammasabhā0 sattitaññya”
hūso sabhā0lakkhaṇāāruṃ၌sālaျှငya bhā0nācityakiု thā”ramaññya phaြcyasaññya．
1． pathavīdhātya၏ ---- māmaှု-kaြmya”maှု-le”maှု， paျော’maှု-khaျောmaှု-po’maှု sabho，
2． āpodhātya၏ ---- yiုcī”maှု-phhaဲ’caññya”maှု sabho，
3． tejodhātya၏ ---- pūmaှု-aေ”maှု sabho，
4． vāyodhātya၏ ---- thokyakanyamaှု-thanya”kanyamaှု sabho ----
hūso paramatyasabhotarā”āruṃpoya၌sā bhā0nācityakiု koငya”chā thā”ramaññya phaြcyasaññya．
akayya၍ pathavīdhātyahu raှုliုkyarā tacyakiုyyaluṃ” = rūpakāyatacyakhuluṃ”kiု khaြုံ၍ māmaှု-kaြmya”maှု-le”maှု，
paျော’maှု-khaျောmaှု-po’maှု sabhomaျာ”kiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya mathe’maြငyase”saññyaphaြcyaṃ’， āpodhātyahu nokyadhātya
tacyaluṃ”siု’ paြောငya”raှုliုkyapāka pathavīdhātyahūso paññatyapoyamaှာsā soငyataငyanesaññya maññyapesaññya．
thiုsiု’ amaññyanāma paññatyapoya၌ soငyataငyaneso bhā0nācityakā” dhātyakammaṭṭhānya”kiု phā”maျာ”ā”thutya
neso bhā0nācitya mahutyase”pe， chiုkammaṭṭhānya” achaင’yamaှာsā raှိnese”saññya． kaျnyadhātya (3)pā”tiု’၌
laññya” naññya”tū maှtyapā．
akayya၍ pathavīdhātyahu raှုliုkyarā pathavīdhātya၏ māmaှု-kaြmya”maှု-le”maှု， paျော’maှု-khaျောmaှု-po’maှု
sabhotarā”tiု’kiု rūpakāyatacyakhuluṃ”၌ anaှံ’apaြာ” the’maြငyasaññyaphaြcyaṃ’， tacyanaññya”chiုrasoya māmaှု-kaြmya”maှု
-le”maှု， paျော’maှု-khaျောmaှု-po’maှု sabhotarā”tiု’kiု ñāṇyamaျkyaciphaြင’ya maြငyaaောငyakaြñña’ya၍ pathavīdhātyahu raှုsaññya
phaြcyaṃ’， maြငyalaññya”maြငyasaññya phaြcyaṃ’ ---- thiုakhā āpodhātyahu paြောငya”၍ raှုpā． amaññyanāmapaññatyakiု kaျောya
lhanyashā”paြီhu chiုliုpāsaññya． alā”tūpaငya āpodhātyahu raှုrā၌ yiုcī”maှုsabho， phhaဲ’caññya”maှုsabhotiု’kiု
rūpakāyatacyakhuluṃ”၌ anaှံ’apaြာ” ñāṇyaphaြင’ya the’maြငyasaññya phaြcyaṃ’， siု’mahutya yiုcī”maှုsabho， phhaဲ’caññya”maှုsabho
tarā”tiု’kiု tacyakiုyyaluṃ”၌ maြငyaaောငya ñāṇyamaျkyaciphaြင’ya kaြñña’yapaြီ”maှ āpodhātyahu raှုsaññya phaြcyaṃ’ -- tejo
dhātyahu paြောငya”၍ raှုniုငya၏．
tejodhātyahu raှုliုkyarā pūmaှုsabho， aေ”maှုsabho (raင’yakaျkyacemaှုsabho) tiု’kiု rūpakāya
tacyakhuluṃ”၌ anaှံ’apaြာ” ñāṇyaphaြင’ya the’maြငyasaññya phaြcyaṃ’， siု’mahutya pūmaှုsabho， aေ”maှုsabho (raင’yakaျkya
cemaှုsabho)tiု’kiု khandhākiုyyatacyakhuluṃ”၌ anaှံ’apaြာ” the’maြငyapāmaှ tejodhātyahu raှုsaññya phaြcyaṃ’ ----
vāyodhātyahu paြောငya”၍ raှုniုငya၏．
vāyodhātyahu raှုliုkyarā၌laññya” thokyakanyamaှုsabho， thanya”kanyamaှုsabhotiု’kiု rūpakāya tacyakhu
luṃ”၌ anaှံ’apaြာ” ñāṇyaphaြင’ya the’maြငyasaññya phaြcyaṃ’， siု’mahutya rūpakāyatacyakhuluṃ”၌ anaှံ’apaြာ” thokyakanyamaှု
sabho， thanya”kanyamaှုsabhotiု’kiု ñāṇyamaျkyaciphaြင’ya maြငyaaောငya ce’ce’ငုငု kaြñña’yaraှုpaြီ”pāmaှ vāyodhātyahu raှု
saññya phaြcyaṃ’ ---- pathavīdhātyahu tacyaphanyapaြnya၍ raှုniုငya၏．

10． bojjhaṅgasuttanya (aggisuttanya) (saṃ-3-98-100．)
īsuttanyakā” mahāvaggasaṃyutyapāḷitoya bojjhaṅgasaṃyutya cāmaျkyanaှာ (98-99-100．) suttanyanaṃpātya
(234)၌ aggisuttanya amaññyaphaြင’ya lāraှိpesaññya． visuddhimaggaaṭṭhakathā pathamathaဲ cāmaျkyanaှာ (127)casaññyatiု’၌
nimittakosalla bhā0nākosallapiုငya”tiု’thaငyalaññya” īaggisuttanyakiုpaငya choငya၍ raှငya”paြthā”pesaññya．
īaggisuttanya၏ chiုliုraငya”akhaျkyamaှာ īsiု’ phaြcya၏．
kaြို”cā”ā”thutyamaှု luṃ’lavīriya alhanyalaျော’nekhaြငya”， bhā0nālupyaငnya”khhaငya၌ vamya”maြောkyamaှု maphaြcyakhaြငya”，
saṃvegañāṇya naññya”pā”khaြငya”hūso akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’kaြောင’ya bhā0nācityasaññya bhā0nāāruṃmaှ thana’yatiု

sabhā0lakkhaṇākiုsā ū”cā”pe”၍ samādhikiု thūthoငyapā
īapiုငya”kā” dhātyakaြီ” (4)pā”tiု’၏ sabhā0lakkhaṇākiုsā ū”cā”pe”၍ samādhikiု thūthoငya
ramañña’ya apiုငya” phaြcyapesaññya．
1． pathavīdhātya ---- naññya”naññya” māmaှုkiု paျော’saññyahu suṃ”naှုnya”၍ maျာ”maျာ” māmaှုkiု māsaññyahu suṃ”naှုnya”khaြငya”
phaြcya၏． naññya”naññya” kaြmya”maှုkiု khaျောsaññyahu suṃ”naှုnya”၍ maျာ”maျာ” kaြmya”maှုkiု kaြmya”saññyahu suṃ”naှုnya”khaြငya”
phaြcya၏． māmaှု kaြmya”maှု thaငyaraှာ”laျှငya le”maှုlaññya” thaငyaraှာ”lātatya၏． naññya”naññya” le”maှုkiု po’saññyahu
suṃ”naှုnya”၍ maျာ”maျာ” le”maှုkiု le”saññyahu suṃ”naှုnya”khaြငya” phaြcya၏． siု’athakya pathavīdhātyavayya mā-
kaြmya”-le” hūso sabhā0lakkhaṇāsā liုraငya” phaြcyasaññya． thiုthaငyalaññya” māmaှုsā liုraငya” phaြcya၏．
māmaှု thaငyaraှာ”pāka kaြmya”maှု-le”maှုtiု’laññya” pū”thaဲ၍ thaငyaraှာ”lāsaññyasā phaြcyapesaññya．
2． āpodhātya ---- bhilapyamaြmeှုna’yamaျာ”kiု renaññya”ငyyaphaြင’ya phaျောyacapyaliုkyasoakhā thaဲ၍ khaဲshā”maññya．
phhaဲ’caññya”maှု ā”maျာ”lāmaññya phaြcya၏． bhilapyamaြmeှုna’ya anaññya”ငyyakiု remaျာ”maျာ”phaြင’ya phaျောya capyaliုkyapāka
cī”chaငya”shā”maññya phaြcya၏， yiုcī”maှု ā”maျာ”lāmaññya phaြcyasaññya． siု’athakya anaññya”ငyya yiုcī” cima’yavaငyamaှုkiု
phhaဲ’caññya”saññyahu suṃ”chaဲ၍ maျာ”maျာ”yiုcī”maှုkiု yiုcī”saññyahu suṃ”chaဲkhaြငya” phaြcya၏． thiုkaြောင’ya āpodhātya၌
yiုcī”maှုsā liုraငya”padhāna phaြcya၏．
3． tejodhātya ---- anaññya”ငyya pūmaှုkiု aေ”saññyahu suṃ”chaဲ၍ maျာ”maျာ” pūmaှုkiု pūsaññyahu suṃ”chaဲkhaြငya”
phaြcya၏． apūraှိnya laျော’maှုnaှင’ya apūraှိnya lhanyakaဲmaှုsāphaြcyasaññya． siု’athakya tejodhātya၌laññya” pūmaှုsā
liုraငya”padhāna phaြcyasaññya．
4． vāyodhātya ---- paြိုto’maññya aိmyatacyaaိmyakiု mapaြိုaောငya kaျာ”khoyasañña’ya sacyasā”khaျောငya” siု’mahutya
vā”phaြင’ya thokyathā”liုkyasoya thiုaိmyasaññya chakyalakya၍ mapaြိုto’bhaဲ mayiုငyalaဲto’bhaဲ ငြိmyashā”၏．
thokyakanyamaှုhūsaññya mayiုငyalaဲaောငya thanya”thā”sañña’ya chamya”aငya tacyamaျို”sā phaြcyasaññya． arāvatthu
tacyakhukiု laှုpyashā”aောငya nerārhe’shā”aောငya paြုlupyape”liုkyaso chamya”aငyatacyamaျို”kiုlaññya” thanya”
kanyasaññyahupaငya khoyachiုpaြnya၏．
arāvatthutacyakhukiု paငyakiုyyaatiုငya” taññyaneောငya ငြိmyaneောငya thinya”thā”so chamya”aငyakiု
thokyakanyasaññyahu khoyavoyasuṃ”chaဲ၍ arāvatthutacyakhukiု laှုpyaaောငya rhe’aောငya paြုlupyape”neso chamya”aငya
kiု thanya”kanyasaññyahu khoyavoyasuṃ”chaဲkhaြငya” phaြcya၏． thiုthaငya thokyakanyamaှုmaှာ vāyodhātya၏ paငyakiုyya sabhā0
lakkhaṇā phaြcya၏． thanya”kanyamaှုmaှာ vāyodhātya၏ lupyaငnya”kiccarasa phaြcya၏． paramatthadhammasabhā0tiုငya”၌
kiုyyapiုငyasabhā0lakkhaṇāraှိsakaဲ’siု’ kiုyyapiုငyalupyaငnya”kiccarapyalaññya” maျာ”soā”phaြင’ya raှိmaြဲdhammatāpaငya phaြcya၏．
siု’athakya thokyakanyamaှု sabhā0lakkhaṇāchamya”aငyakiု ū”cā”pe”၍ raှုnepāka thanya”kanyamaှု chamya”aငyakiုpā
pū”thaဲ siraှိlāniုငyasaññyasā phaြcyasaññya．
siု’athakya dhātyakaြီ” (4)pā”phaြင’ya samādhithūthoငyanesañña’ya yakhukaဲ’siု’so apiုငya”thaငya ----
1． pathavīdhātya၌ māmaှု-kaြmya”maှု，
2． āpodhātya၌ yiုcī”maှု，
3． tejodhātya၌ pūmaှု，
4． vāyodhātya၌ thokyakanyamaှု ----

naှင’ya bojjhaငyatarā”maျာ”kiု ññīmaျှaောငya kaျင’yapuṃ canacyamaျာ”kiု naññya”maှီ”၍ indaြေ (5)pā”naှင’ya bojjhaငya (7)pā”tiု’kiု
ññīmaျှaောငya kaျင’yapāle．
bhavaငya kaျnetatyapāsaññya
upacārasamādhinayyamaြseiု’ chiုkyarokyaca yakhukaဲ’siု’so akhaျိnyamaျို”thaငyalaññya” tacyakhātacyaraṃ akhaျို’so
yogā0carapuggiုlyamaျာ” santānyavayya bhavaငyakaျkaျnetatyapāsaññya． thiုakhāmaျို”thaငya dhātyakaြီ” (4)pā”tiု’၏
sabhā0lakkhaṇāāruṅkiု maraှုmito’bhaဲ kaျောyalhanyashā”tatya၏． yogā0carapuggiုlya amaျာ”cukato’
“bhāmaျှmasibhaဲ lacyalacyanesaññya”hu paြောtatya၏． thiုbhavaငyacityasaññya paccuppanya mimi raှုphā”nesañña’ya dhātyakaြီ”
(4)pā”tiု’၏ sabhā0lakkhaṇākiု āruṃmapaြုbhaဲ atityabha0 sekhānī”kāla maraṇāsannajoka yūkhaဲ’so
āruṅkiုpaငya chakyalakya āruṃyūtatyaso āruṃyūneso cityaphaြcyasaphaြင’ya yogā0carapuggiုlyaanephaြင’ya

jo၏ āruṅkiု āruṃpaြုnesaññya sinepāsaññyahūso akhaျkyakiု yogā0carapuggiုlya anephaြင’ya siphiု’ranyamaှာ

pā． thiုnoငya indaြneှင’ya bojjhaငyamaျာ”kiု ññīmaျှaောငya chakyalakya kaြို”pamya”pā． dhātyakaြီ” (4)pā”tiု’၏ sabhā0

chakyalakya၍ thūthoငyapā．

bhā0nācityasaññya dhātyakaြီ” (4)pā”tiု’၏ sabhā0lakkhaṇāāruṃpoya၌sā ငြိmyavapyachā kapya၍ taññyane
khaဲ’soya samādhilaññya” khiုငyakhaṃ’lāsoya， dhātya (4)pā” āruṃ၌ tacyanārī naှcyanārī casaññyaphaြင’ya ငြိmyavapyachā kapya၍
bhā0nācityasaññya taññyanesoya - thiုakhā၌ pathavīdhātya āpodhātya tejodhātya vāyodhātyahupaငya

ciုkyakaြñña’yanepā， raှုnepā． dhātyakaြီ” (4)pā”luṃ” ñāṇyathaငya paြိုငyatūliုliု thaငyathaငyanepāka ā”luṃ”kiုpaငya khaြုံ၍
dhātyakaြီ” (4)pā”tiု’၏ sabhotarā”tiု’ apoya၌sā bhā0nācityakiု kapyathā”pā． kaျhamya”kaျငya၍ kaျင’yasā”

lakya thhakyapoyalāmaññya phaြcya၏．
akhaျို’yogīmaျာ”၌ phaြcyatatyapuṃakhaျို’
akhaျို’yogīsūtoyakoငya”maျာ”၌ yakhukaဲ’siု’ samādhiā”koငya”lāsoakhā laငya”roငyakhaြññyamaျာ”

alhanyathaငyaraှာ”lāsañña’ya amaှtyaasā” phaြcyasaññya． thiုakhaျိnyaakhāmaျို”thaငya bahiddhasiု’ cityakiု tacyacatacyaca ce
lhaှtya၍ dhātyakaြီ” (4)pā”kiု chakyalakyaraှုpāka raniုငyasosabho raှိsaññyasāphaြcya၏．
bahiddha၌ thaငyalāpuṃ
sace pana bahiddhāpi manasikāraṃ upasaṃharati， athassa āhiṇḍantā manussatiracchānādayo
sattākāraṃ vijahithā dhātusamūha0sene0 upaṭṭhahanti， tehi kariyamānā kiriyā dhātumayena yantena

= akayya၍ bahiddhaloka၌laññya” dhātyakaြီ” (4)pā”tiု’၏ sabhā0lakkhaṇākiု naှluṃ”shaငya”khaြငya” bhā0nā
manasikārakiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya raှေ”raှုkapyachoငyasaññya phaြcyaṃ’， thiုsiု’ ñāṇyaphaြင’ya raှေ”raှုkapyachoငyasaññyaraှိsoya thiု
yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ asiñāṇyavayya laှñña’yalaññyakaျkyacā” shā”lānekaြkunyaso lū tiracchānya casaññya
tiု’saññya sattavāhūso akhaြငya”arākiု chana’ya၍ dhātyakaြီ” (4)pā”tiု’၏ apoငya”acu၏ achamya”phaြင’yasālaျှငya

apyaso dhātyakaြီ” (4)pā”tiု’၏ apoငya”acukaဲ’siု’ thaငyalā၏． (mahāṭī-1-435．)
siု’soya īapiုငya”thaငya ajjhatta၌ raှုphā”maှု liုraငya”kicca mapaြီ”se”saphaြင’ya bahiddhasiု’ maraှုse”bhaဲ ajjhatta၌sā
dhātyakaြီ” (4)pā”kiုpaငya chakyalakya၍ raှုphā”liုkalaññya” raှုphā”niုငyasaññyasā phaြcyasaññya． ajjhatta၌ rupyanāmyatiု’kiု
paramatyasiု’chiုkyaaောငya simya”chaññya”paြီ”soakhāmaှ bahiddhasiု’ paြောငya”raှုliုkalaññya” raှုniုငyasaññyasā phaြcyasaññya．
akhaျို’so yogā0carapuggiုlyamaျာ”၌kā” thiုsiု’ dhātyamaျာ” thaငyaraှာ” kaျyyapaြna’yalāsoakhā kaြောkya
lana’yalātatya၏， kaြောkyalana’yaphhayya maliုpā． dhātyasabhotarā” tacyakhukhukiု malhanyacebhaဲ dhātyasabhotarā”
maျာ”kiု maျှaောငyasā chakyalakyaraှု၍ samādhi thūthoငyanepā． maျာ”soā”phaြင’ya rupyakalāpyaamaှုnyamaျာ”kiု
the’khānī”so akhaျိnyathaငya thiုkaဲ’siု’ phaြcyatatyapesaññya．
siု’soya akhaျို’so yogā0carapuggiုlyatiု’၏ ñāṇya၌kā” khandhākiုyyakiု mathe’to’bhaဲ dhātyakaြီ”

dhātyakaြီ” (4)pā”tiု’၏ atuṃ”akhaဲmaှာ se”ငyyalātatya၏． tacyakiုyyaluṃ”kiု khaြုံ၍ dhātyakiု maciုkyabhaဲ tacyane
rārākiု athū”saphaြင’ya khandhākiုyya၏ athaငya”piုငya”lokyakiုsā ū”cā”pe”၍ dhātyakiု ciုkyamiso yogā0cara
puggiုlyatiု’၌ phaြcyalātatyaso sabhā0tacyamaျို” phaြcya၏． thiုakhaျိnyaakhāmaျို”thaငya dhātyaatuṃ”akhaဲ၏ kaြီ”maှု se”maှု
kiု āruṃmayūbhaဲ dhātyaacuapuṅkiုsā chakyalakya၍ āruṃyūkā samādhikiု chakyalakya thūthoငyaramaññya
phaြcyasaññya．
īapiုငya”thaငya dhātyakaြီ” (4)pā”kiု āruṃyū၍ thūthoငyalāso samādhimaှာ atoyaasaင’ya ā”
koငya”lāpaြီ phaြcyasaphaြင’ya cityakiု celhaှtyamisañña’yabhakyathaငya dhātyamaျာ” thaငyaraှာ”netatya၏． yogā0carapuggiုlya
ka cityakiု makacā”miphiု’ liုsaññya． rupyakalāpyamaျာ”kiု mathe’khaငyaapiုငya”phaြcya၍ rupyaghana asī”asī”kiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya
maphaြိုkhhaဲniုငyase”sañña’yaathakya paramatyanayyasiု’ khaြceuṃpacya၍ vaငyarokyamashā”se”so akhaျိnya phaြcya၏． paññatya
nayyakiု luṃ”0 makaျောyalhaှာ”niုငyase”saphaြင’ya cityakiု kacā”mika paññatyanaှင’ya ronaှောneso āruṃnimityamaျာ”
laññya” poyanetatya၏． siု’athakya dhātyakaြီ” (4)pā”tiု’၏ sabhā0lakkhaṇākiုsā malhaှtyatamya” āruṃyūlaျkya
samādhikiုsā khiုငyakhaṃ’aောငya chakyalakya၍ thūthoငyaramañña’ya akhaျိnyaakhā phaြcyapesaññya．
dhātyaatuṃ”akhaဲ kaြီ”mā” kaျyyapaြna’yalāsaññyahu asiñāṇya၌ thaငyalāsūnaှင’ya dhātyaatuṃ”akhaဲ se”khe”
shā”saññyahu asiñāṇya၌ thaငyalāsū yogīnaှcyaū”tiု’thaငya se”se”khe”khe” atuṃ”akhaဲaphaြcya thaငyalāsū
yogīpuggiုlyaka samādhi piု၍ cū”raှsaññyakiု raṅkhā the’ratatya၏． kaြီ”mā”kaျyyapaြna’yasañña’ya dhātyaatuṃ”akhaဲaphaြcya
thaငyasū akhaျို’laññya” samādhi cū”raှtatyapāsaññya．
rupyakammaṭṭhānya”piုငya”
609
aphaြူ naှင’ya akaြññyapaြငya
thiုakhāthaငya īachaင’yasiု’ tacyakhāmaျှ marokyaphū”se”so yogā0carapuggiုlyaphaြcyapāka aphaြူroငya
mī”khiု”roငyakaဲ’siု’so aphaြူpaြငyakaြီ”kiု maျာ”soā”phaြင’ya cataငya၍ the’tatyapā၏． siု’soya īapiုငya”thaငya
yogīpuggiုlyamaျာ”saññya tacyaū”naှင’ya tacyaū” cataငyathe’raှိpuṃ akhaြငya”arā matūthū”khaြာ”maှု asaင’yaataင’ya raှိtatya
pāsaññya． akhaျို’yogīmaျာ”ka alaငya”roငyakiု cataငya၍ asiamaှtya paြုmitatya၏． akhaျို’yogīmaျာ”ka aphaြူ
kiု cataငya၍ asiamaှtya paြုmitatya၏． laငya”roငyakhaြññyachamya”aငya ā”paျော’so yogīpuggiုlyatiု’ka laငya”
roငyakhaြññyakiု satimapaြုmibhaဲ aphaြူkiုsā cataငya၍ satipaြုmikhaြငya” phaြcya၏． laငya”roငyakhaြññyachamya”aငya ā”koငya”
so yogīpuggiုlyatiု’kā” laငya”roငyakhaြññyakiု ū”chā satipaြုmi၍ aphaြူkiု nokyamaှ satipaြုmitatyakhaြငya”
phaြcyasaññya．
thiုaphaြူ maှာ poyacathaငya akhaျို’yogīmaျာ”၌ mī”khiု”roငyakaဲ’siု’ ññacyathapyathapya anaññya”ငyya raှိtatya၏．
yogīpuggiုlyaka thiုaphaြူkiု makaြñña’yase”bhaဲ mūlaraှုmaြဲ phaြcyasañña’ya dhātyakaြီ” (4)pā”āruṃ၌sā bhā0nācityakiု
chakyalakya၍ ငြိmyavapyachā kapya၍ taññyaneောငya kaြို”cā”khaဲ’soya thiုaphaြူ maှာ vāghamya”ciုငyakaဲ’siု’ chhatyachhatya
phaြူlātatyapāsaññya． īaphaြူkā” akaြññyadhātya၏ raှေ’paြေ” phaြcyapāsaññya． īaphaြူkiုlaññya” naှluṃ”mashaငya”
se”bhaဲ mūla raှုmaြဲ phaြcyasañña’ya dhātyakaြီ” (4)pā”āruṃ၌sā bhā0nācityakiု ငြိmyavapyachā kapyathā”khaဲ’soya ī
aphaြူpaြငya aphaြူtuṃ”hūsaññyamaှာlaññya” dhātyakaြီ” (4)pā”tiု’၏ acuapuṃsā phaြcyasaññyahu sabhopokyalā
tatyapāsaññya．
akayya၍ aphaြူpaြငya၌ taññyaraှိneso dhātyakaြီ” (4)pā”kiု sabhomapokya phaြcyanekhaဲ’soya thiုaphaြူ
maှာlaññya” lhayyalhayyanaှင’ya paျောkyapaျkyamashā”bhaဲ khiုငyakhaṃ’laျkyasā taññyaraှိnekhaဲ’soya tacyakiုyyaluṃ”kiု khaြုံ၍ māsabhokiု
raှုliုkya， aphaြူpaြငya၌ mā-sabhokiု raှုliုkya - īsiု’ kaြိmyaphanyamaျာ”chā le’kaျင’yapā． le’kaျင’yapā
maျာ”lāsoya aphaြူ၌ taññyaraှိneso māmaှုsabhokiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya thaငyathaငyaraှာ”raှာ” the’maြငyalātatyapāsaññya．
māmaှုsabhotarā”tacyakhukiု kaျkeျnepyanapya raှု၍ raraှိpāka kaျnyanese”sañña’ya sabhotarā” (11)maျို”kiု
laññya” chakyalakya၍ naññya”tū raှုkaြñña’yapā． aphaြူpaြငya၌ mā-kaြmya”-le”， paျော’-khaျော-po’， yiုcī”-phhaဲ’caññya”， pūaေ”，
thokya-thanya” - hūso sabhotarā” (12)maျို”luṃ”kiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya thaငyathaငyaraှာ”raှာ” the’maြငyapāka
pathavīdhātya-āpodhātya-tejodhātya-vāyodhātya hu le”khaျkya paြောငya”၍ raှုpā， samādhi tacyaphanyapaြnya၍
thūthoငyapā．
siု’soya yogīpuggiုlyaamaျာ”cu၌ya thiုaphaြူmaှာ poyacathaငya makhiုငyakhaṃ’bhaဲ khaṇapoyaliုkya khaṇapaျောkyaliုkya
phaြcyanetatyapāsaññya． thiုakhā thiုaphaြူ khiုငyakhaṃ’re”athakya mūlaraှုmaြဲphaြcyasañña’ya dhātyakaြီ” (4)pā” āruṃ၌sā
bhā0nācityakiု ငြိmyavapyasaññyathakyapiု၍ ငြိmyavapyachā kapya၍ taññyaneောငyasā kaြို”cā”pā． thiုaphaြူmaှာ thiုငya၍
dhātyakaြီ” (4)pā”kiု raှုliုkyatiုငya” poyapaြီ”laျှငya nārīvakyakhana’ya tacyanārīkhana’ya casaññyaphaြင’ya mapaျောkyapaျkyabhaဲ khiုငyakhaṃ’
taññyataṃ’khaဲ’soya thiုaphaြူ၌ taññyaraှိneso dhātyakaြီ” (4)pā”kiုlaññya” sabhomapokyase” phaြcyanepāka

ī pathavī-āpo-tejo-vāyo-vaṇṇa-gandha-rasa-ojātiု’kā” (6)dhāraluṃ”vayya kaြññyasañña’ya
rupyakalāpya， makaြññyasañña’ya rupyakalāpyatiုငya”၌ amaြဲtamya” pāvaငya taññyaraှိneso rupyasabhotarā” (8)maျို”
phaြcya၏． tacyakhucī tacyakhucī khhaဲ၍ marakoငya”so = khhaဲ၍ maphaြcyaniုငyasokaြောင’ya avinibbhogarupyahu khoya၏． anaññya”
chuṃ” pamāṇaā”phaြင’ya īrupyasabhotarā” (8)maျို”tiု’ poငya”capyapāmaှ rupyakalāpya tacyakhu phaြcyapoyalāniုငya၏．

rupyakammaṭṭhānya”piုငya”
633
asī”kā” yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ ñāṇyavayya khaဲpaြာ”laျkyapaငya raှိ၏． khaဲpaြာ”aောငyalaññya” raှုramaññyasā phaြcyasaññya．
kaျkeျnepyanapya khaဲkhaဲpaြာ”paြာ” siaောငya raှုphā” simya”chaññya”rāvayya ā”mara phaြcyanepāka ānāpānaphaြင’ya

maျာ” paြို”paြို” paြkyapaြkya talakyalakya tokyapalāsoakhā yaငya”rupyasabhotarā” (8)maျို”kiု kaြññyasañña’ya

jīvita = rupyasakyacoင’yadhātya ---- jīvitakiု raှုliုka kaြññyasañña’ya rupyakalāpyatacyakhu၌ raှေ”ū”chā pathavīmaှ

neso sabhotarā” tacyakhukiု yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya maြငyapaြီ”sā phaြcya၏． yakhaငya (8)maျို”so rupyasabho
tarā”maျာ”naှင’ya kaြññyanesañña’ya sabhotarā”tacyakhukiု poငya”soya rupyasabhotarā” (9)maျို”kiု yogā0cara
puggiုlyasaññya ñāṇyaphaြင’ya the’maြငyapaြီ” phaြcya၏． kaျnya rupyasabhotarā” tacyakhumaှာ jīvitapaငya phaြcya၏． kaြññyasañña’ya
rupyakalāpyatiု’၌ yaငya”sabhotarā” (10)maျို”sā amaြဲtamya” taññyaraှိnesokaြောင’ya phaြcya၏． pathavī-āpotejo-
vāyo-vaṇṇa-gandha-rasa-ojā-jīvita-pasāda hu rupyasabhotarā” (10)maျို”tiု’taññya”．
jīvitakiု asakyahulaññya” khoyachiု၏． jīvitahūsaññya asakyaraှငyaneso sabhā0tacyakhu phaြcya၏．
kaြññyanesañña’ya kammajarupyakalāpya tacyakhu athaငya”vayya sekhaျာchā ciုkya၍ raှုkaြñña’yanesoakhā laှုpyaraှာ”maှု raှိ၍
asakyavaငyaneso sabhā0tacyakhukiု yogā0carapuggiုlyatiု’saññya maျာ”soā”phaြင’ya asiamaှtya paြုmitatya
kaြ၏． yaငya”asakyaraှငyaneso asakyavaငyaneso sabhotarā”saññya mimimaှ kaြhaငya”kaျnyaso kalāpyatū
(9)maျို”so kammajarupyatiု’kiုlaññya” coင’yaraှောkyape”khaြငya” sabholakkhaṇā raှိ၏， kalāpyatū kammajarupyatiု’kiု

phaြcya၏．
jīvitasaññya kammajarupyakalāpyamaျာ”၌sā pāvaငyalaျkya raှိ၏． kammajarupyamaျာ”kā” atityaka kaṅkaြောင’ya

bhe”ka puggiုlyatacyaū”ū”ka vaငyarokya၍ coင’yaraှောkyape”rasakaဲ’siု’ alā”tūpaငya mikhaငyakaṃnaှင’ya ve”khāne

pānaှင’ya maraှုpānaှင’ya． asakyavaငyanesañña’yasabho kalāpyatū kammajarupyatiု’kiု coင’yanesañña’ya sabhotiု’kiု ñāṇya

hadayadasakakalāpya， bhā0dasakakalāpya， jīvitana0kakalāpya， cittajaaṭṭhakalāpya， utujaaṭṭha
kalāpya， āhārajaaṭṭhakalāpyatiု’kā” makaြññyasañña’ya rupyakalāpyamaျာ” phaြcyakaြ၏． pasāda khoyasañña’ya akaြññya

sokaြောင’ya phaြcya၏． siု’athakya makaြññyasañña’ya rupyakalāpyamaျာ”၌ jīvitatiုငyaaောငya (9)maျို”so rupyasabho

bhā0rupyaka phaြcyacepuṅkiု maျာ”soā”phaြင’ya sabhopokyalātatya၏， kaြmya”tamya”khakyathanyaso amūarā
sabhomaျာ”kiု the’lātatya၏． pathavīdhātya၏ kaြmya”tamya”maှုnaှင’yakā” tūññīmaှု maraှိsaññyakiု yogī amaျာ”၌
sabhopokyanetatyapāsaññya．

ā”koငya”lāsoakhā tacyaphanyapaြnya၍ bhā0rupyakiု raှုkaြñña’yapā． jīvita pāvaငyaso makaြññyaso rupyakalāpya

laှñña’ya၍ raှုkaြñña’yapā． buddhaabhidhammā၌ yaငya” (6)dhāraluṃ”tiု’၌ bhā0rupyalaျှငya (10)khumaြောkyaraှိso bhā0dasaka
kalāpyarupyamaျာ” thaငyaraှာ”raှိne၏． buddhaabhidhammā၌ lāraှိso bhā0rupyamaှာ amaျာ”nā”laññyaso bhā0rupya
naှင’yakā” matūpe． amaျို”sā”၏ maျkyaluṃ”naှင’ya amaျို”smī”၏ maျkyaluṃ”， amaျို”sā”၏ maျkyanaှာnaှင’ya amaျို”smī”၏
maျkyanaှာ， amaျို”sā”၏ lakyakhaြseṇṭhānya casaññyanaှင’ya amaျို”smī”၏ lakyakhaြseṇṭhānya casaññyatiု’saññya matūññī
kaြkhaြငya”maှာ ībhā0rupya၏ khaဲpaြာ”maှုkaြောင’ya phaြcya၏， ībhā0rupyaka īsūkā” yokyaျာ”hu， īsūkā” minya”ma
hu siaောငya khhaဲkhaြာ”၍ paြsalaျkya raှိ၏． siု’athakya ībhā0rupyakā” (6)dhāraluṃ”၌ anaှံ’apaြာ” taññyaraှိ
neso rupyatacyamaျို” phaြcyasaññyahu maှtyapā． ībhā0rupya pāvaငyaso rupyakalāpyasaññya jīvita amaြဲtamya” pāraှိ၍
ā”luṃ”poငya”liုkyasoya rupyakalāpyatacyakhu tacyakhu athaငya”၌ - pathavī āpo tejo vāyo vaṇṇa gandha
rasa ojā jīvita bhā0rupya - hu rupyasabhotarā” (10)maျို”cī raှိpesaññya． yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya yaငya”
(10)maျို”so rupyaparamatya sabhotarā”tiု’kiု tacyaluṃ”cī tacyaluṃ”cī ñāṇyaphaြင’ya khhaဲkhaြာ” cityaphaြာ၍ simya”chaññya”
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
636
raှုphā”ramaññya phaြcyapesaññya．
īsiု’laျှငya kaြññyasañña’ya rupyakalāpya၌ rupyasabhotarā” (10)maျို”， makaြññyasañña’ya rupyakalāpya၌ rupyasa
bhotarā” (10)maျို” - ī kaြññya-makaြññya naှcyamaျို”so rupyakalāpyamaျာ”kiု (6)dhāraluṃ”၌ laှñña’yalaññya၍ rupyaghana
khoyasañña’ya rupyatuṃ”rupyakhaဲtiု’kiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya phaြိုkhhaဲphaျkyachī”laျkya paramatyasiု’ ñāṇyaamaြငya chiုkyasañña’yatiုငyaaောငya
ā”rapā”ra kaျkeျnepyanapyakaြီ” raှု၍ aောငyamaြငyamaှု raraှိlāpāka kaြññyaso rupyakalāpyamaျာ”kiု thapyamaṃ၍ khhaဲkhaြာ”
cityaphaြာlaျkya simya”chaññya” raှုphā”niုငyapaြီ phaြcyasaññya． ī၌ makaြññyaso rupyakalāpyavayya (10)maျို”so rupyatarā”
tiု’hūsaññya bhā0rupyalaျှငya (10)khumaြောkyaraှိso bhā0dasaka kalāpyarupyakiု raññyaññhaှnya”thā”pāsaññya． hadaya
vatthurupyalaျှငya (10)khumaြောkyaraှိso hadayadasaka kalāpyarupyasaññyalaññya” makaြññyape． yaငya”hadayavatthurupya
kiု raှုpuṃmaှာ īsiု’ phaြcya၏．
hadayavatthurupya ---- manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ nissayalakkhaṇaṃ hadayavatthu． (visuddhi-2-77．)
manodhātya manoviññāṇadhātyahūso asicityatiု’၏ maှီrāphaြcyakhaြငya” sabholakkhaṇā raှိso rupyasabho
tarā”kā” hadayavatthutaññya”．
ettha pana manoti bhavaṅgacittaṃ． (saṃ-ṭṭha-3-5．) ---- suttanyanaññya”ara manodhātyahūsaññya bhavaငyamano
akaြññyadhātyataññya”． yaငya”bhavaငyamanoakaြññyadhātyasaññyalaññya” hadayavatthurupyakiုpaငya maှီ၍ phaြcya၏． tacyaphanya
cakkhuviññāṇya sotaviññāṇya ghānaviññāṇya jivaှါviññāṇya kāyaviññāṇyahūso pañcaviññāṇyamaှtacyapā”
kaျnyavīthicitya maှnyasamaျှtiု’saññya manoviññāṇadhātya maññya၏． yaငya”manoviññāṇadhātyatiု’saññyalaññya” pañca
vokārabhuṃvayya hadayavatthurupyakiုpaငya maှီ၍ phaြcyakaြ၏． pañcaviññāṇyatiု’thaငya cakkhuviññāṇyasaññya cakkhuakaြññya
dhātyakiု， sotaviññāṇyasaññya sotaakaြññyadhātyakiု， ghānaviññāṇyasaññya ghānaakaြññyadhātyakiု， jivaှါ
viññāṇyasaññya jivaှါakaြññyadhātyakiု， kāyaviññāṇyasaññya kāyaakaြññyadhātyakiု asī”asī” maှီ၍ phaြcya၏．
siု’athakya hadayavatthuhūsaññya manodhātya manoviññāṇadhātya amaññyaraso asicityatiု’၏ maှီ၍phaြcyarā
rupyasabhotarā”maျှsā phaြcya၏． yaငya”hadayavatthurupyakiု raှုpuṃmaှာ īsiု’ phaြcya၏．
īakhaျိnyapiုငya”thaငya (6)dhāraluṃ”၌ kaြññyasañña’ya rupyakalāpya， makaြññyasañña’ya rupyakalāpyatiု’၌ rupyasabho
tarā” (10)maျို”cī the’aောငya raှုphā”tatyapaြီ phaြcyaso yogā0carapuggiုlyaaphiု’ bhavaငyamanoakaြññyadhātya
kiုlaññya” the’raှိnemaññyasā phaြcyasaññya． aိmyaraှငya bhavaငyacityasaññyalaññya” kaြññya၏， paြို”paြို”paြkyapaြkya aroငya
talakyalakya tokyapa၏． (aṃ-1-9．) samathabhā0nācitya vipassanābhā0nācityaā”luṃ”tiု’saññyalaññya”
kaြññya၏， paြို”paြို”paြkyapaြkya aroငyatalakyalakya tokyapa၏． (aṃ-1-258．) siု’athakya yakhukaဲ’siု’ rupyatarā”
tiု’kiု paramatyasiု’ ñāṇyaamaြငya chiုkyaaောငya simya”chaññya”neso rūpapariggaha bhā0nācityasaññyalaññya” kaြññya
laငyasaññyasā phaြcya၏， paြို”paြို” paြkyapaြkya aroငyatalakyalakya tokyapasaññyasā phaြcya၏． catutthajhānyasamādhi
siု’ tiုငyaaောငya achaင’yachaင’ya raှုphā”thā”so ānāpānassatisamādhi bhā0nācityakaဲ’siု’so samathabhā0nā
cityasaññyalaññya” kaြññyalaငyasaññyasā phaြcya၏， paြို”paြို” paြkyapaြkya aroငyatalakyalakya tokyapasaññyasā
phaြcya၏． alaငya”roငyahūsaññya raှေ”alaငya”roငyapiုငya”thaငya raှငya”paြkhaဲ’sañña’yaatiုငya” samathabhā0nācitya vipassanā
bhā0nācityatiု’kaြောင’ya phaြcyaso cittajarupyakalāpyatiုငya”၌ taññyaraှိso vaṇṇadhātya rūpāruṃ၏ tokyapamaှု，
yaငya”cittajarupyakalāpyatiုငya”၌ pāvaငyataññyaraှိso tejodhātyakaြောင’ya chaင’yakaဲ phaြcyaphā”lākaြso utuja
rupyakalāpyatiုငya”၌ pāvaငyataññyaraှိso vaṇṇadhātya rūpāruṃ၏ tokyapamaှု phaြcyasaññya．
rupyakammaṭṭhānya”piုငya”
637
(6)dhāra၌ taññyaraှိso rupyakalāpyatiု’kiု laှñña’yalaññya၍ dhātyakhhaဲlaျkya simya”chaññya” raှုphā”neso yo
gā0carapuggiုlyaaphiု’ yaငya”kaြññyalaငyatokyapaneso manodhātya manoviññāṇadhātyatiု’kiု the’raှိnemaññya
sā phaြcyasaññya． akayya၍ manoviññāṇadhātyatiု’kiု mathe’pāka = sabhomapokyapāka manodhāra = bhavaငya
manokaြññyadhātyakiု simya”chaññya”laျkya lakyaññaှို”tacyakhaျောငya”kiု khe”kaြñña’ya chana’yakaြñña’yapā． manodhārakiုsā
ciုkyaraှုpā， lakyaññaှို”kiု maraှုpānaှင’ya． lakyaññaှို”kiု khe”liု chana’yaliုsocitya， khe”khaြငya” chana’yakhaြငya”kiု phaြcyaceso
cityahūsañña’ya manoviññāṇadhātyatiု’kiု the’raှိniုငyapāsaññya． yaငya”manodhātya manoviññāṇadhātyatiု’kiု ñāṇya
phaြင’ya the’maြငyaneso yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya yaငya”asicityatiု’saññya abhayyakiု maှီ၍ phaြcyanekaြsanaññya”hu
ñāṇyaphaြင’ya tacyachaင’yatakya၍ cū”camya” chaငyakhaြငyakaြñña’yapā． hadayavatthukiု maှီ၍ phaြcyanepuṅkiု sabhopokyaaောငya
ñāṇyaphaြင’ya raှုpā． hadayavatthu pāvaငyaso rupyakalāpyatiု’kā” makaြññyakaြpe． bha0tacyalaျှောkyathaငya amaျာ”chuṃ”
phaြcyanesañña’ya aိmyaraှငya bhavaငyamanoakaြññyadhātya၏ aောkyathaငya taññyaraှိ၏． yaငya”manodhātya manoviññāṇa
dhātyatiု’ka yaငya”hadayavatthurupyakiု maှီ၍ phaြcyanepuṅkiု maြငyaaောငya kaြိmyaphanyamaျာ”chā raှုpā． bhā0nācityakaြောင’ya
tacyanaññya”chiုrasoya bhā0nāsamādhinaှင’ya yaှñyathaဲ၍ phaြcyapoyalāso ñāṇyakaြောင’ya phaြcyapoyalāso laငya”roငya
khaြññyachamya”aငyasaññya athū” ā”koငya”nepāka manodhātya manoviññāṇadhātyahūso asicityatiု’saññya
hadayavatthukiု maှီ၍phaြcyanepuṅkiု sabhopokyaniုငyapālima’yamaññya． hadayavatthurupyakiု sabhopokyapāka yaငya”
hadayavatthurupyanaှင’ya atūyaှñyathaဲ phaြcyapoyashā”kaြso kalāpyatūrupyamaျာ” phaြcyakaြsañña’ya pathavī-āpo-tejo
-vāyo-vaṇṇa-gandha-rasa-ojā-jīvita-hadaya hūso hadayavatthurupyalaျှငya (10)khumaြောkyaraှိso rupyaparamatya
sabhotarā”tiု’kiု tacyaluṃ”cī tacyaluṃ”cī ñāṇyaphaြင’ya khhaဲkhaြာ” cityaphaြာ၍ raှုpā．
akayya၍ aောငyamaြငyamaှု marakhaဲ’soya yaငya”manoakaြññyadhātya၏ aောkya၌ taññyaraှိkaြso makaြññya
so rupyakalāpyatiု’၌ dhātyakaြီ” (4)pā”kiုsā ñāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyaaောငya kaြိmyaphanyamaျာ”chā raှုpā， simya”chaññya”pā，
ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”yūpā． aောငyamaြငyamaှု raraှိlāsoakhā yaငya”dhātyakaြီ” (4)pā”tiု’kiု maှီ၍ phaြcyanekaြso
upādārupyatiု’kiု tacyaluṃ”cī tacyaluṃ”cī tiု”၍ taphaြññya”phaြññya” tacyaca tacyaca raှုkaြñña’yapā． pathavī-āpo-tejo-
vāyo-vaṇṇa-gandha-rasa-ojā-jīvita hūso (9)maျို”so rupyatarā”tiု’kiု the’raှိpāka hadayavatthukiု chakya
lakya၍ raှာphhekaြñña’yapā． naှluṃ”aိmyavayya jīvitana0kakalāpya = jīvitalaျှငya (9)khumaြောkyaraှိso rupyakalāpyanaှင’ya
bhā0dasakakalāpya = bhā0rupyalaျှငya (10)khumaြောkyaraှိso rupyakalāpyatiု’laññya” raှိkaြ၏． yaငya”rupyakalāpya
naှcyamaျို”tiု’laññya” makaြññyakaြpe． siု’soya jīvitakā” pāvaငyalaျkya raှိ၏． siု’athakya makaြññyaso rupyakalāpya
၌ jīvitasiု’tiုငyaaောငya (9)maျို”so rupyatarā”tiု’kiု raှု၍ranepāka hadayavatthurupyakiု chakyalakya၍ raှာphhe
kaြñña’yapā． thiု jīvita pāvaငyataññyaraှိneso makaြññyaso rupyakalāpyamaှာ jīvitana0kakalāpyanaှင’ya bhā0dasaka
kalāpya mahutyakhaဲ’laျှငya hadayadasakakalāpya = hadayavatthurupyalaျှငya (10)khumaြောkyaraှိso rupyakalāpyasā
phaြcyapesaññya． thiုkalāpya၌ hadayavatthukiု raှာphhethe’raှိniုငyapesaññya． hadayavatthuhūsaññya khandhā (5)pā”raှိso
pañcavokārabhuṃvayya manodhātya manoviññāṇadhātya amaññyaraso asicityatiု’၏ maှီrāsabhomaျှsā
phaြcyasaññya， amaှီkhaṃ rupyasabhomaျှsā phaြcyasaññya．
(6) dhāra ၌ taññyaraှိso rupyakalāpyamaျာ”
cakkhudhārasmi H hi cakkhu-kāya-bhā0dasaka0sena ti saṃ kammajarūpāni， upatthambhakāni pana tesaṃ
utucittāhārasamuṭṭhānāni catuvīsatīti catupaṇṇāsa honti． tathā sota-ghāna-jivaှါdhāresu．
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
638
kāyadhāre kāya-bhā0dasaka0sena ce0 utusamuṭṭhānādi0sena ca catucattālīsa． manodhāre
hadayavatthu-kāya-bhā0dasaka0sena ce0 utusamuṭṭhānādi0sena ca catupaṇṇāsame0．
(visuddhi-2-259．)
īathakyapā nāmaññyakaျောya visuddhimaggaaṭṭhakathā၌ phhaင’yachiုthā”toyamūsañña’yaatiုငya” ----
1． cakkhudhāra khoya maျkyaci၌ ---- cakkhudasakakalāpya， kāyadasakakalāpya， bhā0dasakakalāpya，
utujaaṭṭhakalāpya， cittajaaṭṭhakalāpya， āhārajaaṭṭhakalāpyahu rupyakalāpya amaျို”acā” (6)maျို”，
rupyaamaျို”acā” (54)maျို”tiု’ raှိkaြkunya၏．
2． sotadhāra khoya nā”၌ ---- sotadasakakalāpya， kāyadasakakalāpya， bhā0dasakakalāpya，
utujaaṭṭhakalāpya， cittajaaṭṭhakalāpya， āhārajaaṭṭhakalāpyahu rupyakalāpya amaျို”acā” (6)maျို”，
rupyaamaျို”acā” (54)maျို”tiု’ raှိkaြkunya၏．
3． ghānadhāra khoya naှာkhoငya”၌ ---- ghānadasakakalāpya， kāyadasakakalāpya， bhā0dasakakalāpya，
utujaaṭṭhakalāpya， cittajaaṭṭhakalāpya， āhārajaaṭṭhakalāpyahu rupyakalāpya amaျို”acā” (6)maျို”，
rupyaamaျို”acā” (54)maျို”tiု’ raှိkaြkunya၏．
4． jivaှါdhāra khoya laျှာ၌ ---- jivaှါdasakakalāpya， kāyadasakakalāpya， bhā0dasakakalāpya， utuja
aṭṭhakalāpya， cittajaaṭṭhakalāpya， āhārajaaṭṭhakalāpyahu rupyakalāpyaamaျို”acā” (6)maျို”， rupya
amaျို”acā” (54)maျို”tiု’ raှိkaြkunya၏．
5． kāyadhāra khoya kiုyya၌ ---- kāyadasakakalāpya， bhā0dasakakalāpya， utujaaṭṭhakalāpya， cittaja
aṭṭhakalāpya， āhārajaaṭṭhakalāpyahu rupyakalāpyaamaျို”acā” (5)maျို”， rupyaamaျို”acā” (44)maျို”tiု’
raှိkaြkunya၏．
6． manodhāra khoya hadayanaှluṃ”၌ ---- hadayadasakakalāpya， kāyadasakakalāpya， bhā0dasakakalāpya，
utujaaṭṭhakalāpya， cittajaaṭṭhakalāpya， āhārajaaṭṭhakalāpyahu rupyakalāpya amaျို”acā” (6)maျို”，
rupyaamaျို”acā” (54)maျို”tiု’ raှိkaြkunya၏． īsiု’laျှငya (6)dhāratiု’၌ rupyakalāpya amaျို”acā” asī”asī”
rupyaamaျို”acā” asī”asī” taññyaraှိkaြsaññyahu maှtyapā．
ī၌ rupyakalāpya amaျို”acā”sā (6)maျို” (5)maျို”casaññyaphaြင’ya rupyaamaျို”acā”sā (54)maျို” (44)maျို”
casaññyaphaြင’ya raှိkhaြငya” phaြcyasaññya． tacyamaျို” tacyamaျို”၌ arethakyakā” maျာ”chā raှိnemaññyasā phaြcyasaññya． maျkyaci၌
cakkhudasakakalāpya tacyamaျို”， kāyadasakakalāpyatacyamaျို” - īsiု’casaññyaphaြင’ya amaျို”acā”sā tacyamaျို”hu
chiုkhaြငya” phaြcyasaññya． maျkyaci၌ cakkhudasaka kalāpyapoငya”maျာ”chā， kāyadasaka kalāpyapoငya”maျာ”chā raှိkaြ
saññyasāphaြcyasaññya， īsiု’ casaññyaphaြင’ya (6)dhāraluṃ”၌ sabhopokyapāle．
abhidhammā paññāñāṇya raင’yasanyasū yogā0carapuggiုlyasūmaြtyatiု’kā” īmaျှchiုlaျှငya maျkyaci၌ rupyamaññyamaျှ
raှိsaññya， rupyakalāpyamaññyamaျှ raှိsaññya casaññyaphaြင’ya paြောpaြliုkyasoakhā lhayyalhayyakūkūpaငya siraှိ nā”laññya
shā”kaြ၏． raှုpuṃcanacyakiုlaññya” tacyakaြိmyatacyakhālokya paြောpaြruṃmaျှphaြင’ya raှုtatyashā”kaြ၏．

khaျုpyakhaြငya” raှိ၏， kaြာmaြင’yamaှ khaျုpyakhaြငya” raှိ၏， le”so apaြnya raှိ၏． cityasaññyakā” laျငyamaြnyaso khaျုpyakhaြငya” raှိ၏，
po’pā”so apaြnya raှိ၏． thiုsiု’ rupyatarā”tiု’thakya lhanyakaဲchā nāmyatarā”tiု’၏ sakyatamya”tiုso kāla
raှိsaññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya ----
nāhaṃ bhikkhave aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi， yaṃ evaṃ lahupari0ttaṃ yathayidaṃ bhikkhave cittaṃ．
(aṃ-1-9．)
= rahanya”tiု’ ...īcityasaññya laျငyamaြnyaso apaြnyaraှိsakaဲ’siု’ īatū laျငyamaြnyaso apaြnyaraှိso
cityamaှ tacyapā”so tacyakhuso tarā”kiုsoyamaျှlaññya” ငါbhurā”saññya sabbaññutañāṇyahūso samantacakkhuphaြင’ya
kaြñña’yaraှုsoyalaññya” maြငyatoyamamū． (aṃ-1-9．)
īsiု’ bhurā”raှငya hokaြာ”thā”toyamū၏． maှnyapesaññya - paṭisandhecityanaှင’ya atūphaြcyaso rupyatarā”
saññya asakyathaငyaraှာ”raှိnecañya athaငya”maှာpaငyalaျှငya (16)kaြိmyatiု’ tiုငyaaောငya cityasaññya phaြcyapaြီ”၍ khaျုpyashā”၏．
(kaျnya rupyatarā”tiု’၌laññya” naññya”tūpaငya maှtyapā．)
citya၏ phaြcyamaှု upādyakhaṇasaññyalaññya”koငya”， taññyamaှု ṭhīkhaṇasaññyalaññya”koငya”， paျkyamaှု = bhaငyakhaṇasaññya
laññya”koငya” tacyakhutaññya”kaဲ’siု’ tūkunya၏． siု’soya rupya၏ phaြcyamaှု = upādyakhaṇa， paျkyamaှု = bhaငyakhaṇatiု’saññyasā
laျှငya laျငyamaြnyakunya၏． thiုcitya၏ upādyakhaṇa bhaငyakhaṇatiု’naှင’ya tūkunya၏． khapyasimya”kunyaso saṅkhāratarā”tiု’ā”
upādyakhaṇa bhaငyakhaṇatiု’၌ matū khaဲpaြာ”maှုkā” maraှိpe． thiုsaṅkhāratarā”ā”luṃ”tiု’saññya tūmaျှso upādyakāla
bhaငyakāla raှိkaြkunyasaññyasā phaြcyakunya၏． siု’soya rupya၏ taññyamaှု ṭhīkhaṇasaññyakā” kaြာmaြင’yachā၏． (16)khaျkya
so cityatiု’saññya phaြcyapaြီ”၍ khaျုpyashā”kunyasaññyatiုငyaaောငya taññyane၏．
647
rupyakammaṭṭhānya”piုငya”
paṭisandhecitya၏ upādyakhaṇa၌ paṭisandhecityanaှင’ya paြိုငyatūphaြcyaso taññyachaဲ ṭhīkāla ṭhīkhaṇasiု’ rokyaraှိ
neso hadayavatthurupyakiု maှီ၍ bha0tacyakhuvayya paṭisandhecityanoငya naှcyakhumaြောkyaphaြcyaso dutiyabhavaငyacitya
saññya phaြcyapoyalā၏． yaငya” bhavaငyacitya၏ maှီrāphaြcyaso hadayavatthurupyamaှာ paṭisandhecityanaှင’ya paြိုငyatūphaြcyaso
rupya phaြcyasaphaြင’ya yaငya”dutiyabhavaငyathakya raှေ”ū”chā phaြcya၏． siု’athakya yaငya” hadayavatthurupyasaññya dutiya
bhavaငyacitya၏ raှေ”kaphaြcya၍ purejāta maññya၏． pañcavokāra amaññyaraso khandhā (5)pā”raှိso lokavayya
nāmyatarā”tiု’saññya maှီrāvatthurupyaraှိpāmaှ phaြcyapoyalāniုငyasañña’ya chamya”ā” raှိkaြ၏． yaငya”bhavaငyacityasaññyalaññya”
mimi၏ raှေ”ka phaြcyashā”so taññyachaဲ ṭhīkālasiု’ rokyaneso hadayavatthurupyakiု maှီthayyakhhaင’ya raraှိpāmaှ
phaြcyapoyalāniုငyasañña’ya chamya”ā” raှိ၏． yaငya”hadayavatthurupyakiု maှီthayyakhhaင’ya maraka phaြcyaniုငyasañña’ya chamya”ā” maraှိpe．
siု’athakya yaငya”paṭisandhenaှင’ya paြိုငyatūphaြcyaso hadayavatthurupyaka yaငya”dutiyabhavaငyaā” vatthupurejāta
nissayapaccayasattiphaြင’ya phaြcyapoyalāaောငya kaျေ”jū”paြုpe”saññyahu chiုra၏．
siု’athakya paṭisandhecitya၏ upādyakhaṇa၌ paṭisandhecityanaှင’ya paြိုငyatū phaြcyaso， rupya၏ ṭhīkhaṇa ṭhīkālasiု’
rokyaraှိneso， vatthupurejātanissayaakaြောငya”tarā” aphaြcyaphaြင’ya kaျေ”jū”paြုpe”tatyaso hadaya
vatthurupyakiု amaှီpaြု၍ dutiyabhavaငyacityasaññya phaြcyapoyalā၏． thiုdutiyabhavaငyacityanaှင’ya atūtakha phaြcyapoyalā
so rupya၏ ṭhīkālasiု’ rokyaraှိneso vatthupurejātanissaya akaြောငya”tarā” aphaြcyaphaြင’ya kaျေ”jū”paြုpe”
tatyaso hadayavatthurupyakiု amaှီpaြု၍ tatiyabhavaငyacityasaññya phaြcyapoyalā၏． īnaññya”phaြင’ya asakyaraှññyane
samaျှ kālapatyaluṃ” cityatiု’၏ phaြcyakhaြငya”sabhotarā”kiု siraှိpāle． (bha0tacyakhuvayya naှcyakhumaြောkya phaြcyaso
cityakiု dutiya， suṃ”khumaြောkya phaြcyaso cityakiု tatiyahu phhaင’yachiုthā”saññya．)
chiုphhayya athū”kā”
āsannamaraṇassa pana ekame0 ṭhānappattaṃ purejātaṃ vatthuṃ nissāya soḷasa cittāni uppajja nti．
(visuddhi-2-249．)
vatthurūpaṃ ekassa cittassa nissayo huthā aññassa na hoti ṭhapethā maraṇāsannaṃ， tasmā vuttaṃ
“tena saddhi H”tiādi． (mahāṭī-2-400．)
chiုphhayyaathū”kā” --- alhanyanī”kapyaso sekhaြငya”raှိneso sattavāā” tacyakhusālaျှငya phaြcyaso
rupya၏ ṭhīkālasiု’ rokyaraှိneso vatthupurejātanissaya maှီrāakaြောငya”tarā”aphaြcyaphaြင’ya kaျေ”jū”paြုpe”
tatyaso hadayavatthurupyakiု amaှီpaြု၍ (16)khaျkyaso cityatiု’saññya phaြcyapoyalākaြrakunya၏．
(visuddhi-2-249．)
sekhānī” maraṇāsannaakhaျိnyaakhā kālakiု khaြhaငya”khaျkyathā”၍ bha0tacyalaျှောkyavayya maှီrāvatthurupya tacyakhu
saññya tacyakhusocitya၏sā maှီrā phaြcyaniုငya၍ akhaြာ”so cityatacyakhu၏ maှီrāvatthurupya maphaြcyaniုငya． thiုkaြောင’ya -
“thiု dutiyabhavaငyacityanaှင’ya atūtakha phaြcyapoyalāso rupya၏ ṭhīkālasiု’ rokyaraှိneso vatthupurejāta
nissaya akaြောငya”tarā” aphaြcyaphaြင’ya kaျေ”jū”paြုpe”tatyaso hadayavatthurupyakiု amaှီpaြု၍ tatiyabhavaငyacitya
saññya phaြcyapoyalā၏． īnaññya”phaြင’ya asakyaraှññyanesamaျှkālapatyaluṃ” cityatiု’၏ phaြcyakhaြငya” sabhotarā”kiု
siraှိpāle” īsiု’caso cakā”rapyakiု aṭṭhakathācharātoya mina’yachiုtoyamūkhaြငya” phaြcyapesaññya．
(mahāṭī-2-400．)
648
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
vatthu-purejāta-nissaya ---- amaှီkhaṃ hadayavatthurupyaka maှီphaြcyamañña’ya cityathakya alaျငyaphaြcya၍ kaျေ”jū”
paြုpe”tatyaso maှီrāsattikiု chiုliုsaññya． amaှီkhaṃrupyasaññya maှီphaြcyamañña’ya cityathakya cittakkhaṇatacyakhu co၍
phaြcyanaှင’yarasaññya． yaငya”siု’ raှေ”ka phaြcyanaှင’ya၍ maှီrāaphaြcya kaျေ”jū”paြုpe”tatyaso hadayavatthu၏ sattikiု ī၌
vatthupurejātanissayasattihu khoyachiုpesaññya．
««sekhānī” maraṇāsannaakhā၌kā” cuticityamaှ paြnya၍ rethakyasoya (17)khumaြောkya phaြcyaso citya၏
upādyakhaṇanaှင’ya paြိုငya၍ kammajarupyatiု’saññya nokyachuṃ” phaြcyakaြ၏． thiုkaြောင’ya (16)khaျkyamaြောkyaso cityamaှca၍
cutitiုငyaaောငyaso cityaā”luṃ”tiု’saññya (17)khaျkyamaြောkyaso citya၏ upādyakālanaှင’ya paြိုငya၍ phaြcyakaြ
so hadayavatthurupyakiုsā amaှီpaြု၍ phaြcyapoyakaြrapesaññya．»»
khaျုpyapuṃsabho
phaြcyapuṅkiု paြpaြီ”၍ yakhuakhā၌ khaျုpyapuṅkiု chakyalakya၍ phoyapaြapyapāsaññya． paṭisandhecitya၏ upādyakhaṇa၌
paṭisandhecityanaှင’ya paြိုငyatūphaြcyaso rupyasaññya paṭisandhecityamaှ athakya၌ (16)khaျkyamaြောkyaso cityanaှင’ya atū
takha khaျုpya၏．
««paṭisandhecityapā thañña’yashaငya”၍ rethakyasoya (17)khaျkyamaြောkyaso citya၏ bhaငyakhaṇanaှင’ya paြိုငya၍
khaျုpya၏hu chiုliုsaññya． rupyatiု’saññya cittakkhaṇa (17)khaျkya asakyaraှññyakaြsaphaြင’ya cittakkhaṇa tacyakhu tacyakhu၌
upādya-ṭhī-bhaငya = phaြcya-taññya-paျkyahu khaṇaငyya (3)khaျkyacī raှိkaြrakā” cittakkhaṇahūso khaṇakaြီ”ā”phaြင’ya
(17)khaျkya， khaṇaငyyaā”phaြင’ya (17_3 = 51)khaျkya asakyaraှññyakaြ၏． upādyakhaṇanaှင’ya bhaငyakhaṇamaှာ khaṇaငyya
tacyakhaျkyacīsā phaြcya၏． ṭhīkālakā” khaṇaငyya (49)khaျkya raှိpesaññya． īsabhotarā”kiု nā”laññyathā”
pāka aောkyapācakā”rapyamaျာ”kiု nā”laññyamaññya phaြcyapāsaññya． cittakkhaṇa၏ khaṇaငyya (51)khaျkyace’maှ rupyatiု’
sakyatamya” kunyachuṃ”saññyahūso liုraငya”akhaျkyakiု maှtyasā”thā”pā．»»
paṭisandhecitya၏ ṭhīkhaṇa၌ phaြcyaso rupyasaññya paṭisandhenoငya (17)khaျkyamaြောkyasocitya၏ upādyakhaṇanaှင’ya
atūtakha paြိုငya၍ khaျုpya၏． ««paṭisandhecityapā rethakyalaျှငya (18)khumaြောkyaso citya၏ upādyakhaṇa၌ khaျုpyasaññya．
thiုupādyakhaṇakaျmaှ khaṇaငyya (51)khaျkya paြñña’yasaññya．»»
paṭisandhecitya၏ bhaငyakhaṇa၌ phaြcyaso rupyasaññya paṭisandhenoငya (17)khaျkyamaြောkyaso citya၏ ṭhīkhaṇa
siု’ rokyaraှိsoakhā (khaṇaငyya 51-khaျkya sakyatamya” paြñña’ya၍) khaျုpya၏．
akaြငyarhe’lokya saṃsarāhūso chakyakāchakyakā phaြcyatatyaso tarā”maññyasaññya siု’mahutya
citya၏ phaြcyakhaြငya” maññyasaññya raှိ၏． thiုrhe’lokya kālapatyaluṃ” īnaññya”tūsālaျှငya phaြcyane၏． (asaññasatya
bhuṃ၌kā” citya၏ phaြcyakhaြငya” maññyasaññya maraှိ၍ khaြhaငya”khaျkyathā”pā． alā”tūpaငya arūpabhuṃ၌laññya” rupya၏ phaြcyakhaြငya”
maññyasaññya maraှိsokaြောင’ya khaြhaငya”khaျkyathā”pā．)
kiုyyathaငyaraှာ” bhhā”kanaဲ phaြcyakaြkunyaso (amivamya”၌ paṭisandhe taññyaneramaှု maraှိkaြkunyaso) upapātya
sattavā (= opapātikasattavā)tiု’ā”laññya” cakkhudasaka kalāpya sotadasaka kalāpya ghānadasaka
kalāpya jivaှါdasaka kalāpya kāyadasaka kalāpya bhā0dasaka kalāpya hadayadasaka kalāpyahūso
(7)pā”kunyaso ū”khoငya”saphhayya ū”choငyaphaြcyakaြkunyaso rupyaacañyaatanya” santatisīsatiု’၏ achamya”phaြင’ya
(70)so rupyatiု’saññya īatūpaငyalaျှငya phaြcyapoya၍ nekaြkunya၏．
649
rupyakammaṭṭhānya”piုငya”
opapātikānampi sattasantati0sena sattatirūpāni e0me0 pavattanti． (visuddhi-2-249．)
saṃsedaja sattavātiု’၌laññya” naññya”tūpaငya maှtyapā． (mahāṭī-2-400．)
thiုkammajarupya၏ phaြcyamaှု၌ ----
1． kamma = kaṃ，
2． kammasamuṭṭhāna，
3． kammapaccaya，
4． kammapaccaya cittasamuṭṭhāna，
5． kammapaccaya āhārasamuṭṭhāna，
6． kammapaccaya utusamuṭṭhāna ----
ī (6)maျို”so khhaဲkhaြmya”vephanyakhaြငya”kiု sisaင’yapesaññya．
1． kamma = kaṃ hūsaññya
tattha kammaṃ nāma kusalākusalacetanā． (visuddhi-2-249．)
nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayabhūtaṃye0 idha kammanti adhippetanti āha “kammaṃ nāma kusalākusalacetanā”
ti． (mahāṭī-2-400．)
kammapaccayenāti anekānampi kappakoṭīnaṃ matthake attano phalaṃ uppādetuṃ samatthena nānāka
©ṇikakammapaccayenāti attho． kusalākusalauှိ kammaṃ attano pavattikkhaṇe phalaṃ na deti． yadi
dadeyaျ， yaṃ manusso de0lokūpagaṃ kusalakammaṃ karoti， tassānubhāvena tasmi aH ya0 khaṇe
devo bhaveyaျ． yasmi H pana khaṇe taṃ kataṃ， tato aññasmi H khaṇe avijjamānampi ke0laṃ kaṭattāye0
diṭṭhe0 dhamme upapajje vā apare vā pariyāye avasesapaccayasamāyoge sati phalaṃ uppādeti
niruddhāpi purimasippādikiriyā viya kālantare pacchimasippādikiriyāya． tasmā nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayoti
vuccati． (abhi-ṭṭha-3-374．)
1． kaṃ ---- nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayasattiphaြင’ya kaျေ”jū”paြုpe”tatyaso kusiုlyacetanā akusiုlyacetanā
hūsamaျှsaññya kaṃ maññya၏． cittakkhaṇa tacyakhuathaငya”၌ atūyaှñyathaဲ phaြcyakaြso yaှñyaphakya cityacetasikyatarā”
tiု’kiု kaျေ”jū”paြုpe”tatyaso cetanākā” sahajātakamma akaြောငya”tarā”taññya”． yaငya” sahajātakamma
akaြောငya”tarā”aphaြcyaphaြင’ya yaှñyaphakya cityacetasikyatarā”tiု’kiု phaြcyapoyalāaောငya kaျေ”jū”paြုpe”tatyaso
vipākya-kiriyānāmyatarā”tiု’naှင’ya cittakkhaṇatacyakhuathaငya”၌ atūyaှñyathaဲphaြcyaso vipākya-kiriyācetanā
saññya ī၌ kaṃ mamaññyape．
nānākkhaṇikakamma ---- akaြောငya”phaြcyaso kaṃtarā”naှင’ya akaျို”phaြcyaso vipākyarupyatarā” nāmyatarā”
tiု’saññya upādya-ṭhī-bhaငya ano”phaြင’ya thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyasañña’ya akhaျိnyakālasaññya maျာ”chā khākhaြာ”laျkyaraှိ၏． akaြောငya”
kaṃnaှင’ya akaျို”vipākyatiု’phaြcyarā akhaျိnyakālasaññya kambhākuṭepoငya”maျာ”chāsoyalaññya” khākhaြာ”niုငya၏． kambhā
kuṭepoငya”maျာ”chā athakyaka paြုcupaျို”thoငyakhaဲ’so kaṃsaññya yane’ mimi၏ akaျို”tarā”kiု phaြcyaceniုငyasañña’ya
chamya”ā”raှိ၏． yaငya”siု’ akaြောငya”kaṃnaှင’ya akaျို”vipākyatiု’ akhaျိnyakāla tacyakhutaññya”၌ maphaြcyabhaဲ akhaျိnyakāla
athū”thū”၌ phaြcyatatyasokaြောင’ya yaငya”kaṅkiု nānākkhaṇikakamma akaြောငya”tarā”hu khoyachiုpesaññya． akaျို”
650
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
tarā” phaြcyapoyalāaောငya nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayasattiphaြင’ya kaျေ”jū”paြုpe”tatyaso tarā”hu chiုliုpe
saññya． īkammajarupya၏ akaြောငya”tarā”kiု paြောchiုrā၌ yaငya” nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayahūso akaြောငya”kaṃ
kiုsālaျှငya kaṃhu aliုraှိapyapesaññya． sahajātakammacetanākiု īarā၌ kaṃhu machiုliုpe．
dhammatātacyakhu ---- kusiုlyakaṃ akusiုlyakaṃ maှnyasamaျှsaññya mimi၏ upādya-ṭhī-bhaငya ano”phaြင’ya thaငyaraှာ”
phaြcyanechaဲkhaṇa၌ vipākyaakaျို”tarā”kiု pe”riု”dhammatā maraှိpe． akayya၍ pe”riု”dhammatā raှိငြာ”aṃ’， lūsā”tacyaū”
saññya natyapaြññya rokyakaြောငya” kusiုlyakaṃ tacyakhukiု paြုcupaျို”thoငyakhaဲ’soya thiုkaṅkiု paြုnechaဲ khaṇa၌paငyalaျှငya

phaြcyakaြောငya”raှိso vipākyanāmyakhandhānaှင’ya kammajarupyaā” tiုkyariုkyaphaြcyacetatyasañña’ya janakaakaြောငya”tarā”

tiုkyariုkya phaြcyacetatyasañña’ya janakasattiphaြင’yasā kaျေ”jū”paြုsaññya mahutyase”， ā”pe”thokyapaṃ’tatyaso

saññya makaငya”cakoငya”so avinābhā0naññya”ā”phaြင’ya iriyāputhyanaှင’ya cittajarupyasāmanyakiုlaññya” phaြcyacetatya
saññyasā phaြcya၏． (viññatya， iriyāputhya mapāso cittajaojaṭṭhamakarupyamaျာ”kiု cittajarupyasāmanyahu chiုliုsaññya，，)
alā”tūpaငya iriyāputhyakiု thokyapaṃ’tatya khiုငyakhaṃ’cetatyaso cityasaññya cittajarupyasāmanyakiုlaññya”
phaြcyacetatya၏． cittajaojaṭṭhamakarupyamaျာ”mapābhaဲ iriyāpatharupyamaျာ” maphaြcyaniုငyasokaြောင’yaphaြcya၏． īkaဲ’siု’so
athū”kiု phoyapaြkhaြငya”ငှာ “vuṭṭho， kāmajo， abhiññāṇyajo hūso (32) maျို”so cityasaññya cittajarupyakiု
laññya”koငya”， iriyāputhyakiုlaññya”koငya”， viññatyarupyakiုlaññya”koငya” phaြcyacekunya၏”- hu (3)maျို”luṃ”kiု
poငya”caññya”khaြငya” samuccaññya”anakyaraှိso ca-saddākiု aṭṭhakathācharātoyasaññya asuṃ”paြုtoyamūkhaြငya” phaြcyape
saññya．
««īarā၌ pāḷi - ca-saddāsaññya maြnyamācakā” - laññya”koငya”naှင’ya adhippāyyatū၏． (3)khuthaငya tacyakhukhu
kiုsā rhe”khaျyyayūrasañña’ya laññya”koငya” mahutya． (3)khuluṃ”kiုyūraso laññya”koငya”paငya phaြcyasaññyahu
chiုliုpesaññya．»»
cittajarupya naှင’ya iriyāputhya
mahaggutya kusiုlyajo ---- 9 - maျို”
mahaggutya kaြိyājo ---- 9 - maျို”
lokuttarācitya ---- 8 - maျို”
ī (26)maျို”so appanājocityatiု’saññya ----
1． cittajarupya (cittajarupyasāmanya) kiုlaññya”koငya”
2． iriyāputhyakiုlaññya”koငya” phaြcyacekunya၏．
viññatyarupyakiုkā” maphaြcyacekaြkunya． (īappanājotiု’thaငya abhiññāṇyajomaျာ” mapāvaငyahu maှtyapā．)
(visuddhi-2-250．)
na viññata åd H janayanti mahaggatakusalādīnaṃ santabhāvena avipphārikabhā0to． vipphārikame0 hi
kāmā0carakusalādi viññattiṃsamuṭṭhāpeti， iriyāpathūpatthambhakāni pana honti sati santabhāve jhānavege
na saussāhattā， yato tesaṃ ja0nakiccatā． (mahāṭī-2-401．)
ī (26)maျို”so appanājotiု’saññya viññatyarupyakiု abhayyakaြောင’ya maphaြcyacetatyakaြkunyasanaññya”
hūmū ---- yaငya” mahaggutyajo lokuttarājotiု’၏ ငြိmyasakyasaññya၏ aphaြcyaphaြင’ya paြna’yakā”khaြငya” laှုpyaraှာ”khaြငya”
maraှိsaññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya viññatyarupyakiု maphaြcyaceniုငyakaြkunya． maှnyapesaññya ---- paြna’yakā”khaြငya” laှုpyaraှာ”khaြငya” raှိsaññya
sālaျှငya phaြcyaso kāmajo， abhiññāṇyajo caso cityasaññya viññatyarupyakiု phaြcyacetatya၏． siု’soya
yaငya” appanājocityatiု’saññya viññatyarupyakiု maphaြcyacetatya maphaြcyaceniုငyasoyalaññya” iriyāputhyakiုkā” taññyamaြဲ
tiုငya” thā”maြဲtiုငya” taññyataṃ’aောငya thokyapaṃ’tatya khiုငyakhaṃ’cetatyakunya၏． abhayyakaြောင’yanaññya”hūmū yaငya” appanā
jhānyajotiု’saññya ငြိmyaငြိmyasakyasakyaphaြcyamaှု raှိsaññya maှnyasoyalaññya” jhānya၏ ahunyaphaြင’ya ā”thutyakhaြငya” luṃ’la
ussāha thaငyaraှာ” raှိnesaññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’yataññya”． yaငya”siု’ ā”thutyakhaြငya” luṃ’la ussāha thaငyaraှာ” raှိne
saññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya thiု (26)maျို”so cityatiု’၏ jokicca raှိsaññya၏ aphaြcyasaññya phaြcyapoyalā၏． appanājo
tiု’၏ yaငya”siု’ ā”thutyakhaြငya” luṃ’laussāha thaငyaraှာ” raှိnesañña’yaathakya yaငya”tiု’thaငya mahaggutyajotiု’saññya

nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
ānāpānapaṭibhāganimitya kasiုṇya”paṭibhāganimitya caso thiုthiုsamathanimityaāruṃ၏ arasākiုlaññya”koငya”，
lokuttarājotiု’saññya asaṅkhatadhātya aငြိmya”dhātyanibbānya၏ ငြိmya”aေ”khaြငya” santisukha arasākiုlaññya”-
koငya” ahunyapaြငya”chā chakyatiုkyakhaṃcā”khaြငya” ja0nakiccakiု rhakyachoငyaniုငyakaြsaññya．
iriyāpathampi upatthambhe ntīti yathāpavattaṃ iriyāpathaṃ upatthambhe nti． (mūlaṭī-1-151．)
īathakyapā mūlaṭīkā၏ phhaင’yachiုkhaျkyaara abhiññāṇyakiccatapyakhiုkyaphaြcyaso rūpā0cara pañcamajhānyajomaှ
tacyapā”so abhiññāṇyakicca matapyaso rūpā0carapañcamajhānyajonaှင’ya takhaso īathakyathaငya phoyapaြthā”
so jhānyajo magyajo phiုlyajohūso appanājo (26)maျို”tiု’saññya viññatyarupyakiု maphaြcyaceniုငyakaြsaphaြင’ya
viññatyamapālaျှငya mapaြီ”so iriyāputhyaasacyakiု cataññya၍ maphaြcyaceniုငyakaြkunya， siု’soya vuṭṭho kāmajo
abhiññāṇyajotiု’kaြောင’ya phaြcyapoyalāso iriyāputhyakiုkā” thokyapaṃ’tatya khiုငyakhaṃ’cetatyakunya၏．
“thokyapaṃ’”chiုsaññyakā” vuṭṭho kāmajo abhiññāṇyajotiု’kaြောင’ya phaြcyapaြီ”sā”phaြcyaso shā”maှု rapyamaှု
thiုငyamaှု aိpyamaှု iriyāputhyakiု shā”maြဲtiုငya” rapyamaြဲtiုငya” thiုငyamaြဲtiုငya” aိpyamaြဲtiုငya” mapaျkyapaြာ”aောငya chakyalakya
taññyataṃ’aောငya khiုငyakhaṃ’cekunya၏hu chiုliုpesaññya．
“ cittajarupya sāmanyakiုsā phaြcyaceniုငya၏ ”
1． ahitya upekkhāsantīraṇacitya (2) pā” + mahāvipākyacitya (8)pā”hūso
kāmā0carabhavaငyacitya (bhavaငyakiccatapyakhiုkyakiု raññyasaññya．) ---- 10 - pā”
2． rūpā0caravipākyahūso rūpā0carabhavaငyacitya ---- 5 - pā”
3． pañcadhārāvajjanya”， sampaṭi cchiုငya”dhe” hūso manodhātya ---- 3 - pā”
4． ahitya kusalavipākya somanassasantīraṇacitya ---- 1 - pā”
ā”luṃ”poငya”soya ---- 19 - pā”
ī (19)pā”so cityatiု’saññya (iriyāpatha， viññatyamapāso) cittajarupyasāmanyakiုsālaျှငya phaြcyace
kaြkunya၏， iriyāputhyakiုlaññya” maphaြcyacekaြkunya， viññatyakiုlaññya” maphaြcyacekaြkunya． (visuddhi-2-250．)
rūpame0 janayanti na iriyāpathaṃ nirussāhasantabhāvena paridubbalabhā0to． (mahāṭī-2-402．)
ī (19)maျို”so cityatiု’saññya ā”thutyakhaြငya” luṃ’la ussāhamaraှိrakā” ငြိmyasakyaso phaြcyakhaြငya” raှိsaphaြင’ya
thakyavanya”kaျငya ā”naññya”saññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya cittajarupyasāmanyakiုsālaျှငya phaြcyaceniုငyakaြkunya၏． iriyāputhya
viññatyarupyakiု maphaြcyaceniုငyakaြkunya． (mahāṭī-2-402．)
cityachamya”aငyamaျာ”
yathā hi abbokiṇṇe bha0ṅge vattamāne aṅgāni osīdanti paviṭṭhāni viya honti， na evaṃ “dhatti saṃ
chabbīsā”ti vuttesu jāgaraṇacittesu vattamānesu． tesu pana vattamānesu aṅgāni upatthaddhāni yathāpavattira
dyāpathabhāvene0 pavattantīti． (mūlaṭī-1-151．)
