rupyakammaṭṭhānya”piုငya”
athakyathaငya phoyapaြthā”so (32)pā”socitya (26)pā”socityatiု’kiု jāgaraṇacitya = niု”kaြာ”ne
socityahulaññya”koငya”， kiriyāmayacitya = amūarākaြိyākiု paြီ”cī”cetatyasocityahulaññya”koငya”
khoyachiု၏． yaငya”jāgaraṇacitya kiriyāmayacityatiု’naှင’ya maronaှောso bhavaငyacityakhaျññya”sakyasakya achakya
mapaြtya akaြာ”alapya maraှိ chakyatiုkyaphaြcyaneso kāla၌ pakhuṃ”acaraှိso kiုyyaaṅgāacityaapiုငya”tiု’၏
laှုpyaraှာ”khaြငya” maraှိsaññya၏aphaြcyaphaြင’ya kaြံ’kaြံ’khiုငyakaြññya taññyataṃ’khaြငya”kā” phaြcyaniုငya၏． (mahāṭī-2-402．)
maှnyapesaññya ---- jāgaraṇacitya kiriyāmayacityatiု’naှင’ya maronaှောso bhavaငyacityakhaျññya”sakyasakya
achakyamapaြtya akaြာ”alapya maraှိ chakyatiုkyaphaြcyanelatyasoya kiုyyaaṅgātiု’saññya chutyanacyakunyasakaဲ’siု’
vaငyashā”kunya kaျုံ’shā”kunyasakaဲ’siု’ phaြcyakunyasakaဲ’siု’， (32)pā”socitya (26)pā”socityahu phhaင’yachiုthā”apya
kunyaso jāgaraṇacityatiု’ phaြcyakunyalatyasoya īatū chutyanacyakunyasakaဲ’siု’ vaငyashā”kunya kaျုံ’shā”kunyasakaဲ’siု’
maphaြcyakaြlekunya． thiု jāgaraṇacitya kiriyāmayacityatiု’ phaြcyakunyalatyasoya kiုyyaaṅgātiု’saññya toင’yataငya”
khiုငyamākunya၏， shā”laျှငya shā”sañña’yaatiုငya”， rapyalaျှငya rapyasañña’yaatiုငya”， thiုငyalaျှငya thiုငyasañña’yaatiုငya”， aိpyalaျှငya
aိpyasañña’yaatiုငya”hūso phaြcyapoyatiုငya”so iriyāputhya၏ aphaြcyaphaြင’yasālaျှငya chakyalakya၍ phaြcyapoya
nekaြkunya၏hu maှtyapā．
manodhārikajosā
na hi pañcadhārikaviññāṇehi gamanādīsu kañci iriyāpathaṃ kappeti． pa ． sabbopi panesa pabhedo
manodhārikaja0naye0 labbhati． (abhi-ṭṭha-2-388．)
athakyathaငya phoyapaြthā”khaဲ’so cittajarupyasāmanyakiုlaññya”koငya”， iriyāputhyakiုlaññya”koငya”， viññatya
rupyakiုlaññya”koငya” phaြcyacetatyaso vuṭṭho， kāmajo， abhiññāṇyajotiု’thaငya abhiññāṇyajotiု’maှာ
manodhārikajosā ekanyaphaြcyasaphaြင’ya chiုphhayyamaraှိpaြီ． vuṭṭho， kāmajotiု’kā” pañcadhārikalaññya” phaြcyakaြ၏，
manodhārikalaññya” phaြcyakaြ၏． ī၌ manodhāravīthithaငya pāvaငyaso manodhārāvajjanya” (= vuṭṭho) naှင’ya kāma
jomaျာ”kiုsāyūpā． pañcadhāravīthimaျာ”saññya alhanyaā”naññya”၏． thiုkaြောင’ya pañcadhāra၌pāso vuṭṭhonaှင’ya jo
tiု’saññya viññatyarupyakiု maphaြcyaceniုငya， iriyāputhyakiုlaññya” maphaြcyaceniုငya， tacyacuṃtacyakhuso iriyāputhyakiုlaññya”
mapaြုlupyaniုငyahu maှtyapā．

660
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
paṭisandhecityaka cittajarupyakiု maphaြcyaceniုငyapuṃ
1． maှီrā hadayavatthurupya၏ ā”naññya”khaြငya”，
2． taññyataññyataṃ’taṃ’ khiုငyakhiုငyakhaṃ’khaṃ’ thokyataññyarā mararaှိse”khaြငya”，
3． purejāta caso akaြောငya”athokyaapaṃ’ khaျို’taဲ’khaြငya”，
4． bha0sacya၌ rokyakhāca āgantukamaျှsā phaြcyase”khaြငya”，
5． cittajarupyatiု’၏ taññyaphiု’rā akaြောငya”kiု kammajarupyamaျာ”ka nerāyūthā”paြီ” phaြcyakhaြငya” ----
īakaြောငya”maျာ”kaြောင’ya paṭisandhecityahūsamaျှsaññya cittajarupyakiု maphaြcyaceniုငyakhaျေ．
1． rupyatiု’maññyasaññya phaြcyachaဲ upādyaakhiုkya၌ ā”naññya”၏， ṭhīkālasiု’ rokyaraှိmaှsālaျှငya ā”raှိ၏． īkā”
rupyatiု’၏ dhammatātaññya”． paṭisandhekhā၌ phaြcyace， pavattiakhā၌ phaြcyace rupyatiု’saññya phaြcyachaဲ upādyaakhiုkya၌
pacchājātapaccaññya” akaြောငya”tarā”၏ athokyaapaṃ’ āhāracasaññyatiု’၏ athokyaapaṃ’kiု mararaှိ
se”saphaြင’ya rupyahūsamaျှsaññya phaြcyachaဲ upādyaakhiုkya၌ ā”se”maြဲ dhammatāpaငyaphaြcyasaññya． īsiု’ ā”se”
so ā”maraှိse”so miminaှင’ya bha0sacya၌ cataငya၍ paြိုငyatū phaြcyarasañña’ya hadayavatthurupyakiု maှီ၍ phaြcyara
so paṭisandhecityasaññya cittajarupyakiု maphaြcyaceniုငya． (abhi-ṭṭha-2-22．)
2． paṭisandhecityasaññya maှီrāvatthurupya ā”naññya”ruṃsāmaka mimi kiုyyatiုငyakalaññya” kaṃahunya pacyakhaျliုkya
saphaြင’ya bha0sacya၌ phaြcyakhācasā raှိnese”sañña’yaathakya taññyataññyataṃ’taṃ’ khiုငyakhiုငyakhaṃ’khaṃ’ thokyataññyarākiု
mararaှိse”rakā” khaျောkyakamya”pā”paြtyasiု’ kaျrokyanechaဲphaြcyaso yokyaျာ”saññya sūtacyapā”၏ amaှီ
kiု makhaṃniုငyasakaဲ’siု’， thiု’atū paṭisandhecityasaññya cittajarupyamaျာ” phaြcyapoyalālokyaaောငya sahajāta
nissayasattiphaြင’ya kaျေ”jū”paြုmape”niုငyape， cittajarupyamaျာ”kiု maphaြcyaceniုငyape． (abhi-ṭṭha-2-22．)
3． paṭisandhenoငya chakyalakya phaြcyapoyalākaြso pathamabhavaငyacaso vipākyacityamaျာ”laññya” kaṃahunya
pacyakhaျ၍paငya phaြcyapoyalākaြrasokaြောင’ya taññyataṃ’niုငyaphhayya maraှိkhaျေ， siု’soya paṭisandhecitya caso mimi
mimitiု’၏ raှေ”raှေ” khaျုpyashā”so cityamaျာ”ka anantaracaso paccayaakaြောငya”sattitiု’phaြင’ya kaျေ”jū”
paြုpe”laျkya raှိ၏， mimitiု’ maphaြcyamī kaြိုtaငya၍ phaြcyanaှင’yakaြso paṭisandhecityacaso raှေ”raှေ”so cityanaှင’ya
atū upādyakhaျငya”paြိုငya၍ phaြcyaso rupya၏ ṭhīkālasiု’ rokyaraှိnesaphaြင’ya ā”raှိneso hadayavatthurupyakiု
maှီthayya၍ phaြcyarasaphaြင’ya yaငya” maှီrā hadayavatthuka purejātacaso paccayaakaြောငya”sattitiု’phaြင’yalaññya”
kaျေ”jū”paြုpe”laျkya raှိ၏． thiုkaြောင’ya pathamabhavaငyacaso cityamaျာ”maှာ ā”aငyapaြñña’ya0laျkya raှိsaphaြင’ya
cittajarupyakiု phaြcyaceniုငyakaြ၏．
paṭisandhecityamaှာmūkā” mimi၏ maှီrā hadayavatthurupyanaှင’ya atūtakha maraှေ”manaှောငya” bha0sacyavayya paြိုငyatū
phaြcyapoyalāra၏． thiု paṭisandhecityaā” maှီrā hadayavatthurupyaka raှေ”ka phaြcya၍ kaျေ”jū”paြုpe”khaြငya”hūso
purejāta phaြcya၍ maှီrāakaြောငya”tarā” phaြcyaphiု’ranya machamya”niုငyape． akayya၍ maှီrāvatthurupyaka paṭisandhecitya၏
raှေ”kaphaြcyanaှင’ya၍ purejāta akaြောငya”tarā” phaြcyaphiု’ranya chamya”niုငyakhaဲ’pāmūkā” paṭisandhecityasaññyalaññya” cittaja
rupyakiု phaြcyaceniုငyalerāsaññya．
akaြငya cittakkhaṇa၌ maှီrāvatthurupyasaññya amaှီkhaṃcitya၏ raှေ”ka phaြcya၍ vatthupurejātanissaya akaြောငya”
tarā” phaြcyaphiု’ranya chamya”niုငya၏． cakkhuakaြññyadhātya caso maှီrāvatthurupya santatiacañyatanya”saññya maှီrāvatthurupya
661
rupyakammaṭṭhānya”piုငya”
tacyakhu thaငyaraှာ” raှိnecañyamaှာpaငyalaျှငya akhaြာ”tacyapā”so maှီrāvatthurupya၏ khaျုpyapaျkyashā”khaြငya” asacyathapyaphaြcyakhaြငya”
၏achamya”phaြင’ya santatiacañyasaññya chakyacapyamine၏． lhanyakhaဲ’so atityabha0ka cuti၏ maှီrāvatthurupyanaှင’ya lakyaraှိ
bha0sacya paṭisandhe၏ maှီrā vatthurupyatiု’kaဲ’siု’ rupyasantati acañyaatanya” paြtyacaဲlaျkya phaြcyasaññyakā” mahutya．
rupyasantatiacañyaatanya”saññya raှေ”naှင’yanokya chakyacapyalaျkyasā phaြcyane၏．
««puṃcaṃtacyakhu ---- paṭisandhenoငya cittakkhaṇa (17)khaျkyamaြောkyaso cityakiု puṃcaṃthā”၍ kaြñña’yapā． paṭisandhe
cityanaှင’ya upādyakhaျငya” paြိုငya၍ phaြcyalākaြso kammajarupyatiု’saññya yaငya” paṭisandhenoငya (17)khaျkyamaြောkyaso
citya၏ bhaငyakālaakhiုkya၌ cittakkhaṇa (17)khaျkya sakyatamya”ce’saphaြင’ya khaျုpyapaျkyashā”kaြ၏． yaငya” (17)khaျkya
maြောkyaso citya၏ upādyakāla-ṭhīkāla-bhaငyakālatiု’၌laññya” kammajarupyamaျာ” asacyaasacya phaြcyapoyalaျkya
raှိkaြ၏． cittajarupya utujarupyatiု’laññya” thiုkyasaliု phaြcyanekaြ၏． tacyaphanya paṭisandhenoငya pathamabhavaငya dutiya
bhavaငya casañña’ya cityatiု’၏ upādya-ṭhī-bhaငya kālatiု’၌laññya” kammajarupyamaျာ” asacyaasacya phaြcyaphā”laျkya raှိkaြ၏．
yaငya” pathamabhavaငya dutiyabhavaငyacaso cityatiု’kalaññya” mimi upādyachaဲkāla၌ cittajarupyamaျာ”kiု phaြcyacekaြpaြnya၏．
yaငya”rupyakalāpyatiု’thaငya pāvaငyaso tejodhātya (= utu) kalaññya” rupya၏ ṭhīkālasiု’rokyatiုငya” utuja
rupya asacyaasacyakiု phaြcyacekaြpaြnya၏． yaငya” pathamabhavaငya casaññyatiု’၏ akhiုkya၌ phaြcyapoyashā”kaြso rupya
tarā”tiု’saññyakā” paṭisandhenoငya (17)khaျkyamaြောkyaso cittakkhaṇaakhiုkya၌kā” cittakkhaṇa (17)khaျkya
sakyatamya” mace’se”saphaြင’ya chakyalakya၍ taññyanechaဲpaငya phaြcyakaြ၏． siု’athakya yaငya” paṭisandhenoငya (17)
khaျkyamaြောkyaso cittakkhaṇavayya - rupyatiု’၏ khaျုpyamaှု paျkyamaှုlaññya” raှိ၏， rupyatiု’၏ phaြcyamaှုlaññya” raှိ၏， sakyatamya”
makunyase”sañña’ya taññyachaဲrupyatiု’၏ taññyamaှုlaññya” raှိne၏． siု’athakya rupyasantatiacañyaatanya”saññya raှေ”naှင’ya
nokya chakyacapyalaျkyasā phaြcyane၏． kaျnyacittakkhaṇatiု’၌laññya” naññya”tū sabhopokyapā．»»
thiုvatthupurejātanissayasattiphaြင’ya kaျေ”jū”paြုpe”niုငyaso vatthurupyakiု maှီthayyakhhaင’ya raraှိso thiုcittaka
©ṇa akhiုkya၌laññya” cityasaññya mimicityakiု thapyachaင’yaā”pe”tatyaso vitakya vicāracaso jhānyaaṅgāmaျာ”，
sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappacaso maggaငyamaျာ”， phassa cetanācaso cityaaṅgāmaျာ” mayutyalaျော’soyasālaျှငya
thaငyaraှာ”raှိnesoyasālaျှငya cittajarupyakiု phaြcyaceniုငya၏． thiု jhānaငya maggaငyatiု’ yutyalaျော’nesañña’yaathakyakaြောင’ya
cakkhuviññāṇyacasañña’ya pañcaviññāṇyatiု’saññya cittajarupyakiု maphaြcyaceniုငyakaြkunya． (abhi-ṭṭha-2-22． mūlaṭī-2-18．)
chiုphhayyaraှိlāpaြnya၏． paṭisandhecityanaှင’ya upādyakhaျငya” paြိုငya၍ atūphaြcyapoyalāso hadayavatthusaññya
thiုpaṭisandhecitya၏ ṭhīkhaṇa၌laññya”koငya”， bhaငyakhaṇa၌laññya”koငya” purejāta phaြcyane၏ = raှေ”ka phaြcyane၏．
thiုkaြောင’ya paṭisandhecitya၏ ṭhīkhaṇa bhaငyakhaṇatiု’၌ maှီrāhadayavatthurupyasaññya purejāta = raှေ”ka phaြcyakhaြငya”
hūso akaြောငya”tarā” khaျို’taဲ’maှု maraှိsokaြောင’ya thiု ṭhīkhaṇa bhaငyakhaṇa၌ yaငya” paṭisandhecityaka rupyakiု
phaြcyapācehu paြောchiုlāငြာ”aṃ’， yaငya” ayūachakiု tā”maြcyaliု၍ aောkyapā cakā”rapyakiု aṭṭhakathāka
chakya၍ mina’yatoyamūpaြnyasaññya． (mūlaṭī-2-18．)
akayya၍ cityasaññya ṭhīkhaṇa၌laññya”koငya”， bhaငyakhaṇa၌laññya”koငya” rupyakiု phaြcyaceငြာ”aṃ’， paṭisandhe
cityasaññyalaññya” rupyakiု phaြcyacelerā၏． siု’soya cityahūsamaျှsaññya ṭhīkhaṇa bhaငyakhaṇa naှcyamaျို”၌ rupyakiု maphaြcya
ceniုငya． (abhi-ṭṭha-2-22．)
thiုcakā”rapyavayya paṭisandhecityanaှင’ya atūupādyaso hadayavatthu၏ ṭhīkhaṇa bhaငyakhaṇatiု’၌laññya” thiု
paṭisandhe cityacetasikyatiု’၏ maှီrāvatthurupyasaññya purejāta maphaြcyapāhūso cakā”kiု machiုsaင’yasaññyasāhu
662
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
khhaင’yapaြုlaျkyapaငya raှိ၏． thiုkhhaင’yapaြုkhaျkya၌laññya” apaြcyakiု thaငyaraှာ”paြlaျkyapaငya raှိ၏． akayya၍ thiုṭhīkhaṇa bhaငyakhaṇa
tiု’၌ rupyakiု phaြcyaceငြာ”aṃ’， saငya codaka၏ ayūachaā”phaြင’ya paṭisandhecityasaññyalaññya” rupyakiု phaြcyace
lerā၏． siု’soya thiုṭhīkhaṇa bhaငyakhaṇa၌ cittajarupya၏ phaြcyakhaြငya”saññya maraှိsaññyasā phaြcya၏． cityahūsamaျှsaññya
alhanya apaျkyamaြnyarakā” cityaā”luṃ”၏ bhaငyakhaṇa၌ mimikiုyyatiုငyaka paျkyachaဲphaြcya၍ rupyakiု maphaြcyaceniုငya，
ṭhīkhaṇa၌laññya” (ṭhīkhaṇahūsañña’ya paျkyamañña’ya bhakyasiု’ yiုငyalaဲnesosabhā0phaြcyarakā”) paျkyaphiု’ka raှေ”raှုneso
kaြောင’ya rupyakiု maphaြcyaceniုငya． akaြငyaakhā၌ anantara purejāta caso akaြောငya” athokyaapaṃ’kiု raraှိsaphaြင’ya
cityasaññya aငyaā”raှိlāsañña’yaathakya cittajarupyasaññya phaြcyapoyalā၏， thiုakhā citya၏ upādyakhaṇa၌sā phaြcyapoya
lāpesaññya． saငyacodaka၏ ayūachaā”phaြင’yalaññya” akaြောငya”tarā”saññya khaျို’taဲ’laျkyasā raှိpesaññya．
paṭisandhekhaṇa၌ purejātanissaya akaြောငya”tarā” maraှိsokaြောင’ya phaြcya၏． thiုkaြောင’ya paṭisandhecityasaññya
rupyakiု maphaြcyaceniုငyahu maှtyapā． (mūlaṭī-2-18．)
maှိုငုံsaññya maြkeြီ”thaဲmaှ maြpeoyasiု’ thhakyapoyalāsoya maြmeှုna’yakiု mimi aငုံthipyapoya၌ yūchoငyalaျkya
rhakyalaျkyasālaျှငya thhakyapoyalā၏． siု’alā”tūpaငya cityasaññya mimi၏ raှေ”ka phaြcyaso vatthurupyakiု maှီ၍
sālaျှငya mimi၏ phaြcyachaဲ upādyakhaṇa၌ phaြcyalaျှငyaphaြcyakhaြငya” (8)maျို”so ojaṭṭhamakarupyatiု’kiု yūchoငya၍sālaျှငya
thhakyapoyalā၏． (anantaracaso akaြောငya”paccaññya”tiု’၏ athokyaapaṃ’ achamya”kaြောင’ya cityasaññya phaြcyachaဲ
upādyakhaṇa၌ ahunyaraှိraှိnaှင’ya aငyaā”paြñña’yataငya”chā phaြcyapoyalāsokaြောင’yapaငyataññya”． ---- mūlaṭī-2-19．)
paṭisandhekhaṇa၌laññya” maှီrā hadayavatthurupyasaññya paṭisandhecitya၏ raှေ”kaphaြcya၍ vatthupurejātanissaya maှီrā
akaြောငya”tarā” phaြcyaphiု’ranya machamya”niုငyape． thiုkaြောင’ya vatthupurejātanissayahūso maှီrā akaြောငya”tarā”
khaျို’taဲ’sañña’ya aphaြcyakaြောင’yalaññya” paṭisandhecityasaññya cittajarupyakiု maphaြcyaceniုငya． (abhi-ṭṭha-2-22．)
4． marokyaphū”se”so arapyatacyapā”siု’ rokyaraှိlāso rokyasacyaca āganta Kka eñña’yasaññyayokyaျာ”
saññya rokyarāarapya၌ mimi၏ arāṭhāna mahutyasañña’yaathakya maciု”piုငyasañña’yaathakya sūtacyapā”tiု’ā”
“amoငyatiု’ ...lākaြpā ...， amoငyatiု’ā” rhāthaဲ၌ thamaငya” aphaျောya panya”naṃ’sā casaññyatiု’kiု
pe”laှူpāmayya” casaññyaphaြင’ya lokhatyapaျူငှာ paြောchiုlākhaြငya”ငှာ machamya”niုငyasakaဲ’siု’ alā”tūpaငya
paṭisandhecityasaññyalaññya” thiုthiု bha0sacya၌ rokyasacyaca eñña’yasaññya āganta Kmaျှsā phaြcya၏． thiုsiု’ mimi၏
bha0sacya၌ rokyasacyaca eñña’yasaññya āganta Kmaျှsā phaြcyasañña’yaathakyakaြောင’yalaññya” cittajarupyamaျာ”kiု
phaြcyapoyalāphiု’ranya lokhatyapaျူ ငှာ mapaြုniုငyakhaျေ， cittajarupyakiု maphaြcyaceniုငyape． (abhi-ṭṭha-2-22．)
5． pavattiakhā၌ cityacetasikyatarā”tiု’saññya cittajarupyatiု’ā” sahajāta nissaya caso paccayasatti
= akaြောငya”sattitiု’phaြင’ya phaြcyapoyalāaောငya kaျေ”jū”paြုlaျkya raှိ၏． (paṭṭhāna-1-5．) paṭisandhecityakā”
thiုpaccayasatti = akaြောငya”sattitiု’phaြင’ya miminaှင’ya atūtakha phaြcyaphakya amaျှsuṃ”chayyakunyaso kammaja
rupyatiု’ā” kaျေ”jū”paြုliုkyaralepaြီ． amaျှsuṃ”chayyakunyaso kammajarupyatiု’saññya cittajarupyatiု’၏ nerākiု
yū၍ taññyanekaြkunya၏． thiုkaြောင’yalaññya” paṭisandhecityasaññya cittajarupyakiု maphaြcyaceniုငya．
(abhi-ṭṭha-2-22．)
663
rupyakammaṭṭhānya”piုငya”
rahantāaraှငyamaြtyatiု’၏ cuticitya
khīṇāsavassa pana cuticittaṃ vaṭṭamūlassa vūpasantattā na samuṭṭhāpeti． tassa hi sabbabhavesu vaṭṭamūlaṃ
vūpasantaṃ abhabbuppattikaṃ， punabbhave paveṇī nāma natthi． (abhi-ṭṭha-2-22-23．)
= rahantāaraှငyamaြtya၏ cuticityatoyasaññyakā” avijjā taṇaှာhūso saṃsarāvaṭyamaြcya၏ ငြိmya”aေ”paြီ”
paြtyacaဲpaြီ” phaြcyasañña’yaathakyakaြောင’ya cittajarupyakiု maphaြcyaceniုငya． maှnyapesaññya --- thiုrahantāaraှငyamaြtya၏ santānya
vayya aluṃ”cuṃso bha0tiု’၌ avijjā taṇaှာhūso vaṭyamaြcyasaññya ငြိmya”aေ”paြီ” phaြcya၏． noငyatacyaphanya thapyamaṃ၍
maphaြcyathiုkyaso sabhoraှိ၏． bha0sacyavayya rupyaachakyaashayya acañyaachakyamaññyasaññya maraှိto’paြီ．
(abhi-ṭṭha-2-22-23．)
cū”camya”chaငyakhaြငyapā
vaṭṭamūlanti taṇaှာ avijjā vuccati． cuticittena uppajjamānaṃ rūpaṃ tato purimatarehi uppajjamānaṃ viya na
bhavantare uppajjatīti vaṭṭamūlassa vūpasantattā anuppatti vicāretabbā． (mūlaṭī-2-19．)
“avijjā taṇaှာhūso vaṭṭamūlatarā”၏ ငြိmya”paြီ”sañña’yaathakya rahantāaraှငyamaြtyatiု’၏ cuticitya
toyasaññya cittajarupyakiု maphaြcyaceniုငya” - hūso aṭṭhakathācakā”rapyakiု mūlaṭīkācharātoyaka manaှcyasakyape．
manaှcyasakyarakhaြငya”၏ akaြောငya”kā” “aṭṭhakathācharātoyaka rahantāaraှငyamaြtyatiု’၏ cuticityatoyasaññya
cittajarupyakiု phaြcyaceniုငyalaျှငya thiုrupyasaññya nokyabha0၌ chakyashā”lima’yamaññyahu yūchahanyatū၏”hu ṭīkācharā
toyaka athakyapā aṭṭhakathācakā”rapyakiု kokyakhaျkyakhaျthā”၏． thiုsiု’ chakyashā”maññya maciု”phiု’rā ṭīkā
charātoyaka - “cuticityakaြောင’ya phaြcyaso rupyasaññya thiု cuticityamaှ raှေ”၌ phaြcyakunyaso cityatiု’kaြောင’ya phaြcya
so rupyakaဲ’siု’paငya nokyabha0hūso bha0tacyapā”၌ maphaြcyapā” - hu akaြောငya”paြthā”၏． siု’athakya avijjā
taṇaှာhūso vaṭṭamūlatarā”၏ ငြိmya”paြီ”sañña’ya athakyakaြောင’ya rahantāaraှငyamaြtyatiု’၏ cuticityatoyakaြောင’ya
cittajarupya maphaြcyakhaြငya”kiု cicacyathiုkyape၏hu mūlaṭīkācharātoyaka mina’yachiုthā”pesaññya．
siု’soya aṭṭhakathācharātoya၏ aliုmaှာ mūlaṭīkācharātoya yūchasaliု mahutyakaြောငya”kiု madhu
ṭīkāka īsiု’ raှငya”paြthā”၏．
“avijjā taṇaှာhūso vaṭyamaြcyaraှိnese”laျှငya cutipaြီ”nokya paṭisandhesacya phaြcyarā၏， thiု paṭisandhe
asacyaā” kaျေ”jū”paြုphiု’ranya rahantā araှငyamaြtyatiု’၏ cuticityatoyamaှာlaññya” (cittajarupyakiု phaြcyacekhaဲ’laျှငya)
anantarasattiraှိrā rokyalerā၏， amaှnyaā”phaြင’ya rahantāaraှငyamaြtyatiု’၏ cuticityatoyamaှာ anantarasatti
maraှိ， thiုsatti maraှိsokaြောင’ya cittajarupyakiု maphaြcyaceniုငya”hu madhuṭīkāka phhaင’yapaြthā”pesaññya． (vaṭyamaြcya paြtyapaြီ”
sokaြောင’ya yaငya”cuticityatoyamaှာ anantarasatti maraှိkhaြငya” phaြcyasaññya． thiုsattimaraှိsokaြောင’ya cittajarupyakiု
maphaြcyaceniုငyahu chiုliုpesaññya． siု’soya mūlaṭīkācharātoyakā” sattavāā”luṃ”tiု’၏ cuticityamaှnyasamaျှsaññya
cittajarupyakiု maphaြcyaceniုငyahu ayūraှိtoyamū၏． aောkyathaငya thaငyaraှာ”lattaṃ’．)
cuticitya ayūacha
“kāmā0carānaṃ pacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā kāmā0carānaṃ pacchimacittaṃ uppajjissati，
rūpā0care arūpā0care pacchimabhavikānaṃ， ye ca rūpā0caraṃ arūpā0caraṃ upapajjithā parinibbāyissanti，
664
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
tesaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ 0cīsaṅkhāro nirujjhissati， no ca tesaṃ kāyasaṅkhāro nirujjhissatī”ti pana
0canato aññesampi cuticittaṃ rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpetīti viññāyati． na hi rūpasamuṭṭhāpakacittassa gabbhagamanādi-
vinibaddhābhāvena kāyasaṅkhārā samuṭṭhāpanaṃ atthi， na ca yuttaṃ “cuto ca cittasamuṭṭhānañcassa pavattatī”ti，
nāpi “cuticittaṃ rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpetī”ti pāḷi atthīti． (mūlaṭī-1-151-152． mahāṭī-2-402．)
īathakyapā saṅkhārayamiုkyapāḷitoya (abhi-6-28-29．)၌ lāraှိso pāḷitoyakā” vitakya vicāra
hūso 0cīsaṅkhārasā khaျုpyalattaṃ’phaြcya၍ assāsa-passāsa hūso kāyasaṅkhāra makhaျုpyalattaṃ’so puggiုlya
maျာ”kiု phoyapaြso pāḷitoyapaငya phaြcyasaññya． assāsa-passāsa khaျုpyalattaṃ’ maraso puggiုlyatiု’hūsaññya
nokyathapya saṃsarākharī” thaငyaraှာ”raှိnese”soyalaññya”koငya”， saṃsarākharī” paြtyacaဲshā”soyalaññya”koငya”
maññyasañña’yaakhaျိnyakālamaှ maphaြcyalattaṃ’so puggiုlyatiု’paငya phaြcyakaြsaññya． yaငya”siု’ assāsa-passāsa makhaျုpya
lattaṃ’so puggiုlyatiု’maှာ aောkyapāatiုငya” phaြcyakaြsaññya．
1． kāmatihityacuticitya (4)khu cetasikya (33)tiု’၏ uppādakkhaṇasamaṅgī (= phaြcyachaဲ upādyakhaṇanaှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃ
so) puggiုlyahu chiုapyaso jhānyamavaငyacā”so kāmā0cara arahattaphalaṭṭhānya = rahantāpuggiုlya，
2． pacchimacitya (= nokyachuṃ”cuticitya) maှ paြnya၍ rethakyasoya achuṃ”chanyaso assāsapassāsanaှင’ya
atūtakha khaျုpyaso cityamaှsaññya nokyachuṃ” pacchimacitya၏ anantaraphaြcyaso ----
ka． dutiya tadāruṃ (tadāruṃnoငya cutikaျsovāra )，
kha． maraṇāsanna pañcamajo (jonoငya cutikaျsovāra )，
ga． bhavaငya (bhavaငyanoငya cutikaျsovāra ) tiုငyaaောငya jhānyamavaငyacā”so kāmā0cara arahattaphalaṭṭhānya
= rahantāpuggiုlya，
3． pathamajhānyavipākya dutiyajhānyavipākya hu chiုapyaso savitakka-savicāracityaphaြင’ya parinibbānyapaြုlattaṃ’
sosū phaြcyaṃ’， paṭisandhemaှca၍ nokyachuṃ” pacchimacitya၏ upādyatiုငyaaောငya， avitakka-avicāra vipākya
cityaphaြင’ya parinibbānyapaြုlattaṃ’sosū phaြcyaṃ’， maraṇāsannapañcamajo၏ upādyatiုငyaaောငya jhānyavaငyacā” mavaငya
cā”so rūpā0cara arūpā0cara pacchimabhavika (= nokyachuṃ”bha0raှိso) puggiုlya，
4． kāmasugati (7)bhuṃmaှ rūpā0cara arūpā0carabhuṃsiု’ phaြcya၍ parinibbānyapaြုlattaṃ’sosū phaြcyaṃ’， achuṃ”chanyaso
assāsapassāsanaှင’ya atūtakha khaျုpyaso cityamaှsaññya cutitiုငyaaောငya kāmā0caracavanta (= kāma
bhuṃ၌ cutichaဲ) puggiုlya，
5． rūpā0cara arūpā0carabhuṃ akhaျငya”khaျငya”maှာsā nokyathapya phaြcyakhhaင’yaraှိsaññyaphaြcya၍ parinibbānyapaြုlattaṃ’so
sūphaြcyaṃ’， paṭisandhemaှca၍ cutitiုငyaaောငya asaññasatya akaniṭṭha kaြñyaso rūpa-arūpapuggiုlya ----
īpuggiုlya (5)maျို”tiု’kā” 0cīsaṅkhāra khaျုpyalattaṃ’phaြcya၍ assāsa-passāsa (= kāyasaṅkhāra) makhaျုpyalattaṃ’
so puggiုlyatiု’ phaြcyakaြ၏． noငya assāsa-passāsa phaြcyakhhaင’ya maraှိto’so puggiုlyamaျာ”hu chiုliုpesaññya．
assāsapassāsā cittasamuṭṭhānā0． (visuddhi-1-362．)
= assāsapassāsatiု’saññyakā” cityakaြောင’yaphaြcyasañña’ya cittasamuṭṭhānyarupyatiု’sā phaြcyakaြ၏．
athakyapā saṅkhārayamiုkyapāḷitoyakiု thokya၍ “aluṃ”cuṃso puggiုlyatiု’၏ cuticityasaññya assāsa
passāsakiု maphaြcyaceniုငyasakaဲ’siု’ assāsapassāsanaှင’ya cittajarupyakhaျငya” tūññīso akhaြာ” cittajarupyamaျာ”kiုlaññya”
665
rupyakammaṭṭhānya”piုငya”
cuticityahūsamaျှsaññya maphaြcyaceniုငya”hu mūlaṭīkācharātoyaka chiုliုpesaññya． maှnyapesaññya -- cittajarupyakiု
phaြcyacetatyasocitya၏ amivamya”၌ phaြcyakhaြငya”， renacyanekhaြငya”， me’maျောnekhaြငya”， senekhaြငya”， catutthajhānya vaငyacā”
nechaဲ phaြcyakhaြငya”， rūpabha0 arūpabha0naှင’ya paြñña’yacuṃnechaဲphaြcyakhaြငya”， nirodhasamāpatyakiု vaငyacā”nechaဲ phaြcyakhaြငya”hūso
assāsapassāsakiု tā”maြcyatatyaso akaြောငya”tarā”၏ thaငyaraှာ” maraှိlatyasoya kāyasaṅkhāra hūso
assāsapassāsakiု maphaြcyaceniုငyakhaြငya”saññya maraှိkoငya”saññyasā phaြcya၏，
1． cutelaññya” cutechaဲ phaြcya၏，
2． cityakaြောင’ya phaြcyaso cittajarupyakalaññya” phaြcyachaဲ phaြcya၏．
īnaှcyapā”cuṅkā” maphaြcyasaင’yasaññyasā phaြcya၏． “cuticityaka cittajarupyakiု phaြcyace၏”hūso pāḷitoya
saññyalaññya” piṭakatyatoya၌ maraှိpā． khīṇāsa0 rahantāaraှငyamaြtyatiု’၏ cuticityahu athū”paြု၍ chiုkhaြငya”maှာ
noငyatacyaphanya bha0sacyanaှင’ya capyakhaြငya”maraှိso noငyatacyaphanya maphaြcyaso khaျုpyakhaြငya”phaြင’ya khaျုpyashā”so rahantā
araှငyamaြtyatiု’၏ cuticityatoya၏ rupyakiု maphaြcyacekhaြငya”saññya thaငyaraှာ”၏hu naှluṃ”piုkyatoyamū၍ aṭṭhakathā
charātoya mina’yachiုtoyamūkhaြငya” phaြcyasaññya． īsiု’ maှtyasā”pāle． īkā” mūlaṭīkānaှင’ya mahāṭīkācharātoya
tiု’၏ ayūacha phaြcyapāsaññya．
madhuṭīkā၏ khaျpekhaျkya
thiုachiုkiု madhuṭīkā၌ khaျpethā”၏， khaျpepuṅkā” ---- “cuticityasaññya alhanyaā”se”၏， alhanya ā”
paျော’၏． assāsapassāsakā” alhanyathaငyaraှာ”၏． saṅkhārayamiုkya၌ cuticityaka assāsapassāsakiု maphaြcya
cepuṅkiု hotoyamūsoyalaññya” akhaြာ” cittajarupyakiုlaññya” yaငya” cuticityaka maphaြcyaceniုငyahu mayūsaင’yapā．
mūlaṭīkācharātoyaka cuticityasaññya cittajarupyakiု phaြcyaceniုငya၏hūso pāḷitoya maraှိkaြောငya”kiု nokya၌
mina’yachiုshā”၏． thiုpāḷitoyasaññya maraှိsakaဲ’siု’ cuticityasaññya cittajarupyakiု maphaြcyaceniုငyahūso pāḷitoyasaññya
laññya” piṭakatyatoya၌ maraှိpā”hu khaျpeshā”lesaññya．
pañcaviññāṇyatiု’ rupyakiု maphaြcyacepuṃ
dhepañcaviññāṇyatiု’၌ phassamaှ manasikāratiုငyaaောငya sabbacittasādhāraṇa cetasikya (7)luṃ”tiု’sā
yaှñyakaြ၏． vitakya vicāra pīti sukha ekaggatā hūso jhānaငyathiုkyaso tarā”tiု’laññya” maraှိkaြ． sammādiṭṭhi
sammāsaṅkappa sammāvāyāma sammāsati sammāsamādhicaso maggaငyathiုkyaso tarā”tiု’laññya” maraှိkaြ． lobha，
dosa， moha， alobha， adosa， amohahūso hityatarā” (= akaြောငya”raငya” mūlatarā”) tiု’laññya”
mayaှñyakaြpe． yaငya”siု’ jhānaငya maggaငya hityatiု’naှင’ya mayaှñyasañña’yaathakya cityaaṅgā alhanyaā”naññya”laျkya raှိ၏．
yaငya”siု’ cityaaṅgā၏ alhanyaā”naññya”sokaြောင’ya thiုdhepañcaviññāṇyatiု’saññya rupyakiု maphaြcyaceniုငyakaြkunya．
(abhi-ṭṭha-2-23．)
jhānapaccaññya” maggapaccaññya” hetupaccaññya”maျာ”၌ ---
hetū hetusampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo． (paṭṭhāna-1-1，，)
jhānaṅgāni jhānasampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ jhānapaccayena paccayo． (paṭṭhāna-1-8．)
maggaṅgāni maggasampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ maggapaccayena paccayo． (paṭṭhāna-1-8．)
666
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
īsiု’ casaññyaphaြင’ya jhānaငya maggaငya hityatarā”tiု’ka jhānasampayutyatarā” maggasampayutyatarā” hetu
sampayutyatarā”tiု’ā”laññya”koငya”， cittajarupyatiု’ā”laññya”koငya” phaြcyacekaြောငya”kiု hopaြtoyamūlaျkya
raှိ၏． thiုtarā”tiု’thaငya vitakya vicāracaso tarā”tiု’၏ jhānasattikaြောင’ya cityasaññya āruṃtacyakhukiု yūrā၌
samaṅkā laျှံkā mahutyabhaဲ cū”cū”ciုkyaciုkya yū၏． thiုkaြောင’ya thiုjhānyanaှင’ya yaှñyaso cityasaññya chamya”aငya kaြီ”mā”
lā၏． citya၏ chamya”aငya ā”koငya”maှု၌ jhānaငyatarā”maျာ”saññya are”kaြီ”so kaṇḍarapya tacyakhumaှ pāvaငyalaျkya
raှိ၏． maggaငyanaှင’ya hityatarā”tiု’kalaññya” cityachamya”aငya kaြီ”mā”phhaṃ’phaြို”re”athakya ā”kaြီ”so athokyaapaṃ’
kiု pe”laျkyapaငya raှိ၏．
saddhā-vīriya-satitiု’၏ akūaññīkiု rayūlaျkya samathaāruṃ siု’mahutya vipassanāāruṃ hūso
koငya”maြtyaso āruṃ tacyakhukhuapoya၌ ငြိmyavapyachā kapya၍ taññyaneောငya cityakiု chhaဲcupe”liုkyaso
akhā samādhi khoyaso maggaငyatarā”tacyakhu poyalāpe၏． yaငya”samādhika chamya”aငya paြñña’ya0lāsoakhā
“samāhito yathābhūtaṃ jānāti passati” (aṃ-3-259) = “samādhiraှိso puggiုlyasaññya hutyatiုငya”maှnyachā
si၏ maြငya၏” - hu bhurā”raှငya hokaြာ”thā”toyamūsañña’yaathakya paramatthadhammasabhā0maှnyakiု hutyatiုငya”maှnyachā
sitatyasañña’ya paññāchamya”aငyatacyamaျို” tiု”၍ phaြcyapoyalāpe၏． yaငya” saddhā-vīriya-sati-samādhi-paññāhūso
chamya”aငyamaျာ” paြñña’ya0cuṃlaငyalaျkyaraှိso cityakā” tanyakhiု”ānisaငya kaြီ”mā”laှ၏． nibbānyahūsañña’ya thiုmaှာbhakya
kamya”siု’ rokyaaောငya maggaငya (8)pā” lamya”kaြောငya”poyamaှ bhe”siု’ timya”coငya”၍ kaျmashā”aောငya thinya”khaျုpya
thā”niုငyaso chamya”ā” raှိ၏． thiုkaြောင’ya cityachamya”aငya kaြီ”mā”re” kaြီ”thhā”re”athakya jhānaငya maggaငya hitya
tarā”tiု’saññya alhanyaare”pālaှ၏． thiုjhānaငya maggaငya hityatiု’naှင’ya yaှñyathaဲphaြcyakhhaင’ya maraso cityasaññya citya၏
aṅgā mapaြñña’yacuṅkhaျေ． lakyakhaြေaṅgā mapaြñña’yacuṃsosūsaññya thiုthiု kiccakiု lakyakhaြေaṅgā paြñña’yacuṃsūlokya
machamya”choငyaniုငyasakaဲ’siု’ cityaaṅgā mapaြñña’yacuṃso cityasaññyalaññya” rupyatarā”kiု maphaြcyaceniုငya．
(abhi-ṭṭha-2-23．)
dhipañcaviññāṇesu pana jhānaṅgaṃ natthi， maggaṅgaṃ natthi， hetu natthīti cittaṅgā dubbalaṃ hotīti cittaṅgadubbalatāya
tāni rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpenti． (abhi-ṭṭha-2-23．)
jhānaṅgāni hi cittena saha rūpasamuṭṭhāpakāni， tesaṃ anubaladāyakāni maggaṅgādīni tesu vijjamānesu
visesarūpappavattidassanato． (mūlaṭī-2-18．)
arūpavipākyaka rupyakiု maphaြcyaceniုငyapuṃ
cattāri arūpavipākāni tasmi H bhave rūpassa natthitāya rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpenti． na ke0lañca tāne0，
yāni aññānipi tasmi H bhave aṭṭha kāmā0carakusalāni dasa akusalāni na0 kiriyacittāni cattāri
āruppakusalāni catasso āruppakiriyā tīṇi maggacittāni cattāri phalacittānīti dhecattālīsa cittāni
uppajja nti， tānipi tattha rūpassa natthitāya e0 rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpenti． evaṃ paṭisandhicittaṃ rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpeti．
(abhi-ṭṭha-2-23．)
= arūpavipākya (4)maျို”tiု’kā” arūpabhuṃ၌sā paṭisandhe bhavaငya cutikiccakiု rhakyachoငyalaျkya phaြcyapoya
kaြso cityamaျာ” phaြcyakaြ၏． thiု arūpavipākyatiု’saññya thiုarūpabhuṃ၌ mimi arūpavipākyaka phaြcyacethiုkyaso
rupya၏ thaငyaraှာ”maraှိkhaြငya”kaြောင’ya cittajarupyakiု maphaြcyaceniုငyakaြkunya． tacyanaññya” arūpabhuṃ၌ araငya”khaṃrupya akhaြkheṃ
rupyakiုka mūlakataññya”ka luṃ”0maraှိpe． rūpabhuṃ၌ rupyaraှိsañña’yaathakyakaြောင’ya rupyakiု phaြcyacetatyaso akaြောငya”
667
rupyakammaṭṭhānya”piုငya”
tarā”tiု’ka rupyakiု phaြcyacekhaြငya”saññya thaငyaraှာ”raှိ၏． arūpabhuṅkā” rupya၏ phaြcyakhhaင’yaraniုငyaso bhuṃṭhāna mahutyasañña’ya
athakyakaြောင’ya yaငya” arūpabhuṃ၌ rupyasā thaငyaraှာ”raှိkhaဲ’soya cityasaññya akhaြာ”rupyatacyamaျို”kiု thapya၍ phaြcyacele
rā၏． thiုmūlaakhaြkheṃ rupyatarā”kiုka thiုarūpabhuṃ၌ maraှိsañña’yaathakyakaြောင’ya arūpavipākyacityatiု’saññya rupyakiု
(= cittajarupyakiု) maphaြcyaceniုငyakunya．
tacyaphanya thiု arūpavipākyacityatiု’ sakyasakyasā rupyakiု maphaြcyaceniုငyakunyasaññyakā” mahutyase”， arūpa
vipākyamaှ akhaြာ”laññya”phaြcyakunyaso thiုarūpabhuṃ၌ phaြcyakunyaso ----
1． kāmā0cara mahākusiုlyacitya ---- 8
2． dosamūdhe”kaြñya kaျnya akusiုlyacitya
= (lobhamū-8 + mohamū-2 = 10) ---- 10
3． manodhārāvajjanya”naှင’ya mahākaြိyācitya ---- 9
4． arūpakusiုlyacitya ---- 4
5． arūpakaြိyācitya ---- 4
6． sakadāgāmimagyacitya + anāgāmimagyacitya + arahattamagyacitya ---- 3
7． phiုlyacitya ---- 4
ā”luṃ”poငya”soya ---- 42
ī (42)maျို”kunyaso cityatiု’saññyalaññya” thiုarūpabhuṃ၌ rupya၏ thaငyaraှာ” maraှိsañña’yaathakyakaြောင’yasālaျှငya
rupyakiု maphaြcyaceniုငyakaြkunya． (abhi-ṭṭha-2-23． mūlaṭī-2-19．)
thiုarūpabhuṅkā” rupyakiု cakyachupyaso baြhmātiု’၏ nerāpetaññya”． siု’athakya thiု arūpabhuṃvayya rupyakiု
phaြcyacephhayya maliုsokaြောင’ya yaငya” arūpabhuṃ၌ phaြcyaso cityatiု’ka rupyakiု maphaြcyacekaြpe． rupyakiု cakyachupyaso
rūpavirāgabhā0nākaြောင’ya phaြcyapoyalāraso arūpajhānyasaññya rupyatarā”kiုsā cakyachupyasaññya mahutyase”，
kasiုṇya”rupyakiုlaññya”koငya”， kasiုṇya”rupyakiု āruṃyū၍ phaြcyapoyalāso rūpajhānyatiု’kiုlaññya”koငya” cakyachupya
saññyasā phaြcyapesaññya． thiုkaြောင’ya rūpā0caracityatiု’laññya” arūpabhuṃ၌ phaြcyakhhaင’ya marakaြpe．
īkā” cityatiု’ka cittajarupya， iriyāputhya， viññatyarupyatiု’kiု phaြcyacepuṃ maphaြcyacepuṃnaှင’ya capya၍ aṭṭhakathā
ṭīkātiု’၏ chuṃ”phaြtyakhaျkyamaျာ” phaြcyasaññya．
upādyakhaṇa၌sā rupyakiု phaြcyaceniုငyasaññya
yāni cettha rūpaṃ janenti， tāni na ṭhitikkhaṇe， bhaṅgakkhaṇe vā， tadā hi cittaṃ dubbalaṃ hoti．
uppādakkhaṇe pana balavaṃ， tasmā taṃ tadā purejātaṃ vatthuṃ nissāya rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti． (visuddhi-2-250．)
uppādakkhaṇe pana balavaṃ anantarādipaccayalābhato． (mahāṭī-2-402．)
īphoyapaြpā cityatiု’thaငya akaြငyacityatiု’saññya rupyakiု phaြcyacetatyakunya၏， thiုrupyakiု phaြcyacetatyakunyaso
cityatiု’saññya ṭhīkhaṇa၌laññya” maphaြcyaceniုငyakaြkunya， bhaငyakhaṇa၌laññya” maphaြcyaceniုငyakaြkunya． maှnyapesaññya - thiု
ṭhīkhaṇa bhaငyakhaṇa၌ cityasaññya ā”maraှိpe． alaျောyaā”phaြင’yachiုramū cityasaññya upādyakhaṇa၌ anantaracaso
668
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
akaြောငya”athokyaapaṃ’kiု rasokaြောင’ya sanyamaြnyaso ā”raှိ၏． thiုkaြောင’ya thiုcityasaññya thiုupādyakhaṇa၌
mimi raှေ”ka phaြcyanaှင’ya၍ maှီrāvatthuaphaြcya kaျေ”jū”paြုpe”tatyaso purejātapaccaññya”tapyaso hadayavatthurupyakiု
amaှီpaြု၍ phaြcyapoyasaññyanaှင’ya tacyapaြိုငyanakyataññya” cittajarupyakiု phaြcyace၏． (visuddhi-2-250． mahāṭī-2-402．)
citya + cetasikya

2． āhārasamuṭṭhāna = āhārakaြောင’ya phaြcyasorupya
āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma upādiṇṇaṃ kammajarūpaṃ paccayaṃ labhithā tattha patiṭṭhāya ṭhānappattāya ojāya
samuṭṭhāpitaṃ ojaṭṭhamakaṃ， ākāsadhātu lahutā mudutā kammaññatā upacayo santatīti cuddasavidhaṃ rūpaṃ．
(visuddhi-2-251．)
“upādinnaṃ kammajarūpaṃ paccayaṃ labhithā”ti etena bahiddhā anupādinnaojā rūpāharaṇakiccaṃ na karotīti
dasseti． paccayalābho cassa kammajabhūtasannissayatā0senāti āha “tattha patiṭṭhāyā”ti． tattha
kammapaccayacittasamuṭṭhānādirūpassapi kammamūlakattā siyā kammajapariyāyoti taṃ nivattanatthaṃ “upādinna”nti
visesethā vuttaṃ． (mahāṭī-2-403．)
upādinnaphaြcyaso kammajarupyakiု akaြောငya” athokyaapaṃ’kiု raraှိ၍ thiုkaṅkaြောင’ya phaြcyaso kammaja
mahābhutya၌ taññya၍ rupya၏ ṭhīkālasiု’ rokyaraှိlāso ojāsaññya phaြcyacepyaso pathavī āpo
tejo vāyo vaṇṇa gandha rasa ojā hūso ojālaျှငya (8)khumaြောkyaraှိso ojaṭṭhamakarupya， ākāsadhātya，
lahutā， mudutā， kammaññatā， upacaya， santati - ī (14)maျို”so rupyasaññya āhārasamuṭṭhānyarupya =
āhārakaြောင’ya phaြcyasorupya maññya၏．
upādinnaṃ kammajarūpaṃ paccayaṃ labhithā = upādinnaphaြcyaso kammajarupyakiု (၏) akaြောငya” athokyaapaṃ’
kiု raraှိ၍ - hūso īcakā”rapyaphaြင’ya bahiddha apaြငyaapa sakyamaဲ’loka၌ taññyaso upādinna mahutyaso
ojāsaññya (= upādinnakammajarupya၏ athokyaapaṃ’kiု maraso anupādinnaojāsaññya) āhārajarupyakiု
choငyakhaြငya” phaြcyacekhaြငya” kiccakiု mapaြုlupyaniုငyahu ññhaှnyapaြ၏． tacyaphanya thiုbahiddhaphaြcyaso acāāhārahūsaññya
utujaojaṭṭhamaka rupyakalāpyatiု’၏ apoငya”acusātaññya”． thiုutuja rupyakalāpyatiုငya”thaငya pāvaငyaso ojā
kā” bahiddha anupādinnaojātaññya”． yaငya” bahiddha anupādinnaojā၏ āhārajarupyakiု phaြcyacephiု’ranya akaြောငya”
athokyaapaṃ’kiု rakhaြငya”saññyalaññya” kaṅkaြောင’yaphaြcyaso kammajamahābhutya dhātyakaြီ” (4)pā”laျှငya maှီrā raှိsaññya၏

phaြcyacekaြောငya”kiု aṭṭhakathāmina’yachiုkhaြငya” phaြcya၏． thiုaṭṭhakathācakā”rapya၌ kaṃlaျှငya akaြောငya” athokyaapaṃ’
raှိso vipākyacityakaြောင’yaphaြcyaso cittajarupya acaraှိso rupyatarā”၏laññya” kaṃlaျှငya akaြောငya”mūla raှိsaññya၏
aphaြcyakaြောင’ya kammajarupyahūso akaြောငya” pariyāyyatacyamaျို”saññya phaြcyakoငya”lerā၏， thiုkaြောင’ya thiု
kammapaccayacittasamuṭṭhānarupya = kaṃlaျှငya akaြောငya”athokyaapaṃ’ raှိso vipākyacityakaြောင’ya phaြcyaso cittaja
rupya acaraှိso rupyatarā”kiု nacyacekhaြငya”ငှာ (ī၌ machiုliုhu sicekhaြငya”ငှာ) upādinnaṃ-hu athū” visesana
ma၍ upādinnakammajarupya၏ akaြောငya” athokyaapaṃ’kiု raraှိkhaဲ’soya thiုkammajamahābhutya၌ rapyataññya၍ kabaḷī
kāra āhārahūso utujaojāka ojaṭṭhamakarupyakiု phaြcyacekaြောငya” mina’yachiုtoyamūkhaြငya” phaြcyasaññya．
(mahāṭī-2-403．)
athakyapā aṭṭhakathā ṭīkātiု’၏ chiုliုraငya”maှာ īsiု’ phaြcya၏． sattavātiု’ alutyaalhe”paြု၍ cā”maျို
apyaso acāāhārahūsaññya tejodhātya၏ acī”aphā” utujaojaṭṭhamakarupyatiု’sātaññya”． yaငya” utuja
rupyakalāpyatiုငya”thaငya pāvaငyaso tejodhātyakā” ojaṭṭhamaka rupyakalāpya asacyaasacyakiု chaင’yakaဲ phaြcyace
niုငyasoyalaññya” yaငya” utujarupyakalāpyatiုငya”thaငya pāvaငyaso ojākā” pācakatejodhātya hūso kammaja
vamya”mī”၏ athokyaapaṃ’kiု marakhaဲ’soya āhārajarupyakiု maphaြcyaceniုငya． sapityaathaငya” panya”kanyaathaငya” casaññya
၌ bahiddhaojāaphaြcyanaှင’ya taññyanesamaျှ kālapatyaluṃ” āhārajarupyakiု maphaြcyaceniုငya． yaငya”kabaḷīkāra āhāra
hūso utujarupyatiု’၏ apoငya”acukiု sattavātiု’ cā”maျိုliုkyasoakhā khaṃthaငya” laññyakhaျောငya” acāsacyaaိmya
aူcaso thiုthiု ṭhānasiု’ rokyaraှိshā”၏． sattavātiု’၏ santānyavayya thiုthiု acāsacyaaိmya caso ṭhānatiု’၌
acāsacyakoṭṭhāsaaphaြcyaphaြင’ya taññyaraှိkhiုkya khandhāaိmyaathaငya”siု’ mapaျံ’naှံ’khaငya athaငya”maှာlaññya” utuja ojaṭṭhamaka
rupyatiု’sā phaြcyakaြse”၏． siု’soya kiုyyathaငya” ajjhattasiု’kā” rokyaraှိlākhiုkya phaြcya၏． yaငya” utuja rupyakalāpya
tiု’thaငya pāvaငyaso ojākā” utujaojātaññya”． acāaိmyavanya”kaျငyacasaññya thiုthiုṭhānavanya”kaျငyathaငya santati
acañyaā”phaြင’ya atityaka kaṃ၏ chamya”hunyakaြောင’ya achakyamapaြtya raှေ”naှင’yanokya chakyacapyalaျkya phaြcyapoyanekaြ
so jīvitalaျှငya (9)khumaြောkyaraှိso jīvitana0ka rupyakalāpyatiု’ raှိkaြ၏． yaငya” jīvitana0ka kalāpyatiုငya”
thaငyalaññya” dhātyakaြီ” (4)pā” pāvaငyalaျkya raှိ၏． atityaka kaṅkaြောင’ya phaြcyasañña’yaathakya taṇaှာ diṭṭhitiု’ka “ငါ
ငါ’hā”hu chaဲyūapyasañña’ya upādinnakammajarupyatiု’taññya”． yaငya” upādinnakammaja mahābhutya (4)pā”tiု’thaငya acākiု
kaြkeျkyacerā၌ āhārajarupyakiု phaြcyacerā၌ tejodhātyakā” paြdhānya”laျkya raှိ၏． udaraggi khoyasañña’ya
kammajavamya”mī”taññya”． yaငya” tejodhātyakā” kaျnyadhātya (3)pā” mapābhaဲ phaြcyaniုငyasañña’ya chamya”ā” maraှိsaphaြင’ya
kammajamahābhutya dhātya (4)pā”၌ rapyataññya၍ yaငya” upādinnakammajarupya၏ ā”pe”thokyapaṃ’maှုkiု raraှိkhaဲ’soya
athakyapā acāsacyakoṭṭhāsa၌ pāvaငyaso ajjhattikasiု’ rokyaraှိlāso utujaojā = kabaḷīkāra
āhārasaññya ojaṭṭhamaka rupyakalāpya asacyaasacyakiု phaြcyace၏hu chiုliုpesaññya．
3． āhārapaccaya = āhārahūso athokyaapaṃ’ raှိsorupya
āhārapaccayaṃ nāma “kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo”
(paṭṭhāna-1-7．) evaṃ vuttaṃ catusamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ． (visuddhi-2-251．)
āhārapaccayassa āhāro na ke0laṃ upatthambhako0， atha kho janakopīti dassetuṃ
“catusamuṭṭhānarūpa”nti vuttaṃ． (mahāṭī-2-403．)
680
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
alutyaalhe”mapaြုapyasoyalaññya” paြုapyasakaဲ’siု’so kabaḷīkāra āhāra hūso kaṃ-citya-
utu-āhāra akaြောငya”tarā” (4)pā”kaြောင’ya thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyapoyalāraso catusamuṭṭhānikaojāsaññya
īrūpakāya = rupyatarā”apoငya”hūso catusamuṭṭhānikarupyaā” āhārapaccayasattiphaြင’ya kaျေ”jū”paြု၏
hu bhurā”raှငya hokaြာ”thā”toyamūsokaြောင’ya kaṃ-citya-utu-āhārahūso akaြောငya”tarā”
(4)pā”kaြောင’ya thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyapoyalāraso catusamuṭṭhānikarupyatarā”apoငya”saññya āhārapaccayarupya maññya၏．
āhāralaျှငya akaြောငya” athokyaapaṃ’ raှိso catusamuṭṭhānikarupyaā” rupyaāhārasaññya sakyasakya
thokyapaṃ’ruṃ thokyapaṃ’tatyasaññyasā mahutyase”， caငyacacyasoyakā” phaြcyalaññya” phaြcyacetatya၏hu thaငyaraှာ”
paြkhaြငya”ငှာ catusamuṭṭhānarupya = kaṃ citya utu āhārakaြောင’ya phaြcyaso rupyasaññya āhārapaccayarupya maññya၏hu
aṭṭhakathā mina’yachiုkhaြငya” phaြcyasaññya． (mahāṭī-2-403．)
4． āhārapaccaya āhārasamuṭṭhāna
= āhāra athokyaapaṃ’ raှိso āhārakaြောင’ya phaြcyasorupya
āhārapaccayaāhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma āhārasamuṭṭhānesu rūpesu ṭhānappattā ojā aññaṃ
ojaṭṭhamakaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti， tataြာpi ojā aññanti evaṃ dasa dhādasa vāre pavatti H ghaṭeti． ekadi0saṃ
paribhuttāhāro sattāhampi upatthambheti． dibbā pana ojā ekamāsaṃ dhemāsampi upatthambheti． mātarā
paribhuttāhāropi dārakassa sarīraṃ pharithā rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti． sarīre makkhitāhāropi rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti．
kammajāhāro upādiṇṇakāhāro nāma． sopi ṭhānappatto rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti， tataြာpi ojā aññaṃ
samuṭṭhāpetīti evaṃ catasso vā pañca vā pavattiyo ghaṭeti． (visuddhi-2-251．)
sattavātiု’ cā”maျိုapyaso pakatiso kabaḷīkāraāhārasaññya utujaojaṭṭhamakarupyatiု’၏ apoငya”
acusā phaြcya၏． yaငya” utujaojaṭṭhamakarupyatiု’thaငya pāvaငyaso utujaojā asī”asī”saññya pācakatejo
dhātya amaññyaraso kammajavamya”mī”၏ ā”pe”thokyapaṃ’maှုkiု raraှိsoakhā ojaṭṭhamaka rupyakalāpya asacya
asacyakiု phaြcyacepaြnya၏． yaငya” rupyatarā”tiု’kā” āhāra (ojā) kaြောင’ya phaြcyaso āhārasamuṭṭhānya
rupyatiု’taññya”． yaငya” āhārasamuṭṭhānyarupyatiု’၌ pāvaငyataññyaraှိso rupya၏ ṭhīkālasiု’ rokyaraှိneso ojā
saññya (nokyanokyaso āhārasamuṭṭhānya ojaṭṭhamakarupyatiု’၌ pāvaငyataññyaraှိso ojā၏ ā”pe”
thokyapaṃ’maှုkiု raraှိsoakhā) akhaြာ”tacyapā”so ojaṭṭhamaka rupyakalāpyaasacyakiု phaြcyacepaြnya၏． yaငya”
ojaṭṭhamaka rupyakalāpyaasacya၌ pāvaငyataññyaraှိso ojāsaññyalaññya” (nokyanokyaso āhārasamuṭṭhānya
ojaṭṭhamakarupyatiု’၌ pāvaငyataññyaraှိso ojā၏ ā”pe”thokyapaṃ’maှုkiုraraှိsoakhā) akhaြာ”tacyapā”so
ojaṭṭhamaka rupyakalāpyaasacyakiု phaြcyacepaြnya၏． īsiု’laျှငya (10)kaြိmya (12)kaြိmyatiု’ tiုငyaaောငya ojaṭṭhamaka
rupyakalāpya asacyaasacyatiု’၏ phaြcyakhaြငya”kiု chakyacapyace၏． ī ojaṭṭhamakarupyasaññya - āhārapaccaya
āhārasamuṭṭhānya = āhāra athokyaapaṃ’ raှိso āhārakaြောင’ya phaြcyasorupya maññya၏．
abhayyakaြောင’ya āhārapaccaya āhārasamuṭṭhānyarupya၏sā (10)kaြိmya (12)kaြိmyasiု’ tiုငyaaောငya oja-
ṭṭhamaka rupyakalāpya asacya asacyatiု’၏ phaြcyakhaြငya”kiု chakyacapyacepāsanaññya”hu me”ranya raှိ၏． aphaြko” ----
tacyane’၌ cā”maျိုapyaso acāāhārasaññya khunacyarakyapatyaluṃ”soyalaññya” catusamuṭṭhānikaojākiု nokya
thapya ojaṭṭhamaka rupyakalāpya asacya asacyaphaြcyaaောငya ā”pe”thokyapaṃ’niုငyaso chamya”ā” raှိsokaြောင’ya
phaြcya၏．
681
rupyakammaṭṭhānya”piုငya”
natyaojākā” tacyala naှcyala patyaluṃ”soyalaññya” catusamuṭṭhānikaojāā” nokyathapya ojaṭṭhamaka
rupyakalāpya asacyaasacya phaြcyapoyalāaောငya ā”pe”thokyapaṃ’thā”niုငya၏． mikhaငya cā”maျိုapyaso acā
āhārasaññyalaññya” sūငyya၏ khaျkyatiုငyaraငya”maှ acañyalaျှောkyakunyaso arasākiု choငyayūtatyaso
rasaharaṇīakaြောtiု’phaြင’ya sūငyya၏ kiုyyakiု paျံ’naှံ’၍ ojaṭṭhamaka rupyakalāpya asacya asacyakiု phaြcyace၏．
amivamya”thaငya”raှိ sūငyyakā” akhaျငya”phaြင’ya racyapatyanaှောငyaphhaဲ’thā”apya၏． sūငyyaaိmyaakhaျငya”saññya khaြာ”khayyaapya
so sūငyya၏ kiုyya၌ lū”limya”saññya၏ achamya”ā”phaြင’ya āhāra၏ koငya”chā yaှñyakhaြငya”saññya maphaြcyasaင’yahu
siraှိpāle． thiုkaြောင’ya mikhaငya cā”maျိုapyaso acāāhārasaññya sūငyya၏ khaျkyatiုငyaraငya”maှ tacyachaင’ya rasa
haraṇīakaြောtiု’phaြင’ya sūငyya၏ kiုyyakiု paျံ’naှံ’၍ ojaṭṭhamakarupyakiု phaြcyace၏． khandhāaိmya၌ limya”kaျံapyaso
āhārasaññyalaññya” ojaṭṭhamakarupyakiု phaြcyace၏． īkā” upādinnakaāhāra anupādinnakaāhāra hu
naှcyamaျို”raှိrāthaငya anupādinnaka phaြcyaso āhāralaျှငya akaြောငya”athokyaapaṃ’raှိso catusamuṭṭhānika ojā
āhāraka ojaṭṭhamakarupyakiု phaြcyacepuṅkiု paြchiုkhaျkyataññya”．
kammaja rupyakalāpyatiုငya”thaငya pāvaငyaso ojākā” kammaja-āhārataññya”． yaငya” kammaja-āhārasaññya
upādinnakaāhāra maññya၏． thiု upādinnakaāhārasaññyalaññya” (āhārasamuṭṭhānyarupyatiု’thaငya pāvaငyaso
ojā၏ athokyaapaṃ’kiု raraှိsaphaြင’ya) rupya၏ ṭhīkhaṇasiု’ rokyaraှိsaññya phaြcya၍ ojaṭṭhamakarupyakiု phaြcyace၏．
thiုojaṭṭhamakarupyakā” upādinnaka āhārasaññya phaြcyacepyaso ojaṭṭhamakarupyataññya”． yaငya” ojaṭṭhamakarupya
၌ya pāvaငyaso ojāsaññyalaññya” (āhārasamuṭṭhānyarupyatiု’thaငya pāvaငyaso ojā၏ ā”pe”thokyapaṃ’maှုkiု
raraှိsaphaြင’ya) rupya၏ ṭhīkālasiု’ rokyaraှိkhiုkyavayya akhaြာ”tacyapā”so ojaṭṭhamakarupyakiု phaြcyacepaြnya၏． īsiု’laျှငya
(4)kaြိmyalaññya” phaြcyakunyaso (5)kaြိmyalaññya” phaြcyakunyaso rupyakalāpyatiု’၏ phaြcyacañyatiု’kiု chakyacapyace၏．

cū”camya”ramañña’ya akhaျkyatacyarapya
kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo． (paṭṭhāna-1-7．)

toya၏ cakā”rapya၌ cityakaြောင’yaphaြcyaso cittasamuṭṭhānyarūpakāyaā” kabaḷīkāra āhāraka coင’yaraှောkya
tatya ā”pe”thokyapaṃ’tatyaso upatthambhaka āhārapaccayasattiphaြင’ya kaျေ”jū”paြုmaှုkiု cū”camya” chaငyakhaြငya၍
yūpā． akaြောငya”kā” īsiု’taññya”．
1． cityakaြောင’yaphaြcyaso cittasamuṭṭhānya-ojaṭṭhamakarupyamaျာ”thaငya pāvaငyataññyaraှိso kabaḷīkāra āhāra
amaññyaraso ojākiုlaññya”koငya”，
2． nocittasamuṭṭhānyaphaြcyaso kaṃ-utu-āhāra - akaြောငya” asī”asī”kaြောင’ya phaြcyaso kammaja
rupyakalāpya utujarupyakalāpya āhārajarupyakalāpyamaျာ”thaငya pāvaငyaso kabaḷīkāra āhāra
amaññyaraso ojākiုlaññya”koငya”，
3． thiု naှcyamaျို”luṃ”so cittasamuṭṭhānya nocittasamuṭṭhānyarupyakalāpyamaျာ”thaငya pāvaငyaso kabaḷīkāra ā
hāra amaññyaraso ojākiုlaññya”koငya” ----
yaငya” (3)maျို”luṃ”so ojāka cityakaြောင’ya phaြcyaso cittasamuṭṭhānyarūpakāya = rupyatarā”apoငya”
ā” coင’yaraှောkyatatya ā”pe”thokyapaṃ’tatyaso upatthambhaka āhāra paccayasattiphaြင’ya kaျေ”jū”paြုmaှုkiု
(cittasamuṭṭhānaduka， pauှvāra， paccayānuloma vibhaṅgavāra၌) bhurā”raှငyasaññya hokaြာ”thā”toya mamūkhaဲ’pe．
akayya၍ upatthambhaka āhārapaccayasattiphaြင’ya kaျေ”jū”paြုkhaဲ’saññya phaြcyaṃ’． ----
cittasamuṭṭhāno kabaḷīkāro āhāro cittasamuṭṭhānassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo，
683
rupyakammaṭṭhānya”piုငya”
= cityakaြောင’ya phaြcyaso cittasamuṭṭhānya rupyakalāpyamaျာ”thaငya pāvaငyaso kabaḷīkāra āhāra amaññyaraso
ojāsaññya cityakaြောင’ya phaြcyaso cittasamuṭṭhānyarūpakāya = rupyatarā”apoငya”ā” āhārapaccayasattiphaြင’ya
kaျေ”jū”paြု၏ ---- īsiု’ casaññyaphaြင’ya bhurā”raှငya hokaြာ”toyamūkhaဲ’saññya phaြcyarā၏． siု’soya bhurā”raှငyasaññya
hokā” mahokhaဲ’pe．
alaျောyaā”phaြင’yachiုramū - athakyathaငya phoyapaြthā”so cittasamuṭṭhānya， nocittasamuṭṭhānya， tadubhaya =
cittasamuṭṭhānya nocittasamuṭṭhānya naှcyapā”cuṃ hūso (3)maျို”so kabaḷīkāra āhāraamaññyaraso ojākiု
nocittasamuṭṭhānyaphaြcyaso kammasamuṭṭhānyarūpakāya， utusamuṭṭhānyarūpakāya， āhārasamuṭṭhānyarūpakāyaā”
upatthambhaka āhārapaccayasattiphaြင’ya kaျေ”jū”paြုmaှုkiု bhurā”raှငya hokaြာ”toyamūkhaဲ’pesaññya． thiုkaြောင’ya athakya
pā aṭṭhakathācharātoya၏ cakā”kiု cicacya၍ yūpāhu chiုliုsaññya．
ī athakyapā ṭīkācharātoyamaျာ”၏ maှtyakhaျkyaara - ī āhārapaccaññya”piုငya”၌ cittajarupyakalāpya
tacyakhuthaငya pāvaငyaso kabaḷīkāra āhāra amaññyaraso ojāsaññya akhaြာ”akhaြာ”so cittajarupyakalāpya
tacyakhuthaငya pāvaငyaso ojāā” upatthambhaka āhārapaccayasattiphaြင’ya kaျေ”jū” mapaြုniုငyahu maှtyapā． alā”tūpaငya
kammajarupyakalāpya utujarupyakalāpya āhārajarupyakalāpyamaျာ”thaငya pāvaငyaso ojā asī”asī”kalaññya”
cittasamuṭṭhānyarupyakalāpyamaျာ”thaငya pāvaငyaso ojā asī”asī”ā” upatthambhaka āhārapaccayasattiphaြင’ya
kaျေ”jū” mapaြုniုငyahu maှtyapā．
tacyaphanya cittasamuṭṭhānyarupyakalāpyamaျာ”thaငya pāvaငyaso ojāka kammasamuṭṭhānya utusamuṭṭhānya āhāra
samuṭṭhānyarupyakalāpya asī”asī”thaငya pāvaငyaso ojānaှင’yatakhaso rūpakāyaā” upatthambhaka āhāra
paccayasattiphaြင’ya kaျေ”jū”paြု၏． kammasamuṭṭhānya utusamuṭṭhānya āhārasamuṭṭhānya phaြcyaso kabaḷīkāra āhāra
amaññyaraso asī”asī”so ojākalaññya” akhaြာ”akhaြာ”so ojānaှင’ya takhaso kammasamuṭṭhānya
rūpakāya， utusamuṭṭhānyarūpakāya， āhārasamuṭṭhānyarūpakāya asī”asī”ā” upatthambhaka āhāra
paccayasattiphaြင’ya kaျေ”jū”paြု၏hu maှtyasā”pāle．
5． āhārapaccaya utusamuṭṭhāna
= āhārahūso athokyaapaṃ’ raှိso utukaြောင’ya phaြcyasorupya
āhārapaccayautusamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma āhārasamuṭṭhānā tejodhātu ṭhānappattā utusamuṭṭhānaṃ
ojaṭṭhamakaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti． (visuddhi-2-251．)
āhārapaccayautunopi utupaccayāhārassa viya dasa dhādasa vāre pavattighaṭanā veditabbā．
vuttanayattā na uddhatanti 0danti． (mahāṭī-2-403．)
= cā”maျိုapyaso acāāhāra-utujaojaṭṭhamakarupyatiု’thaငya pāvaငyaso ojākaြောင’ya (kammajavamya”mī”၏
athokyaapaṃ’phaြင’ya) phaြcyapoyalākaြso ojaṭṭhamaka-āhārasamuṭṭhānyarupyatiု’thaငya rupyakalāpyatiုငya”၌ tejo
dhātya pāvaငyalaျkya raှိ၏． yaငya” tejodhātyakā” āhārasamuṭṭhānya tejodhātyataññya”． yaငya” āhāra
samuṭṭhānya tejodhātyasaññya rupya၏ ṭhīkālasiု’ rokyaraှိsoakhā utusamuṭṭhānya ojaṭṭhamakarupyakiု phaြcyace၏．
īojaṭṭhamakarupyasaññya āhāralaျှငya akaြောငya” athokyaapaṃ’raှိso tejodhātyautukaြောင’ya phaြcyaso
āhārapaccaya utusamuṭṭhānyarupya maññya၏． (visuddhi-2-251．)
684
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
āhāralaျှငya akaြောငya” athokyaapaṃ’raှိso utu၏laññya” utulaျှငya akaြောငya”athokyaapaṃ’
raှိso āhāra၏kaဲ’siု’ (10)kaြိmya (12)kaြိmyatiု’ tiုငyatiုငya rupyatiု’၏ phaြcyacañyakiု chakyacapyacekhaြငya”kiု siraှိapya
pe၏． phhaင’yachiုapyakhaဲ’paြီ”so naññya”raှိsaññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya mathutyapaြapyahu charāmaြtyatiု’ mina’yachiုtoyamūkaြ၏．
(mahāṭī-2-403．)
tataြာyaṃ āhāro āhārasamuṭṭhānānaṃ janako huthā paccayo hoti， sesānaṃ nissa-
yāhāraatthiavigata0senāti evaṃ āhārajarūpassa nibbatti passitabbā． (visuddhi-2-251．)
sesānanti kammacittautusamuṭṭhānaṃ tisantatirūpānaṃ． kabaḷīkāro hi aññāhārasamuṭṭhitassa，
tisantatirūpānañca upatthambhaka0sena attanā uppāditassa janako huthā paccayo hoti． evaṃ āhāra-
paccayo hontoye0 atthiavigata0senāpi paccayo hoti， nissayabhāvo pana paṭṭhānanayena
natthi． āhārapaccayā pavattamānāni rūpāni āhāranissayāni nāma hontīti suttantanayena vuttoti
daṭṭhabbo． parato utuno nissayajotanāyapi ese0 nayo． (mahāṭī-2-403-404．)
thiု āhārajarupyaphaြcyapuṃapiုငya”thaငya cā”maျိုapyaso kabaḷīkāra āhārasaññya siု’mahutya cā”maျိုapya
so utujaojaṭṭhamaka rupyakalāpyatiု’thaငya pāvaငyaso ojāsaññya kammajavamya”mī”၏ athokyaapaṃ’kiု rakhaဲ’soya
ojaṭṭhamaka rupyakalāpya asacyaasacyakiု phaြcyace၏． yaငya” asacyaphaြcyapoyalāso ojaṭṭhamakarupyatiု’kā”
kabaḷīkāraāhāra = ojākaြောင’ya phaြcyapoyalārasañña’yaathakya āhārasamuṭṭhānyarupyatiု’ maññya၏． siု’athakya
kabaḷīkāraāhāra = ojāsaññya āhārasamuṭṭhānyarupyatiု’ā” tiုkyariုkyaphaြcyacetatyaso janaka akaြောငya”
tarā” phaြcya၍ kaျေ”jū”paြုpe”tatya၏． kaြhaငya”kunyaso kammasamuṭṭhānya cittasamuṭṭhānya utusamuṭṭhānyahūso ti
santatirupyatiု’ā” nissayasatti āhārasatti atthisatti avigatasattiā”phaြင’ya ā”pe” thokyapaṃ’tatya
so upatthambhakaakaြောငya” paccayaakaြောငya”tarā” aphaြcyaphaြင’ya kaျေ”jū”paြုpe”tatya၏． īsiု’laျှငya āhā-
rajarupya၏ phaြcyapuṅkiု maြငyaaောငya raှုpā． (visuddhi-2-251．)
alutyaalhe”paြု၍ cā”maျိုapyaso kabaḷīkāra āhārasaññya siု’mahutya cā”maျိုapyaso utujaojaṭṭha
makarupyakalāpyatiု’thaငya pāvaငyaso ojāsaññya kammajavamya”mī”၏ athokyaapaṃ’phaြင’ya ojaṭṭhamaka-āhā
ra samuṭṭhānyarupyatiု’ā” tiုkyariုkyaphaြcyace၏． siု’athakya mimisaññya phaြcyacepyaso ojaṭṭhamaka āhāra
samuṭṭhānyarupyatiု’ā” yaငya” kabaḷīkāraāhāra = ojāka janakasattiphaြင’ya kaျေ”jū”paြုpe”၏．
yaငya” āhārasamuṭṭhānyarupyatiု’thaငya pāvaငyaso ojāsaññyalaññya” kabaḷīkāraāhāralaျှငya taññyarā
vatthu raှိsokaြောင’ya ṭhānūpacāraā”phaြင’ya kabaḷīkāraāhārapaငya maññyakaြောငya” athakyathaငya raှငya”paြkhaဲ’၏． yaငya”
āhārasamuṭṭhānyarupyatiု’thaငya pāvaငyaso kabaḷīkāraāhāra = ojāsaññya ----
1． akhaြာ”so kabaḷīkāraāhārakaြောင’ya phaြcyaso āhārasamuṭṭhānyarupyaā”laññya”koငya”，
tacyanaññya” - yaငya” āhārasamuṭṭhānyarupyatiု’thaငya pāvaငyaso ojāā”laññya”koငya”， (akaြောငya”-
ojānaှင’ya akaျို”ojātiု’maှာ kalāpyatū mahutyabhaဲ kalāpyakhaဲpaြာ”saññyahu chiုliုsaññya．)
2． kammasamuṭṭhānyarupyatiု’ā”laññya”koငya”， tacyanaññya” kammajaojāā”laññya”koငya”，
3． cittasamuṭṭhānyarupyatiု’ā”laññya”koငya”， tacyanaññya” cittajaojāā”laññya”koငya”，
4． utusamuṭṭhānyarupyatiု’ā”laññya”koငya”， tacyanaññya” utujaojāā”laññya”koငya” ----
nissaya-atthi-avigata hūso ā”pe” thokyapaṃ’tatyaso upatthambhaka = paccayaakaြောငya”tarā”
685
rupyakammaṭṭhānya”piုငya”
၏ achamya”phaြင’ya kaျေ”jū”paြုpe”၏．
nissaya - maှီrā akaြောငya”tarā”
1． nāmyakhandhā (4)pā” akhaျငya”khaျငya” tacyapā”saññya tacyapā”ā”，
2． mahābhutya (4)pā” akhaျငya”khaျငya” tacyapā”saññya tacyapā”ā”，
3． paṭisandhekhā၌ nāmya-rupya akhaျငya”khaျငya” tacyapā”saññya tacyapā”ā”，
4． citya-cetasikyatiု’ka cittajarupya = cittasamuṭṭhānyarupyatiု’ā”，
5． mahābhutyatiု’ka upādārupyatiု’ā” ----
maှီrā nissayasattiphaြင’ya kaျေ”jū”paြုpe”၏． (paṭṭhāna-1-5．)
thiုthaငya ojāhūso upādārupyaka ojaṭṭhamakarupyahūso bhūtarupya upādārupyatiု’ā” kaျေ”jū”paြုmaှု
saññya nissayapaccaññya”piုငya”၌ maraှိpe． siု’athakya mahāṭīkācharātoyaka - nissayabhāvo pana paṭṭhānanayena
natthi = nissayapaccaññya”၏ aphaြcyasaññya paṭṭhānya”naññya”၌ maraှိpā hu phhaင’yachiုkhaြငya” phaြcyapesaññya． siု’soya āhāra
kaြောင’ya phaြcyapoyalākunyaso rupyatarā”tiု’saññya āhāralaျှငya maှီrā raှိso rupyatarā”tiု’ maññyakunya၏hu
naှluṃ”piုkyatoyamū၍ suttanyanaññya”၏ achamya”phaြင’ya aṭṭhakathācharātoya phhaင’yachiုtoyamūkhaြငya” phaြcyasaññyahu maှtyapā．
nokya၌ lāraှိmañña’ya utu၏ nissayapaccaññya” aphaြcyakiု thhanya”paြrā၌laññya” ī naññya”atiုငya”paငya maှtyapā．
atthi ---- akaြောငya”phaြcyaso ā”pe”thokyapaṃ’tatyasañña’ya āhārasamuṭṭhānyaojānaှင’ya akaျို”phaြcyaso
kammajaojā cittajaojā utujaojā āhārajaojā hūso catusamuṭṭhānikaojāsaññya thaငyaraှာ”raှိnekhiုkya
kaျေ”jū”paြုpe”so sattikiု atthipaccayasattihu khoyachiု၏．
avigata ---- yaငya” akaြောငya” akaျို” naှcyarapyaluṃ”tiု’ makaငya”mī makhaျုpyamī akhaျငya”khaျငya” kaျေ”jū”paြုpe”so
sattikiု avigatapaccayasattihu khoyachiု၏． īsiု’laျှငya āhārapaccaññya”saññya akaြောငya”paccaññya”tarā” akaျို”
paccayuppanyatarā” naှcyamaျို”luṃ”tiု’၏ thaငyaraှာ”phaြcyanetunya” raှိnetunya”maှာsālaျှငya atthisatti avigatasattitiု’phaြင’ya
laññya” kaျေ”jū”paြု၏， suttanyanaññya” aliုā”phaြင’ya nissayasattiphaြင’yalaññya” kaျေ”jū”paြု၏hu maှtyasā”pāle．
(mahāṭī-2-403-404．)
īkaဲ’siု’so āhārajarupya၏ phaြcyamaှုkiုkā” nibbānakiု liုlā”toင’yatalaျkyaraှိso asaငyayogā
0cara puggiုlyasūmaြtyasaññya ñāṇyapaññāmaျkyaciphaြင’ya kiုyyatiုငyamaျkyamaှောkya thhaငya”phokya simaြငyaaောငya raှုphā”ramaññya
sā phaြcyapesaññya． (visuddhi-2-251．)
utujarupyatiု’၏ phaြcyapoyapuṃ
utujarupyatiု’၌laññya” ----
1． utu，
2． utusamuṭṭhāna，
3． utupaccaya，
4． utupaccaya utusamuṭṭhāna，
5． utupaccaya āhārasamuṭṭhāna ----
ī (5)maျို”so khhaဲkhaြာ” vephanyamaှုkiု sisaင’yapesaññya．
686
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
1． utu = tejodhātya
tattha utu nāma catusamuṭṭhānā tejodhātu， uṇaှutusītautūti evaṃ panesa duvidho hoti．
(visuddhi-2-251．)
thiု (5)maျို”tiု’thaငya kaṃ-citya-utu-āhāra hūso (4)maျို”so akaြောငya”tarā”kaြောင’ya thaငyaraှာ”
phaြcyapoyalāraso kammajakalāpya cittajakalāpya utujakalāpya āhārajakalāpyatiုငya”၌ pāvaငyaso
tejodhātyasaññya utu maññya၏． ī utusaññyakā” uṇaှutu = apūutu， sītautu = aaေ”utuhu
naှcyamaျို” raှိ၏． (visuddhi-2-251．)
kammasamuṭṭhānyautucaso (4)maျို”luṃ”so utusaññya utujarupyakiု phaြcyacekhaြငya”၌ chamya”niုငyasaññya၏ aphaြcya
kaြောင’ya catusamuṭṭhānya rupyakalāpyatiုငya”၌ taññyaraှိso tejodhātyasaññya utumaññyakaြောငya” aṭṭhakathā
charātoya phhaင’yachiုtoyamūkhaြငya” phaြcyasaññya． īutusaññya tejodhātya၏ aphaြcyaphaြင’ya athū” maraှိငြာ”soyalaññya”
thakyasaññya၏aphaြcya nuṃ’saññya၏aphaြcyahūso tikkha-manda guṇyathū” visesaphaြင’ya ----
1． thakyamaြkyaso tikkha - tejodhātyakiု uṇaှutuhulaññya”koငya”，
2． nuṃ’so manda - tejodhātyakiု sītautuhulaññya”koငya” ----
khoyachiုliုkyasaphaြင’ya īsiု’ naှcyamaျို” khaဲpaြာ”shā”khaြငya” phaြcyapesaññya． (mahāṭī-2-404．)
mahāṭīkā dutiyathaဲ (108-109)tiု’၌laññya” aောkyapāatiုငya” raှငya”laငya”thā”၏．
pathavī tejo vāyo hūso dhātya (3)pā”apoငya”saññya phoṭṭhabba maññya၏． ī phoṭṭhabbāruṃ၌

2． utusamuṭṭhāna = utukaြောင’ya phaြcyasorupya
utusamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma catusamuṭṭhāno utu upādiṇṇakaṃ paccayaṃ labhithā ṭhānappatto sarīre rūpaṃ samu-
ṭṭhāpeti． taṃ saddana0kaṃ ākāsadhātu， lahutā， mudutā， kammaññatā， upacayo， santatīti pannarasavidhaṃ
hoti． (visuddhi-2-251-252．)
yadipi utu upādinnakena vināpi rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti， indaြိyabaddhe pana tena vinā tassa rūpuppādanaṃ
natthīti āha “upādinnakaṃ paccayaṃ labhithā”ti． tenāha “catusamuṭṭhāno utū”ti． utusamuṭṭhānoye0
hi utu upādinnakena vinā rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti． (mahāṭī-2-404．)

3． utupaccaya = utuathokyaapaṃ’ raှိsorupya
utupaccayaṃ nāma utu catusamuṭṭhānikānaṃ rūpānaṃ pavattiyā ca vināsassa ca paccayo hoti．
(visuddhi-2-252．)
utupaccayaṃ nāma catusamuṭṭhānikaṃ rūpaṃ． yauှိ utusamuṭṭhānaṃ pannarasavidhaṃ rūpaṃ， yañca tadaññatisantatirūpaṃ，
tassa sabbassapi sabhāgo utu upatthambhakapaccayo hotīti． yasmā visabhāgo utu himādi viya
padumādīnaṃ visadisarūpuppattihetubhūtaṃ purimarūpaṃ vināsentaṃ viya hoti， tasmā sabhāgaṃ， visabhāgañca
ekajjhaṃ gahethā vuttaṃ “utu catusamuṭṭhānikarūpānaṃ pavattiyā ca vināsassa ca paccayo hotī”ti．
(mahāṭī-2-404．)

bhoyaā”laျောyachā tiုkyakhanya”tacyakhuathaငya”maှ acapaြု၍ soငya”lokadhātya tacyakhhaငyasiု’ tiုငyaaောငya raှññyachā
so kālapatyaluṃ”laññya” phaြcyaniုငyasaññyasātaññya”． vipassanāñāṇya aroငyaalaငya”maှာ thiုcittajaojaṭṭhamaka
rupyakalāpya utujaojaṭṭhamaka rupyakalāpyatiု’thaငya pāvaငyaso vaṇṇadhātya = rūpāruṃ၏ alhanyaakaဲ aroငya
tokyapamaှုtaññya”． vipassanāñāṇyanaှင’ya yaှñyaso citya cetasikyatiု’kaြောင’ya phaြcyaso cittajaojaṭṭhamaka
rupyakalāpyatiု’thaငyalaññya” vaṇṇadhātya rūpāruṃ pāvaငyalaျkyapaငya raှိ၏． thiု rūpāruṃsaññyalaññya” ñāṇyaānubhoyaka
kaြီ”laျှငya kaြီ”saliု alhanyatokyapasaññyasā phaြcya၏． siု’soya thiု vipassanācityakaြောင’ya phaြcyaso cittaja
rupyakalāpyamaျာ”kā” sarīraṭṭha = yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ khandhāaိmyaathaငya”၌sā phaြcya၏， apaြငya bahiddhasiု’ mapaျံ’pe．
yaငya” cittajarupyakalāpyamaျာ”thaငya pāvaငyaso tejodhātya utukaြောင’ya chaင’yakaဲ phaြcyaphā”lākaြso utujarupya
maျာ”saññyasālaျှငya ajjhattathaငyasāmaka bahiddhasiု’tiုငyaaောငya arapyachayyamaျkyanaှာ vanya”kaျငyapatyakhaျာ၌ paျံ’naှံ’၍
phaြcyakaြ၏． yaငya”bahiddha၌ bhutyaachakyachakya riုkyakhatya၍ phaြcyanekaြso utusamuṭṭhānya = utujarupyatiု’kā”
utupaccaya utusamuṭṭhānyarupya maññyapesaññya， anupādinnakapakkha၌ taññya၍ utujarupyatiု’၏ phaြcyamaှုpaငyataññya”．
5． utupaccaya āhārasamuṭṭhāna = utu athokyaapaṃ’raှိso āhārakaြောင’ya phaြcyasorupya
utupaccayaāhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma utusamuṭṭhānā ṭhānappattā ojā aññaṃ ojaṭṭhamakaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti，
tataြာpi ojā aññanti evaṃ dasa dhādasa vāre pavatti H ghaṭeti． (visuddhi-2-252．)
athakyathaငya phoyapaြthā”khaဲ’so kammasamuṭṭhānya-utu， cittasamuṭṭhānya-utu， utusamuṭṭhānya-utu， āhāra
samuṭṭhānya-utuhūso (4)maျို”so utukaြောင’yaphaြcyaso utujarupyakalāpya (= utusamuṭṭhānyarupyakalāpya)
694
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
asī”asī”၌ taññyaraှိso ojāsaññya (raှေ” āhārajarupyapiုငya”thaငya phoyapaြkhaဲ’so āhārajaojā၏ ā”
pe”thokyapaṃ’maှုkiု raraှိsoakhā) rupya၏ ṭhīkālasiု’ rokyaraှိkhiုkyavayya akhaြာ”tacyapā”so ojaṭṭhamakarupyakiု
phaြcyace၏． yaငya”ojaṭṭhamaka rupyakalāpya၌ taññyaso ojāsaññyalaññya” (āhārajaojā၏ ā”pe”thokyapaṃ’
maှုkiု raraှိsoakhā) rupya၏ṭhīkālasiု’ rokyakhiုkya၌ akhaြာ”tacyapā”so ojaṭṭhamakarupyakiု phaြcyacepaြnya၏．
īsiု’laျှငya (10)kaြိmya (12)kaြိmyaso rupyakalāpyatiု’၏ phaြcyakhaြငya”kiု chakyacapyace၏． (visuddhi-2-252．)
janaka naှင’ya upatthambhaka
tataြာyaṃ utu utusamuṭṭhānānaṃ janako huthā paccayo hoti， sesānaṃ nissayaatthiavi-
gata0senāti evaṃ utujarūpassa nibbatti passitabbā． e0uှိ rūpassa nibbattiṃ passanto kālena rūpaṃ sammasati
nāma． (visuddhi-2-252．)
rūpassa nibbattiyā diṭṭhāya tassa bhaṅgopi diṭṭhoye0 hoti ittarakālattā dhammappavattiyāti
āha “nibbatti H passanto kālena rūpaṃ sammasati nāmā”ti． na hi nibbattimattadassanaṃ sammasanaṃ nāma
hoti， udayabbayadassanañca adhikatanti． esa nayo ito paresupi nibbattiggahaṇesu．
(mahāṭī-2-404．)
athakyapā rupyakalāpyaamaျို”acā”tiု’thaငya ītejodhātyautusaññya utusamuṭṭhānyarupyatiု’ā” tiုkyariုkya
phaြcyacetatyaso janaka akaြောငya”tarā”phaြcya၍ kaျေ”jū”paြုtatya၏． utusamuṭṭhānyarupyamaှ kaြhaငya”kunyaso kamma-
samuṭṭhānya cittasamuṭṭhānya āhārasamuṭṭhānyahūso (3)maျို”so tisantatirupyatiု’ā” nissayasatti atthisatti
avigatasattitiု’၏ achamya”phaြင’ya ā”pe”thokyapaṃ’tatyaso upatthambhaka akaြောငya”tarā”phaြcya၍ kaျေ”jū”paြု
tatya၏．
īsiု’laျှငya utujarupyatiု’၏ phaြcyapuṅkiု vipassanāñāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyaaောငya raှုpā．
akaျို”kā” --- īchiုapyakhaဲ’paြီ”sonaññya”phaြင’ya rupyatarā”၏ phaြcyamaှုkiု vipassanāñāṇyaphaြင’ya kiုyyatiုငyamaျkyamaှောkya
thhaငya”phokyasimaြငyaaောငya raှုso yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya raṅkhā rupyatarā”kiု raှုphā”suṃ”sapyasaññya maññya၏．
(visuddhi-2-252．)
rupyatarā”၏ phaြcyamaှုsabhotarā”kiု vipassanāñāṇyaphaြင’ya kiုyyatiုငyamaျkyamaှောkya thhaငya”phokya simaြငyaapya
paြီ”saññyaraှိsoya paramattha dhammasabhā0tiု’၏ alhanyatiုtoငya”so akhaျိnyakāla sakyatamya”raှိsaññya၏ aphaြcya
kaြောင’ya thiုrupyatarā”၏ paျkyakhaြငya” bhaငyakiုlaññya” maြငyaapyasaññyasālaျှငya phaြcya၏． thiုkaြောင’ya “rupyatarā”၏ phaြcyamaှု
kiု vipassanāñāṇyaphaြင’ya kiုyyatiုငyamaျkyamaှောkya thhaငya”phokyasimaြငyaaောငya raှုso yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya
raṅkhā rupyatarā”kiု raှုphā”suṃ”sapyasaññya maññya၏”hu aṭṭhakathāka mina’yachiုkhaြငya” phaြcyapesaññya．
maှnyapesaññya --- phaြcyamaှု sabhotarā”sakyasakyamaျှkiု raှုkhaြငya”saññya lakkhaṇāre”suṃ”tanya taငyakā raှုphā”
suṃ”sapyasaññya mamaññya． caငyacacyakā” phaြcyamaှု paျkyamaှုkiု raှုkhaြငya”kiု capyayaှñyaapyaso arātaññya”hu siapya၏． īmaှ
nokyapiုငya”vayya phaြcyamaှုkiု raှုkhaြငya”tiု’၌laññya” naññya”tūpaငya maှtyapā． (īkā” vipassanāpiုငya”kiု raññya၍ phhaင’yachiုso
cakā”taññya”．) (mahāṭī-2-404．)
īthaငya rūpanibbattipassanākāra khoya rupyatiု’၏ phaြcyapuṅkiု raှုphā”puṃ akhaြငya”arā ākārapiုငya” paြီ”၏．
၏၏၏
695
rupyakammaṭṭhānya”piုငya”
maျkyaci၌ kaြññyasañña’ya rupyakalāpyamaျာ”kiု khhaဲkhaြာ”puṃ
athakyathaငya phoyapaြkhaဲ’so catusamuṭṭhānikarupyatiု’၏ phaြcyapuṃakhaြငya”arākiု kaျññekyaaောငya athapyathapya
phatyaraှုpā， ce’ce’ငုငု kaြñña’yaraှုpā． siု’maှsālaျှငya aောkyathaငya chakyalakyaphoyapaြmañña’ya rupyatarā” raှုkhakyamaျာ”kiု
sabhopokyaniုငyamaññya lakyakhaṃniုငyamaññya phaြcyapesaññya．
raှေ”rupyakammaṭṭhānya” jayā”maျာ”thaငya phoyapaြkhaဲ’sañña’yaatiုငya” maျkyaci၌ cakkhudasaka kalāpya kāyadasaka
kalāpyahu kaြññyasañña’ya rupyakalāpya amaျို”acā” naှcyamaျို” raှိne၏． īakhaျိnyapiုငya”thaငya yogā0carapuggiုlyaane
phaြင’yakā” kaြññyasañña’ya rupyakalāpyaamaှုnya makaြññyasañña’ya rupyakalāpyaamaှုnyahū၍sā the’raှိneū”maññya phaြcyape
saññya． cakkhudasakakalāpyamaှာlaññya” kaြññyaso rupyakalāpya tacyamaျို”paငya phaြcya၍ kāyadasakakalāpyamaှာlaññya”
kaြññyaso rupyakalāpya tacyamaျို”paငya phaြcya၏． chanyamaှုna’yanaှင’ya nanhaငya”maှုna’yakiု samaaောငya rocapyathā”bhisakaဲ’siု’
maျkyaci၌ yaငya” kaြññyasañña’ya rupyakalāpya naှcyamaျို”tiု’ ronaှောlaျkya taññyaraှိne၏．
rūpāruṃ aroငyaachaငya”kiု siso cakkhuviññāṇyacityasaññya cakkhudasaka kalāpyaathaငya”၌ pāvaငyataññyaraှိ
so cakkhupasāda = cakkhuakaြññyadhātyakiု maှီphaြcya၍ phoṭṭhabbāruṃ (= athe’athidhātya = pathavīdhātya-tejodha
mtya-vāyodhātya)kiု siso kāyaviññāṇyacityasaññya kāyadasaka kalāpyaathaငya”၌ taññyaraှိso
kāyapasāda = kāyaakaြññyadhātyakiု maှီ၍ phaြcya၏．
maျkyaluṃ”aိmyaathaငya” maññyasañña’yanerākiုmachiု se”ငyyaso arāvatthutacyakhuphaြင’ya tiု’kaြñña’yapāka nerā
tiုငya”thaငya the’thimaှု phoṭṭhabbadhātyakiု siso kāyaviññāṇyacitya phaြcyapoyaniုငyasaññyakiု sabhopokyaniုငya၏．
thiုkāyaviññāṇyacityasaññya kāyaakaြññyadhātyakiုsā maှီ၍ phaြcyaniုငyasaphaြင’ya maျkyaluṃ”aိmyaathaငya” nerāanaှံ’
apaြာ”၌ kāyaakaြññyadhātya pāvaငyaso kāyadasaka kalāpyapoငya”maျာ”chā raှိnesaññyakiု sabhopokya
niုငya၏．
cakkhudasaka kalāpyamaျာ”maှာ maျkyaluṃ”aိmyaathaငya” kaြññyalaငyaso avanya”aviုငya”၏ athaငya”vayya sanya”-
ū”khoငya” pamāṇaraှိso arapya၌sā maျာ”chācuve”laျkya phaြcyanekaြ၏． thiုcakkhudasaka kalāpyamaျာ” cuve”taññya
raှိrā arapya၌laññya” thimaှုkiု sisañña’ya kāyaviññāṇyadhātya၏ maှီ၍ phaြcyarā kāyaakaြññyadhātya pāvaငyasañña’ya
kāyadasaka kalāpyamaျာ”laññya” cakkhudasaka kalāpyamaျာ”naှင’ya ronaှောlaျkya taññyaraှိnesaññyasā phaြcya၏．
siု’athakya thiုakaြññyadhātya naှcyamaျို” pāvaငyaso akaြññyakalāpya naှcyamaျို”kiု khhaဲkhaြာ”၍ raှုtatyaphiု’ liုapyapesaññya．
rūpābhighātārahabhūtappasādalakkhaṇaṃ cakkhu． (visuddhi-2-74．) rūpāruṃ၏ raှေ”raှူriုkyakhatyakhaြငya”kiု thiုkya
tanyaso (rūpāruṃ၏ raှေ”raှူriုkyakhatyakhaြငya”ငှာ thiုkyatanyaso) bhūtarupya (dhātyakaြီ” 4-pā”)kiု kaြññyalaငyacekhaြငya”
sabholakkhaṇāraှိso rupyakā” cakkhupasāda = cakkhuakaြññyadhātyataññya”． thiု cakkhuakaြññyadhātya pāvaငyaso
cakkhuakaြññyadhātyalaျှငya (10)khumaြောkyaraှိso rupyakalāpyakā” cakkhudasaka kalāpyataññya”．
phoṭṭhabbābhighātārahabhūtappasādalakkhaṇo kāyo． (visuddhi-2-74．) phoṭṭhabbāruṃ (pathavī-tejo-
vāyo)၏ raှေ”raှူriုkyakhatyakhaြငya”kiု (raှေ”raှူriုkyakhatyakhaြငya”ငှာ) thiုkyatanyaso bhūtarupya dhātyakaြီ” (4)pā”
kiု kaြññyalaငyacekhaြငya” sabholakkhaṇāraှိso rupyatarā”kā” kāyapasāda = kiုyyaakaြññyadhātyataññya”．
thiု kiုyyaakaြññyadhātya pāvaငyaso kiုyyaakaြññyadhātyalaျှငya (10)khumaြောkyaraှိso rupyakalāpyakā” kāya-
dasaka kalāpyataññya”．
696
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
īsiု’laျှငya riုkyakhatyaneso atiုkyadhātyaāruṃnaှင’ya kapya၍ yaငya”āruṅkiုpā pū”thaဲsimya”chaññya”၍ akaြññya
dhātyamaျာ”kiု khhaဲkhaြာ”cityaphaြာ၍ raှုramaññya phaြcyasaññya． riုkyakhatyaso āruṃnaှင’ya tiုkyachiုငya၍ --- “maññyasañña’ya akaြññya
dhātyaka cakkhuakaြññya phaြcyasaññya， maññyasañña’ya akaြññyadhātyaka kāyaakaြññya phaြcyasaññya”hu khhaဲkhaြာ”yūramaññya
phaြcyasaññya．
raှုphā”simya”chaññya”puṃcanacya
samādhikiု achaင’yachaင’ya thūthoငya၍ maျkyaci၌ dhātyakaြီ” (4)pā”kiု ciုkyaraှုpā． rupyakalāpyaamaှုnyamaျာ”kiု
thaငyaraှာ”chā the’maြငyarasoakhā kaြññyasañña’ya rupyakalāpyatacyakhukiု dhātyakhhaဲpā． (10)maျို”so rupyasabhotarā”
tiု’kiု maြငyaaောငyaraှုpā． yaငya”kaြññyasañña’ya rupyakalāpyatacyakhu athaငya”၌ taññyaraှိso kaြññyanesañña’yasabho =
akaြññyadhātyakiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”yūthā”pā， simya”chaññya”thā”pā． tacyaphanya thiုakaြññyadhātya pāvaငyasañña’ya rupya
kalāpyanaှင’ya malaှmya”makamya”thaငya taññyaraှိso kaြññyasañña’ya rupyakalāpyatacyakhu၏ rūpāruṃaroငyakiု phaြcyace， makaြññya
sañña’ya rupyakalāpyatacyakhu၏ rūpāruṃaroငyakiုphaြcyace， siု’mahutya kaြññya-makaြññya naှcyamaျို”luṃ”so rupyakalāpya
amaျာ”cu၏ rūpāruṃaroငyakiုphaြcyace laှmya”၍ āruṃyūkaြñña’yapā， ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”yūpā， simya”chaññya”pā． thiုrūpāruṃ
aroငyaka mimi pū”thaဲsimya”chaññya”thā”sañña’ya thiုakaြññyadhātyakiု akayya၍ raှေ”raှူriုkyakhatyanepāka thiုakaြññya
dhātyamaှာ cakkhuakaြññyadhātya phaြcyasaññya， thiုcakkhuakaြññyadhātya pāvaငyaso rupyakalāpyamaှာ cakkhudasaka kalāpya
phaြcyasaññya． thiုcakkhudasaka kalāpyakiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya khhaဲkhaြာ”cityaphaြာ၍ tacyaluṃ”cī tacyaluṃ”cī raှုkaြñña’yapāka = dhātyakhhaဲ
kaြñña’yapāka rupyakammaṭṭhānya”jayā”maျာ”thaငya phoyapaြthā”sañña’yaatiုငya” cakkhuakaြññyadhātya = cakkhupasādalaျှငya (10)
khumaြောkyaraှိso rupyasabhotarā”maျာ”kiု the’raှိmaññya phaြcyasaññya． akayya၍ thiု rūpāruṃaroငyaka thiု mimisimya”
chaññya”thā”sañña’ya akaြññyadhātyakiု raှေ”raှူriုkyakhatyamaှု maraှိpāka thiုakaြññyadhātyamaှာ kāyaakaြññyadhātya phaြcya
phhayyarā raှိpesaññya． siု’soya sekhaျာaောငya kaြိmyaphanyamaျာ”chākā” chanya”cacyakaြñña’yaramaññya phaြcyapesaññya．
tacyaphanya maျkyaluṃ”aိmya athaငya”maှာpaငya kaြññyanesañña’ya rupyakalāpyatacyakhukiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya simya”chaññya”၍ dhātya
khhaဲpā． yaငya”rupyakalāpyathaငya pāvaငyataññyaraှိneso akaြññyadhātyakiု chakya၍ simya”chaññya”pā， ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”
yūpā． thiု kaြññyasañña’ya rupyakalāpyanaှင’ya anī”kapyachuṃ” rupyakalāpyatacyakhu၌ siု’mahutya rupyakalāpya amaျာ”cu၌ya
taññyaraှိsañña’ya phoṭṭhabbadhātya amaññyaraso pathavīdhātya tejodhātya vāyodhātya tacyakhukhukiု laှmya”āruṃyūpā，
ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”yūpā， simya”chaññya”pā． namūnāā”phaြင’yachiုrasoya thiုanī”kapyachuṃ” rupyakalāpyatacyakhu athaငya”၌
siု’mahutya rupyakalāpya amaျာ”cu၌ya pāvaငyataññyaraှိso pathavīdhātya = māmaှုsabhotarā” tacyakhukiုpaငya laှmya”၍
āruṃyūkaြñña’yapā． akayya၍ thiု māmaှုsabhotarā” phoṭṭhabbadhātyaka mimi simya”chaññya”thā”sañña’ya akaြññyadhātyakiု
raှေ”raှူriုkyakhatyanepāka thiုakaြññyadhātyamaှာ kāyaakaြññyadhātya phaြcya၍ thiုkāyaakaြññyadhātya pāvaငyaso
kāyaakaြññyadhātyalaျှငya (10)khumaြောkyaraှိso rupyakalāpyamaှာ kāyadasaka kalāpya phaြcyasaññya． thiု (10)maျို”

rupyakammaṭṭhānya”piုငya”

utusamuṭṭhānyarupyahupaငya khoyachiုpesaññya． īsiု’laျှငya (4)kaြိmya (5)kaြိmyaso rupyatiု’၏ phaြcyakhaြငya”kiု chakya
capyace၏． (visuddhi-2-250．)

phaြcyacesaññyasātaññya”， upādinnakaaphiု’၌ taññya၍soyakā” chiုphhayyarāpaငya maraှိ --- hu aṭṭhakathācharātoya
mina’yachiုtoyamūkhaြငya” phaြcyasaññya．

2． samathabhā0nācitya vipassanābhā0nācitya magyacitya phiုlyacityatiု’kaဲ’siု’so mhanyamaြtyaso cityatiု’၏
athokyaapaṃ’，

4． mhanyamaြtyaso āhāra ojātiု’၏ athokyaapaṃ’ caso ---
ī athokyaapaṃ’koငya”maျာ”kiု chiုliုsaññya． īathokyaapaṃ’tiု’kā” mūlaakaျို”pe”neso kaṃ၏

maှာlaññya” kammajatejodhātyapaငya phaြcya၏． yaငya” kammajatejodhātyakalaññya” ṭhīkālasiု’ rokyaraှိkhiုkyavayya

rupya = kaṃlaျှငya akaြောငya”athokyaapaṃ’ raှိso utukaြောင’ya phaြcyasorupya maññya၏．

taññya”． (visuddhi-2-251．) (cittajautu၏ sā”taññya”．)

rupyakammaṭṭhānya”piုငya”
asacyakiု phaြcyacepuṅkiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyaaောငya raှုpā． yaငya” ojaṭṭhamakarupyakā” āhārapaccaya utusamuṭṭhānya
maññya၏． (visuddhi-2-251．) (āhāraja-utu၏ sā”taññya”．)
yaငya” āhārapaccaya utusamuṭṭhānya ojaṭṭhamakarupyathaငya pāvaငyaso tejodhātyakā” utujarupya =
utusamuṭṭhānyarupya cāraငya”thaငya vaငyashā”paြီ phaြcya၏． yaငya”tejodhātyakalaññya” ṭhīkālasiု’ rokyaraှိkhiုkya akhaြာ”
so ojaṭṭhamaka rupyakalāpya asacyakiု phaြcyacepaြnya၏． utupaccaya utusamuṭṭhānyarupya maññya၏． (āhārajautu၏
maြေ”taññya”．) īnaññya”ā”phaြင’ya (10)kaြိmya (12)kaြိmyaso rupyakalāpyatiု’၏ phaြcyakhaြငya”kiု chakyacapyace၏．
siု’soya natyaojā casaññyatiု’kaဲ’siု’so mhanyamaြtyaso āhārajaojā၏ athokyaapaṃ’kiု rakhaဲ’pāmū raှññya
chāso kālapatyaluṃ”soyalaññya” ojaṭṭhamakarupyamaျာ”kiု phaြcyaceniုငyasaññyasātaññya”． (visuddhi-2-251-252．)
(āhāraja-utu၏ sā”cañyamaြေ”chakya achakyachakyataññya”．)

( kha ) cittapaccaya utusamuṭṭhānyarupyanaှင’ya thiုmaှtacyachaင’ya utupaccaya utusamuṭṭhānyarupya phaြcyapuṅkiုlaññya”koငya”，
( ga ) utupaccaya utusamuṭṭhānyarupya phaြcyapuṅkiုlaññya”koငya”，

asī”asī” phoyapaြkhaဲ’paြီ” phaြcya၏．

ī phoyapaြpā catusamuṭṭhānyautusaññya utusamuṭṭhānyarupyakiု phaြcyacerā၌ upādiṇṇakaṃ paccayaṃ labhithā

liုapyalaျkyasā raှိpesaññya． raှေ” utujarupya phaြcyaphā”puṅkiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyaaောငya raှုphā”simya”chaññya”puṃapiုငya”
thaငya (naှာ-688 - casaññya၌) phoyapaြkhaဲ’paြီ”pepaြီ．

tiု’၌laññya” naññya”maှီ”၍ raှုphā” simya”chaññya”pāle．

athakyathaငya phoyapaြkhaဲ’so āhārajarupyamaျာ” phaြcyapoyalāpuṃ akhaြငya”arānaှင’ya chakyacapyalaျkyaraှိso

acāsacya၌laññya”koငya”， acāsacyaaိmyasiု’ rokyaraှိshā”paြီ”so acāsacya၌laññya”koငya” dhātyakaြီ” (4)pā”
kiု maြငyaaောငya ciုkyaraှုpā． utuja-ojaṭṭhamaka rupyakalāpyaamaှုnyamaျာ”kiုsā the’raှိnemaññya phaြcyasaññya． mimi raှုphā”
liုso acāsacyavanya”kaျငyathaငya taññyaraှိneso jīvitana0ka kalāpyatiု’thaငya pāvaငyaso acākiု kaြkeျkya
cetatyaso pācakatejodhātyaka yaငya” cā”maျို vā”maျိုliုkyaso utuja-ojaṭṭhamakarupyatiု’thaငya pāvaငyaso
ojākiု ā”pe”thokyapaṃ’liုkyasoakhā yaငya” utuja ojāka ṭhīkālasiု’ rokyakhiုkya ojaṭṭhamaka rupyakalāpya
asacyaasacyakiု phaြcyacepuṅkiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyaaောငya kaြñña’yapā． tacyaphanya yaငya” ojaṭṭhamaka rupyakalāpyatiု’
kā” bhutyaachakyachakya riုkyakhatyalaျkya tacyakiုyyaluṃ”siု’ (6)dhāraluṃ”siု’ paျံ’naှံ’ phaြcyaphā”laျkya raှိpuṅkiုlaññya” ñāṇya
phaြင’ya maြငyaaောငya raှုpā， kaြñña’yapā． yaငya”rupyatiု’kā” ojākaြောင’ya phaြcya၍ āhārasamuṭṭhānyarupyatiု’ maññyakunya၏．
(visuddhi-2-251．)
akayya၍ asaငyayogīsūtoyakoငya”saññya cā”sokyapaြီ” tacyakhaျိnyakhaျိnya၌ raှုphā”liုpāka acāsacyaaိmyaathaငya”
aူathaငya” casaññyatiု’၌ taññyaraှိso acāsacyakoṭṭhāsakiု āruṃyū၍ puṃcaṃtūpaငya raှုpā． akayya
၍ acāsacyaaိmya athaငya”၌ acāsacyakoṭṭhāsakiု lhayyalhayyakūkū mathe’niုငyaso akhaျိnyamaျို” phaြcyanepāka
maraှုkhaငyamaှာ renaññya”ငyyakiု phaြcyace sokya၍ raှုkaြñña’yapā． āhārasamuṭṭhānyarupyamaျာ” tacyakiုyyaluṃ”siု’ (6)dhāra
luṃ”siု’ anaှံ’apaြာ” bhutyaachakyachakya riုkyakhatyalaျkya phaြcyanepuṅkiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyaaောငya raှုpā． tacyane’ cā”maျို
liုkyaso acāāhārasaññya khunacyarakyapatyaluṃ”soyalaññya” rūpakāyaā” ā”pe”thokyapaṃ’maှု upatthambhaka
sattiphaြင’ya kaျေ”jū”paြုniုငya၏hūso (visuddhi-2-251．) achiုamina’yakiု satipaြုpā． īāhārasamuṭṭhānyarupyakiု
raှုtatyapāka maျkyaciathi āhārasamuṭṭhānyarupyamaျာ” paျံ’naှံ’ phaြcyaphā”nesaññyakiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyaaောငya raှုtatya
pāka cakkhudhāra၌ taññyaraှိso catusamuṭṭhānika ojāā” yaငya” āhārasamuṭṭhānyaojāka ā”pe”thokyapaṃ’
maှုkiု tacyachaင’yatakya၍ raှုniုငyapaြီ phaြcyasaññya．

ñāṇyaamaြငyachiုkyaaောငya simya”chaññya”paြီ”maှ ojākhaျငya” poငya”chuṃmi၍ āhārasamuṭṭhānyaojāka upatthambhaka
āhārapaccayasattiphaြင’ya kaျေ”jū”paြုpe”၍ catusamuṭṭhānyaojā asī”asī”ka janaka āhārapaccayasattiphaြင’ya
kaျေ”jū”paြုpe”khaြငya”kaြောင’ya ojaṭṭhamaka rupyakalāpyaasacyamaျာ” phaြcyapoyalāpuṅkiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyaaောငya raှုpā．
phaြcyapoyalātiုငya”so ojaṭṭhamaka rupyakalāpya asacyaasacyamaျာ”kiုlaññya” paramatyasiု’ ñāṇyaamaြငyachiုkyaaောငya
khhaဲkhaြာ”cityaphaြာ၍ raှုpā， simya”chaññya”pā， dhātyakhhaဲpā．
naှcyakhha - naှcyakhha - royaှkya phaြcyapuṃ
athakyathaငya phoyapaြkhaဲ’so cakkhudhāra၌ taññyaraှိso --- cakkhudasaka kalāpya， kāyadasaka kalāpya，
bhā0dasaka kalāpya， cittajaaṭṭhakalāpya， utujaaṭṭhakalāpya， āhārajaaṭṭhakalāpyahūso (6)maျို”so
rupyakalāpyatiု’၏ phaြcyacañyakiု marocapyasaphaြင’ya thaငyaraှာ”phoyapaြthā”၏． yaငya”phoyapaြkhaျkyakiု sekhaျာce’ငု kaြñña’ya
raှု၍ canacyatakaျ raှုphā” simya”chaññya”tatyaaောငya le’kaျင’yapā． cakkhudasaka kalāpya caso thiုthiု rupyakalāpya
tacyakhu athaငya”၌ ---
1． tejodhātya，
2． ojā ---
713
rupyakammaṭṭhānya”piုငya”
īnaှcyamaျို”so paramatyatarā”tiု’saññya ojaṭṭhamaka rupyakalāpya asacyaasacyakiု phaြcyaceniုငyaso chamya”
ā”raှိso rupyaparamatyatarā”maျာ” phaြcyakaြ၏． thiုthaငya tejodhātyasaññya --- upādiṇṇakaṃ paccayaṃ labhithā =
(visuddhi-2-251．) hūso aṭṭhakathā achiုatiုငya” upādinnaka kammajarupya၏ ā”pe”thokyapaṃ’maှုkiု raraှိso
akhā utusamuṭṭhānya ojaṭṭhamakarupyakiု phaြcyaceniုငya၏．
ojāsaññyalaññya” upādiṇṇaṃ kammajarūpaṃ paccayaṃ labhithā (visuddhi-2-251．) upādiṇṇa kammajarupya၏ athokyaapaṃ’kiု
raraှိsoakhā āhārasamuṭṭhānya ojaṭṭhamaka rupyakalāpyaasacyakiု phaြcyaceniုငya၏． cakkhudhāra၌
raှိso kaျnyarupyakalāpya (5)maျို”tiု’၌laññya” naññya”tūpaငya maှtyapā． rupyakalāpyatiုငya”thaငya tejodhātyanaှင’ya ojātiု’
pāvaငyamaြဲ dhammatāphaြcyarā rupyakalāpyatiုငya”liုliု၌ taññyaraှိso tejodhātyatiုငya” ojātiုငya”saññya yebhuyaျ
ā”phaြင’ya ṭhīkālasiု’rokyakhiုkya ojaṭṭhamaka rupyakalāpya asacyaasacyakiု phaြcyaceniုငya၏hu liုraငya”akhaျkyakiု
maှtyasā”thā”pā．
ī၌ yebhuyaျhu paြောchiုrakhaြငya”maှာ īsiု’ phaြcya၏ --- yaငya”tejodhātyanaှင’ya ojātiု’ka utusamuṭṭhānya
āhārasamuṭṭhānya rupyakalāpya asacyaasacyakiု phaြcyacerā၌ le”chaင’ya ငါ”chaင’ya casaññyaphaြင’ya rupyakalāpyatiု’၏
phaြcyakhaြငya”kiု chakyacapyaceniုငyasaññyaphaြcyarā --- nokyachuṃ”achaင’ya rupyakalāpyathaငya taññyaraှိso tejodhātyanaှင’ya
ojātiု’kā” nokyathapya ojaṭṭhamaka rupyakalāpyaasacyakiု phaြcyaceniုငyasañña’ya chamya”ā” maraှိto’sokaြောင’ya
yebhuyaျ = maျာ”soā”phaြင’yahu paြောchiုkhaြငya” phaြcyasaññya． īraှငya”laငya”khaျkyakiု sabhopokyapāka aောkyapā
mahāṭīkācharātoya၏ mina’yakaြာ”khaျkyakiု sabhopokya nā”laññyaniုငyamaññya phaြcyapesaññya．
mahāṭīkā၏ phhaင’yachiုkhaျkya
ettha ca yathā tattha tattha koṭṭhāse paramparappavatti H dassentena akammajā dutiyādipavattiyo
asambhedena dassitā， evaṃ kammajāhārasamuṭṭhānautu0sena， kammajautusamuṭṭhānāhāra0sena， kammapaccaya
cittajāhāra-utusamuṭṭhānautuāhāra0sena ca sambheda0senāpi rūpappavatti dassetabbāti 0danti．
(mahāṭī-2-401．)
īarāvayya kammajakoṭṭhāsa， cittajakoṭṭhāsa， utujakoṭṭhāsa， āhārajakoṭṭhāsahūso
thiုthiုkoṭṭhāsa aphiု’acu၌ rupyakalāpyatiု’၏ raှေ”naှင’yanokya acañyamapaြtya chakyacapyalaျkya achakyachakya phaြcya
khaြငya”kiု phhaင’yapaြtoyamūso aṭṭhakathācharātoyasaññya kammapaccaya āhārasamuṭṭhānya， kammapaccaya utusamuṭṭhānya
caso kammaja mahutyaso naှcyakhumaြောkyaso rupyakalāpya casaññyatiု’၏ phaြcyakhaြငya”kiု raှငya”raှငya”laငya”laငya” tacyakana’yacī
khaြာ”nā”၍ maromayaှkyabhaဲ phoyapaြsakaဲ’siု’ alā”tūpaငya ---
1． kammajāhārasamuṭṭhānautu၏ achamya”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya”，
2． kammajautusamuṭṭhānāhāra၏ achamya”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya”，
3． kammapaccaya cittajāhāra၏ achamya”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya”，
4． utusamuṭṭhāna utuāhāratiု’၏ achamya”phaြင’yalaññya”koငya” ---
royaှkyasaññya၏ achamya”phaြင’yalaññya” rupya၏ phaြcyakhaြငya”acañyakiု paြsaင’ya၏hu charāmaြtyatiု’ mina’yachiုtoyamūkaြ
kunya၏． (mahāṭī-2-401．)
īathakyapā mahāṭīkātiု’၏ mina’yamaှာtoyamūkhaျkyaara raှုkhakyakiု raှုtatyaphiု’ranyaathakya atiုkhaျုpyakiု
714
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
anaññya”ငyya thapyamaṃ raှငya”laငya” taငyapaြapyapāsaññya． cakkhudhāra၌ taññyaraှိso (6)maျို”so rupyakalāpyatiု’kiုpaငya
caṃnamūnāthā”၍ phoyapaြapyapāsaññya．
1． cakkhudasaka kalāpya athaငya”၌ taññyaraှိso kammajatejodhātyasaññya upādiṇṇaka kammajarupya၏ athokyaapaṃ’kiု
raraှိsaññyaphaြcya၍ ṭhīkālasiု’rokyakhiုkya ojaṭṭhamaka rupyakalāpyaasacyakiု phaြcyace၏． kammaja
utukaြောင’ya phaြcyapoyalāsañña’ya (kammajapaccaya) utusamuṭṭhānyarupyataññya”． yaငya”utusamuṭṭhānyarupyathaငya pāvaငyataññya
raှိso --- (8)maျို”so rupyatiု’thaငya tejodhātyalaññya” pāvaငya၏， ojālaññya” pāvaငya၏． kammapaccaya utu
samuṭṭhānyatejodhātyanaှင’ya kammapaccaya utusamuṭṭhānyaojātaññya”．
1． yaငya” (kammapaccaya) utusamuṭṭhānyatejodhātyakalaññya” ṭhīkālasiု’rokyakhiုkya ojaṭṭhamaka rupyakalāpya
asacyakiု phaြcyacepaြnya၏， utupaccaya utusamuṭṭhānyarupya maññya၏． (visuddhi-2-252．)
2． yaငya” (kammapaccaya) utusamuṭṭhānyaojākalaññya” ṭhīkālasiု’rokyakhiုkya (āhārasamuṭṭhānyaojā၏
athokyaapaṃ’kiု rasoya) ojaṭṭhamaka rupyakalāpyaasacyakiု phaြcyacepaြnya၏． utupaccaya āhāra
samuṭṭhānyarupya maññya၏． (visuddhi-2-252．) tacyanaññya”chiုrasoya kammajautusamuṭṭhānāhārajarupyataññya”．
(mahāṭī-2-401．)
īkā” kammapaccaya utusamuṭṭhānya tacyanaññya” kammaja utusamuṭṭhānyarupyamaှ thapyachaင’ya၍ (1) utusamuṭṭhānya，
(2) āhārasamuṭṭhānyahu rupya (2)maျို” phaြcyaphā”shā”puṃtaññya”． ñāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyaaောငya raှုpā．
tacyaphanya athakyapā --- amaှtya (1) phaြcyaso - utupaccaya utusamuṭṭhānyaojaṭṭhamakarupyathaငyalaññya” tejo
dhātyanaှင’ya ojā pāvaငyalaျkyapaငya raှိpaြnya၏． yaငya”tejodhātyakalaññya” ojaṭṭhamaka rupyakalāpyaasacyakiု phaြcya
cepaြnya၏． (utupaccaya) utusamuṭṭhāna utujarupyataññya”．
yaငya” ojākalaññya” ojaṭṭhamaka rupyakalāpyaasacyakiု phaြcyacepaြnya၏． (utupaccaya) utusamuṭṭhāna
āhārajarupyataññya”． (mahāṭī-2-401．) īsiု’laျှငya (4)kaြိmya (5)kaြိmyasoyalaññya”koငya”， thiုthakya alhanya
soyalaññya”koငya” rupyakalāpyatiု’၏ phaြcyakhaြငya”kiု chakyacapyace၏． īnaññya”phaြင’ya rupyakalāpya tacyakhu athaငya”၌
tejodhātyanaှင’ya ojātiု’ka naှcyakhha naှcyakhha khhaဲthhakya၍ ojaṭṭhamaka rupyakalāpya asacyaasacyatiု’ phaြcyaphā”shā”puṅkiု
ñāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyaaောငya raှုpā．
tacyaphanya athakyapā amaှtya (2) phaြcyaso (utupaccaya āhārasamuṭṭhānya siု’mahutya kammajautusamuṭṭhānāha
mrajarupyahūso) āhārasamuṭṭhānyarupyathaငyalaññya” tejodhātyanaှင’ya ojā pāvaငyalaျkya raှိpaြnya၏． yaငya”
tejodhātyakalaññya” ojaṭṭhamaka rupyakalāpyaasacyakiုlaññya”koငya”， yaငya”ojākalaññya” ojaṭṭhamaka rupya
kalāpyaasacyakiုlaññya”koငya” phaြcyacepaြnya၏． īsiု’laျှငya (4)kaြိmya (5)kaြိmyasoyalaññya”koငya”， thiုthakya
alhanyasoyalaññya”koငya” rupyakalāpyatiု’၏ phaြcyakhaြငya”kiု chakyacapyace၏． ñāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyaaောငya raှုpā．
īkā” cakkhudasaka kalāpya tacyakhu athaငya”၌ taññyaraှိso tejodhātyakiု akhaြkheṃ၍ utusamuṭṭhānya
ojaṭṭhamakarupya āhārasamuṭṭhānya ojaṭṭhamakarupyatiု’ naှcyakhha naှcyakhha phaြာthhakya၍ achaင’yachaင’ya ojaṭṭhamakarupyatiု’ phaြcya
phā”shā”puṃtaññya”．
tacyaphanya yaငya”cakkhudasaka kalāpyathaငya pāvaငyataññyaraှိso ojākiု akaြောငya”khaṃ၍ akhaြkheṃ၍ āhāra
samuṭṭhānya ojaṭṭhamakarupya utusamuṭṭhānya ojaṭṭhamakarupyatiု’ naှcyakhha naှcyakhha phaြာthhakya၍ phaြcyaphā”shā”puṅkiုlaññya” chakya
lakya phoyapaြapyapāsaññya．
715
rupyakammaṭṭhānya”piုငya”
yaငya” cakkhudasaka kalāpya၌ pāvaငyataññyaraှိso ojāsaññya ṭhīkālasiု’rokyakhiုkya āhārasamuṭṭhānya
ojā၏ athokyaapaṃ’kiု raraှိsoakhā ojaṭṭhamaka rupyakalāpyaasacyakiု phaြcyacepaြnya၏． āhārapaccaya
āhārasamuṭṭhānyarupya maññya၏． (visuddhi-2-251．) tacyanaññya” kammapaccaya āhārasamuṭṭhānyarupya maññya၏． 
(visuddhi-2-249-250．)
yaငya” āhārapaccaya āhārasamuṭṭhānyarupyathaငya tejodhātyalaññya” pāvaငyapaြnya၏， ojālaññya” pāvaငya
paြnya၏．
1． yaငya” āhārapaccaya āhārasamuṭṭhānya --- tejodhātyakalaññya” ṭhīkālasiု’rokyakhiုkya ojaṭṭhamaka
rupyakalāpyaasacyakiု phaြcyacepaြnya၏． (kammajāhārasamuṭṭhāna utusamuṭṭhānya) = utusamuṭṭhānyarupyataññya”．
(mahāṭī-2-401．)
2． yaငya” āhārapaccaya āhārasamuṭṭhānya --- ojākalaññya” ṭhīkālasiု’rokyakhiုkya ojaṭṭhamaka rupyakalāpyaasacyakiု
phaြcyacepaြnya၏． (kammajāhārasamuṭṭhāna āhārasamuṭṭhānya) = āhārasamuṭṭhānyarupya
taññya”．
tacyaphanya yaငya”athakyapā amaှtya (1) utusamuṭṭhānyarupyathaငyalaññya” tejodhātyanaှင’ya ojātiု’ pāvaငyalaျkya
raှိpaြnya၏． yaငya” tejodhātyakalaññya” ojaṭṭhamakarupyakiု phaြcyacepaြnya၏， yaငya” ojākalaññya” ojaṭṭhamakarupyakiု
phaြcyacepaြnya၏． (utupaccaya utusamuṭṭhānya， āhārapaccaya āhārasamuṭṭhānyarupya asī”asī”taññya”．) īnaññya”
atiုငya” (4)kaြိmya (5)kaြိmyasoyalaññya”koငya”， thiုthakya alhanyasoyalaññya”koငya” rupyakalāpyatiု’၏ phaြcyakhaြငya”kiု
chakyacapyace၏． ñāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyaaောငya raှုpā．
tacyaphanya yaငya”athakyapā amaှtya (2) āhārasamuṭṭhānya ojaṭṭhamaka rupyakalāpyaasacyathaငyalaññya” tejo
dhātyanaှင’ya ojātiု’ pāvaငyalaျkyapaငya raှိpaြnya၏． yaငya”tejodhātyakalaññya” ojaṭṭhamaka rupyakalāpyaasacyakiု
laññya”koငya”， yaငya” ojākalaññya” ojaṭṭhamaka rupyakalāpyaasacyakiုlaññya”koငya” asī”asī” phaြcyacepaြnya၏．
īsiု’laျှငya (4)kaြိmya (5)kaြိmyasoyalaññya”koငya”， thiုthakya alhanyasoyalaññya”koငya” rupyakalāpyatiု’၏ phaြcyacañyakiု
chakyacapyace၏， ñāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyaaောငya raှုpā．
īkā” cakkhudasaka kalāpya tacyakhu athaငya”၌ pāvaငyataññyaraှိso ---
1． tejodhātyakiု akhaြkheṃ၍ utusamuṭṭhānya āhārasamuṭṭhānyahūso naှcyamaျို” naှcyamaျို”so ojaṭṭhamaka
rupyatiု’ naှcyakhha naှcyakhha achaင’yachaင’ya phaြcyaphā”poyapokyashā”puṃnaှင’ya ---
2． ojākiု akhaြkheṃ၍ utusamuṭṭhānya āhārasamuṭṭhānyahūso naှcyamaျို” naှcyamaျို”so ojaṭṭhamakarupyatiု’
naှcyakhha naှcyakhha achaင’yachaင’ya phaြcyaphā” poyapokyashā”puṃtaññya”．
cakkhudasaka kalāpya athaငya”၌ taññyaraှိso tejodhātyanaှင’ya ojātiု’maှ utusamuṭṭhānya āhāra
samuṭṭhānyahūso naှcyamaျို” naှcyamaျို”so ojaṭṭhamaka rupyatarā”maျာ” phaြcyaphā”shā”sakaဲ’siု’ alā”tūpaငya cakkhudhāra၌
taññyaraှိso kāyadasakakalāpya， bhā0dasakakalāpya， cittajaaṭṭhakalāpya， utujaaṭṭhakalāpya， āhā-
rajaaṭṭha kalāpyahūso kalāpya asī”asī”၌ taññyaraှိso tejodhātyanaှင’ya ojā asī”asī”tiု’kalaññya”
utusamuṭṭhānya āhārasamuṭṭhānyahūso naှcyamaျို” naှcyamaျို”so ojaṭṭhamaka rupyakalāpya asacyaasacyakiု asī”
asī” achaင’yachaင’ya phaြcyapoyacepuṅkiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyaaောငya raှု၍ simya”chaññya”pā． thiုsiု’ raှုphā” simya”chaññya”rā၌
kammajarupyatiု’၏ athokyaapaṃ’， citya၏ athokyaapaṃ’， utu၏ athokyaapaṃ’， āhāra၏ athokyaapaṃ’
716
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
hūso thiုthiု athokyaapaṃ’ akaြောငya”tarā”tiု’ka chiုငyarāchiုငyarā rupyatiု’ā” thiုkyasaliု kaျေ”jū”paြုpe”puṃ
kiုlaññya” raှေ”thaငya raှငya”paြkhaဲ’sañña’yaatiုငya” sabhopokyaaောငya raှုphā”simya”chaññya”pāle． achaင’ya akaြိmya anaññya”
amaျာ”kiုlaññya” raှေ”thaငya raှငya”paြkhaဲ’sañña’yaatiုငya”sā maှtyasā”pā． (cāmaျkyanaှာ-649-694 - tiု’၌ kaြñña’yapā．)
kammapaccaya - cittaja - āhārasamuṭṭhānyarupya --- naှluṃ”aိmya athaငya”၌ taññyaraှိso hadayavatthurupyakiု
maှီ၍ phaြcyaso sampaṭicchiုငya” santīraṇa tadāruṃ bhavaငya caso vipākyacityamaျာ”kaြောင’ya phaြcyaso ojaṭṭhamakarupyasaññya
kammapaccaya cittasamuṭṭhānyarupya maññya၏． (visuddhi-2-249．)
yaငya” kammapaccaya cittasamuṭṭhānyaphaြcyaso ojaṭṭhamakarupyathaငya ojā pāvaငyalaျkya raှိ၏． yaငya” ojāsaññya
ṭhīkālasiု’ rokyaraှိkhiုkya āhārasamuṭṭhānyaojā၏ athokyaapaṃ’kiု raraှိsoakhā ojaṭṭhamaka rupya
kalāpyaasacyakiု phaြcyacepaြnya၏． kammapaccaya cittajāhārasamuṭṭhānyarupya maññya၏． (mahāṭī-2-401．)

paccaya cittasamuṭṭhānya tejodhātyautukalaññya” ojaṭṭhamakarupyakiု phaြcyaceniုငyasaññyasātaññya”． (visuddhi-2-

thā”saññyakiု thokyapā． raှေ”thaငya phoyapaြkhaဲ’paြီ．»»
