raှိso saddana0ka kalāpyarupyatiု’၏ apoငya”acumaျှsā phaြcyasaññya． yaငya” assāsa-passāsa koṭṭhāsakā”
naှcyamaျို” raှိsaင’ya၏hu charāmaြtyatiု’ ayūraှိtoyamūkaြpaြnya၏． raṅkhā asakyaraှူ၍ koငya”၏， po’pā”shakyalakya၏，
khaျောññakya၏， akhaျို”kaျ၏． raṅkhā asakyaraှူ၍ makoငya” phaြcyatatyapaြnya၏， po’pā”shakyalakyamaှု maraှိ， khaျောmhe’maှု
maraှိ， akhaျို”kaျ achaငyapaြmeှု maraှိ． siု’athakya assāsa-passāsatiု’၌ - lahutā+mudutā+kammaññatā rupya
tiု’ pā-mapā naှcyamaျို” paြာ”shā”saññya． siု’athakya cittajakalāpya (8)caññya” phaြcyarasaññya．
īrupyakalāpyatiု’kiု raှုphā”liုso yogā0carapuggiုlyasaññya athakyathaငya phoyapaြthā”so (6)dhāra
(42)koṭṭhāsatiု’၌taññyaraှိso rupyatarā”tiု’kiု simya”chaññya”thā”paြီ”pāka piု၍koငya”pāsaññya． anaññya”chuṃ”
(6)dhāra၌ taññyaraှိso rupyaacacyatiု’kiု simya”chaññya”thā”paြီ”sū phaြcyarapemaññya． rupyaacacyamaျာ”kiု paramatyasiု’ ñāṇya
amaြငya chiုkyaaောငya raှုphā” simya”chaññya”paြီ”pāmaှ rupyaatumaျာ”kiု siု’mahutya rupyaatumaျာ”naှင’ya ronaှောneso
rupyakalāpyamaျာ”kiု simya”chaññya”phiု’ranya lhayyakūmaññya phaြcyapesaññya．
1． cittaja suddhaṭṭhaka kalāpya ---- (6)dhāra (42)koṭṭhāsatiု’၌ cittajarupyakiု raှုphā”simya”chaññya”sañña’yaatiုငya”
hadayavatthurupyakiု maှီ၍ phaြcyaneso cityakaြောင’ya cittaja ojaṭṭhamakarupyamaျာ” achakyamapaြtya phaြcyanepuṅkiု
ñāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyaaောငya kaြñña’ya၍ raှုphā”simya”chaññya”pā．
2． kāyaviññatti na0ka kalāpya ---- bhavaငyamanoakaြññyathaငya cityaciုkya၍ lakyaññaှို”tacyakhaျောငya”kiု khe”
726
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
kaြñña’yapā， chana’yakaြñña’yapā． khe”khaျငyasocitya chana’yakhaျငyasocitya caso cityaasī”asī”kaြောင’ya citya
tacyakhu tacyakhuka rupyakalāpyapoငya”maျာ”chā phaြcyathhanya” poyapokyacesaññyakiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyaaောငya kaြñña’yapā．
thiုcittajarupyakalāpyamaျာ” tacyakiုyyaluṃ”siု’ paျံ’naှံ’ shā”saññyakiု maြငyasoakhā khe”nesolakyaññaှို”
athi thiုcittajarupyamaျာ” paျံ’naှံ’shā”saññyakiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyaaောငya kaြñña’yapā， raှုpā． lakyaññaှို”kiု mathe’
to’bhaဲ rupyakalāpyaamaှုnyamaျာ”kiုsā the’raှိnemaññya phaြcyasaññya． thiု rupyakalāpyapoငya”maျာ”chāthaဲka khe”
khaျငya chana’yakhaျငyaso cityakaြောင’ya phaြcyathhanya”poyapokyalāso cittajarupyamaျာ”kiုsā thiု khe”maှု chana’yamaှု paြု
neso lakyaññaှို”၌ ñāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyaaောငya chakyaraှုpā． thiု rupyakalāpyatiု’maှာ ojaṭṭhamaka rupyakalāpyatiု’
paငyataññya”． thiု (8)maျို”so rupyatiု’naှင’yaatū khe”khaျငya chana’yakhaျငyaso cityanaှင’yaatū phaြcyaneso khe”sañña’ya
amūarā chana’yasañña’ya amūarā rupyatiု’kiု (= kāyaviññatyarupyatiု’kiု) ñāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyaaောငya chakya၍
simya”chaññya”pā． (8+kāyaviññatya = 9) kāyaviññatti na0ka kalāpya rupyatarā”tiု’ phaြcyakaြsaññya．
3． lahutādekadasaka kalāpya ---- athakyapā cittaja ojaṭṭhamakarupyamaျာ”kiု maြငyaaောငya kaြñña’yapā． raṅkhā
thiုrupyatiု’၌ po’pā”shakyalakyamaှု = lahutā， nū”ññaṃ’paျော’paျောငya”maှု = mudutā， akhaျို”kaျ achaငyapaြmeှု =
kammaññatā - hūso rupyaatumaျာ”laññya” ronaှော၍ pāvaငyanemaှုkiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyaaောငya kaြñña’yapā，
simya”chaññya”pā．
4． kāyaviññattilahutādi dhādasaka kalāpya ---- athakyapā kāyaviññatti na0ka kalāpyakiု paြnyaraှုpā．
tacyakhātacyaraṃ khe”၍ chana’ya၍ po’pā”shakyalakyamaှု raှိ၏， nū”ññaṃ’paျော’paျောငya”maှု raှိ၏， khe”၍ chana’ya၍ akhaျို”
kaျ achaငyapaြmeှု raှိ၏． thiုakhā lahutā-mudutā-kammaññatātiု’ pāvaငyane၏．raṅkhā thiုsiု’ mahutyapāka
thiုrupya (3)maျို”tiု’ mapāvaငyape． thiုrupya (3)maျို”tiု’ mapāvaငyasoya kāyaviññatti na0ka kalāpya phaြcya၍ thiုrupya
(3)maျို”tiု’ pāvaငyasoya kāyaviññatti lahutādi dhādasaka kalāpya phaြcyasaññya． kaြhaငya”kaျnyaso khe”khaြငya”
chana’yakhaြငya”， shā”khaြငya” caso thiုthiု kiုyyaamūarātiု’၌laññya” naññya”tū raှုpā． iriyāpatha raှုkhakya
sampajaññaraှုkhakyatiု’၌ - īrupyakalāpya naှcyamaျို”tiု’kā” paြdhānya”laျkya raှိ၏． nokyapiုငya”thaငya iriyāpatha
raှုkhakyanaှင’ya sampajaññaraှုkhakyatiု’kiု thapyamaṃ၍ phoyapaြū”maññya phaြcyapāsaññya．
5． 0cīviññatti dasaka kalāpya (0cīviññatti saddadasaka kalāpya) ---- asaငyayogīsūtoyakoငya”saññya
bhavaငyamanoakaြññyadhātyathaငya cityakiု ciုkyathā”laျkya (ka-kha) hu asaṃtiု”tiု”kale”phaြင’ya rhatyaphatya
kaြñña’yapā． ka-kha-hu rhatyaphatyakhaျငyasocitya rhatyaphatyasocityatiု’kaြောင’ya cittajaojaṭṭhamakarupyatiု’ achakya
mapaြtya raှေ”naှင’yanokya chakyacapyalaျkya maျာ”chā phaြcyanepuṅkiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyaaောငya raှုpā． ka-khatiု’kā”
laññyakhaျောငya”ṭhāna၌ phaြcyaso akkharātiု’ phaြcyakaြsaphaြင’ya thiုakkharāmaျာ” phaြcyapoyarā laññyakhaျောငya”ṭhānasiု’
tiုငyaaောငya ojaṭṭhamakarupyatiု’ paျံ’naှံ’shā”puṅkiု maြငyaaောငya raှုpā． laññyakhaျောငya”ṭhānathaငya santati acañya
ā”phaြင’ya phaြcyapoyanekaြso kāyadasakakalāpya caso rupyakalāpyatiု’ raှိkaြ၏． yaငya”cittajaoja
ṭṭhamakarupyatiု’thaငya pāvaငyaso pathavīdhātyasaññya laññyakhaျောငya”၌ taññyaraှိnekaြso kāyadasakakalāpya
casaññyatiု’၌ pāvaငyaso kammajapathavīdhātyatiု’kiု vāyodhātya akūaññīphaြင’ya laññyakhaျောငya”ṭhāna၌ riုkya
khatyamisoakhā asaṃ thhakyapoyalā၏． ka-kha-hu paြောchiုneso naှုtyaamūarā 0cīviññatyalaññya”
raှိne၏． siု’athakya (8+asaṃ+0cīviññatya = 10) 0cīviññatti dasaka kalāpya phaြcyasaññya． kaျnyaso
akkharātiု’၌laññya” thiုthiု rhatyachiုliုkyaso akkharātiု’၏ phaြcyarāṭhānasiု’tiုငyaaောငya liုkya၍ naññya”tū
paငya raှုkaြñña’yapā．
727
rupyakammaṭṭhānya”piုငya”
6． 0cīviññattisaddalahutādi terasaka kalāpya ---- raṅkhā ka-kha caso cakā”saṃ phaြcyapoyalāaောငya
rhatyaphatyarasaññyamaှာ po’pā”shakyalakyane၏， khaျောmhe’ne၏， akhaျို”kaျ achaငyapaြnee၏， lahutā mudutā
kammaññatātiု’laññya” pāvaငyalāpaြnya၏． 0cīviññattisaddalahutādi terasaka kalāpya phaြcya၏． raṅkhā
shakyashakyalakyalakya maraှိbhaဲ makhaျောmhe’bhaဲ akhaျို”makaျ phaြcyanepāka lahutā mudutā kammaññatātiု’
mapāvaငyato’pe． thiုakhā 0cīviññattidasaka kalāpya phaြcyasaññya．
thiုthiု asaṃphaြcyarā akkharāphaြcyarā ṭhāna၌ santati acañyaā”phaြင’ya phaြcyanekaြso kammajakalāpyatiု’thaငya
pāvaငyaso kammajapathavīdhātyatiု’kā” tuṃ”-naှင’yatū၏． thiုthiု asaṃphaြcyarā akkharāphaြcyarā ṭhānasiု’tiုငyaaောငya
santatiacañyaā”phaြင’yapaျံ’naှံ’phaြcyapoyashā”kaြso cittajarupyakalāpyamaျာ”chāthaငya pāvaငyaso pathavīdhātyatiု’kā”
lakyariုkya-naှင’ya tū၏． tuṃ”kiု lakyariုkyaphaြင’ya riုkyanesañña’ya amūarānaှင’ya 0cīviññatya tū၏． thiု 0cīviññatyakā”
thiုthiု akkharāasaṅkiု phaြcyaceliုso cityakaြောင’ya phaြcyapoyalāso vāyodhātyakaြောင’ya phaြcyapoyalāra၏．
thiုvāyodhātyakā” cityakaြောင’ya phaြcyara၏． siု’athakya cityakaြောင’yaphaြcyaso vāyodhātya၏ sabhā0satti
chamya”aငya lhanyakaဲneso rupyatarā”apoငya” = rupyakalāpyaapoငya”၏ tacyakiုyyaluṃ”siု’ paျံ’naှံ’၍ shā”khaြငya”kaြောင’ya
cakā”saṃmaျာ” phaြcyapoyalāra၏． ñāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyaaောငya raှုranya phaြcyasaññya．
7． assāsapassāsa - cittajasaddana0ka kalāpya ---- hadayavatthukiု maှီ၍ phaြcyaneso cityatiု’kaြောင’ya
vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyaletiု’ phaြcyapoyapuṃ siု’mahutya vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale amaññyaraso
saddana0kakalāpyarupyatarā”tiု’ phaြcyapuṅkiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyaaောငya raှုpā． asakyaraှူlamya”kaြောငya” athaငya”၌
taññyaraှိphaြcyaphā”neso lekiု raှေ”ū”chā maြငyaaောငya raှုpā． thiုlekiု samādhilaငya”roငyakhaြññya chamya”aငya
phaြင’ya the’maြငyasoakhā dhātyakaြီ” (4)pā”kiု thiုlethaငya”၌ maြငyaaောငya raှုpā． thiု vaငyasakyale thhakya
sakyale athaငya”၌ dhātyakaြီ” (4)pā”kiု maြငyaaောငya raှုniုငyapāka samādhiaraှိnyaralāsaññyanaှင’ya tacyapaြိုငyanakya
rupyakalāpyaamaှုnyamaျာ”kiု cataငya the’raှိmaññya phaြcyasaññya． thiုkalāpya amaှုnyamaျာ”kiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya khhaဲkhaြာ”citya
phaြာ၍ raှုpāka - asakyaraှူsaṃnaှင’ya takha (9)maျို”so rupyaparamatyatarā”tiု’kiု the’raှိniုငyapāsaññya． asakya
raှူsaṃ hūsaññya yaငya”asakyaraှူlamya”kaြောငya”thaငya taññyaraှိkaြso kalāpyatiု’၏ pathavīdhātyanaှင’ya yaငya”
cittajakalāpyatiု’၏ pathavīdhātyatiု’ akhaျငya”khaျငya” riုkyakhatya၍ poyalāso asaṃtaññya”． cityakaြောင’ya
ojaṭṭhamakarupyatiု’ asakyaraှူle၌ phaြcyanepuṃ， pathavīdhātyatiု’ akhaျငya”khaျငya” riုkyakhatya၍ asaṃ phaြcyapoyanepuṃ，
kalāpyatacyakhu tacyakhuathaငya”၌ asaṃnaှင’yatakha rupyasabhotarā” (9)maျို”cī raှိpuṃtiု’kiု maြငyaaောငya raှုpā．
akayya၍ asakyaraှူlamya”kaြောငya”၌ taññyaraှိneso vaငyasakyale thhakyasakyale athaငya”၌ santati
acañyaā”phaြင’ya phaြcyaneso dhātyakaြီ” (4)pā”kiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyaaောငya ciုkyaraှုsoyalaññya” rupyakalāpya amaှုnya
maျာ”kiု mathe’se”bhaဲ atuṃ”akhaဲ phaြcyanese”pāka ākāsadhātyakiု maြငyaaောငya ciုkyaraှုliုkyaniုငyapāka rupya
kalāpya amaှုnyamaျာ”kiု lhayyakūchā the’raှိniုငyapāsaññya． laငya”roငyakhaြññyachamya”aငya၏ akūaññīkiုkā” maျာ”chā
liုapyanemaññyasā phaြcyapesaññya．
raṅkhā asakyaraှူsaññyamaှာ po’po’pā”pā” shakyashakyalakyalakya khaျောkhaျောmhe’mhe’ akhaျို”kaျ achaငyapaြေ
ne၏， asakyaraှူ၍ koငya”ne၏． lahutā-mudutā-kammaññatātiု’ pāvaငya၏． raṅkhā asakyaraှူ kaြpyanetatya
၏， le”le”laṃlaṃ kaြmya”kaြmya”tamya”tamya” phaြcyane၏， asakyaraှူ၍ akhaျို”makaျ phaြcyanetatya၏． lahutāmudutā-
kammaññatātiု’ mapāvaငyape． assāsapassāsa cittajasaddalahutādidhādasaka kalāpyanaှင’ya assāsa
passāsa cittajasaddana0ka kalāpyatiု’ phaြcyakaြ၏．
728
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
ī rupyatarā”tiု’thaငya kāyaviññatya 0cīviññatya lahutā mudutā kammaññatānaှင’ya ākāsadhātya
tiု’kā” rupyaatusā phaြcyakaြ၏． vipassanā maraှုkoငya”so rupyatiု’ phaြcyakaြ၏． siု’soya nāmarūpaparicchedañāṇya
piုငya”၌ yaငya”rupyaatutiု’kiုpā ronaှော၍ simya”chaññya”ranya visuddhimaggaaṭṭhakathā dutiyathaဲ cāmaျkyanaှာ (225)၌
ññhaှnyakaြာ”thā”pesaññya．
utuja rupyakalāpya (4) caññya”
1． suddhaṭṭhaka kalāpya = sakyasakyaso utuja ojaṭṭhamaka kalāpya．
2． saddana0ka kalāpya = asaṃlaျှငya (9)khumaြောkyaraှိso utuja saddana0ka kalāpya．
3． lahutādekadasaka kalāpya = lahutācasaññyalaျှငya (11)khumaြောkyaraှိso utujarupyakalāpya．
4． saddalahutādi dhādasaka kalāpya = asaṃ lahutā casaññyalaျှငya (12) khumaြောkya raှိsorupyakalāpya．
(8+asaṃ+lahutā+mudutā+kammaññatā = 12．)
īrupyakalāpyatiု’thaငya suddhaṭṭhakakalāpya saddana0kakalāpyatiု’kā” rupyaacacyatiု’sātaññya”． vipassanā
raှုkoငya”so rupyamaျာ”taññya”． suddhaṭṭhaka kalāpyakā” (6)dhāra (42)koṭṭhāsatiု’၌ thiုkyasaliု utujarupya
phaြcyakhhaင’yaraှိrātiု’၌ raraှိniုငya၏． saddana0ka kalāpyakā” vamya”aောyasaṃ caso asaṃpāso rupyakalāpyataññya”．
ī suddhaṭṭhakakalāpyanaှင’ya saddana0kakalāpyatiု’kā” ajjhatta၌laññya”koငya”， bahiddha sakyaraှိloka sakyamaဲ’
loka naှcyamaျို”luṃ”၌laññya”koငya” taññyaraှိ၏．
amaှtya (3-4) rupyakalāpyatiု’kā” rupyaatumaျာ”naှင’ya ronaှောneso rupyakalāpyamaျာ” phaြcyakaြ၏． lahu
tā mudutā kammaññatātiု’kā” vipassanāmaraှုkoငya”so rupyaatumaျာ”sā phaြcyakaြ၏． yaငya”rupya (3)maျို”kiု
vipassanāmaraှုkoငya”saphaြင’ya phayyathutyaliုkyapāka suddhaṭṭhakakalāpyanaှင’ya saddana0kakalāpyatiု’sā kaြhaငya”kaျnya
to’၏． raှေ”thaငya phoyapaြkhaဲ’so (6)dhāranaှင’ya (42)koṭṭhāsatiု’thaငya akhaျို’koṭṭhāsatiု’၌ taññyaraှိso utu
jarupya raှုkhakyatiု’kiု naññya”maှီ”၍ raှုpāle． yaငya” amaှtya (3-4) rupyakalāpyatiု’kā” rupyanāmyakiု simya”chaññya”rā
nāmarūpaparicchedañāṇyapiုငya”၌sā ronaှော၍ simya”chaññya” raှုphā”ramañña’ya rupyatarā”tiု’ phaြcyakaြsaññya． yaငya”naှcyamaျို”
so rupyakalāpyatiု’kā” anindaြိyabaddhaphaြcyaso bahiddha sakyamaဲ’arāvatthutiု’၌ maraniုငya． ajjhatta bahiddha sakyaraှိ
sattavātiု’ santānya၌sā raniုငyasaññya．
āhāraja rupyakalāpya (2) caññya”
1． suddhaṭṭhaka kalāpya = sakyasakyaso āhāraja-ojaṭṭhamaka kalāpya．
2． lahutādekadasaka kalāpya = lahutācasaññyalaျှငya (11)khumaြောkyaraှိso rupyakalāpya． (8+
lahutā+mudutā+kammaññatā = 11．)
īrupyakalāpya naှcyamaျို”tiု’thaငya suddhaṭṭhakakalāpyakā” (6)dhāra၌laññya”koငya”， (42)koṭṭhāsatiု’thaငya
akhaျို’so koṭṭhāsatiု’၌laññya”koငya” raraှိniုငya၏， rupyaacacyatiု’taññya”． vipassanā raှုkoငya”so sammasana
rupyataññya”．
729
rupyakammaṭṭhānya”piုငya”

rupyatiု’၏ phokyapaြnyamaှုkā” paြိttābhuṃbha0၌laññya”koငya”， dubbhikkhabhe” acāငtyamhatyakhoငya”pā”khaြငya” bhe”chiု”

rupyakammaṭṭhānya”piုငya”

arapyatiု’၌ maှkya-khaြငya-yaငyatiု’၏ kiုkyakhaဲkhaြငya”kaြောင’ya rupyatiု’၏ phokyapaြnyamaှု piု၍ thaငyaraှာ”၏． ငှkyaphaျာ”rogā
casaññyatiု’kā” phokyapaြnyamaှု thaငyaraှာ”so sādhakatiု’taññya”．

casaññyatiု’ phaြcyalātatyakunya၏． naှluṃ”she”kaြော， ū”ṇaှောkyashe”kaြော casaññyatiု’ paြtyashā”tatyakunya၏．
maျkyaci kāṇya”tatya၏， kunya”kha shā”tatya၏， chhaṃashā”tatya၏． nepūkaြောင’ya phokyapaြnyamaှုkā” saဲkantāra
tiု’၌ piု၍ thaငyaraှာ”၏．

pe၏． rapyakhaြငya” casaññyatiု’၌laññya” naññya”tū maှtyapā． (dī-ṭṭha-2-357． ma-ṭṭha-1-255-256．)
sattavāhūso ayūacha
sattūpaladdhinti satto atthīti upaladdhi H sattaggāhaṃ na jahati na pariccajati “ahaṃ gacchāmi， mama gamana”nti
gāhasabbhā0to． tato e0 attasaññaṃ “atthi attā kārako vedako”ti evaṃ pavattaṃ viparītasaññaṃ
na ugghāṭeti nāpaneti apaṭipakkhabhā0to， ananubaြူhanato vā． evaṃ bhūtassa cassa kuto
kammaṭṭhānādibhāvoti āha “kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā satipaṭṭhānabhā0nā vā na hotī”ti． (ma-ṭī-1-351-352．)
737
rupyakammaṭṭhānya”piုငya” -- iriyāpatha akhanya” naှင’ya sampajañña akhanya”
aိmyakhhe” maြkhehe” caso sattavātiု’၏ “shā”laျှငya shā”၏”hu shā”khaြငya”maျှlokyakiုsā sisañña’ya
sāmanyaasimaျို”saññyakā” - “ငါshā”၏， ငါ၏ shā”khaြငya”taññya”” - hu īsiု’ chaဲlamya”khaြငya” chaဲyūkhaြငya”၏ thaငyaraှာ”
raှိnesaññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’ya “sattavāsaññya raှိ၏”hūso ayūachakiု sattavāhu chaဲlamya”khaြငya” chaဲyūkhaြငya”kiု
mapayyachana’yaniုငyape．
thiုsiု’ mapayyachana’yaniုငyasokaြောင’yapaငyalaျှငya - “paြုlupyatatyaso khaṃcā”tatyaso attasaññya raှိ၏”hu
īsiု’ phaြcyapoyalāso maှာ”yhaငya”phokyapaြnyaso amaှtyasaññāhūso attasaññākiု mapayyakhhāniုငya， mapayya
chana’yaniုငya． thiုsiု’ shā”laျှငya shā”၏hu sāmanyasiso asimaျို”saññyakā” thiုattasaññānaှင’ya thipyatiုkya chana’ya
kaျငyabhakya maphaြcyasokaြောင’yalaññya”koငya”， anattānupassanāñāṇyakiု matiု”phā”cetatyasokaြောင’ya
laññya”koငya” attasaññākiု mapayyachana’yaniုငyape．
īsiု’ attasaññākiု mapayyachana’yaniုငyaso shā”laျှငya shā”၏hu sāmanyaasimaျို” phaြcyapoyaneso thiု
yogā0carapuggiုlya၏ santānyavayya abhayyamaှာlaျှငya kammaṭṭhānya”casaññya phaြcyaniုငyapāaṃ’naññya”， thiုkaြောင’ya “kammaṭṭhānya”
laññya” maphaြcya， satipaṭṭhānyakiု phā”maျာ”ā”thutyakhaြငya”hūso satipaṭṭhānabhā0nālaññya” maphaြcya”hu aṭṭhakathā
charātoya phhaင’yachiုtoyamūkhaြငya” phaြcyapesaññya． (ma-ṭī-1-351-352．)
īathakyapā aṭṭhakathā ṭīkātiု’၏ phhaင’yachiုkhaျkyaara shā”laျှငya shā”၏hu， rapyalaျှငya rapya၏hu， thiုငyalaျှငya
thiုငya၏hu， laျောငya”laျှငya laျောငya”၏hu shā”khaြငya”maျှ rapyakhaြငya”maျှ thiုငyakhaြငya”maျှ laျောငya”khaြငya”maျှlokyakiုsā sine
sañña’ya sāmañña asimaျို”kā” kammaṭṭhānya”laññya” mahutya， satipaṭṭhānyakiု phā”maျာ”nesañña’ya satipaṭṭhānabhā0nā
laññya” mahutyasaññyakiုkā” athū”garupaြု၍ maှtyasā”saင’yapesaññya． sapityakhaဲ kiုyyakaျေ maphaြcyaphiု’ranya satipe”
neso cakā”maျာ”paငya phaြcyakaြ၏．
alaျောyaā”phaြင’yachiုramū shā”khaြငya”caso thiုthiု iriyāputhyaakhiုkya၌ phaြcyapoyaneso rupyatarā”tiု’၏
athū”apaြာ”kiု khaဲkhaဲpaြာ”paြာ” sineso īyogā0cara rahanya”toya၏ simaှုsaññyakā” sattavāraှိ၏hūso
ayūachakiုlaññya” payyachana’yaniုငya၏， attasaññākiုlaññya” payyakhhāniုငya၏， kammaṭṭhānya”laññya”phaြcya၏， satipaṭṭhānyakiု
phā”nesañña’ya satipaṭṭhānabhā0nālaññya” phaြcya၏． thiုasimaျို”kiု aṭṭhakathācharātoyaka aောkyapāatiုငya”
raှငya”laငya” taငyapaြthā”၏．
tattha ko gacchatīti na koci satto vā puggalo vā gacchati． kassa gamananti na kassaci sattassa
vā puggalassa vā gamanaṃ． ki Hkāraṇā gacchatīti cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphārena gacchati． tasmā esa evaṃ
pajānāti “gacchāmī”ti cittaṃ uppajjati， taṃ vāyaṃ janeti， vāyo viññatti H janeti， cittakiriyavāyodhātu-
vipphārena sakalakāyassa purato abhinīhāro gamananti vuccati． ṭhānādīsupi ese0 nayo．
(dī-ṭṭha-2-357． ma-ṭṭha-1-256．)
1． abhayyasūsaññya shā”sanaññya” hūmūkā” - tacyacuṃtacyayokyaso sattavāsaññyalaññya”koငya”， puggiုlya
saññyalaññya”koငya” shā”saññya mahutya．
abhayyasūsaññya shā”sanaññya”hūso īme”khhanya”kā” ---- shā”khaြငya”kiriyākiု (= shā”maှုkiု) paြုlupya
tatya paြီ”cī”cetatyaso kattusādhanakiုlaññya”koငya”， shā”khaြငya”kiriyākiုlaññya”koငya” (= shā”maှုkiု
laññya”koငya”) - asī”asī” makhhaဲkhaြာ”apyasaññyakiု paြု၍ shā”khaြငya”kaြိyā၏ paြီ”cī”aောငya paြုlupyatatyasū
(kattā”)kiု me”kaြောငya” phaြcyaso pucchātaññya”． thiုame” pucchāsaññyakā” shā”maှုkiု paြုlupyatatyaso kattā”
738
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
aphaြcyaphaြင’ya athū”paြုapyaso attakiု payyaraှာ”khaြငya” anakya raှိ၏． abhayyakaြောင’yanaññya”hūmū rupyadhamma nāmyadhamma
hūso dhammasabhā0tarā” sakyasakyamaျှ၏sālaျှငya shā”khaြငya” kiriyākiု paြီ”cī”cekaြောငya”kiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya
the’maြငyarasokaြောင’ya phaြcya၏． (ma-ṭī-1-352．)
sāsanāpa ayūacha raှိsūtiု’kā” “attasaññya (= asakyakoငya lipyapaြာkoငya viññāṇyakoငya
attakoငyasaññya) shā”khaြငya”caso thiုthiုkiriyākiု paြုlupyatatya၏， thiုthiု āruṅkiု khaṃcā”tatya၏” - īsiု’
casaññyaphaြင’ya chaဲlamya”yuṅkaြññyakaြ၏． buddhaabhidhammā၌kā” paramatthasaccāsabhoā”phaြင’ya sattavā asī”asī”tiု’
santānyavayya raှေ”naှင’yanokya acañyamapaြtya chakyacapyalaျkya phaြcyapoyaneso rupyatarā” acuapuṃnaှင’ya nāmyatarā”
acuapuṃsā raှိ၏． (31)bhuṃ athaငya”၌ ----
1． asaññasatyabhuṃvayya rupyasakyasakyasā taññyaraှိ၏，
2． arūpabhuṃvayya nāmyasakyasakyasā taññyaraှိ၏，
3． khandhā (5)pā”raှိso pañcavokāra (26)bhuṃvayya rupya-nāmya naှcyapā”sā taññyaraှိ၏．
thiုrupyanāmyaka lhaဲ၍ atta hūsaññya maraှိ， tacyabha0paြီ” tacyabha0 paြောငya”rhaှေ’nesañña’ya akaျိtyaakhaဲ akhiုငya
amā anaှcyasāraā”phaြင’ya taññyanesañña’ya mapaျkyacī”tatyaso attasaññya maraှိ． selaျှငya paြtyashā”sañña’ya
attasaññyalaññya” maraှိ． rupyanāmya acuapuṃmaျှsā raှိ၏． siု’athakya shā”sañña’yaakhiုkya၌laññya” shā”so akhaြငya”
arāā”phaြင’ya phaြcyanesañña’ya rupyadhamma nāmyadhamma acuapuṃmaျှsā raှိ၏． shā”maှုkiု paြီ”cī”cetatyaso puggiုlya sattavā
kā” maraှိ， attakā” maraှိ． thiုsiု’ maraှိkhaြငya”kaြောင’ya abhayyasūsaññya shā”pāsanaññya”hūso me”khhanya”kiု aṭṭha
kathācharātoyaka - “tacyacuṃtacyayokyaso sattavāsaññyalaññya”koငya”， puggiုlyasaññyalaññya”koငya”
shā”saññya mahutyapā”hu phaြcheiုtoyamūkhaြငya” phaြcyapesaññya． shā”khaြငya” kiriyākiု paြီ”cī”cetatyaso tarā”kā”
rupyadhamma nāmyadhamma acuapuṃmaျှsā phaြcyasaññya． rupyadhamma nāmyadhamma၏sālaျှငya shā”khaြငya” kiriyākiု paြီ”cī”cetatyasokaြောင’yalaññya”
koငya”， thiုrupyadhamma nāmyadhammamaှ alhatyaphaြcyaso tacyacuṃtacyayokyaso puggiုlya sattavā
atta၏laññya” thaငyaraှာ” maraှိkhaြငya”kaြောင’yalaññya”koငya” - tacyacuṃtacyayokyaso sattavāsaññyalaññya”koငya”，
puggiုlyasaññyalaññya”koငya”， attasaññyalaññya”koငya” mashā”pāhu chiုliုsaññya． (ma-ṭī-1-352．)
2． abhayyasū၏ shā”khaြငya”naññya”hūsaññyakā” - tacyacuṃtacyayokyaso sattavā၏laññya”koငya” puggiုlya၏
laññya”koငya” shā”khaြငya”saññya mahutyapā．
abhayyasū၏ shā”khaြငya”naññya”hūso īme”khhanya”kā” athakyathaငya phoyapaြthā”so anakyaadhippāyya
kiုpaငya pariyāyya tacyamaျို”ā”phaြင’ya paြောchiုkhaြငya”paငyataññya”． shā”khaြငya” kiriyākiု paြုlupyatatya paြီ”cī”cetatya
so kattusādhanakiုlaññya”koငya”， shā”khaြငya” kiriyākiုlaññya”koငya” asī”asī” khhaဲkhaြာ”apyasaññyakiု paြု၍
paြောchiု၏， shā”khaြငya” kiriyā၏ shā”tatyaso kattā”naှင’ya chakyacapyakhaြငya” maraှိsaññya၏aphaြcyakiု yaငya”me”khhanya”ka
thaငyaraှာ” phoyapaြkhaြငya”kaြောင’ya phaြcya၏． maှnyapesaññya ----
1． ko gacchati = abhayyasū shā”sanaññya”，
2． kassa gamanaṃ = abhayyasū၏ shā”khaြငya”naññya” ----
ī me”khhanya” naှcyarapya၌ pāvaငyaso ki H = abhayyasūhūso cakā”saññya chana’yakaျငyabhakya = paṭipakkha
anakyakiု athaငya”၌ choငyaapyasaññyakiု paြု၍ phaြcyapoyalā၏． siု’athakya - ko gacchati = abhayyasūsaññya
shā”sanaññya” hūrā၌ abhayyasūmaှ mashā”hu chiုliုsaññya． kassa gamanaṃ = abhayyasū၏ shā”khaြငya”naññya”hūrā၌
739
rupyakammaṭṭhānya”piုငya” -- iriyāpatha akhanya” naှင’ya sampajañña akhanya”
bhayyasū၏ shā”khaြငya”maှ mahutyahu chiုliုpesaññya． (ma-ṭī-1-352．)
3． ki Hkāraṇāti pana paṭikkhittakattukāya gamanakiriyāya aviparītakāraṇapucchā “gamananti attā
manasā saṃyujjati， mano indaြိyehi ， indaြိyāni attehī”ti e0mādigamanakāraṇapaṭikkhepanato．
tenāha “tatthā”tiādi． (ma-ṭī-1-352．)
3． abhayyaakaြောငya”kaြောင’ya shā”sanaññya”¿ ---- athakyapā me”khhanya” naှcyarapyatiု’၌ shā”khaြငya” kaြိyākiု
paြုlupyatatya paြီ”cī”cetatyaso puggiုlya sattavā attahūso kattā” maraှိkaြောငya” payyathā”paြီ” phaြcya၏．
siု’athakya īme”khhanya”kā” yaငya”siု’ payyaapyapaြီ”so kattā”raှိso kiriyā၏ phaြcyapoyalārakhaြငya”၏
akaြောငya”raငya”cacya phaြcyaso paramatthasaccānayyamaှ maphokyamapaြnya maှnyakanyaso akaြောငya”tarā”kiု me”maြnya”
kaြောငya”phaြcyaso ame”pucchātaññya”．
sāsanāpaayūacharaှိsū akhaျို’tiု’kā” shā”maှုnaှင’ya patyasakya၍ īsiု’ yūchakaြ၏ - “shā”khaြငya”hūsaññya
attakiု cityaphaြင’ya yaှñyacapyape”ra၏， cityakiု indaြteiု’phaြင’ya yaှñyacapyape”ra၏， indaြteiု’kiု attatiု’phaြင’ya yaှñyacapya
pe”ra၏” - īsiု’ yūchakaြ၏． thiုayūachakā” maှာ”yhaငya”phokyapaြnya mamaှnyakanyaso micchāayūachasā
phaြcya၏． abhayyaakaြောငya”kaြောင’ya shā”pāsanaññya”hūso īme”khhanya”kā” yaငya”siု’so maှာ”yhaငya”so ayū
acha acaraှိso micchāakaြောငya”maှ lhatyaso ----
1． laျောyaso paccayaakaြောငya” = ā”pe”thokyapaṃ’tatyaso akaြောငya”，
2． laျောyaso hetuakaြောငya” = phaြcyacetatyaso janakaakaြောငya” ----
hūso akaြောငya”tarā” thaငyaraှာ”raှိso paramatthadhammamaှnyatiု’၏ phaြcyapuṃakhaြငya”arāthū”saññya shā”khaြငya”
maññya၏hu phoyapaြso me”khhanya”taññya”． thiုkaြောင’ya aṭṭhakathācharātoyasaññya ---- tattha ko gacchati - aca
raှိso athakyathaငya phoyapaြthā”so cakā”rapyamaျာ”kiု mina’yachiုtoyamūkhaြငya” phaြcyapesaññya．
tacyacuṃtacyayokyaso puggiုlyasattavāsaññyalaññya”koငya”， attasaññyalaññya”koငya” mashā”khaဲ’soya tacyacuṃ
tacyayokyaso puggiုlyasattavā၏laññya”koငya”， atta၏laññya”koငya” shā”khaြငya” mahutyakhaဲ’soya abhayya
akaြောငya”kaြောင’ya shā”pāsanaññya”hūmū - aphaြko” īsiု’ phaြcya၏． cityasaññya paြုlupyaapyaso cityakaြောင’ya
phaြcyaso vāyodhātyalaှုpyaraှာ”khaြငya”kaြောင’ya = tacyakiုyyaluṃ”siု’ paျံ’naှံ’shā”khaြငya”kaြောင’ya shā”၏ hūpe．
thiုkaြောင’ya yogā0cara rahanya”toyasaññya īsiု’ si၏．
shā”aṃ’hūso cityasaññya phaြcyapoyalā၏， thiုshā”liုmaှု၏ achamya”phaြင’ya phaြcyapoyalāso cityasaññya
vāyodhātyakiု phaြcyace၏． īarā၌ ṭīkācharātoyaka aောkyapāatiုငya” raှငya”paြthā”၏．
vāyaṃ janetīti vāyodhātuadhikaṃ rūpakalāpaṃ janeti， adhikatā cettha sāmatthiyato， na
pamāṇato． gamanacittasamuṭṭhitaṃ sahajātarūpakāyassa thambhanasandhāraṇacalanānaṃ paccayabhūtena ākāra-
visesena pavattamānaṃ vāyodhātuṃ sandhāyāha “vāyo viññatti H janetī”ti．
adhippāyasahabhāvī hi vikāro viññatti， yathāvuttaadhikabhāvene0 ca vāyogahaṇaṃ， na
vāyodhātuyā e0 janakabhā0to， aññathā viññattiyā upādāyarūpabhāvo durupapādo siyā．
(ma-ṭī-1-352．)
740
nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
thiုshā”liုso cityasaññya vāyodhātyakiု phaြcyace၏hu chiုsoyalaññya” vāyodhātya tacyakhutaññya”
kiုsā phaြcyacesaññya mahutya， vāyodhātya၏ sabhā0satti chamya”aငya lhanyakaဲneso rupyakalāpyaapoငya”
kiုsā phaြcyace၏． īarā၌ lhanyakaဲmaှုhūsaññya vāyodhātya၏ paramatthadhammasabhā0satti chamya”aငya lhanyakaဲmaှု
sātaññya”， atiုငya”atāpamāṇa rākhiုငyanaှုnya” akhaျို”acā”ā”phaြင’ya lhanyakaဲmaှုmaျို”kā” mahutyape． shā”liုso
cityakaြောင’ya phaြcyapoyalāso， atūphaြcyaneso (tacyakhaျိnyaathaငya” paြိုငyatū phaြcyanekaြso) sahajāta rūpa
kāya = rupyatarā”apoငya”kiု thokyapaṃ’thā”khaြငya” choငyathā”khaြငya”， sahajāta rūpakāya = rupyatarā”
apoငya”၏ laှုpyaraှာ”khaြငya”tiု’၏ akaြောငya”tarā”phaြcya၍ phaြcyaso akhaြငya”arāathū”phaြင’ya phaြcyapoyalāso
thokyakanyaā” thanya”kanyaā” apaြñña’yaava raှိneso vāyodhātyakiု raññyarhayyatoyamū၍ - vāyo viññattiṃ
janeti = vāyodhātyaka viññatyarupyakiု phaြcyace၏ - hu phhaင’yachiုtoyamūkhaြငya” phaြcyasaññya． (ma-ṭī-1-352．)
īathakyapā aṭṭhakathā ṭīkātiု’၏ phhaင’yachiုtoyamūkhaျkyaara shā”liုso cityakaြောင’ya vāyodhātya
၏ sabhā0satti chamya”aငya lhanyakaဲneso rupyakalāpyaapoငya”saññya phaြcyapoyalā၏， thiုrupyakalāpyatiု’thaငya
pāvaငyaso thokyakanyaā” thanya”kanyaā”hūso sabhā0sattichamya”aငya lhanyakaဲneso vāyodhātyaka
kāyaviññatyarupyakiု phaြcyace၏hu maှtyapā． īarāvayya ---- vāyaṃ janetīti vāyodhātuadhikaṃ rūpakalāpaṃ
janeti (ma-ṭī-1-352．) ---- shā”liုso cityasaññya vāyodhātya tacyakhutaññya”kiုsā phaြcyacesaññya mahutya，
vāyodhātya၏ sabhā0sattichamya”aငya lhanyakaဲneso rupyakalāpyaapoငya”kiုsā phaြcyace၏hu chiုliုkaြောငya”
phhaင’yachiုso ṭīkācharātoya၏ cakā”kiု nibbānyakiု liုlā”toင’yatalaျkyaraှိso asaငyayogī sūtoya
koငya”saññya riုsechā athū”maှtyasā”lerāsaññya．
shā”liုso sattavā၏ athaငya”sabho aliုchandanaှင’ya atūtakha phaြcyapoyalāso kiုyyaamūarā
athū”saññya kāyaviññatya maññya၏． kāyaviññatya၏ akaြောငya”tarā”kiု phhaင’yachiုrā၌ atūphaြcyaso saha
jāta rupyatarā”apoငya”kiု khiုငyakhaṃ’aောငya thokyapaṃ’thā”khaြငya” choငyathā”niုငyakhaြငya” chamya”ā” apaြñña’yaraှိso
thokyakanyasañña’ya vāyodhātya， atūphaြcyaso sahajātarupyatarā”apoငya”kiု laှုpyaraှာ”cekhaြငya”ငှာ chamya”ā”
apaြñña’yaavaraှိso thanya”kanyasañña’ya vāyodhātya - īnaှcyamaျို”so vāyodhātyatiု’၏ sabhā0sattichamya”aငya
lhanyakaဲnesaññya၏ aphaြcyakaြောင’yasālaျှငya - vāyodhātyasaññya viññatyarupyakiုphaြcyace၏hu vāyodhātyakiု
yū၍ aṭṭhakathācharātoya phhaင’yachiုkhaြငya” phaြcyasaññya． vāyodhātya tacyakhutaññya”kasālaျှငya viññatyarupya၏ tiုkya
riုkyaphaြcyacetatyaso janakaakaြောငya”tarā” phaြcyakhaြငya”kaြောင’ya thiုsiု’ phhaင’yachiုkhaြငya” mahutyape． akayya၍ vāyo
dhātya tacyakhutaññya”kasālaျှငya viññatyarupyakiု phaြcyace၏hu yūchakhaဲ’laျှငya viññatyarupya၏ mahābhutya dhātyakaြီ”
(4)pā”kiု maှီ၍ phaြcyaso upādārupyaphaြcyakaြောငya” cakā”saññya makoငya”saphaြင’ya paြီ”socakā” phaြcyalerā၏．
(ma-ṭī-1-352．)
īraှငya”laငya”khaျkyamaျာ”ara athakyapā aṭṭhakathā၏ chiုliုraငya”maှာ īsiု’ phaြcya၏．
shā”aṃ’hūso cityasaññya phaြcyapoyalā၏， thiုshā”liုsaññya၏ achamya”phaြင’ya phaြcyapoyalāso cityakaြောင’ya
vāyodhātya၏ sabhā0sattichamya”aငya lhanyakaဲneso rupyatarā”apoငya”saññya = rupyakalāpyaapoငya”saññya
phaြcyapoyalā၏． yaငya”vāyodhātya၏ sabhā0sattichamya”aငya lhanyakaဲneso rupyatarā”apoငya”ka kāya
viññatyarupyakiု phaြcyace၏． cityasaññya paြုlupyaapyaso cityakaြောင’ya phaြcyaso vāyodhātya၏ sabhā0satti
chamya”aငya lhanyakaဲneso rupyatarā”apoငya”၏ = rupyakalāpyaapoငya”၏ laှုpyaraှာ”khaြငya” paျံ’naှံ’၍shā”khaြငya”kaြောင’ya
aluṃ”cuṃso rūpakāya = rupyatarā”apoငya”၏ raှေ”siု’ sayyachoငyaso akhaြငya”arāā”phaြင’ya phaြcyakhaြငya”kiု

rupyakammaṭṭhānya”piုငya” -- iriyāpatha akhanya” naှင’ya sampajañña akhanya”
shā”khaြငya” hū၍khoyachiုapyapesaññya． rapyakhaြငya” casaññyatiု’၌laññya” īnaññya”atiုငya”paငyataññya”．
(dī-ṭṭha-2-357． ma-ṭṭha-1-256．)
raှုphā”puṃ canacya
asaငyayogā0carapuggiုlyasūmaြtyasaññya mimi raှုphā”liုsañña’ya caṅkaြံtacyanerāthaငya matyatatyarapya၍ samādhi
kiု achaင’yachaင’ya paြnyalaññya thūthoငyapā． (6)dhāra (42)koṭṭhāsatiု’၌ taññyaraှိso rupyatarā”tiု’kiု tacyaphanya
paြnya၍ simya”chaññya”pā． yaငya” (6)dhāra (42)koṭṭhāsa၌ taññyaraှိkaြso kaṃ-citya-utu-āhārataññya”hūso
akaြောငya”tarā” (4)pā”tiု’kaြောင’ya asī”asī” phaြcyapoyalākaြrakunyaso catusamuṭṭhānika rupyasantati acañya
kā” sakalakāyahu aṭṭhakathāka khoyavoyasuṃ”chaဲthā”so raှေ”raှူ asayyachoငyakhaṃraso rupyatarā”cu
tiု’taññya”．
shā”liုso cityakaြောင’ya phaြcyakunyaso vāyodhātya၏ sabhā0satti chamya”aငya lhanyakaဲneso ----
1． kāyaviññatyarupyalaျှငya (9)khumaြောkyaraှိso kāyaviññattina0kakalāpya，
2． kāyaviññatya lahutā casaññyalaျှငya (12)khumaြောkyaraှိso kāyaviññattilahutādi dhādasakakalāpya
ī kāyaviññatyapāso rupyakalāpya naှcyamaျို”tiု’kā” athakyapā (6)dhāra (42)koṭṭhāsa၌ taññyaraှိ
kaြso catusamuṭṭhānika rupyatarā”apoငya”kiု raှေ”raှူ sayyachoငyatatyaso rupyatarā”cutiု’taññya”．
(6)dhāra (42)koṭṭhāsatiု’၌ taññyaraှိso rupyatarā”tiု’kiု khaြုံငုံ၍ simya”chaññya”paြီ”soakhā shā”to’
mañña’ya amūarākiု paြုlupyakaြñña’yapā， anaññya”ငyya shā”kaြñña’yapā． bhavaငyamanoakaြññyakiု simya”chaññya”၍ yaငya”bhavaငya
manoakaြññyadhātya = manodhārakiု achaဲpaြု၍ phaြcyapoyalāso shā”liုsocityakiု simya”chaññya”pā． yaငya”
shā”liုso cityakaြောင’ya viññatyarupya pāvaငyaso athakyapā rupyakalāpya amaျို”acā” naှcyamaျို”， tacyamaျို” tacyamaျို”၌
rupyakalāpyapoငya”maျာ”chātiု’ tacyakiုyyaluṃ”siု’ paျံ’naှံ’၍ phaြcyapoyanekaြpuṅkiု maြငyaaောငya kaြñña’yapā．
maျkyacikiု maှိtyalaျkya khapyaphaြññya”phaြññya” shā”kaြñña’yanepā． kāyaviññatyapāvaငyaso sayyachoငyatatyaso
rupyatarā”tiု’kiု ū”cā”pe”၍ simya”chaññya”pā． yaငya” sayyachoငyatatyaso rupyatarā”tiု’ka asayyachoငyakhaṃ
raso (6)dhāra (42)koṭṭhāsa၌ taññyaraှိso rupyatarā”tiု’kiု raှေ”raှူsayyachoငyanepuṅkiု tacyanaññya”chiုrasoya
raှေ”raှူsayyachoငyaso akhaြငya”arāā”phaြင’ya phaြcyanepuṅkiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyaaောငya kaြñña’yapā， simya”chaññya”raှုphā”pā．
paramatyatiု’၏ sabhomaှnya
paramatyatarā”tiု’kā” alhana’yaalhanya tiုtoငya”so sakyatamya”akhaျိnyakāla raှိkaြsaphaြင’ya tacyanerā
maှ tacyanerāsiု’ paြောငya”rhaှေ’phaြcyaniုငyasañña’ya chamya”ā” maraှိkaြpe． phaြcyasañña’yanerāmaှာpaငya paျkyashā”kaြsañña’ya dhamma
sabhā0tiု’sā phaြcyakaြ၏． siု’athakya raှေ”siု’ sayyachoငyatatyaso rupyatarā”tiု’kalaññya” takayya sayya
choငyanesaññyakā” mahutya， asayyachoငyakhaṃraso rupyatarā”tiု’kalaññya” takayya asayyachoငyakhaṃra
saññyakā” mahutyape． vāyodhātyanaှင’ya viññatyarupyatiု’၏ chamya”aငyakaြောင’ya asacyaasacya chaင’yakāchaင’yakā
raှေ”naှင’ya nokya chakyacapyalaျkya athapyathapya phaြcyaneso rupyatarā”tiု’saññya nerāasacyaasacya၌ paြောငya”laဲ၍
asacyaasacya chaင’yakāchaင’yakā athapyathapya phaြcyanekhaြငya” sabhosā phaြcya၏． yaငya”siု’ mūlaphaြcyanesañña’yanerā၌
thapya၍ maphaြcyabhaဲ nerāasacyaasacya၌ paြောငya”rhaှေ’၍ phaြcyanekhaြငya”saññyakā” vāyodhātyanaှင’ya viññatyarupyatiု’၏

nibbānagāminipaṭipadā -- pathamathaဲ
chamya”aငyakaြောင’yapaငya phaြcyapesaññya． thiုkaြောင’ya raှေ”raှူsayyachoငyaso akhaြငya”arāā”phaြင’ya phaြcyakhaြငya”kiု shā”
khaြငya”hu khoyachiုkaြောငya” phhaင’yachiုkhaဲ’khaြငya” phaြcyapesaññya．
1． sayyachoငyatatyaso rupya，
2． asayyachoငyakhaṃrasorupya ----
ī iriyāpatharaှုkhakyakiု raှုneso yogā0carapuggiုlyasūmaြtyasaññya sayyachoငyatatyasorupya，
asayyachoငyakhaṃrasorupyatiု’kiု khhaဲkhaြာ”၍ raှုtatyaphiု’ khhaဲkhaြာ”၍ sithā”phiု’ liုapyapesaññya．
cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphārena sakalakāyassa purato abhinīhāro gamananti vuccati - hu
athakyathaငya phoyapaြkhaဲ’sañña’yaatiုငya” aṭṭhakathāka phhaင’yachiုthā”toyamūkhaြငya”kaြောင’ya ----
1． shā”liုsocityakaြောင’ya phaြcyaso vāyodhātya၏ sabhā0sattichamya”aငya lhanyakaဲneso rupyakalāpya
anethā”phaြင’ya tacyakiုyyaluṃ”siု’ paျံ’naှံ’laျkya phaြcyaphā”shā”so ---- kāyaviññattina0ka kalāpya，
kāyaviññattilahutādidhādasaka kalāpya - hūso rupyakalāpya amaျို”acā” naှcyamaျို”， rupyakalāpya
tacyamaျို” tacyamaျို”၌ maျာ”chāso arethakya raှိkaြso rupyakalāpyaapoငya” = rupyatarā”apoငya”
tiု’kā” sayyachoငyatatyaso rupyatarā”tiု’taññya”．
2． (6)dhāra (42)koṭṭhāsa၌ taññyaraှိso ----
(ka) kammajarupya，
( kha ) cittajarupya，
( ga ) utujarupya，
(gha) āhārajarupyatiု’kā” asayyachoငyakhaṃraso rupyatarā”tiု’taññya”．
cittajarupya - naှcyabhakyara
na hi pañcadhārikaviññāṇehi gamanādīsu kañci iriyāpathaṃ kappeti． pa ． sabbopi panesa pabhedo
manodhārikaja0neye0 labbhati． (abhi-ṭṭha-2-388．)
īathakyapā sammohavinodanīaṭṭhakathā၏ phhaင’yachiုkhaျkyaara pañcadhārikajovīthi cityaacañyaathaငya”၌
pāvaငyaso pañcadhārikaviññāṇyatiု’saññya maññyasañña’yairiyāputhyakiုmaျှ phaြcyaceniုငyasañña’ya chamya”ā” maraှိpe． siု’soya
cakkhuviññāṇyaacaraှိso pañcaviññāṇyatiု’maှtacyapā” kaျnyapañcadhārikaviññāṇyatiု’kā” cittajarupyasāmanyakiု (= iri-
yāputhya mapāso cittajarupyakiု) phaြcyaceniုငyakaြsaññyakhaျññya” phaြcyakunya၏． yaငya”cittajarupyatiု’kā” asayyachoငya
khaṃraso rupyatarā”aုpyacuthaငya pāvaငya၏． tacyaphanya vīthicityamaှ alhatyaphaြcyaso bhavaငyacityasaññyalaññya” cittajarupya
sāmanyakiု phaြcyaceniုငyasañña’ya chamya”ā” raှိsaññyasā phaြcya၏． yaငya” bhavaငyacityakaြောင’ya phaြcyaso cittajarupyatiု’laññya”
asayyachoငyakhaṃrasañña’ya rupyatarā”aုpyacuthaငya pāvaငya၏．
sayyachoငyatatyaso rupyatarā”tiု’kiု siု’mahutya iriyāpatharupyatarā”tiု’kiု phaြcyaceniုငyaso citya
tiု’kā” manodhārikajovīthicityatiု’sā phaြcyakaြ၏． siု’soya akhaျို’akhaျို’so jhānasamāpattivīthicityatiု’
kaဲ’siု’so manodhārikajovīthicityatiု’saññyalaññya” akhaြာ”so manodhārikajovīthitiု’kaြောင’ya phaြcyapoyane
so iriyāputhya = iriyāpatharupyatiု’kiု chakyalakya taññyataṃ’aောငya khiုငyakhaṃ’aောငya thokyapaṃ’thā”niုငyasañña’ya

rupyakammaṭṭhānya”piုငya” -- iriyāpatha akhanya” naှင’ya sampajañña akhanya”

siု’soya yaငya”jhānasamāpattivīthicityatiု’saññyalaññya” pañcavokārabhuṃ၌ (= khandhā 5-pā”raှိsobhuṃ၌) cittajarupya

apu cya tu ငha pya င fpā0ငlya ska f raှိkaြ၏． thaakd kaြာင hf asayaaf chāငkhya raṃ so rapu tya rā”apu cya tu ငha f - sakalakāyassa

apoငya”kiု raှေ’siု’ raှေ”raှူsayyachoငyakhaြငya”hu phhaင’yachiုthā”pesaññya．
tacyaphanya sayyachoငyatatyaso rupyatarā”bhakya၌kā” ---- cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphārena - casaññya
phaြင’ya cittajarupyasakyasakyakiုsā phhaင’yachiုthā”pesaññya．
siု’athakya iriyāpatharupyakiု phaြcyaceniုငyaso manodhārikajovīthicityatiု’kaြောင’ya phaြcyaso kāya
viññatti na0ka kalāpya， kāyaviññattilahutādi dhādasaka kalāpyahūso cittajarupyatiု’kā” sayyachoငya
tatyaso rupyatarā”maျာ” phaြcyakaြ၍ iriyāpatharupyakiု maphaြcyaceniုငyaso cityakaြောင’ya phaြcyaso cittajarupya
tiု’kā” asayyachoငyakhaṃraso rupyatarā”tiု’thaငya pāvaငyakaြsaññyahu maှtyapā．
asaငyayogā0carapuggiုlyasūmaြtyasaññya sayyachoငyatatyaso rupyatarā”bhakya၌ rupyatuṃ”rupyakhaဲtaññya”
hūso rupyaghanaasī”asī”kiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyaaောငya phaြိုkhhaဲphaျkyachī”laျkya paramatyasiု’ ñāṇyaamaြငyachiုkyaaောငya
raှုphā” simya”chaññya”pā． tacyaphanya asayyachoငyakhaṃraso rupyatarā”bhakya၌laññya” rupyatuṃ”rupyakhaဲtaññya”hūso rupya
ghana asī”asī”kiု ñāṇyaphaြင’ya phaြိုkhhaဲphaျkyachī”laျkya paramatyasiု’ ñāṇyaamaြငyachiုkyaaောငya raှုphā”simya”chaññya”pā，
naှcyabhakyaluṃ”၌ paramatyasiု’ ñāṇyaamaြငya chiုkyasoakhā sayyachoငyatatyaso rupyatarā”cutiု’ka asayya
choငyakhaṃraso rupyatarā”cutiု’kiု raှေ’siု’ raှေ”raှူsayyachoငyaso akhaြငya”arāā”phaြင’ya phaြcyanepuṅkiု ñāṇya
phaြင’ya maြငyaaောငya simya”chaññya”pā， ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”yūpā．
īnāmarūpapariccheda ñāṇyapiုငya”thaငyakā” yakhukaဲ’siု’ rupyatarā”tiု’kiု simya”chaññya”khiုkyavayya ----
1． sayyachoငyatatyaso rupyatarā”tiု’kiု āruṃyū၍laññya” “rupyatarā” rupyatarā””hu simya”chaññya”pā，
ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”yūpā．
2． asayyachoငyakhaṃraso rupyatarā”tiု’kiု āruṃyū၍laññya” “rupyatarā” rupyatarā””hu simya”chaññya”pā，
ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”yūpā．
3． sayyachoငyatatyaso rupyatarā”naှင’ya asayyachoငyakhaṃraso rupyatarā”tiု’kiုlaññya” āruṃyū၍ khaြုံငုံ၍
“rupyatarā” rupyatarā””hu simya”chaññya”pā， ñāṇyaphaြင’ya piုငya”khaြာ”yūpā．
rapyakhiုkya၌ raှုphā” simya”chaññya”puṃ
tataြာpi hi “tiṭṭhāmī”ti cittaṃ uppajjati， taṃ vāyaṃ janeti， vāyo viññatti H janeti， cittakiriya-
vāyodhātuvipphārena sakalakāyassa koṭito paṭṭhāya ussitabhāvo ṭhānanti vuccati．

“sattavā shā”၏， sattavā rapya၏， ငါshā”၏ ငါrapya၏”hu khoyavoyakhaြငya”maျှsaññyasā phaြcyapoyalā၏． thiုkaြောင’ya
raှေ”raှေ” aṭṭhakathācharāmaြtyatiု’saññya aောkyapāatiုငya” mina’yachiုtoyamūkaြsaññya．

cittacetasikā dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ sahajātapaccayena paccayo． (paṭṭhāna-1-5．)
= cityacetasikyatarā”tiု’saññya cityakaြောင’ya phaြcyakunyaso cittasamuṭṭhānyarupyatiု’ā” atūphaြcya၍ kaျေ”jū”
paြုpe”tatyaso sahajātapaccayasattiphaြင’ya kaျေ”jū”paြုpe”tatya၏ - hu bhurā”raှငya hokaြာ”thā”toya
mūkhaြငya”kaြောင’ya - akaြောငya”phaြcyaso cityatarā”naှင’ya akaျို” vāyodhātya， akaြောငya” vāyodhātyanaှင’ya akaျို”
kāyaviññatya - ītarā” (3)maျို”tiု’kā” paြိုငyatūphaြcyakaြso tarā”maျာ”paငya phaြcyakaြ၏．
akaြောငya”phaြcyaso cityatarā”kaြောင’ya phaြcyapoyalākaြrakunyaso sayyachoငyatatyaso kāya
viññatya pāvaငyaso rupyatarā”tiု’kiု iriyāpatharupyatarā”tiု’ hū၍laññya” khoyachiု၏． yogā0carapuggiုlya
saññyakā” cityakaြောင’ya iriyāpatharupyatiု’ phaြcyapuṅkiုlaññya”koငya”， yaငya”iriyāpatha amaññyaraso sayya
choငyatatyaso rupyatarā”tiု’ka asayyachoငyakhaṃraso catusamuṭṭhānika rupyatarā”tiု’kiု shā”soakhaြငya”
arā， rapyasoakhaြငya”arā， thiုငyasoakhaြငya”arā， laျောငya”cakyasoakhaြငya”arāā”phaြင’ya phaြcyapoyalā
aောငya sayyachoငyanepuṅkiုlaññya”koငya” ñāṇyaphaြင’ya maြငyaaောငya raှုphā”simya”chaññya”niုငyapāmaှ - shā”laျှငya shā”၏
hu， rapyalaျှငya rapya၏hu， thiုငyalaျှငya thiုငya၏hu， aိpyalaျှငya aိpya၏hu sisaññya maññyapesaññya． īkā” athakyapā
pāḷitoya aṭṭhakathā ṭīkātiု’၏ chiုliုraငya” anakyasabhotaññya”．
akaြောငya”phaြcyaso cityatarā”
akaြောငya”tarā”bhakya၌ citya-hu chiုthā”soyalaññya” cityatiု’maññyasaññya cetasikyatiု’naှင’ya kaငya”၍ phaြcya
niုငyasañña’yachamya”ā” maraှိpe． thiုkaြောင’ya - cittacetasikā dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ sahajātapaccayena
paccayo - casaññyaphaြင’ya hokaြာ”thā”toyamūsañña’yaatiုငya” cityacetasikyatarā”tiု’kapaငya cittasamuṭṭhānya
rupyatiု’ā” phaြcyacesaññyahu maှtyapā． cityakiု padhānaū”taññya၍ cittajarupyahu (cittasamuṭṭhānyarupyahu) khoyavoyakhaြငya”
phaြcyapesaññya， padhānanaññya”taññya”． yaငya” akaြောငya”phaြcyakunyaso cityacetasikyatiု’kiု raှုphā”puṅkiု nāmyakamma-
ṭṭhānya”piုငya”thaငya phoyapaြmaññya phaြcyapāsaññya． siု’athakya īiriyāpatharaှုkhakya apaြñña’yaacuṅkiု nāmyakammaṭṭhānya”piုငya”

thā”pāsaññya．
